links_reviews_title: Cute but felt like a bag
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this dress more than anything! I really wanted to wear it to a rehearsal dinner but I really felt like I was wearing a bag. It didn't really compliment my frame at all. But that back is absolutely gorgeous! It was lightweight and those pockets! Love! I wish it didn't just hang on me.

Dress was super fun and perfect for a wedding rehearsal and dinner. I wish I could buy it. The fabric was kind of thick but stretchy. I wear a size 8 pants and usually a size 6 dress; I ordered the 4 as backup but it was a little tight (in the inner lining only) around my hips. I didn't see much of a difference in the way the top fit between the 4 and 6. It's a very forgiving fit around the body. I would say I have a pretty lean chest/bust so for women who carry more weight up top they would have to size up for sure
Love the pockets, very comfortable - received several compliments!

I love this dress and would definitely rent it again. Comfortable for eating and dancing. Great color for photos, fully lined with pockets. The neckline is so different! Strapless bra worked great. Dress was the perfect length (I am 5'3"). Definitely recommend.

This is a great dress for the first trimester/early pregnancy when you’re trying to hide a small bump or just feeling a little bigger than normal. I would definitely wear this dress not pregnant as well - super comfy and gorgeous color!

links_reviews_title: Great color and fit for postpartum!
links_reviews_text: I am currently 5’2” 145 lbs and 6 weeks postpartum. The style hid my mid section perfectly. The color was fun for an outdoor summer wedding. Got lots of compliments and would rent again for sure!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Fun neckline, bright pink color. Received complements all night. Hid my problem area (stomach) well. Bonus pockets! Was perfect to stay cool for a summer wedding in Charleston.

This dress has been on my favorites list for some time now. I'm so glad I had the chance to rent it! I wore it to a friend's outdoor wedding rehearsal dinner in July. I am early in my second trimester, and this dress was so comfortable and perfect for my changing body and for the occasion! The dress is a bright pink and has a slip underneath the already thick-ish material. I wore a regular strapless bra and no Spanx. It was more fitted at the top, so it didn't look too oversized. Can't say enough good things about this one!
Loved the dress. I wore the 4 instead of the two only because the top was a little tighter on the two around my broad shoulders. Roomy dress though. Definitely get a size down for back up.
This dress was everything! IT HAS POCKETS. I probably could have sized down, but stayed with the 12 so it was a little looser around my butt. I would highly recommend this dress.
Dress was perfect for a more formal summer event. The color is beautiful and the dress was flattering. I usually wear a 6 but I wore an 8 in this dress and it fit perfectly. I LOVED this dress!!

links_reviews_title: Loved this bright color pink, perfect for my studios dance recital!!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit true to size. Material was thicker, which is more comfortable to me. It helps hold everything in! I could wear a strapless bra comfortably. Highly recommend this dress!! I would totally rent it again!!
Loved the bright color of this dress! It was very comfortable but definitely size down. From the side view the back looked a little baggy. Otherwise this was a great dress for a summer wedding!

Beautiful bright fun color for spring/summer. Looks great with a tan. The cut is very forgiving in the stomach so no Spanx required. After 4 kids that's not easy to find a flattering cut without having to wear a lot of stuff to suck you in. The back has really cute straps and best of all there are pockets!!
The pockets make the dress!! Easy to wear!

links_reviews_title: I received a ton of compliments on this dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress is true to size.
The fit is perfect. The slip on the inside is tight so keep in mind if you have a full bottom and hips.
Loved the color and fabric! Was very comfortable and easy to move in. Ran a little big (I'm a 12 and wore a 12 but could have gone down a size).

This dress was even better than I was hoping. The color was beautiful - bright but not crazy. I got so many compliments! And it has pockets!! It was super comfortable. I probably could have sized down to the 6, but I felt like it would have been pushing it on the length. This was my first RTR experience and I have been so impressed!

links_reviews_title: This was a great dress for a tropical wedding!
links_reviews_text: Fit great and looked great. I wore this to an outdoor, tropical wedding and received a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, flattering and perfect for dancing - what else could you need for a summer wedding?
links_reviews_text: Fit was great, didn't ride up too much when sitting

links_reviews_title: I wore for Valentine's dinner, it is spectacular, color pops and the design is comfy and still sexy!
links_reviews_text: I loved how the dress fit for dinner, it was sexy without being clingy, and the color really was awesome, didn't need to wear a bra, but i wore pasties. I got compliments all night from other diners in the restaurant and my friends. It was definitely a dress I would consider buying!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and POCKETS! Loved the neckline.
links_reviews_text: The fit is rather boxy around the hips/waist but the bust and neck are perfect. I liked that it was longer and enjoyed the pockets.

I rented this for the wedding of a childhood friend. The dress was perfect and the fit hid the fact that I was having drinks and food all day. It's a little tight around the legs and butt, but that may be just because I have thunder thighs. I loved the neckline, which I thought was very original. Also loved the color, which looks more neon than it appears online. Definitely bright though, so if you aren't looking for bright then it's not for you.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun dress for a summer event!
links_reviews_text: Wire this to a summer wedding 2.5 months after I had a baby! It was perfect! Cute and summer-y, but not tight - perfect for me! I'd say this dress runs a bit large. Would definitely rent again!

I was super excited to rent this. The color is brother in person and so pretty! The dress itself is comfortable and a great length. And pockets! Loved it. Got so many compliments. I normally wear a 4, but it was too big in the bust, and the 2 fit perfectly.

I do like the dress and the color is the “wow” factor. It even has pockets! It just makes me look larger than I am. Maybe more for pregnant or super skinny person. It’s great for petite size. Not too shor and not too long.

The folds were a little bit misplaced, but once I steamed them out, the dress fit nicely. I would normally wear a 10, but the 8 fit MUCH better. Got lots of compliments and the fit was very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: First timer for RTR! Great, bright, comfortable dress!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful and most comfortable dress I've ever worn! No spanx needed! Worn to a September wedding and still got so many compliments on the color, even though I personally thought it was too bright! Because I'm large chested, it kind of made me a little boxy. Doesn't show any body shape at all. But again, definitely comfortable!
I wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner in Chicago. Very comfortable and love that it has pockets. I normally wear a 14 and the 12 fit just fine so I would size down 1.
This dress definitely runs large. At 5'2" 120lb I usually wear a 4 but ended up wearing a 0 in this.
Great dress! Got lots of compliments. Wore with stick-on bra. Comfortable and great for dancing.
Great dress for a summer affair. It's VERY pink! Runs a little big. I'm larger in the bust and a size 6 was perfect but seemed a little loose in the mid section.

links_reviews_title: Best dress for a March wedding
links_reviews_text: The dress fit true to size and was very comfortable for a wedding that boots were worn to. I got lots of compliments on the dress and color. The neckline was cute without being too much for a larger chest!

links_reviews_title: The dress was beyond expectations; beautiful and comfortable! I was sad I had to send it back!
links_reviews_text: The fit was forgiving but I wouldn't say loose. In order to have the dress hang appropriately on your body I would order your true to size otherwise it will pull.

I'm 19 weeks pregnant and it is SO hard to feel cute and pretty these days. This dress was a perfect fit. I received compliments all night and I felt like it hid my bump without making me look like a whale. Would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Super cute and comfy for beach wedding
links_reviews_text: True to size. #beachwedding
Great fit, true to size! I got a ton of compliments on this dress and it's color!
Very bright pink that stands out from the crowd. Loved the neckline-very flattering. Fit is loose around middle so no Spanx required! And it has pockets!! Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Fun comfortable dress for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was looser fitting than I usually wear, which is nice if you want something with a more relaxed fit. It was very comfortable and also flattering! Easy to dance in, and lots of fun to wear. The fit was just as expected.
This dress is even prettier in person! I layered it with a belle sleeve top for modesty. The dress does run a bit small. I sized up to a 2 based on the reviews.
Great structure, very subtle and unique color; and not too long on my very short frame!

This dress looked and felt expensive. Was great for a classy holiday party. I'm tall with a long torso and the hips were built a little high for me from the waist but I think I felt it more than other people noticed it. Length was perfect for my height though.
Wore this to the Phantom of the Opera Symphony. Very unique, thick fabric. Surprisingly warm and still lightweight. A great fall or winter dress. Perfect, easy fit.

In love with its retro looking copper and overall design. The lining and the exterior fabric make it a perfect dress for a wedding reception that called for a smart dress code in an old-school club in chilly September. Almost ankle length for my height 5"3. Such a elegant dress that's also very comfortable to wear!
Wore this to a holiday work party. I liked the longer length and high neck with the bowtie. Fabric was a little clingy.

Love this conservative dress with some flair by Hunter Bell! Although the material is not stretchy, it has an amazing flow and the color and texture of the fabric really adds movement to the style. I would recommending one size up for backup and this would be most comfortable from A to C cups. Pair with some statement earrings and a cute pair of heels or flats for the perfect look!
Took the idea of the previous reviewer snd lut a black long sleeved top underneath. Fun snd easy to wear and unique fabric. I am innetween 4 and 6 and sized up.
This dress was absolutely gorgeous. I wore to a work event and received a number of compliments. The color is unique. I paired with a long sleeve black top underneath.
Pretty dress, nice fabric. Some fit issues, small across the chest, little poofy around the hips and longer than expected.
An effortless dress, that quickly drapes you in bronze and class. I received so many compliments on it.
Tight around the bust that it slightly smashed my boobs (I am a 34F), super snug in the waist, but could make do because it was a formal event. Really pretty dress!
I rented this dress for work. It's the perfect combination of a little bit hipster and a lot classy. I received many compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: It was work. I guess work has some unforgettable moments.
links_reviews_text: I have been wanting to rent this dress for a while with my unlimited plan. I so wish it would have worked out! Everything about this dress was great except I could not get it zipped. I have too broad of a back for it. It was disappointing to say the least. I thought the fabric was lovely and soft and had a little stretch to it. The zipper area did not. If you are more athletic and broader, I don't recommend this dress.
I wore it to my company holiday party. It was formal without being over the top and hugged my figure without being revealing. I'm 5' 5" and the midi length fell in a good spot.

I rented this for NYE but didn't end up going out so didn't wear. I debated wearing it to work but it was a little too dressy. Plus the length is weird--it was not midi length like the picture shows but went just above my ankle. There is a slip underneath the skirt but it only goes halfway down so the dress material sticks to tights. Just doesn't work to wear.
The dress was comfortable, although I was lucky it fit well as there its much stretch in the waist. I would order true to size. Loved The color and got several compliments.
I was really hopeful about this dress. But I'm a curvy girl. So the material laid heavy and frumpy around my middle. I think it probably would lay really awesome on a tall slender person.

The dress is more bronze than the more muted color pictured. It has nice stretch. Can be worn with or without a shirt underneath for extra coverage in the winter. I wore a simple cotton black long sleeve tshirt underneath and it blended in well. The top half was snug.

links_reviews_title: A conservative but not boring party dress
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a company holiday party. I loved the fit and color. It was conservative enough that it felt appropriate for a corporate environment but definitely not boring because of the cut and color. I found it a tiny bit hard to zip up at my back but once it was on it was totally comfortable.
I rented this for an office holiday party and it was perfect. It was dressy enough to stand out but comfortable too.

The color of this dress seemed a little darker than what is pictured, but it is still a beautiful material. Unfortunately, the black band hit right around my rib cage and was extremely tight, making it bunch up above and below the band. The fit was terrible on me, and there was no way I could wear it without looking ridiculous. Also I'm 5'4 and the dress was pretty long on me, hitting right above my ankles. This dress would probably look much better on a really tall person.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear, but it is a lovely dress.
links_reviews_text: I am a little wider around the middle, and this dress accentuated that, so while I loved it overall, it didn't look right on ME.
Didn’t wear

Loved wearing this dress for a work event that specified cocktail attire but was less formal. This could be easily dressed up or down, and I wore with a structured laceup oxford style bootie. If you have a larger chest like I do, I recommend sizing up. The 6, my normal size, fit perfectly but was too restricting in the bust, so I wore the 8. There is not much give in the top part of the dress or at the waist, as other reviewers mentioned. The material was warm and has a slip that makes it feel like you are wearing pajamas. The dress was super comfortable and perfect for fall! I wish I could have kept it!
Sized up for this as recommended but it still wouldn't zip up in the back. It was really cute and I would have loved to wear it! Definitely recommend sizing up 2 sizes if you have a full bust.
This dress is beautiful! But it is two thick fabrics, and way to hot for the 90+ degree August this year. It would be great on a crisp fall day.

links_reviews_title: Glam and fun for a night out!
links_reviews_text: Loved the thick fabric of this dress- the color was a darker copper and it look great with simple black shoes. The waist is fitted and doesn't have any stretch. Overall was fun to wear and perfect for a formal wedding!
Darker than on the pictures but still cool metallic

links_reviews_title: Great dress for networking parties & date night!
links_reviews_text: Had this in my RTR update shipment and wore to work professional networking events (with many compliments!) and on a casual upscale date night with my boo. Form-fitting, appropriate tea length and true to US size. Bonus: can wear a regular bra with this! No need to change straps (but can if you prefer!)

links_reviews_title: The event brought together old family and friends.
links_reviews_text: The picture does not do this dress justice. It fit perfectly and had a unique flair and sophistication.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear it - band is much smaller around the rib cage
links_reviews_text: The dress is beautiful! Couldnt wear it due to the band that is super tight around the rib cage, and doesnt have any give. Id recommend two sizes up.

This dress was not only fun, but also extremely comfortable. The fabric was thick (which is great for a February in NY) and I paired it was a black long sleeve shirt, leggings and black suede boots to winter-fy it a bit more. Definitely made going to work a bit more bearable :)

This dress is actually good for cooler temps believe it or not bc it is a thicker material I didnt like the way it looked on me a bit matronly and the bow swallowed me a bit Would look good on tall gals The gold is a rich color and the material doesnt feel cheap Wish this looked better on me

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a work holiday party!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a holiday party at my home of my company president. The dress cut is obviously on the more conservative side, but I nonetheless felt festive due to the gleaming copper color and interestingly textured fabric. The dress was not boring, and not risqué. It was just right. As for the size: My current weight is actually 145 lbs, not 135. The size 6 cut into my waist and the skirt bunched up around my hips. The size 8 was comfortable around the waist and the skirt nicely skimmed my hips. In terms of length, it ended up reaching below my calves (so about 3-4 inches from my ankles, as opposed to 3-4 inches below my knees).

links_reviews_title: Rented for black tie NYE party, was perfect fit and got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: 5’ 9’’ 165 ibs 36C Fit wonderfully! May be a little revealing if you have a larger bust.

links_reviews_title: First dress I ordered didn't fit me so I was able to get two replacements happy I went w/ this one!
links_reviews_text: Such a beautiful dress but I think it would have looked better on someone taller. I'm only 5ft so the length only made me feel shorter.
Perfect fit. I'm 5" so it might have been a little longer than normal on me but it was perfect! I would rent again.

This fit like a size 4 with not an 1/8" to spare! I wish I'd gotten a M backup to be safe but it worked. The waist seam was quite tight and it definitely hugs the hips, but because of the thicker fabric and flattering silhouette it was tasteful and i wasn't terribly uncomfortable. I thought the neckline and flared skirt really elevated this classic LBD. Wore regular strapless bra and Paired with green Kendra Scott earrings for color pop.
This dress fit true to size. It is tight fitting, but does stretch a bit. I was able to dance in it all night at a wedding. Definitely recommend if looking for a less formal black tie event dress!
Loved the dress!!! Fit well around waist/hips! Not too revealing up top!
I rented this for a black tie wedding and it was the perfect mix of fun and classy. The skirt is comfortable and fun to dance in and the fit is SO flattering.

It was a tiny bit bigger in the chest and straps than I hoped, but with a bra it wasn't uncomfortable and didn't slip around and looked great. Would just recommend wearing a strapless /stick-on bra if you have a smaller chest like I do, but otherwise great dress that's really flattering!

links_reviews_title: Loved this for a black tie optional event.
links_reviews_text: Received many compliments. It was different than the typical black dress I would normally choose. It was an XL - I normally fit a 12 so I would say this probably runs a little small. But the bust was a little big. For me, if fit as I'm pretty curvy lol
I rented this for a rehearsal dinner, and it fit perfectly. Very comfortable!

Very comfortable, true to size, and great for dancing! I loved the neckline and the shape it gave me. It kept twisting a bit to the right during the night, but this was only a small bother and definitely not a deal breaker. Perfect LBD, but still felt very stylish.

links_reviews_title: Classy and sexy for a formal dinner.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress even though the fit wasn't perfect on me. Tailored dresses don't often work for me because I'm tall so usually the extra fabric for the tush is too high. But this one hugged great on back. It also doesn't hide a rounded tummy so be prepared for anything not flat to show. The bust was a bit too big so the sides winged out a bit, but it actually made the top of the dress look nice. Sharing this not-flattering pic so you can see what I mean about the tummy area. Overall the dress looked a lot nicer than this. I would recommend but I wouldn't rent again.

I love the flattering cut of this classic black dress by Dress The Population! This piece runs true to size so I would recommend getting your typical size as your primary and going one size up for the backup size. There is comfortable room throughout the midsection and it is a straight fit on the hips as it is a shift style dress so it does not hug the curves. This dress is great for all cup sizes as it is comfortable in the bust area and I recommend wearing a strapless bra with it. In regards to length, the dress hit me at mid calf and I'm 5,4 in height. I would pair this dress with black heels (as pictured), a sparkly necklace and or earrings and a cute statement bag.

links_reviews_title: This was actually my back up dress for my cousin’s black tie wedding. I literally fit perfect!
links_reviews_text: Zero cons, all pros! I’m a solid size 6 as well as a medium. The dress fit perfectly everywhere AND it was comfortable! I got tons of compliments.
I absolutely loved this dress! I definitely have some curves but I felt so confident and comfortable in this dress. It also would be super easy to dress up or down with accessories! Highly recommend!

I wasn't too ecstatic about this dress - it was a replacement because RTR sadly messed up the shipping for my original dress. What they sent was just a tad too much for what I was wearing it to. However, it's form fitting and fits well on the curves. It definitely shows the cleavage. It was kind of an odd length on me (I'm 5'3"). Not my favorite and probably won't make you stand out in the crowd but in the right setting and on the right person I think it could be sexy and/or classy.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit and length for my engagement party!
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly for someone with curves (wouldn’t wear if you’re not pear shaped). Good length for tall ladies. Thick dresss good for winter.

links_reviews_title: Loved wearing this dress to my husband's company Christmas party!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress! It's very flattering and also comfortable. For me, the XL was none too big, but it fit about as I would expect for my usual size 12/14. (The XXL was too big in the bust, and I'm a 38D.) There is no stretch in the bodice, however, so I do recommend getting the back-up size in the larger size. The trumpet flare was flattering on my legs--which are thicker. I'm an hourglass shape. The black material is a perfect thickness for disguising bulges. The straps stayed up great for me, but are not adjustable. The zipper sticks, so you'll want someone to help you with that. (Tip: Can't really wear a bra with this dress, and for me I had to have something. I tried taping for the first time and was pleasantly surprised that it worked great!) :)

Got so many compliments on this dress. Was a bit hard to sit down in but worth it. Fit as expected. I'm small chested and was worried it may fit loose and gap open. Didn't have that problem at all. Would def rent again

Loved wearing this dress - I'm glad I had the large, but it fit really well, and I had so many compliments throughout the night. It was comfortable enough to sit and dance in, too. I wore it with strappy heels & just statement earrings and a bracelet.

links_reviews_title: Figure flattering shape. Not too tight on hips compared to some other fitted styles
links_reviews_text: Really like the cut of this brand's dresses at the neckline w/ the v. This version fit nicely to accentuate an hourglass shape and the flare at the bottom was flattering and added an extra bit of interest. Want to buy!

This is a very flattering dress for anyone with a curvaceous shape. I loved the natural waist emphasis and the neckline (definitely sexy but not overly revealing). The sleek, simple design makes it classy and elegant. I thought this was kind of reminiscent of a 1950s wiggle dress. Would wear it for another event!
The dress was great for the 1920s theme costume! I got lots of compliments but The neckline was a little low. Overall, a super cute dress!

links_reviews_title: Hits all the RIGHT CURVES for hourglass ladies!
links_reviews_text: This was my "backup style dress". And let me say, had the event not been for work, I would have worn this dress! Wow, ladies! If you have an hourglass figure and want to show it off and feel like a queen all night, get this dress!! It was gorgeous and hit all the right curves! I will order this dress in the future for events that are not work involved!
Rented for an Anniversary party-sadly did not fit :( -but the shape was amazing!!! Wish it had fit! Runs pretty small!!

links_reviews_title: Felt so sexy in this dress!
links_reviews_text: My normal size is 12 so I ordered the L and the XXXLR as back up and ended up wearing the larger size. The smaller size fit, but this dress has no give so I opted for the larger size so I could sit and breathe freely. It was a bit big in the chest, but I felt AMAZING in this dress. I've recently gained weight and I've had trouble finding things I feel sexy in. This dress definitely did the trick!! Highly recommended.

Everything I have gotten from RTR has fit based on the recommended size (usually a 4) but this dress was so small that I couldn't even get it on... there was a good 10 inches between the two zippers in the dress. I'm surprised that all the reviews said it was true to size - wondering if mine was a fluke.
Unfortunately I thought the XXL would fit after reading the reviews, if you are above a size 8 it will not fit. I am a size 10, 38C and it would not zip.
I wore this to a handbags award gala and got so many compliments. It fit me perfectly and was very elegant. I almost bought this dress

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a Gala fundraiser for work.
links_reviews_text: I'd go a size up - fit was flattering. I was able to wear a strapless bra with it.

links_reviews_title: I did not end up wearing this dress. It did not fit
links_reviews_text: Runs small. I did not end up wearing this dress

links_reviews_title: Exchanged it because it was too small and not flattering
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear - exchanges it
The dress is beautiful and very flattering. If you are too heavy, definitely go up a size as the dress is very straight and low cut. I am a size 14 and the XXL was a challenge to zip.

I didn't get to wear this. It was a backup style, but not as forgiving in the hips. I'm a 6-8 on top, size 12 on bottom, and couldn't wear the medium. Cute dress though if you're less pear shaped than me!

links_reviews_title: Great if you have a very flat stomach
links_reviews_text: I did not end up wearing this dress, unfortunately. It’s a beautiful mermaid-style cut, but unless you have a very flat stomach, it is not flattering at all. Would probably work for a non-curvy body type.
Not for someone with large busy. But great for hourglass figure
The dress fit everywhere except in the chest. To be fair, I have a fairly large chest.
Great fit

Really loved this dress, but I ended up loving the other dress I rented more. Had a little trouble getting the zipper up on my own (single girl problems), but otherwise this dress fit true to size and was really comfortable.
I absolutely Loved and adored this dress, but because it has little to no stretch factor, the zipper wouldn't go up. This dress however is worth losing weight for. GORGEOUS!

Very cute dress, I could've worn a 2 in it to be honest. But it isn't anything amazing! It's very spacious from the ribcage down so awesome for pear shapes. I liked it and got a few compliments but I doubt I would order again!

links_reviews_title: A bit tight but super cute if you get the right size
links_reviews_text: This dress is adorable. The scoop neckline is very flattering. I sized up based on reviews but really could've used another size up for some breathing room. It was super tight across my rib cage and taking deep breaths was difficult. I was anxious to take it off when I got home from work. The embroidery is beautiful. Got compliments all day. I will rent this again but will go up another size for comfort.
Pretty dress, pockets! Runs a bit large

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for Easter....loved it.
links_reviews_text: I am pear shaped so the dress was a little bit big on top, but comfortable and pretty. And it has pockets!
Perfect dress for Valentine's Day dinner! Fit was perfect. A bit low cut for work. Nice quality!

Although it is deeply fall I couldn't help but rent this adorable dress and wear with seasonally inappropriate white shoes because I am smashing patriarchy AND fashion "rules". The result was glorious and it is 80degrees in San Francisco, so naysayers can kick rocks. Pros: embroidery, colors, structure, pockets! Cons: only 1- the sleeves kept turning up so the lining showed. The fit was correct so I am assuming this is just due to wear. Styled as shown in my standard bathroom selfie with a rented handbag to boot!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress for my rose gold themed bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: Admittedly, I hoped to wear white for my bridal shower, but the other 2 dresses I rented didn't fit well. Luckily, this fit perfectly and I got tons of compliments! The scoop neckline was very flattering with just a hint of tasteful cleavage. Plus, pockets! The embroidery on the dress was beautiful, without feeling too heavy for summer. However, the sleeves arrived VERY scrunched up and wrinkled, but I managed to sort that out with some steaming and ironing. Overall, this was a cute, flattering, and comfortable dress true to size!

I loved this dress. It fit well, is of obvious great quality and is quite stunning. The only down side was that it did wrinkle, which was unexpected because the material is thicker. I had to really work to steam the hem and arms smooth and then the waist, as you can see, wrinkled during the day. To be fair, I did sit through a conference in it for 6 hours; this photo was taken at the end of a 13 hour day. Overall, I was pleased with this rental, received compliments from strangers and would rent it again.

I'm not going to lie. The style and pattern aren't exactly "me" at all, and I rented this one primarily because it was so expensive, and I wanted to try it. Still, I received several complements, and it fit really well. I ended up being very pleased with it and might even consider renting it again in the future. It was a very pleasant surprise. :)

Gorgeous dress with beautiful pops of color and emroidery. Perfect fit. Nicely lined. The only thing to keep in mind is its a big scoop neck and may be low for those who prefer a more conservative neckline. Many people complimented the dress snd said it was perfect. Highly recommdend!
This dress is absolutely beautiful. The only con is it showed a bit more cleavage than I would have liked. I think because I am petite the neckline dipped lower than it would on most.
This dress is so cute and Springy! It fits really nicely and is very flattering, especially on the top half. It fits true to size, so the 8 was perfect! I'd recommend sizing up for your backup size.

Wore this for a date night and loved it. There was more cleavage than I anticipated so it's not really appropriate for all occasions. It blows my mind that this dress is worth over 1,000$. I would not ever buy a dress at that price but I loved getting the chance to wear it for a night!

The fit is great, especially for a curvier body type. The scoop neck gives bustier gals a little more room. Despite the simple silhouette, the dress is remarkable thanks to its intricate embroidery. It's really a special dress. I wore it to dinner with platform sandals and a velvet mini bag.

I don't want to give this dress back. The fit and flare shape is so flattering and the embroidery is feminine and flirty. It's polished, yet not too overdone to wear to work. The fabric has no stretch, so it can be a little tight across the chest, but I didn't find it uncomfortable at all. One of my favorite rentals!

links_reviews_title: Pretty! Fit great. Bright and happy colors. Works well for day time or night
links_reviews_text: The neck is pretty low cut. Something to keep in mind if you are on the busty side

This dress runs big and makes me looks like a child. The neck line is also cut low and I couldn't find a bra that fits with the dress. The material was soft and felt great on the skin when worn though.
Would have been very cute, but could not zip over chest
The material was gorgeous, the fit was beautiful. A little low cut.
This dress shows a lot of cleavage.
Ended up being frumpy looking

Would be perfect for a garden party, but I recommend sizing up for your backup size. It fit perfectly below the waist but it just didn't want to zip up around my chest. I'll definitely be ordering it again in a larger size, it's SO cute.
This dress is gorgeous and obviously excellent quality, but I couldn't wear it because the dress was HUGE! Order at least one, and maybe 2 sizes down!

This dress is flattering with a classic silhouette. It didn't come in time for me to wear it to a wedding, which I knew was a gamble. It's a bit much for work so I sent it back without wearing it. I'd consider renting it again for a function.

links_reviews_title: Customer service was great over the phone. All the clothing was excellent quality.
links_reviews_text: The overall fit is great BUT, very low cut so I had to wear a red cami underneath. The quality is fabulous! Very well made!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, strange fit on me
links_reviews_text: Skirt flares quite a bit on, and made my bust look small. The dress is low cut leaving a lot of open "space." Maybe it would have looked better with the right necklace but it seemed to exaggerate my proportions for the worse.
Perfect for a pest figure. Tons of compliments
Pretty dress that fits well but flares out wide at the hips. Not as flattering on as I had hoped it would be. Didn't end up wearing for that reason.
Way too much cleavage.
Very flattering dress. Long enough for a tall girl! If you have a larger chest (28 C), the size 2 may not be work appropriate as there was some cleavage.

I'm 65" 52 kg 32A and it fit quite nicely. Only thing, the lace does NOT give and can feel a wee bit constricting so if you're at odds with that maybe go for something with a bit more stretch:-) The underdress was plenty stretchy though. I loved it! And as hot as it was in the church the fabric was surprisingly breathable.

Rented this for a summer wedding. The color was great for the season. Rented the 4 and the 6 but ended up wearing the 6, so it was less of a bodycon look. Comfortable and didn't feel like I had to suck in all night. Fabric is noooooot breathable and gets real hot in the sun, but kept me warm once the sun was down. All in all, great dress!
Beautiful color and details

I received many compliments on how beautiful the green color was. The design of the dress is beautiful and fits well for the most part. I gave 4 stars because the arms were really tight and restrictive and the chest area was a bit big for a B cup, however I could not have gone down a size because the rest of the dress fit just right.
The dress is absolutely stunning. The most gorgeous color & the fabric is nice and thick. Unfortunately the dress was too big for me in the middle section.

Love these Cynthia Rawley lace sheaths. Same fit for all styles. Very stiff and no give, but works well for petite hourglass shapes. Perfect for my husband's work holiday party and dressed it up with silver glittery heels and a pearl cuff. Sleeves a bit long. Again, easy on the dry cleaning, bc these dresses will get dull for repeat cleaning so renter beware on age of rental.
Comfortable and fit true to size! Perfect for Christmas!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but I couldn't move my arms
links_reviews_text: The body of this dress fit perfectly, however I felt the arms were way to tight which is why I marked this dress as runs small. The fabric in the arms has no give and it was challenging to reach for anything. While I loved the look of this dress is wasn't practical for moving around. This dress was also very short, I am only 5'6 and I had to be careful because it was that short. I knew that it was short when I rented it and honestly it didn't bother me that much since I didn't have to sit during the event. Maybe if I had sized up it wouldn't have been so bad but it would have been too loose around the waist and bust if I had. The part that really bothered me were the arms and I don't think sizing up would have made a significant difference. While I wasn't thrilled with the fit I did think the dress was beautiful and well made. I got a lot of complements on this dress and definitely stood out in the crowd.

I have loved every Cynthia Rowley dress I have rented but this was hands down my favorite!!! The color is perfect and I received so many compliments! The cut is also super flattering!!! Don't want to send it back but I have a different Cynthia Rowley dress on the way!! ;)

I thought this was going to be too short but it was the perfect length. Pretty comfortable, but the other reviews are correct in that you cannot raise your arms. But if that's ok with you then this dress is perfect. The emerald green color is rich and bright and flattering. The long sleeves made this perfect for a late September wedding. Got tons of compliments on this dress. I'm more pear shaped and there was enough room in the bottom and wasn't super loose on the top. 10/10.

This dress was great. I should have sized up but I think that's a personal problem and perhaps not a design flaw. The crochet sleeves did make it difficult to raise my arms but I still had fun! I received many compliments on this piece! Stand out in the crowd of black dresses with this emerald number!

I rented this for a wedding, but didn't wear it because my teenagers deemed it too short. It is a little shorter than I would normally wear. I normally wear a size 6, but went with an 8 based on other reviews. I'm glad I did because the 8 was perfect. It doesn't have any stretch so size up. I also don't have a big busy...34 B...much bigger and I don't think it would work since the fabric doesn't give. The color is great, the lace is fun...it was a good rental!

links_reviews_title: Wore it to my cousin's wedding!
links_reviews_text: Fit great! Good excuse to wear a long-sleeve to a chilly spring wedding. Ran a little short but I'm only 5'4" so it worked out fine.

links_reviews_title: This was perfect for a wedding in the mountains.
links_reviews_text: This was perfect for a wedding in the mountains, it was very comfortable and I recieved endless compliments throughout the night. The size 2 was a little tight on my arms and across my chest, so I went with the size 4 and it was perfect.

I love renting dresses that I can wear for everyday use and this one *kind of* fit the bill. It's a little thicker in material (I live in the desert - thankfully I rented in April) and slightly heavy. I didn't think it did anything special for my body. Didn't like the look on its own, the arms were a little hard to raise your hand over your head.... The dress was a little too stiff for my liking.
Ordered 6/8. 6 was perfect, I would've normally got a 4 but everyone said size up and I'm glad I did. Didn't need to wear a bra, I loved this dress. Super comfy and super sexy with heels.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a spring bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a bridal shower in Connecticut, it was only 40 degrees outside so this was a pefect long sleeved dress for the weather. It was still a bright color which is great for March. I wore a white jean jacket over it. I found that it fit true to size, somewhat tight in the bust. I am 5'2" and it hit 2-3 inches above the knee. This is a great dress for shorter woman, I could see it being too short if you were taller. I would have given this 5 stars for fit but the shade of green wasn't my favorite, it looked more green than teal which is why I gave it a 4. I would still highly recommend.

Very comfortable, but might can't lift arms fully above head. Flattering for hourglass figure. Perfect amount of stretch on the underneath layer. The green color is so pretty, as is the lace detail. Many compliments on this dress!

links_reviews_title: Color was perfect for St. Patrick's Day!
links_reviews_text: Extremely comfortable...classy...great length

This dress is a beautiful shade of kelly green and warmer than expected. The lace design is thick, but unflexible, so raising my arms was tricky. Runs a little short and small. The shoulders and top were tight. I received so many compliments.
Perfect for outdoor spring wedding
This dress fit true to size and was very comfortable.

This was a great dress to rent! Very cool color and thick quality fabric. I wore this to a rehearsal dinner which was great! The sleeves don't allow much movement, so I wouldn't recommend wearing to a reception with dancing (or if you have a toddler in tow).

I wore this to a rehearsal dinner. After reading others reviews, I ordered a size up (6) from my normal size. I have large arms for my body type, so I was worried about them fitting in the dress. The arms were not tight at all, and the rest of the dress was just a tad big. I could have gone with my normal size (4). It also looks really short on the model, but I am about 5'4, and even when I sat down, I didn't feel like it was too short.

Like others have said, the sleeves are pretty restrictive so it's not the most comfortable dress I've ever worn. However the color is beautiful and it definitely stands out in sea of black dresses. I usually wear a 6 and that did fit but the arms were extra tight and it was very short for a family wedding, so I went with the 8. Definitely size up for your backup. Overall I liked it but probably wouldn't rent again.
I went up a size due to being worried about length.

Beautiful dress that could easily be dressed up or down. The color was a gorgeous shade of green, perfect for the holiday party I was attending. I rented the sz 4 and 6. Both fit well, but the event was for work so I opted for the looser fitting 6 which also had a little more length. The sleeves were not too tight and there was plenty of room in the bust (I wore a strapless bra). The dress was very comfortable and I received compliments all evening. I would definitely rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: I loved the sleeves for a winter party!
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments this night. It was comfy but i looked fancy.

links_reviews_title: The lace sleeves were beautiful in green
links_reviews_text: The size 2 had a sticky zipper (on the hanger and on me) and the shoulders were too big. I'm not sure if it was stretched out by a previous renter or that's the fit. Luckily the size 0 fit perfect so I got to wear this beautiful dress twice (once to an outdoor wedding and once to a nighttime party with a jacket over top to create a more casual look).
Gorgeous color! The size 4 fit, but the arms were a little tight and restricted so I went with the size 6. Felt beautiful and the color is amazing. Definitely one of my favorite rentals so far!

This dress was a hit at the outdoor, fall wedding we attended. The size 6 fit so perfectly but was a little short, so I went with the 8 so as not to worry about flashing any guests. The dress was exceptionally well made, and the color was truly brilliant. I would absolutely rent this one again!

Picked this dress for my 30th birthday wine tour and it was perfect. A little tight on my arms but I wore a denim jacket over it most of the day so it wasn't really noticeable and overall it was just such a pretty color and great fit otherwise. I'd def recommend for a fall wedding or casual event it can be paired with heels to be fancy or boots to be more casual.

Wore this to a fall outdoor wedding and it was perfect. The color is more of an emerald green than it appears in the model photo, it's also not nearly as short as it looks on the model (I'm also 5'3"). The fabric is sturdy, as is the lace/crochet overlay. I ordered the 2 and the 4, and the 2 was perfect- as someone with broader shoulders I was afraid my arms/should area would be too tight- the 2's arms actually fit the same, if not more loosely, than the size 4. The dress doesn't have a ton of give, so you certainly won't be able to raise your arms completely, but there is enough room for decent movement and dancing.

I absolutely adored this dress. The color was much more vibrant in person rather than the photo. The dress did run smaller around the tops of the arms. I simply zipped the back up about three quarters of the way and then clasped it. You couldn't even tell and it alleviated the tightness. Lastly, I did wear shorts underneath as to not make a show for everyone as it is a bit short. Overall, I would suggest the piece and may even rent it again.
Fits true to size, and easy to wear. Only downside is that it's difficult to lift your arms all the way up and buttons/jewelry can get caught on the lace.

links_reviews_title: Unique dress stands out in a crowd of black.
links_reviews_text: This dress runs true to size, but I would recommend sizing up if you have a bigger chest or hips as it is fitted in those areas. If you are wanting to dance at a wedding the arms are quite restricting. I couldn't raise my arms above my shoulders.
Great fit, loved the color and the sleeves. Wore to an outdoor wedding!

The dress is beautiful and I got a lot of compliments. As most others stated, it runs small and the fabric provides little give for movement. It comes up a bit when you sit, also, so it was a bit awkward and I felt I was pulling it down a lot during the ceremony. I would say if you know you'll be standing a lot, it's a great dress. I had to cut out before the reception, but I imagine it would probably be difficult to dance in. I typically wear a 6-8 and the 8 fit only slightly snug and the 10 was way too big. Because of the layers and fabric, I was able to not wear a bra.

This dress is absolutely stunning. I rented it though unlimited for everyday wear/work/church. I wore this to church and got a ton of compliments. I opted to not wear this to work due to feeling confined in it. Like the other reviewers say, it's tight across shoulders so order a size up, so that's what I did. I got a 4 instead of a 2. I guess all the crossfit I do had bulked me more than I realized, as this fit loose everywhere except across the shoulders. I decided 3 hours for church was enough, I didn't really want to feel confined in this for a whole work day. I absolutely love the look and could see ordering this again for say, family photos. Pretty piece but a bit tight through shoulders.

I wore this dress for a semi formal dinner at Ashford Castle in Ireland. The dress is beautiful and photographs well but it loses a star on comfort. I typically wear a size 4 or 6 and while I did wear the 6, the slip beneath the lace was a little too short - I was thankful to have a napkin covering my lap during the meal. The lace has no give so the sleeves do feel a bit tight. Sizing up 2 sizes might help but I worry that a looser fit along the body would be less flattering. It was great for the relatively short amount of time I wore it but not sure I'd want to spend more than a few hours wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous flow on a breezy day
links_reviews_text: The dress is comfortable and beautiful on its own but in motion it becomes AMAZING.
I love knee length. I wore this with flat boots for casual look and with heels for work. Great fabric
Liked it so much, I wore it three times!

My boyfriend told me I looked like a witch... and not necessarily in a good way when I wore this. But I liked it, especially the sleeves, which added a bit more fun to work entire. Light, breathable fabric and good color. The pattern was fine, but not very noticeable.
It runs big but was super comfy. Silky and soft without being silly. Gorgeous arms that drape and a length that was easy and reasonable and cute.

I loved the pretty colors and the fun, flow-y fabric. I wear between a 6-8 and as 8 was unavailable, I rented a 6 so it was a bit snug in the shoulders but overall a good fit. With its high neckline the dress definitely veers on the conservative side but the ruffles make it fun.

Picked this up in the Chicago RTR store. Great lightweight dress that's modest for any work environment and still flattering. Had a little trouble deciding which shoes to pair it with since it's definitely not open toe season here yet!
Pretty pattern but the sleeves make the dress! Feels like silk and I had to double-check the label (it's not). Very comfortable to wear all day.
Tight in the waist.
This dress was one of my favorites so far! Looked great with a leather jacket. The sleeves were a bit tight though as an FYI in case you need to size up!

Nice, subtle pattern--draped nicely and was very comfortable for the entire work day. The high cut neckline was perfect for the chilly a/c in the office, also would be good for more conservative events (school play, church wedding, even a funeral).
Fit in all areas, I am 5'10" and the shortest part came to my knees. Conservative yet flattering

links_reviews_title: Nice for a memorial. Good fabric.
links_reviews_text: Kinda hard to zip to top. Nice length.
Fit well. Nice flow. Light and breezy.

I feel like the 14 fits true to size if you are an hourglass or pear shape. It really nips in at the waist. If you are more broad waisted you may find the fit to be small. I found that I could have used a bit more room in the bust. As a 34G though I'm used to thinking fitting me tight up there. It was snug but not uncomfortable and it loosened as the day went on. I had it on for about 4/5 hours and was comfortable the whole day. The material is light, good for warm days.
Beautiful dress - but wasn't able to wear :(

links_reviews_title: A mash up of all spring trends with a hint of modesty weirdly works
links_reviews_text: Fit: True to size, you might need help zipping yourself in as the full sleeve makes it hard to reach the last upper half. Hits just above the knee on me (5'8) and did not pull at my chest. Pros: GORGEOUS fabric (pics do not do it justice), very flowy Cons: Look it wasn't my style - it's a lot of trends mashed together: animal print + ruffles + glinda the good witch sleeves + mormon modesty - but it's still a STUNNING dress
This is more modest than what I usually wear - it felt kind of like Mennonite chic - but I loved the fluttery feel of the fabric and how it skimmed my body. The color is terrific too.
LOVED this dress. The picture doesn't do the fabric justice, it's a light silky fabric with a subtle pattern. I'm short and curvy and the fit was great and TTS. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Not good for the more endowed bust!
links_reviews_text: I tried the eight in this dress, and it fit beautifully on the hips and waist but was too tight in the bust and arms. In my previous review I mention that the armholes seem to be too low which made it do a strange pulling across the chest. But I love the dress enough and the fabric enough, that I wanted to try the size 10. I received it and it basically did exactly the same thing across the chest and was just too big and unflattering of the rest of my body. Oh well just not cut out for the bustiest ladies out there. But very beautiful if you have a C cup and below I think.
Thin and comfy, sexy without being skimpy. I have a long torso and this is the perfect length! Could easily dress up or down.

links_reviews_title: It looked and felt really special.
links_reviews_text: Was looking for a cold shoulder top and this was fairly dressy for a nice dinner while vacationing in the Mediterranean, mid-January. Paired with white jeans & taupe suede booties. Didn't read the other reviews until now.. yes, it was a little difficult to get on (luckily?) I have a small head/neck, but did feel like a bit of a choker at first.. and had to be somewhat flexible getting my arms in the sleeves. Have been using RTR Update for 2-3months and still in my top 10 rentals & would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Conservative and just enough sexy for a first date
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and open shoulder style. My only complaint, if you are broad shouldered like me, you may feel some slight restriction in shoulder area. The chest and style of the body part of the shirt is a straight cut, no flairing at the waist. So this shirt could be boxy, but it's your preference. The neckline with the long straps design, was awkward at first but then I realize that's the style of this shirt. I didn't tie it, just cross crossed the straps once and let it drape. It's a silk like material, so the fit really depends on your preference.

links_reviews_title: Size up for the awkward neck fit!
links_reviews_text: This shirt was very cute, however, the neck was extremely tight and awkward. I felt like it was choking me all night. If you plan on wearing this to an event where you have to raise your arms to eat or drink, I would consider sizing up, because it was only comfortable for me when my arms were down by my side. I rented a size small which is my normal size and it fit everywhere but the neck!
It is super small in the busy. I even bought a special strapless bra to make this work and the armpits to cheat are really small. I normally wear small or medium.

The quality of the material wasn't has nice as I thought it would be - it's thin. And it ran small - I ordered a M and that's what I normally wear in tops, but it was too tight across the bust. Sending back.

links_reviews_title: Nice blend of an interesting cut without being too revealing.
links_reviews_text: The fabric wrinkles easily but otherwise, it is a great piece.

I am typically a small/medium in tops. So I rented this shirt in a medium and I couldn't even get my arms in the sleeves. So I tried a large and it was STILL too small. This is a shirt for only very, very small people. I am average to petite on top and couldn't even do a large.

links_reviews_title: Thin, sexy material and fun cut outs
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing this since I am broad shouldered, it didn't have a ton of give in that area.
it was hard to wear without visible strapless bra lines. I noticed this in other pics. My husband thought it made my boobs look weird bc of that. But it was a fun top to wear - definitely size up!
Good color

In concept this is great but just fits odd and looks very blah. Pulls weird around the neck and isn't flattering on the bust. The color and material are lovely - I am medium built so perhaps on a very slender person it would work.

links_reviews_title: I could not wear it. Arms too tight.
links_reviews_text: Very tight in the arms. Could not get on. Seems like great fabric. Just too narrow in arms.
Too tight. I could barely get the shirt on and when I did I couldn't move. Beautiful shirt, just runs small.
I'm usually a 10-12, according to other reviews, I rented a medium. Could not even get it over my chest... super cute, great quality, just SMALL!

links_reviews_title: No human woman is shaped like a 2x6 plank.
links_reviews_text: Very narrow fit. So far off on size its funny not funny

links_reviews_title: Cute top but Did not wear
links_reviews_text: I could not pull the shirt over my bust.
very tight across bust
Very tight in the shoulders, neck and bust, but any bigger and the sleeves would have been far too long. Not comfortable or particularly flattering.
The loose drape fit doesn't even come close if you have any breasts; very tight! I felt like a sausage
Runs quite small across the shoulders. Would recommend you size 1-2x up. The fabric and color are very pretty.

I read other reviews the arms holes were tight, I didn't experience that, however I couldn't get it to lay right across my chest so it didn't look very good. Also, I'm short and I felt like it was too long. Didn't wear.

links_reviews_title: Very strange fit.. I couldn't get my arms into the sleeves.
links_reviews_text: Runs small in the arms!

Wore to dinner on a bachelorette party with jeans and nude stacked heel slip on sandals. I am happy I read the reviews and sized up, I am normally an xs/s. Could have potentially done a medium but the large did not look too big at all. Was able to front tuck it and it laid nicely around my waist.
This was an unusual fit for me. I carry extra pounds in the tummy so I was looking forward to the baggy fit. But this was loose in the tummy but so tight in the bust that I couldn't even wear it.

links_reviews_title: It's a beautiful top, but runs extremely small
links_reviews_text: This top runs extremely small and I was not able to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Ran small, I'm broader across the shoulders. No stretch at all
links_reviews_text: Ran small, I'm broader across the shoulders. No stretch at all
Couldn't get this over my head. I usually wear a large but this felt like a small.
The arms were a bit tight on this and the neck pulled a bit awkwardly. Next size up may have fixed it- so considering sizing up if you aren't sure. Pretty color and nice fabric.
I couldn't even get it on. REALLY tight in the chest and arms. Material has a wrinkle appearance. Just okay.
The arm holes and chest area were tiny!!!! Returned this immediately.

links_reviews_title: Fat man in a little coat
links_reviews_text: The hole in the sleeves were tooooo small- it was so tight around my arms, shoulders and neck

The fit in the bust and shoulders was so small, I gave up even trying to put it on fully. Since there are no reviews, I wanted to flag that this top seems about 2 sizes smaller than normal. The fabric is lovely but the fit negates that.

links_reviews_title: Pretty but a nightmare to wear
links_reviews_text: The sleeves are so long they covered my entire hands, all the way down to my fingertips. The folded neckline is gorgeous, but it does not stay down. I was constantly fighting with it to keep it from riding up and looking like an avant-garde V-neck (think: exaggerated neckline on Sleeping Beauty's gown). I could not wait to take it off. On a positive note, the Knit was stretchy and comfortable.
Neckline is annoying! Doesn't stay. Dress is nice but not that memorable.
This fit like a glove and had almost sweatshirt material on the inside which made it very comfy. Loved this dress

My 14 year old daughter chose this dress for her first homecoming and it was perfection! The dress was comfortable, extremely well made, and she received a million compliments! Sometimes sequins can be scratchy but she said it felt soft and comfy all Night. Easy to dance in and fun to accessorize although not Much was needed bc it was so over the top! Loved it!!!
This dress was so comfortable (though WARM with the lining), and totally perfect.

This wasn't my selection, RTR sent it to me because my selection became unavailable at the last minute. Good thing I loved it. It's a beautiful dress and the sequins are shiny on one side and a matted sparkle when they flip. It is stretchy so it hugged my curves well. It's a really thick dress so I wouldn't suggest it if you're going to an event where it'll be warm, but it was perfect for an early spring black tie affair. I think it was short but that's okay because the long sleeves and high neck balanced it perfectly. I'd rent it again.
This dress was comfortable and great fit for larger breasted people. Had stretch for snug fit
I wore this dress for a night out in Vegas. Very comfortable with a great quality. Received tons of compliments and will definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: I felt like a rock star!
links_reviews_text: I found the size 4 too short for my taste but the size 6 ended up being perfect. It is nice and stretchy and very flattering! I loved that it zipped up so it was easy on and off and the sequins were a hit! I had so many compliments and was comfortable all night long. I found it to be warm for a winter party which was fantastic. It was amazing all around!

links_reviews_title: Great fit and unique but not overdone style
links_reviews_text: I would consider buying this dress. Excellent choice for cold weather events. It is lined and super comfortable. Body con but I wore it with opaque tights to dress it down somewhat. Danced all night and felt great.
Fun and comfortable. Many compliments

I love the details on this dress by Elizabeth and James! It runs small so you should size up. The dress is fitted at the hips and waist but comfortable throughout the midsection. It works best for all cups sizes and can be worn with any standard bra. The perfect mini dress to be paired with a bold heel!

This dress was very well made, had a nice comfortable material inside and fit nice and snug (but not in a bad way). The only problem was it was extremely short. I think if I went a size up the rest of the dress would have been too big and not even that much longer. I was planning on wearing tights and even still, the back was inappropriately too short and I am not tall.

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments on the dress.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'7" about 135lbs, athletic build. The dress fit really well and was so comfortable. I went with size 6 and probably could have gone with a 4 but it may have felt too short and less forgiving.
Was a little heavy and itchy. Pretty dress but wasn't a good fit for me and a little uncomfortable

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress, it is an easy fit and you feel confident wearing it.
links_reviews_text: True to size, forgiving in the bodice but it is short. I loved it, would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Received lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: This dress is VERY short. I wore it with opaque black tights and that worked well. I rented it knowing it was short, but was still surprised by the length when I put it on.

This dress was so fun to wear. It's pretty short, but I loved that the high neck and long sleeves balanced it out so I didn't feel too scandalous. I would never have tried this many sequins before, but it was perfect!

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing it.
links_reviews_text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this dress - sequins can be hit or miss. The dress fit and looked great but we ended up having a more casual New Years so I toned it down with a different option from RTR.

This dress was so fun to wear! The reverse side of the sequins has this cool matte glittery type look to it, which makes the dress feel more sophisticated, but still fun. Also upper comfortable style. I wore tights with it, so didn't feel like length was an issue. It is a warm dress, so perfect for wintertime parties!

links_reviews_title: It was way too short. I wouldn't recommend for anyone with a long torso. I couldn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: Way too short.
Stunning! It’s comfortable and warm, had a thin cotton like lining. Very stretchy to fit any body type. Would definitely rent again.

Easy to wear, quality party dress. Even on me @ 5'6 this dress was short. Super comfortable stretchy cotton blend base layer beneath the sequins. For the best look, had to "style" the sequins to make them look right.

links_reviews_title: This dress is actually pretty rad looking.
links_reviews_text: Material is great! I'm 5'6" and it was very short on me. I have a slender athletic body, around a size 4-6 and my butt cheeks almost hung out. I couldn't wear it. I would plan on this for a short slender person or size up.
Everything about this dress was great. Loved the fit, loved the look, and received compliments all night long.

This dress fit like a glove, even being fuller busted, the top zipped up perfectly. Usually i have too much room in the midsection when the bust fits but thus whole dress fits great. The sequins are perfect each with an individual amount of glitter so it sparkles just right. Also the length was great hit at mid thigh on me. It was also thicker so perfect for a colder night

This dress was awesome! I was looking for something with sleeves to wear to a fundraiser. It was comfortavlw and fit well. I got compliments all night. It was my first rental and I will definately rtr again!
I am 5'2" - The dress went down to my knees and was too matronly for the look I was going for.

What. A. Showstopper. This dress was so fun for New Year's Eve: eye-catching without being too much. I was surprised by how great the dress looked when I received it - sequins are a little bit of a gamble, after all. But it looked brand new, and I didn't lose any sequins while dancing, scooting in and out of cabs, etc. The dress definitely has some stretch - I could have easily worn a 6 if it'd been available. But overall, your natural size should work. The only two complaints I had were minor: (1) the sleeves were long on me (but I just cuffed them under so that they sat at my wrists), and (2) the lining feels a little cheap and heavy (but the only person who will know that is you!). Overall, definitely recommend for a fun night out!
Beautiful dress!! It was way too short for me, but i am 5'10" would be great for someone shorter. It was my backup dress, thank goodness my first pick worked! Runs true to size.

I rented this maxi for vacation and I loved it. It was easy to pack and just throw on. The color is great. I did find that it was a tad large in the bust area and wish that I would have sized down to a medium but I absolutely loved the length and how it fit everywhere else. I wore it with a strapless bra. The shoulder ties can be a bit tricky but not a deal breaker. Loved this dress and would definitely rent it again and maybe size down.

The fabric on this dress is so pretty. Mustard, cream and gray. The dress is the perfect maxi. The only tricky part was finding the right bra. Go without or use a strapless. No other way. I also felt this ran a touch small if you're going for a lot of flow.
I got tons of compliments. Added my own belt because otherwise a little bland. Top is a little large, so would order a size down next time.
Perfect dress for vacation to Portland. Vintage vibe and can dress up or down.
I got this as part of my first rental for my cousin's wedding. I loved the color! It was a little long but we sewed the hem up. We also tied the straps onto my bra so they wouldn't fall.
This dress was flowy enough to be breathable on a hot summer day and could be a dress to grow into as the baby bump grows. The top strap ties were kind of weird and the dress wrinkles easily.

Wore this to a casual wedding and just hanging around on a hot day and to a dinner. It's just such a lovey easy lil bb you can dress up or down and wear braless and happy and free. Also the color and pattern are amazing and the fabric is so light and comfy and length was perfect on me at 5'8. Want to keep!
This dress was the perfect length. I'm on the shorter side and maxi dresses are always dragging. This one was PERFECT. The straps tied on and were adjustable which was an added bonus.

links_reviews_title: Pretty and comfortable-- a little large
links_reviews_text: It was really nice and I love a dress that you can adjust the straps but it was just a bit baggy and I didn't have time to get a different size
The dress was gorgeous and had so many compliments. Very elegant and works for daytime and evening.

This dress is lightweight, flowy, and perfect for summer. I wore it with a strapless bra just because the top is so casual. The gathered waist sat a little high on me, but I added a thin black belt and it pulled it together nicely.
I was worried about the color being too drab, but it definitely wasn't. This dress was an unexpected hit! Perfect summer maxi.
Wore this to a Saturday brunch on the hottest day and got so many compliments. Loved!

I wore this with and without an additional belt. It's a great summer dress and effortless. The mustard yellow looked much better on my skin tone than I had expected. The adjustable tie straps were a big plus too!
A little long-but great for summer evening!

links_reviews_title: Very pretty. Figure out the straps
links_reviews_text: Neckline can be a little weird. It's pretty. A perfect thrown on dress. A little long, but perfect for my height. Floor grazing in flats. If you're in between a medium and small, get the small.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for Memorial Day Weekend, would rent again!
links_reviews_text: Fits large and long. Cute & cool dress for warm summer parties or just running errands.
Love the adjustable ties and elastic waist. Felt good and cute. Too long when I wore flip flops so I knotted a corner. Buying it to wear all summer!

This dress is much prettier in person. I had to size up to 14 from my usual 12 and so glad I did. Even with that I needed shape wear. I felt beautiful and hubby said I looked pretty in it. It's a drapey fabric that could be dressed up or down.
Beautiful color of the dress, got compliments all day. Based on reviews, I sized up and was glad I did. The dress is definitely tight on the stomach bloat
This brand runs small so I sized up one and it was perfect. Love this dress.

links_reviews_title: @thanksitsrtr - reviews said to size up & it fit great in the ribcage
links_reviews_text: but then the rest of it was just so frumpy! I just don't love the length. I love Parker usually, though! Size up and if you're okay with a weird medium length, this is a great dress! More on @thanksitsrtr or thanksitsrtr.com

links_reviews_title: The perfect day to night dress!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to work and then to a charity event that was a little dressier. At work, I buttoned the top and it was perfect for my conservative office. This is the 2nd time I've rented it. It's great if you have a large chest! I highly recommend this dress! So many compliments.
The dress is very pretty. I went up a size due to everyone's comments about being tight in the midsection area. Very beautiful dress but the dress had a hole on the left sleeve.
I chose to keep the neckline open. It fits true to size. Nice length and flowy skirt. Perfect for an outdoor spring time wedding!

Very well constructed. I sized up to accommodate my ribcage like I always do. The waist is a high yolk waist and it tucked me in snugly but wasn't too tight and didn't cause lumps. Very well constructed.
I read reviews that this ran small so I sized up. The fit was perfect. Such a fun color and pattern! Enjoyed wearing it so much that I scooped it up at the LA Sample sale :-)

links_reviews_title: Pretty in Purple!! Fun dress for a winter work event!
links_reviews_text: Great floral Parker dress, rented this to wear for a work event, lots of compliments, the pattern is very pretty!! It does run small in the waist, as others have said and the peek-a-boo keyhole is pretty friendly, I had to wear a bandeau top to cut down on the cleavage. I like a short fit and flare dress, so if you are uncomfortable with short, maybe skip this one or wear tights. Overall loved it!!

links_reviews_title: Snug in the waist but very cute
links_reviews_text: This was very cute for work. I wore lace stockings by Natori, a Karl Lagerfield cropped cardigan, and black kitten heel pumps by Louise et Cie. Many complements!
Glad I sized up for my waist based on past reviews. Great print. A little low in the keyhole in the front but I wore a cami.
The cut is nice and flows nice but is way too short. I'm only 5'1 and I had to wear dark thighs to tone it down. Also the slit/opening in the chest can be a little revealing so size up!

Very pretty silk fabric. FYI, if you have any curves AT ALL you will need to size up. . .maybe by two! I ordered my true size and it was comically small. Room for neither T nor A :( Waist had a nice nip. Might try again. Prob won't waste the shipping time though. (Waist v. Waste—see what I did there) :D

The fabric and cut of this dress is amazing, but this has no "give" so I went up a size to make sure it was the perfect fit for me. I am a full-figured girl and this dress is forgiving in all the right places (arms and belly) yet made me feel like a had curves without forcing them in place. My favorite part of this dress was actually the front. There is a small hook and eye to open this up for a low cut dress, for an evening look. I could see this as work attire, but open up the front and a fun happy hour look as well. Since I am also short this dress did hit right around my knee so for those are blessed with a little height I would be cautious. Overall a great dress.
Fits tight around the middle - not forgiving of any stomach bloat - but otherwise true to size. Great dress. Thinking about buying this one.
Good fit Wore for daytime party in winter

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear it, ran too small in the bust.
links_reviews_text: Will maybe try next size up next time? Fit everywhere except the bust :( I loved the pattern, pop of color and flowy design. It's on the short side in the back so that's something to note.
Loved it

links_reviews_title: Love this dress. Got tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: SUPER CUTE, very flattering, will rent again, possibly even buy!
my bootie may be too big for this. ' ) will rent again in an 8. it's super cute
Looked very cute, loved the layers and loved the purple (not usually a purple wear-er) this dress runs small so definitely size up!

Overall a very nice and flattering dress. Beautiful color and print. I'm in between sizes and typically wear size 4 (most labels). Since size 4 was not available I opted for size 6. While size 6 was a bit loose on me, I think 4 might have been too snug. So my suggestion is - if in doubt/between size it - size up.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! It felt like a special occasion just wearing it, if even just to work. ;)
links_reviews_text: Go up one size and give this piece a try!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments at work and then on my date. Loved it.
links_reviews_text: I saw that others said it ran small so I ordered a size up and I would suggest it. Worked for me.
I didn't care for this dress. Love the fabric and colors but the fit wasn't flattering to a full figure.

links_reviews_title: Wasn't able to wear, too small. So bummed it's cute! Will order again after I shed a few lbs.
links_reviews_text: Bummed

links_reviews_title: Cute dress for work and life
links_reviews_text: Hook and eye closure or just leave it open - both cute, but have to keep tabs on the top so as not to flash anyone. Color is lovely. Flattering skirt
This was a great dress, beautiful material, ran big so I sized up one and it was perfect. It was pretty warm so I wouldn't wear it in the summer
Fit well, comfortable , pretty, looks exactly like picture. Key hole is not revealing if chest is not too tight.
The keyhole in the front is really large - like 4 inches. Dress is super short.

Having read the reviews, I sized up from a 4 to a 6. I am petite yet pear shaped. I still could barley get this over my hips and stomach area but the top part I was swimming in! Avoid if you have larger hips and anything but a flat stomach :(

links_reviews_title: Runs small, doesn't work if you have a large chest
links_reviews_text: I run between a 14-16 and should have ordered an 18, if it was available. I couldn't get this over my bust (nor could I try to get it up from putting it on feet first, because, as others stated, there's no give in the hips). I loved the colors and design, but the fit didn't work.
Well-fitted and very cute. I wore it for date night and left open the eyelet to be a little more flirty with my husband. Great pattern and flowy, yet fitted, feel to this dress.
Hi

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous silk fabric and very beautifully made, but was tight on me.
links_reviews_text: I hover between a size 8 and a size 10 and the ten probably would have worked. I thought the A line shape would mean I should go for a smaller size, but was too snug in the hips and didn't lay correctly. Bummed because it's a stunning dress.
awful fit. not a 16 by any means. more like a size 10.

This dress is a beautiful print and seemed to be a nice flirty, fun dress for a night out on the town. But it was too small, snug in the midsection accentuating my mommy pouch, and it was way too short. perhaps if I knew to order a size up I would have worn it as a blouse with black leggings or jeans.
Did not like the overall fir of the dress esecially uptop
Runs true to size as other Parker dresses. I'm usually a 4 or 6, and the 6 fit easily. Great dress with black tights for date night.
Sadly I wasn't able to wear this piece as it was way too large. I tried buttoning the halter to make it fit but it just looked odd. I imagine if this fit well it would be cute, though!
So nice that this top was adjustable! I was able to wear a halter bra and loved the open back

links_reviews_title: easy to adjust to your body due to the adjustable halter
links_reviews_text: didn't even need a bra or nippies!
Wanted to love so badly as the color, fabric and style all are so amazing; however, for me the fit - just didn't work.
Comfortable and fun

links_reviews_title: Hardware snaps at halter are GORGEOUS
links_reviews_text: Didn't fit , small in bust but beautiful color

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: I wore this top to valentines dinner with my husband and I got so many compliments - including from him - that I just knew I couldn't let this top go! As far as stiffer lace material goes, this shirt wasn't too scratchy - I've worn worse from RTR - and the see through panels were definitely a little more risqué than I was used to but I liked that about it. Definitely needed to wear a strapless and backless bra with this and I had to size up from my usual small to medium for a pretty snug fit.
If you have a c cup or larger Size up

links_reviews_title: Amazing for a party this fall!
links_reviews_text: So many compliments on the cutouts and details of blouse!
Pairs well with a high waisted skirt or jeans

links_reviews_title: Super fun event. I received several compliments on my outfit.
links_reviews_text: I loved the top. Lots of compliments. Though it didn't show unless I lifted my arms, it was tight. I'd suggest ordering a size larger unless you have super slender arms. The fit was a bit tight in the arms and shoulders.
