links_reviews_title: I chose this top for a Valentines date with my husband.
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this top ...wish I could have kept it!! I am usually a size XS so I was glad I had ordered a back size, ended up wearing the small. I got tons of compliments everywhere we went, so happy I rented this beautiful top!
The fabric is a little scratchy and stiff but if you're not playing botchy ball, it's fine.

Super cute and sexy top for a casual event. Does run small so size up! Other reviews said that dancing was hard in this top but I had no issues doing just that: I enjoyed wearing this. Strapless bra is necessary
Very pretty but stiff with little stretch. I'd size up if possible. Very pretty though and quality fabric.
Top was gorgeous. I received tons of compliments. The material has no give so it was pretty difficult to zip on my own. Was able to wear with a strapless bra.
Love this for a Xmas party! So flattering. I was able to wear a regular nude bra with it...which was great...no special bra needed!!
Fit perfect in all areas, hit in the right spots and very flattering.

I loved wearing this top! Although it does show skin, I think it is a very classy top that can be dressed up very fancy or a fun date night or girls night out shirt. I felt great wearing this top and was very happy I got the large because it is tight. Also note you can't swing your arms around because of that but it didn't bother me. Loved this rental!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my 46h birthday in Austin. Got so many compliments and was told it was exotic.
links_reviews_text: The fit was amazing ! Like a glove! I wore an xtra small and had no problems and loved it. Def looks 10 x better on and in person. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit and color. You can dress it up or down.
links_reviews_text: If you need this for a more clasic night out (with professionals) wear something under because you could see my belly button.

links_reviews_title: Beautifully crafted shirt with beautiful material
links_reviews_text: After reading the reviews I knew this was going to be tight on my shoulders when lifting my arms. I have a smaller frame and small shoulder width and I felt comfortable at the party all night, despite the slight restriction. Of course, I got SO many compliments- always happens with RTR!

This is definitely a beautiful top, but runs small--especially in the arms. I was extremely restricted when tried to lift up my arms at all (i.e. couldn't even adjust hair). A small might have been better, but then I think around the stomach and chest it might have been a little large. The red color and details/cutouts really stand out with this one, but if you're looking for comfort at the same time this is not the right pick. I only wore for photos for about 15 minutes, and that was about my limit from a comfort perspective.

links_reviews_title: It was truly a one of a kind item. Everyone complimented and loved the color and lace like details.
links_reviews_text: Arms can be a bit restricting, wonderful high quality material, great zipper with a little material to help get into it by yourself.

This beautiful top by Saylor is the answer to your holiday get together! This top is made from top quality and the details are absolutely stunning. It does fit a bit small so I would recommend sizing up. Due to the details in the waist, you are able to see your skin but it isn't too revealing. I would recommend wearing a strapless bra or no bra since the panel on the chest can show your bra. Love this top and can't wait to rent it for the holiday!

links_reviews_title: I wore this when I was in NY and one girl even asked to take a picture with me she adored the top.
links_reviews_text: Fits great, but the fabric bleeds. Ruined the top of my white leather pants, so don't wear with white unless you dry clean first and scotch guard.

links_reviews_title: Love this classy, yet trendy top!
links_reviews_text: Obsessed! True to size. I wore this to work and then took a few pics for my blog afterwards. It would also make for a great holiday top. -Lindsey

The top does run small. I felt like I couldn't lift my arms above my head. It fit my chest perfect. If I had a larger chest I would size up. I loved the shirt! I got amazing compliments and I was the first person to wear this!! I would rent again for a night out or perhaps a holiday party.

links_reviews_title: was too tight on me so was not able to wear it
links_reviews_text: beautifully made, however, i should have ordered the medium

I wore this top to a high tea and then for family Christmas photos. I felt very classy at the high tea, and I really felt like it popped in the photos. I wore a nude tank top underneath. The arms restrict movement a tiny bit (no stretch), but the crochet detail is really fun!

The shirt is definitely an eye catcher and very flattering cut.. but I didn't realize from pics that it's sheer everywhere but the boobs. You can def see your mid section (belly button) through the sheer. Still cute but def not appropriate for my office holiday party that I had thought I would wear it to. Also you can't lift your arms!
Didn't get to wear because it was too tight in the arms, but beautiful top!

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing, may try to rent again
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a medium, and I think I'm right in between sizes for this top. It was fun but ultimately didn't end up wearing because it was slightly too big and the bra situation was difficult.

I read reviews which said runs small so I sized up and it was huge on me. Maybe I just don't have the body type for this shirt. Other than that, it is beautiful and very romantic and sexy. Would've loved to have worn it
The shirt was super cute, but it was too long from the neck to the chest area so I couldn't wear it. Made for someone with a long upper body.

I decided to rent something I wouldn't usually wear so i'd have something fun for a date night with the hubs. Unfortunately I didn't get to wear this because the sleeves were too tight for my arms, I was able to put the top on, but my mobility was so limited I decided not to wear it out of the house. The rest of the shirt fit great though, so for those of you with smaller arms - definitely try this one out.
Super cute with dark wash skinny jeans for a small Christmas Eve dinner party with family friends
Something festive yet unique for a holiday party! Definitely fitted and slightly restricting. Couldn't really lift my arms up much but was fine socializing with a drink in hand!
Beautiful top. Just ran too small. I have a chest and large rib cage.

Such a special top. I wanted something different for a holiday party so I paired this with black pants just like the model. It was perfect and I got a TON of compliments. Prob the most of any RTR rental. It really stands out and has gorgeous lace detail. Cons: not super comfortable. Had a little trouble raising arms. Def no give so size up. Might not work on busty gals.

This shirt is really pretty and I was sad not to wear it. The fit was really awkward and the tight him around the bottom hem of the shirt made it a pain to pull over the bust. I would not recommend this for curvy women - there is no give in the fabric.
I love the color and the lace bur it was too small. I couldn't lift my arms!
Ecen with small arms it was a but restrictive and hard to raise arms. Super fun and unique but not comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Order up- runs small and is very stiff
links_reviews_text: Beautiful and well made shirt but runs small and is stiff with no stretch. Could not wear.

Best features of this top are its uniqueness and its color - you wont find anything else like it. I am 5'6" 145lbs 34B, the medium would have fit me best but that size wasnt available. I ordered the L with the S as backup. I couldnt zip up the small so i went with the large. It was big in the bust area but i didnt mind. Slightly tight in the shoulders as other reviewers have stated but it didnt stop me from dancing all night!
Very fitted, was not able to wear a bra with it but it didn't really need one because of the inner lining over the bust.

My team had an 80s Miami Vice themed meeting - I thought more people would take that theme seriously but I didn't mind being one of the only people to commit to 80s pastel vibes! This dress is fantastic, it is an interesting color- like if mint and lime green had a baby. I love the color and cut and style. The fabric has some stretch and was very flattering (fully lined) only complaint was the tight fit of the lower arm hole. Styled as shown, and so fun to wear.

This dress was perfect for the bridal shower I hosted for my friend!! Everything from the color to the fit to the style completed the total look we were going for at the event! I would 100% RECOMMEND!
Rented for work but this is def an "event" dress! Bachelorette party for sure. And you've got to have body confidence to wear it, so have fun! Walk into the room like you own it!

This dress was perfect for a spring graduation. Received so many compliments on the color and style of the dress. Great material and runs true to size. The sleeves do fit right around the arm like suction cups. Some reviews said the top was too big but I did not have this problem. Great for someone with an athletic shape or curves. Would def rent again!
Wore this to a Bridal shower. It is the perfect color for spring & summer events. I was sitting a lot & it wrinkles easy so it's better for events where you're standing around a lot.
Ran a tad small, I had to size up but it was very flattering once I had the right size.

links_reviews_title: Great fit, super cute, love the color for Spring.
links_reviews_text: This dress was really cute and flattering. It's also very appropriate business attire. The top section is loose and hides any imperfections. The bottom skirt is tighter and shows off the hips and curves. I paired it with a pink bow belt and flowers to make it look less like a business dress and more Spring and casual. It was worn for a photoshoot with my dogs. The color is light mint green, perfect for Spring and Summer. And it was super comfortable. I paired it with a pair of tan platform sandals.
Pretty in mint. Lots of compliments. Very nice quality and fit.
Great cut and shape
Truly a perfect fit, great color and fabric quality, amazing sleeves

The fit was slightly on the larger size. I probably could have gone down a size but then I probably would have given up comfort in my midsection. It was the top part that was bigger on me, but because it was also the style I think it was ok. Overall, this wasn't my favorite rental, but it was still a really nice, well made dress. I have another black Genny dress that I kinda wish I had worn instead it was GORG. So I definitely came out with a new fave designer overall. Still though, I felt fab and stylish all the same.
This was great for a business event. A ton of compliments on cut and color.

Love love love this dress ! Perfect for a work review! It's also the first dress from RTR that I can zip up past my chest, so if you are "fuller bust" with a smaller waist size, this dress is perfect !

links_reviews_title: Only thing missing was my invite to the royal wedding
links_reviews_text: The color and proportions of this dress make it an all around winner. A little tan on my shoulders helped make the color pop. Is it practical for much moving or driving? No. But perfect for meetings! Fun to wear and perfect for spring as the material is a little heavier without much breathing under the arms.

Only two reviews were done when I decided to add this dress to my shipment. If you have a smaller waist but still a slight backside/hips/legs this dress will fit great. The sleeves are exaggerated which was to be expected but if you have the bottom at the right spot around your elbow they lay good. I would say "movement" would be just as "constrictive" as any body con or more fitted dress you would wear. This was a good fit for the graduation I attended & tried to get a little tan because the color can wash you out if you are pale. Would recommend if you want something a little different and classy but still showing your tiny waist/curves!

Pros of having the unlimited membership: renting a bomb dress for a Thursday night dinner with bae. Loved the fit but you won't be using your arms much (worth it). The material is amazing! I did wear a type of strapless bra or else my nipples would show somewhat.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Spring Dress with funky sleeves!
links_reviews_text: Fit is true to size, I'm usually a 4-6 and the 6 was a bit loose, but very flattering. The sleeves were definitely odd (especially when you raise your arms) but the color is fantastic! And the form is perfect!
The dress was very cute, super narrow in the hips. I would have to size up two sizes if I tried it again. I ordered a 42. Cute spring/summer dress.
It was a nice dress for work. I felt confident and pretty.
Yeah, I'm curvy but damn. Ci couldn't even zip this up. No room for hips at all. Guess this will work if you have a flat butt and no hips - just straight up and down

links_reviews_title: Love the color and that's pretty much it
links_reviews_text: The bust is too big, the bottom part is too tight..the arms as several reviewers have said are not the most comfortable. I wore this to an event at church and I constantly had to pull the bottom down..so annoying!
Skirt part runs a little small but super chic and tight material sucks you in; wouldn't be best color on a pale person
I love this dress. The color, the cut outs, the fit. It all works. Perfect summer dress for any occasion

Rented this for a luncheon but it didn't arrive in time so I ended up wearing is more causally and loved it. Mine was a little worn on the hem so I'm only giving four stars, and keep in mind this style limits your shoulder/arm mobility a bit. Definitely recommend!

So, I got this in a size 14 which is my typical size but the bottom was too tight around my hips. Returned and got the size 16 and now the top is WAY too large for me - granted I'm a pearshape so I'm definitely more bottom heavy. If you aren't busty I might pass on this dress if you are a pear shape.
Loved the outfit. Little too big for me

links_reviews_title: I received many complements about the color of the dress.
links_reviews_text: The dress was a bit tight in the midsection. Otherwise I loved it
Not for petites

What an interesting design-wore it to wedding rehearsal dinner and got so many compliments. Material is thicker so it's very forgiving. Sleeve design is sexy yet sophisticated. Wish I could have kept it.

links_reviews_title: the fit was amazing and the color was great!
links_reviews_text: the bottom hugged my curbs well and the top was loose and confortable, I am a little top heavy so this dress was perfect, the color of the dress really complemented my cinnamon skin.

Beautiful dress but will definitely need Spanx. There is more than enough room up top but the bottom is VERY form fitting so every lump or panty line shows. I double spanx'd on bottom, so it worked out beautifully.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for work and for going out. Lovely color and shapely cut. Will rent again!
links_reviews_text: Fits well and is flattering on one's figure.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but the sleeves do limit movement
links_reviews_text: Really pretty lime color and sleeves are poofy like the pics, but they do restrict your movement a bit.
Fit tight on bottom and loose on top

links_reviews_title: Such an adorable dress, but the fit is a little strange.
links_reviews_text: Runs small in the hips/butt & VERY tight in the arm bands that hit around the elbows. Unless you have super skinny arms, I could see it being very restrictive.

links_reviews_title: Really pretty dress. Color is as pictured. True to size.
links_reviews_text: This is a really pretty dress! I didn't try it on before packing it to wear to a destination wedding. When I went to wear it the day of the event, to my surprise, the zipper separated as I was unzipping it to put it on. I was devastated and didn't pack a back-up dress. I ordered this a little big so I didn't think I'd need a backup. I usually order size 4s to give me space to dance and be comfortable, but I'm actually a 2. I tried to fix it, but no such luck. Shoulders are really pretty and I don't think I would have had any issues with them. I will definitely rent it again to wear to another event.
This dress is gorgeous and unique. I was heartbroken I could not wear it to my event. Will rent again and hopefully it will be in good shape.

links_reviews_title: This dress is beautiful and fits perfectly.
links_reviews_text: Fit's perfectly quality
too big

links_reviews_title: AMAZING DRESS! Top 1% of all the rentals I have worn!
links_reviews_text: Great fabric, fit and flare. Perfect for an awards night at work. CLASSY and FLATTERING.
This dress was so flattering & went perfectly with my Mardi Gras accessories!
Everyone thought it was so fun and sexy and it was a color I would've otherwise never picked. Fits true to size. 5'3 120 lbs wore a small
Great color and perfect for a holiday or festive party! Not the most flattering so spanks were a must! Sequins also scratched up my arms! Would still recommend!

Rented to chaperone our winter formal...medium was a little bootylicious for a high school teacher, so I went a size up (although to be fair, I probably would have been self-conscious about the medium at any event). It was stretchy, non-itchy, and such a great green. Caught the light in all the right ways!
So many compliments! Not too short or tight and the color was magical!

I rented the dress for a cocktail party. Dress fit true to size. It has some stretch in it so made is super comfy. I danced all night in it and the sequins didn't scratch under my arms or anything. I loved this dress!!!

links_reviews_title: I received great reviews from peers. I loved the dress. Definitely would rent again.
links_reviews_text: Only con not made for person with butt and thighs couldn't dance because it was so shirt in the back.

Sparkly but not over the top. Color is fantastic. I was worried the sequins would rub under my arm but it didn't bother me at all. Has stretch to it so it's very comfortable. Runs a little small - size up if in between.
Material had some stretch. I'm 36DD and didn't wear a bra or pasties-- perfect hold. Very comfortable- danced all night. Great length. I would rent again.
Great color. Loved the sparkly sequins. Dress is stretchy and comfortable. Received many compliments. Super festive!

The dress had a great fit-made of a little stretchy material so hugged well in all the right areas. I am 5 foot 11 so the larger size was helpful. The dress is a little short for tall girls. The large fit but I definitely needed the extra inches for the length. I am on the curvy side.
This dress was amazing! I felt super sexy in it and it fit amazingly. I got so many compliments and it worked perfectly for a holiday work party!

I worked this dress to a Christmas cocktail party and I had so many compliments on the color and fit. I decided to wear the medium for a little more hip room to dance and it was perfect. It has a little stretch and I had no issues with the sequins irritating my arms. Great dress and I would rent this again!

I rented the L because I wanted to be on the safe side it being a tight dress but it was very loose on me. I should have gone with my true size, M, and it would have been comfortable still. The fabric gives and it looks great in person and in pictures!

This dress was a show stopper. It was flattering and forgiving where it needed to be. I'm 5'5" and thought it was a little short, but still classy. The only draw back was the sequin under the arms was a little irritating, but worth it. Would recommend...
Definitely runs small. I'm normally a 2 but went with small instead of extra small and it fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for a Hollywood Award Show!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely LOVED this dress! If fit perfectly, and the color looked great on my skin. It's definitely a head turner and will make you feel FIERCE. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Arrived early and was so easy to return! Will definitely be renting again!
links_reviews_text: Fit snug, didn’t move, could have used a size up, but it wasn’t available. Great color for wearing once!

links_reviews_title: This dress is a stunner, and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I originally ordered a M, but it was too big-- stretched out like a lot of people had already worn it. RTR sent me a S super quick, and I wore that one instead. It fit well, hugged the curves in all the right ways, but the black lining kept peeking out the bottom (see picture) which made me feel self-conscious.

I wore this for a #harrypotter themed wedding to represent #slytherin ;) Felt very sexy, yet classy. I am carrying a little extra weight right now (mostly belly) and wore a shaping slip under it. Not a requirement, but it did give me a good hourglass shape! Regular bra would work, but I wore my strapless because the straps on my other bra kept sneaking out. Lots of compliments. Felt comfortable and glamorous.

links_reviews_title: Very shiny and modest yet short and fitted.
links_reviews_text: I would've gotten a size up on a count of how tight it was. Also consider the sequins so if you're dancing, it's a little uncomfortable to the touch.
My fiance surprised me with tickets to see a show in Vegas so I wanted to do it up big, Vegas style. This dress was perfect for that! I got compliments the entire night, everywhere we went.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a classy club party for my company in Vegas!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove! I'll be honest, when I was ordering this dress as part of my unlimited to try it on, I was very skeptical that I would even like it. Turns out, I love it, and I bought it. Loved the look and feel of it. Although after being out in the Vegas heat wearing this, the sequins did start to rub around my underarms, so if you plan on wearing this for 8+ hours, be wary of that. I got SO MANY compliments wearing this dress. Our company rented out an upscale Vegas night club for our USA Ball celebration, and the dress code was "classy club attire". I think this dress hit the nail on the head. I wore it with silver accessories, and it was the perfect combination. I would absolutely recommend this, and plan on wearing the same look for a friend's bachelorette party!
Fit like a glove yet hid all my bumps and lumps! Super sexy and fun! Great color

I rented this dress to see Wicked. I could have worn the XS or the Small but chose the small because the bottom hem had fallen out on the extra small. This dress has a pretty classic sheath shape, was comfortable to wear and was exactly what I was looking for.
Loved this dress! The color is so unique, definitely a show stopper! Comfortable and true to size as well. I wear a size 4, the small was perfect.

This dress is beautiful and fit amazingly well. Loved the cut and fit. It has a nice stretch to it and didn't ride up when I walked. My hair did get stuck on some sequin every once in a while but over all a great dress!
This dress was perfect for a Mardi Gras Party! Would definitely rent again!
Obsessed with this dress as it was perfect for a girls trip to Vegas!!!! Very flattering and for us tall girls it wasn't too short! So many compliments!
Absolutely love this dress! Perfect fit and length. Everyone was obsessed with the color and sequins

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for a roaring twenties party.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable. Fitted, but has lots of stretch. The color was fantastic. Received many compliments. I would definitely wear again.
So many compliments!so comfortable ! Will rent this again!

Beautiful green, sequins dress perfect for Saint Patty’s weekend wedding! Many compliments on the shade and the sparkle. Only complaint was that the stitching on the bottom hem was falling out a bit from previous use.

I wore this dress to a Casino Night Charity event. It was perfect! I ordered the small and medium. Both fit but i went with the medium. I weigh 140 lbs. 5 foot 5. Athletic ish build. I was concerned the sequins would bother my under arms, but they didn’t. Great experience with RTR. I’ll be using them again.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress - would wear for a holiday party.
links_reviews_text: Fits nicely and not to short. I didn't end up wearing it as I liked a back up style better for my particular event. Color is beautiful.

links_reviews_title: First time renting from RTR but definitely not the last!
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing!! Rented it for my sorority's semi-formal (Mardi Gras themed) and the dress was perfect, very sparkly but not tacky at all. I was a little worried about it being too short, but I wore it with 3" heels and it was a great length. Only thing to note is that the sequins under the arms were a little scratchy at first, but after an hour and one or two drinks I didn't notice it at all. Would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: As soon as I took off my coat, a stranger told be how fabulous my dress was!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my 40th birthday party. I'm 5'2" , 140lbs and I wear 34G Bra. The XL fit perfect, not super snug. I could have probably worn the L if I had smaller boobs. The dress is very comfortable. I got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: I danced the night away in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Love this dress!! It was fun, comfortable + stretchy, simple style with a little bling - perfect!! I ordered a small + extra small - the small would have been "ok" but was a little loose in the back. The extra small was a little short (for me) but I was reassured several times that the length was completely appropriate. I miss this dress already!!

Dress was gorgeous and I got a ton of compliments. The fit was a little strange. It was loose and tight in unexpected places. The sequins were perfect and it was comfortable but I felt the fit was nothing special compared to some of the other dresses I've rented.
Loved this dress for New Years! It fit perfect and I loved the green!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, great color, made well, lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress, giving it a 4 as one of the seams wasn't in tact and I had to see it at the event. I'm thankful where the event was held had sewing kits.

This dress was true to size. The material is thicker, but I did not notice an issue with the hem flipping up like some other reviews I read. The best feature of this dress is clearly the back. The open back with the intricate floral, lace detail was so lovely and feminine. I ended up not wearing this dress for the formal Christmas party I went to because I went with another dress I had rented. I would rent this one again, though, particularly for a fall, formal event or wedding.
Wore this dress to a work event. Very beautiful dress with lovely back.

links_reviews_title: The back of the dress is incredible
links_reviews_text: Great thick material, back is beautiful. Don't know if it's just the cut, but it poofs out at the bottom a bit which made me think it's hemmed weird or someone altered the dress. Still a good fit but just so you know

2 a bit roomy on me. 0 would be perfect! Rented this for a big formal event but decided I liked a new dress better. Wore to a different cocktail party. It's very beautifu just been around a while but you wouldn't know it from the perfection of the embroidery and construction. The bottom of the dress has plastic or something sewn into the hem & a heavier thicker material. Dress does stick out as it does not fall against your legs.

I loved everything about this dress for a holiday cocktail party. Some fun details: the lace in the back is unlined; there are snaps on the side that secure lace over the zipper. Overall the dress is slim fitting and was a perfect cocktail length for me at 5'2". Highly recommend for petites who typically fit an XXS or 00.
Perfection. Amazing quality and color. Hem was a bit tangled but it added volume in a nice way. Snaps were hard to open/close but they were very well constructed. Rave reviews for the dress.

I rented this dress for a fancy holiday party, and it was perfect! I've never gotten so many compliments on anything I've worn - multiple people even asked where I got the dress! It fit beautifully, although the zipper was tough (probably need a buddy to help zip). The pictures don't do it justice. And there are pockets! I wish I could keep this dress. I definitely plan to rent it again.

I wore this to the Christmas party my husband and I host. So many compliments! Someone told me I look like I own the party! However, the material inside the weighted hemline was crinkled and causing it to keep flipping up. I had to pin it down.
Measurements in the photo: 5'2" 36x26x36 and the 4 was snug in the waist but still wore because it fit as long as I didn't allow myself any food that'd made me bloat :)
Fit very snug for a 10 and wasn't form fitting at all

links_reviews_title: I wore the dress for our engagement photo shoot. Loved the dress!
links_reviews_text: Thanks to a very receptive customer service, I got my back up dress in the nick of time! This was not my first choice for the photo shoot but luckily they were able replace and overnight this one. The details on the dress are wonderful. The back design is great. The material of the dress was thick enough to go without a bra.

I typically wear size 12 dress and tops (38C) with a short torso. Couldn't get the 12 zipped. Thank gawd I ordered the back up size 14. Received several compliments on the color and style. Though other reviewers mentioned wearing backless bras, I bought an inexpensive red bralette from Target and it did the trick! Others couldn't even tell. And did I mention the pockets!!

links_reviews_title: I think I just needed a bit smaller of a size.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'6 and a half, 150 lbs, 30 waist, 39.5 hips and 36D. This dress was just okay! I did not like the material/fabric. It creased when sitting and standing. I also felt like the dress was more boxy than A-line. Would not rent again. However, I did get compliments on the dress though! I really loved the colors and details. Just the fit was not for me. I do have a vlog on Instagram: Mrs.chicchanel with a video to better show and explain.

Dress fit well. Wore my own bra which is nice for a large busted woman. Don't get dressed alone!!!! Husband was needed to zip and snap me up (many many snaps). Loved the color. Hem on back up dress was not okay!!!!! Was wonky.
The dress is spot clean only. But I think it needs a dry cleaning.

I love red and had at least one compliment on the color. The see through/lace back is neat and received compliments on this as well. Comfortable and as someone else mentioned you can eat and dance in it w no problems lol. Honestly not sure on sizing. I have worn two size 12s off here (different labels) where size 10 was too small. This one had option for 14 so I didn't get the 10 but thinking I might have been able to wear a 10 this time especially w no bra and I think I lost a little weight. I didn't realize this dress had snaps til already wearing it and when I did I couldn't unsnap them. Overall a great experience though!
The back of this dress is fantastic. Ideally worn without a bra. I put some weight on recently so i am about 160lbs and i wore the size8
Fits true to size, and material was thick enough to not need a bra.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but desxription is misleading
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful, but the RTR description is not correct. It says you can wear it with any standard bra, so iI thought the back was fully lined and just appeared backless, but that is not the case. Its just lace, so you need a backless bra which I luckily happened to have. I rented it for my work Holiday party and didn't think a backless dress was appropriate, so I was a little uncomfortable all night. Also, the description says its knee length on a 5'6 model, but I'm 5'7 and its definitely mid-thigh which was another issue for a work party. Lastly, it has a thin piece of plastic about 2 inches wide all the way around the hem I guess to give it some structure, but mine arrived creased so the dress laid really weird all night. Overall, it is a gorgeous dress but I wish the description had been more accurate ans I probably wouldnt have fotten it for this particular event.

links_reviews_title: First RTR was amazing! I didnt want to send back this dress.
links_reviews_text: The fit and length were perfect. The back of the dress was gorgeous. Got compliments all night. Zipper was a bit tricky but it was fine.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and festive for the holiday season!
links_reviews_text: I always love ML dresses and rent them quite frequently for special occasions. I wore this for a friends wedding and it was beautiful. I rented a 4 and a 6 but wore the 6; the 4 was tight in the chest for me. The back of the dress is a bit sheer and I know some reviewers had mentioned going braless but I wore a nude bra and didnt think it showed too much. The dress was very comfortable and even had pockets ;)

Pros: the dress fit nicely, professional, lace back is a nice touch Cons: the zipper is broken about halfway up (it isn’t a sizing issue) - it took four people to help me zip it up and even my back up size had the same problem; the bottom of the dress tends to flap up and isn’t appealing

links_reviews_title: Loved dress but it was difficult.
links_reviews_text: The bottom of the dress has a thick band, to keep the bottom rounded out but when the dress arrived it was severly twisted which did not allow the dress to be worn properly. I spent hours w an iron and working on it to straighten it out. The zipper on the side of the dress was also not functioning well. The top lace overlay that snaps was ripped and tge elastic under it had been visibily stretched. The dress presented itself very well and I received many compliments but it was a nightmare to make it wearable.

The details of this dress are simply beautiful! The lace detailing on the front and back are gorgeous. I wore this to my brother-in-law's wedding and received many compliments. The back of this dress is see-through, so it's best not to wear a bra (or use a backless bra). I had planned on wearing the size 6, but because I didn't wear a bra, I sized down to the 4 in order to keep everything in place :) It was fitted but comfortable enough even to sit in. I took off one star because the bottom of this dress was strange - a stiff band along the bottom of the dress seemed to be warped, giving it an awkward shape. It didn't bother me enough to not wear the dress, and I don't think anyone else really noticed it.
This dress is gorgeous! Definitely true to size. The lace back (not pictured) was super beautiful. Wore it on an unexpectedly chilly night, but still loved it!
No give because of the material, so I went with the larger size. Color and back are really special! Got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: This dress is fun to wear and gets a lot of attention so that is pretty much a win win!
links_reviews_text: This was a back up look so I only got it in one size-thank goodness it was true to size and the 6 fit me perfectly. It's a backless dress but I'm small busted so I just didn't wear a bra and it was fine. It's so pretty and it has pockets and I got a ton of compliments. The color is super vibrant and even at an event where everyone was wearing red, mine really stood out!

links_reviews_title: The dress is beautiful and lacey back very sexy yet elegant.
links_reviews_text: I liked the dress a lot and received a lot of compliment. I am 130lbs, 5'9" and size 2 worked ok. The fit was not ideal and part of the dress around my waist - especially in the back was sticking out a bit - I tried size 0 and it was way too small. I loved the pockets and keeping my hands in them helped to conceal the sticking out material :)

My original size 0 was sold out and I ended up receiving my back up size 2, plus two other dresses of a similar red lace look. The 2 seems to fit as a "normal" size 2. It was a little baggy in the skirt area but otherwise fine for me. The red leaf design is enchanting and begs for compliments. I had my heart set on wearing it, so I'm glad it worked out w/ the 2. Very comfortable. And a plus - no bra needed. I paired with beige leather sandals, much like the photo in the listing.
Received many compliments-perfect for a fall wedding. Classic style with fun lace open back (need backless bra). Has pockets!!

Beautiful dress, got tons of compliments. Fit was usual for an ML dress for me (they are usually a little small on me, so I size up). Only fit issue was it bunched a little in the back above my bum. Maybe it's because I have a bigger booty or maybe I should have sizes up another size.

links_reviews_title: Stunning in person, this dress is gorgeous- and it has pockets!
links_reviews_text: The dress is essentially backless- plan on a backless bra and wearing hair in an updo to show off the gorgeous design. Fully lined, beautifully crafted, little details like hidden zipper and snaps are wonderful.
This dress fit perfectly! Loved the fabric- thick in front and lace in back. Was able to wear without a bra. Loved the flower details! Great for a fall wedding.

links_reviews_title: The dress was well made and made me feel like a queen.
links_reviews_text: The back was sheer, but I was able to wear a (nude) bra. However, if you're self-conscious about your back, you might want to take along a little shawl. But the back of the dress definitely set it apart. I danced all night and didn't feel constricted in any way. This was my first time to use Rent the Runway, but definitely not my last.
Have pockets! Back is beautiful!
The back of this dress is special! Pockets rock. Side zip is convenient. I usually wear a 12, ordered 10 and 12.

I usually wear a size 10 (non-designer) so a 14 was a good fit. The downside for me is that I am a box (not really an apple or other fruit.) So this dress doesn't necessarily sit where I would like with my non-shape and mom belly, but it was more flattering than I expected. I REALLY loved the color. A plus that I didn't expect to be a plus were the pockets. Pockets usually look horrific on me, but these were great and didn't poof out when I put the dress on. (Alright, so I'm a box with a little mom hips as well as mom belly.) Overall, I would recommend this dress.
Great dress!!! You can eat whatever you want and dance the night away comfortably!! Beautiful color and sassy back!

This dress was amazing. Great quality, beautiful color, pockets! I wore it to a cocktail wedding and received many compliments. The back is sheer therefore go with no bra or some sort of sticky boobs (I just use duct tape). I have thicker thighs and found the cut to be a little snug so wore my backup size.

Pro: "stretchy" material made it comfortable to wear and move around in -I'm 5'4 and the dress was perfectly floor length...I was hoping it would've been long enough for me to wear heels in. -size up for sure if you're going to rent this

links_reviews_title: I felt absolutely stunning in this dress! It hugged me in all the right places
links_reviews_text: I thought the 4 would fit better, but it was loose at the top. The size 6 fit snug and felt great! The cutout in back was a cool extra - I loved this dress and felt so amazing in it!

Beautiful dress. Material was so nice and high quality. Loved this dress. Sized way up based on others reviews and it was successful. Typically a 14 but went up to 18 and felt so gorgeous. Highly recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: Flattering in ALL the right spots!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so perfect. It fits like a glove, accentuating all the right areas! I felt very Kim K in this dress. I ended up not wearing only because I wanted a dress that stood out in color a little more but strongly considering purchasing this dress!
Looked great, loved it and didn't trip over it all night.

Beautiful dress that pairs well with gold. It was very classy, but the low shoulders made it more fun and young. The bust and body were a little tight but I managed just fine. The length was good too. This was my favorite look of the two I needed for the event.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress & may have to buy it! I've rented it twice, for my mom's 60th & BF wedding!
links_reviews_text: I am typically a 0 but the 2 was so much more comfortable! Size up with this one
I'd normally wear a 6 but glad I got the 8. I ordered an 8 L and I'm so glad I did because it ended up being the perfect length with my heels! Definitely snug so order a size up!

This dress fit me like glove and I felt good in it. I love the simplicity of the gown. I would definitely rent this again. You cannot wear spanks because there is a small diamond shaped cutout in the back. The dress fits nice and tight in the torso, so you feel fine without tummy control.

links_reviews_title: I had an amazing senior prom in this dress! It was originally my second choice but I loved it.
links_reviews_text: I am a small person and had a hard time finding a dress and this dress fit me like a glove. Its a stretchy material that hugs your curves but it’s not a lot of arm movement due to the sleeves.

links_reviews_title: Felt elegant and comfortable all night long!
links_reviews_text: Huge fan of this dress!! Being 5’3 it’s rare to find something i don’t have to hem so I was incredibly happy when the regular length barely grazed the floor in 3 inch heels! This dress is soo figure flattering. The thick material hugs in all the right places and has just enough stretch! I couldn’t totally get away with no bra, but a strapless was completely concealed even with the tiny cut out in back. Love, love love!
I'm 5'7 /140 and the 6L was better. The dress was super flattering and nice and stretchy. Only downside is limited movement in arms.
A perfect navy dress for a semi formal affair.
I felt like a star in this dress! Hugs curves perfectly. Super flattering. I felt confident all night. Only downside is you have limiting arm movement for dancing..didn't stop me though.

This dress fit perfectly. I'm 5'9 and 130 pounds and wore the 4L. It was very fitted and I could have probably even worn the 6L (it wasn't available rent as my back-up size). The length was perfect without heels, which was fine with me. I wore comfortable flats and no one knew different :) Pros- mermaid fit, thick & stretchy material, rich navy blue color Cons- zipper almost got stuck going over seam, the top piece that folds down didn't want to lie flat or even all around, length if you're tall and want to wear heels I enjoyed the whole experience and look forward to renting again!

This was such a gorgeous dress a really showed of the figure beautifully. The only downside is even the long is still too short. I had to wear sandals and my feet were still showing. Other than that I received so many compliments on the dress and would wear it again.

This dress was perfect! As I'm fairly short, I was afraid that the dress would drag on the floor, but it was a perfect length with heels. It hugged my curves nicely, but wasn't too tight or restricting. Will definitely rent this one again.

The dress was extremely tight, despite sizing up like reviews stated. The off the shoulder portion would require continual fixing and reworking, every movement repositioned the shoulders. The cut out in the back is cute, but makes it unable to wear spanx. Did not wear this dress
Perfect fit and very comfortable. Wore to a New Years Gala.
Loved this dress. There is tighter waist on the dress which is perfect for hugging your curves. The dress fit great but I found it hard to zip because of the fabric, not because of the fit.

links_reviews_title: Fits great, but length is really short.
links_reviews_text: Wore with Spanx and the fit was great. Very glamorous. Although some seams were popped when it arrived, like the darts near the chest area. But not noticeable because of the dark color. My only complaint is that the long is still too short. I was self conscious of the length the whole night.

The dress is definitely a stunner. I rented my usual 4, and the 6 as my backup. Based on the last time I rented Katie May, I knew that I needed to size up and get the long length, and I'm glad I got both. I ended up wearing the 6L. The fabric of this dress had stretch and held me in in the right places. The only issue was that the give in the fabric made the dress ride up a little, so each time I stood, I had to readjust and shimmy the skirt down. When I first got the dress, I wasn't sure what the off-shoulder bit was supposed to do, whether it was supposed to just scrunch down or fold or what. I decided to neatly fold it halfway down and tack it in place so it wouldn't aggravate me the entire evening. I got so many compliments and my boyfriend loved it! I accessorized with sparkly earrings, no necklace, and it felt great! As much as I enjoyed this dress, I wouldn't rent it again--it ran way too short for my taste. RTR is awesome!! I'm already expecting my next rental! Thanks for making it a memorable evening!

links_reviews_title: I felt AMAZING in this dress!!!!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit, but it was extremely tight around the arms. Otherwise than that all eyes were on me!!
Very comfortable

Try on Review: I was surprised I loved this as much as I did. It was very comfortable and the length was great. It was a little difficult to zip up since the zipper is on the left but if you zip up first before putting Left arm in sleeve it's not so difficult. Also the off the shoulder piece was a little difficult to adjust on your own. Just a note there is a cut out in the back so no full body shape wear.

Great floor length dress for a formal wedding. It was a little tight on me (I wore a 4L) and the unwire had instances where it jabbed me. Wish the color was a lighter navy, as it often looked black. Overall happy with my decision
Beautiful dress, the fabric is really thick, however the arms were so tight I couldn't even lift them high enough to zip the zipper. Returned it for another

links_reviews_title: Perfect blend of sophistication and sex appeal
links_reviews_text: This dress is a stunner. I felt amazingly sexy and sophisticated in this dress. However, it runs very small. I fluctuate between a 10 and a 12. I wore a 14, and even that was snug. But the way this dress hugs at the waist/hips, and the slight mermaid cut will do amazing things for your butt! The shoulder detail is slightly annoying. It just folds over, and it did not want to stay that way throughout the night, especially when we got to dancing. The back of this dress is gorgeous, however the cutout is pretty low. So I highly recommend a a backless bra. Also, if you were shapewear, they need to be seamless and short, otherwise they will show where the cutout is.

links_reviews_title: This dress was incredible! Compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: This great was great! I had people telling me I should buy it because it looked so good! A lot of people say this dress runs small but I would say it fit true to size. However this dress is made to be form fitting. It will hug EVERY curve. The length worked perfectly for me with 3 in heels I wouldn’t have wanted it to be any longer. I will note you most likely will not be able to raise your arms above your shoulders, but hey you’ll look great!
Fits a little tight on my breast. I am. Size DD but overall a great comfortable fit and fabric. I would rent it again
This dress fit me like a glove and wasn't too long. I received so many compliments on the dress

I chose this dress for a black tie charity event. I'm 5'4", 123 lbs, pear shaped and typically wear a size 2-4. I read the reviews and ordered up. I got a 6R and an 8R. The material was good quality and thick; nice to hide any flaws. The size 6 was tiiiiiight in the hip area and I couldn't zip it up. Size 8, zipped up, was fitted in the hip area, but was so gappy in the boob/armpit area. And the band that goes around the shoulders was a little odd. I wasn't sure whether to fold it or keep it as is. As is, it came up almost to my neck. So I folded it, but it just wouldn't fold correctly all the way around. It was just awkward and awkward to dance around in. But all off the shoulder outfits are. The length was good. I wore 4" heels with the dress and it was a perfect length. Overall, the dress worked and the boob gapping wasn't noticeable, but I won't rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Dress did not fit me (lining way too tight), so my friend wore it instead!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful shoulder detail.

I wore this as a bridesmaid for a formal wedding and it was a lovely dress. It does run a bit small, I am between a 4 and 6, usually fitting better into a 4, and the 6 fit perfect. The 8 actually also fit, but was large in the bust for me. I am 5'9 so the long was necessary with heels. However, if wearing flats then the normal length probably would have worked. I received compliments all night on this dress. It felt very elegant and sophisticated. It's quite comfortable as well, made of stretchy thick fabric that holds you in.

I felt amazing in this dress and got so many complements! It is very form fitting yet figure flattering and sophisticated. It fit perfectly but with no room to spare, So I would recommend sizing up on a backup size. I 100% recommend the dress, I wish I had another event I could wear it to!

Love Katie May dresses at a fraction of the price! The crepe material and lining is flattering. However do size up on this dress, per the designer this runs small. I'll echo what others say - don't expect to lift your arms in this one. I rented as a bridesmaid dress and love it because it's totally not a typical bridesmaid dress or material. I'm so obsessed I might buy it!

links_reviews_title: Loved it! I received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly.

I rented this dress for my engagement photos and I absolutely loved the way it fit. However, I purposely rented a 6 long and 8 long because I am 5'7. I was hoping that with heels my dress would still cover my shoes but they didn't which was a little disappointing. Especially because on a different review a person said she was 5'10 and dress up was long enough to cover her feet. I ended up having to take off my shoes in many of my photos due to the length of the dress. The sleeves barely stay down but that wasn't too big of a deal. Other than that, everything was great!

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Lots of great compliments!
links_reviews_text: Got so many great compliments on this dress! I would recommend sizing up one, since the dress does hug you a little. I am between a size 10/12 and I went with the 14R and was very comfortable all night!

I'm 5'3 so I'm on the shorter side , the straps were a tad long and couldn't be adjusted . The hem was also a tad long just for reference . Other than that I was very happy with this dress , the fabric , print and cut . Sz 4 would've also fit me if I wanted it clinging to my body . With sz 6 , I was able to move around comfortably .

links_reviews_title: Quality fabric, vibrant design, tropical fun!
links_reviews_text: Took this dress to Jamaica and wore it many times! I didn't wear a bra, and the length (I'm 5'5) worked with sandals so no heels required but can certainly wear with heels if you'd like. There's a bit of a plunge, but it worked for a tropical vacation. The side tie bunched up a bit, but that didn't stop me from having this dress in constant rotation.
Cute dress that felt high quality, just beware that the neckline is really low. Worked great for me as a coverup for my swimsuit. The slit at the leg and tie on the waist were also fun touches!
Pretty dress! True to size!

Great if you're looking for a tropical vibe! It had vibrant colors and then cutest print! The material was not as imagined--almost a bathing suit material. Because of this, it can most definitely be dressed up or down. I wore it to a summer wedding, but it can definitely be worn for a more casual evening. It was a little tighter around my tummy than I would have liked and it is pretty low cut. For these reasons, I did have to purchase the appropriate under garments in order to wear this dress--something to consider for women who don't feel comfortable without wearing a bra. I almost didn't wear it for the reasons just mentioned. Overall, I'm glad I ended up wearing it and got tons of compliments through the night.

Luxurious fabric and print puts this dress at center stage and makes the wearer feel fabulous. I wore it for a Polynesian themed date night with my husband and it was a hit! The chest and back are both low cut so be prepared to go boldly braless.

Beautiful dress and print -but it smushed the girls to the point of being uncomfortable- will order again when I shed a few pounds. Upsetting because I rented to wear in Miami- not sure where else I could get away with it...
Great dress for our vacation to Hawaii. Ran slight large in the chest for me, but nothing some fashion tape won't fix. Length was great (I am 5'10") and overall fit was TTS. Loved this rental!

The size I wore is one down from what I normally fit into, I think because it's so flowy it was easy to fit into. It has adjustable straps which helped to make it feel more customized. At 5"3' i wore flat sandals with it and there wasn't too much of the dress dragging on the floor. Gave it four stars because I didn't love the fit in my chest area but it wasn't an awful fit, just not suuuuper comfortable. Color and design was gorgeous in person.

links_reviews_title: Fit well, able to adjust the straps. A lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Color was more pink, which I liked. Didn't love the dress on me, but fit well.
Wore this dress on vacation in Mexico. I wish the bust for a little better- I could not wear a bra and usually don't go bra less - I did feel elegant and beautiful though

Wore this on Anniversary trip to Mexico for dinner. The fit was a little weird but I made it work and my husband loved it. The tie falls below the waist so doesn't really accentuate the waist. The chest was TIGHT on my 36D and I could not bend over or my whole boob would pop out! But the night slot makes it float and sexy. A little shinier fabric than I'd normally like but was fine for vacation.

Loooove this dress. Wore it for a destination wedding in Mexico and got a ton of compliments -- super comfy fabric and the perfect cut for hot weather. I would definitely rent this again! Felt like just the right amount of sexy for a wedding and bonus, adjustable straps so you can make it just right for your top half.

This dress fit me so much better than I expected. I was desperate to grab a dress for a resort vacation and this was the last thing I thought would work. However, the fabric draped beautifully and made the dress super flattering. I got numerous comments all night and it was incredibly comfortable. I have a small chest and don't know that I would recommend it for people with bigger chests since it was tight enough that I couldn't wear a bra underneath it. However, you definitely couldn't tell and it made the dress look better.

links_reviews_title: didn't wear the dress because the best is made for flat chested women.
links_reviews_text: The triangle parts of the top are very small. didn't cover me at all. not sure a 6 would have been any better otherwise I loved the dress.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a beach luau party. Stunner!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a summer beach party and this was perfect. I read the complaints about the fit in the chest area and I found that using / inserting pads worked perfectly in solving and giving form. Also lightweight and comfortable for long evening on the beach.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up using this for the event.
links_reviews_text: The material was heavier than I expected and the side tie was a little strange. I'm not saying it's a bad dress, just not really the look I was going for once I got it on.
Didn't love the print, not the fall of the split. The tie made the waist sit funny, but fun for a night out, not spectacular.
Flattering and can adjust with side tie. Color is gorgeous and great for date night.
hung oddly in the bust
Wasn't able to wear this beauty. It was a bit too long and surprisingly the fabric was on the heavier side. Quality was amazing. Larger busted women may want to go up a size

links_reviews_title: Such a simple, beautiful dress. No bra required, felt so elegant. No stretch in the rib cage
links_reviews_text: All I needed was a little double sided tape to make sure the girls stayed put and I was ready to go. No bra required and for vacation that is the best! I dressed down with some sandals and up with some heels. Loved this dress and would have bought if I could afford. Will absolutely rent again. I was being stopped in Hawaii and told how nice the dress was.

links_reviews_title: Dress was cute but didn't get worn
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a friend for a gala she hosts every year. It is a hot pink color in person. I thought it looked great on her, but she felt it showed too much cleavage and chose to wear a different option.
The material is thick. I didn't wear it because it was too low-cut for the event And it was too tight in the chest. I would order a 10 and wear it knowing now what event it would look best with
This was adorable. I wore for casual engagement pictures. It did stretch out a tad by end of session. Maybe size down.

links_reviews_title: Wish it fit a smidge better
links_reviews_text: Unique style, very interesting, and got lots of compliments, but had to constantly pull up shoulders and pull the front up to keep the girls from making an appearance, yet I still wore it 3 times because it's so cute!
The fit was tremendous. I run a size 6/8 (usually 8) and this was great on me. I like the structure of it and it hugs in all the right areas. It's flannel material so be warned it's a bit cotton-y.
Revived lots of compliments on this top! Would rent again! Adjustable straps and fun peplum style!

I wore this top to a concert with leggings and to a baby shower with navy pants. Got compliments both times. It is a nice structured top and fits well. I wore my normal size and it did show a bit of cleavage but not too bad. Only complaint was that it had a small stain but it wasn't noticeable on due to the pattern.

This is a cute top and thankfully showed up wrinkle-free for me. I liked it on, it fit well and was flattering, but it felt a little young for me, and also didn't seem appropriate for Fall despite it being 90 degrees here still. I sent it back without wearing it but may try again in the Spring/Summer if I'm still with RTR.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable off white top w/ pink (not red) and blue pattern
links_reviews_text: When I receive this top it looked better paired with dark denim than white jeans because the white teens made the top look dingy. The chest area run little big for me, so wore a padded bra and the straps are adjustable so that helps. The back has elastic even though there is a zipper so that gives you some room if you're between sizes. Was comfortable. Pink in pattern, not red.
I love Parker! Wore this to a brunch. The strap would fall down from time to time but other than that, it was great. Nice fit. Didn't need to wear a bra with it.
#DinnerDate
I like the ruffle sleeve and thick fabric. I'm usually an XS in tops but the S fit perfectly. This is a peplum top.

I wore this top to an outdoor music festival with my girlfriends. I paired it with denim shorts and sandals, and I received lots of compliments! It got my 34B chest perfectly, but would work for girls of many sizes thanks to the elastic in the back. I love the way the top was looser...kind of a peplum...around the waist. Will definitely rent this again sometime!
Loved this top paired with shorts. Strap has a tendency to slip at times but they are adjustable. Wore this top several times.
Loved this for July 4th

Flattering peplum with a little flair. Very hard to zip, had to put it on backwards, zip, and spin it around! Came pretty wrinkled and was a bit hard to steam but made it work. Comfortable and fits true to size. I wore a bandeau bra underneath as it was a little low cut for my taste.

Perfect summer shirt to wear casually, I wore it to a bbq. It does run a little large, very big in the bust area and straps fell down even though I adjusted them to the smallest size. I wore a medium but the small would have fit better.
Fit well. Was fun and comfortable

links_reviews_title: Perfect for hanging out with friends or if you want to do a video or just be casual but look nice.
links_reviews_text: no cons.
Really liked this top. Can be dressed up or dressed down. I wore it with a pair of white skinny jeans and flats. The top is pretty low cut, so be aware of that. I would rent again!

Love this top. Very comfortable, very flattering. Hits in all the right places! Don't need a bra to wear it, and the 'stretch' in the back was key - especially since I'm small framed but large chested. Highly recommend!!!
Cute top. You can dress it up with pants or wear with shorts. Nice fit.
And I'm so sad I didn't take a photo in it while renting it for vacation. This is a summer dream for any other girls who love Peplum!!!
Love this top - perfect for when you're feeling bloated as it hides everything, super cute pattern, great fit, very flattering.
adorable
Very cute and flattering!
Super cute top! It is short (at least for me at 5'9") so high waisted pants would be a must- unless you want your waist showing. The style and pattern was great though.
I went from a 34B to a 34DD during my pregnancy, so I thought I'd order the medium to accommodate my busy size. The M was too big. I never got to wear this top.
A little busty but quite cute.

links_reviews_title: Fun and flattering top for an hourglass.
links_reviews_text: True to size

links_reviews_title: Super cute for summer night out
links_reviews_text: Super cute top for a girls night out- wore with white jeans.
Was entirely too low cut for me. otherwise a great fit.
Fit well besides the straps being a tad loose on one side. Overall a very comfortable and cute top!
Loved this top! The zipper can be can be a bit tricky but overall a great fit and just a cute and cool top!
The top fits well and true to size. It's to hot I was hoping to wear it with shorts, but the length made it so that it looked better with jeans.
unfortunately, the straps are only somewhat adjustable, and since i'm short in the sternum, this was pretty low cut for me.
Cute shirt for a day at the park
Large, but comfortable. Pretty casual. Won't rent again but it was fun for a day.
Very cute, but a bit large on me. Typically wear a size 4 / S or XS
Cute but super tiny, I probably could force it but wouldn't be comfortable for an event. And the material seems to get wrinkled easy so I didn't bother ordering a larger size. Cute pattern otherwise.

This dress was lovely but unfortunately it runs really big. I wore it for my bachelorette and it was comfortable but I felt as if it didn't really do much for me and my figure. I went with a size 2 because I read reviews saying to size up and I wish I hadn't :(

I followed the reviews and ordered a size 6 and it fit perfectly. I'm usually between a size 2 and 4. The hem is too long but I just used double stick tape to fix it. RTR should really fix the hen professionally though. I really loved this dress. I wore it twice on vacation. It was great to dance in. It was t too hot. Not too short. Not too sexy but not too sweet. Very flattering and very comfortable. I'd definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a beachy night out, great quality fabric
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! I am a 6/8 and wore the 8, I have a small waist (28 Inches) and wide hips (42 inches) and it fit perfectly although there wasn't much stretch. Other reviews mentioned it being tight up top and it fit me but with no room to spare. It was a bit short, I don't think I would have worn it in another scenario that with cute sandals at the beach. Perfect for my bachelorette!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my bridal shower.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my bridal shower. It is super flattering on most body types but it runs extremely small. I recommend getting two sizes up since the material has zero stretch. LOVED it though and would rent again.

Overall I'm pretty straight in the waist and hips, but this gave me more of an hourglass figure. Definitely not made for women vlwith bigger busts, I'm only a 32c and I had to go up a size from my normal because it is tight on top. Plenty of room in the hips. Outer layer was a bit shorter than than the liner, looks like it shrunk from washing but it wasnt too bad. Not sure it's worth the $65 vs some others, but overall I'd rent it again.

The dress runs very small so size up- I am normally a 6 and the 10 fit perfectly. The dress is beautiful and comfortable and looks ok with flat sandals if you are like me and can't walk in heels! I am a 34DD and was comfortable bra less, which is rare. My only con is was it was a bit wrinkled and i don't think it could be ironed- if I had a steamer it would have been perfect!

links_reviews_title: it was a fun, flattering dress that had me feeling great for my bridal shower
links_reviews_text: It was a great fit, and very flattering halter-like cut that showed off my shoulders. The way the waist-line cut in nicely showed off my curves, and I appreciated that although it was a short dress, it didn't make me feel like I was showing off too much in my 5'7" frame.

links_reviews_title: The weather was a perfect October evening at the Le Diner En Blanc. True white.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable. Not too short.

links_reviews_title: Tight is the chest, but runs truer to size on the bottom
links_reviews_text: I am always a 4 in dresses, but after the reviews I rented a 6 and an 8. The 6 flattened my cest, so I went with the 8, even though it was a bit big on the bottom

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my rehearsal dinner - it was perfect! I got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: The dress definitely runs small! I usually wear a 00 in dresses, and wore a size 2 in this dress and it was still pretty snug -- so this dress is great for petite girls! I could not even zipper the 0, so I am glad that I got a backup size. Hope the pictures help!

While this dress runs very small, if you size up twice, you'll have one of the best rentals ever! The detail and design is absolutely beautiful. While it was clear that this dress has been worn and treated many times, it didn't matter because it's still so damn gorgeous!

links_reviews_title: Very pretty but runs really small
links_reviews_text: I am usually a 4 in dresses and I have to wear an 8 even though it was a bit big on the skirt part because the 6 was really really tight on my chest. This dress is really pretty and I was able to wear a strapless bra with it.

This dress I had reserved for a wedding, but was told it wasn't available. I picked another dress. To my surprise, it accompanied the new choice and was actually shipped! I ended up wearing to another function I had the same weekend, and it was P-E-R-F-E-C-T!!! RTR stylist are so amazing and professional Plus!!!

Never have I ever worn an 8 until I wore this dress. Rented for my stock the bar party and got tons of compliments! Didn't need a bra and it's very comfortable. I almost didn't rent this dress because they didn't have "my size." I'm usually a 2 or 4. But then I read all the reviews about ordering at least one size up and ordered a 6 and an 8 because that's all they left. Glad I got the 8! Make sure you give yourself enough time to iron in as it does wrinkle easily and it'll be wrinkled in the bag. First time doing RTR, will definitely do it again.
I wore this to my bachelorette and it was perfect. It's bright white so really stands out. Short but not too short on me (I'm 5 9). I am a 2-4 and wore a 6 in this so order up! No bra needed!
this dress was so comfortable I wore it twice on vacation! very slimming. good thick quality material.

links_reviews_title: White party dress but I can't zip it all the way up in back. Looks beautiful from the front though
links_reviews_text: White party dress but I can't zip it all the way up in back. Looks beautiful from the front though. I would recommend a size up.

I rented this dress for my bachelorette party in Nashville and it was perfect! I didn't want anything too revealing since I didn't feel like it fit the city and I'm so glad I went with this! It fit perfectly and I got a lot of compliments on it.

I rented this dress last minute for my Bridal Shower when a dress I bought fell through. I'm typically an 8 or 6, but the 10 was the only size available. Since it is woven non-stretch material, I would order true to size and then size up for backup. The dress was perfect for my shower, and I received so many compliments! It was also 90 degrees out and I still felt comfortable. If you want to stand out in white yet still feel appropriate, definitely order this dress!

links_reviews_title: Cute unique dress, plenty of compliments but not my best RTR experience.
links_reviews_text: I would not recommend this for anyone with booty. It was tight in the bum and loose in the top and ran small overall. Could be because it's 100% cotton and has had some shrinkage that wasn't factored in by the designer. Also, because of the fabric it really needed a good ironing before I could wear it.

The dress runs very small! I normally wear a size 2, but I could barely fit in the size 4. If you have any boobs and hips, I suggest going up 2 sizes. Other than the dress running small I loved it!! I received many compliments on this dress. I wore it to one of my wedding showers! I would rent this dress again! :)
Ran small run! Order 2 or 3 sizes up!

The photos on here don't do this dress justice - the only reason I rented it is because I saw it in Cusp and it is stunning in person. It ran very small, so I would suggest sizing up. The fabric is really thick so don't rent it for a hot day. And it's either no bra or sticky bra.
Loved it. Flattering dress. No need for a bra and material is thick enough that it isn't a problem.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely love! Would rent again! Or even buy it!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely love this dress! I would rent it again in a heartbeat or even buy it! It does run small so order a size up. I wear an 8 in dresses and I ordered a 10 and it fit perfectly!

This was not the dress I ordered but it was a perfect substitute! I wore this dress for the Kentucky Oakes. The dress fabric has a beautiful flower detail. I usually wear an 8, this dress was a 10 and fit perfect!

links_reviews_title: Busy runs small but otherwise cute and casual
links_reviews_text: The top part is definitely cut for average to smaller busts. I actually wasn't able to zip up past mid ribs so had to wear a denim jacket but it worked with the look. Sweet and cheerful white flower print. Good for day time or a more causal evening party, could see on a bride at a shower for sure!

Conservative length but still a touch of sexy with the see through front portion. Great for day to night. Runs SMALL. I agree with other reviews and suggest ordering one to two sizes up. No give in hips. I'm hourglass and had an inch or two extra which let the dress lay lovely. I can easily wear a four in most designers, sometimes a six. This was DEF an 8.

links_reviews_title: Runs very small. Size up a size or two! Super cute!!
links_reviews_text: Such a fun dress for summer! Unique design and very eye-catching. Runs very small, so size up. Even the size 6 was tight on my 34D bust. But worked out okay. Received lots of compliments!
Loved this dress. Great halter style, double thickness so no bra needed. Perfect for any summer event you might have. Could dress up or down.
Wore this in Palm Beach - beautiful details and unique cut. Pictures don't do it justice. Many compliments. I'm usually between a 2 and 4 and the 4 fit well. A little tight in the bust.

links_reviews_title: Such a cute dress but runs small!
links_reviews_text: This dress was really great, the material is thick so flattering, but also a cotton so not stifling or hot. It is definitely tight in the bust and runs small so per the reviews I ordered a size up. I was almost afraid it wouldn't zip but did in the end, however that explains how small it runs! The length is good for work, however the cutout detailing may have been better suited for a social outing. Overall great flattering dress though!

This dress was adorable. Received a lot of compliments! It does run fairly small and I would definitely recommend ordering a size up. The top was very flattering and got more and more comfortable as the day went on. One of my favorite rentals so far!

This was perfect for the Kentucky Derby. Work appropriate but stylish and a little edgy. It runs a little small if you have developed shoulders and any sort of bust. I usually am a size 4. That wasn't happening in this dress.

links_reviews_title: Classic while still feeling current. This dress is flattering and incredibly well made.
links_reviews_text: This dress definitely runs small. I normally wear a 0/2 and this dress was snug. Like I wouldn't have been able to zip with one more piece of pasta. Gorgeous dress however. Just be aware that it does run small. The fabric doesn't have any stretch to it but I wore it all day and was comfortable.

I am obsessed with this dress!! BUT it is really difficult to find the right size/fit. The fabric is a gorgeous stark white with amazing details. However, the dress is pretty thick and has no stretch whatsoever. I'm usually between a 0 and a 2 and neither would zip up. It was tiny in the hips as well as in the bust (and I'm small on top!). I was determined to fit into this beauty so I ordered a 4. Unfortunately, the 4 was slightly large and gaped in the back. Now I need to lose a few lbs so I can squeeze into the 2...
I really loved this dress but was unable to wear it the first time I rented. It runs EXTREMELY small. Order a size or 2 up. Once I had the right size I had a ton of complements at my bridal shower

This dress runs ridiculously small. I am usually a 0/2, so I ordered this dress in a 4 after reading other reviews. I was barely able to zip it up and legit could not breathe in this dress. I was super bummed, as I was so excited to wear this one! I may try again with the size 6, but there are other dresses that might be better options AND that run more true to size.
Tiny did not wear

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress | The lining will show
links_reviews_text: I received many compliments on the dress color, and cut. The slit on the leg was a lot of fun for pictures and dancing. I didn't like how you could see where the slip ended and it was hard to find a bra that wouldn't show lines either in the front or back. I was worries that the dress may be too long but it was perfect length to wear with a cute pair of wedges.

I wore this to a rooftop bar for some day drinking and I loved it!! It was flattering and it hugged in all the right places. You can dress it up or down which is my favorite part of this dress. I am still considering buying it to just own because it was just a comfortable dress. I wore it in the middle of the summer and it showed no sweat and was still cooling!!

I liked this but didn't love it. PROS: The color is pretty, the material is nice and soft, and the neckline and slit add some date night flair without being too revealing. CONS: The material shows everything (so you need to wear very bare undergarments), and it's very long (I'm 5'4" and there's no way I would have been able to wear this dress without 4" heels). I wouldn't caution against renting, but I personally won't rent again - I think this is best for a taller gal.
Rented this for a rehersal dinner for a wedding I was in. A little too low cute for my lack of chest but super cute dress and recieved serval compliments on. Material was stretchy and soft.

links_reviews_title: Dusty pink maxi with sexy slit!
links_reviews_text: I would've felt more comfortable in a small vs XS but this was just for a photoshoot. Super cute and perfect for a wedding or date night.

links_reviews_title: Would have preferred the long to wear with heels, but it was unavailable
links_reviews_text: Flattering but also that type of material that shows all lines if that makes any sense. Super comfortable. A fair amount of cleavage for bigger busts. Seems pretty casual, I expected something a little nicer just since it's RTR.

links_reviews_title: Blush wrap with a lot of leg
links_reviews_text: The way this dress falls made me look like a goddess. The cleavage button maintains some modesty. When you sit down or the wind blows expect to show off leg.

I loved the way this dress looked on. It's very flattering and works on a fuller figure, and I love the color. The main problem with it was there is a short mini skirt length liner under the skirt that was just too tight on me that kept riding up.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous but not for short girls!
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful on and very comfortable, but far too long for my 5'2 frame. Even with 3-4inch heels it was still grazing the floor enough to be a gripping hazard. Didn't end up wearing, but if you're tall enough you definitely should!
So comfortable yet easy to dress up. It's true to size but definitely hugs around curves so be ready for that.
The fabric was heavy
rented this for a sip & see, the skirt has a lining which was great. also there is a button for the wrap which was nice, kept the top from opening
I liked this. I wore once for a date, since I'm 5'3" I had to wear big shoes so short girla are warned. :) lived the button to keep the cheat from flying open. Felt sexy and classy
WAAAAAAY big. It was loose everywhere and felt about 1 size too large.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for day to day on the weekend. Great casual wear!
links_reviews_text: Fits great and it's a beautiful color. The fabric is also lovely and smooth.
I liked the color and fit however the lining underneath is visible, making it not very appealing. I didn't end up wearing it :(
Washed me out and you could faintly see the attached slip underneath -this is for someone with a darker complexion. Nice fabric weight though

links_reviews_title: It was simple but still kinda sexy and complimented my skin tone
links_reviews_text: Was a bit longer than I'd thought it'd be but it was really cute and comfy. The chest button to keep the v from overexposing my chest was a bit loose and seemed kind of useless
Flattering wrap dress that hugged my body in the right areas. Low cut but not too showy. Will definitely order again!

The pictures do not do this dress justice. The fit is impeccable and I felt stunning from the moment I put it on. The length is classic and I was able to wear a strapless bra. It was comfortable to sit in and I could have worn it all night.

links_reviews_title: Runs big, wasn't clean on arrival.
