links_reviews_text: This dress would be beautiful and have five stars, however I gave it four for 3 reasons: first, it smelled like the last wearer went to a crawfish boil and it hadn't gotten cleaned - it smelled terrible and was wrinkled. And second, because the dress didn't lay right, possibly because it hadn't been cleaned. 3. It's ever so slightly worn out, from over use probably. It also runs big - I'm a true 10 and could have worn an 8. I'm disappointed!! I may try to get the size 8 before my event in 5 days.
I am petite and it was a little long on me but was such a beautiful and comfortable fit. Ended up wearing something else but afterwards sort of wished I had worn this instead

links_reviews_title: Great fit and the golfing details to the dress In the front AND back were lovely !
links_reviews_text: I am 5'8 size 8-10 with 38D and this fit perfectly ! Looked very elegant and loved wearing it !

links_reviews_title: It was great having the perfect dress for the event (black-tie optional work gala).
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress. Fits true to size and fit perfectly. Conservative below-the-knee length. Does not have much stretch in the heavier fabric. Would definitely rent again. Received many compliments. Thank you for a wonderful dress.
Runs a bit large so go down a size. The fit is incredible and very figure flattering.

This dress is gorgeous. Elegant, sophisticated, and just a touch of sexy. It was ever so slightly snug in my normal size and a scotch too big in the larger but I figured that was preferable. I wore this for a valentines date and was slightly overdressed but I didn't even care. This dress is amazing!

This gown is gorgeous and the photos really don't do it justice. The material is about heavier than expected and fully lined so it's better for a fall/winter event. There is some lovely stalk G and folded details across the bust and back that adds interest to what is a very simple dress. The cut is flawless and the fit is very true to size. There is plenty of room for a generous sizes bust (I wear 32ddd) but the material has no stretch so do check your measurements. I got a lot of compliments on this one - I highly recommend it!

A sophisticated Narciso Rodriguez look! This style runs true to size and I would recommend sizing up for your backup. I am wearing a size 4 in this picture but I could have worn a size 2 (my true size). It is fitted throughout but there is some stretch in the material so it is a comfortable! Curvier women should consider sizing up for fuller hips or bust. You will have to wear a strapless bra with this style as it is one shoulder. At 5'10" the length hit me at my knees. Pair with black heels and a nice bracelet!

This Narciso Rodriguez dress is so flattering and cut beautifully! I am wearing a size 4 the photo and my usual size is a four. This dress does fit true to size. I do recommend curvier women sizing up for their backup size. The dress was fitted to my midsection, waist and hips. Even though it was fitted I felt very comfortable in the dress. The dress is great for any bust size. I am a 36D and felt very comfortable in it. This dress must be worn with a strapless bra. I am 5’9” and the dress was mid-thigh to knee length on me. This dress if perfect to go from day to night. Pair with black heels and big gold earrings.

links_reviews_title: So much more than a little black dress!
links_reviews_text: This was my backup dress after the one I originally ordered was unavailable and I'm so happy I got to try it! The dress was a bit long on me coming just past my knees but for a formal event, it was perfect. I have a wider back so the top was definitely a bit snug and I needed help to zip it but once I did it was fine. Since the top is a bit snug it forces you to have better posture too so that you don't get the dreaded armpit fat. I wish I owned this dress and I loved it so much!
Stunning dress. I wore it for two nice date night dinners and felt lovely and sophisticated. I think it may accentuate the belly for those that are conscientious of that body part.
The fit was a little large but was perfect as a conservative LBD. Very classy and elegant. Paired with pointy black pumps to add some sexy factor
Great dress - very nicely made. But I'm a 34 B/C and it was too big in for me. And while i understand having the back slit off center was on purpose, its not far enough off. Just looks odd.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress that I will rent for a black tie
links_reviews_text: Absolutely gorgeous dress. I didn't wear it solely because I decided on another less formal dress for my holiday party. I will definitely order this for my next black tie event. Form fitting but true to size.
I didn't wear this because other back ups worked better but it was a stunning dress. Not for younger girls, it's a very mature dress but high quality and well made and flattering.
Pretty Dress and nice fabric. It was somewhat longer on me than the model - more tea length than just below the knee but I am 5'2". Zips up the side which makes it easy in and out.

I rented this for a wedding, and ended up wearing another dress that was more "fun" and fit with the feel of the wedding, otherwise I 100% would have worn this dress. It's simply gorgeous. The material is more textured than it appears in the picture (I thought it would be smoother for some reason) but no matter. Easy on with the side zipper, true to size, and very flattering. It's the perfect chic, classy dress. I will definitely rent again when I have the right event!

links_reviews_title: A Hot mama in this structured dress
links_reviews_text: The construction was absolutely gorgeous and flattering. It nipped my waist in and the one shoulder was nice on my somewhat broader shoulders. It was comfortable to wear with a little give. The length is longer than most dresses but that gave it a little something extra, more slimming and sexy.

links_reviews_title: Great dress - tons of compliments on the open back!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit like a glove, loved the style of it and the leg slit was just enough for a formal event without being over the top. It was really short though, even with my lowest heels (boo) it barelyyyy skimmed the ground and it killed me slightly. The next size up was perfectly long enough but way too big. Wouldn't rent again just due to the length factor but if you're a bit shorter it's perfect!
This dress was a total knockout. It was both classy and sexy and perfect for a winter gala. It was also very comfortable even after a night of eating and drinking :)

links_reviews_title: Dress arrived on time in good condition.
links_reviews_text: Dress was a slightly shorter in length than expected and a little big up top. other than that perfect for the occasion and comfy!

links_reviews_title: Better than any other black dress there!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful classy but still sexy black dress. Perfect for an upscale wedding I attended as a guest. I posted a picture with no heels to show you, this dress is for shorter women like myself. I am 4'10 and it was perfect length. Also I don't think it ruins small. 0R was perfect I didn't even touch the 2. Only one star off because the boning inside dress did dig into my chest a little but it wasn't terrible. Because of the thick material no bra needed! Which is nice with the low back. Loved it

This dress looks better online. The fabric is very thick... Think heavy table cloth. It does not feel like quality material. The straps fall down easily if your shoulders are not back and when you sit down, be mindful of the "shaping" lining to poke you and possibly show some side boob. Although it photographs nicely, I wasn't comfortable in it.

I wore this dress to a military ball and received so many compliments. I usually wear a size 6 and rented a size 6 and 8. I wish I would have gotten a size down instead of going up as the size 6 was a little loose. But with a little double sided dress tape, it was perfect!

links_reviews_title: Nice dress, but a little too much exposure.
links_reviews_text: Pretty dress, but I didn't realize how exposed the sides were. I didn't end up wearing this dress out cause it was too much exposure for the event, but I liked it. The only con was the length, order a long. Otherwise, your feet will be hanging out.

links_reviews_title: worked great even for a rehearsal dinner
links_reviews_text: I am pear shaped and ordered this as my back-up style. I wore it to the rehearsal dinner because it fit pretty well and wore the main style to the wedding. It was a little tight in the hips, but definitely the right size dress for them. It looked very nice and emphasized my rear in a very good way. It was quite large up top because I'm very small chested, but it fit basically fine with a stick on "bra." It should be obvious from the style that you can't wear any kind of real bra with this dress! The back really is quite open. One thing to note is that I don't believe this dress comes in "long" and the regular length was pretty short as you can see in the pictures. I am 5'7" (erring on the side of 5'6"). Even if I had had flats on, the dress would have been off the ground. Don't get this dress if you are my height or taller and care about it being the right length.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! I received so many compliments throughout the event.
links_reviews_text: I wish that it had been available in an 8L. I have long legs and with my heels the dress did not touch the floor. The bust was a little looser than I would have preferred but I may have been the only one who noticed. The dress was classy and the slit and opening on the sides made it perfect. The fabric was thick enough that I did not have to wear a bra.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my work charity gala. Perfect and Elegant.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfect and laid perfectly on me.
I rated it three stars because it seemed pretty worn!! I've rented from RTR a lot and never had anything look worn before

links_reviews_title: Classy dress for a classy affair
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! I wore it to a friend's black tie wedding and received compliments the entire night. I agree with some of the reviewers that the dress was a little short. I'm 5'9 and it fell right to my ankles rather than to the floor, but I didn't mind and it wasn't super noticeable. The 6 fit almost perfectly - straps were slightly loose but the 4 was too small. Overall, awesome dress!
Loved the back of this dress and very flattering overall. Would rent it again for sure!

I selected this dress for a friend's black tie wedding, and I felt amazing in it all day and night! I loved the cutouts as well as the dramatic open back. It's a little restrictive when it comes to moving around, but it was fun and easy to move around in while on a packed dance floor for hours. Would definitely rent again, and wished I owned it!

I received so many compliments on this dress! I was worried that it was too plain, but it was a show stopper! The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it was pretty short, but with some fun shoes it doesn't really matter unless you want to to be floor length!
Beautiful dress just couldn't wear the heels I wanted!

links_reviews_title: An elegant dress that fits well, flows with you, and makes your night so easy.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to take pictures to celebrate our 15th wedding anniversary. his dress is elegant and made very well. It flows with you as you move. I normally wear a size 10 and the size 10 in this dress fit perfectly. I did not wear a bra, cups, or tape. The dress has vertical wiring in the chest to help hold it's shape, and is fully-lined, giving the dress a nice weight and helping you feel covered. The only issue I had was that the straps on the lower back were a bit too big and did not lay flat, which I easily fixed with double-sided dress tape. A wonderful dress to celebrate a wonderful night!

Fit like a glove. I have an athletic build with bigger breasts for my frame this dress was stunning. I wore 2” heals and the hem was perfect. The only negative is that I was really cold, despite the heavier material, but it was an out door wedding.

Overall I really liked the way the dress looked. I did need to use tape for my chest. The structure was not tight enough to not have support. I probably should have sized down. Other than that it was a great dress.

Wore this to a Military Ball and got lots of complements. Being a smaller gal with some hips and booty, but a smaller waste I was a little concerned this dress (size 6) wouldn’t fit. It fit like a glove. The back did gap a little around the straps toward the bottom, maybe because I have a short torso, but did not bother me and couldn’t tell all night long. Highly recommend

links_reviews_title: This dress was lots of fun, didn't need a bra, and was easy to dance in!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'6" and 120 lbs, 34B, usually wear pants 0 or 2, and the 0 fit fine. It was a bit snug across the neck and thighs - a 2 might have worked, but might have been too big. However, this dress is short - showed all of my shoes! I wish I'd packed better ones.

I was really excited about this dress and did a lot of research on others who are similar to my size before choosing to rent this. Unfortunately I didn't love the fit. It gaped quite a bit and I felt like the straps could easily slide off if I didn't keep my shoulders pushed back. If I had bigger boobs or wider shoulders this may have fit better. The photo I took doesn't show just how baggy it seemed, but it shows a little gaping. This dress is also a little short, so it would have been nice to have a LONG instead of the regular.

links_reviews_title: The dress was a show stopper. I got so many compliments and felt great in it.
links_reviews_text: It fit like a glove. I'm only 5'2" and the length was perfect so it may not be great for tall girls. I found it to be comfortable, elegant and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Made me feel sexy and classy!
links_reviews_text: Dress was amazing. Great fit. However, it was a little loose at the top. Not bad, though. Overall, this dress was a great choice.

This dress drew lots of positive attention at a black-and-white awards ceremony. The open back is nice and it fit well. However, the edges of the slit in the dress kind of peeled back rather than staying crisp, if that makes sense. That's my only complaint. Otherwise it's a lovely dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress got me compliments all night, but it was a bit difficult to move in
links_reviews_text: I had to wear the smaller size to keep everything covered, even though it was pretty tight. The wire in the dress poked through and required some quick hacks to survive the night. Because I went with the smaller dress, it was really hard to move around in.

This was hands down my favorite dress I have ever worn! The fit was amazing, the length was perfect and it was just the best dress! I'm 5'0 and I never tripped on the dress throughout the night (I also wore a 5 inch heel with the dress). Received so many compliments! Definitely renting this dress again!

links_reviews_title: A perfect dress for a masquerade ball! Sexy & Elegant.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful-loved it! I'm 5'1, 130lbs, 36C chest and it fit true to size. I ordered the 6R and 8R. The 6R was form fitting-true to size-used fabric tape to keep straps in place. Length was perfect with the 6R-I wore 3 inch heels (gold sparkly strappy heels). The 8R was my backup, it was a little loose, not too bad, but the length was longer than the 6R. I wore "nipple protectors," bra is not needed as the fabric is flattering/thick enough. Perfect dress for short girls! The top can be a bit big depending on your chest size-be cautious with that. I got compliments all night-definitely worth getting for a formal affair! Delivery was on time and the return process is super easy. Coat hangers did arrive broken but the dresses were clean and ready to wear.
I felt the 4 was a little larger and wish I had gotten a size 2. But it was a gorgeous dress!

Classic style with a gorgeous back & silhouette to make it stand out from the other black dresses in the crowd! Sexy without being overly revealing, and material was great for a fall wedding (definitely not too thin!). With the material in mind, I may not recommend this for a hot summer day/night, as it is on the heavier side.

links_reviews_title: Showstopper!!!! I received so many compliments! This dress was sexy and classy, I highly recommend!!
links_reviews_text: I’m 5’5.5, 138 lbs, 36 DD bust, athletic built. True to size, perfect length, high quality material, did not disappoint.

Ordered 2p and 4p. Ended up going with the 4p however the chest was a little big on me. 2P was a little tight on the legs with the thicker fabric. Other then that the dress was very comfortable. I am 5'2 and wore 3 inch heels. Perfect length for me. Multiple complements throughout the night. Easy to dance in. Great for a formal wedding. Thicker fabric great for winter wedding !

I was worried the 8R wouldn't fit, and RTR was unable to send the 10R. This dress fit wonderfully! My only complaint is that it was very short and fell just above my ankle. I am 5'7, perhaps the long would've been better. Overall the dress is super elegant. The material is stretchy and comfortable!

Very elegant. Sexy and classy at the same time. A little snug in the hips on me, but material was a little stretchy, so setting was comfortable. The dress was short, hit me at the ankles. Still looked great paired with some pretty shoes. I would rent this dress again.

This dress was super sexy but very comfortable! I'm pear shaped so a size 4 made the straps more secure but didn't fit the backside... I managed to not have any wardrobe malfunctions with size 6 as it was too tricky to tape/clip. Overall I loved the dress!!
Great fit. Liner was a little misaligned and I had to pin it inside. Recommend

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this sexy dress!
links_reviews_text: I typically wear a size 2 but it was way too tight in the hip area. The 4 was comfortable but may not be the best for girls with hips. I loved it and felt super sexy.
The length and hips were perfect but the top was a little loose. I used double stick tape.

links_reviews_title: The perfect amount of detail and sophistication!
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit. Had just enough stretch to be super comfortable. Great for athletic builds as I have broad shoulders. Only con is the neck can be uncomfortable when sitting.
This dress is absolutely stunning! Fit like a glove, very comfortable. Fabric is thick material, which was very forgiving in midsection and bottom. Loved it!

The material was rich and elegant, I got so many compliments on the evening I wore it. The top was a little snug on the small ( I normally wear 2/4) so had to size up to the medium which the overall fit wasn't as great but was still comfortable. Overall very pleased!

links_reviews_title: Makes the hips look wider than usual
links_reviews_text: Fits well but very hippy and accentuating the wrong part
I ordered a size up based on the reviews. It feels fine when you're standing but as soon as you sit, the boning pinches your torso
The dress was beautiful. Runs a bit small at waist and larger on the bust.

links_reviews_title: Classy with a touch of spice
links_reviews_text: Fit was good and so was the length. I'm short so it was a little longer than floor length with 3" heels and I loved it. I did fold and stitch the flap at the top so it wasn't so long and I liked the way it looked a lot better.
Fits perfectly and great for dancing with the drapes
Loved the top and fit. Slit and ruffles were fun
Perfect fit.

links_reviews_title: This dress is the cute/sexy version of the salsa emoji!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress, it was my backup dress but I ended up wearing it for my event, which was my office holiday party. There was a little extra room in the bust area, but the dress never fell for me, and I didn't wear a bra. I am on the tall side and I needed to wear heels so that it was not dragging on the ground. I would totally rent again!

links_reviews_title: Even being short this dress still looks good!
links_reviews_text: It's romantic, and shows your waistline. I have a small busy so this was flattering and gave me a bit of shape.

links_reviews_title: A little tight when sitting but good for dancing!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for the semi-formal wedding I was invited to. It fits to size while standing but it gets tight without being forgiving when sitting. However, I was able to comfortably enjoy lots of dancing! Be aware, I am 6'2 so it looks a little shorter on me.

I was a bit hesitant about this dress, but ordered anyway for my 2 year anniversary dinner with my boyfriend. I LOVED it, but the Medium was too big on top...and I'm a 30D. I still wore it out for a nice dinner and felt very glamorous and old Hollywood. Wouldn't recommend for a night of dancing.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit well, and I received lots of compliments for the event. I definitely recommend!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect, had some stretch which was nice. The flow of the dress was very pretty to watch. Wouldn’t recommend for a dance party, as the leg movement for the dress was slightly minimal. Beautiful overall!

The dress was fairly comfortable and I loved the style. It did run small however snd I wore the larger backup size. I'm 5'5'' and wore 2 1/2 inch heels and the dress just touched the ground. The color was great for a holiday party!
I ordered the dress in size small and size medium. The size small didn't close all the way, and the medium was too big on top. Very odd. Regardless it was beautiful and I wish I could've worn it

The fit of this dress was perfect, and the fabric and print was beautiful. I rented this dress for a November wedding, at first I was reluctant to wear a strapless dress because I didn't want to be fiddling with it all night but this dress stayed in place without a problem. Would definitely rent again for the holidays!

I loved the material and fun cut of the dress, however, I needed a larger size to be able to sit and dance comfortably at a wedding, even with spanx on. The dress feels really heavy on the hanger but not so much once you're in it.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but runs small beware
links_reviews_text: Runs small through chest and overall I wore the medium but it was very tight and I should have dozed up. It's a pretty dress, gorgeous color.. no need for a bra. Nice and thick material.

links_reviews_title: Fun asymmetrical skirt great for dancing!
links_reviews_text: Great to dance in! Narrow through the rib cage. I am super short waisted so the boning pushed on my sides a bit - something I deal with in most strapless dresses so I was not concerned!

I wore this to a summer wedding with sandals, but it would works great dressed up for a black tie wedding too. The material was thicker and heavier than I anticipated, but otherwise, it was as advertised. Loved the movement of the skirt!

links_reviews_title: I got a lot of compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Make sure you use the flash when taking pictures so the colors truly show! I think this runs small- I usually wear medium but had to size up to the large and it still felt a little tight. It does have the skirt underneath so it was tight around the legs and the rib cage. Didn’t have to wear a bra!!!! And didn’t have to worry about pulling it up all night. Stayed put pretty well. Love the cut of the dress, it was so unique and I was getting a lot of compliments on it. I am 5’7 and wore wedges and the one side was to the floor so beware if you are shorter. I just wore a simple bracelet and bigger earrings.

I really loved the deep red color of this dress. It was super flattering, but definitely runs small. I could get the Medium zipped, but I don't think I would've been comfortable wearing it all night. If you have a more petite build, your regular size would work better. Otherwise, I'd recommend sizing up. I really liked the hemline and the longer side was floor length on me at 5'5".

One of those dresses where i was really apprehensive about renting given the lack of reviews, but it ended up being the perfect back-up! It was ideal for a formal/black tie optional wedding where I wanted to dance a lot. As I'm curvy and 5'3 - this was the idea dress. I will say I didn't love how it photographed - but I dont think I've ever received so many compliments!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a semi-formal to formal event! Beautiful downward flow of the fabric!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a black tie holiday event and received so many compliments. The floral pattern is so subtle, but elegant. The downward flow of the fabric is gorgeous and provides a slim look. The top of the dress is unique as well and really gives you a great shape. This dress makes a statement without amplification.

links_reviews_title: Beware this is a very fitted dress.
links_reviews_text: From the pic online, I thought this was an A-line dress but beware that it is actually a fitted mini dress underneath. I am pulling it open in the picture so you can see. I wear a 6 and could not even zip the small so this is the medium. I would have loved it if the fabric on the bust didn't kind of flap up. I have a small chest so I can't imagine what it would do on a large one. Also, this dress is long so I'm not sure than anyone under 5'5 could wear it without stepping on it and that's with high heels. Would definitely be fun to twirl around on a dance floor in though!

First things first: this dress runs very, very small! I normally wear an XS or S, but I had to go up to a Medium. Despite this, the dress looked fantastic and was a showstopper. I got a ton of compliments on it and the color is stunning. I'm actually wearing flats with this and I'm 5'7"!
I loved everything about this dress EXCEPT the ruffle hit me in such a weird spot it made me look wider in my hips than I am. I think if you have a long torso, this dress would actually look better!!

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear because it was tight and too much fabric
links_reviews_text: Lots of fabric for a short girl

links_reviews_title: This was the perfect dress for a late fall wedding in the woods.
links_reviews_text: After reading the reviews, I chose going up a size in my free extra size dress and I'm glad I did. I'm usually a XS/S, 0-2 and the medium fit me better. I couldn't button the small in the back. I loved this dress tho and got so many compliments on it!

Was a comfortable dress. Never had to worry about the top falling down, which was nice. Had someone tell me, "you look like a movie star." This dress definitely makes an understated fashion statement without making a fuss. Easy to walk and sit in. Fun rental!

I rented this dress for a wedding and it didn't fit. It was about an inch too small in the bust. I'm 5'9, size 12/14, 34 C bust. I didn't have time to hunt for another dress or fiddle with returning the garment for another selection prior to the event, so I borrowed a formal dress from a friend for the evening.

I stepped out of the box when I chose this style, but I really loved it! It fit like a glove - figuratively and literally. It does not have a great deal of "give" but it was still comfortable. The top half is definitely flattering to bottom half curves. I wore this for a ladies cocktail night and it was perfect.
I wore this to a gala and felt super glamorous. It was definitely different from the other dresses I saw.

links_reviews_title: Unable to get either of the L or XL zipped up. Disappointed but happy RTR was willing to swap!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'4" and 175 lbs so I am far from petite but I assumed that the XL would be plenty big enough, right? Unfortunately not. I couldn't even get the zipper half way up. It's a darker red in person too. Not as vibrant as in the photo. It has a very fitted liner that does not allow for any movement. No stretch. Definitely size up almost 2 sizes if you can!

links_reviews_title: The dress fit perfectly and was a hit at the party!
links_reviews_text: No cons here! I am 5'4, 124 pounds, 34 B and the XS fit like a glove. I did not have to worry about pulling the strapless top up and I was more than comfortable the whole night.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a December wedding! It was warm, and was perfect for the Christmasy event!
links_reviews_text: The top fell down some, but that was probably because I have a smaller chest. I got so many compliments!!!

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear! Sizing is very strange.
links_reviews_text: I was super disappointed in this dress. It was my first choice so I got a size SR and MR. I'm 5'3" and usually a size 2 or 4 in formal wear. I definitely consider myself an athletic built because I have curves BUT I usually never have a problem with smalls fitting me and this dress is definitely NOT made for women with curves. The small fit quite snug on my ribs and bust (I'm a 34B and tried to wear without a bra) and it fit my hips but it looked like it was pulling the fabric so I went up to a medium which was manageable at the bust but then to loose in the hips and the ruffle train was way to long even in 4 inch heels. Overall I think this dress is meant for very long and lean ladies! Hope that helps!
Very heavy dress. I'm typically a size small, 2-4, but I couldn't even zip this dress up. There's no stretch which I needed for my muscular thighs. If you rent this, order a size up.

links_reviews_title: Runs VERY small- no stretch at all
links_reviews_text: I was so bummed about this dress. I have had great experiences with RTR but this was the first dress I ordered that came in small, medium, large and not actual dress sizes. RTR showed this dress matched my size (between 12-14) but it was not even close to fitting. Could not wear to my event. Be prepared for no stretch in the fabric and a dress that runs small.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it too small in the chest
links_reviews_text: this dress fit everywhere but wouldn't zip at chest area
This is a cute top, great for parties and other festive events! You can dress it down with jeans or dress it up with black pants. True to size.

Fun top for my friend's 21st birthday! Fits true to size with no fit issues - top is elastic so adjustable for different sizes! Only warning is that there is not a good lining so it was kind of itchy, but that's expected with sequin tops

links_reviews_title: Perfect top for a night out during the holidays!
links_reviews_text: The top fit comfortably and had a lot of give in the mid-section. I could’ve probably worn a size smaller. As someone who is 4’11 I always worry that tops will be too long, but this one was just the right length. I sequins definitely makes you stand out, but not too much. It was the perfect top for a date night during the holidays.

links_reviews_title: Cute top for a Vegas concert
links_reviews_text: Great top. A little itchy but still comfy . Run maybe a little big. I had a plenty of room in this top. Paired with some faux leather pants for the George Strait to Vegas concert.

I LOVED the idea of this top. I paired it with a black lace pencil skirt and a leather jacket for a wedding. It looked great on, super classy. BUT it was SO itchy under the arms. I lasted through the ceremony (in agony) and then had to go change. It wasn't as bad without a jacket over it, but I live in the midwest, so a jacket was necessary in January.
Worked perfectly for a new years eve top! Got a lot of compliments! Wish i coukd keep it!
Wore this for a show and it was the perfect amount of sparkle. Very scratchy but a good fit.
This is a perfect party top! I wore with black denim, heels and big earrings. Compliments all night.
Ordered this for NYE but didn't wear it because the sequins were really uncomfortable. It was also too short.

links_reviews_title: Adds the perfect touch to any outfit. You can dress it up or down.
links_reviews_text: Sparkles makes an outfit oh so much better.

links_reviews_title: Received a ton of compliments on this top. Loved the sparkles!
links_reviews_text: This top fit large, loose at the bottom. The fabric was tad itchy, but since it was not form fitting it was bearable. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: This top is very sparkly but really doesn't fit well, so it's not very flattering.
links_reviews_text: This top runs extremely large - a small could probably fit someone who wears a size 14. Also, the sequins are incredibly itchy, so you have to wear some kind of tube top or something underneath to make it bearable.

links_reviews_title: This arrived too late for the event so I didnt have a chance to wear it out
links_reviews_text: A bit heavy and thick.
So itchy - made it unwearable.

links_reviews_title: I was unable to wear the top for the event as the top did not fit properly
links_reviews_text: A bit small
I got this for New Years but then decided to do something more low key. Would rent again.
Didn't end up wearing because it was so itchy.
Cute top... Better for warmer weather.

This was a fun top. It runs a big big, so I wore the smaller size, but it fit comfortably (not tight, but not too loose). The sequins are a bit scratchy but not so much that it bothered me throughout the night.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable- didnt need a bra
links_reviews_text: Love it. Got so many compliments!

A party top by BB Dakota! Running true to size, I would recommend sizing up for the backup. Since this is not a fitted top, there is a comfortable amount of room in the bust which makes this great for any cup size. Due to the one shoulder, I would suggest wearing a strapless bra with this top. The sequins make this top stand out! There is comfortable room at the midsection and hip areas due to the straight cut. Absolutely perfect for a party or a night out!

links_reviews_title: Love the sparkly shirt which was supper fun for my New's Year Eve Dinner Party!
links_reviews_text: The shirt is really cute on and fits great. I was able to go without a bra, which was awesome. The only thing I didn't like was the sequins were a bit scratchy, which drove me completely nuts. If it wasn't for that, I would completely recommend this shirt for a fun date night or New Years Eve Dinner Party.

I love this dress! I received compliments all night long! It was comfortable and gorgeous. I love the gold detailing. Looked great with gold heels. Only downside is it tended to ride up so I kept having to pull it down, but I loved it! I normally wear a 6/8 and I ordered the 10. It fit great!

The fit was a little tight but it fit me well and was flattering for my body type. It rode up a little bit when I would walk, so I was pulling it down throughout the night but that was just a minor inconvenience. I would absolutely recommend this dress. It's truly gorgeous!

links_reviews_title: Beautifully made but runs very small!
links_reviews_text: I am short and in most dresses I am a 0-2 depending on fit. After reviews I ordered this in a 4 and holy moly I could have gone up another size but it would have likely been big in certain areas. The neck was a loose on me, the chest a little tight, the waist a little loose, but the hips and bum were very tight and the overall length was SO SHORT. It was a very bodycon/clubbing vibe. It was fine- the dress was beautiful and matched my mask perfectly but I would size up if renting again.
This was my 1st rental. The dress fit perfectly and I felt amazing! The only con was it would ride up as I danced. I would recommend wearing opaque tights if you are worried about the shorter length.

I am a true 00 which isn't available for rent on RTR. So when I say it fits so well, it fits well on me. Which means it runs a size small. So size up if you are true to size. I love the fit on me and I was so tempted to buy it. It's definitely on my re-rent list. It looked beautiful and the gold metallic embroidery was so pretty. I got so many compliments!

I absolutely loved this dress! The hemline on the sleeves is super beautiful. It's long enough to wear to a wedding. I'm sort of between sizes but I don't like anything fitted so I wore the bigger size for a little extra breathing room. I would absolutely recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Bachelorette party! So comfortable and sexy!
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing. Regular strapless bra will work. Super classic black lace with gold metallic overlay. Long sleeves but not too tight. High neck is so flattering. A little short but that's ok. Highly recommend. !!

This dress was perfect for the wedding I went to. It was sophisticated with the high neck and sleeves but was so fun with the sparkles and length. I got a TON of compliments. It's a little short but it was worth it.

I love this elegant dress by Rachel Zoe! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back-up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and hips - curvier women should consider sizing up for fuller hips. It works for all cup sizes and can be worn with a standard bra. At 4’8”, the length hit mid thigh on me and was not too short. The sleeves were a little long, but after folding them in the dress was fit perfect. The gold embroidered details really make this dress stand out. Pair with black heels to complete your look.

links_reviews_title: It was so convenient to have the dress shipped and ready to go!
links_reviews_text: Loved the way this dress fit! Very sexy!

links_reviews_title: Being able to have the perfect outfit!
links_reviews_text: I always tend to be between sizes 10 and 12 and glad I had the free backup size and the 10 was too tight. The 12 fit perfect! I am on the "taller" side so it did seem too short for my work's holiday function, but paired it with black tights and no longer had any concerns. I loved the fit, the mock neck, and the golden fabric (pic quality is bad and doesn't do it justice) I very happy with this rental!

I love this trendy dress by Rachel Zoe! Running true to size with a little stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works for A to C cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this style. I would definitely consider this style a mini dress. The dress is amazing in person. Pair with nude heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!
The fit was perfect for me. I'm super petite, so it wasn't too short or overly matronly. The sleeves were a good length and the neckline was just fitted enough, but not constricting.

I loved this dress! I wore it for NYE on the Queen Mary and it was the perfect mix of comfort and style. You'd think the lace would be scratchy but it's actually super comfortable. I'm a pear, so I got this in an 8 and a 10. I can usually pull off a 6 if it's loose on the bottom, but this is form fitting so I did an 8 and it fit like a glove. I highly recommend this dress!

This dress was super comfortable. When i first tried it on it felt short, but with tights it wasn't as short as it appeared. The fabric can easily catch on things- but wasn't an issue throughout the night. super comfortable!

This was my first Rent the Runway rental. I was nervous but I am so glad I did it. This dress fit very well. I am 5’10 and weigh about 148lbs. I was a bit nervous with lace on the top due possible lack of stretch. I do a lot to weight lifting so I have a little bit of a built upper body. It just worked! It was a hit. I had lots of compliments. Highly suggest!
Had some stretch and not scratchy anywhere. Collar had room to breathe too.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a Christmas Party and received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'2" and 148 lbs and wore the 12 ( so I could have room to dance) It was perfect!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, unique dress that was perfect for company holiday party.
links_reviews_text: This dress was pretty snug in the chest and shoulders for me (but have fairly muscular arms), so I did use the larger backup size. Besides that, it was great. I got lots of compliments. The long sleeves were perfect for a winter party. Definitely recommend.
Fits tight in the stomach so if you have a little bit of a belly you'll have to suck it in or get something underneath. Nice for holiday party

Absolutely loved wearing this to my husband's holiday party. Has a good amount of give so dancing was fun and easy. There's not a lot of structure in the skirt, so if you are concerned about a tummy pooch like me than I recommend tights or spanx to hold it all together. Highly recommend for a fun night out.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear, not appropriate for occasion!
links_reviews_text: This is a great dress for CLUBBING or looking really sexy. I felt extremely uncomfortable with the length and fitted nature of it. It's very stretchy. Feels a little cheap. It's a lovely dress, but not for an office function! Way too racy!

The fabric is absolutely stunning. It is an intricate, shimmering gold/black pattern that I loved as soon as I pulled it our of the bag. The top fit perfectly (gorgeous cut); however, the skirt is really short. If you have the legs to rock it, then the dress is awesome. My legs are athletic and felt like I needed to frequently pull it down to keep from exposing myself.

links_reviews_title: Cute but didn't end up wearing it
links_reviews_text: Really liked this dress but ended up going with a less formal option for a Sunday wedding. Would definitely recommend

This was the perfect LBD with a twist! I received so many compliments and on top of it looking amazing, it was very comfortable! I was able to wear a strapless bra without a problem. The photo on model makes it seem as though the dress get loser around the hips, but that was not the case for me. It was more fitted than I had expected, but still loved it. I paired the dress with RTR's White Pearl Earrings by Kennith Jay Lane and they really pulled the look together!
Wore this fancy frock to a concert and dinner out. I'm a 2/4 and was glad I went with the 4. I felt comfy all night with a tiny bit of scratchy neck from the collar. Not a big issue.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous and comfortable dress! Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a 2 but this ran a little small so the 4 was a better fit! The lace is gorgeous and great quality of dress. Would definitely recommend and wear again!

I've never ordered or tried on any RTR dress so I decided to go to the RTR Topanga location to see how they fit. I'm normally iffy about ordering dresses - especially fancy dresses online because they never fit my body shape well. I'm 5'4'', 112 lbs, and smaller on the bust/waist side so my problem area with picking a dress is always the chest area - sometimes its too big, doesn't look good even with a strapless bra, etc. So I needed a dress that wouldn't give me any problems of being too loose or weird fitting in the chest area. This dress was amazing and fit surprisingly well for a 0. I'm normally a 2 but they didn't have so I decided with the 0 and I'm glad I did because any bigger would be too loose. The material felt nice and not too heavy. There's an inside black satin slit that helped space the outside material from my skin so it ended being super comfy. The theme for the event was "internet glam" so the gold really helped make thing pop! Aside from the dress, the service at the store was amazing! Everyone was extremely helpful in assisting and recommending accessories. The return process was effortless and extremely efficient! My whole experience was so stress-free and I had an amazing night looking and feeling incredibly glamorous! Thank you!
This dress was stunning.

The dress fits a little snug through the shoulders if you have broad shoulders. I ended up wearing a size 12. I am 5'8, 160 lbs. Typically wear a size 10 but I also have broad shoulders and wear a 38 C bra.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear both size were far to small M
links_reviews_text: Dress ran very small. Did not wear either size. I'm a usually a 10 . Ordered up and that did not fit my either. Material felt scratchy too. I'm 5'6 170 36DD

Received the dress in a 4 and 6 about 4 days earlier then they said I would get it. That was great so I had time to make sure I had shoes , purse and accessories to go with it! The 4 fit well but was a little snug. The 6 was a little big so I went with 4. Happily there is a little stretch in the dress so it loosen up a bit as I wore it. The sleeves were snug and had to be coaxed on like a wetsuit. Received several compliments on the dress. It ended up being comfortable and easy to wear!
This dress is beautiful in person! It was a little too short for the event I rented for so I didn't wear it but I loved it

links_reviews_title: I felt incredibly beautiful wearing this dress for Thanksgiving.
links_reviews_text: Pros - So comfortable, keeps you warm in slightly chilly areas, perfect length for me Cons - None?

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this dress to the event, it didn't fit.
links_reviews_text: The dress itself is beautiful and I loved the detailed gold pattern. It allowed a little skin to show through without being too revealing (for a formal work event). However, this dress fit me VERY tight, it was not comfortable and it had no give. I ordered the 12, because I wanted there to be a little breathing room - yet there was none. It fit like a second skin and is not for women that have large shoulders and and chest. I'm 36DD and there was NO room for breasts. Also, I am more apple shaped and have a slight belly pudge - this dress will not forgive that. I am 5'6, 150 lbs, 36DD...I normally wear a dress size 10.
too snug for me!
Lots Compliments!

links_reviews_title: Not wedding appropriate, at least for my shape.
links_reviews_text: This was a gorgeous dress. Loved the detail. Fortunately I have curves, unfortunately because of my curvy hips, this dress ended up being a tad short to wear to the wedding. Fit more like a bodycon dress (without stretch). The dress was stunning though!

links_reviews_title: i couldnt wear it very disappointed
links_reviews_text: runs very very small

links_reviews_title: It was made for someone with a Smaller bust line.
links_reviews_text: The shoulders were tight for me and the armpits were scratchy. I wasn't impressed with this dress.

I ended up wearing it even though it was way too small- the center wrap button was so tight, I just wore it over a tank and didn't use the button. I wore a jacket over it most the day. The print and style was cute though so would rent again in larger size obviously

links_reviews_title: Large in chest, small in shoulders.
links_reviews_text: Rented for work, could wear with under shirt.

links_reviews_title: Pretty floral material, runs a little small
links_reviews_text: I thought the floral material and colors of this top were very pretty. I wore it a couple of times. It was a little small in the rib cage. I was unable to fasten the inside button, but was able to tie the wrap so I could still wear it. I had to wear a camisole under it, but it looked nice. I bet a large would have fit me better than the medium did.

I wore this pretty blouse to work and really liked it. I didn't want to wear a camisole and it wraps kind of low in the front, so I needed to pin it. Pretty comfortable, but might be tight for those with larger torsos or upper arms. I'm slightly large in both of those areas and it worked well for me. This can be dressed up or down. Cute piece.

I love this trendy top by J.O,A! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout at the natural waist line and works for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this shirt. The floral print on this top is amazing in person and is perfect for the day in the office or an evening out with friends.
This is such a cute top for work or everyday! I found it fit true to size, maybe slightly on the small side. I wore a white bandeau underneath as I felt it was a little low cut for work. Loved it!
This top is small. I'm usually a medium in the store and large in designer. I couldn't even button this shirt around the waste.

links_reviews_title: Like the top but would size up next time
links_reviews_text: Cute wrap top but runs a little small

links_reviews_title: Super small. Couldn't get it around me if I tried.
links_reviews_text: Way too small.

It has an odd fit. I normally wear a size 8. The medium was tight in the ribs, and I couldn't get it to button on the inside side of the wrap. The Large fit in the ribs, but there was way too much room in the under-bust area for a B cup and it bagged and looked very sloppy. The medium looked better, but I couldn't move my arms at all. You definitely need a cami or bandeau underneath unless you want to show everything off. Even so, I still thought it was pretty and I felt a little more dressed up than I normally am for work.
I didn't end up wearing this because it was way too small. Also was shorter on me then it seemed it should be in the picture.

links_reviews_title: I bought it! Fun print, flattering wrap.
links_reviews_text: True to size, fun floral print, loved the fit and flair cut. Need to wear a cami - especially if you have a small chest.

links_reviews_title: Cute but not the right fit.
links_reviews_text: Cute top. So cute I tried to wear it but the arms were a little too snug to be comfy. Definitely needed a tank under, but I'm large on top. Also, the lining around the neckline would not easily lay flat. Returned without wearing. Could be super cute on someone else.
This top is really cute, but it runs incredibly small. I usually wear medium or small and should have ordered at least a large.

Pros: Cute print and colorway for spring. Wanted to love this, but don't. Cons: . Hard to reach up (like if writing on a whiteboard, reaching for something on shelf over your head) without the top gaping open and pulling across my shoulders. Needed a few pieces of fashion tape to keep things covered up. A safety pin to keep the v-neck closed would've been better, I think.

links_reviews_title: Love the blouse but really small
links_reviews_text: I wear a medium cause I am a 10 but this blouse fit like an extra small
I want to love RTR but somehow been let down with last 2 items. This one arms were too tight don't have full range of motion picking arms up or extending and wrap didn't stay closed
The blouse was very narrow. It would work for slim shapes.
Such a cute shirt but it quickly turns R rated because of my boobs

links_reviews_title: too small and I could not close it
links_reviews_text: even if I could have closed it, the neck is too wide and would have shown my small breast to the world.
This top was a little too short on me, and because I have wide hips, it just wasn't flattering.

links_reviews_title: It was just okay but print was cute
links_reviews_text: Loose on top but tight around waist and arms
Could not button. I wear a size 10-12 in tops normally. Normal bust size.

links_reviews_title: Make sure you get fashion tape
links_reviews_text: If you're small in the chest like me, you're gonna need to hold down the top somehow. The peplum is very cute and flattering and the pattern is really nice, but my bra was slipping out constantly.
Too low cut to work without adding a camisole underneath, and didn't like how that looked. A little tight around the ribcage as well.

Good top for work but had to wear a camisole underneath. The top was a little too small around the rib cage and I wasn't able to secure the inside button. No worries because the material was sturdy and the top stayed securely tied all day with just the ties.

I rented this for work and couldn't wear it because it was too small. It was much more low cut than in the pictures and my whole chest and bra were showing. I am very small chested so this is weird fitting .
Love the wrap around style tops like this, also love the shorter bell sleeve details. If you have a smaller bust, you may want to pin the top shut like I had to, to keep it from falling wide open.
I liked the top but you definitely have to wear a cami under. gaps out

links_reviews_title: Pretty top but ran tight in the arms/shoulders
links_reviews_text: I really wanted to love this Because the pattern and colors were so pretty. If the under arms would have fit, I probably would have kept it

This is a very flattering top. The little flutter of the sleeves adds a subtle elegance without being overly decorative. I wore navy flat front tailored pants and camel shoes for a very put together look.

links_reviews_title: Had to return because it did not fit!
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size M/L in tops and this top was very very tight. I would size up at least one size, maybe two!

links_reviews_title: Tight around the waist, the front hung open awkwardly
links_reviews_text: Didn't fit well on my pear body.
too small for me
I have a fairly narrow rib cage and typically wear shirts that are medium. The button to close the wrap was a bit tight. I would size up. Otherwise the design is gorgeous

links_reviews_title: If the clasp at the boobs didn't fall off right away, I'd give it 5 stars
links_reviews_text: This shirt is beautiful. It's flattering, slimming, the colors are gorgeous. I have a small chest and got this shirt with the tags still on. Despite all of this, the snap at the chest came off as soon as I put it on. This made for a problematic day as I was having to check to see if I was hanging out all day. I wish I was able to wear it with the snap, because I loved everything else about it.
Title says it all. Couldn't close it and had to send it back.
Pattern looks more interesting in pic on model. Runs SUPER small. I'm small on top but couldn't get it on arms or buttoned at waist. Not sure an xsmall would even work.
Small
Didn't end up wearing because it was too big in the chest. Lovely cut and colors.
This romper was sooo cute, flattering & fit well! My only complaint was that it was a bit itchy between the legs.

links_reviews_title: Loved this romper! I received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: It was a bit short, but I am 6'0". With it being a romper, I still felt comfortable in it.

Wore this to an afternoon bridal shower. It definitely stands out but, as a bridesmaid I think it fit the bill. Color is beautiful and vibrant. Fit true to size however, the chest was ill fitting on me. It gaped wide open so I had to pin it, not a big deal because I loved it so much. The zipper is tough to do on your own so you might need a bathroom buddy.

This was super cute. Loved the color, it was like a dark bright coral. I was nervous about the sleeves because I wore this in Nashville in August but they were nice and airy so I wasn't hot at all. The top was big on me so fashion tape was necessary. Sometimes it would scrunch up in photos in the shorts which wasn't flattering. But, cute overall!

links_reviews_title: Love the color, wore twice on 5 say vacation
links_reviews_text: Narrow in waist, but not uncomfortable. Size up if larger chested
Very soft material, zipped up easily and fit very comfortably. Flattering, low cut so I had to tape down near chest so that bra wouldn't show

It's hard to overstate how much I liked this romper. The color and material, especially the lace sleeves, are gorgeous. The sleeves were just a little long on me (and I have longer arms), but it wasn't a big deal at all. The fit was great -- as another reviewer noted, this romper doesn't flatten your posterior the way many others do. The neckline is quite low, but cut nicely if you have a small chest -- no tape needed! The romper body is lined too, so you can wear regular underwear. I got a lot of compliments!
Fit overall was good. The boobs are out of control though, safety pin is necessary. Otherwise, I really liked it and received tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Great daytime and evening summer piece
links_reviews_text: Love the fit. Conforming. Short. Cute. Debating if I'm going to buy it. Runs a little small as does all Nicole Miller.
Went down to NOLA for a friend's bachelorette party and this was the perfect going out romper! Great to dance in, BUT tape the top down. #roomforboobs #babewear

links_reviews_title: It was sexy and i felt amazing. I would rent this over and over again.
links_reviews_text: Fit is tts and doesn’t make you look big like some rompers.
Fits amazing! Length and cut is perfect. Great detail to the lace. So hard not to purchase this one.
Love this lace romper! The color was beautiful and the fit was perfect. I did have to pin the bust as otherwise would be too revealing for my taste. Rented twice!

The sleeves are so great & long, I have long arms!! When you sit the tummy kind of pooches, other than that it's great! I did not wear a bra & used a safety pin to pin the top & then tape to keep my ladies covered!!
The pros are, the color is great and it's adorable! The cons are, you need big boobs to make it fill out on the top and it fits large!

links_reviews_title: The lace is so delicate - this one is a beauty
links_reviews_text: From the vibrant color to the intricate ladies this romper is so perfect. I'm very busty and put a magenta sports bra on under it. But the mix of color and texture worked perfectly. The shorts are the right length and I absolutely love the long sleeves. This one is a keeper

links_reviews_title: Nice and sexy. The color tho a little washed, looks like pinky, not red.
links_reviews_text: Nice and sexy. The color tho a little washed, looks like pinky, not red.
This was so uncomfortable I couldn't wear it. It showed too much cleavage and the shorts were short.
Loved the lace, color, style/cut BUT it did feel uncomfortably tight & itchy!

I can't say enough good things about this romper. Its both sexy and classy. It fits true to size (not skin tight but just right). It is well made/constructed. It is a great color. The piece was in excellent condition, which made me super happy. I wore this to rooftop birthday drinks that I organized for my husband and got a TON of compliments on the outfit. Highly recommend this piece. For this romper I wore size 0. As a reference, I'm 5'7'', a small 32 B-cup and weigh about 117 lbs. I'm size 26 in jeans and usually wear a 0 or 2 in most US brands.
The romper fit well. The shorts were a good length and the sleeves weren't too tight. The top was very low cut and I ended up having to pin it closed to wear it out.

links_reviews_title: Cute romper I wore around NYC
links_reviews_text: I loved this romper! Runs a bit small, I would have had a 4 if I rent again. I wore it around NYC and received lots of compliments. Would recommend if you have long arms like me to get a size up, it was a little tight there. I also wore an undershirt because it's see thru in certain places in the torso. Otherwise perfect!!
I wish I could buy this beauty! The color, fit, comfort, detail...the compliments kept coming all day! I had to pin it because it dips quite low but other than that it's perfect!

I loved this romper on, but it bunches up a bit too much in the front when seated. I'm also a small B and the front was fairly low and opened at times which exposed by bra. Might not be the best option for a larger bust. Overall, I would rent this again.
I loved how the romper fit. Deeper v neck than I anticipated so double stick tape or camisole may be necessary. Short in back. I did receive lots of compliments :)

Ok, I got many compliments on this and the size 6 fit but I just felt more comfortable in the size 8, however I had many safety pins inside on the top, was just a little to low for me. Top part fit better in size 6. Going pee ladies was a bit challenging :) Oh and the front pleats kinda made me feel like I had a belly pouch...so wish there were pockets in this.

links_reviews_title: I loved this outfit! I got so many compliments. It was comfortable, too!
links_reviews_text: Perfect date night alternative to the usual outfit!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress, but it was way to big in the chest
links_reviews_text: I had to have perfect posture for the romper to stay up and the lace left a rash on my inner elbow

The material is quality- I have larger bust and it still gaps at the top- needed tape - the arms are TIGHT - it's probably because I'm athletic but my hands still struggled to get into it - the body fit fine - careful with this one

This is a knockout romper! Pros- comfortable, beautiful color, beautiful lace, stands out in a crowd, sexy, shows off toned legs Cons- very low cut; I had to use safety pins in the front to keep from being exposed, hard to zip If you are tall like me, plan on not having to bend over or squat down if you drop something or you'll be showing some booty.

This is a super cute romper. Unfortunately, it's also super gappy in the chest area. I had to safety pin it shut. I am a 32D and it was hanging open in the front. For us short girls (5'3), it fits a little funny in the back. Fits fine in the waist, huge in the chest and then bunches in the back near the zipper. I would of probably worn something different if I would of brought something else, but this was my only option. Beautiful color. I was the first to wear this size 4 as it still had the tags on it, so it wasn't even that someone before me stretched it out. Rent with caution as it does fit weird.

links_reviews_title: My chest is just too big!
links_reviews_text: The romper was in great shape, a little heavier than I anticipated. Also way more booby than I anticipated. I could not wear it because Way too much skin was showing . Not sure I'm an off the rack kinda girl. I'm usually a 10 and this was a 12 and fit other than up top , so I guess you could say it runs small.
Beautiful romper! I received so many compliments on it. I typically wear a 4 in dresses but the 2 fit perfectly. I would say it runs a little large. Overall I'm very happy with how it looked! :)

links_reviews_title: Fits true to size but sleeves are quite tight
links_reviews_text: This was adorable and fit very well through the bodice, but the sleeves were VERY tight, and I don't have big arms, lol. I'm 5'4" and 115 lbs, 32D and usually wear a size 0. The back is also lacy, so you really need a backless bra, or don't need one at all because the front is lined. I did have to safety pin the front because it gaped.

links_reviews_title: to small in the waist, but fit everywhere else!
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing it, but it was nice. I typically wear a 10, rent the runway suggested an 8 so i went for it. I shouldn't have. The waist was too tight, but everything else fit. So if you have a small waist but a 10 hips, it would definitely work!
Fabric was restrictive. Especially around arms/shoulders
Can't wear with a long torso
Way to short
Great for my date night
Overall I liked this but I couldn't wear it because the chest area was too big. If I leaned forward it was way too open.

links_reviews_title: Backup option ended up being The One
links_reviews_text: I chose this romper as my backup for another NYE dress this year, but ended up wearing it for the night. Loved it! Historically, my 5'8" frame and big booty doesn't lend itself well to a romper, but this one fit like a glove. The cinched waist disguised my tummy, and the cut out was sexy but not too revealing.

links_reviews_title: This romper was perfect for a cocktail party or a night out on the town!
links_reviews_text: This romper was fabulous! I loved the fit (true to size). It was extremely comfortable and the fabric was great quality. I wish I did not have to give this romper back. I would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: You need this for date night!
links_reviews_text: Sexy and chic yet comfortable! The sleeves are gorgeous and pockets too?! I will likely be buying this romper. :)
Cute but I'm only 5'3" and the shorts ride up quite high making it a bit uncomfortable. But cute.

True to size- sleeves a little short but I'm 5'11" w/ the long extremities to show for it, so no sleeve or pant leg is ever really long enough. Liked that it could be a tad more or less conservative w/ the button at the bust- I wore unbuttoned for date night w/ the hubbs- felt with the long sleeves this wasn't over the top but to each her own. Length of the shorts was great - though I suppose that might mean too long for a woman of normal height. I found the fit to be super flattering as its cinched at the waist and liked that it had pockets.
Love this outfit and it has pockets. Had compliments all night at the wedding. Classy and comfy
Fit is very comfortable. Runs a little large but still fit!
Loved this romper! As with most it was slightly difficult to hook and unhook for bathroom breaks throughout the evening, but not unmanageable. Definitely recommend!
Loved this romper! Looks uncomfortable but the lace didn't bother me at all. Perfect if you want to dress up but want to be a little catty ;)

Loved the fit of this romper! I'm short and busty so I often have a lot of issues with fit, but this one was great and really flattering. Had a great little button on the chest which I wish all v-neck clothing had. Will definitely rent again.

This romper is super soft and easy to put on. Just two buttons. I wear it for dinner and then clubbing at a company holiday event in Vegas. It fits so well and and was extremely comfortable wearing it all night dancing.#mostflattering #mostcomfortable.
Comfortable fit

Rented this romper to wear in Vegas. It fit true to size and was so flattering! I opted to wear with tights due to cooler temps, but it would've been long enough without them. The material was really comfortable, and it offered a nice second button on the chest keyhole if you wanted to show more or less cleavage. The elastic waistline hit perfectly above the hips (again, flattering!). Going to the bathroom wasn't too cumbersome; I could manage the buttons in the back of the neck myself. I loved the shear arms and elastic on the bell sleeves so that the material didn't flop around by my wrists. I will definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Great for a night out in NOLA!
links_reviews_text: This romper was so extremely flattering! I had tons of compliments all night. Fit true to size and the top didn't plunge too low.

The fit was perfect. I'm 5'4" @130. I wore the small and it was very true to size. It had a small rip in the arm of the fabric but you could not see it at all. Tons of compliments and I could def see myself renting this again. LOVED.

This piece was perfect! I'm tall and it's hard to find rompers that don't ride up the crotch, but the fit of this one was great. It's definitely a sexy outfit but in a covered up and classy way. I loved that you could wear a regular bra. The fabric had a really nice feel to it, and it was perfect for that in-between season where it's a little chilly out but you don't want to haul around a jacket. The buttons on the neck were a little difficult to do on my own- it definitely helps to have some assistance getting this thing on and off.

links_reviews_title: Felt comfortable and stylish all night long wearing this piece.
links_reviews_text: The look & fit are great! Parker is one of my favorite labels. Only criticism is that the fabric ( lace) was torn under the arm. I had no other option so wore it anyway and still loved it. Perfect for a night out, sexy but also classic. I am 5'2 , 125 and size S was perfect.
Super cute. Great styling. Comfy. The bodice is very thick fabric and it feels great.
Rented for a bachelorette party. Was cute and flattering. Unique option instead of a typical LBD.

I wore this romper for a bachelorette in Nashville. It was really cute and fit me well as I am fairly petite and wear rompers pretty easily. Really comfortable, although if some tightness around your neck is uncomfortable I'd suggest perhaps a different style.
Fun romper that I wore for a bachelorette night out. Loved the detail of the polka -dot sleeves to give the standard black outfit something extra!

links_reviews_title: worn for a charity ball after-party. the perfect romper! Must rent!
links_reviews_text: great fit, extremely flattering and comfortable
It worked great for the bachelorette party I went too! Sexy but still very classy.

links_reviews_title: Who doesn't love a black romper
links_reviews_text: Loved this for a night out. I rented the xs and it was short but I'm short, 5"3' and I wore tights with it. It was fun and flirty... didn't wear a bra and you couldn't tell because it's dark. Of course using the bathroom is a challenge in a romper but worth it when you look super cute!
The neckline was a little low for my taste, and the torso was a little long for me, but otherwise it was super comfortable and easy. Received a lot of compliments. Loved it!
Rented this for a bachelorette party in New Orleans. Loved it! Fit super well and was extremely flattering. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my bday night out. Super comfortable and sexy without being over the top.
links_reviews_text: I’m usually a size 4 and the small fit perfectly. The only downside was the hem was falling apart and I had to stitch it 5 minutes before leaving. Would rent this again though.

Loved this oufit! Im 5'4 and 155 lbs and I was able to wear the medium! Sad I didnt get to take a full body pic. The romper is short but I loved how much leg it showed, which was above my mid thigh. I felt the long sleeves and the fact that it was a romper, balanced out the length of the shorts. Loved the neckline and I was able to wear a regular bra with this outfit!
Fit perfectly, so many fun details. Thick enough fabric I got away with just wearing panties and no bra. Wore for a work dinner and night out with my husband. Would rent again.

I loved this look for the news. It was flattering and just enough sexy. I like that it covered my arms and made my torso look smaller. Be warned, a little short, so I would not recommend this for conservative work attire.
Loved the fit, loved the style, loved that it had a little sex appeal but still very classy
This was a great romper for a dec concert in Vegas!! It was very comfortable and still sexy
Rented for a bachelorette party and it fit great ans was really flattering.
Loved the fit, i am typically a small and this fit great! Fabric was beautiful and very stylish!
I love this jumper! I'm a true XS and it fit perfectly. It was sexy but still classy with the long sleeves and a revealing but tasteful cut out at the chest. Perfect for a night out!

I rented this romper for a performance at a casino. It was perfect and easy! It was sexy without being too revealing. It was comfortable and allowed me to move around. It had pockets!! I received compliments all night. It was totally worth the rent! I tried the medium on first. It felt ok but looked a little sloppy. I was afraid that the small might bunch and tuck in all the wrong places, but it didn't! Great fit! One of the most comfortable and flattering rompers out there!

links_reviews_title: I wore this with tights and it looked amazing. I got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Great fit and flattering. Sleeves were a little short but I have ridiculously long arms.

links_reviews_title: Worked perfect for a bachelorette party
links_reviews_text: This romper was perfect for a bachelorette party in Nashville! I wore it with over the knee boots and it was so fierce! I got so many compliments and it fit amazing. It even could have fit someone a little taller as the waists hit a tad low on me

links_reviews_title: Wore to a concert. Runs big in the waist
links_reviews_text: Long sleeves were snug at the wrist but great conservative addition. Neckline has a little button to snap. Back of neck snap was secure. Waist ran larger for me so i kept having to pull it up or down. Overall fantastic piece

links_reviews_title: Great romper for a night out
links_reviews_text: I grabbed this from the store last minute in XS. I usually wear small bc I have boobs and ass but this still fit. It was just a little short in the crotch. The two buttons that hold the collar -the button on the bottom would not stay buttoned but honestly it felt better looser/ less chokey.
Loved this dress for a fall wedding. Great fit, hugged my body. The slit on the side was perfect! Got lots of compliments and felt amazing! The color was absolutely beautiful.

This dress fit like a glove but it has stretch so it is super comfy. I was able to dance and sit with no issues. The fabric is thick and not see through. It runs small. I wore the bigger size but still had no room left in the bust. I am a DDD so it is prob not an issue with a smaller chest. Received so many compliments!
Fit like a glove and loved how classy yet sexy the dress is. Would absolutely rent again. It really hugs your curves and the material is well made. Can move in it for dancing too!

This was my second option dress for a friend's wedding. It was really hard to pick between this dress and the other. I ended up going with the other because this dress was slightly on the smaller side and it was an outdoor afternoon wedding with the day's temperature was near 90 degrees. I didn't want pictures with potential sweat marks all day long.

This dress has been on my list of ones to try renting and I am so glad I did! The color is so rich, gorgeous and unique, perfect for the start of fall! So many compliments, very flattering hugging the curves, only downfall is the waist was a bit tight when it came to dinner! Comfortable for walking and dancing, but size up! The 2 fit like a 0 for me, wish I got a backup in a 4! Overall, HIGHLY recommend for its unique factor!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress and received lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: The dress ran small as many of the reviews mention. I’m normally a 6 and wore an 8 but it was very comfy and I was able to dance in it. The only uncomfortable part was having to wear a strapless bra. Overall I felt really good in it and received a lot of compliments on it! Perfect for fall.

Absolutely loved this dress! It was tight but the thick fabric smooths everything out. Probably could have worn a 2 but I have no hips so I appreciated how the 0 held the very minimal curves I do have. Comfortable considering the snug fit and the slit made for easy walking without revealing anything when sitting down. Would 100% rent again!

This is a lovely dress but I just didn't find it entirely flattering or comfortable so I decided to send it back without wearing. It did that armpit fat thing that just would've annoyed me all day. Still recommend if you can rock it!
Beautiful dress - great fabric - flattering and approved for tall women! But does run quite small as stated in previous reviews. I had to return the size 8 and size up. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Stretchy so it hugs, easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: The dress was a bit long for me but didn't look odd. Very stretchy and flattering -I have some muscles so I need the stretch. I wore the 6 although I'm usually a 2 or maybe 4. My broader back and booty probably contributed to that.
I love this dress and felt so comfortable in it. It does run on the small side so I ordered a size up and it fit perfectly. I would definitely rent this dress again.
I rented this for my graduation but it was definitely tight on my chest but it fit beautifully and I got a million compliments! Would def rent again!

Definitely go a size up like others say. This dress is perfect for hourglass/athletic shape. The cut around the neck didn't make my arms look giant. The fabric was perfect weight and comfortable. I had to do a lot of running around in this dress, and I had no issue there either.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: Loved the look and fit of this dress. Definitely does run small so I would size up. Elizabeth & James knows what they're doing! This dress made me feel great and I received a ton of compliments. Would 100% recommend!

links_reviews_title: I felt stunning in this dress!
links_reviews_text: It's a tight fit but comfortable fabric and moved with ease. I received LOADS of compliments and felt all night gorgeous. I wore it to a work party and felt appropriate in that setting. Highly recommended.
This dress fits like a glove with nice thick material. My husband loved it!
So flattering and sexy without being too much. Loved this.
Slightly snug - perhaps size up if you don't want to show your figure as much. Loved the color and style!
Great dress-- love this brand, love the cut, love the color, LOVE LOVE LOVE

links_reviews_title: Felt as good as it looked
links_reviews_text: Looked as flattering as it felt. Definitely worth ordering the back up size and deciding between the two. I cannot wait to rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Matching with my husband. We never match.
links_reviews_text: I am glad I got a size 8 because I got a little thick. I consider myself an athletic build. It was comfortable and pretty.
Loved the color and small slit. Ran very small and was snug around the waist.

It ran small. It's a fitting dress and the fabric does not stretch. Great fit though once I wore the size 10. I usually wear 6 so I definitely got lucky that was the only backup size they had. I would rent this dress again though!

A very cute dress would recommend wearing Spanx or some type of shapewear because it is clingy but it does stretch. It was quite comfortable to wear and I got a lot of compliments. I ordered a 4 and a 6 and the 6 was a little loose in the wrong areas.

links_reviews_title: The dress is well made and figure hugging.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'3 107 lbs I rented size 0 and size 2 for a backup. The 2 is a little loose in the back for me, the 0 fits perfectly. I would recommend these dress for a small frame figure, as it runs small and tight. The dress is sophisticated, classy with a touch of fun. It's absolutely gorgeous !!

Tight fit, I ordered an 8 and 10...could've worn the 8, but the 10 fit nice a snug with a tad more breathing room. 36C bust, I was able to go braless since the dress was so fitted in the bust! Loved this dress, got lots of compliments on the Las Vegas strip!

links_reviews_title: Great fit and great color for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: I wore the zero and the material was tight to make it slimming, yet stretchy enough to keep it very comfortable. Easy to dance in! The color was a bit different than the photo, in my opinion. It also cut on my upper arms creating a "bra fat" look that was a bit unflattering. Otherwise, comfortable and photographed great!
I wore this to a bachelorette party in NYC. The fit was small so I went with the 8, but it was the perfect length with just a small slit and hugs your curves. I MISS THIS DRESS lol

I ordered this dress in a 10 and an 8- I would have preferred to wear the 10 but it had 2 holes in it and my replacement didn't arrive in time. The 8 fit but was a bit tight for my taste- I had to ask a few friends if I looked slutty (I'm not sure how honest they were!) I did wear some spanx with it to make sure everything was in its place!
