It worked out fine and I think it looks nice in the pictures. I didn't feel restricted dancing which is a plus as I really shine on the dance floor!! ;)

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a Fall Night Out
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a night out with friends. I usually wear a size 2 and ordered a backup size 4 since the reviews said the dress runs small. I opted to wear the size 2 since it fit me nicely and paired it with some beige pumps. I got so many compliments and felt amazing in it!

I got this dress for a wedding rehearsal dinner (I'm on the far right in picture). I got both size 2 and 0. I am 5'4 108 pounds and the size 0 was way to tight. The 2 fit a lot better. Very pretty cut and color! Is tight up top near chest area and mid section. Great for a formal fall event!

links_reviews_title: Simple cut and great color for fall
links_reviews_text: I rented this as my backup dress for a fall wedding. I had a tough time deciding between this and my first choice but ended up going with my original. I'm consistently a 4P in Banana/J. Crew and I rented the 4. It was a bit snug in the waist and I'd probably size up if renting again (more hope for eating/dancing). Even though I'm short, I thought the length was appropriate on me. You can't wear a bra with straps because of the cut of the neckline--so strapless of braless is the way to go. You could wear shapewear if desired but nothing with longer shorts because of the slit. The material is thick with a little give. Overall great simple on-trend dress in the perfect fall color.
Beautiful dress form fitting yet comfortable
Some compression to hold you in.

Dress was suuuuuper tight, so size up. I'm usually a 4 and a had to squeeze into a 6. Would've been more comfortable in an 8. If you got a booty, definitely size up 2x. However, the tight fit made me feel slim.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and very comfortable for a semi-formal wedding
links_reviews_text: We all know Elizabeth and James dressed run small. I typically wear a dress size 4, but the size 6 was more comfortable in my shoulders. This was a beautiful dress and I received many compliments. It is figure-flattering, but without being too show-y for a wedding.

This dress was a great color. Definitely runs on the smaller side like others have said. If you are self conscious about your stomach at all, you will probably be uncomfortable. Spent a lot of the night sucking in. And it's pretty tight, so I think you would see spanx underneath, I didn't actually try it though But, Bonus.. I got to wear a sports bra, cause it went under the strap shape perfectly.

I've rented Elizabeth and James dresses before but this one felt extra tight. Love the cut and color of this dress. High neck makes it easy to go braless. Love the slit too, but it definitely comes up high when seated - size up for a more comfortable and conservative fit.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for my 20 year high school reunion - I loved the color and the fit!
links_reviews_text: This was actually a stylist selection as another dress I ordered was not available last minute and I was so happy with it! I am usually a size 4 and this was a size 2; I think a 4 would have been a more comfortable fit. It is certainly form fitting, but I was able to walk, move and dance without it creeping up. This was my first RTR experience and it was a good one!

The fit made me feel slim and sexy around my hips, butt, and shoulders-it hugged all the right places. I did feel it was a little tight around the stomach area, but I do have a bit of a belly. I am 5 feet, 122 lbs with a small chest. I did not need to wear undergarments with this dress. Overall, this dress has been my favorite rental so far and I would highly recommend it!

links_reviews_title: 7 months pregnant- fit like a glove!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. Loved!

links_reviews_title: Form-fitting and so comfortable, size up in 3rd trimester
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my office baby shower. Initially I felt self conscious because it was much tighter in the hips and bottom than appears on the model. I wore a size S at 32 weeks and am a pretty- pregnancy size 0. I paired with a long sweater because I felt the dress was a bit tight for a work event. It was very comfortable. Highly recommend, just size up if you want a little more room.

links_reviews_title: Great for second and third trimester
links_reviews_text: Dress is comfortable (stretchy), accentuates your bump, and hugs all your curves. I felt more comfortable wearing it with a long sweater/cardigan so my rear end wasn't quite so on display. Despite the way it looks in this picture, the slit is ok for work, but you will need to keep an eye on it. It kept riding up on me. I'm 5'4" and was 36 and 37 weeks pregnant (140 pounds) when I wore it, and I don't think it would have been appropriate much past that-- a little too tight/revealing.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and sexy at 9 months pregnant.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a baby shower I was attending at nine months pregnant. I'm typically a small or medium but the medium fit best this far along. For reference I'm 5'6" 34DD and weigh 180 now (140 Pre-pregnancy). This dress was comfortable and made me feel sexy even though I am so swollen and huge! The side ruching is very flattering. Would definitely recommend.
The dress fit perfectly and hugged my bump in all the right spots. It was very comfortable and I received a lot of compliments!
I wore this dress for my baby shower. The material is very comfortable - soft and stretchy. I loved the print, too! The cut was not too long or too short.
Form fitting and flattering. Comfortable

links_reviews_title: My husband said " you look like a sexy pregnant lady!"
links_reviews_text: Pleased with how this dress fit snug around my belly, accented it beautifully. Liked how the dress was on the longer side, just past my knees, and didn't feel too skimpy.

I wore this to a formal wedding and found that it was super comfy. As you can see there is a touch of tension in the bottoms as I have a larger bum due to years and years of sports. I had no issues in the bust. I spoke with my friends too and they mentioned it did not look that tight but from my standpoint I could kind of feel it, the general consensus found that if I had gone up a size it might not hug my figure as I had a ton of compliments. Not to worry I danced all night in this dress
Loved the thick material and cut it's super flattering!
I mean look at this dress.
Could not wear to work because of how high up the side came when I sat down.

links_reviews_title: The dress is gorgeous more so pink then red
links_reviews_text: I love it, order a size up.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, not for small chested women
links_reviews_text: I did not end up wearing this dress. It was very large in the chest area (I'm 32A) but perfectly fitted in the middle (~110 lbs). The length was also not too short on me (5'3''). I was planning on wearing it to a wedding but even a super padded bra wouldn't have made up for all the extra fabric on top. Online it looked like a red dress but in person it has more pink/fuchsia tones.
This dress fit perfectly! I have a large chest and smaller waist so I have a hard time with dresses but this one was great! I wore it for my MIL 60th birthday party and got a lot of compliments.
Cute dress even though I didn't wear it out

links_reviews_title: Cute - it was a little short for work with the interesting hemline
links_reviews_text: Interesting hemline
Pretty dress but it's definitely not a work dress because the short part of the dress and the slit go up wayyyy too high. Especially bad if you're tall.

links_reviews_title: Got many compliments with this dress
links_reviews_text: Color is vibrant and style sexy

links_reviews_title: The uneven hem line accentuated my legs
links_reviews_text: very comfortable

i'm typically a 2 and this fit perfectly. beware that the slit is a touch high, but not inappropriate. there is stretch so it is figure flattering without showing too many lumps. love the fuchsia color, perfect for summer and spring. highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: This dress runs extremely small, I am between a 2 and 4 and I could not fit into the 4.
links_reviews_text: Size up at least one size

This was my back up, so I didn't actually wear to my event. I loved the look, the fit and most of all the ombré blue. However, I caution that the sleeves were irritating my arms after a few minutes, hence a star deduction. If you can tough it out, the cut is stunning, I especially love the back.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a night out in Las Vegas!

links_reviews_text: Easy to wear, comfortable and lot of compliments! Back was awesome! Rent it!

I wore this dress to a political event that my boyfriend had to attend. The attire was cocktail attire. This isn't what I would have picked for myself but decided to go out on a whim and try it. I was blown away with the fit and comfort of the dress! This was absolutely stunning and I received many compliments all night on the dress. I definitely will use RTR in the future!!!
True to size, not itchy and stayed put, didn't ride up. Lovely dress!
Beautiful dress!

links_reviews_title: Great dress, festive for New Years Eve!
links_reviews_text: I loved the colors and fit of this dress. It's stretchy and comfortable. I'm 5'11" and about 140 lbs and the medium was a perfect fit. Highly recommend! The back is a little low, but I used a special bra strap to keep from showing.

Figure hugging and just the right amount of skin for an upscale formal occasion! Worn for NYE our on the town. Blue color was understated and added the perfect amount of sparkle. Loved the lower back, but I wasn't prepared for it to be quite so low. Would recommend pasties but it is thick enough where you won't feel exposed if you don't have. The length hit me right below the knee so I could still wear Spanx too! Would highly recommend and would wear again!
So pretty in person. Hid the mom tummy and gave me an hourglass shape. Loved it.
My office threw a speakeasy-themed christmas party and this dress was perfect! It was super comfy and really on point. It fit like a glove.

links_reviews_title: Amazing Cheers to 10 years Christmas party event for my company and the dress was just as amazing!!!
links_reviews_text: the fit was perfect with the ability to dance without any limitations.
The ombré on this dress is so unique and beautiful. The fit is very flattering, however I chose to wear my backup dress because the sequins were very scratchy on my arms.

After seeing reviews of this dress being very stretchy and bump-accommodating I decided to give it a go. My prepregnancy dress sizes are typically S/4 so I went with a S and M in this dress, not knowing how my bump would fit (23w pregnant). I'd say this dress runs a little small, I wore the medium. It did have a lot of stretch and fit my bump. The back is super low, just be aware, and I also found the front neckline road up a little. Got lots of compliments and felt fancy with the sparkle!

links_reviews_title: Great dress - loved the back and really flattering overall.
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size for me. I wore an XS and it fit well. It was also really comfortable. Other folks complained of the sequins being uncomfortable, but they did not bother me. I had a lot of compliments and the back made the dress really elegant.
Tight thru waist

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my husband’s Fraternity Alumni Chapter anniversary event. This dress turned heads!
links_reviews_text: The fit of this dress is true to size. The low cut back is beautiful and the overall look was very elegant and sexy! I didn't have to wear a bra as it was snug without being tight. I’m 6 ft tall so I was pleased that the length was just right - right below the knee. I was able to move freely in the dress which was fantastic- I was able to dance! The color is a little darker than the picture but it wasn’t an issue...it’s an AWESOME dress. I received numerous compliments and will absolutely rent this again.
Fits like a glove, material stretches to flatter all curves. Comfortable and breathable. Would highly recommend for any event!

I wore this dress to my friend's 10 year annual party in which the attire was formal wear. I didn't want to buy a dress so I used RTR as my go-to for events like this lol. The dress fit great and I received many compliments!

Got this for an outdoor wedding. As you can see from the pics, it shows up beeeeautifully in pics. More fitted for a evening wedding or New Years, but I felt gorgeous nevertheless. Cons: it’s heavy-ish (duh, all sequins), i wasn’t a fan of the sleeves at first cause they felt restricting and sequins were scratching my arms. But after having it on and walking around, I barely even noticed it. Back was super sexy, be sure to wear pasties or your back strap will show. The gradient is not as strong/vibrant as it is in the model photo, which I liked. I just wore simple pearl earrings and my hair up. Felt super fancy and dolled up.
Rented for a wedding!!! Loved it I got some many compliments. I'd rent again
Received lots of compliments! Dress was very comfortable to wear, danced all night. Would definitely rent this one again!
For true to size, was comfortable, & made it easy to dance

I wore this dress to a wedding when I was 29 weeks pregnant. Pre-pregnancy, I would’ve wore the XS but where I am now, I chose the S. I am currently 130 lbs, bra size 34C (vs. 115-120 and a 34B pre-pregnancy). Didn’t have to wear a bra or any special undergarments with this dress and got many compliments off of it! I wore my hair up to show off the lower cut back of the dress.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress but beware or arm irritation from sequins
links_reviews_text: This dress was very body hugging. I wore it to a black tie optional wedding and got many compliments. One thing to be aware of is that the sequins near the upper arm/armpit will rub your skin unless you have teeny tiny arms and an arm gap. I wish I had applied some anti-chaff because my arms were cut up and raw the next day. Despite this, I'd rent this dress again. It was classy but also fun.
Dress runs small. The sequins are a bit scratchy on your arms and arm mobility was a little limited. I wore tights underneath since it was a frigid snowy night. Overall it was a fun dress to wear.

Aside from the slight itchiness at armpit from sequins, the dress was spectacular. I’m 5’6”, 158lb, post-partum 36B. Had planned on a Large but Medium fit better on top. No need for a bra, hugged all the curves, stretchy enough to sit comfortably and dance in. I was told I was “stunning” several times. Absolutely loved this!!!! Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Loved everything about this dress. Felt fabulously fancy.
links_reviews_text: Like others said, I wish the blue would have been more vibrabrant in contrast to the black, but it was extremely flattering and comfortable all night. Had to wear stick-on bra. Looked perfect at my black tie event.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to the Tony Awards!
links_reviews_text: The small was too small. Medium fit perfectly. It was stretchy, so comfortable enough to sit in the theatre for 4 hours and then go to a gala.

I wore this to a girls' Christmas dinner. I wasn't feeling good about my weight at all and this dress was clingy without highlighting my problem areas (tummy). I highly recommend if you want to feel sexy but also "held in" by your dress. I wore tights but no spanx.

Dress appears soooo tight if my pictures but it actually wasn't uncomfortable. I had a large as my backup but it was just a bit loose in the chest and waist so I stuck with the medium. I'm 5'10" and the length was perfect, right above my knees.

links_reviews_title: This dress was everything. I had so much fun wearing it and danced the night away in it.
links_reviews_text: Both M and L fit but I felt more comfortable in the L. It had good stretch and was super comfortable. 10/10 would wear this dress again. Absolutely LOVED it.

links_reviews_title: I got a lot of complements and I felt great in it!
links_reviews_text: The only con was the irritation on the arm pits. It was not unbearable, but slightly annoying.
Dress fitted perfectly! It is my first experience with RTR and i am extremely satisfied

Dress fit true to size, had good stretch to it, and was super comfortable. I wore this for my son's high school fundraising gala and got a ton of compliments. I'm actually sad that I have to send the dredd back because I love it so much!!

I wore this dress to a prom I had to chaperone. I felt the fit was true to size. As other reviews have stated, the dress was a little itchy, particularly around the neckline and under the arms but after a while it didn't seem to bother me and I didn't get a rash or anything. I am not as confident showing my back/going braless as others but I wore some shape wear that was kind of a nylon fabric and it worked great for me. My date also said he loved the dress, so that didn't hurt either!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a black tie optional wedding!
links_reviews_text: Make sure you have a bra/sticky situation organized before you travel!

I wore this to a school gala and received many compliments. This dress fits like a glove! The stretch material makes this comfortable and easy to move around in. I loved the length, being 5'10". The sequins is stunning and it is such an elegant dress. The low back gives a fun & flirty vibe. I had so much fun wearing this and would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great fit, just the right amount of stretch.
links_reviews_text: This dress worked well with my baby bump. I think it would've been just a great when I'm not Preggo. I loved the length as well. Compliments left and right. This dress was definitely a winner.
Classy but sexy. Tight and supportive enough that I didn't need a bra. Very comfortable! Great dress.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a Museum Ball.
links_reviews_text: This dress is even more beautiful in person. It is also very comfortable. I’m 125 pounds at 5’8” and the medium was a perfect fit.
Loved this gown. I still was carrying some extra baby weight so it fit a little snug but that wasn't the dress's fault. Overall very glamorous. I'm very busty and it did show a bit more cleavage.

links_reviews_title: Great material! Comfortable all night long!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable, yet sturdy material. Worn with rib cage-thigh spanx, but didn't need a bra! Perfect length. Slightly difficult to raise arms, but overall fit was great.
Perfect for a black tie wedding! Love the neckline, fit and the slit! Got lots of compliments! Hard to dance to 'Shout' though 😂
Fit like a glove, very classy. Received so many compliments

I didn't want to wear this dress but ended up loving it and so happy with end result. I went up a size because it's really tight in the top might not be able to pull it off if you're big chested. The 4R was perfect length and I'm short. The top was still snug so much so I didn't wear a bra. Would rent it again!
The material is not forgiving and a bit structured but I loved it. Need better spanx then I had - otherwise it was great. The slit is not to bad, though when you sit down it's more revealing..
Loved everything about this dress!

I was almost 35weeks, and I went up 3-4 sizes. It worked perfectly. The dress is stretchy and roomy enough. The slit is sexy high. I even wore my heavy duty 3-part belt and a belly band and the dark color and cut hid it well. Received many compliments!

links_reviews_title: The most amazingly comfortable, fitting, perfect dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove, perfect stretch, so comfortable, I can't say enough. I would purchase and wear again!

links_reviews_title: Loved the ease of delivery and sending back. Nice dress for an even better price.
links_reviews_text: The fit was a bit snug, usually wear a 6 and sized up. Would have preferred a thicker material. Nice color and overall was happy with dress and was a good price!
Rented this dress for prom. I got a lot of great compliments on it! It was comfortable all through the night!

links_reviews_title: I am currently 7 months pregnant. I ordered this dress 3 sizes up. It fit wonderful.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a Mardi Gras ball. I received so many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments on this dress. I wore it for my sisters formal wedding and it was perfect.
links_reviews_text: It fit very nice, not too tight so it was good for a nice wedding around family members. The bust line stayed up all night throughout dancing, I was never worried about it slipping down. Only con was the small straps used for hanging kept coming out in the back all night.

The dress fit very well aside from it being a little too long. I spent much of the night holding it up even with four-inch heels on. I’m 5’7”. I wear about a 40C bra size and it fit my bust nicely. I didn’t have to wear a bra with the dress. It was a bit restrictive with the way the arms are made, and the little strings that hold it on the hanger kept popping out the whole night. Women kept taking it upon themselves to stick them back in or just inform me they were out. Overall, it was great for the price. I would suggest some sparkly jewelry to help spice it up.

links_reviews_title: Received dresses in time, returning was so easy, and loved getting two sizes.
links_reviews_text: Overall the dress was great! Compliments all night! Thank god I went with a bigger size. I'm usually a 6 or 8 and the 8 wouldn't even zip. The 10reg zipped and was the perfect length with my shoes, wish it was just a little tighter around the waist.
Nice dress. Not my favorite but good if you just want a classic navy look. I didn't wear it to my event but it was a good back up.
One of my favorite dresses I've rented so far. Comfy & has a little bit of stretch. I recommend a strapless bra and strapless spanx slip to smooth you out if you have extra fluff like I do. Lol!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a black tie event. I got so many compliments! Simple, modern, and elegant.
links_reviews_text: This dress runs small. I am an 8-10 in clothing but I wore a 14 in this dress. I am also busty with broad shoulders so it's difficult for me to find things that fit up top as well as my waist and this was no exception. It was a bit baggy in the waist but it's a dark color so it wasn't too noticeable. Overall, I would definitely recommend this dress.

This is a very beautiful and elegant dress. I normally wear size 4 and I ended up wearing the backup size I got in size 6. If you have wide shoulders, make sure to size up. If you get the right size, this dress wouldn't disappoint you.

links_reviews_title: This dress is beautiful! It fit nice and hugged all the right curves.
links_reviews_text: I was worried this dress wouldn’t fit over my hips and backside (I am 5’5”/150 lbs and pear shape) but it fit like a glove. I loved the sexy neckline and heigh slit up the side. It made an incredible evening even more magical!
Gorgeous dress, so many compliments.. made me feel like a princes

links_reviews_title: Not a huge fan of the dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress runs a lot shorter than I anticipated and I wish it came in a long. I have a small chest but I'm tall so I usually have to size down for fit. The dress has a number of extra strings on it for hanging so it required sticky tape to hide them. It didn't work that well for me though and I had to have my husband do "string checks" throughout the night. The dress also sits a lot lower (chest wise) then I wanted. I'd give it 3.5 stars.

I was 39 weeks pregnant when I wore this for my husband's office holiday party and I felt amazing in it. I am 5'4", my pre-pregnancy weight was 115 lbs, I normally wear xsmall and in dresses (depending on the brand I am anywhere from a 0-4), because I was so close to the end of my pregnancy I went a couple sizes up to 6R and it fit perfectly because it had so much stretch. I highly recommend and wouldn't mind renting it again not pregnant!

Really loved this especially since I have a large chest. I can't do typical strapless dresses but this one has secret straps under the off the shoulder straps. They did an amazing job of staying in place all night. The slit is high but not trashy. Would totally rent this again if we didn't take so many pics in it!

This was my first RTR and I'm so impressed! I'd do this again and again. During the event I received several compliments and I referred everyone here. I had to size up as my chest is unusually large due to lung disease. Even still, the bodice was strong enough to hold shape while still being comfortable and did not squish my boobs too much. The waist was very loose on me; however, due to the amazing seam work on the gown, there was an illusion of a tiny waist! I've never looked so good.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments, but it wasn't my favorite rental
links_reviews_text: I wore this to dinner and a holiday party. I got lots of compliments, but I didn't love the fit of the dress. The cut across the front seemed odd on me and the underwire poked me all night. It was a tight squeeze but I made it work. The length was a bit shorter than I'd expected for a regular but it was fine.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Navy blue formal dress. My boyfriend & others loved it.
links_reviews_text: Its a beautiful dress that i wore at a formal wedding. Gained a lot of complements and my boyfriend loved it. I followed the instructions on the length of dress. Im about 5'4 and wore a 2 1/2 inch heel and was a perfect length. At the end of the night, the wire under the chest area popped out. Luckily it was when i was heading home. I wish the dress fit a little tighter on the hips. I Couldn't wear the 4R since it was too small on my back area.

There was another girl at the even with the same exact dress. The dress didn't hug as much of my curves as I hoped. I got the smallest size possible which was a OR. A OP would have fit better, but it still looked nice. If you want something simple this is the dress for you.

links_reviews_title: Didn't actually get to wear it because it came after my event.
links_reviews_text: It's a shame this dress came after my event. I wanted to try it on anyways and it was elegant and fit perfectly. With 5 inch heels, this length worked. This would have been a perfect dress for the Marine ball. The only con would be that it is difficult to raise your arms up which I would imagine would make it difficult to dance. Otherwise I really loved it.
Absolutely perfect fit in the chest and hugged everything just beautifully. Nice, comfortable fabric.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress!! Got compliments all night! I would definitely rent again!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly! Definitely true to size!

This is an absolutely gorgeous dress but be warned - it fits large, especially if you have a small waist. For the sake of comparison, I am just a hair under 5' tall, 100 lbs, 32A, and pear-shaped. I rented the smallest size available (0R). With 4" heels on the dress dragged on the ground a bit but it was only about 1/2" too long. If you are taller than 5' you will have to wear shorter heels (and it might be too short entirely if you are taller than 5'4"). The fit was good in the hips, shoulders, and chest. However, it was HUGE in the waist/stomach. I seriously could have worn this as a maternity dress - there was that much room in the torso. Perhaps if you are built straight up and down instead of pear/curvy this will work better for you. I saved the look with a belt and ended up receiving a ton of compliments on the dress, but if I hadn't been able to order that belt online at the last minute I would have just looked baggy and sloppy instead of glamorous. The photo on the left is the dress with the emergency belt I bought, and the photo on the right is how the dress fit me without a belt - shapeless and baggy in the torso/waist.

links_reviews_title: It was fancy enough! Loved it. Simple yet elegant!
links_reviews_text: It was right from my ribs! But overall fit great. It wasn’t too uncomfortable.

This was my first time renting a gown. It made me a little uneasy not knowing for sure if it would arrive. If I would like it. It arrived the day before the event which was awesome! Previous reviews said the dress ran small which is deff true. I should have ordered a size up but it was not a huge problem. I got soo many compliments. Overall very happy with this and would do it again for the next event!

links_reviews_title: Trendy but modest, best for an athletic figure.
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress to wear as the MOH in my best friend's wedding. On the pro side, the dress was surprisingly comfortable to wear. The shoulder straps stayed up even through dancing all night, and the built-in bra provides enough support/coverage. On the con side, it was not quite the best fit for me. I have an hourglass figure and the dress was too loose and column-like at my waist, and didn't hug my curves. It might be ether for someone with a more athletic or straight figure.

Wore this for a black tie optional wedding. Put on a lot of weight this year, but along with spanx this dress doesn't show it (at least I don't think) I really liked that you can move the straps up or down depending on how sexy you want to look - it's really low cut if you move the straps closer to your elbows, or much more family-wedding appropriate if you move them closer to your shoulders. I'm 5'7 and in low heels the dress didn't quite hit the ground. Very comfortable too - this was a great rental!

The dress (4R) fit wonderfully and the fabric was stretchy and very comfortable. The length was great with 3 inch heels. I did have to sew each of the hanger straps down to prevent them from flipping up. There were some mild creases and wrinkling which steaming did not entirely fix, but they weren't very visible anyway.

I rented this dress for a black tie wedding and it did not disappoint! The compliments were flooding in on this dress!! I rented a 6R and an 8R. Currently I weigh about 143 pounds and I'm 5'7. The 6R fit the best. The sleeves were not too tight and the stomach area fit well also. The overall fit was perfect and was more comfortable than I expected. The hanger strings were annoying, but I had safety pins on hand to use to keep them from showing all night. The dress length was perfect for my shoes. I wore a heel that was about an inch and a half or maybe two inches high which were ideal. This was my first time using RTR and I could not be more pleased! I'm now trying to think of upcoming events I could use RTR for again :)
Thought I needed a strapless but turns out it fit me all around. A little pokey around the ribs but I recommend this dress for a formal night out.

The fit was perfect! The fabric was really nice and it fit tight in all the right places. I wore 3.5" heels and if I went any taller the dress would've been too short. You can't really move your arms that high up but that was fine for me!
The fit is definitely small to size, but the side and back details are so cute. Loved this dress!

I ended up not wearing this dress because it was not appropriate for the wedding I needed. I am 5'4.5 (5'5 on a good day) and the slit just hit way too high. But I am going to rent it again for a spring event?
Very comfortable
Dress definitely runs small I had to leave part of the zipper open. I'm a size 6 w 34 D. I wore without a bra and it held up well all night. Hot dress!
This dress was very fitted. I have a large chest which made this dress busty but not too tight. The slit is very high and you have to be careful how you move.
Fit true to size with a little stretch. I'm 5'4 and with heels or was the perfect length. Also the the high slit on the side was the best part

links_reviews_title: True to size, to slightly smaller. Very high slit
links_reviews_text: Great color, was not aware from other reviews how high the slit was which made me a little uncomfortable. I ordered a 6 and an 8 as a back up and ended up going with the 8. Overall a good dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so much fun to wear!
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this dress! I felt so confident in it and received tons of compliments. The top is structured enough that I didn’t have to wear a bra, which was a plus for a summer outdoor wedding!
This dress looked great and was still sexy. The detail on the side and back were unique.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, very flattering, great fabric. You do not need to wear a bra. Sexy and fun.
links_reviews_text: I felt comfortable in this dress but I could have worn a seize 6 the only thing is because if the side slit it belled out a bit and seemed a little to A-line, so a size 4 was better. The straps are adjustable and the dress has plenty of support. The image in RTR does not do the dress justice. It has a beautiful side detail that includes mesh and is strategically placed to flatter the figure. Great dress for bigger bust and thicker girls. I received lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Loved the way it fit me
links_reviews_text: It runs small I never wear an 8 usually 4 or 6. Was extremely comfortable and flattering

I rented this for a summer wedding and it was perfect, I wanted something simple but sexy. It was very humid out but I wasn't too hot, I was able to dance all night. I'm 5'3 and I thought the length worked with heels. If you're in between sizes, I'd go up. Also if you're larger chested. I'm not and it was still a little tight around my chest.
It's a little stretchy and tight to kind of holds you in. I didn't need a bra with it. The bright red is eye-catching especially when everyone else wears black!

Loved this dress. Easy to wear and the side striping was extremely flattering. Definitely meant to be curve hugging, but great for dancing. I'm on the shorter side (5'4") so this dress was a tad long on me - but still worked great. Paired with a leather jacket for earlier in the night for an edgier look. Red is a vibrant slightly orange-red but a great color!

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress, fit great!! Felt beautiful!
links_reviews_text: I'm glad I sized up because I'm busty so it needed to be. I would have loved a size down! But I was pressed for time and I rented it directly from the flag ship store in New York. It was really awesome to try the dresses on because this one definitely worked well and I would totally rent it again! The slip up one side of the dress is beautiful in the length is perfect it's sexy enough without being over-the-top!! I should've gotten more pictures it was really a great piece!
Very flattering and comfortable. Love the color!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: The fit was a little tight fit a little tight but I was still able to sit and move around comfortably. I'm smaller on the top and have a larger bottom and the 6 fit well.
Fit is perfect! If you have a bust it will fit much better. I felt pretty fierce in it. Leather jacket makes a perfect fit!

I so wanted this dress to fit! The bright red if beautiful and it has gorgeous form. Length and slit were just right and gave the booty great shape, the side details flattered the figure but... my 36D bosom did not fit in at all. My top looked squished and overflowed at the top. I wish it had a bit more space and/or stretch to make is work because it is a truly beautiful dress. If you have a smaller chest, go for it, you won't regret it!
a little tight zipping up the back

links_reviews_title: Felt gorgeous in this red dress! Perfect length, many compliments on the color and flattering fit.
links_reviews_text: Great length on the dress, I am 6 ft tall and it hit me right above the knee. The slit it super sexy and the dress is very flattering, room to stretch.
Amazing, only con zipper is small need help to zip up.

This dress is a showstopper and definitely a winner. I would size up at least one size and be aware that all your curves are going to be displayed! I have a long torso and had to adjust the straps. I felt the hips didn't hit me in the right place, but still rocked it. My only gripe is that the dress had two small holes and a stain near the bottom. I discovered them the night of the event so I didn't have time to get it switched out... but you couldn't really see them when it was on.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it this time but have worn it in the past.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, stunning.

links_reviews_title: The side of this dress is amazing.
links_reviews_text: It was little too big around my hip so I could 't get the nice curve like other photos. Dress was little too long for my height. I tried to adjust but it just looked weird.

This dress is very sexy and great for a night out. I did find that this ran small (similar to other reviewers) and it was a bit too revealing up top for me. I don't think I would wear it out if I weren't with my partner – too much unwanted attention. Otherwise I felt very chic in it!

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to a fancy dinner party, and got a ton of compliments.
links_reviews_text: There is a stretchy striped pattern on the side of the dress that is extremely flattering for some reason. I like the length of this dress because it's not super short but there are slits on the sides too. Felt modern and stylish.

links_reviews_title: I did not end up wearing this dress.
links_reviews_text: I seemed to be between sizes in this dress. It was beautiful and comfy, so I was bummed to not be able to wear it. The 2 was too tight and the 4 bunched up at my hips and I knew I’d be adjusting it all night.

links_reviews_title: I did not wear due to the really high slit.
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear this dress because I was unaware of the really high slit on the side. It would have fit perfectly if it weren't for that. It went to just under my butt so when I moved wrong my butt would show. I am also larger on bottom than top so I am not sure if this played into it. The size up was way to big on top even with adjustable straps.
Cute, stylish and flattering

links_reviews_title: So cute but too small. I'm going to exchange for a bigger size.
links_reviews_text: Super cute style

links_reviews_title: This dress is an absolute head-turner. Fits the curves in all the right places.
links_reviews_text: If you want to wear a bright red curve hugger, this is the dress. It fits true-to-size, so skin-tight on me for an 8 and if I wanted loose a 10 would be that. Don't wear if you like breathing or overeating LOL although it DOES have stretch.
was too small! size up!

It was slightly tight on top, which I expected, but I didn't have to wear a bra and they felt very secure. Not much stretch to the dress, so I wouldn't advise eating a large meal while wearing it. But overall great dress! Sexy but not too revealing. Would rent again but may try a size up.
NOT for pear shaped bodies. It gapped in the middle around my stomach and tugged around the hips.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but not for big boobs :-(
links_reviews_text: This dress has a very slender fit. Unfortunately I could not zip it up.

After reading previous reviews, I ordered up a size (from a 0 to a 2). The dress itself fit, but there was extra material on the hips of the dress which is NOT at all a flattering look. Sadly I will be returning this dress without wearing it.

I have wide hips (see pear shape) it fit great up top with the racerback straps, but the bottom half was just a tad too big. Might rent again for vacation. Size up. Hot dress though, my BF loved it even if it was a rad too tight.
Slightly big in the hips but perfect everywhere Else. Stunning dress!

This dress is gorgeous and unique. The embroidery is amazing. I didn't get to wear it because I found it too bright for the occasion since I was going to a fall wedding. But it would be perfect for a spring and summer event. It fit perfectly and the material was very nice and thicker than you would think. Wish I could have worn it!

links_reviews_title: What an amazing dress! It's exactly what I was looking for.
links_reviews_text: It fit like a glove and was very flattering and comfortable. The only challenge was the length. At 5'2 with 4" heels on, even the petite was several inches too long. I was so thankful that RTR took care of cleaning after dragging the hem through the mud!
Wore this to a semi formal community event. I'm between a 4/6. Only the 4R was avail. I think the 6 would have fit better. Beautiful color and floral print. Length was perfect with heels.

links_reviews_title: I only write reviews for items I truly fall in love with and this one of those items!
links_reviews_text: Wore to a black tie wedding, the color was standout, the details were beautiful, packed in my suitcase well, fabric was high quality, fit was SO flattering and I typically do not wear tight clothes, great for all figures (I'm pear shaped), material was forgiving and heavy so it covered up any imperfections. I felt incredible in this dress. I loved it so much!

links_reviews_title: wore this lovely dress for my Niece's black tie wedding.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit true to size I'm 5'7" and wore 2" heels and the length was perfect. (long when shoes were off) the 6R was true to size and the color was a bit more blue in person but it was lovely!!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a formal Indian wedding!
links_reviews_text: The bright colors and floral design make this dress totally on point for an Indian wedding. The floral appliqué is also very sliming, which never hurts. The fabric is pretty heavy as well so no issues with underwear lines! I got tons of compliments and was able to dance without any fuss. Highly recommend!!!
Not the best pic but this dress really fit all the right places. I had both men and women giving me compliments all night. Felt like a million bucks!

Lightweight fabric made this the perfect choice for a summer, beach-side, black tie wedding. The other gowns I tried were very heavy and warm, but this gown was sleek and just stretchy enough t be especially flattering. Plus I love the color! Photos do not do justice to the brightness of the fuchsia. The floral pattern makes it easy to go out with minimal jewelry. However, I'm an A-cup and had to wear a slightly padded bra to get and ideal fit around the chest.

Wore for a wedding that my husband was the best man. It is a beautiful dress, received lots of compliments. I'm 5'3 and the petite was the perfect length so I could wear flats! I have a small bust and used a stick on bra, worked perfectly. The color is beautiful and stood out while everyone was wearing black and blue. I would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Loved this gown! Unique and fun.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a Black Tie wedding in August and loved it! I received many complements and felt confident all night. The fit was true to size, I am 5' 9" around 138lbs and an A cup, the dress fit like a glove. I was able to ware a basic strapless bra with it and have it not show which was another plus. However, I did order the long and I was disappointed that the dress was a little short even without heels. The fabric was slightly heavy so it was hot for the outdoor portion of the wedding, but comfortable the rest of the night. If you are looking for something fun, different, and formal this is for you!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a formal summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly with 4.5" wedges! I'm only 5'0", and this is the only gown I've rented from RTR that didnt drag on the ground. The dress was comfortable, flattering, and the flowers were super unique. I would definitely rent it again!

I ordered this dress as a backup style as I had concerns that it wouldn't be flattering if I wasn't stick thin and I wasn't sure about the neck line, but I was so wrong! I ended up choosing it for a black tie wedding and received so many compliments throughout the night. It was very comfortable, not too heavy, and just the perfect length for me with 3 inch heels. I would buy this dress in a heartbeat if I had more formal events to attend. It is by far my favorite RTR dress ordered so far.

This was definitely a beautiful dress! It was just waayyy too long. I thought I would be okay since other girls who are maybe an inch taller than me said it was a perfect length in 3 inch heels... I wore my tallest heels (4 inch) but it was still really long. I made it work by kind of bunching up the skirt and holding it up when I walked. The fabric is nice and heavy. I did wear a strapless bra and spanx, just my personal comfort thing, but you definitely don't need to. Also, I ended up wearing the 2 instead of the 4 because the zipper didn't go all the way down in the 4 (like the side seam was sewn over the zipper and I had to call my neighbor to help me take it off over my head!) the 2 fit really nicely and wasn't too snug so it worked out. I would dock it a star because of the above, but it is a really beautiful dress, even more so in person, and it is unique. You will definitely stand out in this dress!

Fit perfectly along my curves, the material was thick enough to hide imperfections but not too thick to where I was uncomfortable. The color stood out and the floral design was more unique then others. It also wasn't too long for my 5'2 frame - wore 3 in heels. I wore a sticky bra but strapless or no bra would work.
Great fit. I am 5'1" and still wore 4" heel with petite. Floral embroidery was great! Love it

links_reviews_title: Made me standout and was comfortable
links_reviews_text: I loves this dress so much .. got many compliments .. it was perfect fit expect for the openenings near arms .. i used fashion tape yo seal the openings towards my chest.. didnt need ro wear a bra., was perfect even though i am a bit larger in my chest. Beautiful dress!

Wow... what a stunning dress. First, the fit. I am 5'2" and 112 lbs athletic build. The 0P worked well for me but if you are muscular around your shoulders and upper arms the neckline is quite snug but it certainly didn't detract from how comfortable the dress was! The material is heavy but hangs beautifully and doesn't cling. The color is so eye catching. I wore a stick-on bra so no lines and it was perfect under this cut of dress. I received so many compliments. HIGHLY recommend!
This dress got compliments all night. It photographed so well. I'm 5'6 for reference, the 7'0 NBA player makes me look teensy. Loved this rental!
Loved wearing this dress.

5'11" and I order the Regular, not the Tall. I have a long torso, so the cut and style of this dress was perfect. Material is thick, somewhat stretchy. High neckline and heavy fabric offered adequate support... did not feel the need for strapless bra, I'm a D cup. Married beachside in Hawaii, so color was perfect.
Beautiful dress. Fit very well. No pressing required

Rented this for a black tie Work function and the compliments didn't stop all night. The color of the dress stands out, but not overwhelming. It's structured so it held everything in nicely and I didn't need to wear a bra. I'm 5,3" and wore roughly 4 inch heels and it was a great length. Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: A beautiful gown destined for compliments!
links_reviews_text: I really wish this dress came in a 0L. I wore the 2L and it was a bit big for me under the arms. I am 5'11" so I could not wear my tallest heels with the dress but the 2L was surprisingly long enough. I received many compliments and felt really comfortable in the dress.

This dress was amazing, I got so many compliments. Accidentally rented the 4L instead of the 4R so I had to pin up the hem, but other than that it fit like a glove. Rent this dress you will not regret it!
This dress fits like a glove! So flattering and the color is bright and fun. Got tons of compliments!

The color was much darker than shown, more of a magenta, but I actually loved the color more in person. 5'7" so with 4" heels the dress just touched the floor. I didn't trip once or feel the need to pick up my dress to walk or dance. I typically wear a 6, so I rented a 6L and it fit perfectly. It was very comfortable to dance in all night, just a heavier material than anticipated. Hugged in all the right places! Would definitely wear this again!

links_reviews_title: I loved the color! There wasn't anyone else at the wedding in that color.
links_reviews_text: The fit, length, style, and color of the dress are so pretty. It felt like the dress was made for me. It was a little hot to dance in all night but it was easy to move in and didn't lose its shape or wrinkle no matter how many time I sat down or got up and dance.

This is such a beautiful dress, I wish I didn't have to return it. It fits so nicely and I love the halter cut neck line. The fabric is a great (heavier) quality on top of the lining. It drapes nicely and I don't think this is supposed to be a super tight fitted dress because there was still room for me around the chest and waist without looking baggy. Thank god I got the petit size- I am 5'3" and wore flats to this wedding and it had just a nice drape on the ground without letting me feel like I was dragging. I was able to dance all night and I don't think I've ever received so many compliments. Definitely a show stopper!

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear but would have if I didn't love the BCBG dress more! This dress is beautiful!!!
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear but would have if I didn't love the BCBG dress more! This dress is beautiful!!! - this was an extra backup style. It is absolutely lovely...flows perfectly, skims the body, super flattering halter neck, beautiful embroidered flower pattern, stunning and unique color, really a standout. Would absolutely rent again for the right occasion. Runs a bit long (I am 5'2") and fit into the 2P but I also wear 5-6 inch heels with it so it worked out nicely for me. If you are shorter and are not wearing at least a 5" heel, you might have a problem with the length, even with the petite size(s) so beware of that. Also the 2P had a little bit of give, it could have been tighter on me - maybe a 0.
This was gorgeous! I have a small chest but used tape. Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful embroidery and color palette! Forgiving and not too sheer.
links_reviews_text: At 5'6", 32C, and 117lbs w/ broad shoulders and very slender hips the 0R fit me very comfortably and accentuated my shoulders. It is TTS and the embroidered flowers are quite beautiful. The colors are really very beautiful. Elegant and whimsical w/ a forgiving liner that allows for undergarments. I did not need a bra as the flowers were strategically placed.

links_reviews_title: Very unique dress! Got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Flatters your figure, unique floral designs! Loved the classy yet boho look. Wish I could've kept the dress!

links_reviews_title: The dress is truly unique and beautiful. More purple than pink. I felt very elegant all night long!
links_reviews_text: Such a lovely dress! I wanted to wear something that would stand out, and this dress did the trick. Perfect for the wedding I attended, which was black tie optional. Overall, the dress fit very well; I wore a regular ol' strapless bra with it. My only complaint is that the neckline felt a bit irritating, because the dress is heavier than it looks. Nonetheless, I enjoyed the weight of the dress, as it truly felt like I was wearing a gown as I twirled around all night!

links_reviews_title: It was an Army formal event.
links_reviews_text: There was some drama the day before the event because the 6R & 8R were not available to ship in this gown so I was sent some others to try that didn't work at all. The 6P became available that evening so RTR overnighted it to me and it was actually perfect. The bodice was snug enough I didn't need to wear a bra and the length surprisingly turned out great even though I'm a little over the height that is considered petite.

I received so many compliments on this dress. I went to an indoor wedding over Memorial Day weekend, probably would have been too heavy for an outdoor wedding in the summer. I'm 5'2" so had to wear tall wedges with the R. I had originally rented another dress by the same designer but the fit wasn't as good and I ended up liking this one better anyways!

This dress is pretty heavy but so lovely! I wore the 4P, I am 5'4, 130#, 34/28/34, 34B. I wore one of those sticky bras that don't go all the way around the back and it gave just enough lift; without a bra I felt and looked a bit flattened. I wore a thick 4" heel and it just barely skimmed the ground. I got a lot of compliments and it was very comfortable. The cut of the top is very flattering and the gown skims versus clings. The fuchsia is really nice and not too "LOOK AT ME" but still gets attention of course. Highly recommend this dress!
This was a very comfortable dress. The fit was perfect. I loved the details on it.

I was worried about how this would fit, since I rented this for prom, but it was perfect! It was incredibly flattering and stood out against all the other dresses. I'm 5'6" and 120 lbs and the 0 Regular was the perfect size. The fabric is really high quality and the dress was super comfortable. Would definitely recommend!
Hit perfectly! I felt beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Great easy to wear, and warm, dress!
links_reviews_text: This was great! I wore to a daytime event. Was warm in NYC winter. Tight fitting on top but didn't feel constricting. Loved the dark maroon color. Very comfortable and expensive looking.

links_reviews_title: Compliments all night!! Loved the fit, the fun cutouts, and the color.
links_reviews_text: This dress really is great! It fit very well. Only caution: the material is thick, and it isn't super easy to get on (especially if you don't have someone who can zip it for you #single) but, it's worth the work! The cutouts provide a cute detail and also give it a great silhouette. It's a great warm winter dress that is still sexy and fun. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a fun work event!
links_reviews_text: I had a work event that I wore this for and it was PERFECT! The event was fun and flirty and that's exactly how this dress is! The cutouts are super cute and adds a little extra something to the dress. I loved it! It was tight on my arms so be warned if you have bigger arms!

I love this dress! It's pretty heavy, so great for fall/winter and the cutouts add just a little "umph" to it. For other pear shaped girls like me: this is a fit and flare, but doesn't flare out as high up as I would prefer, so have some Spanx handy! Would definitely rent again.

I wore this to a holiday work party. The dress is stretchy and made of a thick material which made it extremely easy to wear. It is fairly fitted around the waist and has cutouts here so shape wear isn't really an option. It was warm enough to wear in December while still being cute. Got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Warm, wine colored cut out fun
links_reviews_text: My boyfriend picked this out for me to wear to his bday dinner and he enjoyed it much more than me. The quality of the garment was amazing: loved the color and the heaviness (warmth) of the fabric for winter. I'm not a fan of turtlenecks and found this mock to be a tad constricting, but if they're your thing, you'll love this dress!

links_reviews_title: Loved the material. Perfect for a cold NYC valentines date
links_reviews_text: Loved the thick material. Very form fitting and slim. The BF loved it!

Equally fun and elegant, burgundy dress with peek-a-boo tummy cut outs. Great for a party where it's ok to show some unconventional flesh. The fit was mostly true to size although the shoulders and bust area are a tad on the narrow side. If I bought this dress, I'd probably buy the large and have it tailored to my shape. I wore tights with the dress and the top of the tights did occasionally peek through the cut outs. This didn't bother me that much, but FYI

links_reviews_title: This has been my favorite rent to date!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. It was comfy. It was even warm because the material was thicker, which was great for a 10/31 wedding. I got lots of compliments all day long. 10/10 would rent again. Absolutely been my favorite dress so far.

links_reviews_title: Super fun party dress for winter!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my 30th birthday dinner (& surprise party!). It was super cute and fit great! The cut outs around the waist give it a sexy feel but the higher neck and long sleeves keep it classy. The material is thick and warm perfect for a winter occasion. I am around 5'8 and the medium came to mid thigh so not super short. I wore it with tights because of the weather but it would be cute for a fall event/wedding with no tights too. Highly recommend and would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great party dress for the dead of winter.
links_reviews_text: I rented this to celebrate my 30th birthday in. I live in Boston, and we were in the middle of a snow storm, so I was glad the dress had long sleeves and a mock neck. The material is a bit thicker as well, but not quite a sweater dress knit. The material is stretchy, which is good because it's quite tight. I'm pretty slender and had a hard time getting it over my shoulders and it was quite fitted on the arms. I'm often a 2 or xs in dresses, but I wore a small in this. I wish I had gotten the medium as my back up size, but the small fit well enough in the end. Still, I would recommend if you size up--the cut outs made for a fun party dress while still keeping me from freezing.

I absolutely loved this dress. It was perfect for a winter outdoor wedding and I got a ton of compliments! I also really loved the cutouts. I rented both the XS and S and went with the XS. It was a little snug, but the small was definitely too big for me. Definitely recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to ring in the new year! Got lots of compliments, great color.
links_reviews_text: This dress had really nice material, was slightly ribbed and appeared to look like a high quality sweater, but was thicker and less cotton-y than a sweater. Liked the fit up top. I'm 5'3" and the sleeves were a good length (someone taller could definitely wear the small though). The sleeves on the medium were definitely too large for me. One issue I ran into was wearing tights with this dress. As you can see in the picture, I pulled up the tights above the cutouts. I was disappointed I had to do this, but the dress fit quite snugly around my waist and was unflattering if I had kept the tights below the cutouts. I'd recommend not wearing tights with this dress if you can.
I wore this dress to a Nashville birthday party. The fabric is thick and high quality. I received many compliments!

I wore this to my nieces bat mitzvah (and no Santa didn't attend the party!!) This is a great dress for any fall/holiday event! I wanted a size Small but they only had XS left, very tight (fits true to size) and form fitting! Cutouts made the whole dress and the color is a very rich wine color!! Overall amazing dress!!

A fun dress. Definitely a darker red than it appears in photos and like folks have said, a heavy, inflexible material. The fit was quite snug, to the point where it made me feel self-conscious about the cutouts at my waist. Going up a size helped me feel less bulgy but didn't fit well through my arms and shoulders, so I stuck with the XS. Not ideal for someone with a short torso, but it worked!
I worn this dress for a date and my boyfriend complimented the dress a few times! The color looks good on me and it looks like a very expensive winter dress. Warm, comfortable, I want to buy one!

I loved the scalloped edges on this dress. The cutouts in the waist were a cute touch. I rented the S & M and wore the S. The medium had some extra material under my arms and around the waist. The small fit like a glove and went very well with black tights for a perfect fall birthday dress.

Super fun dress! I loved the fabric, which has a nice weight, the zipper in the back, and the detailing. I wore it twice! The cut-outs on the skirt did catch on cabinet hardware continuously though throughout the day.
I rented it in the medium which was a bit big but its really great fabric, i would def rent again but in a small!

The fabric on the dress is heavy and perfect for a cold evenjng. The dress was very comfortable and moved easily. I paired it with black suede over the knee boots. The cutout details at the waistline attracted attention and i received lots of compliments.
I loved the fit and the cutouts at the bottom/midsection. I wore a tank under it to cover up for work though.
The fabric is so nice and thick. Great for winter, it's quite snug - very form fitting but can get just a little uncomfortable around the neck. Overall, I love this and will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and stylish. Great for the holidays.
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a holiday dinner. The cutout details were cute without being too revealing. Would definitely rent again.
The small and medium fit me - I ended up wearing the small because it stretched over my shoulders and chest (where it was the tightest) so that it would fit snugly on my midsection

This dress came to me brand new with the tags on! It is so flattering for a smaller waist and larger butt/thighs. Love how it's conservative up top, but shows a little skin around the midriff. I got a medium, but definitely could have worn a small. It's a stretchy material and super comfortable. Would definitely rent again.
I'm too old for this style but it's flattering, comfy, true-to-size, and cute.
I thought the thickness of the fabric would make this hang, but it kind of rode up my curvier areas and was too small

I rented this dress for a holiday party. Although, it arrived late (after my party), I would not have worn it even if it had arrived on time. I rented the size Small, which was very tight. I am usually a Size 4-6, but I would definitely recommend sizing up in this dress. Additionally, I felt that it looked more like a cheer-leading uniform than a cocktail dress, since the material was thick and somewhat stretchy. Overall, I would not recommend.

links_reviews_title: Heavy enough for winter, but cute details
links_reviews_text: Perfect for New Years dinner and party. Heavy enough for winter, but the cutouts make it fun.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for Christmas dinner, or Valentines day. Very flattering!
links_reviews_text: The large was perfect for my broad shoulders. It was loose everywhere else, but worth it to not feel so unable to raise my arms. Plain top takes accessories well. Thick, quality material with tons of stretch.
I didn't wear this dress. It just didn't fit quite right and wasn't comfortable. Also it was pretty long on me (I'm pretty short- 5' 1")

links_reviews_title: Cut outs are far lower than they appear
links_reviews_text: Typically a 10 and got the L. The top was too big (but I have a small chest) so the cut outs were basically at my belly button; not flattering which is a shame because the material is very high quality.
Couldn't even put it on. The fabric is tight and doesn't stretch.
Sleeves are kind of long but easy to roll up and still really cute

links_reviews_title: Easy process for rent and return
links_reviews_text: Thick fabric perfect for cold weather. The fit cutting makes you look toned up! Be aware of the hollow design around wait line to breath in and look skinny!
Beautiful luxe dress with sexy cut outs. Conservative and sexy.
This was a great piece! Fit true to size and has a great fit and flare aspect to it. The material is a little heavier than I expected.

I wore this to church for Christmas. I rented a medium and a large as back up; I wore the medium. The large was too baggy. I have really long arms and the sleeves on this dress were too short but I was prepared for that. great rental otherwise!

This dress is a cery thick fabric good for cold weather. Fit was a little tight in the chest, but fit great everywhere else. I love the little cut outs in the middle. They hit at just the right place, that i wasnt self conscious sitting and eating dinner in the dress.
Unique top. Well lined. Not itchy. It's not the most flattering- it's thick and slightly boxy- but it stands out and looks great in photos. Definitely better for fall and winter.

links_reviews_title: Festive top with room for holiday eating
links_reviews_text: This top is fun and sparkly but fits more like a sweatshirt so there's plenty of room for indulging in holiday cookies. I wore an XS and had leggings on the bottom. There are ties on the arms that came undone a few times which was annoying for holiday prep and clean up. The color was nice and it was comfortable.
Wearing sequins are not always comfortable. But this top is so comfortable! I'm not sure it was the most flattering because of how square the fit is, but I was comfortable in it!

links_reviews_title: A bit of sparkle in winter
links_reviews_text: I thought this was cute top for an afternoon at the theater. It's made of heavy material and an excellent option for winter while still adding that bit of sparkle. However, it does run on the larger side- I would size down.

I loved how this top was feminine and also super trendy! The material is pretty heavy, but I actually really like that because the top laid perfectly the whole time I was wearing it. It does fit true to size, but I'd recommend sizing down for your backup size.

Didn't wear this top. It wasn't too small/large, it fit but was very boxy up top which made my shoulders look wide (shape is off), and the sleeves!! The sleeves are soo strange. Couldn't tie them at all, so heavy and long. I don't know how you function with them!

links_reviews_title: The material as gorgeous and the sleeves were fun!
links_reviews_text: Others were right about the weight of this top, very heavy. I paired it with white pants and wore for NYE. Great top.

links_reviews_title: Great color; sequin straps impossible to tie
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear-- arm ties impossible

I liked this top and am glad that I wore it to a function in Colorado in December; the material is very, very heavy. I would not recommend wearing this if it isn't pretty cold outside. I did receive plenty of compliments and the sequins are actually more subtle than you would expect from a sequined top. One thing to note is that the sleeve ties are moderately annoying and would get in the way if you were sitting at a table.

links_reviews_title: Had a great time at the party.
links_reviews_text: I got M and L I went with the large though the medium also fit pretty well. I paid it with dark, skinny jeans and heels. The top looked fantastic with the jeans and I got a ton of compliments, people kept coming up and wanting to touch it. Things to be aware of: 1. the back is low. Wear a low cut bra in the back or no bra. I kept checking to make sure mine wasn't showing. 2. The ties at the wrists can be tiresome. I ended up looping them twice around my wrists and then putting them in a bow. They can be long. 3. Finally, the straight hem on the bottom can be awkward. I ended up with the jeans because so much did not pair well with it and made me look very heavy at the hip. Overall though I really did like it and may end up purchasing it.

links_reviews_title: fun sparkles with a cool wrist detail
links_reviews_text: Overall it was a great top. the sequins laid nice and flat and the color was great. It's fully lined which is a pro & con. It made it comfortable, but HOT. Also, because of the lining I kept pulling the waist so the lining and the sequin layer would lay flat together. The wrist bows are cute and the whole top was fun, flattering and work & play appropriate.

links_reviews_title: Cute but I returned it before wearing bc it was too big.
links_reviews_text: This shirt runs large. Body was loose and the sleeves hung far down my hand. Ties at the wrist were very big.
I'm returning this for a smaller size because It runs big. Im usually a size M because of my breast and still this was bigger for my full bust

links_reviews_title: Pretty, thick good quality material, runs small or true, not large
links_reviews_text: I am a size M normally, and because so many other reviews said it ran small, I ordered a M and S and unfortunately the M was even too small and so I couldn't wear this for New Years. I also thought it would be more light and thin material. It was very thick and so you need the larger size for some flow.

The color and style were exactly what I was looking for. Unfortnately, it seems that this piece had been rented a few too many times. While I'm sure it was terrific as a new item, it just looked messy by the time it came to me. Sad that I didn't get the chance to enjoy it.
Beautiful top. I was bummed when it didnt come with the sleeve ties. Fit well and was comfortable.
I did not wear, but it is a beautiful piece. Very heavy. Was not flattering on me. I recommend to size down. I rented a small, should have went XS
Such a cute top but it was huge on me so I returned it

It was a lot heavier than I expected and the sleeves were cumbersome and distracting. I found them annoying enough not to wear it. They were a bit long for me and the top ran a bit large overall so I felt a bit swallowed so I chose not to wear it. I think a smaller size with the right bottom it would be a blast to wear.

links_reviews_title: I liked it so much I rented it twice!
links_reviews_text: Cute top that transitions from day to night easily. I actually rented it last year and this year too, and it comes in other colors which I would also try.
This blouse can be a little low in the back so tricky with bra. I found a bra that lined up perfectly. It has nice detail in the back.

links_reviews_title: Cute top, runs a little big
links_reviews_text: Cute top but runs maybe a touch too big, but I kind of like that it hung loosely. Only downside was it hung too low in the back for a regular bra. Overall cute and easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty top with a very low back
links_reviews_text: I wanted this top to work for me. The style is great and it would have made a great boho-look, but the back was too low for a bra and putting a tube or tank under seemed to kill it for me. If you don't need a bra, it's a gorgeous summer shirt.
Loved this tank! Under my arms was a little tight so if I rent again I would definitely size up.
too big.

This is my second time renting this top, I've actually lost a little weight so I should have sized down to the 4 but the 6 was still a true to size fit and flattering. I love the ruffle detail over the chest and the lower back line - it makes it a perfect date night top for hot summer nights. I did it with skinny jeans and block heels and a fun patterned purse, it also looks great with white jeans. I have a short torso so I would say this is a longer top, I wouldn't plan to wear it with shorts or a skirt.

links_reviews_title: cute, but fit a little big
links_reviews_text: I normally wear an 8 or 10 in tops, I went with the suggested size in this case, which was a 10 and it was slightly big. I was still able to wear it and it was cute, but the back part sort of pulls down in the back (from the weight of the fabric), meaning the front rode up a little bit.
This top is perfect for many occasions because you can dress it up or down. I will definitely be renting again.

links_reviews_title: The nice ruffled tail in the back .
links_reviews_text: Cons : straps keep fell off my shoulders at times.
The straps were a little long but i wore without a bra and it looked great.
Actually long enough for a blouse, loved the fit, materials and especially the details on the back. Would buy.

It runs big! I'm definitely an apple shape and a 12 was too big for me. It also runs kind of short in the front (which I think is intended), so it doesn't do much in the way of covering anything up in the front.
I loved the top, the straps were a little long so I kept having to pull them up after they'd fall off my shoulders - but it was still a great top!
Best to be worn with pants as the back draping goes longer than shorts.
Fairly boring but nice shape. True to size

Definitely a simple shirt to wear for night out. Straps were a little loose on me but I think it's due to my broad shoulders. Anyway cute for night out, better for summer vs. the Boston weather I chose it for. Would rent again!
Cute flowy tank for date night, need low cut bra because hangs low on the back. Loved it!
Really loved this top. Recommend sizing down.
Cute top. Very basic. The straps were about an extra much too long for my shoulders but I wore a black tank under it and it worked perfect. Looks great with jeans .
Very comfortable to wear
This top is nice, and fit well enough, but I ended up wearing something else. The "tail" might bother some people, especially if you're wearing a jacket. It might poke out in the back.

links_reviews_title: Wasn't fussy and was able to relax and have fun the whole evening.
links_reviews_text: Super comfy and cute, was a one time wear for me.
This top was great, very versatile and fun to wear, would rent again!
Tight around arms
Good

links_reviews_title: Wish I would have kept it
links_reviews_text: Very versatile top, definitely runs on the more forgiving side but I didn't mind. I paired it with fitted black and white gingham pants and heeled sandals for a day at the office. Would rent it again or in the other colors it comes in

links_reviews_title: Loved the style but fit was too boxy
links_reviews_text: Cute everyday top but it runs a little large and looks too boxy on me

links_reviews_title: Perfect top for a summer night out!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for my sister's bachelorette. Paired with skinny jeans and wedges. I didn't need a bra (34C) thanks to the ruffles on the front! Loved the details and low!

links_reviews_title: Back cape was the highlight of the item!
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Good for work with a sweater/blazer. Day to night statement top

links_reviews_title: Little black tank with a twist
links_reviews_text: Classic silhouette with unexpected details. The ruffles at the bust and down the back are perfectly proportioned. The darts made it fit very well without a bra (I'd recommend sizing for anyone larger than a B cup).
This fit very well but you CAN NOT wear a bra with it. Even a strapless one showed.

I wore this for a date night with my boyfriend and he loved it! I'm normally a 6 but the 4 fit perfectly. It's not a very stand-out top until you turn around. The draping in the back is extremely flattering.

This was very comfortable, and I didn't need a bra because of the loose top layer of fabric. It looked boxy with shorts so I had to wear it with long pants for the right looks. The back is pretty low cut, so I could not have worn a bra if I wanted to.
Just added too much weight to my frame, didn't wear.
This top was really beautiful, but could not wear without a bra, and the back is too low for most straps

links_reviews_title: Cute, but the back was a bit much
links_reviews_text: The waitress told me she liked my tail. Only wore it once. a little shorter in the back, and this would be perfect.

links_reviews_title: This was effortlessly elegant but still very fun a night on the town!
links_reviews_text: Very convenient in the sense that it does not require an adhesive bra or anything of that sort. It was covering enough that I could just wear a regular strapless bra. Fun and flirty but not too revealing!
I liked this top and the quality was nice

This is a great top and you could even size down - I am a 34B and had room in the bust area and wouldve preferred a smaller size although the 6 wasnt super baggy. This is great paired back to statement earrings or dressed down with jeans for the weekend.
Perfect for a nice dinner out in Vegas that transitioned to a club!

links_reviews_title: Sexier on than I would have liked, but overall lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Loved the outfit, but it didn't look as sexy as it actually is on the model and reviews. It fit great, just shows a lot. Wore it to a nice dinner and club but I was covering my chest with the menu at dinner due to feeling a tad too revealed. It was perfect for the bar after standing up and dancing but sitting at dinner it was more open.

links_reviews_title: The jumper was so different, it was a little revealing. I did love it for the Hamptons!
links_reviews_text: I did wear a black strapless bra that was visible at times depending on how I moved. It was a unique outfit and am happy that I included it in my vacation wardrobe.

This was such an easy romper to feel beautiful in. I didn't wear a bra. I never felt uncomfortable about anything popping out. I drank and danced and felt beautiful all night. Got a ton of compliments.
This romper was FABULOUS! Wore it for a UGA Gameday in Athens. Super comfortable, ran true to size. All around great rental!

links_reviews_title: Great outfit and I felt great wearing it!
links_reviews_text: It is short but so am I so that worked perfectly! I used a broach to secure the front of it because I knew I would be dancing a lot and didn't want any wardrobe malfunctions. Overall I was super happy with the quality and fit and would definitely rent it again!

I got this as a back-up style for a bachelorette weekend in Nashville. It is very sexy and cute, but the center did split very noticeably on me as I am fuller in the chest. I'd suggest pinning it to keep it closed. Also, I had some difficulty with the back zipper as it zips quite high.

Great form fitting little black number!!! Very short... i wore with tennis shoes and or flat sandals but could easily be dressed up with some heels! Love it! Fit was perfect but May order a size up next time to see if it offers a bit more length in the shorts.

links_reviews_title: Super sexy. Not the best fit.
links_reviews_text: For anyone with a large chest this may be difficult to wear. Got a lot of compliments but had to keep adjusting all night to pull the straps up so that I wouldn't show too much cleavage. Maybe a size 2 would've been better.
Perfect fit and style.

I wanted this to work so much better than it did :( the bust is not made for all sizes. I thought I had a pretty run of the mill size but the neckline was really baggy and I felt insecure in it all night. Even adding a strapless bra wasn't enough (plus it would've been visible). The top half was just not made for me.

links_reviews_title: Sexy but not comfy for Apples
links_reviews_text: This was a sexy little outfit but it was too tight in my waste as an apple shaped gal, so i only wore it for 2 hours. If i got a size up, it may have been big everywhere else. Also, had to pin the opening. Its way more revealing than the model pic shows.

I am tall (5'8) so I'm glad I had the size up. There is only one stitch at the top of the cutout keeping it from pulling over further. I had to tape it because otherwise the stitch would show. Other than that, it was so fun to wear. Very soft and thick fabric which is lined. I wore it in Vegas and it was perfect!

links_reviews_title: Incredibly flattering and sexy. Great for small chested ladies with a big butt!
