links_reviews_text: I wore this romper for my 30th Bday as well as a year later for a Bachelorette. I was able to fit in the size 6 as well, but found moving around in the 8 to be more comfortable (140 lbs). I'm athletic build with a small chest (size 4) and large butt (size 8), so finding a great fit is tough - this romper is perfect!

links_reviews_title: I had the best time in this outfit!
links_reviews_text: I loved everything about this outfit. It was comfortable but chic. I paired it with leopard print heels and simple gold jewelry and felt like a million dollars. There are two openings, a larger one over the stomach and one right in the middle of your chest. My nu-bra has a clasp in the front so I had to keep in unclasped so you couldn't see it. Not a problem just an observation. Would definitely order this one again!

links_reviews_title: Great for night out for bachelorette party. Flattering but comfortable at the same time.
It was the PERFECT outfit for going out! I was the center of attention.
links_reviews_text: It fit absolutely perfect.

links_reviews_title: Great fabric, cute style, awkward fit
links_reviews_text: I was really looking forward to this romper. It was a great, breathable and comfortable fabric. The issue I had with this is that the romper wasn't supportive enough to wear without a bra, and when I put a strapless bra on, you could see through the opening in the front. I tried taping the romper, but inevitably my bra was visible as I went about my night. I'd like to say I'd rent it again, but it's no fun tugging at your outfit all evening.

links_reviews_title: Fun, comfortable great fit even for short girls
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loooved this romper! I wore it to my HS reunion that was going to be an outdoor TX BBQ Party. I loved the material which gave the garment structure but was comfortable and cool enough to dance and move about with ease. It was extremely flattering showing off the shoulders and legs of course! I used a regular strapless bra without it showing. I highly recommended this !

links_reviews_title: I was a showstopper at my gig
links_reviews_text: I love wearing sexy clothes when I play shows (I'm a solo artist, and play with a band), but it's hard to find stuff that I can look good in and move well in. This romper did the trick for a mid-summer gig. The material is thicker than I thought (it would have been perfect for an outdoor party, but I was a bit hot on stage), and I longed for a pocket to store my guitar pics, but it looked amazing and felt great.

Fun romper! Loved wearing it and fit perfectly. I didn't have any issues with the keyhole but I am very small chested. Anyone with a larger chest may. Just enough sass with still being very classy. Perfect for a night out of dancing. Would rent again! Felt great in this
This romper was comfortable and cute. You can't wear a bra with it and the seam gives you a little of a madonnaesque form if you don't fill it out completely.
Loved this! I needed a belt I felt like since my torso is so short. Little under boob sometimes but was flattering, comfortable, and would recommend!

I got so many compliments on this romper! It is one of my favorite items I have rented over the past years and I wish I owned it. The sizing is very true. It is structured so I did not have to wear a bra with it. I would totally rent this again!!

I wore this to Vegas for a friend's 30th birthday. A little more skin than I would usually show but it was a perfect alternative for the typical sequin Vegas dress! I am usually a size 2 but sized up and I'm glad I did. It fit like a glove and was high quality material. A fun piece for a fun night!
Great simple black romper!
So comfortable and perfect for every occasion!

Fit true to size and so incredibly comfortable. The silk lining is amazing so I didn't wear a bra. Shorts length was slightly longer than expected (I was wearing it for Vegas so hoping for a little shorter) but if you're in just about any other setting it's a normal length. Will definitely rent it again!
Fit well, sometimes rompers don't always work on me, but this one did. I wore bare lifts tape for a bra. I was really comfortable all day.

links_reviews_title: Constant compliments! Perfect piece for a semi-formal occasion.
links_reviews_text: I wish I'd gotten a better photo of me wearing this, but I was so busy having fun in it, the idea never occurred to me! I was struggling with what to wear to my law school's "semi-formal" until I found the perfect balance between fun and sophisticated in this comfortable romper. Only drawbacks I can think of is that it does not at all hug your butt. So, if your looking to emphasize that area of your body, go with something else. Also, I can imagine it would run tight in the chest for anyone with a cup-size of a C and beyond. If you don't identify with either of these concerns, rent away!

This romper fit like a dream. I have a larger bust but didn't need a bra, the romper did all the work to hold everything in nicely. And it was surprisingly comfortable! I dressed it up with some wedges but this would be cute with a more casual shoe and a jacket as well. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Perfect night out outfit for Vegas!
links_reviews_text: The material on the inside is satin and feels really nice, although I have long legs and it did feel a little short. I would have bought this piece, yet another RTR I fell in love with!! Can't wait to try out another!

Cannot say enough how much I loved this romper. I'm right between a 4 and 6 depending on fit and the 6 was perfect. No bra necessary. The middle clip was broken but it wasn't an issue at all. Amazing fun romper, lots of compliments all night long. So flattering!!
This romper fit perfectly & was perfect for the occasion (reunion). Very comfy & easy to move in!

I am so obessed with this romper I wore for a Bacherlorette party. Both the 4 and the 6 looked great. The 6 though was loose in the open area in the front, which made me feel uncomfortable seeing as you could see side bookin the center. The 4 made me feel uhhh-mazing! I ate, dranka nd dance all night feeling great. Bonus - I didn't have to wear a bra. I am going to be renting this again for sure!

links_reviews_title: Second Time Renting. Love it. Day or Night
links_reviews_text: Runs true to size. This is my second time renting (I wore it to a football tailgate). It was not too hot and it did not ride up at all. The first time I rented I wore a 2 and wore it downtown to bars. This time I wore the 4. I had to bobby pin the keyhole to not show off my boobs. But you couldn't tell and it looked wonderful.

links_reviews_title: Easy outfit for a night out!
links_reviews_text: I had to wear the larger size only because the size 6 was too short ( was a bit too cheeky for my body). The middle strap that held the two sides to a small keyhole was actually torn BUT it made it better in my opinion! have a small chest so it was still flattering without being too revealing!

This romper was so fun to style and wear. It's subtly sexy, but simple enough that you can really play it up with your styling. I wore it in Nashville with a statement belt and booties, and I felt really cool and comfortable all night. Such a great, versatile addition to any wardrobe - I would've loved to keep this one!

links_reviews_title: Such a fun and flattering romper!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a bachlorette and am obsessed, I would love to purchase this. It was super comfortable and I got lots of compliments. Fit - I don't think girls taller than 5'5" would be able to wear this and have it hit at a reasonable length. I ordered the size 0 and 2. I normally wear a size 0 and that was way too small, I couldn't zip it all the way. The two was still a little tight so I would order 1-2 sizes up to be safe. Other than that it was a perfect fit!
A bit big in the chest for my a cup, but I've had that problem with this designer before. fit great everywhere else. It does gape when sitting down so you'll need a safety pin

Rented it for my brother's graduation. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was because the shape of the dress doesn't adjust well to different sizes. I felt in some of the pictures it looked very boxy based on the angle.

links_reviews_title: The wedding was beautiful and the bride was stunning. My dress was perfect for the affair.
links_reviews_text: The dress fits true to size and the long flowing style is elegant and comfortable. I love the flower print and the chiffon like fabric. I’ll be wearing it for my wedding anniversary this weekend too!
I cannot say enough good things about this dress. The print is even more beautiful in person and it's so flattering. I got tons of compliments and thought about buying it afterward!
Flattering and feminine. Top shoulder a bit tight.
This was such a lovely, light dress for a June Graduation ceremony.
I liked but did not LOVE this dress. I was hoping it would be a bit more forgiving, especially around the waist, but it was pretty tight throughout.
I wanted to love this dress but beware if you are a pear shape. It did not fit over my hips and butt. The spaghetti strap was also super big and not adjustable. I could not wear.

Perfect dress for a baptism. Overall fit really well. I liked the slip underneath, it created nice coverage. The only part that didn't fit well was the spaghetti strap, it was slightly too big and fell off my shoulder. I got many compliments on this dress, especially on the color.

This dress was so beautiful! I wore it with 5 inch heels and the length was perfect. It has a slim fit through the hips and butt so I wore the bigger size for comfort while sitting. The top was a tad big but was able to wear a strapless bra with the dress which made the fit perfect. This was my first time using RTR and the whole process was wonderful! Can't wait to rent from them again.
This dress is extremely and flattering. It was a little snug for me in my hips but overall still a great fit. 👌🏽

Ok. This dress is GORGEOUS. BUT! In 5 inch heels it was still too long as weee the straps. The bodice is tight too. I couldn't wear a bra with it and gave me pancake boobs. Which I was ok with but it really was right and loose straps. Not a good look.
Loved wearing this dress! Was a tad long with 4inch heals. Straps for slightly long. It is a great thick material. Such an amazing dress for dancing!
Love the spaghetti strap top. Big plus: can be worn workout a bra, no prob. Fabric has very little give, though, so maybe size up if looking for a backup.

At 5’7” with 4” heels this dress was 1/2” off the floor which made it great to walk in. The top half is fitted which makes bending over and moving while seated challenging. The bottom is not as full as pictured but it moves beautifully when you walk. My one issue with the dress is that the bust has no support or cups which made it a bit uncomfortable towards the end of the night.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress - great fit, elegant, chic.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me perfectly and I am sad to send it back! It is fitted through the chest, waist and hips, and it makes your butt look amazing :) I am 5'8 and was wearing 2.5 inch heels - the hem hit 1-2" above the ground in heels. I didn't wear any bra and it was completely fine (I am a C cup). The back is a bit low cut so plan on a backless bra if you need one. The full skirt is really beautiful when you walk, lots of movement to it. The fabric has a nice weight which helps hold the structure. The dress is a great combo of elegant and sexy, understated but still beautiful and special. Chic!

I wore this dress to a Black Tie Optional wedding and I thought it was perfect. Very elegant, but simple enough that I didn't feel over the top. The fabric is thick and very comfortable to wear without feeling heavy or hot. There is no give in the fabric and the waist/ribs were definitely sung so I would size up if you're in-between sizes. My only complaint is that I wish it had come in a long option. I'm 5'11" and the dress was about 2 inches off the floor.

links_reviews_title: Stunning and simple, this dress has just enough spice to keep things interesting!
links_reviews_text: I went through four sizes with this dress! It’s important for anyone with wide hips (especially pear shaped girls) to know that this dress does run smaller in the hips area, and so if you want it to fit perfectly you should go up a size. Aside from fitting struggles, this dress was elegant and understated. I got so many compliments on how classy I looked, and would suggest this dress for any sort of formal/work affair.
The fit was spot on and it was good material!

links_reviews_title: Dress was wonderful and perfect for the occasion!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress! The straps were a bit loose for my frame and the dress a tad bit too long (maybe I should have worn taller heels.) I'm 5'1" and curvy, so it was tighter around the hips, but it actually hugged my curves perfectly. I only wish that the straps were adjustable because I had to use safety pins to keep them in place. Other than that, it was a beautiful dress and was a hit overall!

links_reviews_title: Truly a striking dress!!!! People literally stopped and asked me about it!
links_reviews_text: Fit was tight, but that is because I'm typically a size 4. The 2 was the only size available, so we made it work, but this dress is definitely true to size, so order your normal size ;) It was truly striking and a perfect length. Got complements all night!

The 4R fit great - 5’6 and received many compliments. The only difference between the 2R and 4R was additional room in the waist, the top and bust area fit the same for both dresses. Slightly shorter than expected so wore flats. Loved the material and comfortable. Would recommend!

I used a consultant in NY to help me find the dress for a black tie wedding. Everyone, including people that I didn't know, complimented on how elegant the dress looked on me. Fabric is a little on the heavy side but didn't bother me too much.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so flattering and perfect for the event I went to :)
links_reviews_text: It fit very nice and I loved the bottom how it flowed out but I was still able to walk in it

Loved this dress and got so many compliments (especially for a black dress). I'm 5'1 and 110lbs and wore the 2R. I wore 4 inch heels but still had to be careful about tripping over the front. I am a 32dd so I used pasties and lots of fashion tape to keep the top in place. The straps were very long and fell down a bit, I secured the neckline with fashion-tape and everything stayed in place even through lots of dancing.
right now Im like 133 lbs and dress was super tight, but I love the way it looks, I used flats because with my 4" heels it looks short to me ,

links_reviews_title: Rented this for an award gala event.
links_reviews_text: Runs small, I am 122 lbs and 5.4 h I am wearing a size 2 and used the size 6R it fit perfect including the length just the straps were a little loose for me but not a big deal. Excellent dress quality fits right and comfortable

Ended up not wearing-- while the cut was flattering, it was a bit stiff and was the type of dress I felt like I wouldn't have been able to move around in. This was for a 6+ hour long holiday party with a sit down dinner and dancing later so I wanted to be comfortable. I think this would be nice for super formal gala that was mostly about posing for photos and gliding around the room elegantly.
The fit was super snug but other than that I loved it!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a black tie event!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly and smoothed out all the right places. The fabric felt thick and well made. The assymetrical ruffles looked very modern and I stood out in the crowd, even though I was wearing black! I got compliments all night. I would definitely recommend this dress!
Overall comfortable, slimming, didn't need to wear bra (36C), May be short on some women 5'2 worn with a small heel.

This dress was incredible and I got endless compliments on it. I just had a baby 4 months ago so was worried about the midsection but it was very forgiving. The only complaint I had was that the straps were too long and i had to pin them so that the dress didn't show entirely too much cleavage. I felt like I was constantly pulling the top up to make sure I was covered. Other than that absolutely loved this dress.

This was so perfect for a last minute gala I attended. I have a complicated size since I'm a 2 on top, 4 in the middle, and a 6 on my hips. I wore the 4 and it overall fit well. A little snug on the hips but not unbearable. The dress is super flattering. You get the perks of a fuller dress without commuting to a ball gown style which was a huge plus for me!

links_reviews_title: Felt like a princess in this gown!
links_reviews_text: The gown fit like a glove! My midsection is my problem area but I didn't even need to wear spanx in this. It was very slimming and elegant. The ruffles definitely take it up a notch!

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect. First formal night out post-partum. Hugged the right places, hid the wrong.
links_reviews_text: Straps are a bit loose - I am generally an 8-14 depending on brand. I have a large chest, wide rib cage, and broad shoulders - even so the straps were a small bit loose. I am typically smaller in other places, including a fairly flat backside. It fit like a glove everywhere else. I have a short torso and this hit the perfect spot. Really pleased even with the slightly loose straps.

Most of this dress fit great! I'm 5'2" and this dress is made for people much taller so I had to tack the straps so it wasn't falling down in the top. But with that strap adjustment and 4" heels, it was perfect

links_reviews_title: Felt like a princess in a dress fit for me.
links_reviews_text: Dress fit like a glove. I didn’t have to wear a bra or use and safety pins to keep the top up (which is usually a concern for me). I wore high heals and the dress just floated perfectly off the ground. I was able to dance in the dance, eat, drink, walk and sit in the dress without any issues. I was very sad when the ball was over and had to return the dress!

I am a true size 2 (occasionally 0, never a 4) and this dress fit like a dream. Extremely flattering, nicely structured. I'm 5'4 and it was the perfect length with 4 inch heels. Only downside was that the bust area fit a little awkwardly, though I was able to wear a strapless bra. It might work best on someone who either has a very small chest or whose girls are hoisted up just below her chin :P Overall, loved this dress and would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress! Made me feel fabulous!
links_reviews_text: Great fit around the hips and waist but slightly too big on the chest, I had to wear a padded bra and the straps were a little too long but I managed. Length was perfect - I'm 5'5 and wore heels. Felt like a princess and received a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Fits very well. Long enough for someone 5'10" in heels.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 6 or an 8 and I wore an 8 in this. A little tight around my butt. It was long enough for me and I am 5'10". It may be a little long for someone shorter. I am wearing 3" heels in the picture too.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for a black tie summer wedding and I loved it!
links_reviews_text: Originally ordered the 12R but it was very loose in the bust and waist. The 10R was a little bit tight, but I still managed to zip up the dress and it gave me more of shape that I wanted. I wore flats with this dress and it was just at the ground, so it might be short for ladies 5'7" and taller. The dress is on the heavier side. There is no padding in the chest area and I went braless so my boobs were flatten since I went with the smaller size. They looked weird if staring at a side view, so I'd suggest wearing a strapless bra with shaped cups. Either than that, I was very happy with this dress. Bust - 38D Waist - 34 Hips - 43

Fun, elegant & sexy! I'm typically a 4/6 in my pant size and a 28A in bra size. I went with a size 2 in this dress. It was a bit tight in the hips and a little loose at the top but definitely still wearable! Also, the fabric is thick so if you're dancing a lot, it gets hot.
Straps were too big, had to pin them. That was the only issue!

I wore this beautiful gown to a formal affair. Loved the look. Super comfortable. Straps were a bit loose and gown would have fit perfectly if I was just a bit taller. Definitely recommend. Felt beautiful in it, and many compliments throughout the night.

I love this classic dress by Cooper Street! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear nubra or no bra since there is an open back. At 5’10”, the length hit mid-thigh on me. This is such a such an elegant piece! Perfect for any black tie affair.

The details on the lower portion of the dress were breathtaking. I have never received so many compliments on a dress. As for the fit - I'm 5'2, wore 4 inch platform heels and I was tripping on the dress the entire night. Highly recommend you find a way to make it work, and if you are a few inches taller you'll probably have an easier time. The 4 fit perfectly and I'm a C/D cup with an athletic build.

links_reviews_title: Classic shape and fabric + fun details
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a black-tie gala. It was a hit! It was quite roomy on top and I wish the straps had been adjustable. I wore a padded push-up bra which helped fill the space (I'm a 34C). The mid-section was perfect for me. Fitted but not too tight. The length was great, I am 5 foot five and wore 3 inch heels and the skirt just skimmed the ground

Thank goodness it fit! I order three dresses. The one I really wanted to wear they didn't have in my size. Unfortunately the one they sent to replace it didn't fit either. This last one did! I felt fancy, very Hollywood. The wedding was "dress to impress" and I felt like I did. I had fun dressing up and felt very comfortable in the dress. My old qualm about it was the straps could not be tightened and they were very loose. I need up safety pinning them.

This gown is GORGEOUS!!! It was my back up gown and Im so happy It was an option. If you have curves it will hug them in the right places. If you are on the shorter side you may have to adjust the straps for a perfect fit but this gown is elegant, sexy, & has the perfect amount of what I call "simple drama". When you walk into the room you will surely demand its attention in this Cooper Street Gown #SimplyBlack #Blackelegance #Cooperstreetblack #Irentedtherunway

links_reviews_title: Everyone admired the dress and how it looked on me
links_reviews_text: It fit well and was comfortable
The fit of this dress is perfect. The material is lovely. It's short...but that makes up for it being a bit conservative. Love that it had pockets.

This beautiful dress made me feel like an absolute queen at my college graduation! It is extremely comfortable and flattering, and not too hot to wear in the summer like I did. The skirt isn't flowy, the way it looks in the picture is how it looks, it won't fall against your legs. It's looks darker in the pictures than it does in person, it's a true navy color. I was also sitting in it for a few hours and when I got up the back hadn't wrinkled at all. Amazing dress, I can't recommend it highly enough!
This dress was classy but unique, I loved wearing if!!

I rented this dress primarily for the pockets and I wasn't disappointed. I got lots of compliments. My only complaint is that the skirt is cut into a sneaky bell shape which means the sides ride up and I had trouble hiding the Spanx I wore when I sat down (I wore the Spanx for my personal comfort, not because I needed them with the dress). Otherwise great dress - good quality - true to size!

links_reviews_title: I like this dress, but it didn't work for me
links_reviews_text: This dress is very pretty and has a nice lining and pockets! It was a little bit tight for my curves and kinda stuck out funny on one side, but that might have been the way it was pressed? I'm going to try the next size up with unlimited and see if that works better.

I loved this dress, classy, comfortable and fun! I wore this to my company awards dinner and received many compliments. It was the perfect length, flared out a little too much but still looked cute, and bonus - it has fun little pockets!
I am typically between a 4 and a 6 and the 6 fit perfectly. I wore it to a work holiday party and it was perfect.
I wore this dress to a work party. I got so many compliments on this dress. Loved this dress, super comfortable, elegant, classy.
The fit of this dress was fabulous. Definitely felt conservative but got a couple of compliments at Thanksgiving brunch!

I am usually a 2 in dresses, sometimes a 4. I wore the 2 and it fit like a glove. The lace was not itchy, and the dress overall was very comfortable. The color is a gorgeous, rich navy. I paired it with simple black heels. I would most definitely rent more dresses by Erin Fetherston.

This dress was lovely, structured, and simple while still being unique. I wore this for Christmas Eve dinner and church after. It was a nice deep blue, that worked well for the holidays! The fit is not too tight and, the top is very modest.

links_reviews_title: Wish I had somewhere to go after work!
links_reviews_text: That's how much I loved wearing it. Plus can't go wrong with a dress with pockets. Loved the navy color
I wore this beauty to my friends rehearsal dinner. It's a gorgeous dress, fits great and has pockets! I'll definitely rent this again.
Perfect fit, cut and flattering

links_reviews_title: Love this dress!! Pretty, elegant, and classy. Will rent again!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely adored this dress! I wore it to my brother-in-law's rehearsal dinner. It was perfect and I received many compliments. It fits true to size, but if you're in between sizes I would recommend going down a size. The navy color and material of the dress make it so classy and elegant, yet not "old." I will definitely rent this dress again.

I rented this as one option for engagement pics and even though it is very different from my usual style I really liked it. The skirt was a bit a fuller than I normally wear, but very sweet and innocent looking, the lace on top was very classy and I loved how simple and classic it all looked. I am usually a 4 but this was only available in a 6 and it actually fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, flattering dress that I wore to an Autumn day time wedding.
links_reviews_text: The dress was a great fit. The lace detail was beautiful. Very comfortable even after a three course meal! I teamed with diamond drop earrings and beige heels, which from previous wearers seems to be a great combo.
I just simply love it. It shows class and elegance. J'adore. It's a little navy dress that I'd rent it over and over again. Perhaps buy it someday.
I got compliments non stop. It was comfortable and felt like high quality. I loved it and would totally rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great fit! Has a sharp, professional, timeless cut in a color that will suit pretty much anybody.
links_reviews_text: I work as a ballroom dance teacher, and I am always on the lookout for a dress that is classy, comfortable, easy to move in, and short without being too revealing. This dress really hit all of those points! The dress runs true to size and even fits my DD chest with room to move still. The collar is not tight. It really is fantastic and I will probably order it again!

links_reviews_title: I rented this for my son's baptism and received a lot of compliments on the dress.
links_reviews_text: True to size, somewhat heavy material.

When I selected this dress I wanted an option for a wedding that was more conservative, with sleeves but not boring. This dress is perfect! I was afraid the collar would make it too casual, but it's very subtle. The top has a lace overlay, and the skirt of the dress is a slight A line with a nice thick satin like material that dresses it up a bit. The fabric is perfect, barely any wrinkles and there are pockets! I loved it, so comfortable, received tons of compliments. It was true to size or maybe I could have even gone down a size.
Super cute, true to size, very comfortable, thick material. Wore it for "Navy Blue Night" for sorority recruitment with a pair of nude pumps.

This dress worked out perfectly for my boyfriends 10 year work anniversary dinner. Totally fit true to size with plenty of room to breathe. Length was perfect and didn't ever feel too short. Wore with plain black heels- arm holes were plenty big and didn't feel too snug- I sometimes have difficulty with sleeves because I have broad shoulders and rather muscular biceps but this fit was perfect and very flattering.

I wore this dress to a wedding and absolutely LOVED it. I have a small chest, broader shoulders and larger biceps from working out and it fit like a glove, and was extremely comfortable all night long.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, elegant and sophisticated! What else can you ask for?
links_reviews_text: I am in love with the color of this dress! This royal blue really made me feel like royalty. It is super comfortable as well. The length and the fit were perfect.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to my company's annual holiday party.
links_reviews_text: The dress fits well (true-to-size), was comfortable and has pockets! I received many compliments on it and particularly loved the little collar.

This is a very pretty, well-made, Conservative party dress. I am petite - so a fit and flare must be a solid color (to not divide me in half) and the skirt cannot be too voluminous. This dress fit the bill. The waist is fitted and the material has no give. I sized up for cake and dancing. I wore navy velvet pointed toe heels with a black ankle strap. Also, I styled my hair in a high quiff to give the look a little edge. The Peter Pan collar is super cute and begged for pearls. My husband loved the look.
Size worked out well and the fabric/shape of dress is very flattering. I was afraid it might be too short, but it was just right and appropriate to wear without tights under.

I rented this dress to wear to school. It's a classic piece. The dress is beautiful, chic, classy and comfortable. The lace is not itchy and the material is loose fitting and can be worn all day. I recommend this piece for taking your everyday wear up a notch. One might say that this piece would be too much for wearing to school, my response to that is, "dress like a boss, act like a boss, be treated like a boss!" I usually wear a size 00 in pants and I found I had some extra room in this dress, it just made it all the more comfortable!
I loved this dress, very cute

links_reviews_title: Something fun and different for a wedding.
links_reviews_text: Love this dress because it's a little different than a normal wedding guest dress. I liked the color and the look of the top which almost made it look like a skirt and shirt. Received a few complements and my boyfriend thought it was cute :) The dress is a teeny small thoughout the rib cage, but I made it work.
A bit conservative but pretty

Length wise it was fine when standing up but it rode up really high when bending over. The overall design of the dress is great and very flattering, however, the hemline was coming apart from the bottom. I expect even a rental to be in a presentable condition and therefore I can only give the dress 3 stars.

links_reviews_title: This dress is SO cute on! I wore it out to dinner and to a confirmation. Can be dressed up or down.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect. Super comfortable. Got tons of compliments.

This was super cute, and I thought I'd like it for a formal cocktail event. Even though I loved the pockets and the dress overall is very slimming, it was too short for my overall comfort at a professional event. I'm 5'9" and would have appreciated an extra 2 inches. The model in the photo is accurate. The heaviness of the fabric and the collar make it not seem cheap, but don't make up for the length.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a country club rehearsal dinner
links_reviews_text: I chose this dress for a rehearsal dinner with a conservative crowd and it fit my purposes perfectly. Got lots of compliments and felt confident! The waist was a little loose on me, but the dress fit just right otherwise. I'd recommend!
Beautiful
Perfect age appropriate dress for a 15 year old attending her brother's season ending banquet.
I can't say enough good things about this dress. I wore it work on one day and to a party another day. The waist is perfectly placed and the pleats are gorgeous!
Fabric is so flowy it made me feel like was elegant and stylish.

Cons: The sleeves were too long for me and were distracting when I was trying to type at work. Also, the long flowing skirt is great, but I had to keep picking it up to avoid the rolling chair in my office. That was a pain. I am fairly small on top, but this dress made me look even pudgier than I am. It didn't do anything for my larger figure. And lastly, the top was a bit restricting in the arms. I felt like if I moved arms to quickly I was going to rip something. Pros: The skirt has such a beautiful cut and so much material. But the waist needs a belt, I think.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress! Gorgeous silk, beautiful pleats, excellent draping and design! The dress is very flattering and slimming. The print helps hide any unwanted pudges. I did have to take in the top and pin it in substantially to avoid flashing everyone, so I got a size or two bigger and it worked out really well! May end up buying this one!
Of course the only issue was the chest area but that was an easy fix with a body suit underneath! Tons of compliments!

Perfect fit! Loved this dress! I received compliments left and right as I always do when I wear my RTR outfits...felt absolutely fabulous in it! Only 1 con... whenever I sit and cross my legs my right leg going up to high thigh area becomes exposed so I have to constantly wrap dress over to cover it. I took a fun boomerang with this dres and cannot wait to post to my social media... obessed with RTR and my unlimited subscription!

links_reviews_title: The dress is delightful and I received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit great but because I am self conscious about showing too much cleavage I wore a pink slip underneath. This worked out perfectly for my Fantastic Beast costume event.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but for small chests only!
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress, but the chest didn't work out well for a work event. The tiny hook above the wrap portion was flimsy and wouldn't stay closed, making it quite a deep plunge for the work event I wore it to. Plus side the pattern was pretty, pleats were figure flattering, and the dress didn't wrinkle all night.
I wore this dress to a graduation ceremony. I liked wearing this dress a lot. Fit well and was a nice design.

links_reviews_title: This was for a garden party for a client event.
links_reviews_text: The fit is way too small and the fabric is not forgiving. If it doesn't fit, it doesn't fit. I'm normally a size 4 but this size 6 was even too tight to even button/tie. The shape of the dress is strange - long (not flattering for anyone under 5,7) and the skirt makes you look wider than you are. The pattern is hard to see and the arm detail on the shoulders is strange. Definitely won't be renting again.

The design of this dress is odd & not very flattering. The clasp at the chest did not work well & the pleats would look better if they started lower on the hips. There are also oddly placed tie/straps at the shoulders which add no design value to the dress IMO.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful! Tight in the cage rib area
links_reviews_text: Looks amazing! I received lots of the compliments. I might rent it again.

Someone else had said this is a wardrobe malfunction waiting to happen and that is true! It's a real wrap dress so those lovely heavy pleats can suddenly fall to the side, flashing your boss a whole lot of thigh mid-meeting. The chest cut definitely needs a cami underneath for work too, even when fastened. That being said one of my favorites. Will be perfect in early spring.
Wore this on NYE- couldn't button the top without the dreaded boob gap so wore it with plunging neckline and it looked great
Pretty nice dress--weird details on the shoulders

links_reviews_title: Was sent in place of the dress I requested. Not worn.
links_reviews_text: The hemline and sleeves were too long for my 5'2" frame. The waist is a single button inside and wrap/tie. The hook at the front bust line is a good idea, but didn't work for me. The quality of the fabric and pleating was nice.

This dress was bit small on me. I do not have a big cup size and it was pulling open at the front, the waist was a bit tight, and it was hard to move my arms. It was workable but I would have been more comfortable if I had gotten an 8, even though my bust and waist are generally a true 6.

links_reviews_title: Weird lace up detail on shoulders not visible in photos.
links_reviews_text: I did not wear either size of this dress. Both of them had crisscrossing cords on the shoulders that did not fit well to the dress so hung strangely. I'm not sure if these had gotten stretched out of place or if I just couldn't arrange them correctly.

Sorry no picture! I'm 5'9" and 36G, usually between a 12 and 14 with a smallish waist and hourglass hips/bum. This dress only JUST worked on me--the skirt is incredibly full and pleated, and it's heavy. The top fit well and the sheer sleeves were a nice balance. The tie was reeeallly long but because it was a true wrap that gave the fit some flexibility. I cannot imagine this on someone any shorter than 5'9".
I'm usually an xs/s, and I've rented a 0 & a 4 on two different occasions and neither size fit because they were too small.

links_reviews_title: Must have been made for a 34 A
links_reviews_text: I think I would have had to order a size 14 in this dress to fit. The whole fit was way off.

links_reviews_title: super flattering but not intended for ladies with ample bosom.
links_reviews_text: runs small in chest area

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but the bust is wayyyyy small!
links_reviews_text: Other than the bust being way too small - dress was very pretty

links_reviews_title: I wanted to love it but: The sleeves choked my arms to death.
links_reviews_text: Meh
This fit perfectly and got several compliments on this dress!
Loved the fit of this top--so comfortable. I wore the 10 but probably could have worn an 8 too.

links_reviews_title: Sexy top. A little too much of an angle on the off -the-shoulder side.
links_reviews_text: I thought the side that was off the shoulder was cut a little too low. I felt like it was going to slip down below my strapless bra. But my bust is not large, so maybe it would stay up better on someone with a bigger bust. I like the style though. The sleeves are fun but be careful to not get them in your food!

I like this top however it was a little snug and constricting. Once I had Put it on I found it a little difficult to reach down and buckle my shoes! I would say it ran a little small so if you are between sizes definitely size up. I went with my normal size and it was fine but there was no wiggle room. Also while super pretty, the lace bell sleeves did make it challenging to eat dinner. I had to be careful reaching across the table that my sleep didn't go in the food. May be a better choice for drinks! Overall though I thought it was flattering with the asymmetrical neckline and thicker than you might imagine material. To see all of my other rentals, check out my Instagram @luxeandlouche :)

This shirt is very pretty. But it def took work to zip it up and I'm pretty small. I couldn't wear a strapless bra with it and I am not big chested, so I think larger chested women would have trouble. But, once on it was beautiful and received compliments!
Paired with a fitted black skirt and it was fabulous!
There is not a lot of give to this short. Love the wide sleeves with lace detail. The neck line is perfect and does not fall down. It is very fitting in top so size up if you are broad.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a presentation at a conference.
links_reviews_text: Fit great on arms and bust. It was a bit loose on the waist, however, I ordered one size up because of the reviews. I do think that one size down would have been too tight on the arms and chest so I am glad I went with this size. Lots of compliments on the top.

links_reviews_title: Loving the lace lined bell sleeves!
links_reviews_text: Overall ran slightly small with a significantly small running bust area. I'm a 34/36C and unfortunately I couldn't even wear my strapless bra with it or the small lift and padding it offered would prevent it from zipping over the bust area. The length is slightly short but I am a long torso'd woman and it was still wearable, just not quite as long as I'd have liked. The ruffled edge and cut of the neckline is beautiful and the fabric is high quality and heavy. I paired this top with a pair of long Lele earrings that grazed my collarbone.
This shirt fit so well. Wore this out with my boyfriend for a date night. It was perfect with jeans and boots. Considering buying this one.

Loved this top. It is a little tight chest/arms but the drop shoulder is supposed to go pretty low on your arm so I can see why. Like most off the shoulders you can't raise your arms too high but it was great for a concert.

links_reviews_title: I wore it for my husband's white coat ceremony.
links_reviews_text: Loved the thickness of the material. Im usually a true 8 but i would have been more comfortable in a 10. Overall it was a great top. I received lots of complements.

links_reviews_title: unfortunately wasn't able to wear it because it did not fit well, but really cute top!
links_reviews_text: Really cute top and quality fabric but i am usually small on top and it did not fit well.

links_reviews_title: Fun top, a little tough to get on
links_reviews_text: Really cute top. Tough to zip and get on. Slightly tighter than I thought but once its zipped, it looks very cute.
weird fit! heavy material but quality. Just fits weird.
Wasn't able to wear this back-up piece because it was still too small. I chose a size up but couldn't get the zipper up. I'm 8 weeks postpartum so my sizing may be off due to pregnancy.
Great fit

links_reviews_title: I ended up not wearing and immediately returning
links_reviews_text: This runs so small. I sized up based on the reviews, but I should have sized up by three sizes instead of two. The sleeves were very long (which I knew they would be) but that wasn't the issue; the issue was how tight the body was. I was able to zip it up but it was uncomfortable and I had a really hard time getting out of it.
a little tight in the chest area but it looks good

links_reviews_title: So flattering. Can be dressed up or down. Sexy for Winter
links_reviews_text: Loved the details and the fabric. Great to pack
Cute shirt but very tight around the bust and underarms. Not very comfortable!
Love the shirt, easy to dress up for a night out. It was pretty tight even though I have pretty small boobs but the soft sweater material did have some stretch so I was able to wear.

I loved this top in the photos of the model, but it just didn't work for me. I have long arms and the sleeves were still too long to be practical. I'd have to scrunch them up in order to eat. Also, the ruffles were too much for me. Instead of me wearing the top, the top was wearing me. I ended up not wearing this.
I didn't like the fit or style on me but it is good quality. I returned this item without wearing it.
Definitely runs small, I'd suggest sizing up especially if you have a larger chest. Disappointed it didn't fit, it's so cute!
It's so beautiful, but runs very small!

I sized up but it was still little tight. Fabric is thick and good quality but good luck trying to put it on and if you get it on, sleeves are long so you can’t even see your hand, and the fit squeezes the armpit a little making it budge out. If you’re a magician, you can take it off, otherwise, it is a two person job. Maybe more of a fit for super skinny person. Just return without wearing it.
It's not flattering; I didn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful structures top. Wore to formal dinner.
links_reviews_text: Very structured and high quality. Flattering.
So flattering.

links_reviews_title: Fits small, get the next size up
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 2/4, but ordered the 6 based on other reviews, and I was glad I did. It was flattering and can easily be worn for day and night looks.
The sleeves were tight at the tops. The fabric was much thicker than I was expecting

Unfortunately I couldn't even wear the shirt because the arms were way too long. Maybe for someone with long arms that sure would be nice because it seems like good material but unfortunately I didn't try it on the moment I got it so I was stuck with this rental.

links_reviews_title: My husband couldn't take his eyes off me
links_reviews_text: Loved this top it was very comfortable even though it was one sleeve it didn't fall down. I'm glad I didn't have to constantly pull it up. Wore this for a date night at an elegant restaurant with cigarette pants. I would definitely rent again
Sleeves are stunning. The shirt gives you room to move. There is a rubber lining at the top so the shirt stays in perfecf place. Love this shirt. Will rent again!
Fit too tight. Hard to get off and on. I am not a fan.

links_reviews_title: Really pretty. I wore this with jeans and with black leather pants.
links_reviews_text: If you are full chested you may want to size up.
Loved the fit and the drama. I received lots of compliments.
Beautiful top, but unfortunately I wasn't able to wear it as it runs quite small. I would suggest sizing up!
This blouse runs way too small. I am normally a 0 or a 2 and this top would not even zip up and was very hard to get in and out of! It is beautiful if i could only wear it!

I wanted to try this because I think it looks like a beautiful shirt. That said, it has absolutely no stretch and runs really small. Admittedly, I have a large chest, but this probably runs at least 2 sizes too small.
I typically wear either a 4 or a 6. The smaller size fit perfectly for this dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a day at the races
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a polo match. It worked perfectly with espadrilles and a big hat. I love the length of this dress and the pockets.

This wasn't the original dress I had rented, but RTR sent me this as a back up because my original dress was unavailable. I wore this for engagement photos and really liked how it looked in the pictures. It fit a little tighter than I would have liked around the bust area, but other than that it was a good fit. It was a nice length, not too short and not too long.

The fabric is beautiful! The detail and texture were prettier than I expected. Dress also has pockets. I didn't end up wearing the dress because it looked large on me, with a fit and flare, I needed the waist to be more snug. With it being larger in the waist, it made me look heavier/larger than I'd like. Had I gotten a smaller size, it may have flattered my waist better and made me look smaller.

So cute!!! This dress is perfect for a bridal shower or formal event! This runs a little small, so we recommend sizing up, especially if you have a larger bust. You can wear this with a NuBra or no bra, since the back is lower. This fabric has no stretch, but because of the full skirt there is comfortable room for hips. Pair this with Miguel Ases earrings and you're ready for your event!

links_reviews_title: This dress fits like a sack of potatoes
links_reviews_text: The concept of the dress is nice... not too short, nice v-neck that's not too low, and POCKETS! But the shape of the dress is horrible and does nothing to flatter my figure. I did not end up wearing it to my event because of this. This will likely be the last time I rent the runway.

This dress was perfect! It was a beautiful material it fit very well very flattering. The best part was the pockets! I wore it to my graduation and it was so convenient to have those pockets would recumbent.

The fabric was pretty; however, it was pretty heavy for a summer-ish dress. The fabric is lined so you don't need to worry about undergarments being seen. The fabric is heavy so the waist and pleats made my hips look bigger than they needed to be. Its a pretty dress but not on me!
good
True to size, not for short waisted girls though. The lining rolls out along the V neckline, but still a beautiful dress.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and well made dress.
links_reviews_text: I needed a true pure white dress. Unfortunately, the color was more ivory or "winter white".

I wore this dress for my rehearsal dinner. While it was comfortable and perfect for the occasion, I wish I had been able to wear one, maybe even two sizes down, from what I rented. If you are small chested and have a smaller waist, definitely size down.

links_reviews_title: A bit more frumpy than I expected
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for graduation and it was a little big/matronly for my age. There was nothing inherently wrong with the dress so for the right person I think it would work great!
Not as dressy as I needed for my event, wore it for everyday instead.
The skirt was too full for my liking

links_reviews_title: I should have ordered 1 size smaller...
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress! I'm normally a 2 so I thought the 40 would be perfect but it was just barely too big in the shoulders and waist. I'm 5'5" and it was right at mid-knee length, so again nothing wrong with the dress I just need to size down if I decide to try it again. It wasn't available in any other size but fortunately one of my backup styles was perfect!
I am 5'5", 130 lbs, 34B and this dress fit very well everywhere except the bust, where is was too small.

links_reviews_title: Top was too small for my bust
links_reviews_text: Love this dress but too small did my bust. Not for busty girls
Beautiful dress but it was two sizes too big. I followed the advice of other renters- wrong. I'll have to re-order a 42 to see if this will work.

i'm typically a 4, but always a 2 in red valentino since it runs large. this dress was no different. beautiful white dress with pockets. love the detail on the overlay. the back and front have a nice wide v, but didn't overexpose me. i didn't bother wearing a bra and def didn't need to. hit a touch above the knee so appropriate for work. highly highly recommend this great dress for summer! it is not see through at all thanks for the layer underneath and wasn't too hot. get this!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! POCKETS were a HUGE plus. My phone was inside them and didn't pull the dress down.
links_reviews_text: tight in the chest! But great fit overall, not too short.

links_reviews_title: Little black dress with a twist
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit in a size 6. Wouldn't change a thing. Loved the cut outs. Felt ridiculously skinny in it. (That's reason enough to rent it). I'm usually not a Nicole Miller fan but this is definitely an exception.

I rented this for my birthday trip to Miami. It's snug but so flattering and sexy!! Husband loved it. I felt gorgeous. So flattering! The tiny cutout was just enough to make it interesting. I'm a size 12 and sized up in this to a 14 with not much room to spare. It's an LBD you will enjoy wearing!

This dress is beautiful and very well made. It’s VERY form fitting and a little forgiving, so spanx are recommended but not required. It was very comfortable in the body, though it ran incredibly small. I’m 5’0, 135lbs, 34DD and typically a 4 in dresses, but the 6 was so tight in the body and the lower sleeve/strap was cutting off circulation in my arms. The 8 fit perfectly, except the lower strap was still WAY too tight and the upper strap was now oddly floppy. I threw a pin on each sleeve in the back and it ended up working well. The dress is lightweight and was comfortable for an outdoor engagement party (WITH GIANT FANS) in the summer in south Florida. If it weren’t for the sleeves, the dress would’ve been absolutely perfect.
Lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Rented for a bachelorette. Good option for a night out.
links_reviews_text: Fit is TTS but has some stretch to it which is nice. The only part I didn't like was the shoulder straps. They are a little awkward and didn't stay up on my shoulders. The fit was weird with the strap around the arm so the shoulder straps ended up being too loose and just falling down. Otherwise it was a great little black dress for a night out.

Really like the dress and purchased. It runs small but it's elastic, so if you get your usual size it probably will still be fine. I usually wear 0 or 2 but got a 4 and it fit well. It's a perfect cocktail or night out dress.
Awesome dress and it was long enough which was nice! Don't have that much movement with your arms!

I loved this dress. I think it's very flattering. Fit great except that the sleeves were a little big. I could've pinned them but I didn't and was still ok. Got a lot of compliments. Will def rent again.
This is my favourite rental so far. The pictures don't do it justice. Will definitely rent again.
Got this to wear on vacation and looooved it. So flattering - my husband said whoa! When I came out. Made out of stretchy fabric so very comfortable too.

links_reviews_title: This LBD was so easy to wear and I felt so elegant in it! Didn't have to adjust anything :)
links_reviews_text: Can't go wrong with Nicole Miller. I originally ordered another dress but it didn't fit properly so RtR rushed me two other choices and this one was perfect! The fit was so comfortable - just enough stretch to cling in all the right places yet not tight. Just stayed put. I have an athletic build and wouldn't normally go for an off the shoulder dress but this was perfect with the two straps over the shoulder too. It was very flattering. At 5' 2" it was just the right length also - not too short! I wore my strapless silicone bra - which I highly recommend for dresses that don't need all the extra straps sticking out!!! Felt gorgeous and glam all night long in this LBD!

links_reviews_title: We had a cocktail party at our house and this was perfect.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit great and I received a ton of compliments. I have a larger bust, so there was definite cleavage, but it fit great. I am 5 months post partum and it flattered all the right areas.

links_reviews_title: Was perfect black dress for a night out.
links_reviews_text: It was a little tight but the quality was nice and thick and was very flattering.

Wore this to a Mardi Gras Queen's ball and it was perfect. The right amount of coverage with a tease. I wear an 8 or 10 depending on the dress fit in the chest area. I decided to go with the 8 instead of the 10 because the 10 was loose around my mid section and hips. I would hands down rent again! It was comfortable and even though the straps were tight on my shoulders it fully supported my chest (36DD) without a bra.

I love this sleek dress by Nicole Miller! Running true to size with very little stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works for cup sizes A-D. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear nubra or since there is small keyhole in the front that may expose a typical strapless bra. At 5’4”, the length hit knee length on me. The black color of the dress is classic. Pair with black heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!
It fit like a glove! It looked awesome!

Love this dress! I'm a size 10 and usually size up in Nicole Miller but this 10 was perfect. Form fitting yet hides all imperfections. I'm a 36D but didn't need a bra with this one. Only issue is you can't lift your arms too high. Rent it. Love it.
Tight and short for a tall girl, but sexy and boyfriend loved.
The straps were too tight and didn't stay up on my shoulders. The silhouettes was really nice though
I was unable to wear as the straps on the arm were so tight and painful to move. Even the size up was uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: Definitely runs small...my hips did not lie!
links_reviews_text: Definitely go up a size or maybe two with this one!

links_reviews_title: Flattering but tricky fit for straps
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear because in order to get straps to work right you need to pull the dress way down. Wasn't trying to wear something that tight and low, but dress is as shown and well made. Would recommend for a different occasion like a night out...somewhere other than a wedding with my MIL.

links_reviews_title: Rented for our night out for our anniversary.
links_reviews_text: This dress is super cute but it is also super tight. I am usually a ten dress. I wore the 12 but honestly I could have used the next size up.

links_reviews_title: Nice, but not def not forgiving
links_reviews_text: Nice dress, good quality and looks as pictured. The material was pretty thin and therefore meant that I needed spanx.

Super cute dress. I wore it for a rehearsal dinner. However, once you start eating, it shows any food baby. It also draws attention to your arms if they aren't as toned. Overall, Great for the occasion but I'd suggest spanx.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing it - straps too loose.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, fits well, upper strap kept falling down and I thought it looked a little sloppy.
This dress was comfy, stretchy, and sexy without being too much, I got a lot of compliments! I wore it for a night out on a bachelorette party.
wish id bought it! easy and super classic!
Pros- flattering Cons- a lite short

links_reviews_title: Didn’t wear, but got this as a backup.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, but too tight around arms. Didn’t wear.
I loved this dress on the pictures but when I tried it on, the straps did not stay put. I guess you have to have super skinny arms to make it work. I didn't wear this.

I really loved this dress online and ordered it as a backup dress since only the 0 was available (and I would want the 2 as a backup if ordering as my primary). I'm glad I did, because my usual size 0 was TIGHT. I needed my husband's help to finish zipping it up over my rib cage, and I could hardly raise my arms once that was done. I think the 2 would probably have fit well and been very cute. I did feel that even in the 0 which was small on top, it was not very fitted in the hips and below, which is my preferred style... so probably the 2 would have been even more like an A-line and less like the figure-hugging silhouette I had hoped for. Honestly without having the 2 to try on though, I can't say for sure. I'd order the 2 as a backup option in the future, that's how much I love the look online... just not sure it will work for me! For reference I'm 5'5", 108 lbs.

links_reviews_title: Sexy but appropriate for any occasion LBD
links_reviews_text: The fit is pretty small - I had to size up but it fit really well. I read reviews saying they couldn't move their arms much, and maybe that part was too big for me because as the night wore on my straps kept falling down. And the dress rode up a bit, but not inappropriately. I got so many compliments!
Couldn't wear this. Definitely runs very small

I had to return the 6 (my regular size in most things/brands including Nicole Miller) to size up for the 8, which was still far to snug to wear to a cocktail attire wedding. The material is super stretchy, almost spandex like, and frankly felt a little cheap for this brand.

links_reviews_title: Great lbd for a work event or cocktail party
links_reviews_text: If renting for a work event keep in mind that it definitely rides up a bit when you walk! Stunning otherwise :)

I feel like the fit of this dress was just a little off for me. I’m usually a standard size 4, and while I could zip up this dress, it felt a little tight in the arms/bust. I have a bigger chest, 32ddd/e, and I wouldn’t have been able to wear a bra. Better for a smaller-busted woman, I think.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear it. Weird tight sleeves
links_reviews_text: Loved the body of the dress- tight but holds in the right places. Sleeves very tight and weird shape. I could not wear this dress. I have larger breasts and not skinny arms. This is only for women with thin arms

This is a beautiful dress. Thick material, but stretchy and slimming. The shoulder straps run a bit long, so they kept slipping down. I normally wear a size 6, but sized up because I wasn't sure if it would be too firm fitting. The 8 fit perfectly. If you're between sIzes, I'd recommend go up.
I would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Loved the very Kate Spade look!
links_reviews_text: Super cute dress! Wore for a wedding.

links_reviews_title: Adorable dress perfect for a holiday party
links_reviews_text: This dress is insanely cute! As others mentioned, it's all about the bow detail on the back. Comfortable to wear without a bra, but quite tight around the waist. The biggest problem I had was the zipper gets stuck at a few different seam areas.

Used Hollywood double sided tape for bust area which was too big for me. Zipper was stiff like other reviewers mentioned but was manageable. Pockets were great. Many complements especially on the back. Clutch was perfect for phone, lipstick and thin powder compact. Would definitely rent again.

I loved the look of this dress - classy and sophisticated. I wore red shoes to give the outfit a pop of color and got lots of compliments. I had hoped to wear the 2 but it ended up being unavailable at the time of shipment, so I had to wear the 4. It was a little big on top (I'm small chested) and gapped a bit since it's backless, but it didn't end up actually being a problem.

links_reviews_title: RENT THIS DRESS! I wore it to a holiday party &loved it... I ordered it again for NYE!
links_reviews_text: Great fit! And has pockets! Must rent this dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress was absolutely perfect, classy and has amazing back detail - one last thing... POCKETS!
links_reviews_text: This dress was flattering and beyond comfortable. The back detail is stunning and I received compliments all night.
I have a small chest so there was a little extra room in that area, but overall the style was perfect. I wish I didn't have to send it back!

links_reviews_title: You will feel glamorous and gorgeous in this dress - just get some double sided tape first!
links_reviews_text: Other than my wedding dress, I think this was the most glamorous I've ever felt. Loved everything about this - the fit, the cut, the show stopping back, and the functional pockets. I am large chested and managed without a bra - couldn't tell. But I did use a generous amount of boob tape. And as everyone said, the zipper is tough - it is definitely a two person job. But it's worth it.

I wore this for a fundraiser. My favorite part is the back detail and bow on this dress. Super cute from The front but an element of surprise when you turn around. The material was nice and thick. Great quality. I love the pockets in this dress as well.

links_reviews_title: I love a good bow detail!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! I have a short torso so I had to pin the straps for being a little long which was tricky considering the open back. The waist band is a little tight too so I suggest sizing up but prepare some boob tape because the side can get gapey if you’re smaller chested. Overall though... this is a classic dress that I would wear over and over!

Only negative reviews on it would be the zipper gets stuck in same area, like other dresses I've rented from RTR. There is no stretch around waist at all! The material was fabulous! THE BACK WAS MY MOST FAVORITE DETAIL OF THE DRESS!
rented this for a black tie wedding.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved this dress so many compliments! It was so fun, perfect for my bachelorette party!!
links_reviews_text: #bacheloretteparty awesome for a pear shaped figure

The dress itself is beautiful and well-made, but the fit is off. I am between a 32-C and 32-D and it bagged considerably at the side of the breast. Don't get me wrong - a good "side boob" dress can be sexy, but this wasn't that. It just gaped. Sadly, as gorgeous as the dress was, I just couldn't wear it.
The back is so cool and different. The 2 was a little tight on top and I am small-chested but needed closer fit due to the cut. Classy!
Definitely a standout piece! very cute dress and and looked perfect for an afternoon wedding. Large busted girls be warned- Tape will be needed. But would absolutely rent again.
This dress was definitely a show stopped my aunt didn't realize it was me from behind and came over to tell me how amazing my dress!!
This dress was absolutely perfect. It was extremely comfortable and very unique. I received so many compliments on it the entire night. I highly recommend renting this dress!!

This dress has by far been my favorite rental. It fit like a glove and had pockets!!! Absolutely love the back. Wore with a bulky necklace for added touch. The material is thick enough that you can go bra-less. May not work for large breasted person, I'd say I'm average and it felt a little snug on the chest.
The dress fit really well. The bow on the back lacked some structure, and the liner of the skirt didn't line up perfectly with the hem of the skirt, but it still looked good.

I wore this dress to my Kate Spade themed bridal shower and it was a hit! I loved that it had pockets I didn't want to take it off at the end of it! The one and only downside was the side boob area. It wouldn't stay flat. I would recommend fashion tape if you're larger in the boob area.

My family threw a engagement cocktail party and this was perfect. So comfortable and the back is adorable. It photographed really well too. Highly recommend, size for great and material was really luxurious
Many complements! 60s Mad Men party
Compliments galore!! Perfect dress for a classy event...the back is so fun. I'm keeping it!!!

links_reviews_title: 1 MILLION AND 1 COMPLIMENTS!!! The hit of the Eve. I want to buy it xoox
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect. Felt like a million bucks xx

links_reviews_title: This dress was absolutely perfect for my backyard bridal shower brunch!
links_reviews_text: At sure I wasn't sure about this dress for my bridal brunch but I am so happy I went with it. I am petite and curvy - 5'3, 34D and usually wear between a 6 and an 8. This dress fit on the snug size (no way a 6 would've fit). You can't wear a bra with it, so a lot of fashion tape was needed (to avoid too much side boob) but the tape did the trick. My only issue with the dress is the zipper was difficult/near impossible to do up. Because I used RTR bridal service I was sent two of the same dress in my size. Thankfully this was the case a the first dress would not do up. The second one was fine and had no problems. This is definitely a fun occasion dress and was a nice confidence boost with all the compliments I received :)

This dress was amazing!! It was so comfy! And it had pockets!! Everyone loved the dress and the bow in the back was unforgettable. The only downside was that I wore the 10 and it was a snag tight around my ribs but as the day went on I barely noticed it and was able to get over seeing that I'm not "large chested" in the front, haha. But it still worked and I would definitely wear this dress again! If you are looking for a simple yet elegant feel as well as a little sass then this dress is for you!! :)

This dress was perfect for engagement photos. The only negative is that this dress hit above my natural waist and so I felt like it wasn't as flattering as it could have been, since the waist is slightly empire. Also it's a tad short, but at 5'5" this wasn't an issue for me. I would still recommend as the quality is perfect!
Complements galore- just remember to buy a sticky bra

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! I absolutely LOVE this dress!
links_reviews_text: So comfortable to wear. I wore it to the Kentucky Oaks and I received so many compliments. Adding a statement necklace is the way to go. I would rent this dress again!
Wore this to my bridal shower. Loved it, felt beautiful & received lots of lovely compliments. The liner did peak out the bottom of the dress but was able to fix with some double sided tape.

I rented this to chaperone for the high school prom. I received a TON of compliments from students and co-workers. The size 4 fit perfectly around the waist and the length was great (I'm 5'7"). I'm not super busty so that part was a little loose. It wasn't noticeable if I watched my posture. If I had more boob to fill it, there would have no problem. Overall, I loved it!

I was very nervous when going to rent this dress since it was for my bridal shower. My theme was the whole "Kate Spade" black and white theme. The dress has very thick material and was very good quality. The bottom half of the dress is more of a cream if not beige color instead of an ivory white. I am an extremely tiny person (5'1, 90 lbs) so the dress was not tight by any means up top but you could not even tell it was a little loose. You can't go wrong with this dress!!

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments! This was the perfect dress!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress. Stunning back!
This dress was perfect for a black tie optional event. It was super comfortable and everyone loved the back of it!
Love it

links_reviews_title: It was perfect for my bridal shower
links_reviews_text: Fit was great. Like other reviews have stated, the zipper is a challenge. I had to have my fiancee zip it for me and it still took about 10 minutes. No bra needed.

Ok let's start by saying, I want to purchase this dress!! Once I finally got it zipped, it was amazing. So many compliments. I gave it 4 stars because the zipper was almost impossible with the thick fabric. It was a little bit loose in the top (tiny bit of side boob). But sizing down would have been too tight. All in all, it was a successful rental.

links_reviews_title: Classic, elegant, and fun! Wish I could own it!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to my Kate Spade themed Bridal shower and I received so many compliments! It fit well although tighter at the waist. It gapped on the sides of the bust slightly but I never felt exposed. I would re a self adhesive bra although I could have went without. I wish I got photos of the back. Nice thick fabric although be careful with the white skirt. If you are clumsy like me be extra cautious.

I have a short torso so the back was about an inch too long, but that was easily fixable with a safety pin. Other than that it was perfect. So comfortable, fun, and flattering! Got a ton of compliments... I didnt want to take the damn thing off.
Fit well, could wear with or without bra. Material was thicker and textured which I wasn't expecting but it was still beautiful. Plenty of stretch for sitting and dancing! Considering buying!

This dress is very well made, very flattering and the best part is that it's low maintenance!! I traveled to a wedding with this dress and was super pleased that I didn't even have to iron it. The fabric is thick, dress hugs in all the right place, and the color and cut are just wedding perfect! Highly recommend!
I felt beautiful in this dress. The color was perfect for a June formal. Tons of compliments. Simple and yet so elegant
Great dress!!! So many compliments; however the v is low and I recommend fashion tape. Heavy enough material that a bra is not required, but it may peak open without the tape.
Gorgeous fit, this was sent as a backup to my selection which was unavailable and I wish O could keep it! Amazing dress

I love this dress! Wish I could have kept it! I went to a 20 Shades of Pink gala. The dress fit me like a glove in the right places while still feeling comfortable. It even made me look like I have boobs! The hem line was unique and beautiful. I would rent this one again!

I really enjoyed wearing the dress and felt really confident. The quality is impeccable. The dress is true to size but it does hug your body. It is a touch low bearing in the front while still remaining tasteful.
I'm typically a 4 but the 2 worked great for me. Really sexy dress, perfect for the engagement party.
Loved this dress. Got lots of compliments!
I wore this for a wedding. It fit like a glove and true to size. It was a little long since I'm petite (5'1"), but I did not mind the length at all.
Loved the styling and details of this dress. Lots of compliments! Very comfortable.

I was a bit worried about my midsection when I first tried the dress on, but once I added in a pair of Spanx, I was good to go! This dress received so many compliments. As the other reviewers said, it's can be a tad boobular. A bit of fashion tape should keep everything where it's supposed to be.

I adore all manner of blush clothing and this was no exception. The color was gorgeous and the length was wonderful. The plunge front was indeed revealing but not in a trashy way. With my large bust and rib cage I could have used a larger size and had to skip the stick on bra in favor of just wearing nipple covers. The end result was a hit and perfect for a Las Vegas adult birthday tea party!

Admittedly, little too booby for a wedding, but I got comments on how nicely made this dress was all night and the next day! The length is perfect for cocktail or formal. I'm a 34C and wore a bra with no padding, the dress pushes you up enough! Love love love and took too many pictures to rent again... or else I would!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress, was even tempted to buy it.
links_reviews_text: Love this dress, was even tempted to buy it. It was a nice change from typical body con dress for a cocktail event. The picture doesn't do it much justice but it was a classy and edgy look at the same time. Love the hem. Thumbs up. Great first experience with RTR.
This dress is probably my favorite rental so far. It's cut beautifully and fit like a glove. My husband thought I looked great and I received a ton of compliments

Everyone complimented me on the hemline of this dress. For some reason when I tried this on at home I didn't realize it was so plunging. I do agree with another review that this dress will definitely show any problem areas in the tummy area.

The dress is absolutely beautiful! The soft pink color is perfect and the design is ever so elegant! Loved the geometric design at the bottom. It allowed for free movement while dancing and looked simply amazing as it swayed back and forth. Highly recommend this classy and gorgeous dress! Lined high quality material. Fitted around the waistline so keep that in mind.
Classy form fitting style. However cleavage was a bit to "boobalicious" for me! Didn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: THE FIT IS INCREDIBLE. SO FLATTERING. Went up a size as his clothes tend to run small on me.
links_reviews_text: Wont lie- this dress needs heels to make it a total 10. LOVED it.

links_reviews_title: The details of this dress really make it stand out!
links_reviews_text: The slits along the bottom and the asymmetrical cut really make this dress a show stopper. Loved it!
I was still able to wear a 4, but it's slightly big (esp. in the chest)

Fit in the body but too big in the chest and just gaped. Pretty dress but I have the wrong body type for this (pear). Would work better if you have a larger chest and are slim through the hips and thighs. Oh well!
Showed ever bump
Didn't wear it, it was too low
Dress came damaged
It fit beautifully. I loved this dress. I wore it to a formal wine tasting event and received tons of compliments. If you're thinking about renting it...DO IT!

I wish I could have worn this, I am pregnant and when I got it I could zip it up but by the time the party came it was just a bit too tight. The bust is low so I was planning on going braless but it is lined so it was fine. This is a very elegant and interesting dress. I can't wait to rent it again.

Fit great at the waist and hips. It was very low cut and a little big in my chest. I couldn't find a bra I could use without it showing. I wasn't comfortable going bra-less to make it work. But if you've got the perky parts it would be great!

links_reviews_title: Lovely, classy dress. My only slight issue was that it was quite low cut but a stunner!
links_reviews_text: Great fabric and texture. I have a B cup size bust and this was a lot more revealing than the photo. Otherwise, great!

As described in other reviews, the dress is tight in the midsection but I still would have worn my normal size (a 6) had the zipper not been broken on arrival. RTR fixed the problem and sent me an alternative dress quickly.

links_reviews_title: Wish I could have worn this....
links_reviews_text: This dress is a pretty peachy nude color. Would match perfectly with nude Louboutins. It was a great fit, true to size, fell mid calf. Unfortunately the zipper was not in working condition when I received it, I was so bummed I couldn't wear it.

I've been waiting to have something to wear this dress to for a while after spotting it on RTR. Unfortunately while the waist down fit like a glove, the top was too large for my small bust and rendered it unwearable. Could not size down as my fuller bottom would not work in a smaller size. So sad because it's such a beautiful dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Potential to be unflattering in the mid-section if you don't wear spanks.
links_reviews_text: Good for tall, small bust. If tummy is problem area, would look elsewhere.

Lovely, ladylike, and a bit of a twist on the standard sheath. The hemline is fabulous. Fits true to size. Would love to see in other colors. I paired with nude patent pumps, but it was a pink-based nude not a yellow-based nude, which I think is important with this shade. Deducted one star because it wrinkles if not placed in the garment bag just right, owing to unusual (but beautiful) hemline. I would wear again.

links_reviews_title: Wore to event for pediatric medicine
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit. It has a shine to it and who doesn't adore a dress with pockets
Dress was so comfy. Sexy without being too revealing. Just enough sparkle. Great for a night of dinner and dancing.
Wore to a wedding, got compliments, nice cleavage neckline aka sexy

links_reviews_title: Size down! Tried again in a 4 & bought it!
links_reviews_text: Originally I got a 6 bc/ I figured this dress has been popular & shrunken due to being dry cleaned so many times. It was way too big. I’m a 34C. I should have selected the 4. Did not wear. It’s a very chic dress & I decided to try it again when the 4 became available. Tons of compliments & decided to keep it forever!
