I wore this style for the opening ceremony of Ms Kentucky, the detailing of the back made it unique and the pockets made it perfect for all occasions!
It fit perfectly. I was so happy with this dress! I received so many compliments on it. Perfect Party Dress!
I wore this for a company party. It was fun and flirty without being over the top sexy. I was able to dance all night and not once worry about how my dress was holding up. Fits true to size.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Birthday or Date Night Dress!
links_reviews_text: I was looking for a fun and sexy dress for my birthday and found it! It was super comfortable and I wore it to a ladies luncheon by day and that night to dinner at a trendy restaurant. Tons of compliments at both. Pockets were great too! I ordered the 2 and 4 and the 2 was a tad big but it just meant more room for birthday dessert. :)

Get ready to be asked all night where your dress is from! I wore this for NYE to a swanky party & had women of all ages ask me about this dress. It fit perfectly & was comfy as I ate, drank, and danced the night away.

links_reviews_title: The dress was fun and comfortable! It ran true to size. Love the pockets! Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect, true to size. The material was very pretty. Not too sparkly. Kind of had a leather look. The pockets were a nice touch too! The dress was fun and festive. Great for my office Christmas party!
Lots of compliments and fit like a glove. Classy fit and very elegant . Can dress it up or down with the perfect accessories/shoes.

Got this to wear to Rupaul's Werq the World. Fits like a dream. Subtlety sexy with a beautiful sheen (at first I thought it was a leathery material from the photos but it's not). It will look great with many different types and colors of shoes! I also really love the way the pleats sit in the front. Very flattering! This was my very first rent the runway and it did not disappoint.

I rented this for an awards ceremony. It was just right. The ceremony started at 3 pm and it was pretty warm. This dress looks like leather but is a soft fabric. I got numerous compliments. I have an ample bust and it was pretty tight in the chest but I couldn't have gone up in size because the strap in the back wouldn't have laid correctly if the dress were larger. It for just right every where else. It also showed quit a bit more cleavage than I would usually do but was ok for this occasion. And there are pockets!! So what more can i say. If it weren't for the bust I would want to own this dress.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for a charity fundraiser. It was perfect!
links_reviews_text: I was a little hesitant at first because I am 5’6” and 40+ so I didn’t want it to be too short but after looking at the reviews I decided to go for it and it was perfect. The 8 fit but the 10 was about an inch longer so I wore that one. Comfortable, forgiving (no spanx necessary) and I got a ton of compliments. The material is quite thick which was good because it was a cold night.

links_reviews_title: Perfect LBD for VEGAS birthday night out!
links_reviews_text: This dress is all that!! Great shape and feel. Looks like sparkly leather in picture but it has a nice soft non stiff texture that moves really well. Loved the fact that it gave me a little cleavage which I never seem to have. I ordered size 4 and 6, and went with the 4. It is pretty true to size and the fit and flare works well for my pear shape. Sexy, fun, flattering dress!! My favorite rental so far!! Best birthday ever!! 45, fabulous, fun!!
I wore this to the Grammys and it was amazing! So comfortable and flattering, got tons of compliments. Great for my body type (boobs and petite)

I wore this to a NYE party. It paired well with tights. It wasn't my first choice, but I was pleased with the dress when it arrived. The material is a little shiney, but it doesn't look cheap or low quality. It has a slight glimmer to it. I went with the 6 over the 4, because the 4 was a little too snug in the cinched part of the wait. It was more comfortable with the 6, though I could have powered through the 4 if I was really adamant about it. My only complaint is that the fabric has a texture to it, so, it rubbed a little bit in my armpit/under arm from dancing all night. If you have super sensitive skin, I would advise against this. However, if you don't get irritated as easily or aren't as big of a dancing machine, you will fair just as fine.
I rented this as a last minute option for NYE I was unsure about it, but the rest of the reviews are right, its shiny in person, not in a leather way though. Plus I love the pockets.
I'm 5'5 and 150lbs the size 6 fit perfect! Very flattering on my curvy figure.

links_reviews_title: Pockets! Comfort! Sexy with the perfect coverage!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this in a 2 & 4 for my work holiday party. I'm 5'1, 120lbs, and I wore the 2. I almost felt like a 0 might work, but the waist may have been a little tight. The cutout back didn't lay perfectly flat since I had a little room in the chest so I chose to wear my hair half up to hide that a bit, but I was so comfortable in this all night! I received tons of compliments and you gotta love the pockets. This almost appears leather with the sparkle, but it was super soft fabric. My order arrived well in advance, but one zipper on my garment bag was broken so it was a challenge to carry this on the subway with me - otherwise the new bags are a huge improvement from the original plastic ones. Don't wait- rent this baby!!!

I really loved this dress. I usually wear a 6, but they were out so I rented an 8. It was a little big through the bust and waist but you couldn't really tell. It was also nice because after our event we went to dinner and I may have carb loaded. The dress still looked great with my belly full of pasta!
Easy to wear. Pockets were great. Fun and flirty.

This was perfect for a big gallery event in December-- festive, edgy neckline, fun cutouts at the back (but fine to wear a bra!), and pockets! The waist was a teensy bit loose, so I styled it with a belt, which you can't see in this picture due to my wine. Which was a cabernet. If you were wondering.

First time renter...rental turnaround too fast...didn't know it had to be to UPS by noon-smh...unfortunately was feeling sick and had to go to doctor...and missed the deadline didn't get to ups until 130:(

I rented this dress for an evening out with my husband. I am 5'4", 120 pounds. I rented the 2 and 4 and only tried on the 2, it fit just right with a little room. I loved that it had pockets and i could wear a normal bra. The hostess at the restaurant complimented my "sparkly, holiday dress" i would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Loved that it was comfortable and made me feel sexy.
links_reviews_text: Zipper sticks out in the open area and a little low cut but makes the girls look amazing! Love the dress and would totally buy and recommend!
Amazing pockets

This dress fit so well aaaand had pockets! It made me feel super sexy without being short (I'm not into super short dresses for myself). I loved the subtle shine/shimmer the dress has. I got compliments all night and will definitely rent again

links_reviews_title: Formal-ish wedding though I'm a bit too edgy for formal.
links_reviews_text: Fun dress, comfy but structured. I am between an 8 and a 10 right now, I only had the 10. While a bit big on top, it is better than being too small. The material is beautiful and the cut is unusual without being whacky (and plunging but definitely can wear with a regular bra). I wore this with chunky necklaces and bootie wedges (though changed into black sequins slippers since I'm not adult enough to wear heals all night).

Very cool and unusual dress! I loved the heavy material (perfect for a fall evening), the back detail, the fact that I could wear a regular bra, and that it has pockets! The metallic sheen along with the interesting collar kind of gives it a futuristic/ Star Trek vibe, but I was down with that! And the low cut front shows plenty of cleavage! It fits true to size, at 5'3"/124 lbs I'm in between a 2 and a 4. So the 2 fit, but was a little snug at the waist.

links_reviews_title: Pockets are important for a Bachelorette party!
links_reviews_text: The pockets were great and it was a very flattering cut. The material wasn't too heavy, which was great for the summer. The downside was the detailing on the back did not lie flat against the skin. It was minor but annoying.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a night out in Vegas!
links_reviews_text: I could have worn the 12, but the 14 gave me a little more room through the rib cage/waist. I loved this dress and wish I could have kept it. Very comfortable to wear all night. It was a little bit short to get in and out of cabs all night. The cut was great. I loved the plunge neckline without being too scandalous. I felt great wearing this dress and would definitely rent again.
Super fun and special dress for an Opening Night. The material looked like leather or some other shiny cloth which added a nice complexity. Loved this and danced the night away!
Absolutely loved this dress. Fabric is awesome and I dug the pockets.
I honestly loved this dress. It fit perfectly was comfortable and looked amazing! Would rent again!
Wore this to a company party! Really loved it,very flattering cut and the fabric is fun and sparkly! Fit a teeeeeny but big but I totally got away w it!

Prepare yourself to get complimented all night! This dress is flirty, kicky, and fun. In the photos, it reads like leather, but in person it's got a subtle shimmer to it. The neckline is very unique; you can wear with a statement necklace or leave the neckline clean and pair with some statement earrings. And there are pockets! Size down for your back-up. Really happy with this rental.
Looks more shiny / glittery than leather in real life. Unique collar / back. Fun. Fits true to size

Love this shiny material! This dress is unique and unlike others. It fits true to size. It is fitted at the natural waist and loose at the hips. We recommend sizing up if you have a larger bust. At 5’6”, the hem hit me 3 inches above my knees. There are also pockets! Pair with a short necklace and colored heels!
It was a stunning dress that fit perfectly, was comfortable and was the perfect combination of classy and fun. I got to so many compliments on it!!!
Such a cute top! Easy to work for work or social.
Great, cute fit. Unique top. Pretty cropped. Slightly opens on the sides.
Very comfortable fit

links_reviews_title: closet staple, basic yet highly stylish!
links_reviews_text: The fit was basically perfect. Black is always a great color to wear. Love the discreet details that scream "FASHION". Can be worn with almost any skirt, cardigan, jacket, necklace...wish i owned it! Follow me on instagram for more style inspiration: @delearza

links_reviews_title: Beautiful top with detailed embroidery and the cutest little ruffle!
links_reviews_text: I'm short waisted, so the proportions worked for me, but I can see where this will be short on a lot of people. The back hem is quite a bit longer than the front. I debated buying this one, and may rent again to keep it. It's a great upgraded basic that could be worn a lot.

a lot more cropped than i was expecting on me (but I am 5'10). This was a little tight in sleeves but not to the point that it was uncomfortable. I thought it was fun with pants for a night out to dinner !

Gorgeous top with very nice detailing. Hangs just right, I got this in Large and it fit perfectly. Definitely needs a tank underneath though, black or even nude would be perfect. Very nice quality. I paired it with a necklace from RTR. I would definitely rent this again.
Gorgeous, so many compliments. Perfect for work (with high waisted pants/skirt) or going out. A bit cropped in the front. Overall amazing and want to keep forever!

As other reviewers have mentioned, this top runs small, particularly in the length, with small slits up the side, and across the bust. I thought it might be okay for me because I have a short torso, but next time would definitely size up. Wore it anyway with a long tank underneath, and it was lovely. Beautifully made, and the detail is so nice.

This shirt is better than I expected. It fits nicely and has more detail than I expected. I didn't need to wear anything under it- just a black bra did the trick without looking trashy. It's great for warm weather!

Love the style of this top! The detail is a perfect touch to a black top. It runs true to size. I would recommend going one size down for backup. It’s great for any cup size and may be worn with any standard bra. The fabric has no stretch but has comfortable room throughout the midsection. So fun and the perfect touch to an outfit. Would definitely rent again!

Fit perfectly. If you're sick of black but still can't seem to wear anything *but* black, this shirt is perfect. You get the slimming effect And comfort level of black but, unlike most black wardrobes, it isn't basic or boring or too safe. At all!

Cute style and nicely made but looked awkward with every pair of pants I tried (3, all high waisted). The top is see through (no liner), so unless you can show your bra all day at work (I can't) you need a cami under it...but the cami peeks out from the bottom in an unflattering manner. Disappointing!

links_reviews_title: Cute, fun everyday or work top
links_reviews_text: I surprisingly liked this top and even received a compliment on it! It fit me perfectly, not too short, but I did have to wear a tank top underneath because it is see through and I wore it to work. The detail made it fun to wear. It was comfortable all day and kept its form well. For reference I am 5'2" but if I was taller then it would be too short for the office.

links_reviews_title: This shirt is high quality but it has not stretch at all.
links_reviews_text: If you have any kind of chest, size up. I was very restricted in this shirt-- I am normally a small, and a size 40 did not allow me to move my arms/shoulders. Fabric has zero stretch.
Even on my short frame, this is pretty short. It was an ok shirt but I didn't love it as much as everyone else seemed to in the reviews
Cute top with nice detail. There's not a lining under the lace so I wore a cami. It's quite short and overall small & structured, so size up and wear with high-waisted pants.
I wear a size 6 and fits very well. Good for a party or work.
Fun details on the shirt. Fit true to size.
This runs extremely small. Probably 2 to 3 sizes

links_reviews_title: Adorable but ran very small - I usually wear a 0 but needed a 2 in this so didn't wear.
links_reviews_text: Adorable but ran very small - I usually wear a 0 but needed a 2 in this so didn't wear.
I knew it would be short but it was unwearable for me. Even with high-waisted jeans, it looked terrible and felt so uncomfortable.

Is short but not too short, it's the slit on the side that seems really high. Ended up not wearing as it was a little tight in the bust and would need the perfect black cami under and high wasted skirt or pant to wear comfortably.

links_reviews_title: Didn't ware it. It was a strange fit. Not for someone with a larger breast size.
links_reviews_text: It was not a comfortable fit.
Rented for a night out and it fit but it cut in the sleeves which I didn't love. Design on front is really cool.

Loved this! I wore it to a causal work outing with a tank under and then to party that weekend without the tank - still modest enough for my recovering mom bod :) I'm short so the length was great but if I were taller it would have been too cropped to be age appropriate!
Runs very small. I am a 4/6 typically and this was very tight and short. Very cute top though and would love it one size up.

links_reviews_title: Very short at front and sleeve holes were somewhat tight, not flattering for me
links_reviews_text: This is a cute top but ended up being a little too small in the shoulders/ sleeve openings. Didn't end up wearing.
I liked this top. It was a little shorter than I expected and boxy.

Rented this with my unlimited to wear as host of Thanksgiving dinner. The fabric on the front, the small ruffle on the bottom and the slight high low all elevated this way beyond the usual black top. As other reviewers noted, it is quite short - but as I am petite, it fit perfectly. Got tons of compliments and highly recommend as a cute dinner/date night top for petites.
The shirt is almost a crop top in the front. I wasn't expecting the front of the top to be like eyelet. It was a nice top to wear on a random Saturday, but probably wouldn't rent again.
Runs small

This blouse surprisingly has holes throughout and not just the neck. I wore a black shirt underneath which made it look like the model photo. Overall the top is pretty small. It's short and tight in the arms and chest causing me to pull it down a lot. I'm pretty small there so it looks nice, but I was definitely aware of the tightness throughout the night. I would size up if you want extra room!

links_reviews_title: Chic and simple work style, but runs small
links_reviews_text: Loved the look, perfect for work in the city! Also very flattering. However, a shirt must be worn under it because of the cutouts in the front, which exacerbates the issue of it running a bit small. I wore a tank underneath and did not wear a bra, because it was too tight with a bra (and I am small-chested).

links_reviews_title: Looking great rocking this during a business trip :)
links_reviews_text: Loved wearing this! It was the perfect addition to slim black dress pants.
Nice details but length was short. I'll never rent again.

Perfect date night top. Paired it with a nude lace bralette and didn't feel overexposed at all. Tons of compliments. Really flirty (especially when you're up close) but from a distance, super classy and professional looking. Could easily slip a black cami underneath and make it Office appropriate!
Cute, but runs small. Also note tat it doesnt have a cami built in, so if wearing it for work, you probabky need to add one of your own.
More of a crop. I wore with high waisted jeans to show less skin. Great detail.
Little short but great w black pants

I wore this jumpsuit to an Elton John concert and got tons of compliments. It ran very large in the chest but could be easily pinned or taped. Super comfy jumpsuit that brings the wow factor. Be aware that it is very bright and sparkly so not a good fit for a conservative affair.
Loved it but it is not for the super tall! Not long enough in torso but I wore it anyway:) rented for Halloween Bowie party but would wear out!

LOVED this piece. It's so sparkly and fun, and most importantly, comfortable! I felt like I was wearing pajamas... but was super glam! Normally I have a tough time with jumpsuits because my torso is long (hello, camel toe!), so I sized up and this was perfect.
Lots of compliments! Very flattering and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Funky Jumpsuit - Got Loads of Compliments
links_reviews_text: The fit of this jumpsuit is kind of wacky. The crotch was very high when I had this belted at the waist as it is supposed to be. Might work better for a shorter lady but I made it work. I had a ton of fun wearing this to my sister's graduation and received compliments all day.
I was anxious the material would be itchy, but it was fine and I got so many compliments on this little number!
This is one of those outfits that is so out there you almost can't wear it anywhere but Vegas. It was perfect for a bachelorette night out!

I wore this to a decade party but I was feelin' myself so much that I went out after! It works well as a costume, but I would wear this on a normal weekend when I'm feeling extra. I got tons of compliments! My only complaint is that the material can be itchy on the neck and around the arms.
So much fun!!!
I wore this out to the bars on New Years weekend and got a ton of complements. I found that it fit perfect but if I was any taller it would have been uncomfortable. But overall it's a loose fit.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to company holiday party and got a TON of compliments.
links_reviews_text: It fit me perfectly but I'm 5' 4". If I were taller it may have been too short in the waist. Also if you're not busty I'd recommend a camisole underneath if you choose to wear the collar open. Otherwise it's pretty cool buttoned up.

I loved this jumpsuit. The photos don't do the shiny material justice. I rented it for a family holiday party and ended up wearing it to my work holiday party as well. It was super comfortable and wasn't too low cut or revealing. The sparkly shiny material definitely makes it stand out. I have a large chest so I was happy I could get it on and off with no problem. If you're less endowed you may want to size down. I got so many compliments and would absolutely rent again. Was sad to send it back.

I sized up to an 8/40R because someone said this gave them Camel toe. So it was comfortable and still looked decent but I could've gone down one. I'm 5'3" so it hit right at my shoe line, on someone taller it might be a cropped look. I dressed down with sneakers but you could easily make it more fancy with heels. Loved it.
Love, love a million loves. Wish fabric was less itchy and more pull-resistant, but it's still amazing. Long-torso friendly!

I always ignored this jumpsuit online thinking it was denim, but once I laid eyes on it in the store, I was in love! I usually wear a 4 but I sized down to a 2 due to the reviews and it was the right choice. Easy to get on and off and a single safety pin on the front will keep it from opening too far. The belt is also great and comes separately. The pants could be an inch longer for my height but otherwise it is super fun. No pockets and it is unlined. I also didn't think it was particularly itchy like other reviews say, so maybe it has softened up.

It was perfect for a night of dancing to 80s music. However, the fabric is heavy so i got a little warm and sweaty in it. But the shiny sparkles of this 80s-inspired jump suit made it worth it. Paired it with a shiny gold fanny pack for a Dexy's Midnight Runner look. Received compliments all night log.

links_reviews_title: SO MUCH FUN! Super fun outfit that makes a statement. Easy to wear, not complicated. You will love!!
links_reviews_text: Nice fit, slightly loose on top if you are not busty .

links_reviews_title: Cool in concept but not for work
links_reviews_text: Very unique jumpsuit however i did not wear it because it was just way too shiny for work. Could work for a nightime event.

I wore this for my birthday and it's a really beautiful jumpsuit with its Shiny shimmery almost glittery material. On yellow lighting it really shines and definitely will attract attention. It's also very easy to put on and off specially during toilet trips. I removed one star just because it runs large at the top, Literally if you bend over and your well endowed the girls will be seen so needed to put fashion tape on. Also it's quite memorable, so I think it can only be wore once. I loved the 80's vibe design of the top.

links_reviews_title: Truly a bit of extra holiday pizazz in this jumpsuit! Comfortable and warmer than a dress for winter
links_reviews_text: A little baggier than I liked and thought was so flattering in the size 6 but the sparkle and fun aspect made up for it (think Michael Jackson dance party appeal) . A great comfy, flashy jumpsuit for a pre-nye brunch house party.
You can't tell from the photos, but the fabric is metallic so I couldn't wear it to work.
This jumpsuit fit but a little much for the local bar. Would be perfect for the right event. Plus not easy to get off to go to the loo. I returned unworn. Unique. Eye catching.

links_reviews_title: Was a bit too glittery so I couldn't wear this for work
links_reviews_text: Perfect for a fun night out in town
Very blingy, strange look

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit is so much fun and so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Fit is true to size

links_reviews_title: I received a lot of comments on the jumpsuit.
links_reviews_text: Casual and comfortable for dancing, but the sequins made it fun for nighttime. I'm pretty leggy and still had to roll up the suit bottoms, but other than that, fit was great.
I went with a bigger size because people said it ran small, it was loose on me, but still a huge hit!

This was so fun! I almost didn't rent as I am 6 Ft and didn't think it would Fit... well it didn't really but I rocked it and had a blast wearing it. It was a bit short in the torso but it worked and it went to my ankles but I wore fun high tops that made that not an issue. I will say tall girls look for jumpsuits that have tight ankles not the flair look as you can still rock it like a skinny pant and have fun in these jump suits
This is very BRIGHT, Shiny and Metallic looking. I didn't wear as on line I didn't realize that material was like this.

links_reviews_title: Great look for a retro event. Wore it to an 80s theme party.
links_reviews_text: Arrived without the matching belt, but it looks much better with a contrast or silver belt.

links_reviews_title: I unfortunately did not wear - I planned to wear it to a casual conference, but it is dressy.
links_reviews_text: FYI - THIS JUMPSUIT NOT MADE OF DENIM or a DENIM-LIKE MATERIAL. In the photos it appears to be denim-like, but it it is a metallic blue material. It fit well -- I have no complaints other than it is definitely not the casual day-time look that I thought it was! It is more of a statement-making jumpsuit and will definitely make a splash!

The jumpsuit fit well overall: didn't need hemming (I'm short), perfect fit on bottom and a little loose up top. A great outfit to mix things up for a night out. Only negative is the belt was a tad bulky. Fun onesie!
The fabric was a little rough but overall comfy and unique

Loved this for going out! As others have mentioned, the material is warm, which meant it was perfect for a winter outing for this always cold gal. For shorter ladies like me, this is a perfect "normal" rather than cropped length but didn't take away from the look in any way. Super comfy to walk and dance in, will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: it was a cancer benefit concert
links_reviews_text: true to size. i'm short waisted so it worked very well for me. didn't end up wearing it because i wanted something fancier for the show i was performing but it's a really cool look!

links_reviews_title: Perfect sparkly blue jumpsuit for formal event
links_reviews_text: Love this so much. Brighter than in the pictures. I'm 5'8" and it's on the cusp of being too short in the torso but I will make it work! So special!

This is probably my favorite piece on RTR that I've rented so far. I love the retro futuristic look and the sparkles! This is def gonna end up in my queue a few times. Looked great for work with a striped long sleeve underneath.

links_reviews_title: all the sparkles, but not a good fit for me
links_reviews_text: it wasn't too flattering on me, but was fun to wear and sparkly!

I didn't wind up wearing this. It cut me in the torso- I have broad shoulders and I think there just wasn't enough room vertically. Also= there are straps on the shoulders, and it made me even more broad there.
Ran a little large. Wore for NYE and got a lot of compliments for how fun it is. Would wear the designer again, but be more conscious with what size I order.

links_reviews_title: This was for an annual gala to raise money for a great cause!
links_reviews_text: The fabric is stretch but snug in the right places. I am 5ft 51/2 inches and I wore about 4inch heels and the length was perfect. If I began to walk a little bit sometimes it would ride up but a quick shift and the dress would be put in place again. I recommend wearing this with sticky boobs, it helps give the top more shape. I would consider myself an athletic build and carry most of my extra weight in my lower stomach/thighs. That being said this dress did a fantastic job accentuating all of the right places. The fabric is durable and you don't feel suffocated at all. The dress is truly timeless, I received loads of complements. Highly recommend!

Wore this dress to an awards ceremony. This was not my fist pick dress, but a back up. It fit better than the first pick dress. If you're short and curvy (like me) you will not regret renting this dress. The fabric is stretchy and form fitting and flatters all the curves. At the time I wore this dress, I was 165 lbs and 5'0". I generally wear a size 10 and the size 10R dress was perfect size and length.
Fit was great and dress was comfy and beautiful!

Great dress! I had my fears about wearing an over the shoulder dress and having a nip slip, but this stayed up wonderfully and I wasn't adjusting all night. It fit perfectly and was well suited to the black tie optional holiday gala I was attending.
Such an elegant dress. Felt like a princess! :)

links_reviews_title: Absolutely perfect black tie wedding dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about this dress. I ended up wearing the smaller size I got (I'm usually a 6-8 but the 4R fit perfectly) and even was able to wear it without a bra!! It's the perfect dress for a black tie wedding and it's super comfortable to dance in too! The only con is the annoying arm straps but they're easy to keep hidden. Wish I owned this dress!!

Loved this gown! Got compliments on it! Fit great! However, it was slightly too long even with tall heels (maybe just short people's problem). But overall a great wear for the event. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: First time using RTR & this dress has me hooked!!!
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly and was incredibly stunning. I'm 5'3 & wore 6 inch heels and the length was perfect! I highly recommend!
I wore this for a black tie fashion gala. True to size; fits incredibly. So many compliments!

This dress was fabulous! It definitely ran big and could've fit into the 0, but it was not available during my dates, but the 2 still was great. It was a heavier dress, but it was sooo comfy. It was pretty long even with shoes on, but I am also short.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for my friends wedding and ai received so many compliments on the dress style!
links_reviews_text: The dress fits true to form, advise to get the size you usually wear in a dress and get the backup size a size bigger because it gets tight in the back area when zipping. I would have given it 5-stars but a wire kept poking me in my right arm the whole evening so advise to check the dress carefully for any dress malfunctions you can tell customer service about to get a replacement in time before the event. Other than that, this dress is perfect for a wedding or special occasion!

links_reviews_title: I went to a benefit for Autism Speaks and got to be with family, friends and donate to a good cause.
links_reviews_text: I'm convinced this dress has the sisterhood of the traveling pants magical properties.

As my first RTR rental, I can truly say I'm impressed. I received so many compliments throughout the night. This dress fits like a glove, but isn't suffocating. I was able to dance in it for hours with no issues. I would say the best part is that this dress is flattering to everyone. I had read countless reviews which all said the same thing. Please believe us and you won't regret it. The off-the-shoulder straps stayed put all night. Also, very important to note for us short women: this dress is not too long if you wear high heels. I wore 4 inch heels and it grazed the floor. I only had to lift it up when going up/down the stairs. Overall, I'd say get the dress. You won't regret it!

I got so many compliments on this dress and it made me feel beautiful! I am glad I ordered a larger backup size because the smaller one made the slit really prominent and I was working the event. However that made the top a bit big, and the hanger straps were so short that I couldn't keep them tucked in all night. Overall I loved wearing this dress but you definitely want some tape or something for the straps. Also I'm 5'7" and it was perfect length to wear with flats.

links_reviews_title: Classically beautiful gown that fit perfectly!
links_reviews_text: I received so many compliments on this gown; while it is simple, the material is lovely and hides imperfections (I am a new mom with a mom tummy). I would highly recommend!

I felt amazing in this dress! It was actually my backup, but once I tried it on, I was sold. The material is a heavy polyester/spandex, which is good because it really hugged my curves but it was also very warm. The only downside was that it has 6 hanger loops that I had to secure with tape because they kept popping out no matter how good I thought I had hidden them. Shapewear was definitely needed, and the regular length with 3" heels was perfect for my 5'3" self. I felt so pretty in this dress and received a ton of compliments. It was my first experience with RTR and I will definitely be back!

I absolutely loved this dress and I received many compliments! I am 5'4" and 140 lbs and the 2R fit great with 3 inch heels. The waist was the only section that was slightly too big but it was manageable. Highly recommend!
I'm a true 14 and the 14R was perfect. It was stretchy and a nice thick fabric. Flattering leg slit. Flows nicely. Highly recommend

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove and I felt amazing.
links_reviews_text: This dress was so flattering and I got a ton of compliments. Wore this to a New York Black Tie wedding and fit right in. Also the straps are nice and tight so I did not have to pull up my chest every two seconds when dancing (which for a big boobed girl is a miracle with anything off the shoulder).

Wore this dress to a summer night time wedding reception. I was worried that it would have been heavy and would have made me hot but it wasn't. It fit amazing! Although I am 5" I got the regular and it wasn't too long. It just had the perfect drag on the floor with my 3-4 inch heels. Loved the slit on the side. Over all was a great wear!

I got this as a 2nd dress, since the first one I ordered didn't fit, for my cousins Black Tie Optional wedding. This dress fit very well and is very flattering in the tummy area (what I am always most concerned about). Slit was classy - not too revealing and length was perfect for me, since I am 5'0, but was probably 5'4 with my shoes. Didn't trip on it or anything. And the sleeves stayed put right on the shoulders, even with vigorous dancing! Would definitely rent again!

Ordered this for a televised award ceremony, which required I be in the dress for about 10 hours. Luckily, this dress was both comfortable and elegant. The fabric is thick with a good amount of stretch, so it's easy to move around in. Loved the leg slit and it was a good length for me, which I was worried about because I'm short. So glad I chose this dress!

links_reviews_title: Feeling fab in my first bodycon dress
links_reviews_text: I wore this a bridesmaid dress, and felt fab and comfortable all night. I could have worn the 16 as other reviewers said, but I opted to be less self conscious in the 18. Pros - comfortable for dancing, super flattering. Cons - had to go buy new underwear and strapless bra the morning of the event bc neckline was so low and leg slit was a tad high. Loved this dress. Would highly recommend. #wedding #bodypositive

This was a stylish and classy dress! I am petite (5'3) so had to make sure my heels were tall enough as the dress is long. I rarely wear off the shoulder so this was a nice change. however I did have to adjust the sleeves while dancing. Nice thick fabric. Would recommend overall.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit in perfectly with the black tie affair!
links_reviews_text: I can't describe how perfectly this dress fit me, the color is incredibly slimming and the sleeves were never an issue. Everything was secure, and I didn't feel restrained. I got so many compliments that night!
As many other reviews said, the waist was loose but otherwise a beautiful dress. Added a pop of color with my shoes and loved the result! Got many compliments at my senior prom.
Don’t put your arms through the arms straps on sleeves. Just tuck them into dress. Otherwise they’ll slip all night. Otherwise great dress and lots of compliments!

I wore this to a black tie wedding and received so many compliments, including from the bride and mother of the bride! It fit like a glove but it wasn't hard to move or dance the night away. It was long for my 5'4 frame but I wore 3 inch heels and was fine (the back was still slightly long but the heels helped). The color was gorgeous. Last time I checked, my measurements were 34-29-39 so I normally opt for size 6 but the 4 fit me perfectly even after eating all day and night. It's the right amount of sexy but appropriate for a wedding. I did wear a strapless bra underneath and it fit. In summary, DEFINITELY would rent this again and highly recommend it to others.

I got so many compliments on this dress! It was perfect for a formal wedding. I wear a size ten in jeans, but generally run 6-8 in dresses due to my pear shape. The dress is stretchy, so went over my wider hips fine and then hugged my waist perfectly (the 8 backup size fit my hips but was too loose around the waist). The only complaint I have and why the dress got 4 stars instead of 5 is because the arm holes are smaller than they should be and I ended up chafing right above my armpits pretty badly from dancing for about 45 minutes. So if you have muscular arms or carry weight there it may not be the absolute perfect dress. Otherwise I highly recommend it!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress SO much! I received lots of compliments all day.
links_reviews_text: The fabric has some stretch to it. Great for big boobied girls. It was comfortable to dance in.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress I received so many compliments people did not stop raving about it!
links_reviews_text: The dress was form fitting and amazing for my sorority formal! Loved every minute of it!
This dress is very pretty (didn't give me a wow moment but it looked great on). It does run big as I'm typically a size 6 but the 4R fit perfectly for my pear shape

This dress was possibly one of the most comfortable dresses I've ever worn. It was a nice, thick material, the slit wasn't too high, and the straps actually stayed in place all night. A few times I had to stick the hanger loops back in, but other than that, perfect! Would totally wear again.

Love this dress! It was actually my back up style and I chose it because it’s more appropriate and comfortable than my original style for my event. The event was a charity ball. Fit is great and true, and the material is really good quality and heavy enough for elegance. Easy to dance in too!! Only thing I didn’t like was the hanger straps didn’t stay in throughout the night- I wish I would’ve used some tape on them. I received lots of compliments and would recommend this dress! I’m 5’9” and about 180ish lbs. I wore 4 inch heels and the length worked well and I wore a strapless bra, which was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my hospitals gala. It was a black tie affair and everything was just beautiful.
links_reviews_text: This dress was absolutely stunning. I wore the larger of the two sizes just because I knew I was going to be a eating a lot and wanted more room. I definitely could’ve worn the size 4. I got so many compliments. I wish I could just buy it. I’m 5’ 7” 145lbs and 34D.

Ordered this as my backup dress but ended up wearing it because my original did not fit! This fit true to size but is a bit roomy in the torso area, which is great to hide any belly. There were three hanger straps on each side of the dress. Being a rental, I figured I couldn't cut them out. Well they kept falling out all night and I was so bugged! Also, the ribbing on both sides of dress was coming out and cutting in to my sides all night. Overall, I thought I looked good and was happy with the dress, but had some downfalls!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for my work Gala. Fit was perfect and extremely comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I would recommend this dress if needed. I got a ton of compliments. Don’t rent in summer though. Material is a little in the thicker side but not heavy.
This dress fit perfectly. I would definitely wear it again. I’m 5’7 and wore 4 inch heals and it still brushed the floor. I got so many compliments!

I am a 5'5 women who normally wears a size 8. I feel this dress didn't synch at my waist like it should have and just kind of hung off my body. Secondly being only 5'5 wearing a 3 inch heel the dress was way to short. Would maybe recommend getting the Long vs the regular if above 5'5 and definitely a smaller size to have it hug you in the right places.
Fit like a glove, true to size, and so comfortable! Usually rentals are too long for me and I have to pin or tape in a couple places but this was perfect.

Unfortunately I did not end up wearing this dress because it was a little big -- the front silhouette was not flattering. I loved the look from the side and the light material that would work in spring / summer. I think that if I could size down it would work.
REALLY BIG. I didn't end up wearing dress due to fit. I wish there was the opportunity to order a few sizes.
Did not wear because I felt like a nun. Very modest and striking and beautiful but just not for me.

links_reviews_title: I love this dress, so simple but fits perfectly, very classy
links_reviews_text: simple but chic
Very slimming.

Dress is plain but fits well and is forgiving (runs slightly big). I wore this to a black tie wedding with a pearl necklace to make it a little more interesting. I'm 5"4 and wore 4 inch heels and the dress was a perfect length

links_reviews_title: Did not ware. I rented 4 dresses and 3 were hard to choose from.
links_reviews_text: Did not ware. I rented 4 dresses and 3 were hard to choose from. I will rent this again... loved the dress

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear, only because I rented another dress for the same event that I loved more. Fits great
links_reviews_text: Really great fit - like a glove, but in a good way. Not too tight - well made.
This is a fabulous dress. Stunning cut.
Wearing it feels nice, fitted and forgiving. I wore it with a pair Jimmy Choo biker boots to dinner on a rainy night and it was perfect. Could be dressed up or down.

I'm 5'11" without shoes on and even without the (24 week) baby bump this wouldn't have been long enough. I'm leaning back slightly in the picture and it still doesn't touch the ground. The material was thin, but the dress overall was very comfortable and the different strap options helped me add some character to the top. If I was shorter, I would rent it again

The waistband doesn't have as much give as I anticipated but it fit really well (once it was on). I used YouTube to find all the ways to tie the dress to customize it to by body. I got complements all night and can't wait to rent it again (there's 3 colors available!)

This is a gorgeous multi-way wear dress. You can dress this look up or down and feel both sexy and sweet depending on how you wear it. This was definitely one hard to give back! I wore this in a small, the default was saying I wore it in a large but that's incorrect.
I wore this dress twice on a cruise and no one knew it was the same dress. It was comfy and I felt great in it.

This was my back up dress and I really liked it. So many different ways to wear it, I could rent again and have a totally different look. If I had it to do over, I'd get the long length, though. I'd been planning on wearing heels but had to go buy flats at the last minute because it was so short. Super comfy though!
I'm 5'1" so it was a little long on me but it didn't matter since it was just for pictures. I loved this dress. The color is so rich. Highly recommend!

Nice heavy material. I decided to wear it as a one shoulder dress without double sided tape for my maternity shoot and it held up just fine. I'm 5'1" 106 prepregnancy ---> 125 @ 30 weeks. Would recommend for a maternity shoot!

links_reviews_title: I was able to convert my dress to whatever style that worked for me .
links_reviews_text: The fit can be tight or loose. Remember this is a dress you can turn into whatever style that works for you .
I wore this dress to prom & got complemented all night on just how elegant it was! Very pretty! I didn't wear a bra and felt secure the entire night!

links_reviews_title: Lovely bump-friendly dress for a gala!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a gala event while I was 20 weeks pregnant. Loved that I could tie it in different ways, although you need a sticky bra - I couldn't figure out a way to tie it that would allow for even a strapless bra. I ended up having to adjust the back several times through the night (fashion tape or a safety pin would have helped), and the large amount of fabric in the skirt meant I needed to hold it up to walk, but this dress was flattering, a gorgeous shade of navy, and bump-friendly! I wore the long (which I am never tall enough for!) because my bump pulled it up in the front and the regular looked too short. Would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: The dress is amazing!!! Everyone said how much they loved it. The customer service is beyond!
links_reviews_text: The dress was beyond what I could imagine and so was the service. Rent the runway is amazing and I recommend it for everyone. They truly care about the customer and want you to feel your best on your special night. I have nothing but amazing things to say about this dress. It fit like a glove. I loved it and it truly made my night memorable. Everyone said they loved my dress!!! It made my prom night a night to remember.

links_reviews_title: I loved the versatility of this dress!!
links_reviews_text: I'm y'all so having a dress y'all enough was wonderful. I wear a 6 but this dress was a little loose around my rib cage. Loved this dress so much though!

I am 5 months pregnant and was nervous about finding a dress that would flatter my bump. This dress was perfect. I got tons of compliments and felt confident all night. In fact, several people didn't even notice the bump and offered me a cocktail.

Rented this as a bridesmaid dress. Currently 26 weeks pregnant with twins. I'm 5'5", normal wear size 0, and wore the AL (long dress), it fit perfect to the ground with 4" wedges. It was super comfy and accented my bump perfectly, received compliments all night! The straps were easily made to adjust to a comfortable and flattering style, and the material was so comfortable to wear all night. Highly recommend as maternity option and would definitely rent again!

Wore this for my fiancé's fraternity formal. I LOVED it. I received so many compliments and the dress was so comfortable. I will say that with it only having 2 sizes it's tough to know your fit. I'm a size 12 and ordered the larger of the 2 sizes but the dress almost didn't fit. My back up size was the smaller of the 2 sizes and it looked like it would maybe fit a size 0-2. Other than the small issue with sizing this dress was a dream! I even thought about buying it!
Great dress. Almost to long. I'm 5'4" and wore 4-5 inch heels and still was a little long. Also, really big around waist. Had to tie tight

links_reviews_title: It was the fanciest wedding I will probably ever attend.
links_reviews_text: This was the perfect dress for a formal wedding! Being so short, I was a bit concerned about length, but I paired the petite version with heels (and brought flats for dancing) and it was just about right. I had a hard time deciding on which style to tie, but I loved having so many great options. This dress was incredibly comfortable and felt like a dream when walking. I would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Best choice for maternity formal wear!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress! Wore this dress while 18 weeks pregnant with my 3rd child. (Definitely a bigger bump than someone on their first) it fit awesome! It was so comfortable! I was worried about the lack of support for my chest but found that I was able to tie the dress and it gave me plenty of support. I did wear an adhesive bra but that was mostly to keep from having head lights all night. I am a size 6 not pregnant and my chest is probably a 34 E at the moment (possibly a bigger cup). I am considering buying this dress in the short version to wear during the summer because I love the versatility and how comfortable it was! I got a ton of compliments everyone loved the dress and said I looked amazing in it! Do yourself a favor and rent it!!

This gown is like wearing your pajamas! It's super comfortable and floats around your body. It was my backup gown and I was so comfortable in it, I couldn't not wear it. You can do the straps in a multitude of ways, the options are endless. The fabric is heavy enough to feel substantial without weighing you down. It was perfect!

links_reviews_title: Didn’t wear the dress for the event I rented it for
links_reviews_text: So I’m a normal 12. The waist was very tight on the AR. Just wasn’t what I was going for with the dress. The options to change up the dress are nice.

The color of this dress is absolutely beautiful in person but doesn't photograph nearly as well. The convertible feature is nice so you can change the fit for your own style. It was an easy dress to wear but you certainly won't stand out in the crowd.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Heavier then it looks.
links_reviews_text: I was so disappointed when I found that I couldn’t get this dress in time for my event. However my sister ordered the same dress and hers came in. At 9 months pregnant this was a perfect dress for me. It was so nice to be able to have something for my stomach and my chest. It was heavier than I thought it was going to be which was really nice for the event. I did end up wearing 4 inch heels with it so that I could make sure that it didn’t drag on the ground. I hope to rent this dress again in the future for another event.

After a month-long search for a floor length, navy blue bridesmaid dress, I was happy to stumble upon this beauty from RTR. It flowed beautifully with high quality, thick fabric and a beautiful cut to the dress. I wore pasties with this dress in lieu of a bra and still felt like I had adequate support because of how I wrapped the top portion. I did not wear the sweater pictured during the ceremony but was happy to have it for the reception (November wedding). I'm 5'7" and wore 1.5" heels, I rented the long version as well but was happy with the length of the regular. I managed to keep it out of puddles all day but if I hadn't lifted it, it would have dragged on the ground. It had Old Hollywood vibes and I was able to wrap the back so it was not backless like the pictures on here suggest. I wanted more coverage and was able to get it! YouTube video tutorials were helpful.

So I Was attending a gala. I needed a dress to fit the theme which was Arabian nights. I tried lots of different tying techniques and I totally recommend checking out some videos. Ultimately I went with the one shoulder look and lots of double-sided tape. I really do recommend having pasty's or bra, I did not. I am very small chested and the double-sided tape across my chest around my breasts pulled funny when I moved. It took a lot of work to make it smooth and flattering. If I'd had a bra or stickies it would've been a lot easier. I'm 5 foot 9 and the long was definitely long. There's a lot of fabric here and it's fun to move in but it takes a little practice. I don't recommend this dress, or at least this tie, if you're going to be dancing. The color was stunning. Great dress and perfect for my event.

links_reviews_title: Everything was beautiful!! I looked fabulous with my dress and it complimented my curves & body!
links_reviews_text: The dress is true to size and it flows very well with any body type and size.

I rented this dress after Googling options for how to tie it. I opted for a full coverage look because I was trying to hide some recent weight gain and it was cold! I received lots of compliments from people I didn't know and I liked the material. I was a little hesitant to dance too crazy at the wedding because the dress would come loose or shift around to show different areas. I just didn't lift my arms...no YMCA for this girl :)
It was beautiful! Fit great, it is customizable and fit the body nicely. You can't really wear a bra with it but it still is very complimentary. Received a lot of compliments

I wore this at 33 weeks pregnant for maternity photos and it was perfect. It looked bulky up close and the multiwear straps added to the bulk, but it photographed well. I ordered the petite size since I'm 5'4" and wasn't planning to wear heels, but if you have a pregnant belly I would recommend going with the longer size. It had lots of room in it, which was a perk for a pregnant person who is changing size and shapes daily. Very thick well made material; I wore it in the middle of summer, but it wasn't too hot.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and flattering at 5 months pregnant!
links_reviews_text: Fit well at 5 months pregnant. Super comfortable and although there is a lot of fabric it didn't feel too heavy. Tried different ways of tying the top and loved all of them - it was hard to decide which one to do! The directions were easy from the designers website. They have videos to show you how to tie and it's not as hard as you think - I was able to tie it myself without assistance. Recommended for any formal event, wedding, maternity shoot, etc.

Rented an AR size. Fitted well, fabric is very soft but really heavy. Practically impossible to wear any sort of bra with it. I didn't end up going to my event, so I didn't end up using the dress but I will consider it for the future!

links_reviews_title: The entire process was so easy and special. Made me feel AMAZING!
links_reviews_text: Pros: Gorgeous draping, very flattering, you get TWO sizes (I ended up going with the longer one I'm 5'5. I just wanted to be dramatic and have it drape the ground), comfortable fabric, stunning color Cons: tight waist! (but there's no zipper so that makes sense)

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress!!!!! I felt like an ancient Greek goddess.
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly, is comfortable, sexy and chic.

The waist looks small at first but if it were any bigger it wouldnt have fit well. At any rate, the dress is excellent but for someone with a large bust the options of tying are very limited. If you dont want to worry about support or side boob this is not the dress for you. Other than that, the dress is really great the material is excellent and the length is perfect. Also, the color of the navy blue is beautiful.

Fit was great mund you there is only 2 sizes its stretchy material. I have a larger chest area and am not a fan of going braless after having children but I bought the flower pasties from target just the thin ones to go over my nipples because the fabric is thin enough to see them when its cold. They helped me feel more comfortable. I was quite surprised with the weight of the dress it is quite heavy but not that it weighed me down while wearing it I actually liked that it wasnt light material. I absolutly would buy this dress and just might look into it.

I wore this for an indoor/outdoor wedding in early fall. I had a lot of fun trying different ways to tie it. (Hint: look up twobirds convertible dress for lots of looks and tutorials). I ended up going with a look with sleeves and plunging neckline. Though it would have been super easy to alter that at any point (think conservative in the Church, sexy at the reception). I tried it on at the store and I wore 3 1/2 heels (it IS long for those of us who are not tall. I didn't really find a way to shorten since the adjustable part is the top. I loved the color and fabric. It was so fun to walk and dance in it. It's comfortable too. I got a lot of compliments and would rent this again.

I didn't believe that this dress would fit sizes 0-12, but I'm a believer now! My husband chose this for me, and I loved wearing it. I got so many compliments and it was sexy without being too much. I was worried about the amount of cleavage, but it was fine! Will definitely rent again in another color.

The A fit perfectly, I’m about a size 14 in jeans but only because of my hips and legs, so the B was huuuuge on my waist and had an ungodly amount of extra fabric. I loved the fit and how you could tie it many different ways. I wore this for a military ball so my husband wasn’t in a dress up mood to tie it 100 ways, but I think if you have a girlfriend around to play with it, this dress is that much better! Definitely recommend but the sizing is tricky if you’re curvy like me.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Really comfortable and so many options on how to wear it. Highly recommended

links_reviews_text: I'm 29 weeks pregnant with a large baby bump 3 other RTR dresses did not work for me, but this convertible dress was perfect! Had enough weight to make the dress lay perfectly over the bump but felt light and easy. I would rent this again even if I wasn't pregnant!

links_reviews_title: Holiday dress and bold work dress
links_reviews_text: The fabric was a little worn. The dress was soft and the length was flattering. It was a little too big and bunched up after walking but looked great well it was pulled down.

links_reviews_title: So comfy and a great fit! Perfect for a holiday party.
links_reviews_text: It's more comfortable than you would think. Very stretchy and comfortable material.
I loved this dress. It's very tight but hugs in the right places. The material is a bit thin so be wary of your undergarment lines.

links_reviews_title: Dress was delivered the next day! Seamless process and fit perfectly!
links_reviews_text: The dress was perfect for the cocktail gala I attended! Had a last minute invite and rent the runway made it possible to get a perfect dress right in time.

This dress is fitted and works well for an hourglass shape. I could wear this out for a nice happy hour and tame it down with a blazer for work (which I did). I love the dress and have not returned it yet. I'm contemplating buying it!

I love this trendy dress by Shilla! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works for all sizes A-C. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear nubra or a low strapless bra since there is an open back. At 5’4”, the length hit tea length on me. This shade of red of the dress is amazing in person and makes it unique. Pair with black or nude heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!

I really enjoyed this dress, I think the color is a standout. The back is cut out, so I may not be work-friendly, but definitely party friendly. The arm holes are a bit large, but that didn't cause me any problems. Overall I liked it!
I got so many compliments on this dress! I LOVED the color, the first, and the back cutout. It was office appropriate but absolutely stunning.

This dress was lovely, but I wish the fabric was a little more firm. It was a basic cotton, which I wasn't really expecting. Ended up buying spanx to wear underneath it just to make myself feel a little more "held together." Pretty dress, though.

links_reviews_title: Color is fantastic- felt sophisticated and sexy!
links_reviews_text: Got a ton of compliments on this dress! The cut and length were perfect for my event. It ran a little snug on my hips/butt, but nothing a light pair of Spanx couldn't smooth out.
I usually get a size medium, but the large was still too tight on my size 8 (6-10 depending on designer) thick-waisted body. I'm 5'6" and 148 right now, 34D. Size way up!
Comfortable and flattering. The back is interesting but my bra strap was showing. Other than that love love love this dress.
Too long in the torso, which makes the waist sit too long. Fabrics is just ok. Not wonderful.
This dress is amazing. The neck and arm cuts are very flattering. I did wear a sticky bra on the front as the back was open.
Fit was good; just too small so went for another dress

I typically wear an 8, pear shaped/ample hips and bum. I ordered the large as advised and it fit like a glove. Received tons of compliments. The back cut out is sexy and allows for a standard strapless bra.

The high neckline on this is super cute. The back is cut too low to wear a standard bra (and probably isn't acceptable for work anyway) so I wore a blazer over it. Great conservative length - perfect desk to dinner in my book!
Felt curve hugging yet still appropriate for work or a nice event! Length was great too

Beautiful transition dress for springtime. It's a bit heavier which is comfortable during the cool evenings. I wore it to work with a jean jacket and booties and easily transformed it for an evening out. Compliments all day!!

links_reviews_title: Too tight for me for work so did not wear
links_reviews_text: Too snug
Length was perfect for my 6'+ frame and love the material; slight stretch.
I wore this for Christmas Eve and loved it! Great fit - not too tight. Heavier/Thicker material. Love the style
The fabric was amazing! Felt sexy and beautiful in this dress. Wore it for Christmas and got many compliments. Fit amazing and didn't want to take it off
Wore this for Christmas Eve dinner in NYC. Fit like a glove and I loved the high neck.
It's fitted. Midi length on me. The back space opens up a little depending on how you are standing. Goes well with pumps. Fits true to size.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for work holiday function with a coat over
links_reviews_text: #chic
I love the tailored light fit. Everything stayed in place and the curves were on point

links_reviews_title: Such a fun and unique shape and print- felt like a walking party
links_reviews_text: Don't think I would have picked this online but picked this up in the store and ended up loving it so much! The one shoulder with ruffle was unique and fun. Fit like a glove. I liked that the fabric had structure and didn't blow up too much in the wind, too.
Great colors and flattering style. Felt cute and fun for my bday, dressing it down with silver sneakers. Definitely glad I sized up. When I tried my normal 8, I couldn't zip it up.

links_reviews_title: Lightweight, colorful and so fun to dance in
links_reviews_text: Cons: It is VERY light weight and the bottom ruffle is a full circle, so if there's a breeze, everyone's seeing what you're wearing underneath and the top ruffle blows up like a frill-necked lizard. lol Also, it needed a bit of pressing from the journey in the bag. Pros: So brightly colored, fun to wear and makes your waste look tiny (due to the waste strap that others have mentioned being very fitted). Super flattering for hourglass figure. Great for dancing the night away!

This light Cotten summer dress was perfect for a variety of events - from family picnics to graduation parties. On hot days it stayed cool, strapless bra was optional even with an ample bosom. I styled it casual with a denim jacket and flip flops. I styled it with wedge heels and a clutch for a more upscale event. It worked easy peasy in every context. My only warnings: Mind the breeze, bottom ruffle will give you a Marilyn Monroe moment! Waist band is tight after meals (also not good for maternity) Overall I recommend!

Wore this while walking all day while on vacation. It's a sturdy material so it held up well to sweat and it's fitted around your butt so you don't have to worry about exposing yourself if the wind blows. The ruffles on top and are fun and the colors were perfect for summer.

links_reviews_title: Super small! But cute and lightweight material
links_reviews_text: I am between 14 and 16, rarely does a 16 not fit but this one was no where close to zipping up over my rib cage. Too bad, as the pattern and cut were super cute and playful.

links_reviews_title: Such a cute, fun dress! I received so many compliments :)
links_reviews_text: The dress fits well but may run a tad large, and it'll definitely need a press/iron since it's cotton-based. I'm in between losing weight so I can't guarantee how small it runs!
Wore a strapless bra, tan heels, white statement earrings. It was super comfortable and I had a ton of complements from strangers. Danced all night!

I wore this to a brunch bridal shower. The colors on this dress were beautiful and I really loved the shoulder accent, however, there is a band around the waist that isn't obvious in the sample pictures and that band ran really small. I am normally a 12 and I had to wear the 14 and that was still tight, solely because of the band. However, other than that, it was super light weight and comfortable. I did get a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for summer events and parties!
links_reviews_text: This is a fun dress. I love that the fabric is a light-weight cotton, making it the perfect choice for hot nights. Even so, it maintained its shape really well. The dress runs small. I am running a 14 these days and couldn't get the 14 zipped. The 16 was just right, except for the bust, which was way too loose. That's great for women with more curves! Rent this one!
I loved this dress. I wore it to the Grand Ole Opry while on a trip to Nashville and got so many compliments. Thanks, RTR!

links_reviews_title: My fiancé couldn't take his eyes off me
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect. Very flattering

Great fit! I normally wear a 10 or 12. This 12 was so comfortable and not too big. I could've worn a 10 but the 12 was not too small and I'm so y'all that it probably gave me a little extra length and otherwise may have been too short. I wore this dress for multiple occasions and almost purchased it.
This was a great dress for a late summer wedding. Note the fabric is very thin, not that that's a bad thing, the color and the print make up for it and make it look high-quality.

links_reviews_title: Festive wedding event in the Caribbean.
links_reviews_text: Perfect cool dress for a Caribbean themed event
Not the fabric I was expecting, not as formal as I thought it would be. Also ran very small, couldn't zip at all.

links_reviews_title: Hips and waist run small, top of dress runs true to size
links_reviews_text: Sized up and was pleased. But had to pin the top for a better fit. Light material that poofs up when you sit down, if you don’t hold it down you will flash everyone within eye distance...
Fit like a glove without being tight! Wore this to brunch with heels and got lots of compliments -- then walked around with my Stan smiths and it was the perfect summer dress
My assumption is this dress runs a little small. I'm usually a size 4 or 6 if the dress runs small but surprisingly the size 8 fit great. Got lots of compliments in this flirty dress.

links_reviews_title: Great day time dress for summer
links_reviews_text: I'm a 5'4" 110 lb 32B and got size 0. Dress fits great and got many compliments but would recommend getting a size up if you prefer the dress not being too tight on a belly area.

links_reviews_title: Loved it but I was too pregnant to wear it!
links_reviews_text: I thought this may work for a wedding because I'm showing but not much yet and normally I would wear a 6 or and 8 but thought a 10 would be good. It was too tight and I was sooooo sad! Maybe next year.
Very nice. Brand new dress clearly (still had tags) but couldn't zip it up and I'm a 14.
So comfortable and beautiful
Great fit! Tricky zipper if you're doing it solo, but tons of compliments all night long.

This dress is beautiful. It's simple and classic but the shoulder detail and cutout in back adds visual interest. That said, it runs TINY. I usually wear a 4 or 6 and wore the 6, but would definitely have been more comfortable in an 8.
Great dress! Although the fabric at the bottom appeared to pucker/wrinkle kind of funny. It was a beautiful dress to wear to a work award ceremony.
I love this dress! It's my second time renting it and it's always been so comfortable and perfect for any semi formal occasion!

links_reviews_title: This dress was awesome. I have curves and the dress hugged every inch of them. Date night approved.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. A nice amount of stretch without being too much. I might buy it.

I wore this for my graduation and graduation party, and received so many compliments! I could definitely dance in it if needed (you can definitely move/lift the sleeved arm), the color was gorgeous, and it was super elegant. The only thing is the back has a cutout that didn't totally lay correctly, but it wasn't very noticeable. I'm between a 6 and an 8, and the 8 fit perfectly! I didn't wear a bra, and wore no show underwear, but I'm not sure how other undergarments might look, since you might be able to see some lines through the fabric (didn't try it with other things, so not sure). All in all, I would definitely recommend this dress! I wore it for two pretty full days, and it was comfy the entire time.

What a great dress! Felt very elegant in it. Both the 2 and the 4 fit, actually pretty similarly. The 4 was more comfortable but too loose in the hips for the more fitted look I was going for. The 2 was slimmer all the way down but a bit tight in the waist. Overall would order this again! Very flattering and boned waist nips you in a bit especially if you go down a size. The color was a tad bit more plum than just deep red, in my opinion.

I loved this dress! I would rent this again for a wedding for sure. I'm typically a size 2. Ordered a 2 and backup size 4. The size 2 was perfect! True to size and not to mention super comfortable. I wore the sleeve slightly on top of my shoulder so that I wasn't restricted with my arms at all. LOVE!! Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Everything about it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: This dress is beyond gorgeous! I wore it to a formal charity event, and got so many compliments. It fit perfectly, and is so flattering. This was my first experience with Rent the Runway, and now I will forever use this service for all future formal events. Loved it!!

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress. I should have worn the larger size, bc it was a bit tight, but it was lovely.
links_reviews_text: Wore the size 4. Should have worn the size 6. It was a bit tight around the top but only bc o should have sized up. Lovely dress to wear to the Nutcracker!
This dress is tight and the style is not very forgiving for curvier bodies. Can't where spanx with the back cutout.

First time using RTR & the dress was everything I wanted! The colour was beautiful, the material is comfy and stays put, and the fabric is nice and thick. The bottom skirt portion is we fitted no matter what your side, and if anything, the top is a bit tighter. Nonetheless, one of my favorite dresses I've ever worn! Comfortable, stylish, and classic.
This dress fit great. Was perfect for an awards dinner where everyone was wearing black. Not as stretchy as I thought it would be but was still very flattering on.

links_reviews_title: This was my first RTR dress and I loved it. Wish I could have kept it. So flattering!
links_reviews_text: Body-hugging fit but somehow still very flattering. It was comfortable even when I sat down. I typically wear a 4 and the 6 fit perfectly.

This was so cute. The boning on the back right side was slightly irritating after wearing the dress for a few hours but easy to fix. You can't lift your right arm but omg this dress looked so good and was comfortable overall.

Tight fit. Material was very comfortable and had stretch. The front and back were very flattering. Beautiful neckline. Zipper is located on the left side. Perfect fit and can’t wait to order from RTR again.

links_reviews_title: So nice to receive the dress in the mail on time and so easy to return!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great with some stretch and give to it! I was the best dressed at our event ! The only complaint I gave is there was a wiring in the back that was poking me and think the dress would be more beautiful if it was fitted all the way down, it flares out too much on the bottom!

links_reviews_title: I wish I had a full length picture to share. This one captures the gorgeous neckline. Very elegant!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit beautifully; hugging all the right places. The should strap was surprisingly pretty comfortable, even while dancing. Beautiful dress!! Wish I could wear it again!!

I wore this dress for a cocktail attire wedding. It was the perfect fit and was comfortable for the 12 hour event. If you plan to wear the sleeve off your shoulder be sure to count your left arm out as it’s hard to raise your arm at all. I loved this dress and received many compliments on it. I would order it again!

I am about 115lbs and 32C I ordered a size 2 and a 0 for my backup and the size 0 ended up fitting the best! I got many compliments. The dress was super comfortable and stayed put while I danced all night! Loved it

links_reviews_title: Great fit but tight around the right arm
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful and overall was comfortable, flattering, and well constructed. The only drawback is what others have already mentioned- the arm is too tight and also makes it hard to raise your arm. While the rest of the dress fit better in my usual size, the arm strap fit better in a size up. I still loved the dress though!

I wore this dress for my anniversary dinner. I felt beautiful and sexy! I received so many compliments as well. Cons were some of the boning from the dress was poking me in the back. Not sure if that's with every dress or if it's just been worn a lot. Also there is no way to wear shape wear because of the key hole back. I'm just a girl that likes shape wear to make outfits look as good as possible. Overall though, I absolutely loved it.

I was a bit disappointed when I first put this dress on. It's very form fitting, even at a 6 (usually a 4). But everyone else seemed to love it. I got endless complements at my event. The color is great and definitely stood out among a lot of navy and black. The back is very sexy thanks to the high slit and cutout. Good rental overall.
I ended up wearing the size 8(two sizes up) based on previous reviews. The fit was great and it had plenty of give for dancing all night!

I loved this dress so much! I wore it to a NYE wedding and got so many compliments. I usually wear a 12 or 14 in dresses and ordered both. I ended up wearing the 14 and it fit like a glove! I’m a 34 DDD and the top was snug but I wasn’t falling out or pulling the dress up all night. I’m 6’3” and it hit me right below the knee. I definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Sophisticated dress for a winter wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for my fiancé's brother's wedding! It was right after Christmas, so the berry color was perfect. Looked very classy & fun. The one sleeve was a little tight & I couldn't wear a bra - but the 6 zipped up just fine. Runs a little smaller than most other dresses I've rented.

Ordered this dress for a company party and it was perfect! I wasn't expecting it to be so long but I am only 5'0. If ordering keep in mind there is a side zipper so I could've went a size up but the 8 didn't look tight. Overall it was a great dress and the shoulder strap wasn't as restrictive as i thought.

This dress was gorgeous and though I felt like I looked good I was uncomfortable. The boning was digging in to me and it fit too small. I typically wear a 4/6 but I wore an 8 and I think I could have gone up to a 10! Your strapless bra has potential to show in the back so just check. The color is gorgeous and I wore gold jewelry with nude shoes. I wouldn't rent again but see the appeal.

links_reviews_title: Our holiday family picture turned out sophisticated:)
links_reviews_text: Hats off to this dress. Nothing but pure joy and confidence wearing it.

Classic and elegant dress but definitely has a wow factor. Received a ton a compliments and loved the fit. Ran small, glad I ordered the extra dress. Usually wear a 4 or 6 and had to go with the 8. Was very comfortable and fit perfect. Color was stunning and perfect for fall wedding.

I rented this for a Fall wedding in Maine and it was perfect. I got 2 sizes and wore the size up from my regular size because of bunching (didn't want to be pulling the dress down all night) the size up was smooth and comfortable. Great stretch and loved the off the shoulder detail, length, and color (great for Fall). Highly recommend, would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: This dress was classy and definitely stood out in a crowd
links_reviews_text: This dress is tight but true to size. You can wear a strapless bra and the length hit about mid calf on me. The best part is the sleeve stays put through all the wedding dancing fun

This dress was tight in all of the right places. Fabric was forgiving but also tight up top (didn't even need to wear a bra!) I would def recommend sizing up as I do think it runs small. I'd rent this again for sure!
I went a size up because I'm expecting and the fit, style, and color are just perfect for the occasion. I felt amazing and comfortable in it. Xoxo

links_reviews_title: This dress was such a hit and photographs really nicely.
links_reviews_text: The fit is exactly true to size and very flattering. I have wider hips and it worked just fine. The only cons are that the shoulders are a bit tight and the cutout in the back could be difficult with Spanx, but it worked just fine for me. Overall I absolutely loved this dress.
Wore this dress to my cousins wedding and it fit perfectly. Lots of complements. Fabric was great and not constraining! I'd rent this one again for sure!

links_reviews_title: Unique style brought on tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress and was honestly sad to send it back. Never have I had more compliments throughout a night. The style was just unique enough (especially with the cut out in the back),l to draw attention. I also loved the length of the dress coming below my knee - it was very elegant! My only problem is that the black strings you use to hang it up kept slipping out, and people kept tucking them in for me.
Excellent fitting dress. Nice, thick material and the one shoulder stayed put. I received SO many compliments on this dress.
Fit beautifully and the color was gorgeous for a fall wedding.
I wore for an evening but a little too much. Not comfortable - tight on the neck and too many ties, the grommets and flared sleeves add to the drama.
Cute and fun shirt to wear. The blue appeared a bit dull, but overall style is cute. The gold circles really made this top unique. Had to wear a tank underneath, but they work well together.
Wore it once, so unique that I didn't feel like I could wear more than that. Fit good.

links_reviews_title: Cute top but very low cut - had to wear a bralette under it
links_reviews_text: Really cute print and details. I have a small rib cage and the tie made it fit perfectly. The gold circles metal detail is great but they sit right on your skin.
