Always cold at first lol. I could not into this top without help! It has a very low zipper in the back and even if I tied the sleeves they would come undone as I put it on but it is really cute on. I have a long torso so this just came right to my waist. It was very low cut but I wore a navy bralette with it (it's navy and pink print). I wore it for a date night with my husband and again to a country concert with jeans and boots. Liked it because it was different and didn't blend!
Very cute style with the belt and ties in the sleeves. I wore a tank top under because it is low cut. Comfortable. Flattering.

links_reviews_title: I wanted a smaller size so I didn't wear it out.
links_reviews_text: I have very broad shoulders and a long torso, and the v-neck is still cut very low. My normal bra doesn't work for this cut unfortunately. It's a gorgeous shirt, and very flattering otherwise. I'm going to go for a smaller size to see if that works better!

Wore this top for my kids' school's fundraiser event/date night with my husband. It was a hit! Fun details and beautiful colors. I wish it hadn't been quite so low cut, but added a cami and it worked. The tie waist gives it a flexible fit.
Very low cute- will need a camisole underneath. I ordered a size up and it fit perfectly in the chest, but even with fashion tape there was no way to wear it without a camisole.

links_reviews_title: Loved the unique hardware on the blouse.
links_reviews_text: Definitely needs a pin, otherwise the girls will be out!

I loved this top much more than I expected to. It cinched my waist really well and although it showed off the 'girls' quite a bit it held up great and was really comfortable. I'd say this is a sexy top and worth the investment for a date night or a night out with the girls!

links_reviews_title: Whispy, but tough to figure out
links_reviews_text: Never wore it because I couldn't figure out how to tie it. Didn't like the metal accents. Too big. Liked the colors.
Couldn’t wear this since there was no way to hold it closed at the bust. Odd fit overall.

links_reviews_title: Unique look, bit tight to get on
links_reviews_text: Tight to get on & doing up a bit tricky but once on v nice. Needs vest under, unless you want to show a lotta cleavage! . Felt a bit maternity - esque with front loose flaps but perfect for a night of pasta indulging! Nice material & detail, quite unique.

The metal grommets and ties added nice detailing. The front is definitely very low, so a cami or bandeau is required. The bows on the sleeves are a little messy and the the front wrap gives you a pouch.

links_reviews_title: So cute with a white tank under with pink shorts and wedges
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit
The material under the bust just didn't lay right. It wasn't attractive.
Pretty fabric and colors, however fit me like a maternity top. I am busty, maybe it's better for someone smaller in the chest.
Fun top
The top is well made. Just wasn't super flattering on me.
Low cut and short on me. Wasn’t super comfortable.
Runs small and is short on the torso
Cute, but too small
This shirt is absolutely beautiful. I couldn't wear it to work however because of the grommet holes around the front that the tie threads through. Too peekaboo for work. Pretty though and fit great.
Power femme. All the way. This is way more plunging and football shouldered than I expected. But the fabric is so light and airy it still feels hyper feminine. So cool.

I sized up on this shirt and it worked very well. Gorgeous print and the detailing was amazing! The plunge v-neck is a bit too deep for anyone with a short upper body. The mid section is flowy and either forgiving or not very flattering depending on your body. Would def rent again!
Pros: The fabric is nice and blouse offers unique details with the grommets. Cons: The wrap has a very deep v. Needs a cami or no bra.

links_reviews_title: Pretty princess vibes (slightly ruined by how often I was yanking my dress up) :(
links_reviews_text: The material is durable and thick, not too heavy. Good for cooler temps. Wore it to a February wedding in iowa. The size 4 was too tight in the torso, but perfect in the chest.. The size 6 was good in the torso and loose in the chest. So I chose the latter and spent the night yanking my dress back up :P Felt like a little princess - definitely gives off a cutesy girly vibe.
I wore this for an 80's prom and it was perfect. It fit great and I got so many compliments. I would definitely rent it again for a formal affair.

I wore this for Night to Shine! Super comfy dress, but I did feel like I was pulling it up a lot when dancing. I'm 5'6, 135lbs, 32D. The dress was a little long on me but I definitely didn't want to go down a size. I got a 2 and 4 and ended up wearing the 2. I wore a sticky bra which worked well. Overall it was a success and I got a lot of compliments!
I'm mad at myself for not buying this dress. It fit beautifully, length was good for my 5'3 self, and even made me look tan!

links_reviews_title: Great for work event! Comfy and flattering.
links_reviews_text: Wore to a gala for work. Comfortable all night. It is long in the back I'm 5'4" and it was still grazing the floor with 4 inch heels.

I rented this for a wedding! I revived so many compliments on this dress. The pink was definitely brighter than I expected but it was a nice surprise. I typically don't wear pink items but this was great!
Fit was great however being strapless and a heavy material I was hoisting it up most of the night. It was super flattering and such a fun change from black or red! Runs long, a tiny bit large.
The weight of the dress caused me to pull it up multiple times throughout the evening which would not hinder me from renting it again. I loved it!
The color. The shape. The fit. This dress is a real topic of convo! It's not boned so I needed a strapless bra underneath but it held me in and was so flattering!

I wore this dress to a black tie optional wedding. I would have liked to try on the 4, but only ordered 0 and 2. It was a little long with my heels, but not enough to notice. I received a.l lot of compliments! I didn't have issues with the dress falling down, but I might have had I sized up.

Beautiful hi-lo dress. The top stays up while dancing up a storm as well! The color is a gorgeous pink. It is a very comfortable material, but fairly thick, so for a wedding that is either fall or spring/early summer. I love this dress!

This dress is a showstopper. It fits like a dream and the material is thick enough that it keeps shape but also isn't too hot. The dress is very long though (I am 5'7" and I wore 3" heels and the end still hit the floor) and beware of the color, it is definitely hot pink, not like the RTR picture. Overall though, the dress is beautiful and unique and I received so many compliments

A friend rented this before and said it was so comfortable and flattering- it really was! I'm typically an 8 with my sporty body type but the 10 fit better so definitely order your true size and then one up. Beautiful color, fits so nicely, good fabric and got compliments all night long. Would definitely recommend!

I am usually a 6 and this fit me well. I did wear a bra but probably could've gone without. I got so many compliments throughout the night! I am 5'6" and the length was fine with heels that were about 3 inches. Only downside was having to iron the skirt, however I would still rent this again!
Great for a summer wedding. Tons of compliments! I was mostly concerned that the color would be too bright, but it wasn't. Very comfortable, thick fabric but not too hot. Stays up easily!

I got so many compliments and i loved the color. It made for a great summer wedding guest dress. It fit perfectly. I am tall (5'9") and wore heels and the length in the back was perfect. I can see how someone shorter might have trouble. I would definently recommend this dress.

This dress is one of the best I've ever worn! Great for dancing at weddings and fits true to size (it was a bit tight on top for me but still was very comfortable) I received so many compliments on it!! Wish I could wear this to every event.

This is a great dress! More vibrant pink than on the model. I wore my regular size, but it was tight up top. I have a very wide rib cage and a muscular back, so the top did not leave room for a bra. That was fine because I have a small bust, but keep it in mind! The dress also blouses out by the pleats in the waist which wasn’t the most flattering, but that might just be how it fit me. I got tons of compliments wearing it, and I paired with a necklace from here too. I felt great, was comfortable, and loved being able to show off some fun shoes! I recommend this as a fun alternative to the sea of black dresses at any event!

I rented this dress for a summer wedding and it was perfect. It's a beautiful bright (but not too bright) shade of pink and is comfortable and easy to dance in. The dress stayed up all night too and I didn't have to worry about pulling it up as a usually do with strapless dresses.

links_reviews_title: I ordered this dress for a wedding. It fit perfectly! I felt like a Barbie!
links_reviews_text: Fabric is a bit heavy and thick but overall it was great. At 5’2” with 3 inch heels, there was about an inch or two that still hit the floor - maybe wear higher heels.
The dress was beautiful!! The only issue is it kept slipping down, but other than that, I got tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: Received tons of compliments on this dress. The color was a perfect shade of pink, it was bright without being too “barbie pink”. I found the length to be just right, I wore average height heels and it did not drag in the back. My only complaint was that it was a little snug in the chest and I did have to pull up and adjust throughout the night, but find myself doing that with most any strapless dress.

This dress was sooo fun and fit like a glove! Really flattering so it's slimming but lose around the stomach so you can still eat. I got a thousand compliments on it, it's super bright so if you don't want to stand out don't wear it haha but I LOVED it!
A little right in the back, but flowy throughout.

Great color, fabric and the dress is made well. It's a flattering dress. I wore a strapless bra under it and it was perfect. I wore it to a black tie optional wedding in Charleston and it was a great dress for the occasion. The fabric wasn't scratchy and it didn't slip on me at all. Watch out for the length thought. I'm 5'7 and it was almost to long on me. With heels it was perfect though. Felt like a million bucks and got compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely Loved this Dress!! Got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'1 and I wore 5 inch heels and it was still a little long.

I am typically a 12 but sized up based on reviews because I am very busty (DDD) and I'm so glad I did. I needed the extra room up top. I loved this dress and wore it for a formal wedding in Dallas. Got a ton of compliments!

I wore this dress to a black tie fundraiser gala. The long short length was perfect as there were variety of lengths worn at this event. The color was really fun and pretty for spring when I attended the event. It was a little too long in the back but I just picked it up when I walked outside. Very comfortable and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Stunning color, very flattering, and great movement
links_reviews_text: This dress was so gorgeous. First of all, the color is so fun and so different than what most people choose for a formal event. Second, it's so forgiving at the waist so it's great for a dinner friendly occasion when you want desert. And Last, when you walk, this fabric on this dress moves in such a stunning way. It's definitely classy, sophisticated, fun, unique, and flirty. I LOVED wearing it!

I wore this for a Derby party at a horse farm. I got TONS of compliments. The dress is a casual yet thick material. It is dressy but was perfect for outside. It was flowing and elegant. The size 4 fit perfectly. I'm 5'7" and wore a fairly high heel.
This dress fit perfectly! It stayed put and was just the right amount of fun for a beach wedding. Keep in mind the wind will pick up this fabric!

Absolutely loved this dress! It runs a bit small so I would advise getting the next size up as your backup. This made my waist look super small and was incredibly flattering and I got so many compliments. It stayed up with no issues. I'm 5'2" and the length was perfect. One thing to be aware of - in the picture it looks more of a peach color, but in person it's a very bright pink (which was fine with me; I love pink.) I would absolutely rent again.

links_reviews_title: The wonderful part was not having to shop around! I just clicked a few buttons on here & done!
links_reviews_text: Wore to a formal wedding and it was perfect! Very heavy nice material! The color is so much better in person!

This dress fit like a glove! The material is thick and high quality. The color pops and photographs very well. I received so many compliments in this dress. It is easy to dance in and bonus- I didn't spend all night pulling it up and adjusting it. Couldn't have been more perfect. Rent this dress! You will be so happy if you do!
Thick fabric, stayed up well! TTS

Tight on top (I'm an A/B cup and 35") and the pleat in the front causes unflattering billowing and this is WITH spanx on. Would be an awesome maternity dress. Not recommended for those who want to look slender from the side as well as the front.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'7" and 142 lbs. I am pretty fit, and really the only problem I have with clothes is my hips! But this dress fit perfectly. I loved the flow and the fit. :)
Perfect fit, feel, and true to size. I was totally in love with this dress and the compliments were amazing.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fit. Perfect for spring weddings
links_reviews_text: True to size. Great fit and fabric. Very pretty bold pink color

I normally am between an 8-10 in dresses. The 8 fit well but was tighter up top than the 10 so I went with the 10 to be a little bit more comfortable. throughout the night I had to pull up the top a few times which I probably wouldn't have had to do as much with the 8 but both would have worked well! This is SUCH a flattering, gorgeous dress. The back is pretty long though as I am 5'10 & was wearing about 2 inch heels & had to pick up the back to prevent it from being on the ground sometimes. So if you're shorter just know that it will probably be a little long! Overall I loved this dress and was so sad to have to send it back.
Was perfect for a beach rehearsal. Great colors and long enough to cover my legs that I don't show too often! Top fit great!
Wore this to an outdoor jazz festival. It would be appropriate for a more formal affair. Absolutely beautiful!
I thought that this dress was great. It fit extremely well and I got compliments all night long!
I typically wear a 4/6, but the 2R fit perfectly. It definitely is much better in person, lots of compliments. The underskirt does ride up a bit when walking, but it was manageable.

First, excuse the funky photo, but the gym was the only place I had a long mirror! Even the woman stocking shelves in the grocery store stopped to tell me "how pretty your dress is." The skirt is full (see photo) and the top was a great fit. Perfect for a date, a wedding or simply to feel pretty on a summer's day. One note: the fabric catches on things easily, but I soon figured out how to avoid that.
Beautiful colors. Great fit. A little long so not for shorter people. Perfect for a summer wedding or event
Compliments galore! Rent it today...

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments, really beautiful lace!
links_reviews_text: True to size and plenty of room for extra curvy figure. Everyone loved the dress, it also had a nice flow to the skirt. Needed help with the zipper. I wore it with a regular nude bra. It as perfect for a hot and humid summer wedding

I wore this dress for my bridal shower, and it was perfect! I got so many compliments. The dress was structured but still very comfortable, and the colors were beautiful. It will probably run long on anyone who is average height/short, but for tall ladies like me, it's perfect!
Such a pretty dress! So comfortable and appropriate for a formal dinner at a museum I attended.
I ended up wearing another dress but loved this a lot in person.
Super cute dress. Conservative, and flattering. the lilac really pops against the white. Loved!
Fit as expected, probably could have gone 12 since that is my typical size but I went up. Dress is flirty and fun. Wore it to my wedding shower.
I felt like a princess in this dress! I got compliments all day, and felt perfectly comfortable for being so dressed up.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Fits great. Unique fabric.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress. Fits great. Unique fabric.

links_reviews_title: The fabric and the construction of the garment were exquisite!!
links_reviews_text: This is not the typical covered in light lace dress that can be found everywhere. The outer layer is almost a light crochet -- not delicate at all for wearing all day and arriving back home without a tear. The under dress has its own lining. It fit like a glove and I know the more popular cheaper versions would never have survived the day. The flow of the skirt -- compliments all day long. Give it a try.

links_reviews_title: A little dressy for work, but still loved it!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful and feminine. I got tons of compliments.

The fit is perfect. Very, VERY flattering! It looks much longer on me than it does on the model, maybe because I have pretty short legs. For whatever reason, it looks more formal on me than it does in the picture. But I don't care! I feel like a 7-year-old with a new Easter dress! So overdressed or no, I'm wearing this everywhere!!! :D

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a summer rose party
links_reviews_text: Fit great, comfortable, lovely fabric and pattern. Got a ton of compliments! Good for a summer evening party of dancing.

This dress I rented for my bridal shower, and it's definitely a pretty dress - and fit true to size - however, felt kind of heavy in comparison to other dresses. Plus, the super long length of it paired with the high neckline made it feel like it had way too much fabric for a summer shower. I did not wear.
Did not wear... would have been too hot and heavy to dance in
Great shape not see through

links_reviews_title: This dress is a classic cut with beautiful lace!
links_reviews_text: The lace is amazing!

This dress is gorgeous x 1000! I will rent again and am contemplating for engagement photos. The dress is stunning on and lays so pretty. I was able to not wear a bra with this and wore it a few times while on vacation. The lace is beautiful. The dress is very agreeable on an hourglass or large busted woman.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments, and it fit perfectly!
links_reviews_text: Pretty lace details, fit perfectly and was surpisingly a bit heavy on the bottom but would definitely recommend
fit very nicely

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a spring wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress is very comfortable. You can wear a strapless bra under it. I wasn't sure if it was formal enough for a spring black tie wedding but I think the tea length dresses it up more and with the right accessories it was perfect. I got lots of compliments! Highly recommend.
This dress is gorgeous and gorgeously made. The lace overlay is soft to the touch, not scratchy or stiff and it has faux horsehair at the bottom to make the skirt move and drape beautifully. A++++++
white slip underneath very short.

The material of this dress is a mesh like stretchy fabric that flatters everytime. I enjoy the fun vibrant prints. I also paired with suede jacket and flat boots for an edgy Friday vibe. This is my third time renting Fuzzi, I love it.

I found this very comfortable and easy to wear. Normally I'm a size medium but as this is clingy I'm glad I sized up. Being a woman of a certain age (!) I found the synthetic fibers made we rather hot - I stayed closed to the ac!
The one thing I love about Fuzzi dresses is the fact that they are lightweight. Very flattering. Stretches to fit. You can always guarantee their Dresses will look nice on
Lots of compliments. Very pretty dress, lots of stretch, and flattering fit.

Dress this piece down with boots or sandals and it makes a comfy, beautiful daytime piece. Easy to wear, great to walk around and have fun in. Can wear a normal bra and not too scandalous for daytime (but definitely not for work).
Stretchy comfort and unique pattern that caught eyes
This is the perfect Florida 'fall' dress. The material is so soft & flowy. Perfect dress!

I love fuzzi dresses and this was no exception--I'm usually between a 12 and 14 and the XL was perfect. The fabric is a sort of stretchy mesh (with a black slip built in--not see-through at all!) and I think would fit a ton of different body types, including my curvy 36G self (with fill coverage!). Somehow despite being fairly skintight, this managed to hide most of my bumps and lumps. That being said, I didn't love this for work as it felt a little too casual but I would absolutely wear again for a weekend event.
Dresses like this are why I love RTR! Beautiful print and fabric. So many compliments.

This dress is super comfortable Stretch spandex feel but a sheer overlay Doesn't cling to body though Fits true to size maybe even a tad small in bust area I wore with camisole for modesty purposes So too bright a little dull colors Lightweight not too heavy
This dress was beautiful and comfortable. It ran true to size as well.

links_reviews_title: Not flattering to my chest. L = 8-12. Returned without wearing.
links_reviews_text: This dress is very comfortable due to its stretch, but I did not like what it did to my chest. It made my chest look huge and droopy. It was better with a push-up bra, but still not great. Also, this dress was high-waisted on me, which also wasn't flattering. Finally, the pattern looked a bit dowdy in person. So despite how comfortable this dress would have been to wear, I returned it without wearing it. I am usually a size 10 in RTR dresses (5'8", 155 lbs, 36C) and the size Large was the correct size for me. The Medium would have been too tight on top.
This dress is really comfortable and fit like a glove. It's a gauze type material with a liner. My husband loved the fit and said he liked that it was kind of boho chic :). I felt pretty!
Another good mesh dresses from Fuzzi. Flattering, slimming, comfortable, stretchy, lovely colors. Sheer from knee down. Came to bottom of calf on my height. Can't wear jewelry etc that catches mesh.
Snug bodice, the style did not work for my body type. I love Fuzzi's styles. This one did not work for me.
stretchy fit
Pretty summer dress
Absolutely love this dress! Flattering, gorgeous colors, comfortable, sexy but not too revealing, easy to dress up or dress down.
Print is a little dowdy but fit is nice. Good for a hot day. Armholes are too small.

I am usually a size 4 and sometimes a size 6. The medium fit perfectly! There is a lot of give to the fabric and it is cool and comfortable. I may purchase as it would make a great travel dress. If I don't purchase, I will definitely rent again.
Hugs you in all the right places and hides a larger bottom half. This dress is so comfortable. I am seriously considering buying it from RTR. I received so many compliments!
I love Fuzzi's fabric and this was another hit! Perfect for an hourglass shape. So many compliments and super comfy!! Probably better for tall ladies as it hit me well below the knee (5'10")

links_reviews_title: It was comfy and the fit was just right
links_reviews_text: The only bad thing I would say is the hymn on the bottom of sleeves rubbed into my armpit.
Fabric is stretchy and doesn't wrinkle. Wore it for a convention - comfortable all day and worked great from breakfast to drinks.

This was a dress that I chose after my original choice was too small. RTR overnighted it (thanks!). It runs small, even the medium was a little tight. Casual dress, I loved the colors, though my husband thought it made me look old.
The fit was fine; but the material didn't do anything for me so I didn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Got a lot of attention for this gorgeous, comfortable work-to-party dress.
links_reviews_text: Comfy and gorgeous fit. Would buy if it were $50 cheaper....
It fit true to size.

links_reviews_title: Rented for work but was too form-fitting and low cut for office. But to evening event and loved it!
links_reviews_text: The small fit perfectly. The fabric is very firm fitting and thin so not quite okay for my work. Still loved the dress and wore it out.
It's a really cute dress, if your stomach is either young or in really good shape. Sadly, mine wasn't! But the dress is cute, and unique, and comfortable.
Beautiful pattern. Lovely dress.

links_reviews_title: I didn't know wear it to my baby shower.
links_reviews_text: Didn't look right. I am 5'2" and 34 weeks pregnant. It is exactly as pictured though.

links_reviews_title: Lightweight and colorful. I love Fuzzi
links_reviews_text: I was really looking forward to this rent but the XL was too small. I could have made it work but I did not want to wear Spanx. I fell in love with Fuzzi when I rented the blue maxi dress with the taupe moths and actually bought it. The mesh did not have the same give as the other Fuzzi dresses I rented and bought. I did not have the same luck with this one. I will rent again when I feel like wearing Spanx or I loose 10 pounds. I normally have to go to mediums or larges in their tops.

I got this to wear out to dinner, and will be wearing it again for casual Friday at work. I love the cut and the feel of the fabric. I could have fit into a size smaller, but liked having a little extra room. It was very flattering regardless, from every angle and sitting down as well. I may be buying this one!
comfortable
This just didn't work. Fabric was comfortable but pattern really unflattering
Fits well, just exquisite if I could afford I would but

links_reviews_title: Very pretty pattern and extremely comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Fit great, skirt falls nicely on a pear-shape (not too much fullness in skirt). The neckline didn't look good on my bosom, but that's not the fault of the dress. It fit great, I'm a pretty solid 12 and wore XL. Would love it if the neckline were a little different.

I love this brand for its styles and ease, however I found this dress less flattering. It was something about how it laid on the sides of my waist. I just didn't like the way it looked. It could be great on someone else, just not me.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful colorful dress, can dress up or down.
links_reviews_text: Fit well and layers wonderfully for the winter. Wore a turtleneck under for work and wore with tall shaft boots. So many colors artfully done in the print - very easy to match to other items in my wardrobe.

links_reviews_title: Cute but looks like a costume
links_reviews_text: Wore this for my “party animal” themed bachelorette. Dress was super cute. Loved the style, the sheen of the material made it look fancy, and it was surprisingly lightweight/comfy to wear. Cons - snug around midsection & reminded me of a costume.
A little tight but not unmanageable. Flattering cut and a stand out dress! Got compliments all night

Rented this for a 60s themed NYE party at the TWA hotel. It had the perfect touch of retro style (but still feels modern too). Very comfortable. You either have to go without a bra or wear a strapless bra. The material is thick enough that you won't feel uncomfortable without a bra. Love it and would definitely recommend.
Loved the print and I received a lot of compliments on it. I'm giving it 3 stars due to the fit; it was tight in the middle and loose elsewhere, which caused the fabric to fold over in a few places.
It fit perfectly, and is a great dress for a clubbing night out!

Wore this dress to an office holiday party and got so many compliments!! The fabric does not have much give but it fits true to size. It is slightly itchy around the neckline but the positives outweigh the negatives. I didn't want to take this dress off!! Would absolutely rent again!!!
Perfect for my fiancé's work Christmas Party! Felt amazing in it, and got so many compliments on the pattern!

links_reviews_title: Cool dress, great statement dress for a special event
links_reviews_text: Usually I wear a 6 but it was way too tight on the hips. The 8 was loose on the top, I'm small chested, but fit great on the waist and hips. Fabric is a little scratchy. Felt great on the dance floor and sitting through ceremony and dinner. Definitely need a strapless bra. I received lots a great comments from friends about the pattern and style. Sometimes in photos is looks like I'm pregnant.
This one was a hit! Lots of compliments, and loved how it fit

The dress was true-to-size. The metallic print made it a standout! It was easy to wear, didn't wear a bra with it, kind of hard to with the back cut outs. But, no side-boob mishaps. Lots of compliments as well.

I loved this dress! Super flattering and very fun. The chest has a little extra room, but it wasn't too much of a problem. Didn't feel like I was rearranging all night to hide my bra. Wore to a cocktail hour wedding and got compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my sister in laws rehearsal dinner. The attire was cocktail.
links_reviews_text: This dress did fit true to size. I wear a size 6 pants. I am curvy and was worried about how the dress would look on my hips. It was a very complimentary fit and looked very good. I got a lot of compliments! This was my first rent the runway dress and it was so easy and perfect!

I selected this after trying it on in the RTR NYC showroom when my original picks did not ship. It's a fun little number, and I got a million compliments. I wore it to a "black tie welcome" wedding. The fabric has zero give, fyi - it's like a brocade. The top is generous, almost to the point of being too big (and I have a full bust). The hips and stomach were tighter than I normally wear, but the sales associate told me it "fit beautifully". All in all, I was really pleased with it.

I love this dress, especially the way it defined my waist and smoothed my tummy with no spanx needed, but my bust looked really flat in it, even though it wasn't tight at all. I think the rib cage was a little loose, in contrast to the defined waist.

I love this edgy dress by Slate & Willow! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going down for your back-up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and at the hips. Curvier women should consider sizing up for fuller hips. It works best for A-C cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear a strapless bra since the cut of the neckline will expose your bra straps. At 4’8”, the length hit knee length on me. The metallic leopard print gives this dress a fun edgy look. Pair with black stilettos to complete your outfit!
Wore this in Vegas on vacation. Got tons of compliments and was so fun!

This dress was super cute, flirty, and the perfect amount of shine for New Year's Eve. I'm 5'9" and 150 pounds, and I wore the size 8. The size 10 was much bigger in the chest. I'm pretty straight and narrow, but I think this would accommodate a well-rounded chest and backside. The most constricting part is the waist, which has no stretch at all. I liked the length a lot and felt sexy without showing excessive skin.
Loved this holiday dress for my formal cocktail attire office party!
Loved wearing the dress, it is larger in the hips and will crinkle after a 6 hour event. Prefect for one night party event
Beautiful detail but since it was too tight in hips, I did not wear.

I was so excited to wear this dress! It’s so cute and trendy, which is exactly what I was looking for for my event. However, when I got it in, the dress would not fit over my butt in either size. If you have a larger hourglass/pear shaped body, I would recommend going up two sizes if not more. However, the dress is absolutely beautiful and well made.
Did not wear as the way the back strap did not fit at all. It was way too loose for me.

links_reviews_title: SUPER cute dress and love the shimmery fabric, but didn't wear.
links_reviews_text: While I loved the style and fabric, the fit just wasn't right - you need to be pretty large chested to fill this out, wouldn't even work by adding in a padded strapless.

links_reviews_title: didn't wear it- wore something else liked better
links_reviews_text: made me look a little boxy
Fit well, ample room for chest. Material is somewhat itchy but lightweight

links_reviews_title: Didn’t wear any of the RTR dresses.
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 6&8. I’m usually between sizes. The 8 fit but was too tight around the waist seam so I didn’t end up wearing either. The dress is really cute and the cut is nice. I hope to try it again in a larger size.
I loved the look of this dress--such a fun neckline and skirt--but you definitely need to be taller than 5'4" to wear it!

links_reviews_title: Not what I thought it would be
links_reviews_text: I was so excited about this dress because I'm obsessed with animal print. I got the dress and it was new to the site so I did it with no reviews. Bad idea. It fit but it kept riding up in the front and it was going to bother me all night so unfortunately this was a no for me.
This dress is beautiful but the fit did not work for me. I am 5'2" and feel it was made for a taller person

For our friend's wedding (Theme: Eleganza Extravaganza) this was the perfect dress. A little tight in the armpits, but I was still able to dance. The neckline was a little low which was a challenge for keeping my bra from showing. Play around with what bras would work for this dress. Overall, loved it!

This pretty dress is true to size even though I sized up due to my problem area, my waist. The material is not stretchy, and not super comfortable either, as it has a little bit of that stiff lace feel, so just expect that. Once on, this dress looked great and I was very happy wearing it, and got many compliments on it. Even my daughter thought I looked good, which is not always the case! I wore it one weekend and even kept it for a different event the next weekend.

Rented this for NYE, a complete hit! Got lots of compliments! Feeling so royal! The dress was really very well made, the laces are so intricate and delicate, simply divine! I'm 5'2, 128 pounds and worn size 6, fit was perfect!
Rent it for a summit and i got a ton of compliments. It is dressy but yet appropriate for work events. Wish I owned it!

This dress is beautiful but I opted for another dress to wear. It's broad in the shoulder area and really shows your neckline and I like the length and the gold fabric is really stunning! Fits well for smaller frames!

Great dress for a cocktail party. Fit is true to size. Do not attempt to zip it alone. If you do not have help- you will not get this dress zipped. Neck line is wide- so you will need a strapless bra- or to go without. The bust is snug- so braless is ok.

links_reviews_title: Flattering regal dress perfect for fall wedding
links_reviews_text: This was a last minute back up dress, but it worked out pretty perfectly for an outdoor fall wedding. I found it quite tight in the arms but otherwise comfortable and flattering.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a freakin goddess and received nonstop compliments
links_reviews_text: Much like a teapot, I'm short and squat. I was a little worried that I would be able to move once this dress was zipped, but the material is surprisingly flexible and forgiving. Overall the dress was extremely flattering and hid most of the areas that I was worried about. People were complimenting me all night. The photos don't do this dress justice.

This dress is gorgeous and I think it's flattering. I'm extra chubby, chubby, right now and this dress helped me feel great. I didn't think about it being so thick until it was too late to change it on my order. It wasn't unbearable or even uncomfortable. It's just we were in the Dominican Republic. Gorgeous dress

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments on this dress! Loved the intricate design, it’s even better in person.
links_reviews_text: Fit well! However, with the neckline it’s absolutley impossible to zip up by yourself. Dress was comfortable and I felt like it was extremely flattering.
Beautiful! But tight in the sleeves and quite itchy! But great for a holiday party!
Dress was absolutely beautiful, it is a little stiff so I steamed it a little bit and it loosened up and laid better.
The fit was just right. The dress was both elegant and comfortable. I would strongly recommend it!

If you are petite this dress may not be for you. I picked this dress as a back up for a dress that didn't ship because it wasn't available. It is very pretty fabric and thought it would be fun and different for a cold weather wedding. I ordered the 0 and it just didn't work. It fit, it just made me look somewhat boxy and was too long for my shape (I am 5'4", 32c, 116-118lbs ) I didn't wear it and wish I picked something else! I think this would look better on tall people in general or maybe just another body type

links_reviews_title: It fit perfectly, in every way!
links_reviews_text: I love everything about RTR! Perfect fit for a curvy girl. I received soooo many compliments and gasps when people saw me in the dress... followed with sincere compliments on how gorgeous my dress was.... and those compliments came from strangers! I can't for my next occasion to RTR!
This dress is beautiful and very comfortable. It's prettier in person than in the picture! I highly recommend renting this for a dressy affair.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress! It fit beautifully and was perfect for the occasion.
links_reviews_text: #workparty

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a philanthropy event, and it was absolutely perfect!
links_reviews_text: I normally wear either a 6 or 8, but went with the 8 since the sleeves don't really stretch. The fit was great, but it was a little itchy after a while. The length was perfect for the event since it was appropriate but not too long.

I wore this dress to my daughter's elementary school auction that was held at a local golf club. The theme of the auction was "Mardi Gras" and this dress worked perfectly. I actually paired it with a gorgeous, delicate laser-cut black mask that I found on Amazon. I got so many compliments on this dress throughout the evening. It was so comfortable and I felt beautiful. (the attached photo was actually from the morning after the event- I loved the dress so much I had to put it on again just for the fun of it) As for the fit: like others have said, the lace in the sleeves has no give/stretch. If you're bigger on top or have large arms, be sure to size up.

links_reviews_title: Fit perfectly for an awards viewing party!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable to wear, the sleeves were the perfect length. A little scratchy at the bottom of the dress where the lace extends but other than that no complaints! I generally wear 00/0. 5'1, 100lbs, this dress fit great

Received many compliments on this dress -- however it was not without issues. The lace is clearly very delicate and had snagged from previous wear. Also the waist line is at an awkward place making the top fit more snug than I would like. The sleeves are pretty but also itchy from the lace detail. Not an ideal dress even though it looked so beautiful online.

links_reviews_title: Georgeous fabric in very figure flattering shape.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove and was very figure flattering! It managed to successfully disguise my little belly pouch left over from my pregnancy. I felt comfortable dancing all night. The dress revealed a hint of cleavage without being overwhelming and the long sleeves made it perfect for a winter wedding.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Holiday Dress for Hub's work party
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Great fit, gorgeous detail. So many compliments. Did not feel sleeves were tight and I don't have small arms. Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress. Looked amazing on stage.
links_reviews_text: I wore this on stage for a show I sang in at the Catalina Island JazzTrax Festival with Contemporary Jazz artist Adam Hawley (adamhawley.com). The dress looked amazing on stage under all the lights. The neck is wide and I feared I would have to wear a strapless bra (which I hate because my bust is so large) but I was able to wear straps without them being seen. The material was just a little stiff and scratchy but nothing that ruined the wear for me. The quality is great and beautifully made. The scalloped sleeves were my favorite. The length was perfect. I added a thick black belt to add just a little pop but the dress looks great without one as well. I would rent this dress again for sure. Loved it. :)
I LOVE rent the runway, this is the second time I have used them! My dress fit wonderfully and I got compliments all night long! Absolutely stunning.
This dress was a little tight in the shoulders but was great otherwise. I loved wearing it and it made the party fun.

This dress was beautiful in person and it photographs well. I have received many compliments from FB/Instagram. The 8 was a little snug on the arms, but the 10 fit perfectly. It is sturdy and well structured while still comfortable. I paired with black wedge ankle boots.

links_reviews_title: All the compliments and how photogenic the dress is.
links_reviews_text: Someone told me I looked like a princess. No complaints here =) great fit and perfect for tall girls who have trouble finding dresses long enough!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a winter wedding. I can't believe all the compliments I received!
links_reviews_text: This dress arrived a few days before my rental period, which as a first time renter I was nervous about what to do if it didn't fit. I am really glad I ordered the next size up as well. The size I chose fit perfectly but the zipper was hard to zip because it would get caught on the lace. Being petite the dress was longer than the picture online but perfect for my event. The dress was a bit snug in the bust so I just went bra-less but I'm sure it would have worked well with a strapless bra as well.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, intricate dress in a flattering style
links_reviews_text: This dress has a vaguely Elizabethan, regal feel to it. The fabric is highly intricate with a slight sheen to the embroidery that would be amazing in candlelight. The deep scoop neckline and small waist with a full skirt were flattering to my pear shape, and the sleeves and weight of the dress made it appropriate for a winter party. I wore a strapless bra but otherwise no special undergarments. Overall, lovely dress, beautiful details, and a flattering silhouette. I paired it with wine-colored pumps and sheer hose and felt very queenly.

links_reviews_title: This dress provided definition in the waist and some cleavage but not too much. Loved it!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to my class reunion. My husband kept commenting on how this dress draped my body just right. The only thing that I wasn't crazy about was the sleeve length. I have long arms, and the sleeves could have been a tad bit longer. Got lots of compliments from classmates on the dress and how I hadn't aged a bit. The dress contributed to my look of classy elegance, with girlish charm.

this dress was amazing. The cut was feminine and sexy but still appropriate for my rehearsal dinner. The photos do not do this dress justice, the gold lace is just exquisite. i was worried about the sleeves being too tight since i have bigger arms but they fit and I didnt feel restricted. At 5'8 this dress hit right at my knees. the scoop neck is a big scoop so i did have some tasteful cleavage. I would rent this again if I had an occasion!

links_reviews_title: Not my first choice, but worked in a pinch.
links_reviews_text: This dress was a last minute replacement when the one I had reserved was not available. I'm glad that I asked for a second size, as I typically wear a 12 but it was too tight in the shoulders/chest, as well as the arms. The 14 fit, but the sleeves were tight enough to be a challenge to raise your arms should you need to. I did receive many compliments on the dress throughout the night and the length was appropriate for the event, which at my heigh is a struggle at times.

links_reviews_title: BEAUTIFUL lace detail! This dress is gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. Wore this for Christmas Eve and at the time I was more a size 12, should have gotten that but I got a 10 instead. Was still able to wear just somewhat snug. Has boning and tulle underneath the skirt but I didn't feel like it was too much tulle. Got so many compliments! Felt very pretty in this dress with all the lace detail!
Beautiful dress, I got many compliments throughout the night. The sleeves were prefect for a winter event, all in all another hit from RTR :-)

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but not totally what expected.
links_reviews_text: The gold detailing was beautiful, more pronounced on the dress than you would except from the picture. The neckline looked a little too Renaissancey for me once on and the arms were quite tight. A bit too tight, scratchy, uncomfortable. Also a longer than expected from the photo. Did look stunning in low lights at a holiday party.

I wore this to a wedding. I normally wear an 8 but it was too tight in the bodice. I ended up wearing the 10 for a more comfortable fit. I got so many compliments during the night! I did get a bit warm in the dress after dancing. Overall, I was very happy with it!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a fall wedding in Vegas
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a fall wedding in Vegas. I felt amazing and I got soooo many compliments on it. I wore a size 16 (compared to my usual 12), so the dress definitely runs small! Even the 16 was really tight in the bust area. It was also quite itchy... But it's the price to pay for fashion ;-) I loved the whole RTR experience.

links_reviews_title: I got TONS of compliments all night! So comfortable and gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: I sized up after reading other reviews and am glad I did. The 4 was a bit tight in the chest/shoulders but the 6 was perfect and left room elsewhere so I could enjoy my meal and dessert and stay comfortable. :) I received tons of compliments all night! I styled it with black tights, ankle boots, and a leather jacket to add a little edge and it was perfect for the occasion of a good friend's wedding

I ordered this dress as a back-up. It was very good quality and beautiful, but it wasn't very flattering. I have a fairly slim body but the full skirt made me look kind of wide. I'm sure this dress would look great on someone else.
This is a stunning deed and I got compliments all night. Rent this!!

links_reviews_title: Stunning and fun dress for a night out with gal pals.
links_reviews_text: Dress fit perfectly, very comfortable and sequin was not itchy. Stunning forest green dress, received lots of compliments. If you are tummy conscious, spanx work great under the dress.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! I wanted to keep it! Definitely worth the rental.
links_reviews_text: The fit was great. I wouldn’t rent if you aren’t comfortable with an open side area. The skirt was fitted but not too tight. The length was still good even though I’m short. The torso fit my wide rib cage. Overall, a major win.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress for the Gatsby gala!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a great Gatsby Gala and I loved it! It was so sparkly and fun and I got compliments on it all night. I would definitely rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: I LOVE THIS DRESS! 3rd time renting it since 2016. Comfortable, flattering, eye-catching!
links_reviews_text: This dress is my absolute favorite! I have rented it 3 times in different colors since 2016 and it has never failed me. It’s comfortable, true to size, flattering to many body types. It has just the right amount of sparkle making it elegant, but also sexy and glam. I always get compliments on this dress.

This was a back up dress for me when my first didn't fit over my postpartum hips and I should have made this my first choice!!! The color was gorgeous, the dress was stretchy, and the neckline was gorgeous. I wore it for NYE, and received lots of compliments. Thank you to RTR for sending this to me as a replacement (for free!!) when my first didn't fit. You had this mama feeling cute!

I wore this to a New Years Eve party and it was fantastic. I sometimes get worried about sequins and it rubbing under my arms or neck, but this dress was comfortable the entire night. I did wear spanx with it and recommend them for a flatter feel with no ruching. I would definitely rent again!

Stunning dress with interesting details. Top runs a little large. You'll want stickies or an adhesive bra because it's low in the back and sides. Does draw attention to lower belly if that's something you're not looking to highlight.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a holiday party! Sparkly and flattering.
links_reviews_text: This dress was simply wonderful. I reviewed the comments before I ordered and they were all true! I got a ton of complements and I loved the sequins. I'm between a 10 and 12, I'm 5'11" and 200 lbs, I ended up wearing the 10 which was a little more flattering. It'll be hard to send the dress back :)

links_reviews_title: Super cute fit. Lots of potential.
links_reviews_text: Tons of compliments on this dress. I love the fit. It's sexy and fun. The front is pretty basic but the back is super cute. It is snug through the hips if you have an hourglass or athletic frame. The length hits right at the knee like a pencil skirt. So much you can do with this. Take it up with more formal shoes and jewelry or down with leather booties/knee boots and chunky bohemian jewelry.
I loved this dress! Received a ton of compliments. The color is striking, and it is comfortable. I am tall, and this dress fell at the perfect length for me. I would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: I am so sad to send this dress back - it's perfect.
links_reviews_text: Super comfy, great fit. Lots of sparkle. I was really pleased with how this rental worked out. I'd been a bit nervous that the midsection would be tight: there is enough stretch (and then enough hold to keep everything in!!) to make this the perfect form-keeping outfit. Also, the color is excellent.

This is the second time I have rented this style (the other was in white for my bachelorette) and it did not disappoint! It is so comfy and form fitting. The lining is soft and cover imperfections and the sequins do not scratch. Would rent again in another color!

links_reviews_title: Felt confident and comfortable in this beautiful dress!
links_reviews_text: Great fit and super comfy! No itchy from the sequins and no need for a bra if you’re small chested like me! Got tons of compliments!!

For a little looser in the bust, which for me was okay. Couldn't wear a bra because there is a small opening at the back, but wow pasties and worked fine. Beautiful green color, got so many compliments!
I wore this to my company holiday party. It's form fitting but the high neckline made it work appropriate. I received tons of compliments and plan to rent one of the other colors in the future!

links_reviews_title: Great color! Sequins are an attention grabber
links_reviews_text: Good fit, comfortable. Didn't need a bra in the 8. About knee length even though I'm tall. Lots of attention in this dress! Would definitely rent again.
Got this for a nyc wedding and it worked well. It was stretchy and comfy. Someone has to help with the back to do the snaps.
Wore this beautiful dress in Vegas. Perfect color and fit! One of my favorite rentals!

links_reviews_title: The dress was exactly what I envisioned and fit like a glove!
links_reviews_text: The size 2 for like a glove and worked exactly as it was recommended to be true to size. My Benz bash as I promoted to RVP with #arbonneindependentconsultant #mercedescashbonus was perfect as I envisioned wearing green sequins!!!
Dress fit true to size. I received a ton of compliments. Dress was super comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, eye catching dress, that was surprisingly comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a roaring 20s auction. I ordered the 10 and 12 and went with the 12 because there was a little more give through the hips. Easy to move and comfortable. I got tons of compliments! The color was beautiful!!

links_reviews_title: I felt super-glam in this sparkly dress! I wore it to a Beverly Hills wedding and it hit the mark!
links_reviews_text: I am SO glad I decided to go with RTR for this glam number. I received so many compliments. No one at the wedding had a dress like this. The color was stunning in person and went really nicely with my hair color. This dress has a nice stretch to it. I expected it to chafe my underarms, but it didn’t. It felt very comfortable to dance in. I was happy that I was able to wear a strapless bra and suggest using some double-stick tape to make sure the bar doesn’t show. Because I’m so short, the hem hit me below the knee, but it worked to cover my Spanx shorts! I ordered the dress about 6 weeks before the event, which gave me a good amount of time to really work on my arm, shoulder, and upper back strength; these are all areas really accentuated by this dress. The Spanx took care of the rest! I was a little disappointed that the stitching that attached one of the “wings” to the back of the dress was torn, but it was easily fixed with a black safety pin. Aside from that, I did feel like I had to be extra careful to not snag the dress or sequins through the night.

links_reviews_title: It was perfect for my Mardi Gras themed cocktail party
links_reviews_text: It was sparkly, but not too over the top. The open back is great. It scratched a little under the arms, but not terrible. I was comfortable all night - even after eating a heavy meal and while dancing. This fit true to size and actually was a tiny bit big. I didn't wear a bra and it was totally fine. I'd recommend this dress for a Mardi Gras or New Year's Eve event - or maybe a night in Vegas.
I loved this dress. It was comfortable and I got tons of compliments on it! I was sparkly green in a sea of red and it really stood out! Would definitely recommend this dress

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my 8 year anniversary in Vegas I received compliments the entire night!
links_reviews_text: I have no cons for this dress. It fit true to size and is definite head turner. The quintessential Vegas dress! XOXO You never disappoint me RTR!

I know it's not specifically a maternity dress but this one worked GREAT! This brand always has stretchy fabric for lots of give in my 9th month of pregnancy. The sequins with this style are always a little bit scratchy in the armpits, but that is to be expected. LOVED the dress! And now that the baby is here I can go back to my regular size!
Glamorous

I absolutely loved this dress. The fit was perfect with no need for shapewear. I was able to get away without a bra. You can't tell from my pic but the back has a nice keyhole. I am 6' and it was just above my knees so an awesome length for us tall ladies. Excellent choice if you like your shoulders and arms.

This dress was great! I wore it for a fundraiser for my sons high school (their colors are green and white). It fit perfectly. Material has a nice stretch so it was very comfortable. I was worried about the torso/under arm/side boob fit and whether it would stay put. It did stay put just fine. I wore a strapless bra and it did not show at all in back. A halter bra would work as well. I am 5'2" and the hem hit right at or a bit below the knee. Great dress, I am think about renting the gold one for an event I have in a few months.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable. Perfect for a Mardi Gras event.
links_reviews_text: Great with low-back strapless bra
LOVED this dress. Could have worn the 10 but wouldn't have had room for dinner LOL. Great dress for Vegas and a 30th birthday. Super fun and would rent again in a different color!
Simple yet stunning it complimented my body nicely.
This dress fit great, just enough stretch to make it super comfortable. The sparkles look even better in person and didn't itch my arms at all. Got compliments on the photos for weeks!
This dress was pretty - appropriate for a work holiday party. The fit was true to size. Not my favorite dress I've ever rented from RTR, but it was pretty.

The color is absolutely gorgeous on this dress! It is completely covered in sequins but somehow doesn't look too flashy. It's extremely comfortable to wear, easy to dance in, doesn't ride up! I wore the size 2 and it did smoosh "the girls" just a bit but I felt comfortable that I was being held in while not wearing a bra. I paired it with blue shoes and rang in the New Year feeling glam - highly recommend this dress!

I rented this for a themed party. The dress was cute enough and did the job. The back fit me a little weird so I probably wouldn't rent again. It almost felt like there was an extra stitch that didn't need to be there.
Super comfortable and fit was perfect, thank god because they didn’t have the next size up.
This dress was great! Comfortable and hid my stomach. Loved the fit. Great for any event!

links_reviews_title: Loved the sparkle and comfortable fit
links_reviews_text: Stretchy fabric made the fit perfect

I LOVED this dress since the moment I saw it on the website! I went by the reviews and sized up. They ended up not having the next size up available so I went two sizes up (I wear a 2, this one is a six) It was a bit big but not enough that I couldn't wear it. The color is so gorgeous and no one had anything remotely similar to my dress.

links_reviews_title: hugs curves in all the right ways! I felt gorgeous
links_reviews_text: definitely little to no stretch. beautiful color! perfect for a wedding or formal event.
This dress fit amazing and I would definitely rent it again!! So many compliments and the color was gorgeous!

links_reviews_title: LOVED THE COLOR!! So many compliments on the fit.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my senior sorority formal. I wanted to go out with a bang, and this dress definitely made that happen! The material is snug and not stretchy so I'm glad I had the 6. If you have huge boobs like me, there might be some spillage, but I made it work. 10/10 recommend!!
I loved it so much I wanted to buy it! It fit like a glove.

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite dresses I've ever worn!!
links_reviews_text: LOVED this dress! Perfect for a black-tie summer wedding. I received SO many complements. I'm glad I ordered a size up because the 6R fit perfectly. I have wide hips and a small bust and the 6 fit like a glove. I loved the way it hugged my curves but gave me enough room to dance. One of my favorite dresses I've ever worn!
Loved the color! It felt and looks best standing still, but don't most things? Walking up stairs and dancing was a little tough because of how tight it was around the knees.

links_reviews_title: Not a great fit overall but beautiful color
links_reviews_text: Bold color looked gorgeous against my tan and from waist up it was a knockout. But the waist fabric clung and bunched in a really unflattering way that wouldn't have been helped by a bigger size. Spanx may have smoothed it out a bit but not a complete fix. As the body is mermaid style and fitted you could not lift dress to use bathroom, someone would need to zip and unzip every visit to the ladies. Not ideal. It looked gorgeous on some of the other reviewers so take a chance if you want to but I found it to be not worth the trouble.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a summer gala!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a work black tie optional gala and got lots of compliments! It was a pop of color amongst all the black dresses. Fit true to size. Probably could have worn a 2p if it was available. However I could move good in the 4r. I'm 115 and five foot two. I could not wear a bra as it showed with the cut of the dress so I opted for pasties. I love the fact that it had a good zipper that didn't get stuck. Highly recommend!

Love this dress! Wore it to a military dinner and received a ton of compliments. For a form fitting dress it does move well-sat for hours and danced with no problem. Do size up though, I'm normally a 2 and the 4 fit like a glove.
Form fitting perfect for formal affair. All eyes will be on you!

I should have worn the 4 but it felt stretched out in the waste so the 6 fit better. The fabric has some stretch to it. Can wear a strapless bra or not. Got tons of compliments the entire evening. It was super comfortable. The cut outs added some flare.

links_reviews_title: Loved the colour , the way it hugged my body .
links_reviews_text: I am 5"11 . I ordered a long and still would love it to be longer .. the back did the justice . Got many compliments ! I was self conscious about the cut outside but overall was a beautiful dress.. I danced and sang all night long without discomfort.. recommended 100%. Never disappointed with renttherunway..
Perfect for a start of summer wedding. Conservative enough and spicy enough

The fit was perfect (for reference: Height - 5'0", weight = ~107, bra - 32B), the length not so much. I stressed the night before as it was so long even with heels. Thank goodness for double-stick tape! Received numerous compliments on the color/fit. Would 1000% recommend.

links_reviews_title: PERFECT dress - from color to cutout to fit
links_reviews_text: This color is EVERYTHING. You cannot walk into a room without turning heads because the color made this dress a definite statement piece. One of the things I like most about this dress is the cutout. It is elegant yet not revealing. This dress also hugged me in all the right places, and I don't say that about a lot of dresses. Since I have a petite body and am not the curviest gal, not a lot of "tight" dresses fit me well. BUT this dress is an exception (but it's probably because I wore a 0 and not a 2). So if you are curvier I would maybe size up. The only con I would say about this dress is the thigh part of the dress made it really hard to move around so I had to hike up my dress to walk. Other than that, this dress is PERFECT in every way. I got compliments ALL night at my sorority formal.
This dress fit me so well! The long length was perfect with my heels. I wore it to my sorority event and received multiple compliments. The owner of the venue even said I had the best dress there :)

This dress was absolutely amazing! If I rent it again at my current weight (5'9", ~160), I would go with the 8, as the 6 struggled to make it over my hips (you can see the pulling in the photo). Other than that it was a slam dunk.

When people tell you, you look like Barbie.. solid win. This dress was truly amazing. I loved it. For perfect every where. Would have been difficult to wear a bra with my it fit tight enough up top I didn't need to

Loved this dress! I wore it to a formal gala in DC. It made me feel like a hot pink mermaid. Fit great and I opted to not wear a bra. Paired it with 3.5 inch nude heels and a nude clutch. Would definitely rent this again in other colors!
Fit extremely well and hugged all the right places! I would definitely rent again although you can't move completely freely.
Loved this dress, color was great and really makes a statement! It was however very long on me (I'm 5'3) so I used temporary hem tape to hem several inches and it worked great!

The dress was amazing! I got a lot of compliments and felt good. The fabric has no give so order a size up. The petite was perfect as I am 5'2. This was a backup dress that a consultant named Saundra (Sandra) helped me find after my first pick was unavailable. Initially I was worried because it was days prior to the wedding and just a day prior to delivery date. The consultant used humor and assured that all would be well. She made this experience a lot easier. I've rented a lot of dresses and never had a consultant as cool as her!!!
Obsessed with this dress! Form fitting, perfect length! I am 5’5 and wore 3 inch heels.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Comfortable! Great bold color!
links_reviews_text: The perfect amount of class and sexy. LOVED it. Super comfortable too.

I absolutely loved this dress! I am 5'3" and the 4P was the perfect length with 4" heels. Dress is great quality, fully lined and super flattering. Very fitted and narrow at the knees so dancing was a bit awkward, as were bathroom breaks, but I would still highly recommend it. Also, I was not able to wear a bra, which is usually a deal breaker for me, but the top was fully lined and very fitted so it really wasn't a problem. I received tons of compliments and had a blast wearing it.
I order a size bigger than I normally wear. It fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: This shade of pink is magical!
links_reviews_text: The dress has a beautiful mermaid shape. It complemented my pear shaped body so well! It was a bit small especially around my thighs/butt area! I didn't wear a bra with this dress but it wasn't a problem, and I'm a 36d for reference. This picture doesn't do the dress justice as to how beautiful it is. Please get this dress its a showstopper!

links_reviews_title: I felt like a Barbie! Love this dress!! Hugged me in all the right places! Compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: I wore a 0 regular. I weight 103lbs and have a bigger bust. 34C. It fit perfectly. I wore 3 inch heels and the length was perfect! It’s lined so I did not have to wear a bra. I did have to side step to get up and down stairs as it is a little tight around the knees. You will have to have someone help you zip it up. The cut outs were in a great spot! Just absolutely loved this dress! I will rent it again! I felt amazing!! Like a Barbie! The color is amazing! Pops with some Pink lipstick.
Comfortable and sexy!! Such a fun dress!

links_reviews_title: The compliments I received while wearing this dress was amazing.
links_reviews_text: The fit was excellent except the bust area. I also got a size 4 for that very concern but the dress was too tight on the hips. However, the general fit was not too loose where I felt uncomfortable the whole night.

I LOVED THIS DRESS. i'm 5'9 and the length was perfect with 2 inch heels! it was such a breathable dress and so comfortable to move and dance in. i wore this for my sorority formal and i'm extremely impressed with the quality

links_reviews_title: Felt like a MILLION bucks!! Loved it
links_reviews_text: Excellent SLIM fit. I had to wear sticky petals instead of a strapless bra because of the cutouts both above and below the breast line. If you are larger than a B cup I have to imagine you'll need to size up because it does a good bit of smooshing! I wore normal cut seamless underwear and didn't have any panty line since it is a quality fully lined dress. The dress doesn't naturally leave a lot of movement in the lower body, but is typical mermaid fit. I did not have an issue walking at a normal stride or dancing! Amazing dress, felt like a million bucks!

A little snug in the hips and the Regular was too short to wear heels with so I wore flats & it hit the ground just barely. I'm 5'7". Super beautiful color and comfortable, wearing! A head turner for sure!
I needed something bright and fun for a family wedding in Palm Springs, after several attempts at RTR dresses this one nailed it!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, fun dress for formal events!
links_reviews_text: Dress was fun! Different from my usual black dresses I tend to lean towards for weddings. It is tight around the thigh area and snug at the bust if bigger chested. Definitely a stand out dress amongst the crowd.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing this one
links_reviews_text: It's pretty but I didn't like it as much as the other dress options I rented. It didn't look as formal and the material looked a little faded. The color is pretty but you'll need some nice accessories to make the dress pop

links_reviews_title: Showstopping, sexy, classy -- this gown made me feel like a star.
links_reviews_text: RTR is three for three in terms of perfect rentals that have greatly contributed to my enjoyment of memorable events! This gown is almost exactly what previous reviewers have indicated. It definitely stands out among the usual gala black (I received compliments from friends and strangers and could feel people staring as we moved into the event ballroom for dinner); it's sexy without showing too much skin (I wore it without a bra but with laser-cut undies); it runs long (I had to use dress tape to be able to wear 3" heels, and still the skirt trailed). The material also wrinkles easily (I spent awhile steaming the gown beforehand) and does not really stretch. While I was able to cha cha, salsa, and bachata easily (the bandleader dubbed my friend and me the best couple on the dancefloor!), I had to take a break to aerate my legs since the skirt/lining were so warm and was careful when walking so as not to trip. Yet I didn't want to dress down when I arrived home! The paint on the zipper pull was chipped, I found a long blonde strand of hair in the lining from the previous user, and the hangers were broken, but I will definitely return to RTR for my next event needs!
The fit was a bit snug but it was still very flattering. I would recommend ordering a size bigger.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! I got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: It was pretty true to size! I absolutely loved the color! I got so many compliments saying Hot Pink was definetly my color! I loved the cutouts, they definetly added some flare to the simle structure of the dress! Absolutely amazing!

I am a size 10-12 and the 42 was perfect. I used Hollywood tape to keep the low front from gapping. I wore it for a dinner cruise for my husband's birthday. He couldn't wait to get back to the dock. ;-)
This was such a special top for some reason. The quality was excellent, and since I don't have a huge chest, it fit like a glove. Would have kept if it wasn't as expensive!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a stylish art show!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to an art exhibition. It was the perfect amount of style and sexy. It is fairly low cut so not appropriate for most work functions. The tie neck in the back is a great detail - looks best with your hair up to show it off. I got compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: So much sass in this shirt!
links_reviews_text: Rented for a Fleetwood Mac concert and got so many compliments!! I decided not to tie the scarf in the back, and was totally comfortable with them hanging down the front. It was a little baggy for my style, but still fit nicely.
I still have this item at home and I may never be able to trade it for another garment. It's so simple and glamorous.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear for a special occasion
links_reviews_text: Very flattering. Could be formal or just for a special party
Loved this top, fit just right and loved the accent of the long sequin ties down the back. Rented for NYE.

Honestly considering buying this top. It was a big hit at a holiday party with black coated denim pants. I could see myself wearing it with jeans also. could be dressed up or down, comfortable and chic. For now I will just hold onto it through the holidays.
The fit was great but didnt end up wearing. Was a little too dressy for my casual date night.
wore this for a work event - made a regular black top more interesting with the neckline and sparkle.
Top part nice bottom part kind of random
No negatives other than it runs a little big. Love the neck and scarf touch. Wore with jeans and it was awesome. Lots of compliments
Can gap open in the chest when sitting

links_reviews_title: Super cute but unfortunately puckered at bottom
links_reviews_text: This shirt would have been amazing if it hadn't had a awkward bottom seam. I wonder if the outer fabric layer of the one I was sent is stretched out from cleaning.
I wore this with a black ball skirt and silk jacket. It was a great piece for my outfit the sequins added some needed glitter. It was a little big, but I think I rented a size too big.
The fit was perfect. A bit too dressy for the current event but will definitely rent again.
I live in FL so dressier doesn't necessarily mean sleeves. the fabric & cut kept it from being too casual
Fit true. Simple and elegant, easy to work with other clothes
Runs large and very low cut. But love the neck tie!

links_reviews_title: Love! Beautiful. Wore with jeans and also wore with leather leggings.
links_reviews_text: I styled the scarf a few different ways. Great fit, very flattering

perfect for a trendy dinner spot. not over the top, but the sequins give it a little more oomph. fit w plenty of room for food. worn w jeans and booties. doesn't wrinkle and you can tell it's well made. neck not scratchy at all, great fabric that falls nicely. size down. if you're smaller than me i wld not recommend it. having the right size makes it easy to wear without a bra or w a demi bra, but not look exposed. if i went to my reg size 4 i wldve been exposed
Loved it!!! I didn't want to return it. Perfect fit and sexy v neck. So classy and easy to wear with a conventional plunge bra. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Love this top, very flattering and fun.
links_reviews_text: The neck sash is a perfect pop of bling and I loved the fabric. Great for a party or a fun night out.

I didn't end up wearing this because the occasion I rented it for fell through. Nevertheless, the fit was basically as expected. For a slightly fuller chest and broad shoulders the v-neck portion of this blouse slightly buckled but, if I had actually worn it and switched up my bra or cleavage cure it would've been classy and perfect.
Very low cut. Elegant. Keeping it for awhile.

links_reviews_title: New Year's Eve at a fancy restaurant!
links_reviews_text: The top is very flattering, although I could have ordered a size smaller - even though I am very busty and have broad shoulders the 44 gaped a little at the armholes and was a little too wide, but it didn't matter as I wore it under a blazer. It was low cut but I just wore a camisole underneath so no problem. I'd rent it again. I wore it with tailored black pants, black sparkly sandals, and a black sequin blazer.
Little big
Very fun and cute top! Daughter wore it for our Christmas dinner out. Loved the sparkle tie at neck. It runs small and is a little short in waist.

I intended to wear this for an event where some work colleagues would be present and it was just way too low cut. It would be great for a date night, but not for this. I would rent it again for a sexy night out.
Very high quality but too big. Need size 36 (4) or size 34 (2) even. Not sure bust will fit in 34

links_reviews_title: Decided to not wear it for New Year's Eve.
links_reviews_text: Very pretty top. But it plunges too low for me.
The armholes, as mentioned by another reviewer, were big and body of it was too wide.

links_reviews_title: This was amazing. Wanted to buy it so bad.
links_reviews_text: just adorable. large in armholes but I wore with a sweater
Great touch of sparkle but was a little tight in the chest and was itchy. I wore it all day at work but wouldn't rent this piece again.
Perfect festive top. Wore with a pair of stretchy black pants when I introduced my boyfriend to the extended family over thanksgiving. Can't go wrong with Galvan. Loved it!!!

This dress is amazing and is a great thick material that holds everything in. It does run very small, I had to wear two sizes bigger than my normal size. Everyone loved the color and I got tons of compliments
The fit was perfect. Wore without a bra and you couldn't tell. I loved the cut and detailing. Got compliments from multiple friends.
It fit great and I loved the detail on the side. Lots of compliments... form fitting but room to eat!

I liked this dress, with the exception of two things: the fabric gapes where your right armhole is, therefore it's almost impossible to wear a bra & the edges are intentionally rough-cut. I loved the way it's shape flattered my body & defines your waist.

I rented this dress for a wedding. I loved the color and the fun side detail. I had originally ordered the 4 and it was too small so I ordered the 6 and that worked! I have a pretty big chest and still had room, so this may not work for smaller chested ladies. I'm 5' and I used some temporary hem tape to bring it up a few inches. Shown in this picture at the original length though. Was comfortable dancing and having fun all night!
Loved this dress for a rehearsal dinner at an estate. Tight, but great fabric and perfect length.

Great flattering fit. I'm 115lbs, 32-26-36", 5'1", I ordered in a 2 and 4 and both fit well but went with the more figure hugging size 2. Beautiful forgiving material and a great minty color that I've worn with and without a tan. Lots of compliments and very comfortable to wear for hours.

Based on the reviews I ordered the 0 (true size) and the 2. The bottom definitely runs snug with little to no stretch so I felt more comfortable in the size up. The top fit a little big but not noticeable to anyone but me. Loved the frayed edges and the asymmetrical top. Tons of compliments and such a pretty subtle color for a summer wedding!

Loved the thick material, forgiving. The dress would ride up slightly when I walked, but I thought the fit everywhere was great and I did even try the larger size. Great dress for a formal summer event!

This was my favorite dress I've rented. The color is beautiful and the cut is so flattering. Such a unique piece and actually really comfortable. Super thick fabric that hugs your body and makes ya look just lovely :)

This dress is lovely. Lots of compliments. Does run small. I am 5'2" and AA chest and the zero was very snug. I went with no bra so I could wear the zero bc the length was better. I could have worn the 2 and had some more breathing room but it was slightly baggy in the back/shoulders so I made the zero work. The structure, material, and design of this dress is unique and fun! Loved wearing it!

Really enjoyed wearing this piece. It fit well - flattering to the waistline and the length was perfect. It has a unique, modern flair and the color was just beautiful..great for an event in the spring or summer. Highly recommend!

This was my first RTR experience and it did not disappoint. I looked at reviews of people who were similar in size which helped a lot! I ended up wearing a size 2 which is true to my size. The color is gorgeous and the material is so thick/expensive looking and feeling. Loved this dress so much and got so many compliments!
