links_reviews_title: I wish I would had signed up for RTW years ago!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! So many compliments. The material was nice and heavy. Would def rent it again! I'm 5'9 138 lbs and the 6 fit like a glove.

links_reviews_title: Endless compliments. Expensive fabric, sophisticated twist and fit like a glove
links_reviews_text: The Compliments. Seriously. Came. All. Day. The dress was a total hit. My favorite rental so far. I am 140#, 34b and 5'7 with curvy hips, thighs and butt... because this dress was so form fitting I had to size up to a 6 (normally can do a 4 in dresses) but this one is very tailored. I still wore shapewear with the size 6 (but probably would do seamless underwear next time). It was snug and cute for my figure. Comfortable and well made. Such an expensive look ..felt like royalty.

links_reviews_title: Perfect, flattering fit. Structured yet comfortable. Very flattering and unique!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress to attend a fashion show. Received so many compliments! Even the designers loved it. Great fit, very fitted. Really nice, thick fabric. Definitely high quality and super flattering.
Loved this dress!! The material was different then I expected- It was heavy and jean like. The mint color was very pretty. I would rec this dress.
Great for my 3 hour flight - nice and comfortable with stretch ... conservative and perfect summer length - it was cute but I wouldn't say it was my absolute favorite- nice rental - soft spring color

links_reviews_title: Great fit, color, TONS of compliments !
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit, going to purchase through unlimited and likely get it shortened a bit. I am short, so a bit shorter will be perfect! Sooo classic and i will def wear a lot !

I wore this to a wedding shower and received tons of compliments (including from a woman who stopped her car to tell me she loved my dress and asked where I got it). The color is a subtle pastel greenish-blue that worked well with my neutral-warm skintone. I ordered the 4 and 6 and went with the 4 (my usual size). It was tight but not uncomfortable, and I think the fitted look worked better for the dress style--the size 6 was gaping on the side/arm hole and bunching a bit in the front. The fabric is structured, fairly stretchy, and thick enough that I didn't need to wear a bra--which is good, because a non-backless bra would probably show a bit on the left arm hole, and you'd probably need it to be strapless on that side as well. Also, as mentioned, the fabric does have a slightly frayed look at the edges, but it doesn't look messy. It's shorter than I usually wear but still felt appropriate for a daytime family event. Overall, I loved this dress and may rent it again!

I was nervous about this dress but it was perfect! It was a good length for me (I'm 5ft) and overall the fit was on point. I am 4 1/2 mos post partum so I'm a bit bigger (140lbs-ish) than my normal size. This dress seemed to suck it all in and fit my large bust without being tight or making it look bigger. I rented for my daughter's baptism. The length, for me, and high neck were church appropriate. There's a little bit of stretch so it's easy to move in. If you're on the fence about this one, I say go for it.

links_reviews_title: Cute and family/professional appropriate, but watch out for the fray!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my law school graduation, so when I was originally dress shopping, I was looking for a dress that was simultaneously appropriate for my family and my professors as well as cute for my boyfriend and photos... this dress did exactly that! I got so many compliments and really wanted to keep it. This blue was a great spring color, not too flashy and gave me a pop of color—it may be slightly less blue than the model’s photo but still pretty accurate. I ordered the two and the four just in case, I ended up going with the two. I am 5’3 and 125 lbs with a 32c and while the 4 fit just fine, I liked where the 2 hit my legs better. My biggest issue is the fray with this dress. I don’t think this was shown in any of the photos very well, so I am including my own. The seams are not a clean seam— IT IS FRAYED! I initially freaked out when I opened the package thinking I received some worn out dress, but then realized it was on both and it was on purpose. I am not really a fan of the fray, but the fabric is so thick, a clean seam probably wouldn’t look as good...anyway, the fray cannot be seen unless you’re super close up, it’s just something to be aware of when you rent so you aren't caught off guard. Overall, wonderful dress! I'd rent it again in a heartbeat!
Dress fit great and it's such a lovely color and price.

Rented this dress for a summer wedding. It was such a great dress! I am normally a size 4 but read the reviews that it ran small so I rented the 6. Honestly, the dress does stretch out after wearing it for a little while so I wish I would have gone with 4. Also a huge perk of this dress is that I didn't have to wear a bra! I am a size 32 EE so it's rare I can go braless! Received a ton of compliments! Will definitely rent again!
Loved this dress! It does run small so size up for sure!

Definitely small! I could have worn a 4 but this fit me like a glove and was super comfortable, so given option i may have still worn 2 over 4. No bra needed. Seamless thong a must. Got tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: I had a ton of compliments all night! The bride even commented that my dress was beautiful!
links_reviews_text: So I go between an 8 and 10. I'm 5'0" and 140 pounds. I'm very curvy and have big hips/booty and a 36D bra size. I was so afraid this dress wouldn't fit me because of other reviewers saying it was small but it seemed pretty true to size for me. The material is really nice and stretchy. Love love love this dress!
Very true to size, incredibly flattering, great color. The fabric is so structured such that you can't see any flaws

links_reviews_title: This dress was so great! Rented for sisters baby shower, great color, and perfect fit!
links_reviews_text: The color was perfect, and I got lots of compliments on the unique style!
Great quality! Comfortable and elegant looking! Received tons of compliments!

I loved wearing this dress! No bra necessary, and I felt completely comfortable. I was nervous it was going to be too short, but it worked out to be great! The ruffle that comes down from the waist was so flattering and covers all the right parts. The only surprise that you can't really see from the pics is that the seam edges are raw so it almost looks frayed when you first open your package, but it wasn't distracting to the overall design, and I still felt the quality was great. I got sooo many compliments. I would definitely consider renting this same dress again!

links_reviews_title: This dress is absolutely stunning!!!!! I received compliments left and right!!!!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely perfect! Worn to a Kentucky Derby party/fundraiser. I received compliments all night long!! It was super comfortable! The material was heavier than expected but wasn't an issue at all on an 80 degree day.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Derby Dress!! (Too bad it rained all day and it was covered by a poncho)
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress!! Super thick material that hid flaws and made it okay to go braless. It does run small though, I typically wear a 2 and had the 4 been available as a back up size, I probably would have worn it. It was super short, in a good way! And the intentionally frayed edges help make it a little more causal. All in all I was very pleased with the dress and so sad I had to wear a poncho all day and didn't get to show it off

links_reviews_title: So many compliments, fits a pear/curvy shape, runs small
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress. It was sophisticated and fun to wear for a Derby party at a charitable fundraiser event. It was comfortable, the material is structured but still has a little give. I originally ordered two sizes but the smaller one wasn't available and I ended up only getting the 6. For reference, I usually am a 4 but sometimes a 2 if the hip isn't fitted. I didn't have a 4 or 2 to try on this time but the 6 fit almost perfectly. I was pleasantly surprised with the fit as sometimes shift/straight dresses don't fit my booty but it fit well! I got lots of compliments.

This dress fit perfectly. I wore a size 6. I'm a size 6 usually. 133 lbs and 5' 5. It's a beautiful mint color. The material is heavier than I imagined it would be but it wasn't too heavy. It helped it not wrinkle. There are frayed edges but it looks fine. It's supposed to be like that. Definitely would rent again! I got so many compliments!
This dress was so incredibly comfortable and I had so many compliments!
I got complimented for this dress by nearly everyone at the bridal shower! It was so cute and comfortable. I'm usually a 0 but had to wear a 2 to fit comfortably!
Perfect for a beach brunch! Fit was spot on and detail was stunning

links_reviews_title: I loved it! Rented for Easter and I felt so chic in this dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress was very snug. I'm glad I got a backup size because my first pick was way too small. Definitely size up. The zipper is a bit difficult too. Other than that, I'm glad I rented it!
Ths dress Fits great! The materialistic and stretching and really hold you in place. I received several compliments on the color and cut of this dress.

links_reviews_title: Love the look, not the cut
links_reviews_text: This dress runs big. I usually wear a size 8, and when my size medium & backup size large arrived, they were both too big. RTR customer service was fantastic, overnighting the size small to my Airbnb so I had a dress for the wedding I was attending. I think the issue I had with the fit was because I'm petite. The tie at the neck has to be pulled from front and back at the right place for the front to lay flat, but I didn't like how low it cut on the sides. Probably non-issue for taller people.

I wore this to a charity event that was cocktail attire. It was flattering, comfortable and fun. I got many compliments and would recommend it. I had no trouble with the bow as I've read in some reviews.

I rented this for an outdoor late summer wedding in south. It was cool, nice fabric without being too bulky/hot. I got so many compliments on the gorgeous rust color and the cute bow. Plus it was generously cut through the mid-section which was exactly what I was looking for to hide my belly following surgery. Loved this dress!
I had just had a baby and this dress was so flattering and comfortable. It completely hid my mom pooch and the tie at the neck was enough pop that I didn't even have to wear a necklace.

I absolutely loved this dress. It was easy to wear and hid my midsection. My only complaints are that it's pretty tight in the chest (I don't have a large chest by any means) which led to a bit of armpit fat showing. Also the cut of the top of the dress was different (in a good way) but tan lines were pretty obvious, even after a spray tan "touch-up". That being said I would absolutely recommend this dress!!
I absolutely loved this dress. I wore it for a rehearsal dinner. Fit perfectly.

Maybe I'm a perfectionist or maybe I didn't have enough patience. Either way, this now situation was a pain. I wanted to love this dress. Burnt red color is awesome. Perfectly airy enough for a summer wedding. Not flattering and that bow was an eyesore.

It was large, bow was super wrinkled, definitely not meant to be form-fitting. I wore it because my other dress didn't work out, but there was nothing flattering about this dress. Pros: I guess color and that I didn't have to worry about anything showing through the dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect color and style for a spring bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color and comfortable fit. Received several complements! Wore to a friend's bridal shower.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful warm color and comfortable cut
links_reviews_text: I did not wear this dress to my event but I did love the warm rust color and cut of this dress. If you're looking for more shape, this dress isn't for you.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and beautiful dress! Color was perfect for a warm, fall wedding.
links_reviews_text: Size down
An RTR favorite! Flattering, fabulous, and fun- so many compliments. Thick enough to look and feel like quality, but not too hot for an outdoor wedding

links_reviews_title: Exactly what I was looking for!
links_reviews_text: Perfect for a bridal shower

This dress fit perfectly. As others have said, it's runs a little on the large side but I could have made either the M or L work, the L would have just been more boxy and larger in the chest. The color is a rust red but my husband wore a real red tie and it looked like it matched well. It's a little on the short side, so you're tall you may want to go with your actual size rather than sizing down. Highly recommend!
I wore this to a dinner. It was a great color (the color in my pic is off bc of the flash and editing) but it wasn't all that flattering. Great when you want something simple.
Great dress! Pretty color! Thicker material - perfect for a fall wedding! It was difficult tying the perfect bow.

Perfect dress for a Fall wedding. The ceremony was in the evening and outdoors so I needed a shaw to stay warm. The dress is thin and better for warmer weather. However the fit was great and the color was stunning. I received numerous compliments all night!
This dress was so much fun to wear! The color and weight of the material was perfect for the fall wedding I attended. The bow-tied neckline made the dress really unique. I'm sad to return it!

I rented this dress for sorority recruitment and it was perfect! The dress was very flowy so it kept me cool and also was made of such nice material. I usually wear a medium or large for dresses but because of the style of this dress I got a small and it worked perfect. Maybe could've gotten an xs if I wanted a tighter fit

links_reviews_title: Comfy dress for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: SUPER comfortable fit, and perfect to attend a summer wedding. I am only 5'2", so the length was comfortable for me. The fabric was thick making the dress hang beautifully. The rust color was striking without being too overstated - it went really well with gold heels and jewelry to dress it up.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering dress, even on petite ladies like myself!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a wedding in July, which probably wasn’t the best choice because the material is so thick. Would have been better suited for a fall wedding, so important to keep in mind! I ended up wearing the XS and it was still slightly big (and long, I’m only 5’2), but still flattering. Overall, it was a pretty dress and I’d rent again in cooler weather!

Wore this to a bridal shower. The small fit just fine. I didn't like how the lines of my strapless bra showed through in the front, so I wore petals instead. Loved the loose fit and didn't feel like it was too big. Very comfortable
I loved this dress. It was comfortable, just the right length, and so cute! It did run a little big, im very small in the chest area and had to wear the XS, it was still a tad loose but not too bad!
Very cute dress and very comfortable! Perfect if your self conscious about you mid section, like myself!
The dress looked so elegant and I loved how it looked on me. The only thing is if you're short like me it will come up to your knees.
The dress was comfortable and the length made it feel very sexy. I felt great all night!
Perfect for wedding!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress! So comfortable and easy to dance in!
links_reviews_text: Wish I could buy this dress and wear it over and over!!

Love this dress! Super thick fabric that hangs nicely. The neckline shape was perfect, I wore the bow in the back. Plenty of room to move and eat. Wasn't too short, which was a concern! Worked out perfectly.

This was a great rental! I loved the fit, the fact it had room to move! It was very high quality and arrived in great condition. I loved the color and the neckline. I danced all night and the length was great for some fancy dance moves.

I really loved this dress. Since it is not meant to be snug, and it sort of drapes over your body, it looked better wearing the XS than the S (the S made me look a little wider than I actually am). Additionally, you can adjust the tie of the bow, which gives you more of a custom fit for whatever dress size you choose. I loved the bow detail, which takes the dress from an ordinary wear to something with a little extra. I did get a lot of compliments on the dress, and I loved the rustic orange/pink color that it wound up being (went well with my olive-toned skin). I wore it on a warm fall day, and it was perfect for the occasion. It is a dress I would rent again.
Loved the feeling of leisure...very cute and casual. Fits perfect.

links_reviews_title: Cute bow, thick material. Low neckline, short hem when sitting. Otherwise felt great.
links_reviews_text: First of all, I should mention that I'm a fairly conservative dresser, so this dress was definitely out of the ordinary for me; it's a true cocktail dress, hangs midthigh when walking and rides up a few inches when you sit, depending on your booty. I got a lot of attention in this dress, from men and women and my boyfriend loved it. I might have chosen a different dress had I known the venue (It was a surprise), but I was able to use Bobby pins to keep everything in place up top and hide the dress length under a napkin. Overall, I enjoyed wearing this dress. It was very comfortable and had great movement when I walked. I would rent this again, to a less formal event though.
A simple and classic design, with a bow that brings subtle elegance this dress! The fabric isn't thin which I found to be a plus.
This dress is so fun and forgiving :) It fits loosly but is very flattering. The bow makes the dress very fun. It is short, but not too short.

Rented this as part of unlimited for a 7-day cruise. I felt super confident and received lots of compliments on this dress. Very comfortable, easy to wear a strapless bra. I am 5'5" and wouldn't have minded a little more length, but I wasn't self-conscious.

This dress fit me perfectly! The color was more orange than rust and that was perfect! The fabric is a little weighty but not too heavy for dancing! The tie at the shoulder was a nice touch to the neckline.
everything about this dress was perfect for my friend's body type and her style - not too short and not too much skin but still sexy and comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress with a fun bow!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a rehearsal dinner. Can wear a strapless bra with it. I would describe the color as more of a rust. The length was perfect and the bow is just the right amount of style while still being appropriate for more formal affairs.

Runs large, I rented a M and L and wish I had rented the S. the dress is loose and very comfortable. The only issue is that it zips all the way up to the neck and got a little tight when fully zipped. Would definitely rent it again!

This skirt was so fun to wear. I paired it with a black crop top and white booties. My date (and others!) couldn't stop complimenting. True to size although I ordered the medium and would rent the small next time.

When I first saw this pattern I was nervous, but I took a chance and turns out I really loved it! It was so much fun to wear and I got a bunch of compliments on it! It fit really well and wasn't too long at all.
I was invited to go on air as a local fashion contributor & got so many compliments after wearing this fun skirt. I love it so much i purchased it to keep.

This skirt just kept going with every jacket in my closet! Also looked cute with a leather jacket! Same thing with shoes! It looked good with any black shoes! I wore it in early Sept so I went with scrappy sandals and flip flops, but it would look good with booties and a sweater too! I got so many compliments at work! I thought it was going to just be a simple skirt but it turned out to be way more awesome than I thought!
Comfrotable fit, great for work and stylist print
Very pretty skirt. Waist band has no give so size up if that area is an issue. I'm a 6 and the small was fine though.

links_reviews_title: The pattern added a pop to what would've been a plain outfit, wore to dinner with friends.
links_reviews_text: I loved this skirt. I definitely recommend pairing with a tight-fitted top, because the waistline of the dress puffs out a bit. The dress fit just above my hips and was very flattering. I got so many compliments. Perfect for a night out with friends or everyday wear.

I really wanted to like this... but I got asked what grade I taught when sending pictures to my friend for her opinion on this for an event. I think it's the length of the shirt that just threw me off! I think it would be cute for work though!

I received a lot of compliments on this skirt! Some even thought it was Tomas Maier, as they have a dress out right now that is very similar in print. Overall, fit was good. I wore a grey and gold belt with it with a tucked-in black Equipment top and a leather jacket and L.K.. Bennett heels. This skirt MADE the outfit!

I'm usually an 8/10 in skirts and the 8 fit well sitting just below my waist. I brought this on vacation to wear with a tight fitting black tank to offset the volume on the bottom. I never ended up wearing it but was still cute and will keep in mind for future rentals.

links_reviews_title: It was light, airy, very pretty pattern.
links_reviews_text: As I am normally a 4/6 I did not enjoy how large it made my hips look. I ended up returning it without wearing it as it was not flatterning on my body size.

I only didn't wear this because I didn't have the right events to wear it too, otherwise it fit really well and looked adorable!! I would love to rent again when the weather is nicer so I can wear it!

links_reviews_title: I wasn't able to wear it. :(
links_reviews_text: This definitely runs small, and since it was a zip with a tight waist, I couldn't even wear it open a little bit. It is very voluminous, so it definitely requires a tighter top underneath.

links_reviews_title: Great skirt for work or going out
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'10" and normally a 4 - thought the medium was a bit snug. It worked, but I'd debate sizing up. Got tons of compliments at work - this is fun to wear!

links_reviews_title: Eye catching print and flowy material
links_reviews_text: Good fit without being too tight in the waist. The pattern is fun and will get you compliments.
It slips at the waist. I don't know if it's a natural waist skirt or low waist skirt, but it it didn't fit at my waist.
Paired well with a black top

This skirt fit so perfectly at my natural waist and was ideal for my annual holiday party at work. I styled it with a black turtleneck and a white tuxedo blazer, and it was probably one of my favorite outfits of the year. So mad at myself for not taking pictures!!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect to Pair with a Sweater
links_reviews_text: I wore this skirt with a sweater and sock booties. It was a hit. I wish I took some pictures. Will definitely rent again

Skirt was cute but I found myself needing to keep my jacket on the entire day. For some reason the pleats made me look hugeeeeeeeeee!! I loved the skirt but not sure why it made me look and feel so fat. I did however get the skirt from RTR shop and somehow a size large fit me when I normally wear a size small.
I loved this skirt! I wore it with a black tank and denim jacket to work. Very comfortable and I got a lot of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Loved the way it moved, great way to spice up a work wardrobe.
links_reviews_text: Fit: True Midi-Length, Small left a bit of room for me to tuck in a blouse and feel comfortable all day, but probably could have done the XS. Pros: Pretty, light-weight, looks great as you walk.
wore to a friends engagement party - very different and fun! very versatile, will probably style with a denim shirt later this week for a more casual look too

While I really loved the cut and pattern of this skirt, it was much too large for me. The waistband rolled and the skirt was really long on me (like maxi length). This skirt is probably more flattering on taller people.

links_reviews_title: Easy fit, could be paired with anything
links_reviews_text: Great easy fit
Great pattern and hangs well, I just bought the wrong size! Going to rent again a size down so it doesn't fall off my waist

I loved this skirt in theory, but once I put it on it was so unflattering on me. Maybe if I had gone up a size to medium (I'm usually a 4), but it gave me wide hips out of nowhere. I'm so sad I wasn't able to wear it for my work presentation.
Light flowy skirt worn to an outdoor party and to work. Paired it with a simple black tank and it almost looked like a dress. Not too long for a petite!
Great work to evening piece. Received a lot of compliments on it and it passed the subway skirt test (did not fly up).

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress but not the best fit for me
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress . I usually wear 8 but even the 10 was snug in the hips. As a result the back zipper buckled a bit. I had to keep pulling it down. Still I received many compliments on the dress.

This dress was my third choice but it was amazing. I am so glad I wore it and will rent it again. I will also keep my eye out for it to be sold I loved it so much! No bra needed for this one and it is so flattering. It hugs you in all the right spots. Just beautiful and classic.

links_reviews_title: Glam choice, could be more fun
links_reviews_text: This dress is really classy! I like the silky fabric and the big ruffle. It's gone enough coverage for a normal bra. The neckline gaped a bit on me, and it could have been more "fun," not for a formal affair it's a good cocktail-length option!

A size ten was worn in this dress, it was slightly too loose in the chest, and fit beautifully from the natural waist down. The dress itself (in total length) is on the longer side( so I had some bunching in the waist and the v neck would migrate, so a strapless bra had to be worn but you could get away with a regular bra. The fabric has no give, so sitting down was a very precise art but it made you remember good posture. 100% would wear again despite the cons I encountered.
Just too low cut. Had difficulty finding a bra to accommodate my size and not show. Result is obvious.

This dress was my backup dress. Once I unzipped the bag I fell in love. I felt pretty and put together. Dress is a little low but not too low. I could have worn the dress without shaper. I would most defiantly rent again. I received so many compliments.
Loved the entire RTR experience. Thanks for having everything be fun and easy. No complaints, and compliments galore! I will absolutely use RTR again.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering + classy. Wore to a gala and an awards ceremony, felt perfectly dressed for both
links_reviews_text: Did not need a bra to feel supported. Just enough stretch on the bias to forgive some lumpy areas. Ruffle does the rest.

links_reviews_title: It is a simple dress with a flare. I received compliments on the dress, via text, after the event.
links_reviews_text: I received many compliments on the dress, but beware if you are petite with a small bust. . . .like me. That is not anyone's fault as I knew I was taking a risk not renting a petite sized dress. The dress was loose in the bust and shoulder area. I had to use tape to make sure it stayed put. Again, it was a hit! I received many compliments. Despite having to tape it down, I would rent this dress again!

Wore this dress to a fundraising event. The side ruffle and neckline are both flattering and put a nice twist on the typical LBD. I also like that you can wear a bra with it. I would definitely rent this again.
Loved this dress because it really made me look thin. The chest was little loose. I love the ruffle. It doesn't show as well in photos but it makes it pop.

One of my absolute favorite items ever rented! So flattering and elegant! It runs very big...I normally wear a 2, but the 2 was huge. So I got the 0 and it fit, maybe even a little loose. Overall, amazing dress!

links_reviews_title: Great dress, ran small in the hips. Try a couple of sizes. Durable and very elegant!
links_reviews_text: Glamorous
Simple and classy, this dress was great for formal night on our cruise. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: A bit of flare with a great Silhouette
links_reviews_text: It does fit a little tight. But love this dress. The material is good and thick. Not a lot of room for movement. However, I got a ton of compliments. It was great for the cocktail attire work event I attended. I am 170' 5'11" Wish I ordered the 10 and the 12, but the 12 is always usually swimming on me.

links_reviews_title: A not so basic little black dress
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a Gatsby themed black tie optional party. I didn't want to do a gown and wanted to be comfortable. I also wanted something that I could maybe jazz up with jewelry and accessories. This dress was perfect. Fit true to size. Was able to wear my regular bra and without shape wear due to the thickness of the fabric. It is a great LBD that has a standard sheath shape with the gorgeous ruffles on the side. Very classy - think Breakfast at Tiffany's. This is a dress I wish I owned!

I love this classic and elegant dress! Running true to size, we would recommend getting your usual size as your primary and going one size up for the backup size. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and the stretchy material allows comfortable room for full hips. This dress is great for any cup sizes and may be worn with a standard bra. In regards to length, it hits me right at the knee. I love the ruffle detailing on this dress as well as the v neck cut, as it is super flattering. Pair it with black or sparkly heels to give it some flair and maybe a fun pair of statement earrings.

I loved this dress. I usually wear a 12, but the 12 was way too tight. The 14 fit well (still a little tight through the hips) but the top was a little big. Still fun to wear and tons of compliments all night long.

Loved this!! Runs true to size, very forgiving and flattering. Material is a black satin feel but not too shiny. Looks and fits like the expensive dress it is! Perfect for a few corporate holiday parties this season.

For me is ran a little big in the bust, but tight through the hips. I'm a 36B and have put on a little weight over the holidays that have landed on my hips. I've never worn an 8 before (I've always been a 6) but with the extra weight gain and since this is a sheath style, it made sense. In all honesty, a size 10 would have fit better in the hips. I wore it to a black tie event and received compliments all evening. Although it was tight in the hips, I was comfortable and felt confident.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but not for petites
links_reviews_text: I found this dress to be overwhelming on me. I'm only 5' 3" and the length and bow was too much. Did not wear.
Beautiful dress. A little low cut.
I'm 5'7 160 and this dress made me feel so beautiful. It hugs in all the right places and I received so many wonderful compliments.
Pretty dress with lovely fabric. Was way too big. And I have hips. Will try the 6.

links_reviews_title: This dress is so well made. Although I did not get to wear it due to it running small, will reorder
links_reviews_text: Dress fit a bit snug for the size I normally order, but will order again. It's just a beautiful dress.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my brother’s rehearsal dinner- didn’t want to take it off at the end of the night!
links_reviews_text: Ran true to size

links_reviews_title: Such a change from the basic black dress!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a old Las Vegas themed gala. The fit was perfect, curved in all the right places. I would normally wear a 0 or 2, and I wore the 2 because there was more room. It was flattering and stunning at the same time. The gathered front gave it just enough change from the ordinary black dress.
tiny, order two sizes up
Fit perfectly
Dress was too tight. Couldn't even zipper it.
Doesn't fit. No stretch factor. Good luck.
This dress was very uncomfortable but looked great.
Didn't wear this one. Unflattering fit. True to size but, wasn't comfortable to move around in.
Runs small and does not stretch

links_reviews_title: Great night supporting Fedex House in Memphis.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful, classy dress. Fabric has NO GIVE. Hard to get on and off, navigate stairs and toilet, probably because the length was upper calf for me (above knee on the model pictured). Neckline is lower than expected. Had to wear push up bra, then felt self conscious as the girls were “out there”. Hard to sit comfortably for dinner and entertainment.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved this dress! Wish I could keep it but a little too much for my budget right now!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress! Wish I could keep it but a little too much for my budget right now!

links_reviews_title: Too large in the chest area.
links_reviews_text: I loved the style of this dress. I ordered it in size 12 and 14. Unfortunately, the size 12 was not true to size, it was too small. Badgley Mischka is usually true to size. The size 14 dress was way too large, especially in the chest area.
loose on top, tight at hips. not for the pear shaped

Beautiful dress but runs a little small in the hips. I normally wear either a size 6 (Ann Taylor, Banana Republic) or size 8, got this in an 8 and the hips were snug. Couldn't size up because the 8 was a little loose on top. Dress looked great anyway and I got a ton of compliments. Side ruffle added style without adding any bulk.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so cute, so sad I couldn't wear it
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress! Looks like it fit like a glove but it was tight in the hips. Couldn't sit down!
Loved this dress for dinner while on vacation!
Loved the dress- the fit was perfect! Only problem was that it wrinkles very easily and was a bit short. But even so, I wish I owned this one, and lived on the beach.

links_reviews_title: Super bright colors great for a vacation or beachy vibe!
links_reviews_text: Dress was a great overall fit! It does run a little on the shorter size though if you are taller like me.
The dress fit great. I really liked it. The colors were perfect for a summer party.
This dress was perfect for a day at work! Only complaint was it was a bit short. I'm 5'9 and wore a size 0.

links_reviews_title: Someone recognized this as a "Lilly dress" and I shared my secret about using Rent the Runway!
links_reviews_text: Great fit - The material is thick enough to allow you to go without a bra.

I rented this dress for a bridal shower. The colors of this dress were absolutely beautiful, got tons of complements. I had to size up to fit my bust but there was plenty of room in the midsection. The only downside of this dress is it is ridiculously short, I could not bend over without giving everyone a show. Sitting was also pretty difficult, because the dress rode up so I was basically wearing nothing on the chair. Despite that it was super cute and flattering. Would probably rent again.
I usually am a 4 or 6 but definitely felt better in the 6 with this one. Loved the fit and how it made me feel. Received compliments. Love how it photographs too!
Loved the fit. Wore a strapless bra and tan flip flops.

links_reviews_title: This dress was STUNNING! I got so many compliments and wish I could have kept it!
links_reviews_text: more vibrant in person than online, didn't show any lines (bra spandex), and was very breathable
Loved the way this dress looked on me! I got many compliments. Was a little tight on the chest area and I may get a bigger size next time. So pretty though! And highly recommend!!!
Rented this dress for my 14 year old daughter (5'5 120 lbs) for Easter and it was a great fit. It was a little short, but still an appropriate length. She received lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: I wore it on a night out to dinner in Cancun and felt gorgeous. May want to size up.
links_reviews_text: This is form fitting so you may want to go up a size especially if you're busty.

links_reviews_title: I wore this Lilly to a summer polo match, it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: This is a true shift and true to size, hugs your hip area but has room in the bust. The colors are vibrant and the lattice front is my favorite detail, a great contrast against the swirling pattern. I would definitely rent again for any similar summer event!

I wore this dress for a wedding in Mexico. It did run a slightly big and I wish that it was a bit longer. I love to dance and I couldn't really do that in this dress because it was short. It was very comfortable and I really liked the colors in the dress!

links_reviews_title: Great simple dress with a slim fit
links_reviews_text: This was actually my back up dress so I ended up wearing this for the rehearsal dinner and it was great for the event. A little tight in the bust but not too bad and I liked the slim fit that wasnt too tight around my body.

I wore this to my sister's bridal shower. I'm 135 pounds 5'4 wore the 2... I can't imagine going up a size, I think it would be too big, but beware it is a short dress! Had to be careful about bending. My sister wore another lily dress and we looked so cute matching! Tons of compliments.

The colors are bright and beautiful, but this dress is not super flattering. I'm currently 4.5 months postpartum, about 145 lbs, 34D, and generally wearing a size 8. The size 8 in this dress gaps a bit in the chest and shows a bit of my strapless bra. Also I felt like it drew attention to my postpartum belly. The length was fine (I'm 5'6), I don't find it too short like some other renters. All in all this dress is okay.
True to size, hugged you in all the right places!

This was a backup dress I had ordered but my original didn't pan out. This is a fun colorful dress for a summer wedding. I wore this for a wedding near the water. I am normally a 0 and it fit great, it's snug but not too tight. Strapless bra is a must.
Wore this for a Bridal Shower and felt like the host of the year! Perfect for summer. I received so many compliments! Fits true to size and wasn't too short. Wish I could own this!
Loved it so much I bought it!!

This was the first time I've worn a Lily Pulitzer dress-I loved it! The colors were really pretty and it was super comfy. I got a size 2 (I'm normally between a 2 and 0 depending on the dress) and size 0 wasn't available so I only have reference for the 2. It was a tad big under the arms but it fit everywhere else. I have a larger butt so a 0 may have been too tight if I went down a size. Wore it to a bridal shower and got a ton of compliments. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Super cute dress but stretches out throughout the night
links_reviews_text: Color is super cute, but the dress does stretch out especially if you're at an event where you are moving a lot.
Great Lilly dress not too short beautiful colors! Fit true to size.

I wore this for a rehearsal dinner and then out afterwards and I loved it. The fabric is thick and very well made. I'm a 32D and went with the 0 so that the bust would fit more closely and there wouldn't be too much gapping near the underarm. It is on the shorter side( I'm 5'8) But even with that I would rent this again. The colors are soooo beautiful in person
Fun, cute and just perfect for a summer party!
Fits well! Both the size 2 and the size 4 fit me. The 4 was more comfortable and fit better in the bust. The 2 was more fitted around my waist. I wore the 4 to the baby shower. I love this dress!
I actually didn't end up wearing this because it was far too tight but it was a beautiful dress, great quality. I'm almost always an 8 or 10 and this was a 10 and super tight

Loved how this dress fit. I never wanted to return it! Perfect for a graduation, baby shower, bridal shower, or engagement party (what I wore it for). For like a glove and very flattering. Also loved the colors!

links_reviews_title: I felt so special in this Lilly dress! I have always wanted to wear one!
links_reviews_text: I received two sizes the 6 & the 8 the 6 fit me best and had a fancy zipper pull that the 8 did not have. I wore a strapless bra and had no problem with undergarments all night, the fabric is thick but not to tight or constricting. The neckline is what really did it for me on this dress. I paired it with chunky heel slingbacks and turquoise earrings.
Nice material & color. Wore this to friends rehersal dinner in July. Strapless bra works w this dress but not needed. Lots of compliments :) i wore size 2 but very slight diff between 2/4.

Loved this dress. I ordered my usual 12 and a 10 bc I've lost some weight and I was pleasantly surprised to find the 10 fit perfect. I'm 5'9" 160lbs and have fairly long legs so I was worried it may be too short. I wore this for a bridal shower/bachelorette party and it covered all my business during the shenanigans. And I received lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: worn for an outdoor summer wedding
links_reviews_text: Size 2 fit perfectly - I could have also gotten away with the size 4 but it just gapped a little in the armpits. This dress is super comfortable and only wrinkled slightly after sitting through a hot outdoor ceremony.

links_reviews_title: I want to buy this dress!!
links_reviews_text: Usually wear a size 2 but I'm glad I got the size 0 as a back up because it fit perfectly! Received so many compliments on this dress and definitely did not want to return it :(

I rented this for a Charleston bachelorette party and it was perfect! The colors are bright and vibrant and the material is a bit thicker (no need to worry about it showing any sweat marks!) I'm generally a 4 in dresses and after reading Lilly reviews was advised to size up. I was comfortable all night. Such a fun dress to brighten up your night!
I ordered this for Father's Day dinner, and it was perfect! Fit comfortably, ran true to size, and I didn't even need to wear a bra. Definitely considering ordering this again for another event!

I really loved this dress, got tons of compliments on it. The colors were bright and beautiful. I didn't give 5 stars because it was short. I had to be super careful bending over not to give everyone a show. But I paired it with a bright lipstick and fun wedges and it really looked cute.
I rented this dress for my graduation and it was perfect. I am 5'2 and have an athletic body shape, i ordered the size 4 and 6, and the 6 fit like a glove.

I wore this dress for a destination bachelorette and loved it! I've never worn LP before because of the fabric -- I'm bigger on the bottom and normally need more stretch. I wore the 6 which was fitted, but if you're inbetween sizes I would recommend the 8 if you like a loser fit. The top was a little bigger and the seems gave it a pointed look but it wasn't noticeable with a strapless bra. The colors are much brighter than I was expecting but it worked well for this occasion. I would definitely rent again!

I loved this dress and tried so hard to wear it! I think it would be better for someone with a larger chest because the top kept falling down even though the strap is adjustable. Wasn't for me because of that but everything else was great

It was a gorgeous dress that fit really well. It did run large so I ended up wearing the medium. I'm 6'0 and it was the perfect length with flats. I got lots of compliments and it was really comfortable to wear!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for an outdoor wedding
links_reviews_text: I will say that I was worried before trying this dress on because the straight shape of the dress didn't look like it was going to do my curvy frame any favors, but luckily it fit great and ended up lengthening me instead of making me look like a sack. Would definitely recommend tape for the bust to prevent the right side from slipping down, as it can be a bit loose even with the strap tied tightly. Also, definitely order a size down. I am usually a M but ordered a S after reading reviews and I am glad that I did. Overall very nice, light dress for a casual wedding

I wore this to an outdoor wedding rehearsal in Dallas and was pleasantly surprised. I stayed cool the entire evening and didn't need a bra. Runs a bit large, so a small may have fit better, but the bigger size kept me cool in the Texas heat! Definitely a good option for a semi-dress beach, evening, or wedding event of any sort.
Runs large but adjustable tie and very long !
Beautiful style
I loved the look of the dress but it was big in the chest area

links_reviews_title: Fits very large. Did not wear.
This was way too big in the top
links_reviews_text: Too big
This was a very pretty dress but the top was too baggy and I wasn't able to wear it.
Too large

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my sister's bridal shower.
links_reviews_text: I am usually a size 6 and can wear a small or medium. I wore this in a small based upon reviews and it was perfect. I think if you have a larger chest you may have a problem with the fit. I got lots of compliments and it was really comfortable.

This is a beautiful dress, but I wish it fit more true to size. It ran large for me - so much so that even when I tied the shoulder pieces as tight as they would go, the dress was still gaping around my chest. Recommend you size down!
Forgiving style and cool for hot climates
The XLG was too big
This dress was really large on me, the top was falling off. I couldn't wear it.
Unless you're on the busty side, size down. It's very pretty & flowing but wish I had gotten a small.
dress is lovely and flowy, with just enough asymmetrical flair. wish the top segment was not as long

links_reviews_title: Not a fan, the material felt cheap. Never wore it.
links_reviews_text: Scratchy and cheap feeling. Not worth the rental.
True to size

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a bridal shower (as Matron of Honor) and I got SOO many compliments. Runs a little big
links_reviews_text: Flattering and gorgeous colors and print. I typically wear a 10/12, but wore a size medium in this dress. SO PRETTY!

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress. Wore it to a bridal shower at a winery.
links_reviews_text: I wore with flat sandals & it was just a bit too long (Nothing tragic, though).

links_reviews_title: I felt like a goddess every time I wore it!
links_reviews_text: So easy to wear, flattering, could wear with flats if I held up the back slightly while walking. HATED sending it back!
I'm 5'9 and dress as too short, fell a few inches above ankle so for you tall ladies, keep looking!
I typically wear a 12 or 14 and so I thought an XL would be what I need... it swallowed me! The top was completed mis-sized
This was baggy and unflattering. Recommend sizing down

links_reviews_title: Very pretty and comfortable but runs big
links_reviews_text: So comfy and really really pretty for a wedding. Love the weight and feel of the material, looks like a more expensive dress than it is. BUT the underarm runs really big. Didn't end up wearing but would have if I sized down

I was recommended to order a size large. It ended up being way too big to the point where it literally fell off my body. The dress was also too long. Not sure if it was the size. Nice quality and pretty design, though.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and still looks great
links_reviews_text: Pros: looks great and is still really comfortable, ruffles have just the right feminine touch. And it had pockets! I got brand new with tags still on which is always great, just needed some steaming to get wrinkles out Cons: definitely lightweight polyester so it can be chilly and also more wrinkly. I've got a good busy size but narrow shoulders so had to fashion tape it (which didn't work well) to stay put. Maybe would be better for more broad shoulders/chest?

I wanted to love this and did--but it just didn't work for my body. I'm a true XS and got the XS. It was a little too baggy on me but I think the XXS might have been too tight depending on the waist. It wouldn't have stayed up on the side and I feared an inevitable "oh, there's my boob" malfunction at some point. I may try the XXS. If you have a bigger chest it shouldn't be an issue. This was long enough for my long torso--another thing I wasn't sure about the XXS, but I think it's for someone with longer legs than I. Still recommend! If you can make it work.
Was great fit up top but baggy in waist and butt.
Different with the one shoulder and ruffle; very fun and made me feel sexy. I wore in Buenos Aires and it was perfect for a night out; I ended up wearing it twice.
Runs a little large.
Fit really well, accentuates the waist, and is overall really flattering

I loved the top of this jumpsuit but the legs were awful. They were very MC Hammer. Had they either been tighter or looser rather than somewhere in the middle it would have been great. Bummed I didn't get to wear it but for someone who is long and lean it might work great!
Fit like a glove!
It fit great just right. I felt beautiful
Many compliments however top was incredibly tight and hard to zip. It is a gorgeous dress and worth stuffing into. It's really stretchy so once in, it's ok.

I originally rented this for my husband's birthday party, but wound up wearing it to a concert instead. The dress was flattering in the midsection, but poofs out quite a bit at the hips. The front of my arms were chaffed at the end of the night where the armholes of the dress rubbed against my skin. I am very small busted and the dress was very fitted, large chested women may need to size up.

I love this trendy dress by Opening Ceremony! Running true to size with a little stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and roomie at the hips. It works for A-C cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear nubra or no bra. At 5’3”, the length hit tea length on me. The pattern on the dress is amazing in person. Pair with nude heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!

links_reviews_title: Unique, Classy, and comfortable- perfect for a fundraising Gala
links_reviews_text: Really great dress! The material is almost like foam- so it was thick enough where I didn't have to wear any special undergarments to keep everything smooth and tight. Really comfortable. The cut and lines of this dress are the real showstopper- it hugs in all the right places and is very flattering. I felt both sexy and elegant. I had fun pairing this dress with another RTR item; Kenneth Jay Lane "Enamel Geo Drops" Necklace. I was honestly blown away by how many compliments I received about the dress. I even had a friend comment how my current job must be paying me really well to afford a dress like this! I said no, it's just RTR ;)
This dress was really cute, I didn't wear it because another dress looked better, but if I had another event to attend, I would have worn it

Unfortunately this dress did not work as a replacement for another dress I rented. The cut and style are very nice but the fabric made it look cheap. Didn't end up wearing it for the city wedding we were attending, returned it.

links_reviews_title: runs WAY too small. Order a size up for sure
links_reviews_text: runs WAY too small. Order a size up for sure. Wasn't able to wear it and my typical size is a medium.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering cut but runs small
links_reviews_text: This is a very flattering cut and I recommend it but size up. I usually wear a small, but a medium would've been much more comfortable as it's narrow in the armpits (I saw that in other reviews as well) and the seam there dug in. My bra size is 30D/32C to give you an idea of the chest size for reference. I'm 5'6" and the bottom of the hem almost went to the floor when not wearing shoes.

links_reviews_title: What kind of material is this?
links_reviews_text: The photos of this dress are stunning, but the material is almost like neoprene, definitely not classy enough for a formal event.

links_reviews_title: It was classy, elegant, and so comfortable to wear.
links_reviews_text: It was just the right texture for a dress, not too warm and not to thin. The style dress covered up my varicose veins so that I could wear my high heals bare skinned The bust line was a little too low for me, but it passed.
Beautiful dress would've love to worn it but it runs too small

links_reviews_title: Haven't word the dress so still trying for that unforgetable moment.
links_reviews_text: The dress is beautiful and thick material so covers all "bumps", however, I am 5'7" 140 lbs with a 34 D cup and the bust would not fit. No way... no how. I rented a medium based on other reviews feeling confident my bust would fit but I couldn't get the girls in that dress no matter what I tried. I am usually as straigh up size 6 so I am trying the large hoping the bust will fit and not be too loose around the bottom.

links_reviews_title: I was not able to wear this dress because it was extremely small
links_reviews_text: extremely small I wear a size 2 normally and I could not get into this dress

links_reviews_title: Runs small, itchy fabric, odd fit
links_reviews_text: The dress runs small. I am a size 0 or XS usually and I couldn't zip it up. The fit seemed odd on my body. Material was itchy. I did not end up wearing, will return.
I'm a size 8 and I couldn't get this zipped in a Large

links_reviews_title: Really nice fabric, runs very small
links_reviews_text: I loved the fabric of this dress and the interesting hemline, unfortunately it was very tight on the lower stomach and hip area that made me feel uncomfortable. I normally wear an 8 or 10 in pants and wondering if an extra large would have even fit over my hips.

links_reviews_title: I loved the dress but wore red instead !
links_reviews_text: Very flattering and fun. Comfortable and no special undergarments needed

I love thicker material dresses (like the scuba material etc), but this fabric was SO itchy that I wanted to remove it as fast as I could! The fit was also funny - unless the cut falls perfectly on a person's torso, it doesn't look right.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear. Both dresses were too small Disappointed
links_reviews_text: Did not wear either dress :((

links_reviews_title: Cute in the picture but not in person!
links_reviews_text: Didn't even try it on, very poor quality material, run really small.
Nice fit and cut. Needed a medium, but large worked. Itchy fabric. Not great quality
The waist fit is small and the material is low quality.

links_reviews_title: Rented for wedding, did not wear due to itchy material.
links_reviews_text: Fit was nice, but found the material too itchy.

The fabric of this dress is hard to describe, it's very unique. It's thick and stretchy and a little shiny and really structured, almost like a thin sheet of foam. Because of this, the seams are really thick and since it's unlined, so I found the seams rubbing against my skin really uncomfortable. The asymetrical hem line in playful and fun and spices up the LBD, but I didn't feel it was quite formal enough for the black tie wedding I was attending. If you adjust the straps, you can wear a regular bra with this. I'm a 32B and didn't have quite the boobs to fill this out.

I wore this to a fundraising gala for work. I loved it! It is very form fitting and has a lot of shape to it. It made me look good in all the right places! The dress was longer than I expected but it was perfect with heels on.
Sculptural piece. Love the idea, but would've been too formal for my event. A small would be better as well. The sleeves didn't cling enough to my shoulders.

This was super tight with a side zipper that I risked nicking myself several times. I didn't zip all the way up though could have. Material does have a lot of stretch in it. Side is very long if you're short like me. Sadly couldn't wear

Used this dress for my last minute elopement! It was perfect for the event. The straps needed to be taken in a little bit to fit me better, they kept slipping off my shoulders. However I managed and i really loved how it turned out in pictures.
Very flattering, and I loved the pockets! I’m between a 4 and a 6, so the chest was a little tight but not uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my white coat ceremony!
links_reviews_text: Sweet and sophisticated. I felt like a princess!
I got lots of compliments on this dress. The style is super flattering and the pattern is unique. Highly recommend!

The dress fit great! I like that it was snug enough in the bust that I didn't have to wear a bra and didn't have any issues with the straps slipping. (Note: there are little clamps under the straps that are meant to hold a bra strap in place....super cool feature that I've never seen before) POCKETS!! The fabric was heavy and beautiful....it hung just right, much prettier in person I got tons of compliments and would definitely rent it again!
I love the material of this dress. Very forgiving. Not stretchy, but still comfortable and plenty of room to breathe in the midsection!

Beautifully fitted bodice and full skirt make for a princessy look. This is an amazing fabric, lush & textured, just a little shiny, it's more baby blue in person than it shows in pics. My family gushed over this at a wedding rehearsal dinner

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear to the event but wish I could have!
links_reviews_text: Fit great, classically flattering and gorgeous colors and material.

links_reviews_title: Great lil sexy but still very formal dress, wore for baptism
links_reviews_text: Great fit has just enough cleavage Has pockets!! A little on the princess side but that was ok for me given it was a baptism

this dress is stunning! compliments all night, stays classy when you het freaky on the dance floor, and offers a delicate yet effective breeze under that skirt! which hides a multitude of sins! AND has pockets!!! I have a small chest, and i probably should have worn a push up to enhance that neckline. Still felt amazing!!

links_reviews_title: Longer than expected & large in the chest
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a party with my boyfriend’s parents. I got a lot of compliments, and it fit for the most part, but: the pockets made it a lot wider than the photos, the chest was large (which made the shoulder straps fall off), and it seemed a lot bigger than a normal 0. I feel bad for anyone renting this who’s shorter than me, because it was over tea-length and I’m not short. The fabric is solid, not overly heavy, but looks more like upholstery than in the product photos. Would’ve been a perfect dress for a bustier 0 with longer legs.

Wore this to a black tie optional wedding. It was gorgeous! I am very busty, and it was a bit tight but fit nicely at the waist and then plenty of room in the skirt. I thought the length was a little awkward, but got tons of compliments all night. PLUS POCKETS!

This dress was beautiful and perfect for a baptism and fancy country club lunch. Feminine and very pretty for early summer. The straps had snaps to help conceal a regular bra, but mine weren't at the correct angle. Had to wear stickies instead, which was fine.

links_reviews_title: I didn’t wear this, just tried it on!
links_reviews_text: The shoulder straps were long! I am 5’ 4”...I think I was too short!

I wore this for my wedding rehearsal dinner. The bust was a little low/tight on me so I had to be careful to avoid any spillage (36DDD). I'm a hair shy of 5'9" and it hit below the knee. I really loved wearing this dress.

Very flattering cut with great, thick fabric. Wasn't too hot at a Charleston outdoor wedding and the pockets came in handy. I was able to move around easily on the dance floor all night. Seriously would keep this dress if I could!

I rented this dress for graduation pictures and it was beautiful! Very elegant, loved the length, and it's a beautiful color. The material isn't too heavy and it has pockets! I loved it so much that I rented it again for the graduation ceremony itself. Highly recommend!
Sooooo flattering!!!!!
Gorgeous dress, fits very well, incredibly feminine. It is a bit long if you are not very tall. I am 5'9 and a 6 regular was on the longer side.
Beautiful and comfy dress! Due to large boobs, had to wear my larger size. Would rent again!

The dress was perfect for the event. However, it fits small in the rib cage area. I'm a true size 6 and it fit that was in the breast but was very tight in the bodice. Size up if you're going to rent this one. But it was beautiful on!

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this dress for my event.
links_reviews_text: I really liked the color and fabric of this dress. The fit was a bit strange, as the waist was a little snug, but the straps were too long/loose. There was not enough room for my chest, resulting in a sports bra-esque smooshing. I liked the shape of the skirt and could have perhaps worn it with a different blouse or sweater.
Material was gorgeous fit was perfect!

Cute dress! I didn't wear it since it was it wasn't quite right for my friend's wedding. I thought it was kind of big for a size 2 (I normally wear a 4) I'm 5'4, 130 pounds, 34c, 26" waist, 38" hips. Wearing 4" heels.

My best feature was the bodice. No bra was necessary because the bodice was a bit tight with no stretch but It work perfectly for me. Gave me a little boost with the girls. Overall it was an amazing dress. Felt very comfortable and chic. Loved the pockets. The fabric is also very light.

links_reviews_title: Very beautiful dress, thick fabric and POCKETS
links_reviews_text: Very beautiful dress but the 0R (smallest size) was too big, especially around the clivage.

links_reviews_title: Lots of material in skirt hides assets ...which could be good or bad
links_reviews_text: On my case I've lost a bunch of weight so didn't end up wearing this dress since I wanted to show it off a little more. The bodice is flattering and has space for bigger boobs. As I recall, despite the big skirt, it didn't have pockets which was a little disappointing. The tea length was kinda fun and the dress was comfortable. In this picture I am wearing a 6 and am 5'8" 140 34D.

links_reviews_title: Really pretty dress -- people told me that I looked like a princess!
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 6 with an 8 for back up, but I wish I had chosen the 4 for back up instead. I wore the 6 and it was fine, but the straps were a bit loose and slipped down while I was dancing. The skirt is BIG which was nice because it really made my waist look smaller, but it was almost too voluminous. May be better for a day time wedding than an evening affair.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous pastel Blue dress. Incredibly flattering.
links_reviews_text: Loved the ice blue color and the fit was super flattering. It hides your stomach area but makes you look like you have a tiny waist and great cleavage (but not too much). The skirt has pockets and is pretty voluminous so it's better for a more formal event or at least cocktail party. Otherwise the skirt might be too much. I found that the dress looked best with nude or light colored heels. I would rent this dress in a heartbeat. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my bridal shower which was tea party themed and it was absolutely perfect! So happy!
links_reviews_text: Great fit so comfortable
Gorgeous fabric and color. Everything from the details to fit was perfect! Rented for my 5'7" 150 lb daughter. She's usually an 8. The 6 was fitted but great!

links_reviews_title: Everyones jaw dropped when I walked in
links_reviews_text: Stunning dress, great material, comfortable, POCKETS!!!
The fit and shape of the dress was beautiful! I Felt so elegant; the fabric was light and airy; very comfortable and many compliments!
So many compliments on this dress. Comfortable to wear the whole day. Fabric light and airy worked perfectly for a summer day.

I loved it! It was my favorite out of the 4 I rented for my vacation. But I had to hand sew it to take out about 4 in in the back. I am a fashion designer and tailor so it was an easy quick fix for me that made huge difference. It's a light weight dress that it just feels great.
Fits so well! I got so many compliments the first day I wore it on three more occasions! I may have to buy this one...

I rented this dress for a wedding in Sonoma and it was absolutely perfect. The color is more blue than it appears in the photos and it's lightweight but has a solid structure all at the same time. I got so many compliments throughout the night and it was very comfortable. I opted to wear it without a bra. The only thing to note is that it's very tight right below the boobs on the upper rib cage and there's no give. It worked, but I was a tad worried it looked too tight. Probably could have opted for a size up to have it a bit looser there, but I still loved it. Definitely recommend. Oh, and it has POCKETS!

links_reviews_title: This was a great dress for the golf course wedding I was attending.
links_reviews_text: This was a great dress! It fit true to size, the fabric was excellent quality, and the pattern was gorgeous! Was getting compliments all night. It was a little tight in the chest area, but could still accommodate more voluptuous ladies like myself. I would definitely rent this again!
I love this dress! Didn't want to return it...

links_reviews_title: I got tons of compliments on this dress. Perfect for summer wedding.
links_reviews_text: I typically wear a size 4-6 so I ordered both. I ended up wearing the size 4 since the 6 was too big in the chest. The 4 fit wonderful....when I was standing up. When I sat down and after dinner, the ribs were extremely tight and I was very uncomfortable... thank goodness we only sat during the ceremony and dinner! The chest also cut very low, so I was hiking it up the whole time. But with all that, I got tons of compliments and it was great for a summer wedding.
Very nice, but it's too tight if you can see your belly button through the dress. Also the material is pretty heavy. Too heavy for summer.

I originally ordered an 8 and a 10 but got nervous the closer I go to the wedding. I went to the designer's website and looked at his Fit Chart and discovered I was in the middle of a 10 and 12 (my bust size) so I changed my order days before the wedding and crossed my fingers. The 10 fit perfectly and the 12 looked a little big so I brought that with in case I spilled coffee of something. It was perfect! The fabric weight is heavy, the dress is lined (which can sometimes bunch so be careful), and I got LOADS of compliments on how I looked and how smart it was to rent. Fantastic!

links_reviews_title: This was a perfect dress for my bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great! The fabric is a bit thick but perfect for a February event.

I wore this for the bridal shower held by my family. I got many compliments and the dress felt very high quality. I sized up and still wore spanx because the fabric does show every bump. But it's beautiful!

I got the 12 & 14 and had a serious debate which one to wear. I went with the 12 which looked amazing in person it made the best of my curves. I got nothing but compliments but the pictures would have been better with the 14. I was happy wearing the 12 but if you are instagram concerned with a bit of a belly, size up.

Cut slim. I was not aware of this in the black (I rented that one earlier). But the white showed all my flaws. I wish I had prepared for spankx and better bra. It still was lovely, but it is very heavy, not a warm weather dress!

links_reviews_title: Elegant stunner with just enough “something” special.
links_reviews_text: The sleeves are everything! Xmas Eve Mass is my family’s Oscars and this dress hit the mark. The fit was true to size. The fabric is fabulous for a proper MI winter. The funnel-neck is a lovely detail if you have broader shoulders. If you have hostess or baby-momma duties, the sleeves are a challenge. Also challenging if you wear a coat; choose your outerwear wisely! My friend liked it so much, she found it online in black and bought it for her wardrobe. I would absolutely wear this again!

So elegant and thick quality material! Love the dramatic sleeves and its very flattering if you order the correct size! Others have said it shows all your flaws, but with spanx and the correct size it will be flattering on just about anyone.
I received complements on the dress all night!
Nice, cold weather dress. Heavy fabric. Snug fit, but appropriately sized.

links_reviews_title: I got SO MANY compliments. Classic dress, well made, comfortable and very flattering.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. It fit perfectly w/no slip needed. Wonderful quality!

links_reviews_title: I felt like an angel. The compliments were wonderful - it was a special night.
links_reviews_text: Perfect for a formal winter event. The dress was not a bright white - but more of a winter/silver white with a generous fit in a thick flattering material that draped beautifully.

This was a great dress for me--warm, dressy, sophisticated. Had a very nice formal birthday dinner and this dress was amazing on. It not only looked sexy and fit well, it was warm enough for the weather. I have a very hard time with strappy dresses during the cold months. This was a nice think material and fit well for someone who is slightly pear shaped. I am only 5'2" and the length was quite nice (for a 55 yo) and would still be awesome for someone quite a bit taller. Would absolutely rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Simple but elegant, and the perfect amount of drama for being on the football field at halftime.
links_reviews_text: It was a little bigger in the sides than I would have preferred, but from a distance it wasn't noticeable. The weight of the dress was surprising, but very nice and helped feel secure. I had to be mindful of my arm movements when it came to the sleeves, but I wouldn't trade the drama they provided in pictures for anything. So happy I chose this dress to wear - it was perfect for a 2018 Homecoming Queen.

Wore this to a celebrity charity gala. Received compliments all night. Dress is just slightly off-white, not bright white (which I liked), very comfortable with a little stretch. In a room full of LBD's this was a stand out with its color and unique sleeves and modern cut. Not too short or tight for a formal gala but form fitting and flattering. Thinking about buying this timeless style! One word of advice: You do need to watch your sleeves if you are eating dinner. I had to hold them up if I was reaching across my plate to make sure they didn't drag through my food. It wasn't a big deal, just something to be aware of.

links_reviews_title: Fabric is thick great for fall, spring or winter event. Very elegant
links_reviews_text: Fabric has a little stretch. My nylons had a seam that you could see in the front of my dress. But I scrunched the fabric a bit to hide it. It was no issue. Loved the dress

Compliments all day long in this gorgeous dress. Pros: lined for a smooth finish, I didn't need spa color or anything special, the fit was incredible- just enough stretch. Sleeves were amazing. No cons. I styled this as shown but swapped sneakers for nude laced Valentino pumps in the office

Rented for sorority international conference. Classic, head turning. Complements from all generations: blue-bonnets and college ladies alike. Well made heavier fabric, kept me warm in freezing conference center. Bell sleeves were a little heavy (made of same fabric as dress). Good stretch, easy to move in and sit. I wore with a smoothing slip, did not need full spanx. I am 5'7", 149lb, a 32DD, 29" waist, 40" hips, wear 6-8 depending on cut.

I'm 5'2", about 148lbs, and curvy- but this dress fit me like it was made for me. My favorite dress- hands down! So beautiful, elegant yet simple, and fabulous! The sleeves are everything and the material so thick but gorgeous. I wore it for my daughter's Baptism- it was perfect!
Overall gorgeous fit and flattering for ladies who have curves! Got a ridiculous amount of compliments and it was the perfect amount of dressy even with a shorter length!
Fit snuggly - I should have ordered a 6. Heavy weight and more of a winter white color. Too heavy for Summer.

links_reviews_title: Unhappy with original sizes ordered but I was able to exchange and receive another the next day.
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect. I'm 6'1 and it hit right above my knees (which I loved). It was a little fitted in the stomach area but that was expected. My only complaint is that because the collar is so big, it was a little flimsy. Other than that it was amazing. Everyone loved it and got a few "best dressed" compliments :)
Received loads of compliments on this piece. Great dress and fit true to size. I would rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Providing a dress that fit each occassion
links_reviews_text: The fabric is stretchy. I got size 16 when normally i wear size 14. The larger size was not baggy. Wearing white will show more of your curves, especially the belly buldge. I was very satisfied with the fit of the larger size. I did get compliments. I love RTR unlimited. I can wear something new or fun each week. Also can try things i will never dare to buy.

Wore this to an awards dinner. I ordered a little late, so they didn't have the black or size 16 I wanted. I would have liked it to fit much tighter. I wore Spanx Higher Power underneath and everything was smooth. I carry my weight in my breasts and thighs/hips and the dress was very comfortable. (I'm so over uncomfortable clothes!) It was great for a cool spring night because the fabric was heavy. Kinda wished I'd had a brooch for it because it would have been perfect. The dress photographs well.

I felt amazing in this dress. It is very structured and feels very elegant. I deducted a star because it does not photograph well. In fact, it photographs quite terribly. The length and style were perfect for our daughter's christening. The color was more ivory than bright white so it did wash me out a little.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress for an event in Boston in March.
links_reviews_text: Fit well. Does show lumps & bumps but control top hosiery helped. Lots of compliments!

Beautiful dress with fabulous sleeves. I got compliments all day. True to size. My only gripe is there was something weird going on with the mining so I had to adjust several times throughout the day, especially after trips to the ladies room.

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for my bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: Two big notes: 1) I am 6 ft tall and this dress came to my knees/a little longer so it was perfect for a shower. 2) The sleeves are show stoppers.

I wore this to a work gala. Both dress sizes worked for me and I am in between the two sizes so I was nervous about fit. I did wear spanx as the white color is less forgiving. The material is very thick and good quality. I ended up in the bigger size which was a little big in the top but the length was much better in my hips as I am pear shaped. It is stretchy and I was comfortable standing and sitting. My favorite RTR to date. I want to rent the black one next! Tons of compliments all night!

I am 5'10; 145lbs with an athetic build. I ordered a size 6 and 8, the 8 was huge and the 6 felt a bit large. The dress itself was magical, I received countless compliments on the dress and would highly recommend.

I wore this to a DC political event and loved it. It reminds me of an Olivia Pope outfit from Scandal. Got lots of compliments. Great for hourgalss figures. It runs true to size but is stretchy so you have wiggle room.
Got so many compliments and loved this dress. It was a little large in the waist, but otherwise fit great. Material was thicker which is good for winter. Would recommend to any bride!

links_reviews_title: Warning: Do not rent this unless you want to be retro modern PERFECTION!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for our surprise 10 person wedding. It is well-made and holds it shape beautifully (I didn't even have to steam it when it arrived). I would suggest ordering a size down as your back up. I'm a bit hippy, but thanks to great control garments, I preferred the fit of the smaller size so it really fit well around the shoulder and bust. I wear a 38D and found the size 16 to be a bit loose on top. The cowl neckline is so flattering and the sleeves are EVERYTHING. Our friends, the restaurant staff and other patrons could not stop raving about the dress! And all my social media and guests' posts were non-stop comments about this dress. It really is spectacular and you will be so glad you chose this dress. I would buy this dress in an instant if it came up sale. It pained me to return it!

There aren't words to describe how much I love this dress! I got so many compliments on this dress it's crazy people stopped me on the street to tell me how much they loved it. I wore it to a party I hosted where I asked everyone to wear winter white and it was perfect highly recommend!

Great dress, thick material. Flattering and true to size. The dress is standard but the ivory white color and the sleeves make it a standout! I would definitely rent again; the only downside is that it will wrinkle if sitting for a while.
Big on top

links_reviews_title: Ideal For My Winter Wedding Shower
links_reviews_text: A lovely dress. I was looking for a classy white outfit to wear to my wedding shower in December. The fabric was thick, so I didn't feel too cold in it. I paired the dress with pearl earrings and baby pink suede block heels with ankle straps. Received many compliments from both my family and other people at the venue. The sleeves were a wonderful touch.

This is an awesome dress. I'm 6' tall and wore the 14. I had a little extra room in the hips. This is also stunning in the black. The material is heavy and it's well made. The sleeves wouldn't fit into a coat so I didn't wear one. I had so many compliments! I would love to own both the white and black! Great dress!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my civil service ceremony.
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful in pictures but it was not cut right for my body type. I ordered a 14 but wore my backup size of 16. I had room in the 16 but it still wasn't super flattering. I think that if I had gone up to an 18, it would have been way too big and I would have been unhappy. This dress was tight in the mid section which was ok considering I could strategically hide it with my bouquet in photos! I would recommend this dress but definitely go up a size or two from your actual size if you are short and curvy and also get a back up just in case it doesn't work.
I'm 35 weeks pregnant. Fit great and was super comfortable.

I'm going to start by saying I absolutely loved this dress. I got so many compliments on it! I did read a review that the bust is small- and I would have to agree, but it worked out in my favor.
