My belly is super high, and wearing any sort of bra is so uncomfortable- so i just wore pasties and the babies stood up in this dress! I'm a 34B pre-pregnancy and I have no idea what I am now, but I feel like I tripled!

links_reviews_title: I rented this for my baby shower and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: The bow straps were adjustable and so cute! I received so many compliments on this dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Maternity Dress for a Baby shower
links_reviews_text: The dress was amazing! The quality was beautiful, everyone loved it, and I actually felt comfortable the whole time! I loved this dress and would definitely rent it again! But seriously, if you're pregnant and looking for your shower dress, this is perfect!
Nice & breezy, feels great at 36wk. Bows in great shape too.
This dress was perfect for maternity photos or even a baby shower. Very comfortable. It was tight in the bust area but overall fit well. I am 30 weeks pregnant.
Wore at 36 weeks pregnant, and it fit perfectly. Loved the tie details on the straps. Hit right at the ankle. Overall loved this dress so much!
I wore this dress to my sprinkle at 28 weeks pregnant. It was so comfortable and beautiful, I got so many compliments. I wore a L due to my chest size.

Rented this for a baby sprinkle brunch at a restaurant. I am 32 weeks pregnant (3rd trimester) and it fit really well! Had I been earlier on, maybe 1st or 2nd tri I would have worn the small regular. It runs true to size. Very flowy, COMFORTABLE, and beautiful - tons of compliments!
Rented for my baby shower for my 2nd daughter and loved it! So comfortable and really pretty. Got tons of compliments.
I'm glad I sized up! The chest area was a little tight on the XL. It was very cute and comfortable. Would rent again if I needed a bump friendly option
It hit in a weird place on my arm and seems to not fit well in in the upper body but it was still a nice maternity option.

links_reviews_title: 9 mo. Pregnant and I looked FABULOUS!
links_reviews_text: Dress was sooo soft, hit the bump perfect! The neckline was very flattering for my athletic shoulders. Wore it with a jean jacket because the event was indoor/outdoor in the fall in the Midwest, but could be worn without beautifully. I usually wear M, but Lg gave me extra room in bust and felt "comfy" .Hit mid shin, wore with comfy sandals for my swollen feet! My sister said- it doesn't even look like a Maternity dress! Very happy, would rent again for next baby!

Super comfortable and got tons of compliments. Rented for a birthday party at 26 weeks. Will likely rent again for my baby shower at 32 weeks. Normally a size 2 or 4 and the small was less constricting in the chest than the XS.

I wore this dress for my baby shower. I like that the straps tie so you can adjust it as needed. I normally wear a 2-4 or a small in non maternity dresses and the small fit great. It even fit my top half which is now a G cup so that was surprising. The length was good as well as I was able to wear flat sandals and it still didn't touch the ground. I'm 5'4 so I always worry about that with maxi dresses.

I am not sure how any brand makes maternity clothes that don't have a bigger chest area for pregnant women but this brand consistently does this. There is no zip which makes this one size fit all if you have an A cup at 40 weeks

I rented this dress to wear to my baby shower luncheon at 36 weeks pregnant. It fit perfectly and was extremely flattering. If you live in a very hot climate and are super pregnant, you might get some back sweat from the smocking. Overall, very classy choice.
I wore this dress for my baby shower. I'm currently weighing 155, 33 weeks pregnant, and am 5'5 and the Medium fit perfectly for my body. Very comfortable and beautiful dress! Got many compliments!

links_reviews_title: A beautiful baby shower with friends and family.
links_reviews_text: Such a fun dress for my baby shower! It was summery and comfortable. Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Really cute - great baby shower dress!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my baby shower. I expected the fabric to be a little thicker but still loved it and received so many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but too long on 5'2" Frame!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress but it was too long for my 5'2" height (hit at my ankles vs mid calf). Beautiful print & fabric - wished it was available in lengths! For reference I'm 29 weeks pregnant with my second, so a sizeable bump too!

I rented this as an option for a gala but ended up not wearing, primarily because I thought the color washed me out. I ordered a size up from my regular size, but because the fabric is thick and does not give much and there is no slit, I still found the dress to be a bit too restrictive. It is very well structured though with great material and I think photographs very well! As with other reviews, I'd recommend going one or two sizes up

links_reviews_title: Wish I could make it work
links_reviews_text: This dress is so pretty and sleek, but those cut outs are ROUGH. if I stood with anything but perfect posture my sides would be spilling out. Normally a 10, but a 12 was the only thing I could get into. If I went up another size, I'd have too much room in the chest. Wish it could work, but it's not for my body type.

links_reviews_title: Simple but elegant dress; Runs small!
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress but definitely order one if not two sizes up. A lot of reviews said it was difficult to walk in but I didn't think it was that inconvenient, just lift the bottom a bit. For length, I'm 5'11.5 and the Long just touched the floor when I was barefoot. My only issue with the dress is the cutouts are very stylish but not flattering for me.
Perfect fit, beautiful color, & many compliments. It is a little long & somewhat hard to walk in because there isn't a slit. Despite that would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Beautifully made dress and received many compliments
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to a gala with 3.75 inch heels. Fit like a glove, and because there is no slit, had to hold the dress up to walk normally. I did not wear a bra and had to wear underwear that made it look seamless. Other than that, this is the second rental I’ve done with rtr and they do not disappoint!
I'm a true size 2 and this dress fit like a glove. It was so flattering and I felt so confident. Weirdly tight at the feet so I had to be careful walking, but overall an amazing dress!
Fit like a glove! Color was beautiful. Very tight, slightly hard to walk in. But a total show stopper! And it wasn’t too long!!

links_reviews_title: Cute but very small with no stretch
links_reviews_text: I based my size off of previous Elizabeth and James dresses but this dress was much smaller. The fabric has really no stretch so it was very tight. But the color is great and it's I got lots of compliments!

The cut, color, material is so flattering! I got a ton of compliments, BUT I'm so very glad I read the reviews to sized up. I really would've liked to have even another size bigger because it is very tight! I recommend 2 sizes bigger at least. It's a little long but higher heels fix that! LOVED IT, but would've loved the extra breathing room!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my senior prom. Very fitting for its occasion super elegant!
links_reviews_text: 125lbs 5’5” 32D I normally range from size 2-4 in dresses so I got both and the 4r was a little small but still fit well.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress, Lots of Compliments but runs small and is hard to walk in
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'6'', 125 lbs and a 34B. I ended up wearing the 6R because this dress runs so small. I was able to fit into the 4R but it was a bit short and very tight. I didn't think I would be comfortable. I received many compliments and the color is beautiful. As other reviewers have mentioned, it is a difficult dress to walk in because there is no slit.

I wore this to my junior prom & I loved it. I read the reviews beforehand & everyone said to go a size up, do it!! I am usually a 0 and I ordered a 2 and it fit perfectly. If I got a 0 it would've been wayyy to tight. The dress is very classy & flattered my body nicely, but it was hard to walk in the dress because there is no slit on the side and the materials thick. So if you are planning a night of dancing, walking,etc and want to be comfortable this probably isn't the best choice (just a btw) :) but over all I loved my experience with RTR & the dress !!

links_reviews_title: The event I had planned for two months finally came to fruition!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well but was tight on the bust and rib cage area, it was hard to breathe! I couldn’t take full steps and it was hard to walk. Overall though, I got a lot of compliments on it and it was a hit. I would wear it again.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and form fitting shape!
links_reviews_text: I actually decided to wear a different dress for my event. I ordered two just to be on the safe side and trying to decide between them was so difficult! In the future I will definitely order this dress again. The fit was definitely on the smaller side. My only critique is trying to find garments to wear underneath was an issue. Spanx or something to smooth out the silhouette are needed. Loved the color and shape!

This dress was gorgeous! The neckline is very flattering but the rest of the dress is very tight! If you're at all worried about your stomach, I'd skip this one. The light color is unforgiving. As other reviewers said, the fabric is pretty thick and the skirt is very narrow. As long as you're not trying to do splits, you should be fine to dance. The color really is a light blue, but the blue doesn't come across in pictures very well, unless you are next to something white – luckily that means if you are going to wear this to a wedding, you really won't look like you're wearing white next to the bride!

links_reviews_title: It arrived a week before the event!
links_reviews_text: Loved how it fit!

I had to order this dress last minute after the dress I ordered wasn't available and it was perfect! I loved the fit and got endless compliments. The dress was comfortable and perfect for a black tie wedding. I can't wait to rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. It fit like a glove and I felt so elegant in it .
links_reviews_text: True to size. A little longer than I expected but it worked out.
Really a great dress! Definitely tight down the legs but I just picked up the dress from the bottom to walk normal. Still loved it !

Rented this dress for a formal summer wedding. As others have mentioned, there is no slit so even walking is kind of tough. I was holding it up most of the night. Also, the fabric is REALLY thick. Needless to say in Texas it was 100+ degrees and I never shy away from the dance floor so if you're like me and love to dance, this might not be the the best dress. It was like a furnace under the dress! I originally tried wearing a strapless bra for extra support, but it showed in the cutouts so I went braless. The dress is pretty well made so this was not an issue. The fit is a little tighter up top. I even tried on my backup size to see if it wasn't as tight, but the 10 was HUGE on the bottom so went with the 8. Personally I don't think I would rent it again just because I didn't like how hard it was to walk without a slit. I am 5'6" and I wore about 3 inch heels the length was perfect.

I usually am a 0 or a 2, but this I wore a 4 and it was even slightly tight around my rib cage. Also, I'm 5'4 and it was a bit hard to walk in as there isn't a slit and the fabric doesn't give. Overall it looked great though.

links_reviews_title: Very cute but would not rent again
links_reviews_text: This dress was very flattering but it was SO difficult to walk in. There's no slit so I had to take little steps and looked super weird. I read reviews saying this but didn't think it would be that bad. I ended up having to pick up the bottom of the dress so I could walk.
Overall the dress was great but I had to wear pretty high heels (maybe 5 inch platforms) since it was long on me. It fit well, was really comfortable, and was the perfect color for a summer dance.
Perfect for a formal affair! I felt glamorous and classy!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments and the dress fit like a glove
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'8", 125lbs and 34C chest. I usually wear a 2 or 4 dress. I got a 4L (& 6L as my back-up based on the other reviews about small size). The 4L fit great (it was a little too long so used a couple of stitches to tack the hem up). the 6 was OK, but a bit big. 2 probably would have been too small. Soft, nice material. The only issue was what everyone else mentioned that it could have used a slit to make walking easier. I found myself just hiking it up a lot when I was walking to be able to take half-way normal strides. But I loved it. Standing still it was amazing. I would definitely get it again.

This dress was a very tight squeeze for me. Also, it was extremely hard to walk in because it was so tight, I had to take really tiny steps all night. Other than that, the material was great and very stretchy. I probably wouldn't order this dress again, though.

Ordered a size larger than I normally wear and it was still super tight, particularly in the hips. I like the quality of materials used and the length was nice for not wearing heels. Pretty color too.

Overall a very flattering fit and nice color. I wouldn't recommend to someone trying to hide their stomach, as it is very form fitting. I am 5'5''-5'6'' and found the 4R a little long, even with heals on. Other than that it was a great dress and I'd recommend. Customer service was also great

links_reviews_title: This dress is so well made and great for a cooler weather event. I did have to size up though
links_reviews_text: The fabric reminds me of body con dresses - very tight! I loved the color and how tall and lean I looked. The regular is long so be prepared to wear high shoes. There also is no slit, I was fine with it but I definitely limited moves on the dance floor. I would recommend this dress for any formal event, the material is well made and the plain palette allows you to get creative with accessories.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a gala and received multi.e compliments! Color was beautiful!
links_reviews_text: Fit is extremely small. I would even recommend ordering 2 sizes up. I'm usually a 2P and the 4P was snug, there's not much room. Length was perfect though.

I wore this for my company's annual gala. I am 5'10 and wore flats. would have been the perfect length with a small 2" heel. I feel really elegant and modern in the dress and got lots of compliments. Loved the thick fabric, although would be very hot if you were outside in the summer. The only con is that there isn't a slit so it's VERY hard to walk in.
Gorgeous dress and amazing color. Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: It was not very flattering on me overall. Still ended up being a great dress for the wedding though!
links_reviews_text: The open slats on the sides of the dress are cute when standing straight up, but if I bent at all it would show off my sides in a really unflattering way. This is a beautiful dress but better for individuals with little to no curves or thickness.
Glad I listened to the reviews. Ordered a size up and it was still a little snug, but worked. Loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: Compliments on the dress at every turn
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress as a bridesmaid in my brother's wedding. Fit like a glove! A bit hard to walk and dance in but I had compliments all night long about how beautiful the dress was. Gorgeous color! I would definitely wear it again if I could!

links_reviews_title: Very slimming dress, holds everything in and streamlines the body!
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear this dress but only because another dress I rented was even better. It fit beautifully though and seemed to suck my belly in flat without Spanx and streamlined my body really nicely. I'm usually between a 4 and a 6 and the 6 was snug, so if you're on the fence about sizing I would say go up. The colour is really pretty and the overall look is elegant, I will definitely rent it for my next occasion.

This mint color is light and beautiful! Dress fits tightly but the cutouts and neckline are extremely flattering. The darts on the chest can create a pointed look. I was unable to wear undergarments because it was so tight- but the material is thick and the dress was extremely comfortable. It runs long, but did not drag with a tall wedge.

links_reviews_title: Great dress. runs very small. I sized two sizes up. One is prob best.
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Hugs in all the right places. Perfect color. Was the MOH in my sisters wedding and the dress was perfect.

I LOVED this dress. I felt elegant, beautiful, and comfortable! In 3 inch heels it was just off the ground, a perfect length, and it fit everything else perfectly, too. The material, although very high quality, has minimal stretch so I would definitely recommend ordering a size up. Loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, is a bit snug on your waist!
links_reviews_text: I'm normally a 4L with Rent the Runway, but I checked out the reviews before hand and sized up. I'm glad I did because the 6L fit great! The length was perfect. I'm 5'10 and wore flats, and it was plenty long enough. The only cons were that it's kind of difficult to walk around in since it is so narrow and there is no slit in the dress. I kept having to pick it up to walk. Also, this dress looks much better with Spanx, no matter how thin you are. However, where the cut outs are is right above the top of the Spanx. So it creates more of a muffin too than you actually have. I went without them due to that reason. Altogether, it's a gorgeous dress with a lovely color. I got compliments all night!

This dress is pretty but it was a little bit big on me and it was more casual than what I really wanted. I still wore it my bridesmaids luncheon but if you are going to something dressier I would pass on this dress. Still a cute dress!

links_reviews_title: Really cute dress. Little short for tall people but still enjoyed it !
links_reviews_text: Can't wear a bra with it but material is thick enough to go without!
I loved the way the dress gave my boy shape some curves! Tries to size with forgiving fabric. My only complaint is I didn't have a tan!

I wore this for Easter and got so many compliments. The fabric is stretchy and comfy. It was a very flattering fit and the perfect length. The only thing is that in some photos it looks like I have some armpit chub. But nothing noticeable.

links_reviews_title: So comfy, perfect fit and very flattering! Will rent again!

links_reviews_text: Great dress. It was a good length and the material is nice and thick, which makes it very flattering. Fits true to size or maybe slightly slightly large. Good for larger busts. The straps were a little long, otherwise I might have considered purchasing it. Photos really don't do it justice - because of the way the lighter section angles down, it looks much less flattering in photos. Much cuter in person

Fitted through the waist with a fun flare. Thick material but some stretch so very forgiving. Love the short length which was great for my 5'3" frame. A great selection for dinner out on my Caribbean vacation!
I wore this dress on vacation to a tropical location. I felt very comfortable and breezy in this dress.

Wasn't my favorite rental. I rented this for a Greek fundraiser during the heat of August in California. The material was kind of thick and warm. Overall the dress wasn't super forgiving; it was stretchy and hugged every bulge.

This was a backup for a friend's bridal shower. I didn't end up wearing but I did love it when I put it on (wish I could buy it)! Very comfortable, nice amount of stretch. The dress has a super flattering shape. Easy to wear with a strapless bra. Would be a great dress for summer events!
Loved this dress! So cute and form fitting. A little short so tall girls watch out! I wore this for my 30th birthday
Very cute summer dress. Runs a tiny bit small and short. Overall very happy with it.
Great fit, especially for my athletic shoulders and wider upper body. The dress shaped nicely and the dress was very comfortable for the Napa sun. I received so many compliments!
This dress fits well. Fabric is thicker but not too hot for warm weather.
This dress is true to size, and is great for a spring/summer party. Wore it to a baby shower.

links_reviews_title: It was a great dress for a summer night.
links_reviews_text: Great dress but it was big so not flattering on me. I'm usually an 8-10, a medium would have been perfect.

links_reviews_title: High quality and comfortable daytime dress.
links_reviews_text: Loved it!
It was so light and flattering. I would def rent again.

I wore this dress to a horse race and it was the perfect attire!! I'm usually a size 8-10 so I went with the Large - the straps were a little bit loose but I'm glad it wasn't super tight around my stomach. Super comfy and thick material. Loved it

links_reviews_title: Cute for work and after work!
links_reviews_text: Great fit and easy to pair with a jacket for work.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fun dress for a spring or summer function!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for graduation! I cannot stress enough how comfortable it was!!! The fabric is awesome and it is nice and lightweight. Loved the color/pattern and got lots of compliments!
This was a great dress!! So flattering and the material was not heavy.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty dress! Wore this in the Caribbean on vacation.
links_reviews_text: The fabric is a thick knit so I would not recommend wearing this dress in a humid environment. The arm holes cuts into my armpits weird so I had a bit of boob fat showing. It didn't bother me that much though so I would wear again.

I wore this to an outdoor rehearsal dinner and it was perfect. I received lots of compliments and yet was comfortable all night, even while caring for our baby. The only thing is, it does have horizontal stripes right at the waist, so it's something to be cognizant of. I'm normally somewhere between a 6 and 8 in dresses and the medium fit great without being too tight through the chest and was relatively loose through the waist and hips. I also wore this to work once while I had it, with a denim jacket, so it was easy to dress up and down.
Very cute and easy to travel with. Comfortable and fun all in one.
Wonderful summer dress. Wore to a surprise party!

This dress was so cute and comfortable! I wore it to a day party that turned into a bowling event, and I never felt uncomfortable. Great for a large chest-- I did not have to size up. It is actually whiter in person, which I loved.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments, wish I owned it. No fidgeting or adjusting, dress fit perfectly.
links_reviews_text: Material is on the thicker side but very stretchy. Both the small and medium fit but with my small chest the medium gapped a bit. Love that it holds its form and flows straight down concealing the belly and allowing some room to move. Able to wear a strapless bra with it. Loved the neck line and that the straps stayed in place.
This dress fits true to size. The small would have fit better but was unavailable. I wore the medium and it looked pretty good. Fantastic for an outdoor summer wedding.

links_reviews_title: Great fit for a big family easter dinner. I would definitely wear it again.
links_reviews_text: I had seen this dress in NOLA the year before but couldn't justify the big price tag without an event. It was just as a I remembered - fun and a great fit.
I wished I owned this dress. It's pretty casual- great for a summer night. This is the only pic I got- but it's very flattering and stretchy. Loved

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress for a rehear dinner down south. Pair it with a pair of tan wedges or pumps.
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress for a summer event ! It was fun and flirty- a feel good dress for sure. I wore a size S. The M was huge on me.

I rented this dress for a visit to DC. I went for a larger size than I normally would get because sometimes I'm conscious of my tummy area. Overall this dress fit well. It was somewhat wrinkly but wasn't that noticeable once I put it on. The fabric was perfect for an August day in DC. I didn't think it was a heavy or too thick of a material. I highly recommend renting this dress.
Fit great! I felt beautiful!

links_reviews_title: The perfect fit and so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size and it was just the perfect dress to walk around the city in!
Comfortable, light weight, cotton like dress. Perfect for the beach wedding in Newport, RI.

I rented this for our wedding shower and could not have been more pleased. Although the material is a little heavier, the dress still felt cool and light. Received many compliments and would definitely recommend the dress and would rent again.
Love the fit, flow, design and was comfortable!
Great fabric, very comfortable, good fit! I really liked this dress!

This dress fit like a glove and was super comfortable! Easily can wear to the office and transition into an evening out with friends. Agree with some of the other reviews that it can create a little bit of "bra bulge" around the armpit area at certain angles.

links_reviews_title: Got tons of compliments- people love lemons!
links_reviews_text: It does run a little small but it's super cute - well fitted and it highlights your curve! Really recommended for a summer party!
Cute but like any other romper difficult to take on and off

Fit perfectly-true to size. Guys it's a lemon romper-you will look cute in it. Open back-be ready to not wear a bra. Paired with some cute sandals and kept is casual. Ps-if you have a little bit of curves, be ready for some to show :)

A little loose with the straps buttoned on the tightest one, and since I couldn't wear it with a bra, I couldn't risk a wardrobe malfunction, so I tied the straps like a halter. Cute, got lots of compliments!
Loved this romper!!!! So comfy and cute!

I wanted this to fit so bad, but it's not good for tall girls! Im 5'8 and there was a solid 2 inches of my bottom showing. I also have a small bust and had to pin about 2 inches of the sleeves so that it would fit. Took a picture in this dress for the purpose of the review, but did not wear it anywhere as it was too revealing

"Your outfit! This whole look! That is it, you win...Over everyone at this festival-you win, honey." "I love your outfit! You look so happy!" "Hey! You with the lemons! I like the look!" -A few of the actual complements I received (though nearly a dozen were submitted). I paired with the lemon earrings from Kenneth Lane on here, it elevated the romper to a complete look- it wasn't too over the top, but if you have reservations you just gotta own it. Though I can see what some others mean about buttoning the straps by one's self, the romper fit true to size on me. The straps attach to the back romper using a button, no clips, and there are three different button holes on the length of the straps to choose from. You can wear the straps criss-crossed or straight down--I checked it out on the website of Fame & Partners, the makers of the romper, and they depicted the straps used in these two ways. I will say that I personally had no troubles buttoning the straps to the romper by myself, but I do have abnormally long arms, so it is likely that you will need assistance with this part. Lastly for the fit, I have a long torso, I can count on one hand the amount of rompers that fit my proportions, and this romper fit like a dream due to the adjustible strap length! Also, this baby has pockets!!! I was able to dance (and dance hard) carrying my own things without having to get cought up in a purse, what a relief! As a nice young man once said to me, this outfit "wins" *snaps fingers with sass*

I'm 5'7 and sometimes rompers can be too short in the torso, but this fit great, size 10 fit me a tad looser than I'd like in the waist and the straps in the back were about two inches too long. I tried crossing the straps which helped but then made it impossible to use the rr. I got compliments all night but one person actually knew it was from RTR. I really liked this romper overall and would consider renting again for the right event.
I got so many compliments on this romper. It fit true to size. The straps unbutton in the back so I wound up wearing it like a halter which was more flattering.

I felt so fly in this romper!! Sized up based on others reviews and was glad I did. I loved it so much that I'm going to buy it. Definitely a fun & versatile piece that you can dress up or down. Don't need a bra. Has pockets. What more would a girl want?!

Loved, loved this romper!! I don't normally wear rompers and was pleasantly surprised with the fit!! It runs small so size up! It's also definitely a super mini so if you aren't into short outfits, don't pick this one. I wore it without a bra and didn't feel too exposed. I got lots of compliments and totally got the eyes from my husband!!

links_reviews_title: Trendy print and love the back!
links_reviews_text: Definitely runs small, but I squeezed in! Size up for your backup. Adorable print!!

links_reviews_title: Fun summer print w/ quality fabric but short & a bit hard to put on
links_reviews_text: Rented for summer casual bday dinner w/ family. Pretty colors. Waist zips & is very fitted. Had red marks when took off. Sizing up would have been nice for length & waist. Has pockets and shorts part is fuller like a skirt, pretty. Non-stretchy boy shorts under help you not flash others. Straps cross in back 3 button holes to adjust length but hard to put on by yourself. Also one button very loose on mine. Wore a Nubra. My daughter loved the lemons!!!
True to size, and fantastic pockets, just wish it was about 2" longer inseam. The romper made it wearable. But it was micro short. I paired with booties but would've loved to rock with heels.
Loved that I didn't have to wear a bra...I'm a 30F. Comfy.

One of my favorite rentals! I actually accidentally wore this as a halter top, but it worked. Neither my boyfriend or I noticed that it wasn't actually suppose to be that way haha. (In the picture I put it on right). The bottom part was fitted, but it was SO comfortable and VERY flattering to the stomach and back area. It is short, but because I am short I prefer things that way. It wasn't an issue for me. I'm in love and I don't want to return it!

Adorable jumpsuit. Be aware that it's SUPER short - not much left to the imagination in the back. :) It's also completely impossible to fasten the straps by yourself, so don't even think about wearing it long enough to need a bathroom break (unless you have a girlfriend to help with the straps). Anyway, it's not for the faint of heart, but it was fun.

I wore this for dinner at a beach vacation and then again for Mother’s Day brunch. It was so cute! I’m short and love rompers and this one was the perfect length. The cute pattern and little ruffles as well as the back are all nice touches. I got lots of compliments! Caveat emptor, the fabric is very unforgiving (i.e. no stretch at all) so keep that in mind if you’re going to be eating a lot!

Obsessing over the lemon print in this romper by Fame & Partners! It runs very small with no stretch!! So definitely make sure you order a size up from your usual. It runs very short and is very tight and fitted throughout the whole thing. the shorts lining is very tight too. It works for any cup size but you have to wear no bra or a NuBra because of the super cute open back. At 5'3 the length hit very mini length on me, so tall girls be careful. This looks so cute with a simple low heel, the romper does all the talking!
Made my legs look great but I didn't feel too revealed. Felt secure without a bra, X crossed back straps. Need assistance getting on and off.

There are buttons in the back to allow easy strap adjustment...the quality is superb...very feminine...didnt make me hot...doesnt give great coverage for the bum if you have any kind of curve or shape...but thats a bonus depending on how comfortable you are with showing some SKIN...this is a must rent for the summer.

I absolutely loved this outfit once I finally got the back buttons together. The length was a little short for someone who is 5'9 - still 0 and 100 with rompers but I gave it a try! Only complaint - it's incredibly hard to get the buttons done by yourself. there are three holes you can choose from but man oh man don't wear if you intend to drink and need to use the bathroom a lot!
Love this but it didn't for definitely runs small. I'm gonna run in bigger size again because I loved this fabric and Style so much hope it works.

links_reviews_title: Cute print, didn't fit my frame
links_reviews_text: As others have said, this romper is short. I'm only 5'3" and it was still pretty close to showing the bottom half of my cheek -- not sure how taller girls even wear this romper! I loved the print and wanted to wear it, but the biggest thing for me was the straps. It has 3 lengths you can adjust to with a button, but even on the shortest length, one shoulder kept sliding off. I knew it would bother me all day if I wore it, so I ended up not wearing the romper at all.
Couldn't wear in a 4 runs small.

Although I did not run into the problems that some of the other renters did with this romper, I can see how it could happen. The zipper is situated in the back center of the item and comes just high enough where if you are not too flexible it would be hard to zip all the way up. I didn't have any problems with the height of the straps, it fit perfectly and stayed situated all day. Even though the romper is fitted, I had enough room to comfortably move around and didn't feel it riding up when I sat down. Overall perfect item, just what I was looking for!

I wore this while on vacation in Colombia and although people liked it, my fiance did not, because my butt was hanging out! This is not ideal for curvy/tall girls unless you are okay with some of your butt cheeks showing.
Fits small so size up. Looks super cute on.
Great fit, high quality, fabric over stomach and shorts is loose enough to be forgiving, waist is tight so is slimming.

I wore this as a bathing suit coverup while on vacation in the Bahamas. I usually wear a size 10, but as other reviews warned that this item runs small, I ordered 2 sizes above my normal size. Also, I swapped the straps to criss cross in the back!

links_reviews_title: Was too tall for the outfit
links_reviews_text: Im 5'6, and I sized up but it still didntfit quite like I wanted it too. Very beautiful outfit, great quality material.
Pros: Cute pattern & waistline is very slimming. Cons: Runs small and is very short!

Too small, zero stretch. Size up one or two sizes. I normally wear size 2-4. I ordered a 4 and it's still too small so I couldn't zip it. Reordered in a 6 because it's super cute. Nice quality fabric.

I'm between a 2 and a 4 and I could barely zip the 4 and my butt was legit falling out of the back (and I don't have a large backside). I loved this romper SO much, though and am excited to get it in the 6!

links_reviews_title: Did not wear it because the shorts were too short.
links_reviews_text: This is VERY short. If I had worn it, the bottom of my cheeks would have been visible. Otherwise, it is adorable.

links_reviews_title: Vacation with friends is always fun!
links_reviews_text: It was very short in the back, I didn't end up even bring this one on my trip.
Loved it. Adorable print, fit great.....BUT was so short, my butt cheeks were visible. Not ok, for a businesswoman....or a mother.

The pattern is so fun--perfect for summer, yet not too loud. A nice way to ease me out of wearing black all the time. I am usually a 0, but sized up to a 2. Glad I did because the brand runs small--it fit perfectly (fitted in the waist, the right length for my height).
Great fit runs small
Beware this romper is extremely short. If you are curvy, this is not for you
Loves this jumper! Thought it was big over all but worked well for the wedding I attended. Next time would order a small.
This is one of those outfits that you zip up and just go! Have fun, look great and feel great several hours later. True to size. I'm 5"4" with 3" heels

Wore to a formal fundraiser event. Comfortable fit for the whole night. Fabric wasn't stretchy but the thickness held everything in and smoothed things out a bit. In a room full of dresses this turned out to be a simple, unique piece that stood out! Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: It was made for my body! My favorite rental so far!
links_reviews_text: The wire/boning is poking through on the top left side in the bust, so that was annoying all evening. And I could only requests pockets because that's always my go to feature for buying a dress/jumpsuit. Everything else was absolute perfection!

Loved everything about this! The ruffle along one side of the jumpsuit totally made the outfit. Great color, great fit. I was worried I might be pulling it up all night but there was no need. Wore this for my husband's holiday partner at his new firm and made the statement I wanted. Only complaint is that the boning has poked through a tiny bit on the right side, it was not visible, I just noticed when it poked my finger a little.

links_reviews_title: Night at Cirque de Soliel in Vegas!
links_reviews_text: Stunning, perfect fitting and yet a little stretchy with all that ruffle flair down the side! I will probably buy this romper… Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Classic silhouette with a bit of sass
links_reviews_text: Such a perfect color - who doesn't love burgundy! Perfect substitute for a dress when you want something a bit unique. Heads up that it is very long - I'm 5'5" and wore 3.5" heels and it was just barely dragging on the ground.

LOVED this jumpsuit and got so many compliments! Im 5"6' 135lbs and 32DDD and it fit like a glove. Its super long and had to wear very high heels so it fit properly. Also, be prepared to bring friends to the bathroom with you bc its impossible to zipper/fasten by yourself
Love this jumpsuit, lots if compliments! It fit snugly, I wasnt fussing with it falling down all night.

This jumpsuit was so fun to wear. Hubby couldn't stop staring lol. Other reviews are right, the top runs a bit big. I wore it out to dinner and there was no problem. Probably wouldn't have worked for a night out dancing. Loved the ruffle and the beautiful color!

links_reviews_title: INCREDIBLY FLATTERING, in all the right places!
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit was actually my back up x4! I had a crazy order this go around as everything I originally ordered only had 1 size. However, RTR was incredibly helpful and had the most amazing customer service, that they sent me 8 different options. I LOVED this jumpsuit!!! The fabric is amazing and hugs you in all the right places, and very comfortable. I did not need to wear a bra with it since the material is pretty thick. It is a little long, but I wore 3.5inch heels and they worked perfect, I also paired it with a black fur jacket. I am not one to wear formal outfits more than once, but if I did I would choose this jumpsuit for sure!

links_reviews_title: Amazing fit. Amazing color. That is all.
links_reviews_text: The fit is almost like a body con dress with snug material, however it accentuates your curves without making you uncomfortable.

This was my first time using RTR and I was not disappointed. I rented this for my Chapter 40 Birthday Celebration and loved loved loved it!! I received so many compliments and it fit like a glove. Great-experience!!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for Night Out in Vegas!
links_reviews_text: This was the perfect Vegas party outfit -- stylish and sexy, yet comfortable and easy to move in. I'm a size 6 (occasionally a size 8) and the medium fit perfectly. The length of the MR was also PERFECT for me in my 4-inch heels (I'm between 5'5" and 5'6" in height). I felt so fabulous and chic wearing this out for fun night in Vegas. My husband loved it too.

No complaints. This jumpsuit has a great fit; is true to size; and very easy to wear. Very unique and the ruffles on the side gives it a cute flare. Received lots of compliments on this piece. Wore without bra and had no issues.

I wore this jumpsuit to a sports hall of fame dinner and it was the bombbbb!!! So obsessed with it!! So comfy, fun and the color is gorgeous. Everyone loved it! It does have some stretch to it and I did get a little hot wearing it, it's fully lined. Overall, it's perfect!

links_reviews_title: They are always on time with shipping and the items are always perfect out of the bag
links_reviews_text: Perfect! True to size! #NEFoundationGala

links_reviews_title: Alexis Jumpsuit Was a Hit for NYE!
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is stunning! I wore it for New Year's Eve in NYC and it was perfect. I've had such great luck with renting other Alexis pieces, so I was thrilled when this worked out as well! This might be one of my favorite pieces that I've rented in fact. It's the most gorgeous burgundy color and fits like a glove (and I'm a bit curvier on the legs.) SUPER flattering.

This fun and festive jumpsuit is the perfect for some attending a formal party but still wants to keep it fun and not wear a dress necessarily. There isn't much stretch to it but it's still very comfortable if you stick with your normal size. The size tried on here is a size medium regular and I normally wear a size 6R. It was perfect! Even the length was great! I am 5'8" and had on 4 inch heels and it was much longer than I expected it to be.

This jumpsuit is perfect! I will definitely be renting again. I love the color! It fit me absolutely perfect. I do have a large bust, though. I'm a 32G bra... for others it might be something to keep in mind. It was comfortable and I got so many complements. One of my favorites outfits I've ever worn.

Loved everything about this jumper! The color, the fit, the last minute fit after another dress didn't fit! It was perfect! Really comfy and awesome for a Christmas party alternative to a dress. Next time I would wear some Hollywood tape at the bust to keep from pulling up as the top runs a bit large. Super flattering and will get you endless compliments. Really fun to sashé around!

links_reviews_title: I'm so sad that I can't wear this! The bottom part fits great, but the top is too tight in the back
links_reviews_text: I love this jumpsuit, but the boning is kind of torqued and it's too tight in the back bodice. The pants part fit so nice though! I think this would be better on a small busted woman. I'm a full 34C, so the top wasn't comfortable in the bust area and at the very top in back. Also, it's very long! I'm only 5'3" tall, so a petite would have been better, but it wasn't available.

links_reviews_title: Cute outfit that was too short on me, so I opted for an old dress of mine.
links_reviews_text: Seems like it'd be comfortable and chic. For me, it was too short overall, particularly the inseam.
The fit was fine with one major exception. It was just too long and was dragging on the floor for me.

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear it to my event.
links_reviews_text: I have a very long torso, and this didn't quite fit. The color was beautiful, and liked it otherwise.

This is a great little jumpsuit - easy to wear and the fit is true to size. Based on the fit I think it's more suited to less curvy bodies - it's slim through the hips and legs. The line of the jumpsuit accentuates that and makes you look long and tall. Having said a ll that I ended up wearing a more dramatic cream jumpsuit to the event. This one is pretty but more casual and simple.

links_reviews_title: It was a bit long but it was pretty
links_reviews_text: I received lots of compliments

I wanted to love this romper, however, upon trying it on the top just fell right off me. The bottom is more of a tight fit material and for very nicely. The top had a sort of wire frame to it and since I'm average and not on the bustier side, the top just fell right down. For smaller chested girls I recommend a smaller size or a super padded strapless bra

links_reviews_title: So cute, but roomy up top.
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is wildly flattering, but if you have smaller boobs you'll be tugging it up all night.

links_reviews_title: Top too loose, had to keep pulling up
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fabric, color, and cut, but too loose at top for my frame, needing to pull up every 20 minutes. Would try a size down, but fear that the torso would be too short.
Gorgeous piece in a flattering color. Love love love
The jumper was excellent color! It was so gorgeous but it was really long, I'm 5'4" and couldn't wear it because it was too long . I should have got the Xs short.

Tried this on and I had a major case of camel toe! This jumpsuit is made for 5'5" and shorter. I could not get it to work - I was either flashing my boobs or riding the camel. Skip this one if you're taller - trust me!

links_reviews_title: I received many compliments on style-even from strangers on the street!
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit was long, I had to wear my highest heels. I did find the top too lose, but I made it work. The plum color is beautiful and the detail on the side was a perfect touch to make this a little different. The quality was very high end and it was a very flattering style. I often have issues with jumpsuits cause I have a longer torso, but this worked out great.
The jumpsuit is too long for me. The decorations makes you fattter
I liked this jumpsuit but the top just didn't stay up, so I couldn't wear it. I'd say size down!

links_reviews_title: I wore it to a formal event
links_reviews_text: The jumpsuit was beautiful and fit perfectly. I am 5'4" and 130lbs waist size 25. The only complaint I have is that it was very long. I wore the Small Regular and had to wear 4" heels with it and it was still on the floor

A really fun item. The SR could have had a bit more length for me, I am tall and pretty thin, but the ruffles looked good and the cut is flattering. I changed into this for the party dancing after the wedding.
Its a no for me, dawg. Replacement for damaged item. Great color, too big in bust and so long on me that hem tape couldnt even save me. Bummer.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and well Made, perfect fit, beautiful lace
links_reviews_text: Pictures don't do it justice. Beautiful heavy black lace., quality material. Didn't ride up when I sat down. Very easy to go to the washroom.

I'm 5'0 and this hit me at the ankles so wasn't too long at all. It felt flattering and cute but just low cut enough to not be too much. It doesn't have much stretch at all, and was a little big on the top. I'm 34B and it was loose but not loose enough I couldn't wear it.
This outfit was super flattering and comfortable. It was a bit big in the chest, but overall a great look.

I love the cut and texture of this jumpsuit. It is lined which makes it a bit warm for warmer weather. I am smaller on top than bottom and felt that my normal size (6) felt a bit loose on top but fit well / snug in the waist and hips. I had a friend pin the back so that it felt more secure. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: I got tons of compliments on my jumpsuit !
links_reviews_text: The jumpsuit was great however the top part is pretty much wide open so make sure you wear a bra that you don't mind showing. I wish it was a little bit tighter in the chest that way my boobs weren't hanging out but I did get a lot of compliments on that so that was OK too. In picture it really is so great!
Rented this for a dinner party and felt like Blake Lively rolling in. I'm still getting compliments about that night.

The overall look and feel of this jumpsuit is five stars. The lace was so pretty and I had no issues being outside in hot weather. The only problem with this jumpsuit is the sleeves. I had to pin them a good inch in order to wear this without the sleeves going down. If you're cool pinning the sleeves then this is worth it. Plus it's bra friendly!

I wore this for a black tie affair and loved how comfortable I felt all night. The lace around the neck would not stay so it ended rolling up and not looking as cute as pictured in the model photo. I wore a 4 but probably could've done a size 2 to provide more support since I did not wear a bra with this jumpsuit.

If you are an athletic build (petite waist and chest but muscular thighs) consider going to the size larger for your alternative size but keep in mind the chest portion may not fit. I used clothing tape to make the top work without it blouson out and showing my bra etc. otherwise this was beautiful and I recurved a lot of compliments.

Very comfortable outfit! Just a bunch of compliments. The sleeves? were a little on the loose side. The back was easy to zip on my own (bonus!) but the v shape on the back was a little loose. Overall, really enjoyed this look
Fit was perfect. The jumpsuit is so soft and comfortable. The lace detail is beautiful and classy. I received so many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Fabulous outfit for a fun night!
links_reviews_text: Wore this jumpsuit to a work party. It was fantastic! A bit loose in the top, but otherwise great!

My first RTR was a totally success. I fell in love with this jumpsuit on the app but was very hesitant ordering it, as jumpsuits usually don't fit me right or look good on me. I have a long torso and pretty flat booty, so jumpsuits either give me a constant wedgie or are just super unflattering. However, this jumpsuit fit like it was made for me!!! It was so comfortable and gorgeous on. I felt so sexy and fierce wearing it! I wanted a fun new outfit to wear for Valentine's Day to surprise my fiancé. He loved it and kept saying how perfect it looked on me.

I'm usually a six but because I am smaller at the top I wore the four. It's not super stretchy but does have a tad more give than I thought it would. Loved this outfit as it was classy and sexy all at once!
Wore this for a bachelorette party. Very cute and comfortable and easy to get in and out of.

Love the lace!! & the low cut in front is super nice but it's big!! Baggy too especially by crotch area. Using it for my field work in elementary school so works well that it isn't tight. Paired it with a blazer to dull down the lace and v cut. Really cute! Would get again if it fit me better

I am on the taller side, so I was a little nervous the length might be too short in the legs and/or torso but I was pleasantly surprised. I agree with other reviews that the top is a little on the looser side but it was not loose enough to cause any bother for me. Overall, I loved this outfit - made me feel great!

links_reviews_title: So chic!! Can't get enough of this jumpsuit.
links_reviews_text: Loved sporting this for my husband's work holiday dinner. The "straps" did run a bit long, but instead of pinning them I wore a backless bra and just let the back fall below where a bra would have been. I'm rather petite and the 0R worked great around my hips and even for the length. Loved how I felt in this gem!
I need more torso for this romper :-( the straps were too long and the crotch bunched bc it was too long in the torso. The lace also didn't sit nicely. I wanted to love it but just not for me
I took and risk and had fun! This surprisingly working for my curvy and athletic bottom half. I wore with a black cami underneath and it was perfect for work with a blazer before an evening out.

I ordered this in a 2 and a 4 for a wedding. The 2 was perfect on top and tight on the bottom, and the 4 was overall too large for my petite frame. But it was a beautiful jumpsuit and I highly recommend it!

First time wearing a jumpsuit this one was great and fit well! The straps were a little big as i expected from reading other reviews, i just pinned them. Received lots of compliments at my formal work holiday party.

links_reviews_title: Fabulous Jumpsuit - Fit Like a Glove
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is fabulous! I loved the fit! While the legs are quite tight it worked for me because I have small calves. I am 5'2" and the 2R hit right at my ankle. The top worked great as well for my 36C top. I will say it needed a quick steam to have the lace lay right on the top but I skipped it as I was in a rush. I wore this to a women's networking party and it was such a hit! Easy to go more business casual or glam with this jumpsuit. I wanted to keep it.
Super soft lining with some stretch, well cut and flattering

This was a replacement to the original jumpsuit I ordered. When my original choice wouldn't come through on time, RTR sent me this one. It was perfect fit in the body, but baggy and kept falling off my shoulders up top. Overall it was very boring. I love RTR but this is definitely not a hit.

links_reviews_title: I got many many compliments on the jumpsuit.
links_reviews_text: It was very comfortable! It fit very well and did not have any quirks. It fit true to size.
Super flattering. Loved this look!

Loved this jumpsuit. I'm on the taller side (5'8") so I worry about camel toe in a jumpsuit, but this one fit perfectly. It was really well made and so comfortable to wear. I'm usually between a 2 and a 4, and the 4 fit perfectly so I'd say the dress runs a little small. I paired it with a gold belt and nude shoes and got plenty of compliments at a day wedding.

Rented this for a college reunion party. Was afraid about renting a jumpsuit because of my height- I usually avoid them because of the long torso/camel toe issue. However, I was pleasantly surprised at how well this fit. Agree with others that it ran big on the top/straps, but I didn't have any issues with slipping straps and I am a pretty small-busted person. Went with the larger size (6) since it looked just as form-fitting as the 4, and so I went with comfort. Could have dressed it up with more accessories, but also does well on its own because of the lace detail.
Wore for a bachelorette night on the town. Felt like a fox! Super pretty lace. Good fit. Slimming.
I rented this jumpsuit for a wedding and it fit perfect and I felt beautiful in it. I just had my second child so to see how great I looked in this was just amazing!! Love love love

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Great outfit- true to size- the top is a little large so tape may be needed to keep the straps from falling- I am 34D I recommend a belt or ribbon sash Lots of compliments on this!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and a little twist on lbd
links_reviews_text: Really cute and easy to wear--only fit issue is the straps are long which the consequences for me was feeling like I had some side boob exposure. But beautiful and fun jumpsuit

links_reviews_title: Fun to wear to a work event
links_reviews_text: A little tight around the hips but great fit other than that

links_reviews_title: First jumpsuit ever was a success!
links_reviews_text: This was my very first attempt at a jumpsuit ever. I thought they wouldn't be for me since I'm short and curvy, but this proved me wrong! I'm usually a 4 but wore the 6 for a little extra room in the rise. As others have noted, the straps were WAY too long, but a few safety pins did the trick. It was easy to get on and off by myself, and was just the right length, although again, I'm only 5'1. Was comfortable sitting in it for 2+ hours at a Broadway show. Would definitely rent again!

I'm pretty tall for jump suits and rompers, usually they are not long enough for my torso -> camel toe. I always Size up to hopefully avoid this delima. I absolutely loved this Jumpsuit - so much so that I bought it! Paired with a patent leather belt and patent leather Loubs it was just perfect for the work function I was attending. I will say the v in the front was lower than I expected so keep that in mind! Lots of cleavage.
Deep v but found it flattering. True to size.

I rented this romper as a backup and actually wore it for my son's graduation because I loved it so so much! I actually want to buy it.. Though it ran a bit big, I rented an 8 and should have rented a 6, I couldn't let it sit there and miss an event. Great material, simple yet classy.. I LOVED this romper!

links_reviews_title: What a stunning jumpsuit, highly recommend!
links_reviews_text: I never really wear jumpsuits but after this I may have to! Loved it! Only downside was the lower crotch. If I purchased this I'd adjust the shoulders to bring it up higher. Other than that, highly recommend!

I wore this for a word dinner - I 'm usually a size 6, but probably could have gotten away with a 4 as the sleeves were a little loose. I received a lot of compliments on the outfit and would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Had so many compliments on my dress. Everyone thought it was beautiful.
links_reviews_text: Everyone thought it was beautiful. Very comfortable, no problems with wrinkling. The material felt very silky and lightweight. Danced the night away and felt glamorous Thank you for an unforgettable moment

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, but didn't work for me
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress! But if you're taller than 5'4 it may be too short. I wish it could have worked, the style was absolutely gorgeous!

I wore this stunning dress for my daughter's baptism. The color and detail make it obvious it was a great quality dress. I had to go with the bigger size because of my chest. There was a part of the lace coming undone under the arm, so it wasn't glaring. It does wrinkle, but that didn't bother me. I received so many compliments and felt beautiful in this dress.
If you have a large chest I would go a size bigger and also had to wear shapewear since it is light in color and very unforgiving

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. Very elegant and felt like butter
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable but a little hard to lift arms up

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Perfect for a wedding
links_reviews_text: The dress was great, I got a ton of compliments on it. You can see underwear lines clearly so be prepared for that. Also the material wrinkled after sitting for a long time, but it was ok for pictures at the beginning of the night. I had to size 1-1.5 sizes up but it worked perfectly and I loved it. Great for a wedding - you can dress up or dress down with earrings.

I originally rented this dress for a friend's wedding, but the lace fabric around the shoulders had no stretch to it and was a bit tight for dancing, so I opted to wear it to a less active event. The dress fit well and looked great in photos. The only issue with the dress was that the fabric creased and wrinkled really easily around the lap area after sitting. Otherwise, I loved it and would totally rent it again!

This dress was beyond perfect for my bridal shower! I got so many compliments on it. The dress came in a garment bag and arrived exactly when it was supposed to. The dress was clean and wrinkle free. It does run a bit small. I ordered one size bigger than I normally wear and it fit perfectly. The return process was also super easy and quick, just put the return label in the front of the bag and drop it off at UPS. I will always consider using RTR for any event in the future!
This dress was perfect for a ritzy wedding! It was on the smaller side, but I was still able to wear it without any issue. Loved the colors!
Rented this for rehearsal dinner. I weigh 125 and am 5’6, went with the 4 since it was less snug. Fit great and received compliments all night. Would definitely recommend.

Like all the other reviewers said, this dress wrinkles very easily instanteously and made me look sloppy :( but I loved the beautiful detail, and it's otherwise a gorgeous dress. Also, the dress fits rather tightly - I have a booty and almost couldn't fit the dress over it! The arms are also snug, I had a hard time raising my arms while dancing.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty dress, fit extremely well, no issues.
links_reviews_text: I rented this last minute and it was one of the only options available so I gave it a go. A little more conservative than I usually select but very pretty dress, worked great all evening!
I had to decide between two RTR dresses and although this dress is absolutely beautiful I didn't select it. It runs small I had to size up.

links_reviews_title: Rented dress for my rehearsal for my wedding!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments. I would definitely wear this dress again
links_reviews_text: Pros: felt conservative & sexy at the same time. Nice length Cons: wrinkles easily. I sprayed the dress with wrinkle release which helped. Arm range of motion is slightly restricted.

links_reviews_title: Great fabric. Very beautiful, elegant dress!
links_reviews_text: I felt like a princess at my bridal shower in this gorgeous dress!

I loved wearing this dress for my Master's graduation, and I felt stunning in it. I got so many compliments and it really made my occasion just a bit more special having such a nice dress. I paired the dress with some Kendra Scott earrings which looked great. Some reviewers said it wrinkled really badly, but I was in NC heat in May and I didn't think it was too bad. I would wear this dress again and again if I could. Highly recommend!!!!!

links_reviews_title: This dress was amazing with beautiful intricate details!
links_reviews_text: Overall, amazing dress! This dress is definitely more of a tight fit, but I chose to go with my normal size to avoid wrinkles (the tightness didn't allow for wrinkles, which I know other customers had complaints about). I received so many compliments through out night and would definitely rent this dress again. I have sensitive skin but the lace detailing at the top did not bother me!
Great fit, beautiful details. Wore this for a formal wedding and felt like a princess!

links_reviews_title: I love the beautiful lace top!
links_reviews_text: The waist fit a bit on the large size.

I wore this for a bridal shower I was in. I received SO many compliments. Funny thing is this wasn't the dress I originally ordered and I was a little upset, it ended up being better than I anticipated. I'm pretty tall and the length was awesome for me. Very feminine and unique. I wish I could keep it. So so happy. Lighting isn't the best in my pic, but I ended up wearing rose gold with it and it worked perfectly. Totally would recommend this.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for formal spring wedding
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress! Loved the lace detail and the fit is great. I got tons of compliments on it all night. Only downsides are that it's a little restricting in the shoulder area and wrinkles if you sit for more than an hour. I'm 5'1" and it hit just below the knee (I used double sided tape to bring the hem up a bit)

Dress is gorgeous on a hanger and looks great on some of the girls in the other reviews. But it did nothing for my figure. I definitely didn't wear it. It was entirely too small in the chest- and the mid section has way too much material. I was only trying the dress on in the photo and you can see that it must wrinkle really easy too.
But definitely WRINKLES five seconds after you have put it on. I walked out of the house feeling so pretty, but once we got to our destination and got out of the car I panicked- so wrinkled!
Received compliments on this dress all night! Perfect for a spring or summer wedding.

This was my favorite of all the dresses I've rented! The dress is tight at the top but it is stunning. I got so many compliments the night of and days after. The dress was perfect for the gala we attended and I would wear it again if I could!
Loved this dress! Got some many complimets on it. The detail is just amazing. Made me feel amazing even though it was my first time dressing up postpartum.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a warm September evening wedding in Santa Barbara. It is a beautiful light pink
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly! I am 5'4, 117 lbs and the size 4 was a perfect fit. It is very soft and comfortable dress. I was able to have dinner and dance in the dress without feeling confined. At the end of the night the dress was not even wrinkled!

Absolutely IN LOVE with this dress. I rented this dress as a Maid of Honor dress and I could not have asked for anything better. It looked amazing with the two other dresses that the bridesmaids wore, and and was perfect for a summer vineyard wedding. Once again RTR delivered!!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress last weekend for a sorority reunion/anniversary at an afternoon tea. Perfect!
links_reviews_text: I loved this pink dress! It had more stretch than I thought based on other reviews and it was not too wrinkled either. It was a bit tight in the bust (38 DDD) so I just went without a strapless bra (which I end up doing frequently because the boning gets uncomfy). The dress was perfect for the occasion and I wish I could purchase it. This dress is so 'me', no one assumed it was rented.
Comfortable, but wrinkles when you sit. Lightweight for dancing but top was too warm for summer wedding. No bra, too tight. Fit like a shift dress.

I received this dress as a backup when my first choice became unavailable. RTR did do a good job with this replacement as the other dress was a lacy sheath. I did ultimately love this dress, but there are two things to be aware of. The chest area is tight, so if you have a larger chest, so may have to size up. Because of that, you don't quite have full range of motion in your arms. Also, be prepared to have wrinkles at the end of the night if you're sitting a lot due to the silk. Even with these two caveats, I would still recommend.

links_reviews_title: Adored every bit of this dress
links_reviews_text: I wore this to my engagement party, and it was perfect! The lace is absolutely beautiful in person, and the material is so pretty. I wish I had gotten a better photo of the dress itself. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Fit was great. Got a lot of compliments at the wedding & via social media
links_reviews_text: This actually wasn't the dress I originally wanted for the wedding I was attending. About a week before the wedding I got an email saying I'll be receiving this dress. After reading some of the reviews, I was pretty hesitant and scared it wouldn't look nice. The comments said it wrinkled easily, the lace part was itchy, and it didn't supposedly compliment short people. Also I was afraid it would be too hot for a wedding in Bakersfield, CA, but I was wrong. It was perfect for the weather and event. I have to say most of those comments were the total opposite of what I experienced! The only thing that I would have to admit was the lace part was a little itchy at first (I think the comments got to my head), but as the night went on, I didn't even notice it anymore. To keep the wrinkles at bay, I actually used a steamer to take out the wrinkles the night before and about 30 mins before I put it on. It worked perfectly! And I honestly didn't wanna wear heels to the wedding since it was outside, but I did for the ceremony then wore my Nike Rose Gold Cortez for the dancing portion (since it matched) and it was PERFECT. The length didn't other me at all. It was about 2-3 inches past my knee and fit great! Overall, I was very happy and pleased with this dress despite all the negative comments about it :)
Super cute! Very stunning on, but the silver/gold color stitching was hard to match with shoes and jewelry. Still liked it though! Got lots of compliments

This dress was perfect for a day wedding. I got lots of compliments on it. They didn't have a size 2 so I ordered both a 0 and a 4 and both fit well, I just ended up wearing the 4 because it gave me a little more wiggle room. You will need nude underwear and like the other reviews say, it does wrinkle really easily but it doesn't detract too much from the dress.

It was gorgeous! I received compliments on it throughout the night. I'm also 5'9" and the length was great for me. However DEFINITELY tight at the top. Hard to move and dance. The size up was way too large in the stomach / hip area. It also wrinkled very easily. It was already a wrinkly mess before I arrived to the wedding just from sitting in the car for 10 minutes.

links_reviews_title: The perfect look for an old-Hollywood themed wedding.
links_reviews_text: This dress was stunning and I got compliments all night. HOWEVER, it runs very long. The model in the picture must be around 5'10 because on me, the dress went to my shins which made it appear frumpy and matronly, which is not a good look. I was so disappointed I attempted to find another dress at the RTR store in SF, but ultimately stuck with it because it really is beautiful. The picture you see here was after I used hemming tape to lift the hem around 5 inches. While this worked, I was paranoid all night that the tape would unstick, or I'd damage the dress unintentionally. I wouldn't recommend renting this if you're on the short side, it just wasn't worth the stress.

My sister and I both rented these dresses from RTR & they were both unbelievable beautiful. I rented the blush colored dress & loved the thin material it was made of, and the detailing on the neck portion was amazing - so many compliments on the dress. The only down fall was that it can become easily wrinkled when sitting down, but i thought that was a small price to pay for this dress. I would definitely recommend this dress to anyone who was considering it. The dress is timeless and never out of style.

Adorable dress! Super comfortable and soft fabric. Great length too- not too sexy for a wedding but also no mother-of-the-bride vibes! The only negative was that it was super tight in the chest and my chest isn't even all that big (34C). The bigger dress size fit my chest better, but then was awkwardly baggy in the hips making me look 10 pounds heavier. So I went with the smaller size and just squeezed everything in up top.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress...if you can get zipped into it.
links_reviews_text: This dress was everything I expected, until it came time to zip me into it. We had MAJOR zipper anxiety trying to get it closed! I don't know if it was just this particular garment, but it was a bit of a pain. Beautiful once it's on! Snug in the chest area, comfortable everywhere else.

links_reviews_title: Not your average LDB for date night!
links_reviews_text: Some reviewers thought this dress ran small, but my regular size fit just right! It was pretty comfortable for such a fitted dress, even if I couldn't quite take a full breath (the middle band doesn't have much stretch - this also made the zipper stick going up). I was able to wear a racerback bra easily and had no panty line issues. The modest knee length gave balance to the high slit. Enjoyed wearing this fancier than usual LBD for a fancier than usual date night!
Absolutely stunning dress. Fits like a glove. I could have worn either the 2 or 4 but since I am top heavy I decided to go with the size 4. One of my favorite dresses I've rented.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a Christmas party in 2017. I had so much fun in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Pros: Very flattering, photographed well, I received many compliments throughout the night Cons: Taking off this dress at the end of the night was so difficult. I had to use painters tape to extend the zipper head to get enough leverage to take it off. Even with this issue I would probably still rent this dress again. ** I didn't get a good photo of the dress at the party so I just uploaded the photos that I sent to my girlfriends :)
Had difficulty with the zipper, got stuck above the hip but was otherwise amazing. Was able to wear bralette underneath
Side zipper was a struggle to get up
Felt super sexy and fun in this amazing dress!!

links_reviews_title: The dress is comfortable and unique and can be dressed up or down
links_reviews_text: The fit on this is a little odd. The zipper was hard to zip even though nothing was tight and it was a bit loose in places but once it was on it was comfortable and flattering.

Definitely runs small, which I actually appreciate as someone who is rather petite. I normally need a size 0, but the size 2 fit perfectly. The length was right under the knee as expected, and I'm just under 5'4. The dress was comfortable all night, including during dancing. Too thin to go braless - I'd recommend a strapless bra.

Man, this material was unforgiving. Not stretchy at all and fit me too tightly. I should've gone up a size. It was pretty tough to breath after I ate, and I really started busting out of that hole on the side by the end of the meal, but it was worth it because it was so unique and beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Classy and sexy, but too small.
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear this because the band around the waist was too tight and not flattering. I had already sized up (usually wear a 6 and this was an 8) but it still was tight enough at the waist to not be flattering. I plan to rent this again in a 10. The fabric was high quality, but not what I was expecting. I got this as a dress for a party requiring cocktail attire but I think the fabric would lend itself more to a nice date night.

I love this dress. I am a 4 and the 4 fits my pear shape body to perfection. I have rented this dress twice. The second time, the zipper was really difficult to zip up, which made me not buy the dress. I mostly wore it for work and a dinner and paired it with a light pink short sweater jacket. I did not need a bra with this dress.

links_reviews_title: I felt so confident and received a lot of compliments!
links_reviews_text: This was my backup dress which I ended up wearing because it fit better than the other dresses I ordered in a size 4 and 6. It fit really well with the exception of some minor gapping around my armpits. The cutout in the side and back was still tasteful and made it just a bit sexy! The dress hugged my curves exactly where I wanted to and helped hide some places I am insecure about. I would absolutely rent this dress again!
The fit was perfect, there is a lot of room for hips area. The top was big enough for my 36D, very comfortable dress, I had it on all day...classy yet elegant and chic!!
The fit was true to size. I didn't end up wearing the dress because I found one better but it was a close second! Awesome for a formal occasion with a bit of skin.

This dress fit perfectly. I usually wear a 4, and it fit true to size. The band didn't feel super tight like everyone said, but by the end of the night I did feel some pressure from it, like you do when you wear stockings. I was able to wear a normal bra with this dress, which I appreciated. I got a lot of compliments. Perfect for a girls night out!

I wore this to a charity event, it is very slimming and the cut out around the back of the waste is super sexy! Also the length makes it very classy. I got so many compliments! I usually am a size 8, but the 10 fit just perfectly
I wore this for a bachelorette party! Got lits of compliments! Super cute dress! Felt sexy but yet classy bc the length! Would totally reccomend this dress!! The cut out and slit made it extra sexy!

links_reviews_title: The quality of the dress was amazing! Fits true to size.
links_reviews_text: The dress fits true to size! I am usually a 0-2 in dresses! I order a size 2 because of my hips and butt. The only issue was the zipper was a little hard to zip up!

Wow this dress to a wedding and it was perfect! Since I'm so sorry I usually am scared of where the cutouts will hit on me, but they were perfect and I felt very classy but still fun with the cutouts. LOVED this dress!

links_reviews_title: It was sexy but conservative as long as you are comfortable being braless.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove. The asymmetry and quality of the dress were my favorite characteristics. The piece that goes across the back is elastic which is good because it has give but bad because it dug into my flesh a bit, creating some undesired rolls. I wore the dress to an awards banquet with some colleagues. The dress was actually sexier and more formal than I expected but it's better to be over-dressed than under-dressed! If you are looking to be covertly sexy in a semi-formal setting, this is the dress for you.

links_reviews_title: This dress is just WOW.. it was so much fun to wear and I received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: It's sexy and fun, yet formal. It is a bit longer than I would normally like, but the slit makes up for it. It was so much fun to wear. The zipper is hard to pull up, and I normally wear a size 4, but needed a 6 in this dress. I feel you also need to pair it up with a statement necklace of some sort.

I wore this dress on a dinner date for my 30th birthday. It was actually very comfortable, even though it was a touch too tight around the hips for me. The fabric doesn't really stretch and so it did ride up a bit when I walked. The cut out is very sexy without being over the top. I wore this dress with a regular strapless bra. I'm not used to wearing dressing with such a high slit, but it was only uncomfortable when I was sitting down (so I just placed my napkin on my lap!). This was a really fun dress to wear on my birthday.
This was a fun dress to wear! Held everything in and the cutouts were fun to show a little skin! Definitely would rent again!
Wore it with a jacket for a professional work event. Then wore it again for my birthday dinner without the jacket for a sexy classy look.
I used this dress for a holiday party. It was beautiful. I received a ton of compliments. The only thing is the zipper gets stuck but otherwise it was amazing!

fit a bit small length is perfect now the side zipper!!! OMG it took me 45 min to zipper the dress, i almost went out to get a new dress but i have to say once i got the zipper the dress is stunning on many compliments

Loved this dress and felt super sexy and confident in it! My only complaint is the zipper is horrible on the side! I ended up wearing the size 4 because the zipper was so hard to zip on the 2 that when I tried to unzip it the zipper pulled apart. The 4 was a little baggy on the back, but it still looked great.
This dress was the perfect mix of modest and sexy. I got so many compliments and I was so comfortable.

I typically wear a size 8 but with the waist cutout the size 10 was more flattering. I received many compliments throughout the night! My husband even said, "you should buy that dress!" #win The ONLY negative for this dress is the zipper. It's awful and impossible to zip up or down on your own.

links_reviews_title: It was polished and edgy. The perfect flirty LBD.
links_reviews_text: I don't think I ever found a LBD I loved more. I loved how conservative it was in the front, but edgy and sexy in the back! I wore this to an evening wedding and I felt so comfortable. The zipper was hard to open and close... I definitely had to tug, but it worked out! This style and cute, definitely works better with Gals with a short torso.
