I rented this dress for a cocktail event. I ordered the 12 and the 14, but chose to wear the 14 - these hips aren't forgiving. I was a little worried after reading the reviews about the zipper closures, but happily, I didn't have any issues with it. The top of the dress would've probably been a better fit if I wore the 12. Since I wore the 14, you weren't really able to see the back opening and/ or belt/band around my waist. My husband loved it and it was very comfortable!

I have a smaller top and bigger hips, so I'm always nervous when I rent a dress to fit my bottom half, but this dress did not disappoint. The top fit perfectly and is thick enough to be worn with or without a bra. The slit doesn't come so high that you feel uncomfortable when sitting, but is enough to add some sexiness. The cutout is fun and didn't make my side pudge out which was a concern depending on the tightness of the dress. A fun and flirty alternative to your standard LBD. Was perfect for a cocktail attire rehearsal dinner!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments, but zipper design not easy...
links_reviews_text: Would've gone up a size next time. Cute, flattering dress but the zipper at the waist needs a serious tug. Even when the dress is on the hanger, the zipper is challenging. So when it's on it needs a strong, helping hand to get it zipped past the waist.

This dress is very cool and unique. I've not seen anything like it. I wish the cut outs showed more at the front on me. This side view in the pic really shows the cutout, but you can't see it as well in the front. If you have a booty it might look a little odd in the front, but nothing too bad. If I hadn't had another, better option in my shipment I could've worn this and felt pretty good! Rubs true to size and has some stretch.

Zipper is very stuck at the waistband when you try to zip while wearing. It's pretty much impossible. Took me all morning to get on and I'm dreading trying to take it off later. Too short-waisted for me (common issue) but I really love the edgy style - too much for work for sure. Too bad on zipper and fit for me, or I'd buy it.
Love love love this dress. It's classically beautiful but the split adds sexiness to it. Plus the cutout on the side makes it unique and fun. I loved it so much that I purchased it!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments, and very comfortable and easy to dance in!
links_reviews_text: Fit a bit big in the chest, but this was somewhat resolved with the right bra.

Rented this for my PhD Graduation Ceremony; it was under my ceremonial robes, so no one saw it during the ceremony, yet it was the perfect mix of sexy and sophisticated for a post-graduation party. Very cute; true to size. (A little long for shorter people (5ft .5in.), in my opinion, yet it looked good with heels ;and the slits helped to balance the length/amount of fabric.)
The dress is so beautiful but my upper body didn't git into it. My chest is large and couldn't close zipper.

links_reviews_title: Easy to ship and dress fit perfectly
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect. No complaints

Wore this for a Mardi Gras Ball and it fit like a glove! I wear a 4 or 6 depending on the dress and it has a bit of stretch to it so I went with the 4R. It was a perfect fit! Very comfortable and the sequins were a beautiful shade of light gold. Perfect for the ball! I felt like a princess!
Absolutely amazing. So many compliments!
I am 5'2" 125 and the dress with a 4 in heel was perfect !

As mentioned by previous reviewers, sequins can be a bit scratchy and my long hair did catch on the sequins. The cute black faux fur coat I rented with the dress helped immensely with those issues. All in all very worth the beauty of this dress.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit so I had peace of mind.
links_reviews_text: The only con I had is it is a light gold. But it fit well and was in good condition. I’m glad their is a petite option. It also arrived on time.

links_reviews_title: I chose this dress for a formal wedding. Absolutely stunning!!
links_reviews_text: Many people complimented me on this beautiful dress!! The dress fit well for my body, I highly recommend renting this dress, just gorgeous!! I am 5'6" and about 138 lbs. Hoursglass figure. about 36c. I say about because I am a mommy of 19 month twin girls who went full term, so I still fluctuate. If you have any questions regarding the dress You can find us on IG @Lifewith_twins. The only thing I personally did not like was that it was too tight for me under the arm. The fabric would rub a little.

links_reviews_title: Fits in all the right places!
links_reviews_text: This was a 4th option and it did not disappoint! It fit well and was mostly comfortable. The sequin under the arms was extremely irritating so I'd recommend wearing a nice cover to protect your underarms.

I wore this to a gala and was complimented all night. I felt like a movie star. The dress fit like a glove and hugged all the right areas. I recommend wearing spanx with it. Definitely true to size. I would absolutely rent this one again.

Rented for a costume party. I loved it for that purpose. Very comfortable, fairly forgiving. I rented the 8 petite as it was the only length available, it was a tad short. Had I been renting it for a serious occasion would have gotten the regular and it would have been perfect. I'm 5'4 tons of compliments on my 3 hour tour!

I didn't manage to get a picture of me at the wedding I attended but felt like I should take a picture of me wearing the dress anyway. Shown without shapewear, it's even better with it. This dress was gorgeous and very comfortable. The material had quite a bit of give for movement and any flaws one might have. The 6 felt great but a 4 would've looked stellar given the amount of stretch in the material. I'm 5'6 and like dresses to sweep the floor. I had to wear flats in order to achieve that.

This dress really is a show stopper!! I received so many compliments all night about how stunning I was in this dress. This dress is way outside my comfort zone, but I'm so glad that I went for it! The only negative I'll make about this dress is the sequence does rub your under arms.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous gown that hugs all the right places
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a Mary Kay convention awards night. It fit well and was extremely comfy EXCEPT the sequins rubbed my mid arm pretty raw and I had to put bandaids on to prevent more damage. Other than that it was fantastic and I felt beautiful.

links_reviews_title: This is an incredible dress! So easy to travel with (I took it overseas for a wedding)
links_reviews_text: Fits well, easy to wear. The sequins are a little scratchy but nothing unbearable. Got a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: I won a trip to Paris in this dress at a fundraising gala. I'd venture to say it's good luck!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'6" and the long version of the dress dragged slightly. I felt amazing overall, though!

links_reviews_title: Looks glam but easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: Rented to wear as a bridesmaid dress. Fit nicely but with a ton of give/stretch that made it great for dancing. Very form fitting but super comfortable. Tons of compliments!
Fit perfectly. I'm 5'10 and had 4 inch heels.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress To Show Off My Bump
links_reviews_text: This was my back up dress but it fit so well I decided to wear it instead. I'm 5'8" and currently 135lbs (18 weeks pregnant). This dress was so comfortable and had lots of stretch for my bump. I received so many compliments. My heels were 3 inches and the length was perfect. I would definitely rent this again.

I loved this dress I wore it with high heels so I'm glad I choose the 4L . I am a 34 D so I choose to wear a strapless bra . It's definitely true to size. It's spacious but also fitting around the hips and butt area. Only problem I had was that my hair kept getting caught on the sequins but other then that I loved it !

links_reviews_title: Glamorous in Gold! I received compliments all night long!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit true to size, and was quite comfortable! My only gripe was that it was a little short. I'm 5'9", and though I'm tall, I'm proportional, so I usually don't have to order the longer length. With this dress, I probably should have! One other note... like many of the other women stated in their reviews... the sequined edge of the cap sleeves did indeed rub my arms raw by the end of the night.

links_reviews_title: Looking like an Oscar that no one gets to take home ! Hahah
links_reviews_text: The dress was short on me which sucked because I didn't have time to reorder a long so if you're taller than 5'6 get the long. Other than that the dress is gorgeous and fit perfectly!

links_reviews_title: This dress was the talk of my town!
links_reviews_text: This dress is wonderful. A little rough with the cleavage if you're a well endowed like me ( 40 DDD over here). I love the fact that RTR has the tall options because I am 6ft. in heels. The only thing I didn't like is that some of the sequin rubbed underneath my arm pit area and caused some irritation. Other than that the dress was great with a good pair of Spanx!

links_reviews_title: The gold dress was perfect for the Ides of March party I attended. I loved how comfy it was.
links_reviews_text: The petite size was perfect for my 5"2 height.

links_reviews_title: New Years Eve Wedding Party Dress
links_reviews_text: Attended a NYE wedding, so this was the perfect dress! Got lots of compliments! The dress fit perfectly and is bra friendly. The only downside is the sequins are very scratchy. By the end of the night, my inner arms were red and it felt like a rug burn.

This dress fit well. I am a true 16 and 5'9" so I had on a 2in heel. The length was great! The fit overall was wonderful. Tons of room! While it is form fitting theres still some stretch so it wasn't bad after the sit down dinner. You will have a few scratches under your arms at the end of the evening since its all sequins, but its worth it as the fabric is so well crafted. Wish this came in other colors for sure! The cap sleeve was great I could wear a regular bra and felt comfortable the whole evening!
Fit like it was made for me.

The dress was amazing. It was a show stopper in its appearance and was also very forgiving i.e. not too tight. Good for people with a large bust. I did notice the scratchiness of the sequins under the arm area but not enough to stop be from wearing it. The dress was also a good length on me despite wearing high heels.

I felt like a princess and got a ton of compliments on this dress. Probably could've gone with a 0R (I am 5.5") but it was sold out so I wore the 0P and kitty heels and it worked our perfect. The dress is longer in the back anyway. It was super comfortable to wear, once you get it on of course.

links_reviews_title: It was Hollywood theme so all night I was told I was "Oscar" worthy.
links_reviews_text: Fit is great, stretches a little. Perfect length to wear with my flats since I was running around the event handling things. Would order the long if I was going to wear heels.

This was my back up dress but I ended up wearing it to my event. I'm usually a size 6 in dresses but got this in a 4 based on the reviews. I wore a regular bra & spanz. I wore a 2' heel and the dress brushed the ground. The regular sizes run short. If you want to wear a tall heel order the long length. The dress looks kind of dull in person but photographs really well.

This dress is long and slinky. The fabric is stretchy and forgiving. It looks good on everyone! Sequins around the armpits can get uncomfortable, but not horrifically so. I got a lot of compliments on the dress. I had to wear 5" heels with it though, so be warned if you are on the petite side like me.
This dress was a showstopper!! The fit and length was perfect! I felt like a movie star and my husband's jaw dropped when he saw me in it all dolled up! I have never felt so beautiful!

Fit is slightly large, which made it actually more comfy to wear but if you're looking for something slinky and form fitting, it's something to keep in mind. Overall, it was amazing and I'm so glad I got recommended to this website.

I am 16 weeks pregnant and still felt like a million bucks in this dress for a fundraiser! I'm on the board and I wanted to still look very glamorous. I had girls and even guys complimenting my dress saying how nice I looked! Very comfortable- highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Gold Dress for being 6 months pregnant!!
links_reviews_text: This dress surprisingly fit well for my 6 month pregnant self. It was very stretchy and comfortable for the most part. I ordered the 10 & 12 and I ended up wearing the 10. They both fit but the 10 was more fitted. However, the beads did bother me under my arms. It felt scratchy throughout the night. It also was a bit loose on the top even though the rest fit great. I think a good push up bra would have worked that out. There's no need to wear a thong either because you can't see any underwear lines. Overall, the dress was a hit and I wore the petite and it showed my feet a bit. Enough to show off the front of my shoe. My heels weren't that tall since I'm pregnant and wanted to be comfortable. Plus I didn't want to trip either. If I weren't pregnant, I think the regular size would have been fine too but definitely hidden my feet. I think this dress is great for pregnant women.

links_reviews_title: So many people were blown away by this dress!
links_reviews_text: I’m 33 weeks pregnant so I wasn’t sure if this dress would stretch enough but it did! It was surprisingly comfortable. I’m 5’3 and usually need to hem everything but I think my belly lifted it enough so the length was perfect. The sequins scratched the inside of my upper arms, though, so that was the only thing. Totally recommend. Got a ton of compliments.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a Golden Goddess!!!
links_reviews_text: LISTEN, if I could live in this stunning gown, I would!! Gorgeous gold sequins were a total standout in a room full of dark colors, and I received tons of compliments all night long. The 8L was the perfect length--whether barefoot or in 4" heels--and hugged all my curves without being suffocating. Dress was forgiving and comfortable; no special undies or Spanx needed. Sequins were a little irritating under the arms but not enough to ruin the experience. I did order the 10L as backup and another dress just in case, but after putting on this one, I fell instantly in love and didn't try on either of the others. Oh, and the dresses arrived a day earlier than expected! SUPER THRILLED with my first RTR experience and can't wait for an excuse to rent here again!

I just had a baby three months ago so I liked that it covered my shoulders and wasn’t too low cut. I would usually wear a 4 but the 6 fit really nicely because I didn’t want it too tight around my mushy tummy after having the baby! Currently 145lbs and 5’5”

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments and easy to move in!
links_reviews_text: The fit is great of this dress. Some said the sequins bothered their armpits, but that didn’t happen for me. The dress was loose around my waist, but I thought it might be since I have to choose dresses based on my chest and not my waist size. The Long is the way to go if you’re taller like me.

I absolutely loved this gown! I rented it for a Christmas party and got many compliments. I dress up each year for this party and was told that my dress did not disappoint! I wore the 4R, which is my normal size. I did not have any length issues, being 5'5" it was perfect to wear with a sensible heel. The fabric was not heavy as one might expect with a fully sequined gown, nor was it itchy where your skin rubs the outside of the gown. It has some stretch to it so just about any body type can make this dress work! You also can wear minimal jewelry, possibly a nice pair of earrings, and you'll be good to go. The gown wow's enough itself to not need a whole lot of extra accessories. All in all, this was one of my favorite rentals I've ever had from RTR!

This dress is definitely makes you standout and have beautiful on! Very form fitting yet still stretchy enough to be comfortable. The dress is showing some signs of wear (loose threads, missing sequins) but not noticeable unless you're wearing it. The sequins under the arm weren't scratchy at all. I received compliments all night long and the best part is that I felt amazing in it. Would probably rent again even though the wear in the dress is a concern.

I wore this to a formal wedding in October at 30 weeks pregnant. I am 5'6" & I was about 170 lbs & 36DD. It fit like a glove. I didn't wear a bra with this - it zipped up snug enough i didn't feel it was necessary. I don't think I could have worn the medium the next week but it was perfect & comfortable at that time. The lining is a soft stretchy cotton. slightly annoying: the zipper is hard to pull up (get help) & the arm sequins would stick to the bodice sequins.

This dress was wonderful. It's stylish, comfortable and a show stopper. My only complaint was that the sleeve is very tight. I don't have large arms but I did have a moment when putting on the dress that I didn't think it would fit over my upper arm. I probably could have worn a XS if it wasn't for the sleeve. So if you have larger arms, I do not recommend. I'm a size 6, 5'5" and 140lbs and ended up wearing the S. The dress is also starting to show some signs of wear that were noticeable up front but not from a distance. Overall, I was very satisfied with this dress.
This dress was amazing! The sequins isn't too sparkly so it works well for a more formal party. I received so many compliments. The only thing to note is that the arm sleeve is snug.
The dress was a little snug around the arm but not uncomfortable. The ombré was super cute and pictured well. Loved the dress!

The dress was very comfortable and great for a winter event. Very unique compared to the other formal dresses people were wearing. I received several compliments. It is a bit form-fitting so shapewear might be a need though I didn't wear any.
The dress is very well made and fit great. Was a little uncomfortable in the armpit where it can rub, but was not a big deal for me. Overall great dress!
Fit was snug yet somewhat forgiving. Very flattering.
Beautiful dress. The colors are more subdued as others have mentioned. I'm normally a size 6 and the medium worked well. The small fit but was uncomfortable under the arm so I wore the medium.

I am a size 4, 127 pounds, 32DDD, and 5'5". I rented a small and xs. I knew it was a form fitting dress, but it is SO small. I always wear a small and I had to have my husband help me zip this one. It was fine at the bottom (still very tight) but, the top was TIGHT. The arms were tight also. I had to wear spanx for sure. The dress is beautiful. Not as bright as the picture looks. I would have absolutely loved the dress if I would have sized up to a Medium. It doesn't itch. My advice is SIZE up!

Loved loved loved this dress. Can't say enough good things about it. I was worried about the sleeveless arm being itching, but it never bothered me at all! I got sooo many compliments on this! Will definitely rent again. It was perfect for my work Christmas party.

Fit like a glove! There’s some stretch, it was a very comfortable dress absolutely perfect for winter! I received compliments all night long! I felt so sexy and looked pretty darn good! My husband couldn’t keep his hands off me!

links_reviews_title: Get this dress! I don't care what your body type is! I'm a mom of 3! Very high quality made dress!
links_reviews_text: It naturally highlights your curves and best assets!! I'm petite but I'm in no way shape or form "fit" or in shape but this dress just highlights all of your curves in a good way! The sequins are a nice distraction from any unwanted bra or panty lines, you could literally wear granny panties and no one could tell. I was so worried what the one sided arm part would fit like but like I said it fits perfect, there's no looseness or extra material. You will feel like Beyoncé in this I guarantee it.
Fit snug but was stretchy. I received so many compliments!
This dress was perfect- beautiful and comfortable! Received many compliments!!

I was struggling to decide which size to get. I normally would have gotten a M, but after reading reviews, I am so glad I went with a L. It fits like a glove! I did have a bit of a problem with the strings under the armpit getting stuck at first and the two layers felt like they were shifting. Other than that, it was perfect for a nice fall day wedding. I got a lot of compliments! I would rent again!

Everyone (including me) loves this dress! The one sleeve was a fun touch to it, and the sequence really set it off! The only thing I can complain about is it was a little snug. I wish I had the medium to compare, but I wore the small instead.

links_reviews_title: This dress is STUNNING!! My husband and I got a million compliments, not to mention we matched! 100%
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove! I wore an XS. I am 5’5 and I loved the length of this dress!
Tons of compliments from the moment I stepped in the building. Loved it. Pretty snug.

links_reviews_title: Fast shipping and easy to use
links_reviews_text: My first 3 options didn't fit great so I had 3 new options shipped overnight. I chose one of those dresses that I wore to my event and received lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Amazing! I wore this dress for my engagement shoot and couldn't be more pleased.
links_reviews_text: Our colors were wine and navy and the theme was love you to the moon and back. So the color and sequin perfectly matched my wedding. Even though we took the photos at our high school where we met I still wanted it to be a dressy occasion- so it fit the bill. We did a lot of fun poses so the dress def. gives some good give and stretch. I loved the ombre and and the sequin wasn't overly shiny. This is a bodycon dress so while the dress hugs the curls it also shows any rolls if they are there so get some good shapewear. The dress was a bit long on me but I am only 5ft tall. it was so perfect in every other category I didn't mind it so much. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: The way I represented that dress was spectacular. Got so many complements and had all eyes was on me
links_reviews_text: The fit was magnificent, the pro was the way I felt and it made my appearance everything and the cons was I couldn't keep it for much longer.
Fit snug and held all my curves in place. I was nervous about a bra because strapless always slides down on me however the dress held it in place. I felt very sexy and had fun in it!
This dress was a perfect fit. The color is unique and brilliant. Love!

Fun, flattering, and classy! Loved this dress. It fits very true to size and was surprisingly comfortable. The sequins are relatively soft, but I do have very sensitive skin and by the end of the night they felt a bit scratchy under the sleeveless arm. But TOTALLY worth it!

links_reviews_title: Fun and sexy without being too "young"
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a black-tie optional event that had a classic rock theme. It had an excellent fit, felt comfortable and didn't move once on. I got tons of compliments on it and it was just FUN to wear. Also, it felt appropriate for a mom in her 40s who still wants to have fun but not look like she went shopping at Forever 21.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress! Got tons of compliments and felt great.
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress! Got tons of compliments and felt great. It wee bit heavy and warmer than I expected, but still enjoyed it a ton! I'm 5'8 with a big 'ol @$$ so it was a bit snug in the bum, but other than that it was perfect.
Fit perfectly and hugs your curves

links_reviews_title: It made me truly stunning, I wish I took more photos.
links_reviews_text: Fit was for fitting, their were no cons, the pros were that it accentuates the curves, has a zipper so there is a little wiggle room, and has a sheath underneath it.

Loved this dress and received tons of compliments. I was worried as clothes normally swallow me up- being short waisted and short in general. I actually had to size up and although it fell below my knees, which is not a great look in me, it was stunning. Thicker and great for cold weather. I feel this dress would make anyone look amazing as long as you are ok with showing your curves.
I was 5 months pregnant when I wore this dress and it was perfect! Not too tight, yet I felt good support to my growing belly. So many compliments received. Perfect for fall-winter weddings.

I wore this to a Christmas party because I wanted something different...it worked out great! It does run a tad small; the length and one shoulder/sleeve were definitely season appropriate--I didn't have to wear a jacket and stayed plenty warm. No issues with scratchy sequins on the strapless side. Would totally rent again!!

links_reviews_title: My first experience with RTR. It was great and I've been recommending it to people frequently.
links_reviews_text: Dresses arrived on time. In my opinion, this dress seemed to run a little small. Probably because the style is very form fitting, so running small makes sense. Just as a note for others who wear this dress, there is a zipper on the sleeveless side! Don't get so excited to try it on that you fail to look for a zipper, get stuck trying to pull the dress over your head, then have to have your husband help pull it on. Also don't reverse this process, panic that you'll be stuck in the dress forever (but you'd look really good) then find the zipper only after you've gotten the dress off...don't do this, that would be silly. It was really the one sleeve that had me wearing the size S over the XS (especially after I found the zipper). I don't have very big arms, but the sleeve fit was snug, there's not a lot of give in the sleeve. The rest of the dress was pretty comfy. There's a good slip inside and it's mostly elastic so it keeps things in place. I went without a bra. The dress is thick enough and the sequins provide enough texture to cover any pointy nipples. At first there was a little bit of rubbing on the edges under my arm and across my chest, but I stopped noticing it pretty quickly. A few pokes and rubs are to be expected with sequins. Sorry for the poor quality photo; I had a fun night and only took the one picture. I was kind of sad to return the dress, it made me look damn good.

I usually wear a size medium or an 8 and the medium was very tight with no room to give, so I had to go with the large. Definitely wear a good undergarment because this dress is very fitted and shows every curve. It is very comfortable and I did not have a problem with the sequins leaving any marks under my arm.

Like others have said, this dress is a little more muted in person but still so pretty. I found it ran a little small and sized up to a medium. It's lined in a soft fabric and I didn't have any issues with rubbing sequins.
This was my backup dress. So glad I chose it! Everyone loved it. I thought it might not be right for a wedding but it was perfect. It fit wonderfully and i was very comfortable in it.

Wore this dress to a black tie optional NYE wedding. It was perfect for the occasion and I received so many compliments! The ombré sequins are fabulous and muted enough that they aren't overly-sparkly / make you stand out too much. I loved the one-arm look as well, it really gives the dress a unique flare. I have hips and a booty, so although the small fit well it was very form fitting, especially in that area. Some may want to consider Spanx etc. Highly recommend this dress!
More Gorgeous in person.

links_reviews_title: Perfect sparkle for NYE! I absolutely LOVED this dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress fits like a glove and hugged my body in all the right places!
Great dress! XS fit perfectly, received lots of compliments and it was comfortable to wear to a holiday party.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my engagement party and LOVED it!! I got so many compliments, felt beautiful!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress!! It was shorter than expected but fine for the occasion as it was with close friends. I found it ran small as I am normally a 4, but wore the 6. This was a minor detail as you couldn't tell unless you were looking very closely, but the dress was a bit pilly like it hadn't been dry cleaned but instead thrown in the wash. Overall though, I loved the dress and would highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing this dress.
links_reviews_text: I found this to be a bit short. You unfortunately can't tell in the photo, but it feels like it would quickly ride up and that I'd be self conscious. It didn't feel super snug, but it did feel super revealing. I'm trying to find a dress for our engagement party - my fiance liked this one but I might try it for a later event.

Perfect Dress for a Bachelorette! It was tighter than I normally would want a dress, so if I had been wearing it to a tamer event, I'd probably have gone with a size 4. But for a night out dancing for the last hurrah, this was perfect. 120 pounds, 5'3, hips 35, Bust 31

links_reviews_title: Cute but too revealing for a family bridal shower
links_reviews_text: I loved the look and lace detail of this dress, but it was simply too short to wear for a family bridal shower. There's no way I could sit down to open gifts or move around comfortably without constantly adjusting. I'd say this is more suited for a bachelorette party... and even then, size up!

I'm fairly tall and have a hard time finding dresses that don't look too short, but this dress was the perfect length! The ribbon falls at empire waist height, but has no "give" when zippering, so I had to size up one size. Wore this dress for my bachelorette, and it was the perfect about of classy and sexy! Loved it!

I wore this dress for my bachelorette party, and it was PERFECT! I got so many compliments! It does run a little small and it is form fitting, so I would suggest sizing up. I'm usually a 4 and I wore a 6. I highly recommend this dress!
Very form fitting yet comfy. It was the perfect bridal shower dress. Made me feel comfortable and bridal~ it hugs pretty tightly but I guess that's the whole point of this dress!

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my Wedding Dinner Rehearsal and it was absolutely stunning!!
links_reviews_text: It runs a bit small, luckily I got an extra size just to be safe and that fit perfectly. Love the quality!

I knew it ran small because I've rented this designer before and back then, I didn't end up wearing the dress because that's how small, short, & tight it was. I definitely recommend sizing up! I don't remember if I went with the 8 or 10, but usually I'm a 4 or 6. In the engagement photos where I'm facing the camera, there's a line across my belly (the dress rode up? Lining?) This side photo of the dress is one of my favorites!
I wore this dress for my small courthouse wedding and pictures. It was absolutely stunning! The fit was perfect and comfy. I am 5'3 110 lbs, 32C. I wore a normal bra XS nude spanx

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Super delicate and pretty
links_reviews_text: Fit is VERY SMALL. Wore the back up (bigger size) and was super snug. Also pretty short, but overall very pretty, got lots of compliments all night.

Got this dress as a replacement for my original order due to my dresses being shipped to someone else and me getting their dresses. However, I am glad how it all worked out. This dress was perfect for our civil ceremony at the Beverly Hills Courthouse! Loved the fit, the sleeves and details!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but runs so small!
links_reviews_text: I wanted to wear this dress so badly, but even after sizing up it was still way too tight and short. I reordered it two sizes up in the navy color, so hopefully that fits a bit better!

I went to an all white attire sweet sixteen for my cousin and it was in the winter so this dress was perfect because of the thick lace and sleeves because it could be fine a hard dress to find in the winter. The fabric wasn't the most flattering though but nice dress

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for my fall bridal shower! But order up!!!
links_reviews_text: CON - I had previously rented this dress in purple for a friends wedding, but this ivory one ran super small! I had worn a 0 before and neither the 0 or 2 fit me. Luckily RTR overnighted me the size 4 and it fit perfect! I would note the color is also very ivory and no where near white PRO - Sleeves weren't itchy and loose enough to move around. Zipper in back stays zipped!
Definitely short, fits like a glove, but very sexy, comfortable!!

links_reviews_title: First time user ... lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: I got invited to an all white outfit party days before the event. I had no idea what to expect and since it's after Labor Day I decided to try rent the runway. After first trying to navigate the site and figuring out how to do it, i quickly picked a dress for the event I had no idea what to expect. I thought I picked two sizes, but after the confirmation email I realized only one size was being sent to me. After reading all the comments about the dress being so small I freaked out to say it nicely. I had no options for back up and prayed for the best. I ran home the day it was delivered... and it fit like a glove. I felt glamorous, it was comfortable, and although short.. not too short while standing. I loved that it was not see through, really any color undergarments would work with this dress. The material was comfortable and I was in the dress from 5 pm until 1 am. I will def look to wear this dress to an event again. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: I wore it as a reception dress at my wedding
links_reviews_text: It was a bit short, but everyone loved it! It was super comfortable and easy to dance in. It definitely made be feel more relaxed as short cocktail dresses are more my speed then the poofy ceremony dress.
Fit snug, but comfortably, tried zero and 2 and fit similarly. So many compliments, beautiful dress!

I loved this dress! It was an ivory color which is much more flattering for my skin tone than white is. Like other reviews have said, order a size (or two) up. I ended up ordering a 4 instead of my usual size 2, and honestly would have preferred a size 6 to have a little more wiggle room. I'm also 5'8 and this dress was almost too short. I did love this dress though, it was perfect for my bridal shower!
I wore this dress for our wedding rehearsal dinner and absolutely loved it. It did feel like it ran a little small, so wore a size up and it fit perfectly. Very pretty dress - Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Super cute for a Bridal Shower!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my Bridal shower! Loved it - it was formal enough yet not frumpy. The only downside is it was see through.

The fit is tight but extremely flattering. As soon as I zipped the dress up I felt so beautiful. I had compliments all night and everyone loves the photos. I'm so pleased with this rental I can't say enough positive reviews about the dress. Even with the short length and Vegas heat I was comfortable . Photo with my brothers was the best full dress picture I had. Normally I wear a size 6 dress and the 8 was the perfect size for me.
Overall I loved the dress, it was very flattering but a bit shorter than I expected.

links_reviews_title: This dress is good quality but runs very small
links_reviews_text: I typically wear a size 6 in dresses but sized up to an 8 in this one after reading the reviews. Apparently, I should've ordered a 10 or 12 because the 8 was still too small. I was able to get it zipped and over my arms with no problems, but it was very short and the zipper puckered all the way down my butt. And it hugged every lump and curve to a fault. It wasn't cute on me. The dress seems to be well made, and I love the style. I just wish it had fit. Fortunately, this was a backup style provided by RTR free of charge as a promo, and I ended up wearing the other style I received. I would have been incredibly disappointed if this was the only dress/style I had ordered because I wouldn't have had anything to wear.
Fits tight but true to size

I rented this dress for my bridal shower and absolutely loved it- I got so many compliments! It does run a bit small, as others have pointed out: I usually wear a 4 but I ended up wearing the 6 in this dress. Even though it is a pretty fitted dress (and not super forgiving) it was very comfortable. I'm definitely considering renting it again in another color for future events!

I absolutely love this dress! It was perfect for my bridal shower. It was super comfortable and I felt great! I have an athletic build and ended up wearing the 12. I could have worn the 10 if my arms had fit. The lace in the sleeves is not stretchy.

I absolutely loved this dress, but it was a little short. I do have long legs so that probably had something to do with it. I would rent it again I just think others should know if you are looking to be more conservative I might skip this one.

links_reviews_title: Great costumer service ans speedy shipping of the other size
links_reviews_text: The dress ran small was extremely short in the size 2. This is the size 4 they overnighted me.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a Winter Bridal Shower
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my winter bridal shower and it worked out great! The dress is very form-fitting, so if you want the dress a little loose I would order a size up.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress for any Wedding Event
links_reviews_text: LOVED this dress. It just didn't look the best on me. I didn't end up wearing it because I rented two from RTR for our elopement and chose the other one. But I would still recommend to anyone.
I wore this for a blessing of my marrage in the cathloic church. It was perfect! Rent the runway never Disappoints!!
I rented this dress for our small courthouse wedding. I wanted something with lace and long sleeves and this one hit all of my requirements. It felt a little short but still worked for me.

Size up at least two sizes! I wore the 8 and I'm normally a 4. I could've used a 10 as it was kind of short, and I am 5'3''. It was very pretty and photgraphed very well. The neckline detail had to be ironed to lay right but was so pretty! It isn't very forgiving, I definitely had to wear my spanx. Loved that I could wear a regular bra.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for my bachelorette party and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: It fit true to size which everything is always big on me. This was my first time renting. Would definitely recommend it. It was adorable and comfy! Only downfall was it kept trying to ride up so I felt I was pulling at it a lot
This was my backup style but I decided to wear it because I loved how it fit. It was a great length, especially considering that I'm short and used to having to get everything hemmed.

links_reviews_title: Changed mind on my dress 2 days b4 the wedding and RTR saved the day w this awesome dress!
links_reviews_text: Ran small but luckily i followed everyones advice! Is form fitting so you will need good under garments and then it was perfect! Super comfortable and I received a lot of compliments!

Beautiful dress but runs very small. I usually wear a 4 and ordered the 4 and 6. They were both very tight. Customer service was amazing and overnighted me the 8 and 10 and I ended up wearing the 10. It's very comfortable and the lace detail is very pretty. The zipper in the back did bunch the fabric slightly at the bottom but not a huge deal. Overall a very nice dress.

I rented this for a formal company Christmas party. Got many compliments and it was surprisingly comfy! I ended up wearing the larger size (8 vs 6) because the midsection is fairly unforgiving. I wore spanx because the fabric shows all the bumps and undergarment lines. Overall, great fit, felt wonderful, and got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Must rent if you want to be noticed
links_reviews_text: The material was silky and lavish

This dress is one of my favorites! Color is everything! Trendy and different. Shoulder detail is nice. It fit like a glove, had a little stretch to it. True to size. The only cons is that I couldn't dance in it because on the strap over the arm. So wore this dress for a wedding, but not reception.

links_reviews_title: This was a beautiful dress for a semi-formal business dinner. I received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: The fit is snug but not too tight, and very slimming. The sleeve is not restrictive at all.

Searched for weeks for just the right dress for a work holiday party and wasn't happy with my choices. Went into the RTR store and found this gem the night before the party. Lucky me! Beautiful jewel tone dress that hugs the curves, not too risqué, perfect!! I love Black Halo and they came through once again!!

links_reviews_title: Such a beautiful and comfortable dress
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a wedding, it was so pretty, so comfortable and I got loads of compliments. I'm probably going to rent it again.
Loved this dress. It's stretchy which is nice and warmer for winter months. The one shoulder is slightly awkward if you are dancing, but certainly shouldn't be a deterrent
Loved this dress - felt gorgeous and best of all super comfortable because the fabric is supportive! Would rent this again.
This dress was amazing. The quality, fit & color could not have been better. It is a thicker material, but it was not hot. The perfect dress for a cocktail attire wedding.
Flattering dress that was comfortable and chic! Lots of compliments! I am small chested and felt that someone with larger chest might feel confined. Also, felt that it accommodates hops well!

I'm 4'11, 32 C and athletically built. This dress was snug, I think if I went up a size it would've been too roomy. Although 2 was snug, I was still able to move comfortably and the fabric was beautiful. I received so many compliments. Sexy, elegant and chic. Perfect for a fall wedding.

links_reviews_title: Elegant and comfortable! Tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress - it is so elegant and soft and comfortable and it fits your body like a glove. That said, it does show areas where you may have extra fat or not be as toned. You can see in my photo even with spanx, it showed my muffintop (eeek), which wasn't ideal. Other than that, it was easy to wear and I got a ton of compliments. Great for a wedding, but make sure you wear two pairs of spanx if you have problem areas!
Fit was perfect- had a little stretch to it so was very comfortable. Wore to a wedding and received a lot of complements
LOVED this dress. The material was so thick and hid all the flaws. I'm between an 8 and 10 and the 8 was perfect. I loved the off shoulder detail. I would highly recommend this dress

I wore this to a garden wedding at 34 weeks pregnant and was very pleased. The color is really lovely and the neckline adds interest to an otherwise plain look. I am pre-pregnancy size 6 and the 10 worked pretty well. It was a tad pulled through the low part of my belly and hips, but the fabric is thick and forgiving. Would recommend to someone expecting and looking for a great look that doesn't say "maternity" at all.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Very classy and comfortable
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 2 but ended up wearing the size 4 in this dress. It was lovely and received so many compliments throughout the night. I will say if you don't have a large bust like me you might have an issue with the dress falling down a bit so I had to watch that.
Great material, stretchy, comfortable. I'm between size 4 and 6. I wore size 4 and it fit like a glove.
It was a beautiful dress, great color and fit! The fabric is thick enough to hide those little imperfections and shapewear if needed. The shoulder twist was very unique! Absolute recommend!

links_reviews_title: This dress fit perfect and was so comfortable even in the Arizona hot summer!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly, I received so many compliments, was easy to dance and move all night. My only complaint is the hanger ribbons are very close to the top so they had a tendency to come out.

This dress is amazing. It is unique with the one shoulder strap on the side, which makes it so much fancier and fun to wear. It is true to size, the fabric is thick and comfortable, and I got compliments all night. The only downside is the black hanger straps tend to creep out, so I had people tucking them in for most of the night.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on the color.
links_reviews_text: I have a big midsection and so I needed 2 pairs of spanx but I have very large breasts and it fit them (which is hard to find) so I was happy and comfortable.
Such a comfortable material, flattering and fashion forward! The compliments kept coming on this one. Highly recommend for your next cocktail attire party or wedding.

links_reviews_title: Great for formal events or date nights!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, hugs all of your curves, doesn't ride up. I would rent this one again!

I felt so glamorous in this dress and got a ton of compliments. The color is so rich and the fabric is thick and has some good stretch. It worked well for dancing the night away (but don't try to drop it too low, there's no slit in the back). My only complaint is the hanger loops were popping out ALL NIGHT. If it were my dress, I'd have cut those suckers out immediately.
Awesome fit. Love it when you can go size or 2 down. Very elegant beautiful color. Thick material hides what need to be hidden. Con an little long

I rented this to wear to a Scholarship Pageant and it was perfect! The fit, color, style was exceptional. However the little black hang-up tabs kept popping out. I also booked a local TV commercial, that wknd, and it worked perfectly for the "date night" look that was required. So the dress will be highlighting VISIT SACRAMENTO soon! I did wear a strapless bra and Spanx, 'cause I always do...

I never wear this color but the style of this dress is so cute that I couldn't pass up not trying it out. I ended up not wearing it my event..But I would def rent again if I have another occasion to wear it too!

I rented this dress for an outdoor wedding in May, and it was so perfect! It fit just right and I received so many compliments on the color, style and fit of the dress! I will definitely rent this dress again!
The 2 was a touch big so I wore the 0. I was afraid I was going to have to tug it up all night but that was not the case. Felt wonderful.

I rented the 14 and 16- I ended up wearing the 16; however the 14 did zip but wasn't as comfortable. The fabric is thicker, so it smoothed every flaw in my leg. Loved that! As for the cut and color, they were both stunning! So many compliments all night and felt beautiful as ever!

links_reviews_title: Felt amazing and so beautiful in this dress
links_reviews_text: Fit was absolutely perfect. Received so many compliments on this dress and the color. Absolutely LOVED the dress!
I loved this dress! Did need to wear spanx with it because it was very forgiving in the midsection but it was perfect after that. I got lots of compliments and felt great in it!

links_reviews_title: Great fitting dress for dancing at a Wedding!
links_reviews_text: Looking for a dress that's form fitting but flexible for dancing? Well, this is the dress! The fabric was fantastic, especially for large chested gals like me (38 DD) . The fabric had a stretchiness that accommodated all my curves, but yet looked remarkably sleek. Thick enough to be able to wear spanx without it being revealing of any lines. I recommend a strapless bra, since it's off the shoulder. All around I loved this dress and color and received numerous compliments at the wedding I attended while dancing the night away!

I have a large bust 34 DDD but 24 in waist and 34 in hips it's hard for me to find a dress that my bust fits in and zips up that is fitted usually a two won't zip up but this one totally did and the fabric is stretchy and soft Looked way more expensive than the rental and I received tons of compliments Oh I am like barely 5'4

This dress fit snugly perfect on my body and I absolutely loved this dress. This was one of my favorites! Hugged my 28 week bump perfectly and it was so comfortable and slimming. The material was such great quality. I received many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color, comfortable and flattering fit
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress. The color is so beautiful in person and the thick, rich fabric makes the dress comfortable to move in yet super figure flattering. The neckline is very unique yet sophisticated. I'm usually a 10 or 12 and I think I could have gone either way in this dress (the 10 would have required spanx. The 12 did not!) but the 12 worked well. The only thing I didnt love was that the seam at the waist is a little bulky and created a little but of a waist thickening effect in pictures. Regardless, I got tons of compliments and would rent this dress again in a minute!

This dress was gorgeous!! I felt like a high class broad in this dress! Loved everything about it! The color, the cut, the length! Perfect for a fall wedding!! Also loved the earring I rented from RTR as well! This dress was TTS for me. I'm 5'9 about 150#. Would buy!!

This was originally my back up dress and it ended up being my first pick for a friends wedding. It is the most beautiful material and fits like a glove. It's completely comfortable, flattering, and perfectly tailored. The color is rich and bold - overall, this dress is SO elegant. I felt really great in it! I got a ton of compliments... I wish I owned this one!!!!
I loved this dress. It looks amazing and is comfortable to wear. The color is beautiful.

Comfy fabric, great color, unique neckline, runs true to size + has some stretch to the material. Im six weeks postpartum in this pic and I felt confident in this dress. I gave four stars instead of five because there is a small stain on the sleeve.
This dress fit very well. Quality was great. Dress was also comfortable!

I needed help zipping the dress so it was a little right at the top- yet once was zipped it looked amazing. Great colors. Lots of compliments. I've been working out a lot so 3 months ago this dress probably would have been a little too tight. Now the 4 was perfect. 5'5 somewhere around 130 lbs.
Cute cut and pattern. Love the scoop neck and bell sleeves. If you have ANY tummy, you may want to wear body shaper.

No special bra needed. No special panties. hides a multitude of sins. Doesn't need any accessorizing. Just throw it on with a pair of flip flops or sandals and you'll look instantly put together. Loved it.

Versatile dress that can be easily dressed up or down. Much brighter color than it looks in pictures. I'm usually a 4-6, got the 6 to ensure it was work appropriate, and wished I had sized down 1-2 sizes because it's cut large especially on top.

links_reviews_title: Loved this bright floral print dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a classic shift dress with a little ruffle detail on the sleeves. Perfect length for work and comfortable to wear all day. Loved the bright light red color with blue floral detail. Received a ton of compliments on it!
This dress was super cute and fun but it was loose up top. Not great for girls less busty.
Beautiful, feminine look and fit! It's great at disguising a few traditional problem areas too!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress for a weekend party
links_reviews_text: This is definitely one of my favorite dresses so far from Rent the Runway! I wore it for Easter. The cut was perfect including the length of the dress and the sleeves. I felt stylish wearing it and got many compliments on it. The dress is MUCH brighter in person than in the pictures!
Perfect dress for a baby shower! It fit true to size - very comfortable & a breathable material.
A Draper James beauty!!! I loved this fit! Rent this!!
Bright and comfy dress for Spring. I'm 5'9 and was a good length. It was slightly right on my broad shoulders, but nothing I was concerned about. Got a lot of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Fit great. Perfect for a shower.
links_reviews_text: Fit and flair style and light fabric make this dress comfortable and cute.

links_reviews_title: This dress is better in person. Really flattering and comfortable as well.
links_reviews_text: Great fit and fabric!

links_reviews_title: Much too bright for my work
links_reviews_text: Did not enjoy the print and it was a bit too big in the bust for me.

This dress is stunning and perfect for work. I am 5'3" petite and it fell right above my knees! Love the bell sleeves and print. Only the top is double lined but the bottom is not see through at all. I will definitely be renting this again!!

I love the stress, the material is beautiful the scoop neck in the dainty sleeves are perfect. If I rent it again I would go down a size as it does run large. I am only 5 foot three and the dress is a perfect length.
Loved the fabric
I'm not even sure a 16 would fit me. Way too small.
Pretty dress, but ended up returning it without wearing it because it was very tight around the belly area.
I'm 5'10 150 lbs and this dress runs big in the chest and stomach. I would suggest for smaller chest girls to order a size down
Super cute dress for work/ daytime. Fit mostly TTS, but was slightly snug in the arms and chest.
I think this dress could work on the right person. I didn't like the way it fit me -- I thought it highlighted my belly and was pretty unforgiving. I didn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and loved the bell sleves.
links_reviews_text: Just the right length and the fit was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Fun print and versatile for work or play
links_reviews_text: Print is fun and dress is well made and light for summer or hotter climates. It was very tight in the chest area but I am large busted for my overall size. May want to take that into consideration when choosing a size. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Really cute and great material but tight in the chest/arms.
links_reviews_text: I loved this adorable dress and had planned to use it for work/wedding shower. The fabric was nice, but it was still comfortable and would have been easy to wear. I have a larger bust and somewhat muscular arms, and it was just too tight across the chest and in the arms to wear. I might try ordering one size up, but it seems like it might just be about the way it is sewn too.

links_reviews_title: Couldn't breathe, but it was cute.
links_reviews_text: Rented my usual size and it was a bit too snug on the ribs/arms. Will size up next time I rent a Draper James dress. Would recommend getting in more than 1 size. Very cute dress and I liked how it looked, otherwise I would not have ventured to work in something I knew I couldn't breathe at full capacity in.

links_reviews_title: Loved the print and sleeve detail
links_reviews_text: The neckline was not the best choice for me.
Loved the color. Got many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments. Smaller around the chest - loved the dress -
links_reviews_text: cute dress, fit tight on chest
love
Fits great. Cute sleeves.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress but it was too small in the chest area.
links_reviews_text: I was unable to wear this dress because it was tight in my chest. I am a 32DD and was very tight.
This dress was comfortable and bright. It's fits well but not too snug. I definitely considered buying it.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress for work, church, shower, etc.
links_reviews_text: Cute! Showed up with the tags on it! Super nice since one of the dresses in the bunch was sub-par quality (laundered, etc.)

links_reviews_title: Felt like a breath of spring on a cold March day
links_reviews_text: Love the bell sleeves. Orange was a nice pop of color

Gorgeous dress! I did not wear it, I am 5'1" & because of my short torso the long back zipper buckled on me creating an unpleasant hunchback effect (true of many non petite back zip styles). If you're taller, enjoy, this breath of spring will make you happy!
Fit perfect and got a ton of compliments.

Rented this for one of my options for my birthday. Decided to go with some thing else but liked the neck of this. A little tight in the waist, no stretch really, so not sure how I would have enjoyed it after a big meal!

I usually wear a 4 or 6 depending on the brand. A 6 was not available in this dress so I had to order a 4 and 8. Luckily the 4 fit perfectly!! This is my second RTR and I had a great experience both times!!

Loved this dress - it made me feel super gorgeous, I got compliments all night long. The black and navy mix was great too because my husband could wear either suit and it still matched! I would definitely rent this dress again for a wedding or formal affair

links_reviews_title: This is a stylish, classy, yet sexy dress
links_reviews_text: For me, the fit was perfect. I’m smaller chested, so I probably could have gone without a bra, but opted for a bra made for a deep V style to add a little cleavage. The only problem with the dress was the button in the back of the neck. It was very loose and when I took the dress off at the end of the night, it popped off. Other than that, it was great!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress -- felt great and looked chic for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: I love, love, love this dress -- you put it on and feel confident. The fabric looks and feels high quality, and the dress is well-made. The neckline is definitely 'plunging' although the lace and sheer dark overlay do a good job of making the overall impression that is tasteful. I have broader shoulders and no cleavage to speak of, but I think that it would still look nice on someone with a larger chest. I've got arm muscles and broader shoulders, and unlike many dresses, the sheer fabric around the arms/armpits didn't chafe or bother me. The length was longer than pictured, and balanced out the top perfectly. The dress was structured but still allowed me to dance. I wore a stick on bra -- a traditional bra will not work with this dress. Love it!
Great length if you are a shortie like me (5'0") Body type: works out but likes to drink beer I wore a 0. Zips easy, doesnt get caught in the middle like other dresses I have rented or owned.
It fit perfectly. Subtle yet sexy. Great material, fit like a glove but very comfortable. Wanted to buy - had to tell myself no
This is a great dress, though it is showing some wear. Sexy without being too showy.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Wore it for a date night on our Vegas trip! It's a very tight dress so I sized up
links_reviews_text: Felt dress ran a little small and was very fitted so I sized up

links_reviews_title: Super sexy, but still formal (enough) for a wedding with party people.
links_reviews_text: Great dress, received lots of compliments. This bad boy does have to worn with confidence because BOOBS obv. It's quite comfortable though, which helps. I wore a deep-v bra, but depending on just how confident you are, you may not need one since the material is nice and thick. I didn't end up wearing a shaper. The embroidered design adds a touch of class. My boyfriend keeps asking if we can buy it, so I guess that's one more positive review!
Fit true to size although I have a larger chest and the mesh will squish it without a good bra to separate.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a High School reunion!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to my high school reunion, which was "night out" style dress. This dress was really flattering. Good, thick material with a texture to it. The mesh in the front was low and showed cleavage, but was still covered. There are similar mesh panels on the sides that aren't as easy to see in the pictures.
Loved the dress. I received many compliments on it. True to it's size and very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Dress was for a wedding and it fit amazing
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. I'm athletic type with a big back so I was skeptical about the 4 but it sat just right.
Fabric is a bit more casual than I anticipated. Definitely order a size up. The difference in fit between the 4 and the 6 was minimal.

Very glad I went a size up, but once I did the fit was very flattering. The thick material smooths you out well. The V is low in the front and I had a hard time finding the right bra, but the mesh makes it more conservative and holds everything in. The pattern of the fabric is very pretty but hard to see except up close.

links_reviews_title: This dress felt both classy and sexy. Perfect cocktail dress.
links_reviews_text: Perfect for smaller chests. The only downfall is the button in the back; had to use a small hair band to button it without being stuck in the dress forever. At 5'6" it hit just above the knee

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for my fundraiser.
links_reviews_text: The dress is beautiful but runs very small. I am usually a 4 or 6 but had to have Rent the Runway overnight a size 8! Luckily, the 8 fit beautifully. One thing to not, the button at the back is very hard to button and unbuttin. You will probably need help with that. Otherwise, I was very pleased with this dress.

The dress fit fine but was not very forgiving for my stomach area. I wouldn't have been comfortable for a long period of time. I went with a different dress for a backyard wedding reception I attended.

Great dress, the fabric was very comfortable! I ordered in a 2 and 4 and went with the larger size because the skirt was tighter around the legs. The mesh deep V-neck was sophisticated yet sexy. I wore with the stick on cups because it was such a deep V a strapless bra still would've been seen. If the dress is tight enough on you you may be able to get away without one.

I exercise and normally I wear a 4 and its snug in all the right places. This dress, I couldn't zip up the 4, so I went with the 6. Also, the low cut V, I wore a black stick on bra and you can see the clasp in the front so I used fashion tape near my neckline to make sure the dress wouldn't move. That worked. Its a little snug for dancing and doesn't give much unless you hike up the skirt. Otherwise it was a darker pattern than I expected but perfect for late September wedding.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, comfortable, and fun to wear!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a friend's wedding and it was perfect. I got many compliments and was comfortable for dancing. Based on reviews I ordered a size up (6) and it fit well. May have been too tight if I I ordered my normal size (4).

links_reviews_title: Not worth the $80 but it was pretty comfortable. Simple, nice dress.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable dress, had to find my deepest dive bra.
links_reviews_text: Great dress, watch out if you are busty, definitely don’t wear this unless you want to show “them” off. If you are busty and move to the larger size I found the waste starts to look strange and pucker, best for smaller busts in my opinion.

Fit was perfect. I ordered the 2 and 4. I normally wear a size 2, but that was too small. I put the 4 on and it fit perfectly. No issues with the dress until the back button popped off. Thankfully it was at the end of the night. Received wonderful comments about the dress, especially from my husband since he was the one that picked it out. He didn't get to see it until the night of our anniversary dinner and he was blown away. Loved everything about it!!
More comfortable then I thought it would be. Didn't wear a bra or any covers and felt perfectly comfortable! True to size. 5'1 and 120 pounds, petite!

I usually wear a 12 dress, but this 12 was a snug fit. If a 14 was available I would have preferred it. Fortunately it was not very uncomfortable, and the dress minimized my belly. I felt very sexy. The length was perfect for me at 5'3" with moderate heels. The color and pattern is gorgeous, but best shown off at an event with good lighting!

The cut of this dress would be flattering to many body types. I was originally concerned about the length reveling too much but the dress was well constructed and didn't ride up. I have a longer torso, so it was nice to find this dress. Highly recommend!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect! Classy with a peek of sexy.
links_reviews_text: This dress was exactly what I was looking for to celebrate an elegant birthday dinner with my sweetheart. I'm only 4'10", pettie and Nicole Miller dresses never let me down. Perfect length & fit. Comfortable to wear all night. Sticky bra cups are key! Hard to catch the blue detailing in pictures but it was beautiful. Paired with navy colored stone earrings and statement ring. Absolutely a keeper!

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress, hit all my curves just right - perfect for NYE or night out
links_reviews_text: The size 8 fit, but was a little too tight on my bottom half. I ended up wearing the 10, it fit like a glove. So depending on your curves, I'd recommend sizing up for your backup dress to be safe. The details on the dress are fantastic, definitely a sexy dress that wows. I received compliments from everyone at the NYE party all night long. The size 10 still had the tags on it!
Very comfortable and really flattering! I loved wearing it to a Great Gatsby themed NYE party!

LOVED this dress! Wore for my brother's wedding. I'm 5'3" and the hem still hit above the knee on me. The dress does have a little give which was nice because my hips are wider than most size 4s. The sheer part looks SO CUTE in person and in photos. I didn't wear a bra because I'm pretty flat-chested and even though it has darts in it, it still fit pretty well. It would be pretty hard to wear a bra because of the deep V in the sheer front but maybe some of those gel bra cups would work? The only issue I had was that the slip inside the dress rode up and I didn't even notice - but I had had two bottles of champagne and was dancing a lot so that might be a user error. Navy blue looks GREAT in photos!

links_reviews_title: I was very happy with my first RTR experience!
links_reviews_text: The dress was true to size and had a little stretch. It smoothed the tummy and sides too. It was overall comfortable and classy. It might be hard to find a bra that works since it’s low in the front and sheet on the back of the shoulders, but I was able to go without.

I LOVED this dress! I was very very flattering for someone with an hourglass shape however, doesn't have much stretch so take into consideration when ordering your extra size. Would definitely wear this dress again and kind of want to buy it!

I wore this to a wedding in Vegas & it was just the right amount of " sexy for Vegas" and "Classy because you are at a wedding". It fit perfectly and was the right length-not too long ( ie-frumpy) and not too short ( again--at a wedding). I'm 5 ft 1.5"
I rented this dress as a backup style, but found it to be a little unflattering... It would be difficult to eat and dance in.

links_reviews_title: I wanted to like this dress.. Way too small in the waist and back
links_reviews_text: Way too small to wear

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and very cute. Sexy without being trashy.
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove, maybe a little tight in the back but I am a little broad shouldered.
Pretty and flattering in the chest, but was too tight in the waist and thighs. 5'3"; 145lbs, athletic build. 36A, but curvy in the thighs and butt.

Great silhouette on my hourglass shape. I'm carrying a little extra around the middle these days and don't usually prefer things this tight in the tummy but it hit me perfectly. (I'm 5'6" and short-waisted). Considering buying.
Love this dress. 3/4 ruffle sleeves means you can eat without worry your sleeves will end up in your food. Great length. I wore it with a belt down more fitted look. Fabulous dress.

I wore this to a conference. Really like the ruffle sleeves and skirt, it added just enough style to the dress while still being understated. The material is very thin, so I'd order a larger size because I'm not sure this dress would look good if it was too form fitting.

I've worn this dress in both the royal blue and the black colors. I found the black to be a bit more flattering (harder to see seams from pantyhose through fabric) but I love wearing this dress in any color. I am obsessed with the sleeves and they bring me joy with each wear.
I rented this for a bridal shower-- loved it! The color is gorgeous in person and it is super flattering. Rent this!!

links_reviews_title: Thought the wait would be longer but I got in and out pretty quickly.
links_reviews_text: Hanging on the hanger doesn't do it justice. Great fit. Not too short. I could eat to fullness and dance the night away. Loved the color.

This dress was so pretty and perfect work in the summer. It fit great without being too tight or inappropriate. From the moment I walked into the office I was getting compliments. I wore it with nude flats because I walk a lot at work but can add heels for a more business formal look!
Very comfortable and flattering

Pretty and vibrant color, nice sleeves and details. Somewhat loose around the waist and hips so added a belt to give it more shape. Hit me above the knee and I'm short. Conservative enough for work but still fun.

links_reviews_title: Pretty color, but too thin for me to wear this size
links_reviews_text: It was a very pretty dress, but too thin for me to wear in my normal size. The line on my tights showed across my tummy.
The color of the dress is beautiful, and perfect for any work or wedding event. Not too tight and fit so comfortably!

I ended up wearing this dress multiple times - once for a work dinner with a client, once for date night with my hubs and then a third time for getting a headshot at work. I cannot say enough good things about this dress. It's comfortable and incredibly flattering. I received sooooo many compliments on it and felt so good about myself! I had a baby 15 months ago and my body is no where near where it once was but this dress gave me a confidence boost and made me feel beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Just the right amount of flair
links_reviews_text: A beautiful and comfortable dress with just the right amount of flair! I felt great in it for a 10 hour conference. It didn't wrinkle and I received tons of compliments. It would be easy to dress up and wear with heels, or, because of the length, its super in flats as well! I saw other reviewers mention the "loose fit". For me it was true to size. There is lovely pleating right over the stomach that gives you a little grace. It's again over the back, presumably for the bum, but for me the pleats hit at my mid-back... The dress is shorter, but not obscene, however, if you have a larger bum, like I do (it's a bit of a bubble but) beware that if it doesn't line up with the pleats, you may not want to bend over in the dress. I certainly could not, however the dress was so stinking cute in every other way, I just made it work - and if your bottom isn't sizable (depth wise, not width wise) - this will not be an issue for you at all! 100% renting this one again. I loved wearing it!
Excellent Fit, Thin Material. Beautiful Color.
Thinner material than I expected but flattering nonetheless.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous most compliments I've ever received
links_reviews_text: I'm horrible at taking these photos but nearly everyone at work complimented me on this dress the color is a beautiful bright blue and the ruffle details make it special. I sized up (1-2 sizes) since I'm 31 weeks pregnant (133lbs) and it just fit my bump. Not stretchy at all so I got lucky and it was a little loose in the back near the shoulders but it worked. I wish I could wear it again for my baby shower in 3 weeks but I'll be too big by then. Will rent again post pregnancy.

This dress is a great color and I loved the sleeves. I did notice it was tight on my hips while it fit perfect on my chest. I would size-up next time I rent. I am on the petite side and the sleeves hit mid-forearm rather than at the elbow but it didn't look to bad, just something to note when you're looking at the photos. I got lots of compliments on the dress and would recommend to others but just size up!
Good fit...appropriate for work. Got lots of compliments on the color

This dress was my favorite out of the four I chose. It was so light, fun, and bright. The fabric is thin, so I definitely wore spanx with the dress. It fit well, but I honestly would have been a bit more comfortable in the size 12 only because I'm curvy. Then again, if I got the bigger size...it may not have been as flattering! Got lots of compliments on the dress. Overall, definitely a good choice.
Great dress for work to night. I wore different shoes for dinner with it. Color is amazing and it fits well too! Wonderful dress . I got so many compliments.
wore to a holiday party where I was a featured guest and going to be photographed. Dress was comfortable, professional, and photographed well.
Rented for an awards ceremony for work. Comfy and easy to wear. Perfect length for petites.

Got so many compliments on this piece! It's a beautiful color, bright blue slightly lighter than a royal blue. Fits true to size. Form fitting without being tight or inappropriate for an office setting. Felt feminine and professional. Comfortable, too! I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Worn for an interview, felt very confident
links_reviews_text: Felt professional & very confident in this dress. Thin material but wasn't a tight fit. Stylish yet professional
Loose fitting but not frumpy. I loved this classy flair for work.
Fits true to size, not too clingy, nice shape and beautiful blue color. Will rent again, I was the first renter...it still had the tags!

links_reviews_title: Flattering color and well made garment
links_reviews_text: I rented this cobalt blue dress for my friend's wedding in San Francisco. The long sleeves were perfect for a semi-outdoor affair in the early evening. The dress material isn't lined so you do need to be cognizant of undergarments as it's easy for lines to show through. It's a thicker material though - perfect for fall/winter! I really liked the way it fit and felt it was a flattering look. I loved, loved, loved the color! And, with the ruffles, it was a nice something extra. Comfortable for dancing the night away!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color. Like the skirt ruffles.
links_reviews_text: This is a gorgeous color of bright, bold blue. The dress is a nice length for work - not too short or long. The skirt and sleeve ruffles give an otherwise simple dress a little flair. I sized up over fear of the dress running small and the fabric being too thin. Even a little loose, the dress is still flattering.

links_reviews_title: Nice color and style but very thin
links_reviews_text: This dress was much thinner than I expected, which made me feel a bit self-conscious at work. There's also a small slit on each side, though the ruffles cover it well. I wore the dress once to the opera and once to work. I love the color and would rent it again for an event but not for work. It fit true to size.

I wore this to work a couple times and found it to be really comfortable. It's a little loose and it there was more room in the booty then I needed. It still looked good though and I absolutely love the color!
I wore this dress to a professional photoshoot. It garnered many compliments. The fabric is a bit thin so plan on wearing spanx.
Perfect fit size 6 Dress very comfy too.

links_reviews_title: Bright shade of blue is a knockout color.
links_reviews_text: The flirty, feminine design with the slight slit up the side was great for my height. However, I could see where a taller person might show a bit too much leg for a professional environment.
The material is very thin but the dress itself is beautiful It was just too tight because it runs small so I couldn't wear it.

It was slightly shorter than a dress I would normally wear to work but I could still pull it off and be professional! I work in DC and this really was a great piece for work. I loved the fit, hugging my chest with flow around the waist. The sleeves were also a nice touch without getting in the way.

links_reviews_title: The sleeves are a feminine touch
links_reviews_text: Great fit, perfect summer work or party dress. The sleeves are a very nice feminine touch. The blue is jaw dropping! Definitely wore it twice in the same week!

links_reviews_title: I wore for a TV appearance - perfect
links_reviews_text: The color popped. The length was perfect; above the knee but not too short. I wore with fuchsia spiked heels. I got compliments all day.

links_reviews_title: Best dress for special work occasion
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about this dress

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress with so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Love everything about this dress. The color is beautiful and the ruffle details make it memorable and different. This will be one that I buy.
Slightly tight in the chest but overall fit was true to size

links_reviews_title: Loved this look. Fit perfectly and was super comfy. Loved the pockets. I may buy this one!
links_reviews_text: Amazing romper. Casual or dressy depending on shoes and jewelry. Perfect!
Loved this romper so much with a big belt buckle
This fit great! I am on the short side and the length was perfect. I rent often and I have never considered buying something before this romper.
It runs big so I had to add a belt to it . But it's definitely comfortable and sexy at the same time
Loved this romper! Comfortable but sexy.

Super comfortable! Rented this as a backup and my cousin ended up wearing it for her sisters bachelorette party! She loved it! First romper for her and she was very confident in it as it was classy, comfortable and sexy!!! The button in the front came undone and was easy to then remove romper to use the bathroom!
Was a bit heavier than I expected and didn't love the liner, but overall had a cute fit

This is SHORT, but SO fun to wear! I paired it with a gold layered necklace and wedge heels. I received a lot of compliments both times I wore it. Con: need help going to the bathroom b/c of the buttons in the back, but that would not stop me from wearing this again. I am 5'4" with an athletic build.

Only complaint is that my hair got very tangled in the buttons on the back. I didn't have a problem getting out of it to go to the bathroom, as the front unbuttons very low, I didn't even have to mess with the buttons on the back. Like I said, it was super cute, and even more comfortable.

This romper was great. I rented it for a Bachelorette weekend in Chicago. I was nervous it would be a tad too short on my 5'8" frame but it was perfect! I felt very comfortable with the length. I received so many compliments and was happy to stand out in a sea of solid black dresses. It did get a tad short when I sat down but nothing that I couldn't handle. I did wear a black cami under it as it is cut a little low and I'm a 32DDD. Going to the bathroom was easier than others made it seem...
