I didn't even need to unbutton the back, just unsnapped the front and pulled it down. I was sad to send this once back and would for sure rent it again!

This is probably my favorite thing I've rented from rtr. It's fun and cute and easy to dress up or down. I have a pretty long torso for someone who's 5'2" and the xs still fit fine. The shorts are shorter than most rompers which I like because I have short legs but if you're taller they'll probably look quite short.

links_reviews_title: Wore dressed down for daytime look
links_reviews_text: This romper is super comfortable and cute. Could easily be dressed up or down. I wore this with sandals during the daytime in Vegas. If you have a shorter torso, the top is a little baggy but that didn't bother me. Make sure you are with a friend when wearing this bc the back buttons up and you will need assistance in the bathroom!

One of my favorite rentals! My husband and I planned a last minute anniversary trip to Nashville-- this was the cutest, fun, comfortable romper for honky tonks and transitioned perfectly into cocktail and dinner attire. I'm on the shorter side, and this romper is SHORT, but if you're not self conscious about your rear, this is an adorable fit! The elastic waste band was not at all too tie or in an awkward place, like some romper a can be. True to size; the button front is accommodating and comfortable for even a larger bust (I'm a D). Definitely renting this one again!

This romper is a great choice if you're looking for something casual that still stands out in a crowd. The short length shows off your legs. The button up top can be left open a little to show some skin or closed for a more modest look. The black lace overlay is unique and makes this outfit a little edgy. The button up back allows the romper to be pulled up and down easily....I find some rompers to be very challenging. For me, the romper runs large. I usually wear a size 10 or 12 depending on how much room there is in the bust, the medium was plenty big for me (36DD). I wore a normal black bra (not strapless) despite the lace upper, and I don't feel the bra straps were noticeable. I paired it with gold jewelry and high wedge flip flops. It was perfect for a casual night time event at the Miami Zoo.

links_reviews_title: Was looking for something to wear to my friends 30th birthday party and this was a great pick!
links_reviews_text: I got this romper for a friends 30th night out in Boston. I rented a xsmall and a small and ended up wearing the small...The small was a little big mostly baggy on the top but the xsmall was just a bit to short. Overall I liked the romper and would rent again.
Worked great. Was super comfy! I was a little heavier when I rented it, at my current size I would definitely go with a small.
Wore it to Vegas and it was perfect

links_reviews_title: Not very flattering on my body type
links_reviews_text: Maybe it's just me but I think the elastic portion would look better at the waist than at the hip, magnified my widest area. Bottom portion wasn't long enough on me to pull up, or it rose up the bum. Overall high quality and cute on the hanger.
I LOVE this romper! It fits perfectly - true to size. The buttons in the back are my favorite part. Seriously considering buying it because there is nothing I dislike about it!
Usually rompers are tough for me to wear because of my height but, I found this fit perfectly!

links_reviews_title: This romper was so cute! Cute details- got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I ordered the medium and large, thinking I would probably wear the large (first time using RTR). When I got the rompers, I tried on the large and it looked okay- but it was a little baggy and the shorts seemed pretty long and unflattering. I was a little worried but tried on the medium and it fit perfect! The shorts were a good length for a NYE party- I probably would not have wanted that length for a family party. Also I read a lot of comments about people safety pinning the top- I did not have any problems with it. It was a little low cut, but again cute for a NYE party. I got so many compliments on this outfit! The only issue that I had with this was the back was buttons. So about 5 buttons down the back, this made going to the bathroom a process, which was a little annoying on NYE when were drinking. But I wore a blazer over because it is sleeveless- so most of the time I had the middle buttons undone for quick bathroom breaks. Overall I loved this romper and would recommend!
I loved this romper. It was true to size and super comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Nice dress alternative for a prohibition themed party
links_reviews_text: I rented this romper for a prohibition speakeasy negligee themed party. The print and loser fit made the outfit very fitting to the occasion. It was very comfortable and perfect for this party, but I wouldn't recommend renting it for a regular event. The fit is my biggest issue with it: it was quite lose on the top but much tighter (and shorter) on the bottom, so I could imagine that it would tend to look pretty inappropriate for anything other than a lingerie-inspired party.

links_reviews_title: Cute outfit for meeting up with high school friends!
links_reviews_text: I had a party celebrating an old friend from high school visiting from Sydney, so I wanted to look cute with all my hometown pals! This romper was a great casual yet refined piece. I found that the top was a little large everywhere except in the bust--I went back & forth between the medium & the large, since the large was kind of baggy in the top (minus the bust). Overall I paired it with grey tights, some black booties, and a black cardigan to look chic and fun. I would definitely recommend this romper!

I winterized this romper with black tights and a leather jacket and it worked perfectly. Really beautiful fabric and I received a lot of compliments. Also it was so comfortable, didn't ride up at all and plenty of room around the mid section so I didn't feel self conscious, renting it again!

Loved this fun romper, that was easy to dress up with heals. Wore this to a Miami bachelorette party. The romper is comfy but also sexy. Pretty short but it is shorts so I felt comfortable to dance all night. Going to the bathroom was a pain with all the buttons up the back, so always bring a girlfriend in with you. It is low cut in the front, but has a button to keep it snapped shut
Great comfy going out outfit! Wore this for a night out in Vegas.

I really loved this romper even more in person than in pictures. It was the perfect thing for an active bachelorette weekend in Asheville: comfortable for our pedal wagon beer tour but still cute enough to go out in later. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I felt it made my mid-section looks but poochy, but I did really like it.

I wore this romper for my boyfriend's sister's bachelorette party. The romper has great lace detail and made me feel skinny. The small was able to accommodate my large chest and was even a bit lose on me. The romper needed minimal jewelry. I would definitely wear this again!

links_reviews_title: Worn for my 20 year HS Reunion. Received compliments all night on how stunning this romper was.
links_reviews_text: Loved it! Fit great, super comfy. Can be dressed up or down. Only downside was that I needed bathroom backup to help with the buttons.

Although I think the XS may have been a better fit I was able to wear the Small comfortably. I enjoyed every minute of this romper & was sad to send it back! It is dressy yet casual. You can tell it is well made! I really loved it & got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Weekend down at the jersey shore :)
links_reviews_text: I rented this for 4th of July weekend. I wanted a fun romper to wear out to some beach bars and this was perfect. Short enough to wear with flats and have it still appropriate for out.
Adorable, fun, classy, and super comfortable. I will most likely rent again I Loved it so much!
I was the MOH and party host of my best friend's bach at a concert. It was nice and light during a sweltering day! And it was stretchy and comfy. I recommend for bach parties :)
I wore it for my bachelorette party. I ordered late and the only size available was a medium so the top was a bit baggy. The small would have been perfect. I would definitely recommend this outfit.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a night out in Vegas!
links_reviews_text: Chose the medium as my back-up size and it was huge. Small was a perfect fit, super comfortable, can be dressed up or down. This is one I wish I owned.

I absolutely loved this romper and would definitely rent it again! I wore this for my bachelorette party and received so many compliments. I ordered the small and medium. I probably could have worn the small but the medium felt a little more comfortable and I wanted a little more room. I wore this with the House of Harlowe Teepee Necklace.
The romper fit great and was very comfortable. I had several people approach me complimenting my outfit and asking where I bought the romper. I would definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: sassy and sexy in vegas - a win/win!
links_reviews_text: This was one of my favorite RTR moments yet! The romper was so incredibly comfortable, super easy to move around in, and was perfect for a work party in Vegas. I could have worn the M but felt a bit better in the L. Unlike previous reviewers I didn't find that the leg openings were too small, it fit perfectly. Received a ton of compliments all night and felt phenomenal!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a bachelorette party and got a lot of great complements on it.
links_reviews_text: I am 145 lbs and about 5'8" tall and the S fit great. The length was not too short or revealing. It's super comfortable while still being classy and great for a night out.

I was a little worried about wearing something this exciting to a wedding. But I just got my husband an orange tie to help tone down my wildness and make us coordinate. We got tons of compliments!! Super low cut but still managed to dance all night with no nip slips! Winning!

Rented for my husband's surprise birthday party. We were going out in a city where our cowboy boots were a must. I received compliments ALL night! And then all day on social media. I felt gorgeous and the birthday boy was glad to have me on his arm. I would definitely rent this one again!

Beautiful pattern with neon green print. Much brighter in person. I normally wear a size 4-6 but the 2 was the only size available. The waist was pretty tight however the straps were a little too long. I had to constantly pull up straps so the boobs don't fall out. The fabric was a bit over worn but no tears. There were 3 missing stones from the waist but wasn't too noticeable. I would not rent again because 2 is too tight in the waist and the 4 would just be too big on the top.

links_reviews_title: I wore the 4 but really needed the size 2.
links_reviews_text: Colors were so fun! Very low cut. I could not wear a bra. BUT pockets :)

links_reviews_title: Skip if you have big ribs.
links_reviews_text: So disappointed. Didn't come CLOSE to zipping around my big ribs. Runs small for this designer.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Jewel missing on the band at the waist on the Size 4.
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress, but I had to return it without wearing it because there was a jewel missing on the waist band. I do not know how noticeable it is. I know that my mother, who would be attending the wedding, would have noticed. The dress fit beautifully, though I do not know that it is the most flattering style for my body type. I am regularly a size 4, and the size 4 did indeed fit. (I am a size 4 in Lululemon, to give you an idea of my normal sizing.) If you have great breasts and legs, but a little bit of a pooch at the waist, this is pretty much the perfect dress for you.
If you have a larger chest this probably isn't for you. Nicely made and it has pockets!

links_reviews_title: . I received so many compliments and felt amazing in this dress.
links_reviews_text: I was nervous about the loud print but it was stunning. Although it was short ( I'm 5'8)) when I sat down there was no issues. Pockets were amazing ! Only hiccup was the bust , I had to fashion tape the dress to my bra.

Loved this dress and got so many compliments! I'm between size 2 and 4, decided to order the 2 after reading the comments from other ladies saying that it ran a bit larger. I'm a 34 B and the dress was a little loose up top, but not noticeable. Super comfortable and has pockets!

Loved this dress. Great quality brocade. Definitely had to contend with finding the right way to adhere the top to a bralette to my body which was an ordeal, but loved the style and feel and fit of this garment otherwise!

links_reviews_title: No accessories needed, the jeweled belt was enough.
links_reviews_text: Fit is good, length great, love the dip in the front. Colors are vibrant.

links_reviews_title: Leopard, sparkly pink, and cleavage, what's not to love?
links_reviews_text: Loved this! The straps are a bit loose, so I kept tugging it down. I think I could've possibly sized down. It has pockets! Pocketssssss. Definitely very booby, as you can see. Perfect length. May have to find another occasion to wear this, it's so great!
It was a brighter green than what the photos show. I couldn't wear it for a work formal because it was too low cut and I couldn't wear a bra with it. Would have been a fun Christmas Party dress!
skirt length perfect fit and flare worked for my body type because skirt has tulle to help it flare more.

links_reviews_title: This dress is everything!!! Find a reason to wear it because it's amazing!
links_reviews_text: Order normal size and I would suggest one size down as well. Colors are on point. Tasteful cleavage--and you can wear a regular bra! I want to wear this dress again and again and again!!

links_reviews_title: fun dress and love the pockets!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit true to size and wasn't too long on my petite frame. The only con was it's a very deep V. I wore a black lace bandeau and it worked just fine. I wear a B bra and it was still not quite tight enough to wear without worrying. Loved the fun print and detailing. Wore it for a NYE party.

I wore this to a cirque show for Christmas. I received lots of compliments as the colors are bright and fun. The dress flares out and is fun for a party. It's very low cut. I wore an undershirt because I was going out with my 8 year old and didn't want to have major cleavage. Had I worn it to a party with adults it would have required fashion tape for sure. It was a tiny bit tight on my waist too but not enough to need to size up.
cute pattern and quality fabric, but the dress just didn't flatter at all, so I returned.
Runs large, especially in bust area. Ordered normal size and size smaller based on others reviews and glad I did as size smaller was perfect fit. Super fun dress and lots of compliments!!!

Fit everywhere perfectly except my ribcage, sadly couldn't zip up over the base of my ribs. straps felt a bit long even if it could zip --but so close if I owned it I may have been able to alter to a winner. really cute dress.
Fabric and cut were great. Just not my size. Zipper got to the waist but no further.
I am very shortwaisted so the straps were too long, but it's a gorgeous dress!
Looked beautician

I'm very short torso'ed and had to pin the sleeves into my turtle neck. The waste runs very small, especially for a size 8 (my waist is 29"). Tons of compliments, but you'll need to wear a top underneath as its extremely low cut.

This dress fit nicely (I did size down per reviews and needed to) but it was a little too busy for my tastes. If you want to make a statement and like pattern/funky colors this would be a great dress for an occasion!
Very pretty dress but couldn't zip up all the way- back too broad for this one.

links_reviews_title: Lots of cleavage if you are a B or bigger. Super cute.
links_reviews_text: Too deep cut.

links_reviews_title: Great looking dress, top is way too big
links_reviews_text: The dress looks amazing, but the straps/chest area were way too big; I couldn't wear it out
I'm a 34dd , 5'2, 140lbs. I rented a size 4 and the chest was so loose. The straps needed to be pulled up 3 inches to even look ok. Ended up not wearing it like planned for a music festival.

This was an alternate rental since the dress I rented wasn't available at the last minute. Its a cute party dress, very low cut though. I didn't even wear it though since it was a bit too dress for a date night. Better suited for a wedding or work party, NYE, holiday party, etc.
Rented as potential party dress. Didn't wear bc the straps were too large but a size down would have been too tight across rib cage. Nice colors and detail though. Much prettier than picture.

This dress definitely runs TTS and is very sexy. It is low cut, so not great for women with larger busts or for those who dont mind showing a bit of cleavage. Best if worn with Spanx, since the waist is tight.

This dress was more dressy and slightly more gaudy than I expected it to be. Waist is true to size but the shoulder straps are loose, will only work if your chest is on the larger size. I wanted to like this but sending it back.

links_reviews_title: I went to a birthday dinner after work and felt wonderful with this dress
links_reviews_text: I am chesty, so I wore a bralette for more coverage, if I hadn't my aereolas would have been exposed! It looked like it was part of the dress and worked perfectly.

links_reviews_title: I wanted to like this dress so much but it was not flattering!
links_reviews_text: I am a pear shape and generally like it tighter on the top and slightly flared but it's more flaresd then I thought and visually made me look two sizes larger. I really only felt comfortable wearing it with my leather jacket. I didn't find the top to low, it was the perfect amount of clevage for a date night. The dress is beautifully made but I don't like where the crystals were placed hitting at an odd place and just ruining the flattery factor! Would not rent again. The zipper was also very hard to zip!!
Didn't wear it, it was too tight in the rib cage which is pretty strange for me!

The print on this dress is totally eye catching and gardened many compliments. However I needed to wear with a shrug to mask the gaping top - top was very large and ill fitted. I was surprised as I have rented this designer before with good results. As with most dresses with embellishment near the zipper it is hard to close over the beading without assistance. Unique piece, but I would not rent again. Try it on first if you can.
Very pretty and unique! Even more vibrant in person. I think a 4 would've been perfect. Didn't get to wear it - it was obviously too big.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful in person, bright colors, but runs large
links_reviews_text: Loved the fun print on this dress (and the pockets) but I really should have returned it for another size. the top felt like it ran very large and the straps ended up being about 1.5 inches too long on me. I will say, it's more beautiful in person. The fabric has some sparkle, and the waist band is crystals. I would rent again, and for sure size down on this one.

I wore this for a work event and it was perfect and got lots of compliments. The fit is more of a sheath though which generally isn't flattering for me. So I went with the smaller size to try to add a little curve. Cute and appropriate but personally wouldn't rent again.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for my boyfriend's graduation and it was almost perfect
links_reviews_text: This dress looks black in all of the pictures, but it's actually a dark navy blue. It's a satin like material. It was super cold in the morning, so I wore it with a black cardigan. I usually wear a size 8, but decided to wear my backup 6 because the scalloped arm piece (next to my armpit) stuck out and didn't lay flat against my skin. Other than that, it was a great dress and I got lots of compliments on it!
Feminine and sassy. Great length and nice deep navy color. Highly recommend.

I wore this dress to a formal event and received lots of compliments. I usually wear a 2 or 4 depending on the fit, I wore the size four only because there was a mistake and the size 2 didn't ship. The size 4 worked but the size 2 would have fit better under the arms. The material is very soft and comfortable, I would definitely wear this dress again.
I rented this dress for a fall wedding and it was perfect. The material is thick and has a great liner. The scalloped edging was the perfect detail.
Saving this for another wear. Fabric doesn't wrinkle so it would be a good dress to pack.

The color was great and the scallop detail was great but it was tight in the hips with the underneath slit.. and I don't have large hips. Overall it worked and got lots of complements, just know that it is small in hip area.
Fabric is soft and stretchy and neckline was very flattering. A little thick for a NYC summer but otherwise loved it.

This was my backup dress for a wedding and I'm so glad I chose it! The fabric has a slight sheen to it and definitely amped up the "glam" factor to it. It fit great, was loose enough to dance in, and received many compliments. I'd buy this dress to have as a staple in my wardrobe!

I have large boobs for my body (I'm a 32DD and a size 4) so I was a little nervous about the 4 being too small. I went up a size to a 6 and it fit great! Awesome day-to-night dress. Wore it to work then a cocktail party afterwards.
Comfy! True to size! Fit my larger chest and still www flattering on the rest of my body!

links_reviews_title: Great Quality & a bit of shine to stand out
links_reviews_text: Fit was a a bit tight around the chest, but that didn't keep me from wearing the dress. I wore it to a work holiday party. I felt great all night-- was conservative enough for a work event on top, but still showed my shoulders, which was nice. The bottom wasn't too tight, or too short, which made it perfect for this type of event. The dress is made of thick, soft, satin material, so it kept its structure, but was still comfortable. It laid flat all night and no concerns with creasing/ wrinkles! The scallops and neckline added an beautiful and classy touch to this LBD. Would definitely wear & rent again!

links_reviews_title: I new twist on the LBD - Little Black Dress. I love the scalloped halter neckline.
links_reviews_text: This dress was snug on me, but manageable. It's meant for a very slender person. The length was perfect for my 5'2" height. The hemline was about 3" above mid-knee.
dress was great

links_reviews_title: Just the right amount of everything
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for the black tie wedding I attended. It was not revealing and the length hit just above my knee. The scallop accent was adorable. Received lots of compliments!
This dress was simply amazing! It fit well and was such great quality that I was blown away!

links_reviews_title: Great dress and got lots of compliments! Will rent this again!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit a bit snug but still very comfortable Loved it
Material is so soft and thick! Great for the fall with a nice peacoat! I had gotten so many comments! I felt very pretty!
I wasn't sure if a 6 or 8 would be better so I went with the larger size. It fit ok, would have been better smaller, it was a bit large in the chest/under the arms.
This was cute. Thicker fabric, so that was nice. The neckline and around the arms was a little loose, so it was gaping a but. Overall quite flattering and comfortable to wear. Modest and classy.

This dress was really unique with the scalloped neckline and silk like material (much different in person). Very flattering fit. I am pretty reliably a size 8, and rented the 6 and the 8. The 8 well in the hips, but was baggy in the top (I have a small chest)- the strapless bra I wanted to wear looked funny against the material, so I wore pasties instead, and went with the size 6. The size 6 was somewhat snug in the hips and chest, but not uncomfortable and still flattering. Normally I would be the first to wear baggy over snug, but somehow this dress was still super flattering in the size 6! I hope I have a reason to rent it again soon.

links_reviews_title: Great for work and cocktail hour!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress - perfect for both work and cocktail hour! The fabric is a thick satiny material that looked dressy but comfortable at the same time. Fit was great made me look slim!
Great fit but the breast area is smal for someone with larger breasts
The neckline and fabric are fantastic. Dress is fitted, but not tight by any means.

Pretty, scuba material. Got this for my daughter and she looked great, but she wasn't wild about it. If you have long hair and wear it long over your shoulder, it covers up the scallop detail, so it just becomes a simple navy sheath dress. But still nice.
I usually wear a size 2 or 4 in dresses, I ordered both of those sizes in this dress, and both were too large.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and easy to dress up
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner and it was perfect. Very easy to dress up with nicer jewelry. I'm 6' and it wasn't too short either! My boyfriend thinks I should buy it.
Runs a bit small. I'm a 38D and usually wear a 10 for most dresses but the bust was tighter than expected. Zipper took a little bit of extra effort to go up the dress as well
The soft silk feel and deep navy color of this adorable halter dress was perfect for a summer evening wedding! It didn’t reveal any perspiration or makeup smears and went well with a nude heel.

I received a lot compliments on the dress. It fit well in the shoulder and chest area. I wish it didn't look as baggy in the middle in pics, which made me look bigger than I am. Overall, I was happy with it. I ordered an 8 and 10 and wore the 8!

I am between a 4-6, This was too form fitting for my large hips because it's straight down fitting. It fit but I felt it looked too small and didn't wear. Would definitely need a 6, but then top may be too big. Super cute though!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a summer beach wedding!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit true to size, material was a little thick which made it hot in the sun but overall awesome Dress and would gladly rent again!

links_reviews_title: I did not wear the dress.
links_reviews_text: It did not fit me right around the shoulders and under the bust. Too loose. I did not wear it.

Nice dress! Definitely order a size or 2 down, it runs very large. With that being said, it’s not skin tight and gives you a little extra room in the middle to dance around! I wore my hair down with this dress but I would recommend wearing an updo with it to show off the scalloped sides on top (my hair pretty much covered them in every picture).

Rare is it that one can wear a dress that doesn't wrinkle (almost scuba like material), is comfortable, neither too short or too long, neither too loose or too tight, but this dress checks all the boxes. It was a pleasure to wear and got plenty of compliments on it!
oddly gapped at the shoulders. cute dress though.
Gorgeous dress. Perfect for in the office with a blazer. Take off the jacket to reveal some stunning scallops in the evening.

links_reviews_title: mterial was great but heavy for the summer
links_reviews_text: great length for work

I am typically a size zero but i really liked the style and thought i would try it. Was too big and i didnt like it as much as the photo so i ended up not wearing it. Was also a bit wrinkly when i got it
Simple dress that just wasn't flattering on me. The scalloped part laid funny and dress was a lil right

Received so many compliments on this dress. I wore short heels as it was exactly floor length. I would have needed a long for 3 inch heels. I needed to use boob tape to keep it secure as the material is very silky. I did NOT need to wear spanx!! The dress hides everything. Overall an awesome dress. I would wear this again.

I received so many compliments and felt great in this dress. The material is light and looks high quality. Only con- I am larger chested and did feel a bit too revealing while dancing. It required a lot of fashion tape so would recommend for a smaller chest unless you are comfortable showing a little cleavage!
This dress fit perfectly true to size and offered a perfect dress for our formal event. I received tons of compliments at the event and even at work from colleagues who saw pictures.
This dress is the best. It fits like a glove, is silky soft and so dreamy.
I chose colored gowns first, but this really fit the bill for a black tie work event. I'm 5'7", 125 lbs... with a medium nude heel, the SL was perfect for me.
Low cut, so use fashion tape. :)

I tried on many dresses at the Georgetown store but this was hands down the most comfortable, elegant and easy dress to wear to a black tie wedding. The neckline is so flattering and i was able to wear a regular bra! I have very broad shoulders and this fit perfectly highlighted my shape and draped beautifully over my curves. It didn't wrinkly and I LOVED the small zippers on the sleeves. Very unexpected but useful when the dance floor heated up! I recommend a statement necklace or earrings!

links_reviews_title: Didn't choose this dress for the event
links_reviews_text: I ordered three dresses for an event to be sure I would have one that worked; I did not choose to wear this dress. It fit well in the waist and hips, but was far too large in the bodice/chest. Would have been lovely if my chest were larger!

This dress worked out perfectly for my formal event and I received so many compliments throughout the evening. With any off the shoulder dress, It was not the most comfortable and felt pretty restrictive, however, in the short time I wore it I was able to manage and still eat, drink and dance the night away. Being in between sizes 4 and 6, I opted for size 4 due to my smaller bust size and it worked out well for me.
Loved the fabric, beautiful dress. Has a little bit of give to us, so it hugs curves. Perfect for a more conservative event.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, very flattering. I had compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: The arms are a bit tight and difficult to raise your arm at all. In the picture it looks tight at the top, but it must just be the way I am standing, it was very comfortable and true to size.

This dress was perfect for my company holiday party. It was a bit of a struggle to get it zipped, but once in place, the dress fit comfortably all night. I was able to dance, sit, eat (and use the ladies' room!) without issue. There was a bit of a tear in the lace in the back, but it wasn't noticeable due to the pattern. The lining was peeking out a bit at the bottom, but it was easily fixed with some safety pins. Hated to send this one back!

links_reviews_title: Really great dress - we joked that I rented a straight jacket but fashion over function! Loved this
links_reviews_text: Fit well for 5'7", 143lbs, straight-bodied, athletic build.

links_reviews_title: This was worn to a celebration of 300 years since Blackbeard arrived in North Carolina
links_reviews_text: It fit great...they only hard part was zipping up without someone being there to help

links_reviews_title: Very easy and uncomplicated to order, receive and to send back. Would use this service again.
links_reviews_text: It was very pretty and worked well for the Spanish Romance themed event. The arms were very tight and I think ladies with a larger bust then me would struggle being comfortable in this dress. I did get many compliments on it though and i enjoyed it a lot.

links_reviews_title: The fit of the dress was perfect! I got a ton of compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: It was true to size.

I wore this to a day time opera show and received so many compliments. I felt stunning wearing it, and the dress was a great combination of conservative and still youthful because of the off-shoulder. It was a nice material that was perfect for keeping me comfortable inside the theatre. I have broad shoulders, and it didn't feel too restricting to me. It is a beautiful dress!

links_reviews_title: Everything said about this dress is true!
links_reviews_text: Possibly the most flattering dress I've ever worn in my life plus, seriously, it was not uncomfortably constricting because the material has a little stretch. Yet, it also covers bulges because of the double layer. Wore to a spring wedding. No bra needed, but gals with bigger chests might need one. Fit was great. I did not yank the chest up once all night. I have arms on the bigger side & yes sleeves were snug but not unwearably so. The close fit makes the arms photograph well.
This is a great dress. It fits true to size and is very forgiving. Rent it!!!

I wore this for a formal charity auction event in the fall. It was a standout dress and the length made it a little more conservative and perfect perfect for a charity event. Decided to wear it with cranberry red heels. Lined.

I absolutely loved this dress! Worked perfectly with a strapless bra. The pattern and colors were beautiful for the holiday season and the Spanish inspired sleeves added extra flair! I would definitely recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: Received lots of great compliments, sexy but classy!
links_reviews_text: Although the arm movement is restrictive, it's a striking dress and show-stopper. One thing I will say is that it was a little on the "worn" side with threads out and a couple of holes but it was not noticeable. Overall, a great dress for a holiday party.

Words cant express how much I loved wearing this dress! Initially, I was disappointed bc I received an email saying that it was no longer available. I was sent a backup dress, however, when I opened up the bag, they had sent this dress in a size 2 instead of a 4 as originally requested. By the grace of God, the size 2 fit! The arms were a little tight like most reviews said but it wasnt problematic at all. I do believe the arms wouldve been perfect in the size 4. I was able to dance without any problems and felt amazing in the dress. I cannot recommend this dress enough- so many compliments!! I an actually considering renting this dress again just because I can! This is one I would love to own. Dont hesitate if youre on the fence, just rent it and see for yourself!
This dress did not compliment my body type. The colors also made me look paler than I was. I didn't particularly like this dress for myself.

Loved this dress so much. The only I would advise is that the arms are very tight compared to the overall fit, so when I first tried on, I assumed I would need a larger size. But the rest of it fit perfectly and had a lot of give. So if you can manage a tighter arm (which eventually stretched a little,) definitely get this dress. I got so many compliments at the gala I attended!

The dress doesn't have much give, definitely order a size up. The top of the dress stayed put and didn't slip throughout the night, but I wasn't able to lift my arms past my shoulders. The dress photographed well. It accentuates your curves and depending on your body, you might need to use some shapewear.

links_reviews_title: Fun wedding in September in Michigan held both inside and outside.
links_reviews_text: This dress runs very small. I wore the size 12 as it was much more comfortable and looked great. I work out and liked the "off the shoulder" look for my age, 56, without being too flashy.

links_reviews_title: The dress looked great and was super comfy. You won't run into anyone else wearing this. Recommend!!
links_reviews_text: Pros - looks amazing, fits somewhat snug. Cons - you can't raise your arms & fit is tight across shoulders.

Very nice dress, requires shapewear for sure. I'm between a 10/12 & the 12 was comfortable. The shoulders fit me a little weird though. I'm short, wish this was just a teeny bit shorter, but still, a beautiful dress, perfect for a fall wedding.

As with most of off the shoulder tops, it's a little restrictive. The fabric flatters any body shape. Suits a simple shoe. I wore it with a cloak blazer as it's hard to wear with a jacket with sleeves.

I love this dress ... and I even wore it in the summer for an event I did. It looks great on stage + it's super flattering. The color is stunning and I felt so comfortable in it. Love this dress and would def wear again! I got a TON of compliments as well ... it also photographed so well. Fun dress!
Cons- fought the straps In the back showing all night Pros- beautiful elegant dress
Perfect fit. True to size. The top didn't budge on the dance floor. Tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress and got tons of compliments. It was fashionable, comfortable, and classy!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. My arm movement was a bit restricted, but I only noticed while dancing. The fabric is form fitting but stretchy and forgiving because of the material.

links_reviews_title: I have put on weight so my closet was lacking. Got a ton of complements
links_reviews_text: It was flattering and stayed up well. The only problem was that RTR had not checked the dress completely and there had been a tear on the arm that had been poorly repaired and was torn when I put it on. I had to do a quick (equally poor) job of sewing up the hole so it was not obvious.

links_reviews_title: Love this sassy red Spanish inspired dress! It hit all the curves in the right places.
links_reviews_text: This dress fits tight but is still able to fit and accentuate curves, in the front and the back. I wore this to a Mexican wedding, picture maracas, mariachis and lots of Spanish music- this dress fit right in and was so fun to dance in. The only con is the zipper is really sensitive- thankfully a friend of mine is a great seamstress and was able to work thru it to get the dress on, or else I would have been a nervous reck.
It was a little hard to dance because of the sleeves but it didn't matter. This dress was awesome and made me feel great. Definitely different than other dresses at this wedding! I felt very saucy.

links_reviews_title: Flamenco flare for Iowa family affair
links_reviews_text: Showstopper fabric and sleeves! If you wanna show your collarbone, this is the dress. Perfect mix of sophistication and sass. Expect a tight fit in the biceps---it keeps the dress up and in place. But I was still able to polka and do the chicken dance with the best of 'em. Overall fit is impeccable and pretty body-con but fabric has enough stretch to allow a comfortable wear session--- just don't expect to be fist-pumping in a mosh pit. Loved this dress so much. A spray tan is the perfect accessory, along with some rad earrings. Wore to my parents 50th wedding anniversary celebration.

links_reviews_title: Dress was tight but forgiving and fun for a night on the town!
links_reviews_text: I ordered the dress in a 2 and a 4 and ended up wearing the 2. Wore this to our NYE dinner and felt fabulous and pretty the whole night through. The flutter sleeve added just enough drama and loved that the sleeves were more of a sheer lace (made for a great contrast and made it feel a bit more sexy!). The dress runs very true to size and I probably should have went with the 4 on the night of... but wanted that extra tight look so did the 2 instead. This dress is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit. I'm almost 60 and was worried it might be a bit tight...it fit beautifully.
links_reviews_text: Sleeves were snug fitting but I was able to dance w/o any constraints (you'd have difficulty sinking basketballs as it does impede upper ward movement of arms) LOL

True to size. A little baggy through the middle but was still flattering. Long enough to feel conservative but the off the shoulder style gave it a sexy feel. Perfect for my holiday Christmas party. Pics make it look navy and red but it is really black and red. Loved it!
Felt like an Italian socialite in this dress! Great stretch fabric made is super comfortable. The bell sleeves and romantic print make it a head turner. Wanted to keep this one! Simply gorgeous.

links_reviews_title: I felt dignified in this retro style!
links_reviews_text: PROS- Beautiful dress! Elegant length! CONS- Very difficult to move in. There was ZERO movement in the arms due to tightness across the shoulders which made the dress uncomfortable. Picture perfect but in reality, an uncomfortable dress.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress with a great fit! Loved it! I'm 5'7", 125ish lbs and size 4 fit like a dream. Get it!
links_reviews_text: See above comments

links_reviews_title: got so many compliments! really unique dress
links_reviews_text: fit like a glove.

The fit was great! I got the 4 for backup, and it was just a bit too loose in the back. I needed help zipping it up, however. The sleeves limit arm movement, which was a bit tricky for dinner at The Melting Pot, but I still managed. Love this dress! Great combination of sexy and sophisticated. My husband loved it as well!

links_reviews_title: New Years Eve dress with a Flamenco flair!
links_reviews_text: This dress was gorgeous and had beautiful detail. The top fit well on my small arms, but the bottom fell a bit flat and didn't show as well as the top.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress. I wore dress on Christmas Eve and received many compliments
links_reviews_text: This was my first rental from RTR. I ordered a size 2 & 4. Size 2 was too tight in the arms, size 4 fit perfect. I will definately use RTR again. So easy and so many choices of beautiful dresses.

This dress is so pretty and fun! I wore it out on a dinner date for my husband's birthday and also out for another random date night. You can dress it up with fancy heels, and add a pop of color that way as well. I chose my yellow stappy heels and it worked perfectly. The back is open, but secures at the top and bottom with cute ties and I thought that the front would be too revealing, but because you can tie the back, you don't end up showing cleavage (and I have a decent sized chest...). I plan to purchase this dress because it just needs to be rotation for dates, happy hours with the girls, and brunches!
This adorable dress was great for a bachelorette party. Fabric is sturdy. It fits my small waist and wide hips quite nicely. It is short though LOL
Loved the open back. Didn’t love the sleeves.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit and so comfortable. Perfect for my work event. A great dress!
links_reviews_text: True to size and very well made.
Love this dress, very flattering and great back
Great dress if you don't want to wear a bra. I'm a 34D, 5'3", 150lbs, hourglass body shape and the medium size fit me perfectly!! Definitely a little short, so if you're tall, be careful!
Little big in the bust area since didn't wear a bra (back is open) but incredibly cute!! I bought it

Rented this as a back up for high school daughter's homecoming dress and it fit much better than the first choice. darling, sophisticated but still young. There is a small tie at the back of the neck and another at the back of the waist which really help in fitting. I did Pin the deep v neck for modesty and when worn with simple jewelry it was very appropriate, could be very sassy if you want!! Daughter didn't need a bra as the dress fit well but I imagine you would need a stick of scenario.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but didn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: The dress was cute but the top part was way too big. Did not wear it.

This looked great on my 4'10" frame. The adjustable top was awesome at preventing gaping armholes. Probably not good for someone with a small chest. I didn't wear a bra and felt like I had a hard time filling out the top, which never happens. The fit of the dress was so perfect it didn't matter.
fun flirty party dress perfect for summer events
Love this dress the style is flattering the only con is you can't wear a bra

5'3" and 34DD make this dress super revealing on top half, which if it's your style will be perfect and super flattering, but i just didn't feel comfortable showing massive cleavage (despite how great they looked) was short but good length if using for cocktail or special event with heels
fit very nice and open back makes it a little sexy

links_reviews_title: I'm an aesthetics nurse- all of my patients complimented me on this! Appropriate but cute
links_reviews_text: Love
Dress seemed way more casual than it had looked online. Kind of an odd fit with the open back and the ties around the waist and neck. Pretty material though.
I received many compliments on it, and even with my large bust this dress fit perfectly! didn't need to wear a bra.

links_reviews_title: Ruffle sleeves are a fun touch.

links_reviews_text: I received so many compliments in this dress. It fits very comfortably and has thick fabric to hide imperfections. Probably not good for hot and humid weather, though.

What an accelerated sheath fit dress. Loved the ruffle sleeves and "Tail" I am 5'2 and wore with 3-4 inch ankle boot heels the ruffle that flows down was maybe 1-2 inches from the ground this way. Paired with sweater tights to keep me warm during the snowy winter. Possibly going to buy because it's a LOOOKKK

I wore this to dinner on my first night in Paris. I was worried about the length based on other reviews indicating it was too short, but I found it to be just the right length. It is flowy enough that it makes up for it being on the short side. I ended up liking it much more than I was expecting to!

Its extremely comfortable. Gets many compliments, can be worn day and night. I network in it, conference in it and date in it. I've rented it twice, next time i'm not sending it back. Which means i should probably buy if before i post this review.

links_reviews_title: Elegant and comfortable for an all day work event!!
links_reviews_text: Overall a great dress, very pretty, elegant and easy to wear. The ruffles are a very subtle detail and add just the right amount of interest without being fussy or too big on your shoulders. Even the ruffle "tail" is super cute and does not get in the way when sitting or walking. The dress is a little short, if you like to feature your legs, this is a great attribute. Unless you are a contortionist you may need a little help with the zipper, but it is super easy to get up (unlike SO many other dresses :) Very good rental!!

links_reviews_title: The most compliments I've ever received for a dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress arrived very wrinkled and I was initially concerned that I couldn't salvage it in time for the bridal shower that I rented it for, but it steamed easily. It fit true to size but is a straight shift shape so is roomier in the waist and hips but not overwhelming for my 5'2" frame. I love it so much that I ended up also wearing for a work event and received nonstop compliments all day!

I received this is a replacement and am so glad!! I wasn't too sure about the ruffle tail thing but it transforms when you put it on. It is short but I don't mind showing off my legs. The only reason I wore the large was it fit me slight better in my broad shoulders. I'd say rent your true size. Fun and different you won't be disappointed!

links_reviews_title: I wanted to buy this dress!
links_reviews_text: When I picked up my arms, the dress came up. I was careful at church, but it was great for lunch!
This dress was super cute and I got lots of compliments! Loved the fit! Loose but feminine
Beautiful dress a bit short but great style!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for Easter Brunch! It was the perfect "in between weather" dress that looked Spring-y
links_reviews_text: I LOVE this dress! I could've definitely done the size small, but it was so short I sized up for length and am glad I did. The medium made the length more doable, although you definitely don't want to bend over in this! The color is perfect, the sleeves so pretty, very flattering and totally perfect for Easter brunch!

I rented this through Unlimited for Easter Sunday. I had my eye on it for awhile but was unsure of the fit but I caved because of the color and detail. I LOVED the blush color and detailing of the fabric. It zips up the back and is incredibly comfortable. It's not form fitting at all and made me look boxier than I am but for the occasion it worked for me. I'm a 34D, 5'2 and 125.
Perfect little dress.
Loved the look, wished that it had more of a shape to the dress. but it was comfortable and fun.

links_reviews_title: Great feminine dress in blush for an outdoor wedding or office party!
links_reviews_text: Love the feminine flourishes on this dress along the arm and down one side. Although they hung down they never got in the way of moving. Fairly short but not uncomfortably. I would definitely love to own this piece.
This dress aas a showstopper! I wish i could keep it! The only problem was getting it off, my lats are too big. So if you work out and have a decent amount of miscle you might want to size up.

Wore this to work christmas dinner. So comfortable!!!!!! Runs true to size, slightly short as previous reviews stated, but nothing major. Did not need any special undergarments (no spanx!) and wore a regular bra. Flirty and fun!
I was so happy this fit me during third trimester pregnancy. I sized up. Material is comfy and stretchy for your growing belly. Very happy with this dress and would rent again post pregnancy.

links_reviews_title: Impressive doesnt look cheap or unflattering
links_reviews_text: Material is light but totally lined giving an expensive feel. Shape looks boxy but its quite flattering. Keeper

This dress is SHORT. I'm 5'8" and this dress almost showed my booty. I couldn't raise my arms all the way up or else everything down there would be showing. I had to be super careful when getting in and out of the car, sitting and dancing. It was at least 2 inches shorter than I would have preferred, but it was a beautiful dress and it fit well. I usually wear a medium and the medium fit perfectly - and not tight in the arms at all! The pink color was definitely more muted than I though it would be. I probably won't rent this dress again.
This dress fit well. I had several unexpected compliments!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Pink for my Baby Shower
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress! I wore this for a double baby shower my best friend and I were having. As I am having a girl, my main priority was to find a chic pink dress to wear. This Alexis dress did not disappoint! I received many compliments on it and absolutely loved the details on the arms. It was very comfortable (which is becoming increasingly important these days!) - I wore a size M (pre-maternity I would have ordered a S) and it fit my 26 week bump perfectly. The only complaint I have is that the material wrinkles very easily. Even so, I would definitely rent this again!
So far one of my fav unlimited rentals. Fit was true to size. Hid problem areas. Was a tad tight in the chest (D cup). But it was gorgeous

links_reviews_title: Sophisticated Fun for a daytime wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so pretty and easy to wear. I went to a Sunday brunch wedding and it was perfect: classic with an exciting twist. The fabric is light which made the longer sleeves a non issue in 75°+ weather. There isn't any give/stretch to this fabric so it was difficult to get off (mostly in the shoulders) but only when I was taking it off or trying to zip it. It fits loosely which is great for any kind of bloating (or just eating in general) and is pretty true to size. If you're flip flopping between sizes, go a size up. The loose fit makes it easier to go up, but could be right in the arms if you go a size down.

links_reviews_title: Appropriate dress for Engagement dinner with the fam
links_reviews_text: This was a cute dress...heavy polyester material, trendy blush color with ruffles. I'm a 34DD, size 6 and the M fit fine. I'm 5'7 and it's a little short but manageable. Wore with nude strappy heels and stud earrings...not to take away from the dress.

Wish I could have kept this dress. Can definitely be worn dresses up or down. Very comfortable as well. Fabric was not sheer but still was breathable. I wasn't hot at all. I am a size 2 which is usually an XS and is what I wore. I had the small just in case. The XS fit perfectly! A little snug when taking it off and putting it on, but I was still able to do it on my own.
Wore this to a Confirmation. Got so many compliments! It is tighter around the bust but does flow nicely. I love the fabric that ruffles down the side. Would totally wear this again!
Wore this to my daughters first birthday party. It was flirty and fun. But also so comfy to wear! Would highly recommend!

The dress was my backup and it was perfect. I wore it to a work gala and i got lots of compliments. It's a very forgiving dress that distracts from problem areas. I felt sexy and confident in it, even though I'm still getting my post baby body back. I paired it with high heels and a statement necklace. It's a tad short, so make sure you're comfortable wearing a short dress. Would rent it again!
Very comfortable dress, loose cut, romantic and chic. Got a lot of attention!
Loved this! Color and ruffle detail are on trend for Spring/Summer. Fit was true to size. Perfect for night out. Would rent again.
I wore this dress to dinner and a show in Vegas. It is classy and fun. This short playful number stands out in the crowd. Oh! And the ruffles! So gorgeous.
I rented this for a 2pm early March wedding. I ordered a small but it was too large. I did not end up wearing this
This dress is fabulous! Comfy, fun! Love the ruffles. Fit is TTS. Would definitely rent again!

Ruffles Galore!! This style was so fun and different, it ran true to size and I would reccomend sizing one size down for your backup size. It is fitted at the bust so I would recommend this style for anyone sizes A-C. The shape of this dress was not fitted, it was not fitted in the hips and the fabric did not have a lot of stretch. You can 100% wear it with a regular bra, spans or shape wear would be with ensuring no lines are seen through the fabric, but seamless panties would work as well! The fabric has some stretch to it, the best body types for this style are Apple, Hourglass, Athletic, Petite, Straight & Narrow. I would wear this style on a date, an evening work event, or formal brunch. In the winter I would pair it with dark accessories, grey, black or dark purple. In the spring I would stick to nude tones, rose gold and cream accessories. I would also recommend simple jewelry, no major statement pieces as the ruffles are certainly the focal point of this style.
Beautiful design, color and fabric
Great dress. Belted it w boots. Cute cute.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, not suited to me
links_reviews_text: Was expecting more of a loose straight cut tunic style, but unfortunately for me it clung in all the wrong places. Wasn't able to wear in the end
Love the dress and got many compliments.
Fit great, good material, and great color! Received lots of compliments. The only thing is it doesn't have a zipper
Went w the the sleek comfortable fit even though my oscomy ring wafer is visible. The dress was too pretty to care . Will rent again

links_reviews_title: I rented this for my my Big 50
links_reviews_text: The fit is great, and the color is awesome
So comfortable!
Fits like a glove... like a tight glove that shows all the curves. Haha. But really, it's a beautiful dress and I felt so pretty.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress and color, I loved the style, cut and fit on this one,
links_reviews_text: Fits like a glove!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress! So comfortable and fit perfectly.
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing. It is very comfortable and elegant. I received so many compliments and felt amazing. I wore a strapless bra and underwear underneath and the fabric was thick enough to conceal it. It was also really hot in the event but no sweat marks showed through. The regular length was a perfect length with 2 inch heels.
Beautiful color. Comfortable. Material has stretch. Easy to move and dance in. Multiple compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: The color & fit made me a happy girl!
links_reviews_text: I like that I could wear a regular bra. Very comfortable! Felt like a Barbie Doll.
I am 5'9 and oddly, the long felt shorter than the regular in a different dress by the same designer, so keep that in mind. I adored this dress regardless. Fabric is magic.

links_reviews_title: So cute I didn't want to return!
links_reviews_text: This was my first time using rent the runway and I was impressed. The reviews were so helpful for sizing, the dress was perfect. It is quite tight, so you have to find the right underwear. The dress did come with a few marks so that's the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars. Beautiful pink color

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, comfortable dress. Runs true to size and a bit short. Make sure to step into the gown!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous, comfortable gown in bright pink! Runs true to size. Make sure you step into the dress rather than trying to pull it over your head. This neoprene material is super comfortable. I ended up wearing a black dress instead because I had eaten too many cookies over the holidays and wasn't crazy about my stomach showing in this pink dress. But I can't wait to rent again in the future! I am usually a size 10 at chest and size 8 at waist and hips (5'8", 156 lbs, 36C). This dress in size 10 Long (46L) fit perfectly, albeit a bit short with 3" heels.
Fit like a glove

links_reviews_title: I was elegantly attired for an unforgettable evening. Great friends, good music and lots of memories
links_reviews_text: Dynamic, bold hot pink color was flattering for my complexion and caught everyone's eye comfortable material with ample stretch for movement.
Nice thick stretchy material. Don't even have to wear a bra:) fits so nice!!

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and material is thick and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a theater awards show. The color definitely stood out amongst a sea of black!
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 6, and the 42 L fit perfectly with 4-inch heels. This was, by far, the most comfortable formal dress I've ever worn! The fabric is heavy enough to cover imperfections but also stretchy and forgiving. I got so many compliments!!
Was a great dress I definitely stood out but wear spanx no matter what. It's shows every nook and cranny

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for an upscale wedding
links_reviews_text: So on the day before a fancy wedding, I found the RTR store in Washington, DC. Katie helped me find the perfect dress! Not only did this dress fit like a glove but it was also comfortable! It was a heavier material which got warm in the D.C. heat. And I did have to wear some slimming Spanx because you could see EVERY line under the dress. It was the perfect mixture of sassy and sexy without being too much. I added a flowy cover up to make it a little more casual and hide all the details you could see under the dress. I got SO MANY compliments on the dress which made me want to never take it off! Overall, another fantastic RTR find!

links_reviews_title: Pink dream - felt like a glamorous barbie.
links_reviews_text: Pretty bright pink gown with neat top cutouts. Extremely comfortable. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: perfect fit & color for a summer formal wedding! i received so many compliments! loved it!!
links_reviews_text: no cons! Im truly happy i went with this dress for this occasion...

links_reviews_title: I felt like a celebrity in this dress!
links_reviews_text: It's a spandex type material that forms to your body. It's breathable yet structured enough to give you a nice shape. It fit me well. I was also very comfortable and the color was amazing!
Very stretch material with no zippers. Material is thick enough so as to not be see through. The color is vibrant!
I'm 5'6 and ordered a long. The length was perfect. Loved the fit and color.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful pink dress for spring/summer formal events!
links_reviews_text: This dress for great buy you definitely need to wear a Spanx undergarment with it as will show it all! I gave it 3 stars because it was a little short... I am 5'8" and it was really a little on the short side with 3" heels.
Fabric was comfortable and dress was flattering.
This dress fits like a glove. I usually wear a 14 and wore a 50. I have a generous bust and it was very forgiving. Only problem was it was too short. I bought a regular and I'm 5'6. I needed a long.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable Hugs your body in all of the right places!
links_reviews_text: Amazing fit and color
Beautiful and form fitting. I felt like a star! Totally reccommend. It is true to size and is a very thick material that helps to hide flaws ;)
This dress was AMAZING! The color, material, cut, etc are FANTASTIC! This was one of if not my most favorite dress I have ever rented from RTR!

Rented this for a wedding. Great color and cut, but it is revealing in the waist area, but still very flattering. Just wear spanx to smooth it out. Or get get one size up just in case. It also stretches so you can use your moves on the dance floor! Amazing how many ladies use rent the runway now! So glad I didn't see anyone in my dress! I got lots of compliments however and was thrilled my husband and I got a good photo together. I would definitely recommend this dress.
This dress fits exactly as recommended! Highly recommend it! I received lots of compliments! I used a backless strapless bra to avoid bra bulge in the back.

The color is stunning and received compliments all night long! I am 5'2, 115 lbs 40R was nice and snug. Runs small so when in doubt go up a size. This dress is very figure hugging but will make you stand out!
I didnt end up wearing because accidentally received the long instead of regular and it was too long! I think the regular would have been perfect!

I am actually not sure if I had the 40 or 42. Once I took them off the hanger couldn't tell which was which. I think this one was slightly less tight and probably was the 42. Only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 was that with heels it was a bit short and I'm only 5'4". So get the long if you are wearing high heels and my height or taller. I am between a 4 or 6 depending on dress style/ brand. Another tip is make sure your Spanx is completely seamless! I had to buy a new one because every detail of my spanx showed. I've never had so many complements on a dress before! The color, the strap detail, it was a hit. Definitely recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Hugs all the right places and as comfy as it is pretty! Great dress!
links_reviews_text: The too of this dress rocks! And this stretchy fabric will keep you comfortable all night. The only thing I would suggest is if you are on the taller side, definitely go with a long because it does run a little short. I got the 40L and 42L. Ended up wearing the 42L for the extra length. Overall, this is a fantastic dress, got compliments all night!
fit like a glove. didn't need to wear a bra. will show panty lines. short but good for me since i'm 5'2"

links_reviews_title: Worn to an evening wedding in downtown Nashville.
links_reviews_text: I ordered the 46r and 48r and could have worn the 46 but went with the 48 so that I would be more comfortable. In a formal dress I would usually wear an 8-10. It was August and an outdoor venue so it was very hot and humid. The material is heavy and may have been too heavy for August but I really liked the stretch of the material and that it had no zipper. It was very comfortable and and allows for dancing, bending down, picking up kids, etc. I am 5’3 at best and was able to wear it with 3 inch heels.
The dress was awesome! Very comfortable and thick to hide any bra lines.

links_reviews_title: OBSESSED. IN LOVE. WANTED TO WEAR IT FOR THE REST OF MY LIFE.
links_reviews_text: I'm absolutely in love with this gem of a dress and never wanted to give it back! It fit like a glove and was so incredibly comfortable. The material is stretchy, but not too loose. I'm 5'8" and love to eat ALL of the snacks. So, I have more to love in my mid-section, but the material was thick and stretchy enough I didn't have to squeeze into Spanx. I wore 2-3 inch heels, which worked perfectly with the 42 L. The dress hit before the end of the heels, so no tripping potential. That was a major plus because I'm clumsy as can be! :) I'm not busty at all, but the dress was still flattering with the fun cut-outs. The bright pink color was too much fun, and it even worked well with me being pale and too lazy to get a spray tan. I wore this to cover the CMA Awards in Nashville. You know you're doing something right if country superstars and darlings like CAM compliment your style! Don't worry, I quickly informed her it was all thanks to Rent the Runway! Can't thank y'all enough! Such a fantastic night! :)
Great length, quality material. A bit loose around the bust.
My favorite dress I've worn from RTR!
Loved this dress! Very flattering fit, but no stretch. I wore this while 5 months postpartum and it helped hold everything in for me. I would totally wear this again, loved the length and side slits
Ran a tad bit small (in the back) but overall fit great! The material / print is so nice. I got so many compliments and felt so comfortable in this dress!! The color also really pops!
I LOVED this dress! It runs a little small so I'd size up! Very flattering and a great material!
Dress was easy to move around in. Definitely size up, it felt a bit tight around the ribs.

The medium fit perfectly. It was my backup size, but I figured that I would end up wearing it. It was very comfortable and easy to move around in. A little long, but the length was perfect with a nice pair of heels. I received a lot of compliments and am honestly considering purchasing this!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for an outdoor summer wedding
links_reviews_text: Fits like a glove! Got so many compliments on this dress. The fabric is a bit thicker, so not ideal for summer weddings, but makes the fit really beautiful.

This dress was incredible - super flattering but so easy to wear. I didn't expect to receive so many compliments but the next day my friends kept calling me the "blue dress girl" because people kept asking me about it. I'm a size 4/6 on top and 8 on the bottom, definitely runs a little small. I have a small waist and it was a tad loose but made it very comfortable to wear while still flattering.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a family member's wedding rehearsal dinner. So pretty!
links_reviews_text: Fit absolutely perfect!
Loved the dress but it was snug. Wish I would have gone up a size. I'm busty so getting the top zipped what a struggle. Overall, I loved the dress though and it worked out.

links_reviews_title: Great dress with the perfect color to really pop!
links_reviews_text: It fit great, was easy to move in, and super comfortable to have on for hours. I received so many compliments and the color really stands out. Would definitely rent again and recommend!
love loved this dress!
Loved this dress! The color and texture were special and stood out. It was really comfortable to wear and dance in all night. I would rent again!
Love this dress, beautiful color but runs small. I wear a size 6 and needed help zipping the M.

links_reviews_title: LOVED this dress. Very comfortable and a cool texture.
links_reviews_text: I normally would think I'd be a small, but glad I went with the medium. The slits on the side made it easy to walk/dance in!
The dress was lovely! The fabric is high quality, though it does wrinkle easily. It fits true to size, and definitely benefits from a shaper ;)

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for a formal occasion but still trendy enough to make me feel comfortable.
links_reviews_text: The dress was great. I really liked the structure and the fabric. It is very flattering on a curvy figure.
Fits tight with non-conforming, thick (fully lined) fabric. True mid length dress and would look best with high heels.

This dress was very comfortable and had a great shape to it. It's an eye catching cobalt blue so definitely stands out in a sea of black. The strapless top was super secure - no slipping or tugging throughout the night. The sizing runs a little small - I usually wear a 6 and/or a M. This was the L.
The fabric has some give to it, but overall is very form fitted. I am the type that typically pulls up a strapless dress all night and didn't have to do it once!
This dress was perfect for a wedding. The medium was still slightly snug around my hips, but not uncomfortable. This dress accentuated my curves very nicely.

links_reviews_title: That I had SUCH a fun dress to dance in!
links_reviews_text: I didn't expect it to fit so well based on material for some reason but it fit perfectly and gives you shape. I liked that it went beyond the knee since I'm tall. Beautiful color and loved the style.

Overall the fit was true to size. Initially I was going to not wear a bra with it but after wearing it around for a while I decided to throw on a strapless to help the top stay up. I normally don't have a problem with this as I am a little bustier, but it was definitely more comfortable with a strapless bra on. I am very tall so the length was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Figure hugging, great color, sexy but not over the top.
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a rehearsal dinner. I'm bigger chested so it was a little snug up tight. It did shape my hourglass figure well. Great for a nice evening, might not be the most flexible for dance floors. The fabric is a bit restrictive, and it's also a lined fabric almost like a corduroy.
The color was amazing. Fit was really comfortable! Fabric was thick and the strapless top stayed put all night. LOVE THIS DRESS!

I wore this dress to my husband's semi-formal work gala. I love the length bc it was not too short and not too long. The color was stunning. The material was quality with a crepe-like texture. The dress definitely runs small. I usually wear a size 8 and chose to wear the large. I could have worn the medium but it was just too tight around the mid-section (mom pooch) for me to be comfortable in all evening.

I really liked this dress but it wasn't my favorite rent. The material is actually ribbed which surprised me but was flattering. It was tight in the chest; that actually was a good thing since it naturally sits a little lower on the chest, I felt a little exposed so four stars for this one. Otherwise worked well and received a lot of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Great color, nice length for Formal Wedding
links_reviews_text: 5'6, 135lbs, more athletic build. Usually wear a small or 4. This fit true to size around the waist, hips and butt, and was over all flattering. The length was great for a formal wedding and the slits on the side did not ride up too high when sitting. The top was not great for a smaller chest (34B). While it fit around the top tightly, there was WAY too much fabric in the chest area. I fixed this by taking it in with safety pins underneath the ruffle and wearing a padded bra. The color is beautiful and the material did not wrinkle easily which was great.

It was just a classic great dress with an amazing color and lovely silhouette. I would say it runs a tad bit big but not much. I have pretty big boobs right now as I'm still nursing my baby so they're about 36DD which is why I went with the medium and it worked perfectly. I'm typically a size 4. This was my back up and I'm so glad I got it!

This fabric is thick and ridged, almost like a corduroy. No elasticity. I wore the medium because the small couldn't fit over my hips, but I didn't quite fill the bust of the Medium, even with a padded bra. Lots of adjusting required throughout the night, but it was fun to wear and I felt pretty in the pics :)

links_reviews_title: Statement dress! Size down for small chest?
links_reviews_text: I absolutely LOVED this dress, it was such a statement piece with the gorgeous color and simple lines, but sexy curve-hugging shape. I'm shaped like an XS on top and a Medium in hips, and the Small fit me perfectly. Hips were snug in all the right ways and the fabric has some stretch which is perfect for small waist/wider hips. I wore a sticky bra to stabilize the top - for smaller chested women, I might suggest sizing down. I didn't have to adjust the top too much, but it felt a tiny bit loose.

links_reviews_title: This dress is STUNNING and STRIKING!
links_reviews_text: This dress is absolutely beautiful- the color POPS and I had many compliments on it. Looks best on a taller frame (I'm 5'10"). The dress doesn't have a lot of "give" to it, however (i.e. zero stretch), hence the 4 stars instead of 5. Would rent again!

I absolutely loved this dress! Only issue I had was that Im typically a small, but the small in this dress was way too tight. The medium fit well, but was a little loose in the chest. The middle fit well enough that it never felt like it was going to fall down though! Got compliments all night! Would rent again :)

Loved this dress for a summer wedding. I am 5'9" and wore 3" heels so you need to be in the taller side for this dress. It was right at mid calf for me. The slits make it fun and easy to move in! I would say the fit is true to size. I usually wear a 4-6 and wore the medium. It did slightly stretch as the day went on, but I wore the dress for over 12 hours. The stretch wasn't bad. It just went from slightly tight to comfortable fit around the bust. Definitely would rent again!

Perfect dress for a formal wedding by the beach. I would suggest if you have a larger chest to size up. For reference I'm 5'7 130ish 32d. I'm normally between a S and M and I ended up wearing the M. The S wouldn't zip at my chest. I wore with a bra but that was for comfort, if you have a smaller chest you wouldn't need a bra. Highly recommend this dress, wish I owned it!!

links_reviews_title: Very classy dress, sexy without being revealing (don't mind my bad posture)
links_reviews_text: The dress ran true to size, I wear a small as I normally do

This was amazing for a "black tie optional" wedding. The picture i put up is slightly misleading as the dress came to a bit below my calves. I got so many compliments! It is form fitting but classy. The fabric is amazing and looks fancier than in the display. What looks like a plain dress is actually amazing!
I loved it so much I'm going to rent it for another wedding!

links_reviews_title: Bust fit nice and tight so I didn't have to worry about holding the top up all night.
links_reviews_text: A little long, would not have looked good without heels.

links_reviews_title: Sexy gorgeous dress for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 6, so I ordered the 6 and 8 for my event (I love the free backup size option!). The size was a bit snug and the 8 fit perfectly but the straps were a bit loose - I just tacked them down and it worked great for my event. This dress was GORGEOUS, it was very comfy, and I got so many compliments on it! It was perfect for the wedding I attended on Valentine's Day!!
Hid my stomach nicely! Showed a lot of cleavage (DD) but I got so many compliments! Would wear again!!

I rented this dress based on the other review pictures. It looked lovely on everyone, and certainly did not disappoint. The only reason I gave it 4 stars was the straps kept falling down. I was able to secure them by adding a couple of strategically placed safety pins and fashion tape. After a little bit of work, it was the perfect dress for dancing the night away!
Comfy, elegant, flattering. My only complaint is that the spaghetti straps are very very long. Had to safety pin them to get a proper fit.
Truly a beautiful dress with a very flattering fit. I thought the size 6 fit more like a 4. I'm 135 and 5'4" - the length was perfect with normal heels.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress that got many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to our annual work gala and it was a hit! It has a built-in bra sewn in so you don't need any stick-ons which was great. I'm 5'2" and the 4P was a perfect length with small heels-I was never walking on it. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: So originally i never selected this dress it was sent as my free back up with my original style. I was super bummed last minute the original style i ordered couldn't be mailed to me because it wasn't returned in good condition. So my back up became my main choice. I was upset until I put on this dress. It really was so stunning and the navy was beautiful. It was also awesome not wearing a bra. I have gained some weight recently so it was a little tight but that was on me and not knowing my size

links_reviews_title: Fit was very flattering and I got tons of compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: This was actually my back up dress, but it was the only one that arrived on time for my event day so I had no other choice but to wear it. I was pleasantly surprised at how it looked on! Based on the pictures and reviews it's very hard to tell. I have a very small bust and basically no hips so it's very easy for flowy dresses to look like trash bags on me with no shape. Despite the flowy-ness of this dress it actually gave me some shape and fit like a dream! I could have ordered the long, but the regular worked just fine too.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was great. I felt beautiful in it. I was able to dance and feel comfortable. The straps were big though and kept falling off and I'm only 5'3 so it was long on me but that's normal. Overall it was a great fit.

links_reviews_title: Small on the bust and big on the arms - lots of cleavage. Otherwise, comfortable
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 6-8 but I had to wear a 10 (after trying on a 8 first) just to get this zipped above my breast area. After getting it zipped, I noticed two things: 1) the straps were way too big which meant it didn't hold up as nicely as I'd like and 2) there was way more cleavage than I'm normally comfortable showing. Overall, I'd suggest this for people who either don't have a large chest area or for those who do and want to show cleavage, but if you do, size up. Also, I recommend pairing it with fun shoes and fun earrings -- I did gold studded shoes and blue/gold tie dye hoops

Wasn't sure if I'd need the 4 or the 2, so glad I had the 2 because the 4 was too sloppy in the rib cage/waist. Was a little long for my 5'4" frame, but it didn't interfere with dancing at all! The slit isn't noticeable if standing, but gives comfort while sitting and walking. Would definitely rent again. Only downfall is I wish the straps adjusted-even on the 2 I felt like they wouldn't stay on my shoulders. Even with fluctuating bust size due to nursing, there was lots of wiggle room in the padding. And the lining was very helpful to prevent any nipples from showing through. Just not a good MAH look (;

links_reviews_title: Compliments on the color and draping
