links_reviews_text: Black tie wedding

links_reviews_title: It was extremely comfortable. It felt light but not too thin. It made me feel beautiful
links_reviews_text: Really the only con I have is that, if you have bigger breasts, you kind of pop out of this dress, so I was glad I had covers for myself underneath. and if you have big thighs the slip underneath can be a bit tight when trying to show off your best moves on the dance floor. Still a wonderful dress though.
Beautiful dress. Received many compliments. The slit in the dress came up really really high when I sat down though. Thank goodness for the tablecloth.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! I got lots of compliments and it was very flattering.
links_reviews_text: The straps tended to fall down.
great dress tons of compliments con - straps kept slipping

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, but the sleeves were a deal-breaker
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress, but the straps were a bit of a nightmare. I'd read the reviews in advance and knew to bring a little sewing kit. When I got the dress, it was very snug around the hips but the straps were falling off my shoulders. Maybe I'm just a terrible seamstress, but I never managed to shorten them appropriately: the straps are so thin that they dug into my shoulders while still managing to fall off half the time. So while it's a nice dress and it could have been lovely, I didn't enjoy wearing it at all.

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect length for a tall (5'9) gal like myself!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a wedding and it fit pretty well! My bra size is a 34 C so the lining of the bra built into the dress peaked a tiny bit! If you're a little more busty that won't be a problem! The 4L was the perfect length and it was very comfy!

links_reviews_title: Can't believe I'm just now renting from RTR!!!
links_reviews_text: I ordered 2 sizes in the same dress and they both didn't fit! And I was devastated, but I remembered I could overnight a dress. So I went and ordered the next size up and it came 20 minutes before I was to leave for the event! And it fit perfectly! I felt like the best dressed person at the event and got compliments THE WHOLE ENTIRE NIGHT! Thank you RTR for making me feel AMAZING!

links_reviews_title: Wore this as a bridesmaid. It was the perfect mix of flirty, feminine, and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'3" and wore 4-inch heels, and the petite size was the perfect length. There was plenty of room in the chest (I'm a 32DD) and the sewn-in cups mean that you can go without a bra (the back is too low to hide a strapless).

I am usually a size 0, but because it was unavailable i went with the size 2. As expected, it was a little big but I made it work. The dress is really well made and very flattering. I would recommend ordering really far in advance though, just so you can get your preferred size.

If you are looking for a solid dress option this is a great one! I think paired with fun shoes and jewlery it would have been great but by itself it was a bit bland, like almost a bridesmaid dress (which isn't bad). If you have a fun occasion might want to consider something else but the fit was great and so was the look!
The size 4 (my usual size) fit me well and was very comfortable. Great dress for a fancy evening! Classic but also fun. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: I really like how this dress makes me feel fancy!
links_reviews_text: I’m 5’7 and I got the long version, but even with heels it was a little too long for me and I tripped over the dress a few times. Other than that I really loved wearing this dress! It’s very classy and makes me feel fancy!
#wedding #bridesmaid so comfortable got compliments all night
Sexy fit and hugged my curves in the right places! I highly recommend

links_reviews_title: Runs small, too much cleavage for a catholic wedding.
links_reviews_text: Rented for a wedding, and ended up going with a backup dress I ordered.

links_reviews_title: The dress is great! Quality fabric, perfect color, elegant fit!
links_reviews_text: Not only is this dress stunning, it's COMFORTABLE! Quality fabric, perfect color, elegant fit! A size smaller would have been my size but I only ordered a sz 4 and we were able to it work!

The dress fits perfectly, and it picks you up and makes your waist look tiny! It felt a bit tight under the bust area when I sat, but it was manageable since the 8R was too big in the bust. The wedding I went to was outdoors in Puerto Rico during the winter, which means it was a little warm, and the dress made me hot since it's not that flowy, but it was worth it! (I'm pear-shapped, 5'6", 155 lbs, 36B.)

links_reviews_title: I am IN LOVE with this dress!!!
links_reviews_text: I'm in love with this dress. I wore it to a company appreciation dinner and - my GOD - I looked amazing. I needed the whole world to see! I am *still* getting compliments, even after the fact!! "Ravishing" was my favorite one. For the fit: I was actually surprised to find that that 16 fit me well! I do generally wear a size 16 but I'm always weary of companies and the crazy size differences between them. I think my favorite thing is that I didn't have to wear a bra. I *always* have to wear a bra. BUT NOT THIS TIME, LADIES AND GENTS. The length: It was almost too long. I wore 2-3 inch heels so it was perfect but I'm on the verge of their recommendation for choosing the long option vs. the regular. If you're between 5'7" and 5'9" and plan on wearing heels, definitely go for the long. If you don't plan on wearing heels, go for the regular. LOVE LOVE LOVE this dress!!!! Wish I didn't have to send it back!

I loved this dress, I usually wear a 10 but did size up to the 12 because of a little extra space needed in the breast region. I am size 36D and have a wide back. Overall looked amazing on, only complaint is the straps were slightly too long so I had to adjust them a few times but nothing too crazy! Would totally rent again

links_reviews_title: I wore this to the Governor's Inaugural Gala. This dress was amazing to wear!!
links_reviews_text: The fit was amazing except the spaghetti straps kept falling down but that could be because I have narrow shoulders. The navy color of the dress is true navy.

links_reviews_title: This dress was fabulous! I LOVED it.
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing! I wore it to a NYE party and felt sophisticated yet sexy in it. There's enough room in the waist and I loved the fabric. Very flowy and a beautiful navy color. I'm 5'5" and wore 3" high heels. The length of it was great too. The only downside was that I had to use tape for the bust area. But it worked out fine.

links_reviews_title: Great gown for a black tie wedding!!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect! I needed to safety pin the straps because they were a bit long, but that wa easy! Overall, the rest of the dress fitperfectly! I was given so many compliments, and I will definitely rent it again!! Such a nice dress for the price.

links_reviews_title: It is perfect for a fall/winter wedding. The arm pieces make it almost ethereal.
links_reviews_text: The fit was very form fitting. I have a bigger bust and i was so worried about spilling out but wardrobe tape helped a but. The front dress piece covers any sign of bloat or muffin top. The straps were slipping off a little bit but again dress tape. Overall it was a beautiful dress that made my night perfect. If you dont like your back showing, dont wear this dress. Im always worried about back rolls but the cut fit wonderfully.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! Very flattering and beautiful!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It def shows the girls if you have curves but not in a trashy way. I wore it to a formal work party with my husband and received compliments all night. I would buy this dress in a heart beat!
I loved this dress. It was a little more cleavage than I was anticipating but I felt really classy and elegant.. would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: flattering, comfortable, easy to dance in
links_reviews_text: Fit is true to size. I liked wearing navy instead of my usual (black). The dress is figure-flattering. You could go with or without a strapless bra and Spanx. I wore both but neither are necessary which I think may be a plus to some potential renters. If you want to wear a dress you won't be constantly pulling on or adjusting all night, rent this one.

Classy and elegant. I wore this for a formal event, and it moves beautifully and looks very classy. No give in the fabric, so size up for your alternate size. I felt like a goddess in this dress. It would be perfect for a summertime wedding or outdoor formal event!

This dress was a light weight, navy blue, low cut dress. I received so many compliments and I felt very beautiful in it. I didn't wear a bra with this and the straps held me pretty well for having DDD boobs! The zipper was annoying, but that's all dressed for my husband lol! The length was perfect and I didn't have to wear spanx! Would buy this!

links_reviews_title: Put the flare in your next formal affair
links_reviews_text: I always wanted to wear a jumpsuit, but had many reservations because of size and fit, but after trying it on in a RTR store, I was excited to wear it to my formal affair. I wore this red jumpsuit to a runway show and I felt very confident. Many heads turned to give me compliments. Zipping and unzipping requires some assistance, so that is something to plan ahead for.

links_reviews_title: Worked well with accessories to glam it up!
links_reviews_text: Slightly on the loose side for a 10. Elegant with lovely lines.

links_reviews_title: Bold, out of the box pick - loved it!
links_reviews_text: I ended up in this jumpsuit after I realized the day of the event that it was a cocktail party and not a gala. Luckily I live in Chicago and was able to head to the store. Since I was there and the choices were a bit limited, I decided to try on a jumpsuit and fell in love with this trend! It was a bold pick for me - especially in the red but I felt great and sassy all night long! I'm a true size 8 and this fit like a glove. If you want to try something different I say give this a go :)

links_reviews_title: Great pant suit!! I felt like a million bucks in it. Got lots of compliments! Color is poppin!
links_reviews_text: You should wear a really good strapless bra with this as the top was just a tad loose on me. Nothing super noticeable.
A little tight on the sides if you have larger ..... but fortunately an easy zip for me.
Super cute and comfortable! Wore this to church on Christmas and got many compliments! Would order again!
Definitely a head turner! Great red color. Was expecting a cropped leg but it was full length. Tons of compliments all night. Sad to ship it back... you will be too!

I have a long torso and shorter legs (but I'm also petit at 5'2") This jumpsuit was almost too short in the torso. The jumpsuit was striking and sexy without being over the top. Overall a great piece for a date night!

I can't tell if it ran small or was just an odd shape. I'm busty with a shorter torso and the 8 gave me camel toe, but was baggy in the hips. I tried the 10 and it was huge! I'm thin but a solid build, so I'm honestly not sure what was wrong with this. It's so pretty though! And the quality is great!

Gorgeous color red, weird fit in the mid section, did not end up wearing. The six got true to size but because of the color and fit in the crotch area/mid section needed tailoring and looked weird so did not end up wearing.
It's a great fit, *except* that the top was just slightly loose for me. I didn't want to be pulling at it the whole night, so I did not wear it.

I wore this to a rehearsal dinner for an Indian wedding. I needed something to perform a dance in that was still cocktail attire and this was perfect. The fit was great, the dress was almost to my knees which is longer than I would have preferred but it kept it classy. The details and beautiful and the color is so pretty.

So I ordered a size 4 but what came was a size 2. Pretty happy with that actually because a 4 would've been too big. My son picked this dress out for our mother and son dance. He wanted purple and this was the closest we could get. It's such a nice deep color. I'm short torso so I needed a cami. I could only find this ribbed tank on short notice but it worked and looked great. This dress also has pockets!!!!!

links_reviews_title: It was perfect for a holiday party
links_reviews_text: The fit is snug on top and hit just right at my hips. I was worried that because I’m high waisted, it wouldn’t sit at the right spot. I was wrong, very flattering and no bra needed! Danced all night comfortably. I would rent it again!

links_reviews_title: A cute dress, it has pockets
links_reviews_text: This was a back up dress sent when my original dress became unavailable. I didn't end up wearing it, but it was cute. They sent an 8 which fit fine. The bodice design was nice and so were the pockets. This wasn't quite my style, but it was a nice dress.

The dress was beautiful! The bodice's design was very eye catching, and I received a lot of compliments. However, the bodice did not really move, so when I sat down it was very tight and definitely pushed my cleavage up and out, which was kinda embarrassing and not what I was going for. When I was standing however, it looked great! So maybe pick this dress if you're under a C cup so that doesn't happen.

links_reviews_title: My Favorite- Form fitting but so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I've rented maybe 15 dresses, this is my favorite. I didn't need to wear a bra, sucked you in, and flared at the right area so you could eat! And with pockets. I got a ton of compliments, mostlyabout the vibrant color!!

links_reviews_title: Unique dress in a shabby chic style wedding
links_reviews_text: Love the A-line style!

Love this dress - the fit, the detailing, the fabric, the length, it was perfect! The color is beautiful and the embroidery really makes it special. The 6 fit snugly in the chest but had a bit of room in the waist so was super comfortable all night long. The length was great for dancing and spinning - but could be too long on the shorter ladies (I'm 5'9"). Added bonus - didn't have to wear a bra and, of course, the pockets!

Pictures don't really do justice to this dress. It's gorgeous and fits really well. Awesome dress for a tall girl! My only complaint was the ribcage area was a little snug, but I didn't need a bra, so I guess that's a plus. :)

I was searching for a dress for a gala event with a floral theme & found this. I loved the color but it didn't seem formal enough for that event so I rented it for chaperoning prom the week before. Liked the fit other than since the material is kind of heavy and stiff at times it raised up at the shoulders. Despite the heavy fabric it was very comfortable and flattering. And it has pockets! Deep, useful ones that don't bulk up! I'd rent it again! I actually usually just search for Marchesa Notte to rent.
Loved wearing this piece. Color and detailing are so unique. Many compliments!

I wore this for one of my bridal showers. It was absolutely perfect! I received so many compliments on it. The dress is a beautiful, silky, magenta pink material that shimmers in the light. The embroidery on it is beautiful shades of white, pink, and green – incredibly stunning and rich looking. I wish I could own this dress! I feel like I would invent reasons to wear it. This is a must-have for any spring or summer event! Plus, very comfortable… And, pockets!
This dress fits true to size and the colors are beautiful. I wore it in summer and it was perfect. I love the way the top was fitted.

links_reviews_title: Fabulous one-of a-kind dress that is super flattering!
links_reviews_text: I love, love this dress. It fits like a dream. I am usually a size 10-12 at RTR and wore this in a size 10. Given the smaller size that I selected, I didn't have to wear a bra since my boobs (C-cups) were nicely held in place. I could have also worn it in size 12 if I wanted a less tight fit. The embroidery is stunning and the colors are gorgeous. This dress will gets you lots of compliments! I am 5'7" and the skirt hit me right above the knees. Perfect length for a wedding. I wore it with a green pashmina wrap. Oh, did I mention the big pockets!! :- I will definitely rent this dress again.
It was a little big in the chest and very low cut, but some fashion tape made me feel more comfortable. I got a ton of compliments!
Nice embroidery detail. Awesome pockets to hold phone. Comfortable. Needed to be steamed on arrival, but didn't wrinkle up when I wore it. Perfect for outdoor summer cocktail party.

links_reviews_title: A zero was just a little too big
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'2, 115lbs, 32B, and the zero was just a little too big, especially in the chest. Just a warning for the petite ladies! Bummed because the fabric and the quality is outstanding. The color really pops!

links_reviews_title: Elegant and effortless, show stopping piece
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for an event at a country club. I got tons of compliments all night. The dress was comfortable and easy to move in on the dance floor. The details are elegant and showed off just the right amount of cleavage. I wasn't going to wear a necklace but the necklace seemed to tie the outfit together. I also didn't need to wear a bra. I am typically a size 4 but sized down to the 2. In my opinion, it fits a little big, but not much. This dress is sure to make your next event special.

This beauty was so much fun to wear. I loved the deep V neckline, fitted waist, and flare skirt. The length made it especially appropriate for a formal event like a wedding. The embroidered flowers over the magenta fabric felt classic and current at the same time. Most importantly, it had pockets!!
This dress was so comfortable! True to size and had handy pockets! I loved the color!

links_reviews_title: The color was stunning and the embroidery was incredible!
links_reviews_text: Fit was very true to size. I'm tall, 6'0 so the length was perfect for me. It has huge deep pockets which I loved. I didn't think the neckline was too revealing but I'm smaller chested. My only concerns were that the fabric was so heavy and I wore it to a summer wedding. Also, it arrived very wrinkled. But other than that it was beautiful, everyone loved it, and I would definitely recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Felt very feminine and confident in this dress
links_reviews_text: The best part of this dress is the satin/silk interior, it feels amazing on. The dress also has pockets! I got compliments on this dress all night. Because of the thick material and embroidery, it did not require a bra. Be warned, you will need to steam or iron this dress before wearing, it doesn't travel well.

links_reviews_title: I had compliments all evening on this dress.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well. I have no chest so I needed to wear a padded bra. Nicely made and the lining made it so comfortable. The pockets were a bonus. Absolutely beautiful color. Highly recommended!! The RTR process is great.

This dress is everything! The colors and embroidery are beautiful and the fit is flattering and comfortable. I had rented this as my alternate for a previous wedding in a larger size and was so in love with it and bummed out that I couldn't wear it that I had to rent it again in the correct size! The material is thick enough to be able to wear regular undergarments and the pockets are great. I so wanted to buy this dress!

links_reviews_title: Great wedding dress! The pockets and skirt were so fun!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a black tie optional wedding and it was a hit. I got tons of compliments and my husband loved the way I looked! The fit was a little tight in the bust. I'm a 32 DDD so a size 8 would have felt a little more comfortable but the 6 fit good too. Wanted to keep it!!!

Rented this for Eurofest and our group dresses up every year. This dress fit the occasion perfectly, and was made even better by the addition of an apron! The pockets were AWESOME as it was the perfect place to stash my phone while we were on the dance floor!

links_reviews_title: First rental- can't wait to try again
links_reviews_text: It was a nice dress- by the end of the night the under arm area was really uncomfortable - the 6 would have been too big in chest area so going up a size wouldn't work. Lots of compliments - embroidery makes it stand out from other dresses.

links_reviews_title: LOVED THIS DRESS. So many compliments, no one had anything similar.
links_reviews_text: Amazing color and I am obsessed with the flower detail! Much more purple than the picture shows. Matched perfectly with my boyfriend's navy suit. It's a fitted dress, not stretchy at all. Very tight in the bust. It actually didn't really fit my bust (36G), I could not zip when wearing a bra. But I just adjusted and it ended up working by showing more cleavage. Hides rolls well on the front, recommend spanx for the back.

Gorgeous dress with the bonus of being comfortable and easy to wear. The embroidery and fabric are both incredibly lush. I received many compliments and was delighted with my choice. The 6 was a snug fit so I went with the 8 so, real talk, I could eat and drink freely at the wedding. Based on other reviews, I was worried the 8 would be too big in the shoulders since I have narrow shoulders, but it was fine. If I owned the dress, I'd have them taken up a smidge; for a rental, it was perfectly fine. I styled with the Nicole Miller Star Light Star Bright necklace from here, a gold clutch, and gold pumps. Pros: You can wear a regular bra You don't need to wear Spanx Fully lined Rich color Pockets! Cons: The fabric wrinkles really easy - but it's also forgiving. The size 8 fell off the hangar in transit and it was a bit of a hassle to steam it, but it fell back into place pretty easily.

I wore this for my rehearsal dinner before my wedding a few weeks ago. It fit so well and was extremely comfortable. I wish that I would have gotten more pictures in it! I would definitely rent it again, because everyone loved it. Any dress where you can wear a regular bra is a plus.

I loved this dress! I rented this for a wedding in Colorado. I received tons of compliments and would rent it again. The colors are bright and vibrant and the embroidery and gorgeous. It was comfortable and had lots of room in the bust for fuller figured girls. It was also easy to match and stood out in a crowd. Also, the dress has pockets!

I wore this to a couples bridal shower and felt great in this dress. It was a little longer than I would have liked but I wore 3"-31/2""heels that helped. And since I'm kind of petite, the torso was a little long which made the shoulders ride up if I wasn't careful. If I had a hand in a pocket (which I loved about the dress )it kept it in place. I received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Stand-out pink cocktail dress with gorgeous embroidery
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a wedding upstate and was really happy with it. People were coming up to me all night and telling me how pretty it was. The flower embroidery is very detailed and beautiful. I was able to wear a regular bra with this dress and has no issues. AND it has pockets, which is just the best thing ever.

I would describe the dress as true to size, although the bodice was pretty fitted. If you are in between sizes, I would size up. The quality of the embroidery was impeccable. The dress was more low-cut than I realized, so keep that in mind if the event is more conservative. As far as length goes, I would recommend the dress for someone tall like me. I'm 5'8" and it hit perfectly but might be too long on someone shorter.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress and have considered buying it. One of my favorite dresses ever!
links_reviews_text: The color of this dress is gorgeous. It's a rich fuchsia and the fabric is dreamy. I wore my normal size for dresses and the fit was perfect. The flower embroidery is so special and unique and the neckline is feminine without going overboard. Highly recommend this stunner!
This dress is perfection. I got compliments all day long.

links_reviews_title: This dress fits well and feels very special. It is bright and the embroidery made it unique.
links_reviews_text: This dress doesn't require a lot of jewelry because of the bodice detail!
lots of compliments, loved the fact that I didn't have to worry about others being in the same dress! Arm holes were a bit snug , but still danced the night away! #rtr

I wore this out for my husband's birthday dinner and got tons of compliments all night from strangers at the restaurant! I loved the floral detail- looked extremely expensive! It does have a long torso so if you have a short torso this may not look good.

Perfect style for your next formal event! Running true to size we recommend sizing up for backup as it is fitted throughout the midsection. There is no stretch to the fabric however there is comfortable room at the bust for so this would work for any cup size. The fit and flare style makes this perfect for any body type, especially for those with a wider hip. At about 5'4/5'5 this style hit right at the knee. Due to the elaborate detailing on the top portion of the dress I would pair with minimal accessories!
Got SO many compliments! Very sexy but super comfortable because it's a jumper. And there are POCKETS!!

links_reviews_title: Didn't feel 100% confident but it worked
links_reviews_text: The pockets were set in such a weird place making it look like the fabric was being pulled at the hips which made me feel insecure. I had ordered the smaller size and the same thing happened which is why I returned and went a size up but the same happened with the larger size. It worked but didn't love.

links_reviews_title: Having a big work week and not worrying about what to pack/wear to the wedding!
links_reviews_text: It was a little big (and I'm a D-cup) so I wore a black lace bralette underneath. I got tons of compliments on it! I'm pretty tall and wore Louboutin Folies with it. If you're tall, don't expect it to hit the ground. They were a little highwater but still wearable.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful sexy look for a black tie affair
links_reviews_text: The jumpsuit is a gem. I'm athletic so it hugged more firmly on my quads/butt but wasn't tight. Very flattering!!! I want to rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Great, classic jumpsuit. Great detail on side of leg. Just revealing enough, but still classy.
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove. No bra needed for me, and I didn’t need tape. Just make sure you have a friend who can unzip you to use the restroom.
So many compliments on this deep V plunging neckline jumpsuit! I felt like a million bucks! Loved!!!

The only jumpsuit I've ever been able to wear! I'm 5'8" and most things are too short in the body, legs or both. I have virtually no cheat so I had to tape this to keep it in place but it was great. Received lots of compliments on a night out with friends. I would totally buy this!!

I rented this for a cocktail attire party and it was perfect! So flattering and comfortable. The front was sexy but not too much so (might have been a different story for someone with bigger boobs!). Length was perfect with tall booties (I'm 5'5" and had about 3.5 inches of shoe). What most impressed me is that the top didn't move at all. No matter how I moved (tested it out at home, lol!) the girls stayed safely tucked away. I'm a tad short waisted and it was still a great fit. Want to own this!!!
I have a small chest, so a little tape was needed to keep in place. But otherwise it was EXTREMELY comfortable and got lots of compliments.
I felt so sexy and confident, and most importantly comfortable in this outfit. Fit perfectly, didn't even need to use fashion tape.

links_reviews_title: Great jumpsuit but length is an issue for short women.
links_reviews_text: This is a flattering jumpsuit. The 2 would have been better lengthwise, but the zipper had some issues getting over the waist-belt. I had platform heels on and the length was still wayyyyy too long. I ended up folding the waist under itself which made the pant legs just touch the floor. Loved this rental but short ladies be prepared for pant leg shock.

Loved wearing this out for my friends bachelorette party! I am a 34 DDD and it was very low cut and not tight on the top so I had to safety pin some fabric up at the shoulder to make it tighter so I wouldn't pop out of it when moving around

links_reviews_title: Great jumpsuit! Sexy but not slutty.
links_reviews_text: Rented for a rehearsal dinner. Usually 4-6 because of a small top and bigger bottom but found that the 8 worked best here. Taped my girls so that they wouldn't fall out of the top and it worked like a dream. Got so many compliments!
Prefect fit. Great for shirt girls too. Really chic. If fit like it was taloried.

This was the first jumpsuit ive rented, and i LOVED it! No option for a bra, so its probably best for B or C cup. High heels necessary since it runs quite long. If you have a very long-torso it could be a problem, but it hit me just right. You do need very flexible shoulders to get in and out of it for the bathroom! Loved that the fabric didn't wrinkle, and is a good medium weight, making it versatile for different seasons.
I loved this jumpsuit! It fit perfect. It does fit a little tight around the waist, but it wasnt too bad. No need for a bra. Im a 36D and didnt have any issues.

Understated, elegant, sexy. Imagine a black pantsuit but tuxedo style and plunging. Fit as expected- order 1 size up from your typical dress size. Usually a 2, the 4 was fitting but not tight. For length - I had the regular, would have loved a long (I'm long legs and 5'10) but the regular would be appropriate for most. The fabric in bust area is fairly thin so if you're larger than a B you'll need something. It's not thick enough for support but perfect for a small bust without help. Beautiful, classic, and well made. Wear a good pair of earrings and a single bracelet or a ring (no necklace). You'll feel simple but better dressed than everyone else- the epitome of style.
This outfit was GORGEOUS! I got so many compliments. I usually wear a 6 or 8 but needed a 10 in this. I'm tall but the body length was perfect - no uncomfortable riding up.

I wore this to a Holiday Social and got so many compiments. I was reluctant to wear it because of the low cut but I bit the bullet with no regrets. I wore it with 3 inch heels. I would definitely rent this again!
Loved this jumpsuit. It fit well though was a bit on the large side in the waist. Would recommend highly.

links_reviews_title: Nice jumpsuit. Overall it was classy and I would rent it again. I Love the tuxedo look!
links_reviews_text: True to size fit. Too Short for 5'8" , I needed a Long. I saw others in the reviews that had ordered a Long but it was not available for me to rent. If I rented it again I would rent a long. Also the V-cut was too revealing. I had to add a bandu under the the jump suit which mad it look more like the picture.

Great piece and super fun to wear. I would have liked a little extra room in the 2, but it was way too long even with pretty high heels (and I'm 5'6/5'7), so I wore the 0. Still comfortable and easy to move in.

I wore this to my best friend's dinner rehearsal. It was comfortable and I felt great in it! It wasn't so revealing that I felt awkward, and it fit like a glove. I felt confident, beautiful, sexy, and sophisticated in this jumpsuit and I'd wear it again in a heartbeat! By the way, my details won't save, but I'm 5'7, 135lbs and a 34B bust.

links_reviews_title: Fit fantastic! Tons of compliments, felt sexy and confident!
links_reviews_text: #20yearreunionhot

This jumpsuit is perfect for looking classy with a touch of sex appeal. The low neckline is really flattering without being too much. The otherwise fairly conservative lines really help balance it. I wore it to a cocktail party for a work function and got a ton of compliments. It can be tough to unzip, but can definitely be done alone if you're even a little flexible! I'll probably be renting it again soon!

I was surprised that the 0 fit me best bc I normally wear a 2 or 4 in dresses. But this was incredibly comfortable and the only drawback was that I had to tape up the hem even with 5 inch heels! Regardless, it made me look taller and I got tons of compliments.

I'm 5'4", 125 lb and wore a size 0. It fit perfectly around the waist and through the torso. The legs were a bit long for me, but it was nothing a pair of wedges couldn't fix! I got tons of compliments all night, and felt confident and sexy! Would recommend this to anyone.

Great fit. Loved he tuxedo stripe on the pant and was complimented for it. At 5'8" it could have been a little longer in my very long legs. I'm a little busy for the top but made it work for a mint at the theater.

links_reviews_title: A fun red carpet award ceremony where I definitely needed a sexy outfit and RTR came through!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size: I am normally a size 12 and wore the 12R. I LOVED the fit and felt so good in it! I was worried about sizing and whether or not this wouldn't be appropriate on someone who is a size 12 but the fit was like a glove. I'm 5'6" and wore 4" tall heels and the bottom of the jumpsuit hit halfway down my heels (perfect). I did use a lot of double sided tape to keep the jumpsuit in place on top. My chest is on the smaller size and I think that helped.

This jump suit is definitely a show stopper with the plunging neckline! I wore it to my birthday dinner and couldn't have been happier. It runs a little small - I usually wear a 4 - but it hugged me perfectly. I used double sided tape to keep the girls in, and that seemed to work fine. It was long in the torso for me personally, but I have a short torso, so I would image it would fit most ladies well. I will definitely be renting this again for another fun occasion!

Both sizes fit. Luckily I only had to use the restroom once because all romper-wearers should know ten on/off process is never easy. I am a 36DD so I had to wear a Cami underneath however I knew this was a possibility upon renting. Still was very nice!

links_reviews_title: This was perfect for a night out in wine country!
links_reviews_text: Well the pros were- I kind of felt like a Bond Girl! I initially ordered the size 6- I could have made it work but I prefer my jumpsuits to be a little looser in the tummy area. I ended up re-ordering a size 8. I got tons of compliments and got away with no bra! Can't beat that! Because it is tighter in the pelvic region, I recommend going a size up.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments and great flowy fit!
links_reviews_text: The model must be quite tall in this photo. I'm 5'6, athletic, 34C with long legs and this jumpsuit hit the ground on me wearing 4 inch Jimmy Choos. However, that made it look that much more elegant. The deep V-neck is stunning and looks elegant rather than sleezy. I got a multitude of compliments and would definitely wear it again. I would say that it runs true to size with give in the material. You cannot wear a bra with this due to the deep neck, but stick ons would be ok.
Great jumpsuit! Sized up but didn't need to. Thinner material, but overall looks great.
This was not a good as I wanted it to be. The torso portion was too long and the pockets added volume to my hips which I dont need. It is great material and comfortable just did not work for me
Lovely but too long, even with heels.
It was beautiful, but it was small. I usually wear a 10 and got a 12, but still was super small in the hips and upper thigh.

I was pleasantly surprised at how beautifully this romper fit. I thought for sure the legs would be too long, the torso too short, etc. Jumpsuits are just very hit and miss. This was STUNNING; fit me like a glove and in all the right places. At my height I definitely needed a tall pair of heels, but that was a gimmy anyway to dress this up, so it was perfect. When my fiance saw this he just stared and said "wow!". Similar advice as others - be prepared with some tape. I was okay; very good posture kept things in place, but I was conscious of it throughout the evening as its hard to wear a bra unless you want it to show.

links_reviews_title: Fun for going out in Vegas but I wish the legs were a bit longer
links_reviews_text: Cute but a little short. I'm 5'7" and wish it was a little longer.
Didn't wear it because it's really long. I'm 5'2 so unless this come in petite I could get it to work. I loved the style and it was flattering and comfy. Hoping to find it in a petite.

links_reviews_title: Glitz and Glam and Super Comfortable
links_reviews_text: Great dress! Perfect for a glitz and glam party - got a ton of compliments! You can wear a regular bra with it as well!

links_reviews_title: Fits True To Size, Comfy, So Many Compliments!
links_reviews_text: Normally a dress size 2, wore a small to a NYE party. Fit so perfectly in chest, shoulders and length. Comfy fabric in the inside, so sequins did not irritate at all.
Beautiful dress for a party. Short with plunging neckline. For a pear, the top was a little loose but not too loose. Otherwise it was great. I received tons of compliments.

I rented this dress for a gala. Was a little worried that it could be too short - but it was worth it because the dress was so comfortable to wear and dance in! Sequins are a beautiful purple/blue. Dress was well sewn. True to size. I am 5'5", 130lbs with small chest and I wore a small.

Fun dress, perfect for those events that call for sequins. Lots of cleavage but my 32F bust fit without threatening to fall out, so I'd say ample room there. Great shape for those us with an hourglass or pear figure.
The dress was very comfortable. I ordered a small and medium thinking I'd wear the medium but the Small fit perfectly! It was a nice weight, not too light, and was a good length.

I love this dress! It was the perfect choice for the themed cocktail birthday party I went to. I received so many compliments. Very flattering and comfortable to be in all night. I got the L and XL I border on a 14/16 and decided to go with the L. Only suggestion is if your bigger chested to get strong garment tape. The neckline inner fabric shifts some and rolls out of place so you see the lining and I kept thinking my undergarments were out.

Got a lot of compliments from complete strangers in this dress. It was pretty comfortable but gave it 4 stars because it did rub my arms as others have said. Wore it to an Elton John concert and it was perfect for the event!!

The dress fit great! The sequins were not scratchy. The dress is heavy and made very well. It was so comfortable. I did use some tape and wore a sticky bra as the normal bra would most likely show. Loved the purple color and the length of the dress! Great rental for sure!!!
Comfortable dress. Dancing dress.

The dress fit wonderfully and was so fun. As with most sequins type dresses, it does rub a bit under your arms but it was not uncomfortable. The black under-lining of the dress would show a little around the bust area but given the dark purple sequins, it's hard to see.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments wearing this dress to a concert.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly for me!!!

links_reviews_title: Super sexy, very comfortable, everyone loved it!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a superhero themed NYE party and the sparkle was perfect! I was worried a little about chafing on my underarms but that was not a problem at all. I got complimented all night on this dress and would highly recommend! Just be prepared - this dress will show a LOT of cleavage!

The sparkle and color of this dress is stunning! It is heavier than expected due to all of the sequins but I likes that because it felt high quality and almost hugged me better with the weight of it. The only complaint is that the sequins rub your underarms a bit but still totally worth wearing it! Gorgeous dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress fit perfect. I'm 5'4 178 lbs, 38D, curvy. Size large was a great fit!
links_reviews_text: There were no cons, I loved it.

I'm 5'2" 180pds and a perfect 12 in everything I wear. I got the Large and the Medium in this after reading reviews and actually ended up wearing the medium. It's definitely low cut, especially if you have a shorter torso, but that was fine for a bachelorette party in Nola. The dress is really heavy and just a little itchy under the arms, but ultimately a great dress, and not itchy enough to be an issue. I would rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Such a beautiful and flattering dress.
links_reviews_text: I ordered this for my 10 year HS reunion and it was a big hit. I thought I was going to be a L but the M fit me perfectly and I got compliments all night. You can get away with wearing a bra if it's low cut (for reference I'm 34DDD), that's if you're comfortable with your girls on display. Now it is a little heavy (the dress) when you first receive it but once you put it on it's fine and it sequins aren't irritating at all. All in all I loved this dress and if I get the chance, I'll rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Purple Sparkle for a Bachelorette Party
links_reviews_text: With my unlimited subscription, I got the small and the medium size to ensure I had a fit for this big weekend. The small fit me better in the chest and waist, but it was way too short. The medium was loose in the chest and waist for me, but with the heavy weight of the fabric, it didn't seem to look bad. Plus the medium was a much better length on my 5'11" frame.

This dress was super cute and fun to wear out for my 24th birthday, but it was extremely low cut! I definitely had to watch it fairly carefully to make sure my bra wasn’t out. I thought based on reviews that I would need a large so I ordered that and an extra large as my backup. The large was a little tight so I wore the extra large, but I could have worn the large if that was all I had. The top seemed to stretch out towards the end of the night though which was odd. Overall it was a really cute dress cute dress, I got a lot of compliments on it! Loved the purple color and the sequins were all in place. It was a very high quality dress!
This dress was comfortable and very flattering. The dress has a very deep v, which I loved because it gave this cute dress a sexy vibe.

links_reviews_title: Wore this gorgeous dress to a studio 54 themed party.. got compliments throughout the night!
links_reviews_text: The dress is heavy but it fits perfectly on all the curves. I usually wear a 4/S but went for a size smaller in this one. I used some fashion tape so I don't have to worry about any malfunctions while I dance the night away but the dress fit so well that I would have been perfectly fine even without it. Overall, a stunning dress. This is my first experience with rent the runway and I am definitely going for it again for the next event. The dress arrived on time and was a huge success at the party.

I usually order a medium, but I decided to go with a small after reading all the reviews! It fit perfectly & was not too short! It was extremely comfortable & I did not have to wear a bra which was a huge plus

I loved this dress and received SO MANY compliments throughout the night! I was able to wear a regular bra that is cut a little lower in the front. It wasn't a plunge bra or anything, so it was nice to feel supported all night. The dress has some stretch and the stomach area is VERY forgiving. The only reason I gave it four stars is because the shoulders were a little big and the lining around the front kept rolling outward. It wasn't super noticeable, but it bothered me. Great dress all around! I would rent again.

I got this dress as a safe NYE option. The other dress I selected I knew would either look amazing or be a disaster on my small frame - turned out it was amazing. Anyway, this is a very safe dress. It's cute, comfortable, fits as expected (true to size), and would be flattering to lots of bodies. I liked it but was looking for something more interesting. The neckline was plunging, but on a smallish chest (34B) it was by know means too showy. I would consider renting it for another occasion. Not overly tight in the waste line or the capsleeves/shoulders either.

The dress is heavy, supportive (went without a bra) and a bit stretchy. Based off reviews I went a little smaller then normal and I was very glad. The shoulders did fall a couple of time while dancing. It's a deep plunge but I didn't have any wardrobe malfunctions

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my bachelorette in Vegas!
links_reviews_text: A perfect Vegas dress! It is sort of heavy, and low in the front and back but I never felt like I wasn't secure in the dress (no fear of anything popping out and didn't need to use sticky tape). I am between a size 8 and 10, and went with the Large for the extra length since I am 5'10". It was a little loose but you couldn't really tell.

I'm a 32D, and the dress fit really well. Fairly stretchy and flows with you. Only cons are that it was very heavy and didn't breathe super well, and a night of dancing left me a sweaty mess. If you're not doing any crazy movement, it's great!

So when I got the dress I was a bit scared because it fit looser in all the places I wanted it to be fitted; however, it was perfect and the loose quality wasn't so big that it made a difference once I taped it. This dress was perfection! I was complimented all night and am still getting likes on photos. Everyone worse sequins or sparkles, but no one wore purple and the neck line made it an original. Plus RTR made it so easy and I loved not having to clean and store the dress for life!
Wore this for a night out in Vegas. Dress is heavy but overall comfy because it's not tight over your midsection. Was happy with the look. Lots of cleavage, especially with a bra.

Sequin is softer than usual, didn't irritate my very sensitive skin. Fabric has some stretch, which makes it much more comfortable. I'm a DD/DDD, and this was very revealing! I certainly didn't mind, but may be off-putting to others. The cut is lower in person than it appears on the model. Surprisingly, I still had some room in the chest - beware if you're smaller up top. May be too big.

Best dress ever! So beautiful, comfortable, and sexy! It was great for the NYE dinner party we hosted. The neckline was plunging in a tasteful way - just make sure to have a low cut bra or at least a dark/black one that won't stand out. The dress wasn't too short but still very flirty. The sequins were thick and heavy, which was perfect for a cold winter event.

links_reviews_title: It was a New Year’s Eve party ! I got so many compliments on the color and style of the dress !!!!!
links_reviews_text: I love the color of this dress . It ran a little big through the shoulders , but other than that it was a perfect , comfortable dress !

links_reviews_title: It was the Christmas Eve party of the Year (maybe decade!!), so it was important to look FAB!!
links_reviews_text: This dress did everything I hoped it would do. First, it is stunning!! The color (deep purple) is interesting and unique. The craftsmanship is superb: the sequins are high quality, and it heavy (well-made) without being uncomfortable. To the contrary, the dress was extremely comfortable. I loved it!!
Loved this dress!
Nice a d elegant

Dress fit perfect, i wore the small there is good amount of stretch in the material. The front v cut was deeper than expected but it was still cute. Not scratchy as the dress was well lined. Everyone loved the dress, I would rent again.

I loved it!!! I wore it for my birthday, a night filled with dancing and good times. I felt like a birthday queen! the material is stretchy and i would've preferred a size down, but this was still a great fit. a plus: the skirt twirls when you dance.

This dress makes you look like a million bucks. It was my backup style, but I had a feeling I'd end up wearing it even if my first choice did fit. The beading is luxurious and has a good weight, so it felt kind of like some Vogue version of chainmail. I have big boobs, small waist, big butt and a tummy, and this dress flattered everything. I do have a super low-cut bra designed for dresses like this, and it worked like a charm. Everything stayed where it was supposed to, and I got tons of compliments from both men and women. Made me feel super sexy stepping in as bartender at my cousin's wedding, and I'd 100% rent again just for the cleavage showcase lol.

This fit fantastic. I would say that you can go with your gut on the sizing, I ordered a larger size, based on some reviews. It wasn't needed. I am glad I got the large as my back up. It is a heavier dress than you think, but it isn't at all inhibiting. It is fantastic.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress way more than I thought I would
links_reviews_text: Awesome material, great length and pattern. I cannot wait to rent this again. I had it in my Hearts for a long time and kept passing on it. Not sure why bc it ended up being one of the best summer work dress rentals I've worn.
So many compliments! xxx

This is a favorite brand, but always fits tight in the bust (this one was a little TOO tight for comfort, I am a 34 DD). Otherwise, the quality and craftsmanship of this dress was on point with this brand, as always.
I loved this dress!!! Zipper was tough at the seam but otherwise it was perfect. Strangers stopped me to compliment the dress. Great length for petites.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to a number of different occasions! Got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: For true to size

links_reviews_title: Beautiful embroidery and appliqué, and the white and blue colors are very striking.
links_reviews_text: The fit is very nice on my 5'2, 110 pound, 32 DD frame, although the chest area is definitely tight and there isn't much separation, giving the illusion of the mono boob. Overall, cute is the word I would use for this dress, although it fits and shows off my figure nicely, I feel a little bit like a baby doll while wearing it. It has been in my closet for about two weeks and I haven't quite slated it for an event in the future. But overall it's a very pretty dress.

Loved this dress!!! Wore it a couple times. It fit perfect and didn't need a bra. The only thing I didn't like was the shape of the boobs. You can see in the picture it has a point to it. You can't notice it at all! Would recommend!!

This dress fit like a glove and was the perfect dress for high tea. I am very small on top and it was pretty fitted, so I don't recommend this for more well-endowed women, or if you order it, size up. It is a little short in the back, so beware when you bend over or wear some little shorts. I'm 5'6, 120 pounds, 32A the XS was perfect.
Such a fun print and embroidery that reminded me of the Greek Islands. I'm normally a small but rented a medium based upon prior reviews and it fit perfectly.
This dress is so girly! You feel like a piece of china. Thick and structured. Small. A little itchy, but very cute, so it's worth it ;)

links_reviews_title: SO CUTE but a little flaw
links_reviews_text: I felt like an adorable teapot in this dress (that's a good thing). The material is thick and good quality and the pattern and fit are so cute. Only two caveats: At least on the dress I got the zipper is horrible. It's so so hard to zip up or even down at certain points on the zipper line. I couldn't wear a bra with this since it wouldn't have fit. So other small busty women take note of that. The S was way too big when I tried it so pick you poison I guess: no bra but fits or too big but can wear a bra. Other than those two issues I LOVE this dress
So cute! Runs small.... I'm a 2/4 and the medium fit perfectly. Loved the material. High quality. Great embroidery. Cut was perfection but def size up.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to work and to an outdoor jazz brunch - very appropriate for both!
links_reviews_text: Fit was great - quite flattering to the figure. The design and details made sense for any events in a warm location. Had a hard time zipping up because zipper goes really high up, so can get challenging zipping it up. Overall a great dress for work and play.
This dress is cute and playful. I loved it. It was s little tight though, maybe size up.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to the horse races
links_reviews_text: I originally tried on a medium in store and it was perfect but only a large was available for rent. I could tell the difference but it wasn't TOO big. I'd say true to size for that reason
Fit well, and very comfortable; the blue color is so pretty and happy

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but not for broad shoulders
links_reviews_text: I like the dress quality but it has no stretch. I ordered the large and it would not zip past my mid back. I have D cups and broad shoulders so I'm guessing that's why it wouldn't zip? So I don't recommend if you have a "built" and or busty upper body.
I normally wear a 0 or a 2, but the Medium fit me perfectly! Paired it with a simple black cardigan and black ballet flats for the office
I couldn’t wear this. It wouldn’t zip. I am always an XS / 0 so this brand is just super narrow
Fit perfectly, great quality, nice pattern, really liked it and end up purchasing. The length is right above knees. Good for semi formal event or travel.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun piece, but runs really small!
links_reviews_text: This is such a unique dress. It's high quality fabric. The fabric is somewhat thick, but the dress is airy enough not to be too hot in the summer. Feels very high-end, custom. The dress does run VERY small. I usually wear a small or medium and the large fit me perfectly.
Love love love this gorgeous dress. Details make it and the only thing missing is pockets. Super comfortable as well.
Runs very small. Too tight in the chest. I'm a size 2 and small was too tight. Size up. Too short to wear to work.
Details were lovely but top of dress wouldn't zip

It fit me very well. The fabric is a bit stiff but it didn't bother me at all. It was a nice spring dress and I got a lot of compliments on it. I'd have worn it more often but I spilled coffee on it the first time I wore it.
N/a
Overall fit was great. A little large in shoulders for petite frame.

links_reviews_title: i did not wear it. too small
links_reviews_text: it runs very small. size up 2 sizes
Fits great if you have a waist. Fabric is a little wrinkly.
Loved this dress...paired if with cowboy boots for a girls night. Higher neck and length were flattering on a petite 40 something
was super cute looking
Very tight through ribcage - so if straight or thick waisted it's not the dress for you!

This dress is beautifully made with embroidery and lots of detail that helps the style but doesn't look overwhelming. I loved it just thought it was a bit too young. Would be great on a teenager or someone in their early twenties.
runs a bit small
The XS was so tight that I couldn't zip up all the way. The color and material are beautiful. Too bad I couldn't wear it.
Very well made. Pretty in person. I'm normally an 8/M and sized up as others suggested. However even the large was a little too small. Disappointed!

links_reviews_title: Real cute, however a bit small and zipper difficult to zip up. Recommend getting one size bigger
links_reviews_text: Real cute, however a bit small and zipper difficult to zip up. Recommend getting one size bigger
Tough zipper.
Adorable dress, the large fits like a size 6. Skirt is pretty full. It is a very feminine and cute look.
It was too small from the waist I ended up not wearing it, beautiful dress though
Loved this one.

Flowing light fabric, easy to wear. I dressed it up for a wedding but it could be dressed down for a dinner or date. Comfortable. Felt beautiful in it. Slits on side make is more flattering ( it kind of flattens out in pictures.) Fun to dance in.

Fantastic dress for any occasion, can be dressed up or down. I wore it on a weekend trip to Philadelphia, running errands on the weekend, and to work (although it was probably a little too low cut for work tbh). Absolutely adore this dress, wish I could have bought it!!
Wore this to run errands and got complemented all day long! Super cute and easy.

I wanted to really like this but fit was off for my body type. I rented the smallest size but the middle tiered area made my hips look big and there was too much extra space around my waist. The dress photographs better than how it looks in real life. I'm straight and narrow though so I think if you have an hourglass figure this would be more flattering. The fabric and pattern was lovely though. I also liked the length.

This super comfortable stunner does not disappoint. The fabric is thin silk, although it looks a bit thicker online. The layers flutter beautifully in motion. I am 5'4", and the tips touched the ground without heels. Also, the top was perfect for flat chested girls like me :)
Wore on vaca and was super comfy.

links_reviews_title: I should have kept this! Fantastic dress!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress half a dozen times on multiple occasions. It feels so breezy, doesn't wrinkle, and can be dressed up or down. Plenty of room in the 12.
Super comfortable- highly recommend!
I wore this for my birthday dinner on vacation. I absolutely loved everything about this dress. It is really light as well which makes it very comfortable. I got a lot of compliments!
This dress has a classic yet boho vibe! So easy to wear; worn to date night summer dinner. 8 was loose as I think it was meant to be, body skimming.

The cut and pattern were incredible. The fabric was luxe and I received numerous comments. The bust was a little large but it wasn't large enough for me to go down a size. Great flow and length for cool summer days.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved wearing this dress - the fit was great, the look was fabulous!
links_reviews_text: Fit well. I have a pretty short torso and the straps weren’t too long like some can be, but I still had to wear a strapless bra instead of a regular bra to prevent the straps from showing.

Photos don't do justice. Looks better worn big and lower than as the model photos. Worn for weekend in New York and adored. It's a beautiful and stunning dress, I may keep a while/switch it for itself a few times.
This dress is so lovely! A piece of art!
This is one of my favorite rentals; I'm a repeat renter of this dress! The print is not overwhelming and the cut is flattering. This dress can be dressed up or down.

Fit was big but ok. Very pretty dress. I thought it was black and white but it's actually a light pink and black which makes it more interesting. I wore it to a rooftop pre-wedding party in Rome and felt great in the dress. It was very comfortable on a warm evening and I got a number of compliments on it.
One of the best dresses I have rented. Pretty, unique, comfortable, flattering. Wore with a black camisole.
Great dress for office (with a sweater) and easy to transition for an evening date.
Stunning dress. Received tons of compliments at work. Size down, especially if you have a small chest, I'm usually a 2/4 and the 2 was was a bit big, a 0 would have fit perfectly.

quality material and very comfortable. rented to wear to dinner and a show during a heat wave then also wore to work. was very comfortable and cool. could be dressed up with heels or down with sandals. not the most flattering but it's not meant to be. fit perfect up top and the midsection was loose but my husband still liked it and I recieved compliments at work, love RRT to try something different!

This dress is very beautiful, lightweight, and fun! I didn't end up wearing it because I didn't have somewhere to where it to before I wanted to exchange my items, but I could easily see myself wearing it for a nice dinner or meeting with a client. It was a bit big on me in the bust, but not so big that I couldn't have gotten away with it.

links_reviews_title: LOVE this dress. It's roomy but doesn't look frumpy. Great for work with a blazer or on its own.
links_reviews_text: Not too long. I can wear with flats and not trip!

I saw some reviews saying this is a formal dress and I wholly disagree. I wore this to a pool party BBQ and it was 100% appropriate. It seems to run large? Or I have lost weight? Maybe a little of both. I styled with Alexis bitter earrings and flip flops and it was a hit.
This dress fits so beautifully. It has tiers and they just flow so nice and fall perfectly. I felt like a princess wearing it. Loved it. Highly recommend.

This dress fit me perfectly in every way, I didn't need to wear a bra with it and although the skirt hit me right at my ankles, it didn't graze the floor. I wore it on the weekends and many people remarked how nice it looked, it is noticeably a high quality piece. I thought the extra fabric on the sides looked nice and made it a bit more casual than it would look without that feature, but with larger hips or butt it might exaggerate those parts of the body.

links_reviews_title: Dress was comfortable and flowed nicely.
links_reviews_text: Ordered my normal size 10 and it was to big. Thankfully I had ordered the same dress in an 8 w/ my RTR selections.
this is a nice dress - i was surprised how flattering it was.

links_reviews_title: This was the most comfortable and flattering dress I have ever worn. Dress it up or down, just perf
links_reviews_text: NO Cons all Pros
Wore with a strapless bra and a chunky necklace. Was so comfortable and the material and print were beautiful.
fabric is nice and it fit well (I wore a smaller size then normal) but it seemed a little heavy for Spain.
Easy dress to throw on and run around in!

the dress runs true to size - i perhaps could have gone with a 6 as the 8 was a tad long in the straps but the dress is so amazing- i wore it to the symphony during the day and it was true perfection - it is so light and airy - i wish i could buy it - LOVE LOVE LOVE it p.s. sorry no photo but take my word from it - it's wonderful

links_reviews_title: Too low-cut for work but gorgeous
links_reviews_text: Great fit, but a bit low cut for work. I wore a jacket over it until dinner. I would have bought it if it were less, but will rent it again.
This dress is so heavenly. Beautiful cut and drape make it super flattering. Want to keep it!

links_reviews_title: Great dress. When I put it on, there was a stain on the front of the dress, so didn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: Great dress, fun print.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing it since it was hard to zip and too revealing for everyday wear!
links_reviews_text: I was too busty for this dress. It is very pretty & unique but not for me.

I wore this to a wedding and it was absolutely perfect. Beautiful, unique, and comfortable. The fit was TTS, without any strange gaping or folds. I did not wear a bra (just a touch of fashion tape to be on the safe side), but you might be able to wear one depending on the style. I am considering buying this dress, as it would quickly become an event staple.

This dress was perfect on vacation - it works well with flats to dress it down or heels to dress it up. The high quality is obvious and it flows very nicely - super comfortable without looking sloppy. I'll rent this again. Unless you want a baggier fit, I'd recommend sizing down. I'm usually a 2 or 4 and the 4 was too big for me. I exchanged for the 2 and it was perfect.

1. I loved it so much I purchased it. It's incredibly rare for a maxi dress to fit me that well. I felt like it was made for me. 2. You will stand out in the crowd and feel incredibly sexy! This was the perfect birthday dress. 3. Just go ahead and rent it.

links_reviews_title: Fantastic for a formal tropical wedding in Bangkok, Thailand!
links_reviews_text: The color and cut were a hit and I received so many compliments. It is the perfect combo of formality and fun. Pros: it is surprisingly secure around the bust given all the cutouts; the placement of the cutouts is very flattering and has a slimming effect; the fabric is comfortable and high quality. Cons: the fit isn't perfect if you are hourglass shaped, I found the back/shoulders to be snug while the waist hung loose and low; the regular is super long, I'm 5'3" and wore 4" heels and it draped to the ground. Overall, I felt like a movie star in this dress and found it perfect for a formal wedding in 90 degree evening weather in Bangkok.

links_reviews_title: Showstopper but beware to the large chested!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress; definitely a showstopper! Really easy to put on and very comfortable fabric and style. I am larger chested, so it attracted quite a bit of attention and you definitely can't wear a bra but I think it worked out for a vacation where I won't see anyone I know again! The dress was easy to fold and pack in a carry on suitcase along with 7 days worth of vacation wear and didn't wrinkle at all. Great quality, definitely recommend!
Perfect for formal wedding in tropical setting. Color was a hit. I was pumping so didn't use tape, a 8 would have probably held my boobs better.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit and extremely comfortable and flattering!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress so much, obviously it shows a lot up top but it was secure. The color was perfect and I got compliments all night. Definitely renting this dress again!
Normally a size 6-8. Glad I went with the 8. Was a little short for heels as a 5'9" girl

links_reviews_title: Sexy and bright, but still classy
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful! This was actually my backup due to my first choice getting returned late by the previous renter. RTR really came through by overnighting this dress to me and I couldn't be happier. I was afraid the bright pink with the open back and the low cut neckline would be too much for a black tie wedding, but the dress fit so well it wasn't an issue. My chest was held in all night without any kid of tape and I am a C/D cup. The only issue I had was the length. 2R was still really long with 3" heels. If the 2P would have been available, this dress would have been absolutely perfect. Would 100% rent again.

I wore this dress to a wedding and received several compliments. The only downfall was the way it fit in the chest. My chest is very small (30 C) so the top looked a bit baggy. Overall though, it was a very flattering and comfortable dress.
Breezy and comfortable for a 22 week pregnant momma but the bust was unforgiving and very tight. Wouldn't recommend for larger busted women
Very sexy, but beautiful color. Had to wear tape to make sure nothing popped out.
Very confortable, which is a must when your almost 8 month pregnant. And I also felt feminine which is also amazing! Just Loved it! @PriscilleCanivet

I rented this dress for a black tie wedding. I was a bit worried that there would be too much cleavage but it was actually super flattering! The material was really nice and the dress was super comfy. I got compliments all night! Honestly, I was really sad to return it.
Gorgeous color! Perfect fit!

This dress was so comfortable, even at a Bahamas destination wedding under the sun. The color is incredible in person—so vibrant and gorgeous, and I received so many compliments on it. I'd rent this again and again!
The gown is so nice! I usually wear a size 2 and rented a size 4 per comments made on the website. The size 4 is perfect for me. I love the color!!

links_reviews_title: Great dress in an even better color!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress! I am smaller chested so it worked fine around my bust, but I could potentially see it being tight for others there. I also got a 6L and the length was perfect with 2 inch heels which is great because I usually have an issue with dresses being short on me.

This dress was a huge hit for my husband's work awards dinner in Miami. I received a TON of compliments & the dress fit well. My only complaint is that I felt like the girls were sliding out of the top a few times due to the cut of the top, but it still looked great.

This dress was unbelievable. I was hesitant to order it because it was out of my comfort zone and low cut. But, this was the best prom dress/gown I have ever worn and could have ordered. I felt confident and beautiful while wearing it. So many people complimented it and it was comfortable -- it allowed for dancing! I have zero complaints about it.

links_reviews_title: Smokin' dress for the Fire Ball
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! I attended the Fire Ball (similar to a military ball) and got SO many compliments! I normally wear a size 4 but this 4L was a little loose around the waist. The length was perfect to go with my 3inch heels though!!! I might try the 2L next to see if it's more snug around the waist/bust but overall this was a huge hit. PS a little on the sheer side so be sure to invest in a nude pair of panties ;)

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Be aware if you are well endowed, that they are out of display.
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous, fun dress! Runs long.
Lovedddd this rental.
Miami wedding, lots of drinks, food, and dancing, and this dress was so comfy and sexy (without being in bad taste), I never worried about any chest slippage and got SO many compliments

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress and it fit me so well! would definitely order again!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this in a long and a regular and ended up going with the regular because the long was very long. It was very true to size and I wasn't worried about any cleavage popping out.
Rented this dress for a Barbie themed shoot, and it was perfect! Very bright vibrant dress.
Amazing fit and color. Buying it for sure.

As a very large-chested Woman I was very nervous to wear this dress without a bra. However, surprisingly this dress held everything up quite well. The fabric is amazing very flowy and extremely comfortable. I ended up buying this dress because I loved it so much. Color was vibrant. Rent it!!
Wore this for formal night on a cruise. It was perfect. Never felt like I was going to fall out. The length required only a little heel.
Loved everything about it The dress was bright & beautiful Fitting was perfect
Super comfortable and gorgeous. Loved this dress!!!

This technically fit me everywhere else, but my boobs looked so weird that it was a dealbreaker. The chest basically looked like I was wearing a bra that was 2 sizes too small (even without actually having a bra on) because I was spilling out and over the front of it and it was definitely not cute. I'd recommend sizing up if you have any cleavage at all, and maybe altogether avoiding this dress if you're bigger than a D cup. Otherwise really cute though! The length was perfect (5'7" in 3 inch heels) and the color is gorgeous.
I loved the color of this dress! It was very low cut so you can't wear a bra with it, but it's tight enough to feel comfortable.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for our engagement shoot and was obsessed! I got so many compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly. If you’re busty, this could show a lot more. I’m 5’4” 125 lbs and the 2R fit perfect except it was super long. I had to hold it up high whenever I walked. The customer before me returned my second size in a condition that it couldn’t be sent back to me which was really disappointing and nerve wracking but RTR sent a second style that I really loved!! But luckily the 2 fit perfect. The back was also way more open than I expected even after all the photos but I absolutely loved it!
Loved the color, lots of compliments. I had to hold it while walking because my legs are short even with heels.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Super comfortable and flattering.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my PA school formal. It was such a unique fun color with a great fit. I pretty much always wear an 8 but sized down for this one and am so glad I did. Its very flowy below the chest, so unless you have a large bust the backup should probably be a size down.

links_reviews_title: Felt comfortable and received a lot of compliments
links_reviews_text: Love this dress!
Beautiful and comfortable. Great color, flows nicely, and no need for a bra! I got compliments all night.

This was my backup style, but after I saw the vibrant color in person, I had to change into it halfway through my event. So comfortable! Stunning color, beautiful open back. You can't wear a bra with it, but it stays in place just fine.

Beautiful back up dress for a wedding. The color was gorgeous and the length was perfect. The 6 was actually shorter than the 4, which worked out well. No tape was needed for the sides which is a plus.

links_reviews_title: This dress is GORGEOUS. The color is absolutely stunning and it fits perfectly
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'4 159lbs 36B. I wore the 8R and I'm usually a 10-12. It is very long so you will need heels. It's pleated in the front so very flattering if you have some post-baby belly to hide!

links_reviews_title: This dress is a winner. Loved everything about it
links_reviews_text: This dress was great. It is super flowy making it very comfortable to wear throughout the night. I am 5'4 and the dress was a bit long even in my 3 inch heels. I wore petals with it which I would suggest because the material is a bit thinner. I got compliments on this dress the entire night and it really made me feel confident. Definitely would suggest for a beach formal!
If you are long-waisted, top tall, or just plain tall, this isn't for you! Size up if so! I rec for petites.
I loved wearing this -- it was just long enough in the torso and legs for me at 5'8, and the waist-defining sash was clutch. Be ready to grab attention. A little heavy for summer wear.

Fun Jumpsuit for a family reunion. in. the city. Very Flattering. A little big up top but would recommend this outfit to stand out at any event. I am 5'2" so the. length was just right - if you are tall this will be a shorter leg.

links_reviews_title: Well I met Milo Ventimiglia in this outfit, so there's that
links_reviews_text: LOVED this jumpsuit and got so many compliments. I get worried about anything with pants sometimes cause I'm so short, but it fit really well

links_reviews_title: Perfect semi-formal outfit and very comfortable
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a semi-formal event, was super comfortable and got lots of compliments! Only complaint is since I have more of a booty it gave me a little bit of camel toe if I didn't pull at it correctly but it wasn't a big deal. Also had to wear stick on bra because it comes too low in the back and on the sides but clearly isn't too revealing which I liked. Would love to own this piece!
This jumpsuit is incredibly short-waisted. At 5'3 it was still too short around me. The fabric was also a bit scratchy.

links_reviews_title: This sparkly jumpsuit is a STUNNER
links_reviews_text: Rented this to wear to my birthday dinner with my parents!! Paired it with a red lip and it was seriously stunning. So many compliments! I recommend this to everyone , plus it's easy and crazy comfortable!!!

Ordered for a girls weekend in Las Vegas to wear to a show. Stood out from all the sequin dresses and was way more comfortable too. Low back so wore a sticky bra but could probably have gone without one. If you are a short person with a butt and somewhere fun to go, stop looking and rent this jumpsuit!

Wore this for NYE. It was sooo comfortable and not restricting at all. Wore it sans bra because of the low back -- it was well lined so I didn't feel uncomfortable doing so. I wore 3 inch heels as I'm just over 5 feet and surprisingly it fell perfectly! Would definitely recommend this jumpsuit!!!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous but rides up if you're tall
links_reviews_text: Much more sparkly than expected but loved it! Got many compliments but wore a sweater over it because 1) the arm holes are too big and cut down too low and 2) at 5'7 even the 10 was too short on me, I had to keep pulling t down BUT neckline and color are beautiful
Perfect for a pre-NYE dinner party with friends. Loved the sparkle and the low back. Very comfortable. I'm 5'2" with short legs and did not feel it ran long at all. Kind of short through the torso.

Super comfortable, has POCKETS, and very shiny, it was super fun to wear. Felt true to size in the width, but I am only 5'2" - I feel like maybe someone who is tall might have some pulling in the crotchal region. Also I wore flats and the length was great, the pants would be ankle length for anyone taller or wearing heels.

I never would've picked this up in a store but I got so many compliments on it. A great baggy leg with an elastic waist made it really comfy. I sized up slightly and the only impact was a bit of side boob.
Style is great. But unfortunately it is short for me.

Loved this flashy jumpsuit for a night out in Vegas! I'm 5'8" and the R length bordered on cameltoe so if you are any taller go for the L length. Paired with giant hoops to really go for the 70s look. Received tons of compliments. Plus, pockets!

This pant suit was true to size and flattering. It was fun and sparkly for New Year's Eve. My only complaint is that the fabric is a little abrasive, fine for an evening party but would have bothered my skin for a longer event.

I havent even left my house yet but Im so in love with how this jumpsuit fits. I'm 5'2 and it is the perfect length, i can actually wear sandals and it not touch the ground. I added my own black belt. Would rent again

links_reviews_title: Everyone wanted to take pics of me in my 'Disco 2018' jumpsuit
links_reviews_text: You can also wear backward for a deep cleavage, chest plunging, Studio 54, Bianca Jaggeresque, LOOK

I didnt wear this piece because my plans were cancelled but it was really pretty. The fabric is super shiny in the light and the belt is a good addition. If youre in between I would size down cuz waist is stretchy and plenty of room.

links_reviews_title: Great jumpsuit, not for tall women
links_reviews_text: The size 6 fit well except it was a couple inches too short in the body so I couldn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Really amazing but SUPER short torso
links_reviews_text: I wasn't sure I would like this; I didn't think it would be sparkly enough for the occasion I was renting it for, based on the pictures. But when I opened the bag I was SO excited and pleased. It looked perfect. Then I put it on. This is actually really comfortable and cute and could even be flattering on someone with a short torso. But for me, it gave me the worst camel toe of my entire life. So if you have a long torso or a butt or belly that might extend the length of this, then I don't think this is the right piece for you.

Adorable simple jumpsuit that fit perfectly. It has a low-cut back but not so low I couldn't wear a regular bra, that's really going to depend on you and your body type. Got a lot of compliments on this, just a simple, sparkly silver jumpsuit. Super on trend!

links_reviews_title: DO NOT consider if you have long torso
