links_reviews_text: I have a longer torso, I'm 5'9" and 140 lbs, normally size 6 so finding a jumpsuit that fits is a constant struggle. However this jumpsuit has an exceptionally short torso so steer clear unless you're on the shorter side
I wore it twice! In Paris and at a welcome party for a wedding
Casual/fun or elegant. Super comfy. There was a snag in the left leg (like someone caught a bracelet or purse), but otherwise perfect.

I often have trouble finding clothes to fit my larger chest, but this was one of the weirdest fitting outfits I have ever tried on. I am already short-waisted, but this was very short in the waist/crotch - since it is all one piece it rode up in the front/crotch and was very unflattering. Meanwhile the straps were long, and it was very low-cut in the back and under the arms - there is no way to wear a bra, but it is so loosely cut that it won't give you any support without one.

links_reviews_title: Fun and unexpected material for a jumpsuit. Not bra friendly.
links_reviews_text: I would have worn this again and again if the back of the jumpsuit didn't dip down so low. The material is comfortable and has a beautiful shine. The belt is detached and gives you a nice waist line. It was the perfect height to wear with heels and I could have almost worn flats but the fabric would have dragged a bit. For reference I am 5 feet 4 inches tall. If you have a longer torso, you may want to skip this jumpsuit. I have an average length torso for my height. Just a little longer of a torso and I would have had a camel situation.... :/ I had planned on wearing in Chicago for Valentine's Day. No bra in Chicago in February just isn't comfortable.
Wore for New Year's Eve and for several compliments
Loved the material and everything about it. Couldn't wear it as a taller girl, will try a size up!
I did not wear it

Easy to wear, comfortable fit. Length was good on me, 5'1" tall, with heels. The backs was a little low for a regular bra but pins made it work and as other reviewers mentioned the arm holes are a little big so I had to be careful to not have my bra show.

I steer clear of this one unless you have a short torso. I'm petite 5'2'' and my torso is regular size, proportional to the rest of by body. This jumpsuit gave me crazy bad camel toe. I was embarrassed just looking at myself in the mirror. It went back immediately.

links_reviews_title: order size larger if you have a long torso
links_reviews_text: loved the fit and fabric

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit is effortlessly elegant. Absolutely stunning.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit - so flattering.
Such a fun outfit to wear. I wore it for a holiday party and received many compliments

The arm holes are very deep. The overall look is too big; however, I have a long torso and any smaller and the rise wouldn't fit. It has a strange drape right over your tummy that accentuates the area. The back is just low enough that you can't wear a bra, but the fabric is thin. Didn't wear it.

This jumpsuit is a very fun fabric! Being 5'6 1/2 this jumpsuit was a little to short for my liking. It was definitely tea length and rode up a little bit in the midsection when walking. The waistband especially offered the most room when it came to stretch and comfort-ability. Definitely would recommend for a party or night out setting as it is a very shiny, attention grabbing fabric and color.

It's super cute and festive for Nye but just too long for me (5'2, 120 lbs, 34c bust). The image looks like its supposed to be above the ankle but it was dragging on the floor for me. Also the waist tie was missing so there was just belt loops sticking out... The portions were also super strange.. rode up a lot and the top seemed too short (I have a short torso - so didn't make sense!). If they made for petites I prob would have worn it.
Runs large. Too much side boob.
As long as you do not walk or sit, it is a great skirt. Slit is way to high for work and when you walk it rides up by the pockets. Received compliments all day on the skirt, great fabric and design.
Higher slit than I would like, but was fun! Skirt had a tendency to want to twist on you.
Had higher hopes, but the center slit is SO HIGH it literally rises up to an "uncomfortable" place. I put this on to go out and had to go back and change before I made it two blocks!

Thick materials but the slit and print makes it summery. I don't think wearing it with tights would work because it kind of rides up. I'm about 5 months PP and it hides what you want it to hide and I've received many compliments. When you sit the slit is kinda high but just close your legs. I like it but don't LOVE it, great for work/professional setting. The length and belt are great.

Aaargh...torn. I'm short and apple shaped, I'm not sure the high waist look compliments my overall figure. I got some compliments but also some other questioning looks. But the end of the day I felt uncomfortable and self conscious. The belt was also missing.

Loveeeeee I've worn this 4x now including tomorrow. So versatile, the day pictured I have long sleeve black top with black stockings and black boots. Another day i wore a black Tshirt, nude tights and pumps. Another I had a white top on. Note: all the tops must be tight to give the correct look. The slit goes up a bit when sitting at work but you just need to seat yourself right. Material is great, doesnt wrinkle or if it does you dont notice. The belt came packaged separately nicely in its own pouch. Very obviously expensive and well made.
Great skirt!!!
Fun print, true to size, good work skirt, doesn't set my life on fire. Has pockets on the butt with flaps that stick out which is unfortunate.
The pattern is very Hawaiian. It's very high waist. Slit in middle makes it hard to sit but if you're not sitting, super sexy/cute

links_reviews_title: Girl date win! Super fashionista classy and loves your curves
links_reviews_text: I am a big bummed 5"11 girl and this skirt killed it. I loved it. It was maybe an inch high in the slit but I loved it regardless- got stopped by strangers. Take the plunge - I found it to be worth it!! Skirt has a bit of stretch but better for those with big butts and flatter bellies than the other way round- as the pockets in the front will pull. Sits high on the hips. Very sexy.
Nice bold pattern, really cool for work or weekend.
Should have listened to the other reviews. Slit is way too high. Super inappropriate for work. Your underwear shows when you sit. Too bad because the skirt is sooo cute.
I ordered the 4 because it was all that was left and all though it's big, it still looked good. I still recommend sizing down unless your hips are on the wider side
Skirt looked and felt great.

links_reviews_title: Very cute but the zipper is funky.
links_reviews_text: Zipper was really hard to zip up - so once I put this on, it was ON. Made going to the bathroom very interesting.
I’m 5’7 and it was a perfect rise on my torso
Definitely something different but I loved it!
This skirt feels so expensive! It's perfect for work . I'm petite and the skirt was the right length

Loved the print and overall fit, however I'm still iffy on the style. The waist sat very high up, it was almost at my bust! So probably good for women with long torsos. The slit is very high up so it makes sitting a bit difficult. I loved that the skirt had pockets!
This skirt was cute but if you have hips just a warning it is a little snug.

links_reviews_title: When you put something on and you just know you look good.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a family girls luncheon. I paired it with a cap sleeved white T-shirt with navy piping. I got a lot of compliments on how cute the skirt was. It fits true to size. The material is very thick, so it might be warm on a hot day. It opens up higher on your thighs when you sit dow but nothing terrible. Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: No belt came with it, so i used my own
links_reviews_text: Flattering
Loved this skirt! Well made and fit well. Very high waisted but looked great with fitted white top. Would rent again.
didn't wear
Fits terribly. I don't know who this was made for.
Skirt was so thick and almost cardboard like. The slot in the front is a little high to wear to work
This was one of my favorite rentals to date. The high waist is extremely flattering. The cross cross asymmetrical waistband gives the pencil skirt a unique unexpected flare. Loved it!
Loved this so much! This skirt was made great and such a fun, different shape! It ran a little small but overall I loved it!
Beautiful skirt. Very different than anything else I own. I rented it for work and ended up wearing it to a party with a crop top as well. I will definitely rent this again!

Great material. Cute pattern. But while the waist fit true to size (maybe because I have a booty), it was snug and the pockets are almost right in the middle of the front and it just felt awkward. Did not work for me.
Not for my 5'3 hourglass figure! The location of the pockets on this skirt made me feel fat. I didn't wear this.
Skirt was a to tight, and the slit was not appropriate for work!

I tried this on and it was much heavier and stiff than I assumed it was in the photos. I chose this for a Mexico vacation and it just felt too thick, stiff and heavy for me personally. Felt more like costume wear. then again, I am new to RTR and wearing "adult" clothing so perhaps this is how it feels! For me I just didn't feel comfortable in it.
Not what I was looking for

I rented this dress for an auction fundraiser. This dress was comfortable but still formal enough. Flattering. Would recommend. I felt it ran a little small. I usually wear a 6 but that was tight in the chest. I wore the 8.
Loved the fit, beautiful colors and fun and festive. I received lots of compliments. I wore it to a gala that was "cocktail" attire.
Great quality and fun to wear!! Has pockets and able to wear normal bra!!!!

links_reviews_title: Compliments from the most unlikely people!
links_reviews_text: I couldn't believe the compliments I got from folks who are normally very quiet. I'm normally a size 2, so I ordered the 2 and the 0, based on other reviewers. The 2 fit perfectly. Be warned, the shape of the top cuts in a bit at the shoulders, so you have to remember to stand up straight or you'll get weird looking fat rolls in front of your armpits 😂

links_reviews_title: Favorite dress, wish I could buy!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a KNOCKOUT. The fit was unbelievable (I usually wear and 8 but sometimes wear a 6 and here I wore a 6). The fabric was light but thick enough to not wrinkle. The colors were vibrant and the pleats were a fun addition. The length was flirty but appropriate for the rehearsal dinner I wore it to. I wore with a pink shawl and navy heels. I already confirmed a rental of this again for a wedding in January! 10/10 recommend.

links_reviews_title: The colors were perfect. And the style was flattering.
links_reviews_text: It was big in the bust. I could have taken it in an inch on each side. I wish I would have ordered the size 0. But it wasn't noticeable to anyone but me.

I really loved this dress! I wore it to an engagement party as a guest. Got multiple compliments. I loved the pockets - didn't have to bring a purse! However I was not able to wear a real bra, some of the reviews stated. The cut of the top shows a little side boob but nothing too showy. Overall very pleased and would rent again!

Loved the colors in this dress and the length was actually decent (I am 4'10" so it's usually a problem). This does run a little big, you can see in the pic that the straps are an inch above my shoulder. If I had worn my hair down I probably could have hid this. I actually didn't end up wearing it because of this and didn't have the option to select the next size down as a backup which probably would've worked out better.

Did not end up wearing this as it smooshed my breasts (36D). I am unsure if going up to a size 10 from the 8 would've mattered with the designated nipple areas. My husband said it was an oddly made dress because of the pointed chest area. Other than that beautiful color and love dresses with pockets.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner and it did not disappoint!
links_reviews_text: The bust area did fit a bit large but overall the dress fit very well and I received a ton of compliments on it!
Love the fit (hid my mom belly). Has pockets!

links_reviews_title: The dress had pockets and I could wear a normal bra!
links_reviews_text: Got so many compliments on this dress. It was so fun for a summer wedding and fit perfectly. Pockets were a huge plus and the colors and materials were so vibrant!
This dress is very cute and fun for someone younger

This old lady felt young in this dress! I loved the colors, they were so rich and I loved the feel of the fabric. The pouf of the skirt was flirty but not overly so. The higher neckline was great because I did not have to accessorize with anything other than earrings and bracelets. The best part - it had pockets! Downside - the side darts make it look like my nipples are showing. They are not. I am a 32D and filled out the dress, but not to the point of making the darts stick out. Steaming does nothing for making them lay down as it is the design of the dress. However - the pros outweighed the whole dart issue. Rent it - you won't regret it!
Received lots of compliments and loved the fit. Didn't need a strapless as it was really snug around the chest, would have had to size up if my chest were slightly larger (36C/38B).

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Super comfortable and the fit was great. Pockets!!!!
links_reviews_text: I can range between a 4 and a 6 pretty easily when it comes to dresses, but the 4 in this one was ultimately the one that worked out. The pockets were FANTASTIC and I felt super comfortable the whole night.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for High School Graduation Ceremony
links_reviews_text: I wore this to my son's high school graduation. I loved the dress & received several compliments. I ordered an 8 with 10 as a backup. Since the zipper would not budge on the 8 (and my husband was scared to force it lest he break it!) I wore the 10. It was slightly too big in the top but only noticeable to me. I loved that it had pockets. My keys went in one, my phone in the other and I didn't have to worry about a purse.

I love the puffiness of the skirt and the pop of color. The arm holes are low. I had to wear a racer back bra. Next time I need to order a size up due to no stretch in the fabric and i have a large rib cage. I will be renting this dress again! Great to dance in!

This dress was great! I received compliments all night. Everyone especially loved the vibrant colors. I loved that it had pockets, was easy to wear and was a great length (above the knee, but not short where I felt like I would show off the booty). The dress did have some weird creases when I took it out of the bag, so we had to steam those out. The top is definitely large for anyone with a narrow rib cage and a smaller chest. I'm a 32A and had to wear my bra that amplifies the chest to be a couple sizes larger so that the dress didn't gap on top. The size 2 was huge on my chest, so I'm glad the 0 worked. The waist is fitted, so if you have a small chest and more of an apple shape, this dress probably won't work. Overall, loved the dress!
Perfect fit

links_reviews_title: Wore this to the KY Oaks and it was super comfy! Got tons of compliments! Love the pockets!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. Length is perfect and material was light.
I love everything about this dress. It was my second time renting it. I love the fit, the style, the colors and of course the pockets.

links_reviews_title: Loved how comfortable and bright it was.....and pockets!!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to Kentucky Oaks day. It was comfortable, high quality and just the right amount of pink. Very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Starlight Affair: A Night Under the Stars Co-Chair
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous colors, it's fun, feminine AND has pockets!!! I received numerous compliments. Perfect for summer events.
The dress felt a tad short, but not enough to make me self conscious. Tons of room underneath so no need for Spanx.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! Would love to buy it!
links_reviews_text: It has pockets! This dress was beautiful! Sooo many compliments! I was very pleased and would rent it again. I love that I could wear a racer back bra. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Color and fit was great! Perfect for the fashion show!
links_reviews_text: I wore this great dress for a pageant appearance!
I wear a size 8 and wore the size 8. It hit me at the perfect length. Very comfortable and the pockets are a great feature.
This dress was sooo cute, I received a million compliments and it has POCKETS!
Loved this dress! Fun, dressy... made me feel super cute for the last night of our family cruise!

links_reviews_title: Two of my closest friends were getting married to each other!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me PERFECTLY! The fit & flare was so cute and the pockets were so great to store my phone and a mini paper fan that guests received because it was 95 degrees outside. I also loved the colorblocking and received lots of compliments!
Pockets!!
Wore it for my birthday party

links_reviews_title: Loved the color block and pockets on this dress! Wore to a wedding and received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size, I'm 5'3 and length was perfect

links_reviews_title: Fun colors for my office's holiday party!
links_reviews_text: Definitely size down in this one - it runs large! It was very flattering on my petite frame with short torso. Lots of compliments throughout the evening.

links_reviews_title: Pictures don't do it justice! Beautiful, fun dress. I got so many compliments. And it has pockets!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so much fun to wear that I was sad to send it back. It doesn't come larger than a 14 and this size fit me like a glove. It was really comfortable and didn't require any special undergarment - I wore a strapless bra just to avoid any slipping straps and a pair of slip shorts. I wore it as a member of the wedding and it was a huge hit! The rental process was so easy!

links_reviews_title: LOVE this dress! I want to buy it!!!
links_reviews_text: True to size. Very flattering. So many compliments.

links_reviews_title: This dress was cute. I loved the poof of the bottom and the pockets.
links_reviews_text: This dress ran a bit big, especially in the bodice. It wasn't overly noticeable and I was still happy with it.

links_reviews_title: This was my first RTR experience and I'm hooked.
links_reviews_text: I chose this dress because it was opposite of what I would usually choose if I were buying something for a special occasion. I have a larger waist for someone my size, so it was a tad snug at first. By the end of the evening, the dress felt comfortable. I received so many compliments on this dress. I'm about 5 feet tall, 110lbs and I wore a size 0. I tried on the size 2 and it was way too big in the top. The size 0 was slightly large in the bust, but not noticeably so. I also loved that I could wear regular underwear with this dress. Comfort all the way. I loved my backup dress as well, but the size was too small. I will order it for my next event in the correct size.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress! This dress has pockets. Game changer when your husband is in the wedding party.
links_reviews_text: Fit and flare fit. Heard this dress ran big so I went down a size. Ended up having to wear the bigger size. Fit true to size for me. Loved the pockets. Comfortable enough to dance the night away.

I rented this for a "black tie optional" charity fundraising event. At 5'9" the long length worked well for me and my 3" heels. I added a beaded black chiffon shawl with it. I wear a 40G bra and went with the 22L after reading reviews. There's no stretch in the chiffon. I tried a 20R in this dress and it was way too small. I typically wear an 18/20 off the rack. The dress has two under linings which makes it a bit warm. The gathered waistline is asymmetrical which kind of looked off balance to me but ti worked fine for my event.
Believe it or not I rented this gown for work because I envisioned making it casual chic with a turtle neck and a leather jacket. It's so feminine and pretty and was a perfect outfit.

Rented this for my birthday brunch and I felt so beautiful in it. Received tons of compliments. Feels and looks expensive. The top does run a little large. I'm a 36DD and this was loose at the top so I pinned it. I'm usually a 12 and sized up to a 14 (after reading reviews). Glad I did and the 14 fit. There's not give at the waist. I wish I would have rented a Long since the Regular length only came down to my ankles. I paired with a black leather jacket to make it less formal.

links_reviews_title: Loved the feel and flow of this dress!
links_reviews_text: This was my first time renting and I am so glad I did! Really loved the look of this beautiful gown, but it didn't fit as well as I had hoped it would, I should have gone a size down. Overall great experience for a special weekend.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, but size up if your chesty or broad.
links_reviews_text: I wanted to wear the 10P but there is no give in the waist. With a large chest and not having a narrow waistline, I had to go with the 12 which unfortunately was a long. With 3-4 inch heels, it was a little too long but worked. If you aren't comfortable with cleavage this no not the dress for you. I loved it and was comfortable all night. I had to adjust a few times but that was from having to size up to accommodate other areas. The zipper was a little difficult even when just on the hanger.
Fit was good. Very comfortable. A bit low cut so needed a top under. Wore flats and it wasn't too long.
Loved everything about this dress. There are lots of layers and folds and it flows really well. Great pattern.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful summertime dress. Flattering and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my boyfriend's birthday. Semi formal dinner date. It was elegant, simple, and yet noticeably glamorous. I am 6 feet tall. I did not wear heels. However, my ankles were still visible. I would've liked it to be longer. The reason for four stars is because I have a smaller chest and it's obvious the woman that wore it before me stretched out this top area. So I was constantly adjusting it. Other than that it was a hit! I would definitely wear it again.

I wore this dress to a wedding shower. It was great. The dress is light and breezy. Someone spilled a glass of water on me and it actually dried pretty quickly and didn't affect the look too much. It's a little magical. I'm not very tall and the length was actually a little shorter on me than I expected, and I had to wear flats. If I were to get this dress again, I might get the long so I could wear heels. The bust was a little low cut for this event, so I pinned it a bit higher.

links_reviews_title: When I put this dress on my 2yo daughter pointed at me and said "dat princess??" A winner :)
links_reviews_text: Runs a little generous, especially in the busy area. I had to safety pin for modesty.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved this dress! I had so many compliments on it, I wish I could have bought it!
links_reviews_text: Fit was TTS, low cut so be prepared to not wear a bra or a deep v-neck bra. Super light and comfortable for an outdoor wedding! I had a few issues with the zipper on the back sticking but was able to fix it myself.

I was right between sizes 16 & 18. I could squeeze into the 16 and it looked perfect, but was not comfortable. I opted to wear the comfortable 18. The 18 looked huge on me, but with a little fashion tape I secured it to my bra in a way that highlighted my cleavage and pushed the bulk towards my back. It was the perfect solution. Comfortable and fitted. Also, it blows beautifully in a breeze. Would rent this or same style, different pattern, again in a heartbeat.

The length for the "long" size was perfect for me with about 2" heals. The v-neck was pretty low and would show my bra at times. I don't think I could've worn the dress without a bra. Very pretty dress though!
Fits great and I got lots of compliments

I gave birth two months ago and am currently breastfeeding. This dress was the perfect option for my sister-in-law's wedding. It has a solid back, so you can wear a regular bra (or pumping/nursing bra, in my case.) I didn't receive the 16WR, so I'm not sure if that one would have been a better fit, but the 18WR fit very comfortably. The cross front top made it easy to access for pumping mid-reception in my car without stripping down, but still stayed together so I felt covered and not like I would fall out at any point while dancing. The bottom was lined without much stretch as described, but it was still very true to size, so there was room to move. I got so many complements while wearing the dress and it was perfect for the occasion.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and perfect for beach wedding
links_reviews_text: It fit great but was a bit low cut yet I was able to wear a bra. Might be a bit better for smaller chested woman but length was just perfect on me with and without heels.

links_reviews_title: Never received more compliments on any dress ever!
links_reviews_text: LOVED this dress. I wore it for my bridal shower brunch, and loved it so much that I wore it to a birthday dinner that evening too. The dress is very long - I'm 5'2" and wore the petite length with 2" heels, and still tripped over it a bit when I walked up stairs and had to be careful about sitting/standing in chairs that it didn't get caught. The top is also very big so I had to tape/pin it at the chest so it wasn't too revealing. Still, the cut is flattering and I've never received so many compliments on a dress - not just from people I knew but strangers at the restaurant too!

Flowy and romantic! Fits true to size. Gained some weight and have not been comfortable in my own clothes lately so I rented for the wedding. Hides tummy imperfections flawlessly. Warning for those that are shy when it comes to your cleavage because this dress doesn't hide it. The bust is not self supportive and must be worn with a bra but you can wear your everyday bra with this dress instead of a specialty bra which just adds to the comfort. Definitely would rent again.
I wore this for a dinner out at the beach. It's flowy, comfortable, & gorgeous. I'm 5'9" and the regular length skimmed the floor when I put on 2" heels. Love it!

Wore this to a beach wedding. Very flowy and gorgeous. I am 5’8, I wore with flats and it was perfectly skimming the floor. It was very revealing in the chest, girls were definitely out on display but the rest of the dress is modest and I was able to wear a normal bra with it.

links_reviews_title: Unique in a sea of black dresses!
links_reviews_text: Great fit, flattering cut. Dress it up or down. I did mine up for an evening auction with chunky sparkle necklace, stud earrings and gold heels and purse. Tons of compliments!!
Really gluey, well made, pretty gown! I wore this to a formal affair that was Polynesian themed. It was a hit! I went up to a 14 in this dress; for perfectly.

This dress was beautiful and comfortable. I got lots of compliments. I could have worn an 8R except I'm an hourglass shape and there is a fitted underskirt that would have been tight through the hips. This was actually my back up dress and I couldn't have been more please. Renting again!

links_reviews_title: It was for my engagement pictures
links_reviews_text: The top was a little big but I used double sided tape and it was fine.

links_reviews_title: Went to a late afternoon gala where the dress code was "summer elegant" - tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: tight in the bust area because of the fabric - required help zipping, but a sold fit everywhere else! would definitely wear again!

My original dress did not fit so this was the "panic" dress. I can't say the fit was my favorite but I did love the pattern and the material. The 10L probably would have fit better but it was not available. This dress literally arrived 3 hours before my event. There is a lot of material on the top and I felt it made me look larger than I already am. If I had some prep time, I think double sided tape would have done the trick. The length was good even with inch heels and that never happens when you're my height!

The fit was absolutely perfect. My regular size 12 for another dress wasn't going to make it in time so I was offered another dress in addition to my back up size for the original one I intended to wear. Back up size ended up fitting perfectly so didn't have a chance to wear this one. Would definitely rent again! I loved the cleavage as it was just the right amount for me.
Wore to engagement party. Felt so comfortable and got so many compliments.

I wore this dress for a summer wedding in California wine country. Unfortunately the original dress I had reserved was no longer available to ship but RTR was able to promptly ship this dress out with no complications. Because of the short notice, the only size close to mine that was available was 10L (I'm 5'5") so it was definitely a little long on me but beautiful nonetheless. A little big on the bust (I'm a 36D) but a carefully positioned safety pin was able to do the trick. Definitely would recommend wearing this dress.

This dress is incredibly well made! It is so flowy and light but still had 2 layers of lining so it was not see through at all. It was perfect for a 78 degree Chicago summer wedding. I wanted a maxi dress because I didn't want to have cross my legs all night long and to hide kinesiotape that I need on my knees every day. This fit the bill. My husband loved the dress on me! I wore a size 20 because after 3 kids in the last 4 years I need a forgiving dress. This was forgiving it a lot of ways. Some maxi dresses make me relook pregnant again but this did not. My chest is a 38 DDD and I often have a hard time finding dresses that fit well enough on top and aren't too long or too big everywhere else. This dress for my chest size was too big. The arm opening area was huge in the armpit to the point that I was constantly worried my undergarment would show. Also it was so big on top that the back of the neckline kept hiking up on me (I'm 5'6") that the zipper would catch in my hair at the nap of my neck. Other than that it was a great dress. I was worried it would be too long and it was alright with 2 inch heels. Flats, I would have been stepping on it. Overall, a pretty dress. This was my first experience with RTR and I am trying it again in November.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on the way
links_reviews_text: You can't not to love this one, so flattering, feminine, amazing!
Loved the dress! Lots of compliments and I felt absolutely beautiful! Perfect for a beach wedding- looks great when the wind blows :)

links_reviews_title: This dress was the perfect summer Maxi for my best friends bridal shower! The fit was great!
links_reviews_text: LOVED the fit! The long was a little too long for me but I had high heels I wanted to wear with it so I thought it would be good. The 16 fit great and I was able to wear a bra with it no problem!
I'm usually a size 6 but I felt more comfortable in the size 8. This dress was so beautiful and everyone loved it. I got so many compliments. It was hard sending this dress back!

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel like a princess!!!
links_reviews_text: I'm a 34 DD and the top was still big on me. I have just lost weight and I ordered both the 14L and 16L the 14 is what I wore. I received so many compliments and this was the easiest dress I have ever worn. I was even able to wear a normal bra with this dress! Would def consider ordering it again for another wedding!!!

This dress made me feel so beautiful. I wish I would have worn a NuBra with this or at least a nude colored bra! I didn't realize how much of my bra would peek out throughout the night. True to size. I'm 5'6" and wore with 4 inch heels, the length on the 14 long was perfect. Don't miss this one, you won't be disappointed!

links_reviews_title: From wizard lunch to the symphony in the same day.
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous and I felt fabulous wearing it. It is not for anyone who wants good chest coverage though. The cut is beautiful and the dress stays in place well, so what starts out covered stays covered. The waist is tight with no stretch, but everything else about the fit of the dress is comfortable. At 5'4 (and a half) I was able to wear flats without any issue. The dress floats out of the way when you walk. If you are thinking of wearing it to an outdoor event in summer in someplace like Florida, be prepared to be hot. There are two layers of not that breathable lining underneath the beautiful outer layer.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fabric and fit- didn't want to return!
links_reviews_text: One of my favorite rentals from RTR! Fabric was light and forgiving, I didn't need the long with 3 inch wedges. I'm short-waisted, so the dress bunched in the back but you couldn't tell due to the fabric. I pinned the front to keep my undergarments from showing, but I was totally comfortable all night! So many compliments and I wish I could keep it forever!

links_reviews_title: Elegant gown, but wasn't fitted enough
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for an outdoor wedding. The pattern of this dress is beautiful and it's very elegant, but I had a couple issues with it. 1) The fabric is NOT breathable. I was very warm the entire time!! 2) The cut of the dress wasn't fitted enough around the torso for me. I ended up having to belt it to give it a decent shape. I've had this same issue with other dresses by this designer (Badgley Mishka), and won't rent one again. They're just not flattering for women with narrow waists.

This was a backup dress sent to me for a black tie wedding. It was not dressy enough for a black tie at all. It has no stretch. It was also very long. I had at least an extra 4 inches extra with 3 inch heels. It's light and flowy and very pretty.

Wore this dress to the church ceremony for my son's wedding. Beautiful colors. And the fit was fabulous. Not too loose and not too tight. It did itch a bit around the neck and arms but not to the point it was annoying. Got so many compliments! Will order it again for another gala later this Fall.

links_reviews_title: Chic and comfortable at a formal summer wedding
links_reviews_text: LOVED this. It's beautiful and a teeny bit edgy while still being conservative. The fabric has no stretch at all, so I opted for a size 10 (I'm typically either an 8-10, and the 10 was the right choice). The cut was super flattering--I didn't need to wear shape wear or even a bra with it. The colors are beautiful, I got tons of compliments. The one downside is that the seam of the collar got pretty itchy/irritating after a couple of hours. But in general, this was a winner. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Sophisticated style! I'll rent it again
links_reviews_text: Loved it. I received numerous compliments and will rent again. I wore it to work.

This dress is completely gorgeous. The cobalt blue is so vibrant, the lace is thick and really well made. The dress does run slightly small maybe, but it's more of a zipper issue. It was a little tight to get it over my butt and hips to get it on and off, but once on it didn't feel too tight. The skirt is narrow, but I was able to move and dance pretty comfortably. One of my absolute favorites.
True to size and comfy! Would definitely rent again!
Derby perfect
The dress fits very slim through the hips and legs and there is no give in the fabric. Don't wear this if you need to move a lot! However, it is a pretty dress.
Fully lined, wear a strapless bra for sure.

This dress runs very small. I normally wear an 8, and had even lost a little weight before my event. The 10 zipped, but the 12 was much more comfortable. The thick lace on the skirt is to die for, and the whole thing felt expensive and special. The color is vibrant and eye catching. I loved the way the satin lining felt and where the waist hit on the dress. The only downside was that the top didn't highlight my shape as much as I'd hoped, and the neckline was itchy, but I felt gorgeous all night. Overall, one of my favorite rentals of all time!

links_reviews_title: This was the perfect dress for our formal engagement photos look!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. The colors are vibrant and show beautifully in photos. The lace detailing makes this dress so special.

This dress is very elegant and I got a lot of compliments. It's a midi length and due to the straight skirt be advised you don't have a large range of motion. The dress ran small and I went up one size from my usual size. Otherwise it was a stunning dress! Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a derby party!
links_reviews_text: Love the color of this dress. It was perfect for the Kentucky derby themed event at the conference I attended. Conservative Enough for a work event but still fun. Lined all the way to the knee. Cons - runs small through the hips and the lace has no stretch. You will need a strapless bra.
This dress was beautiful! I felt so elegant wearing it. The fabric definitely doesn't give, so take that into account if you want to dance in it!

This didn't quite fit me due to it being a little snug (fabric does not have any give), luckily my sister is quite petite and she was able to wear it!) I would say this is more of a double zero... Dress is beautiful and photographs well.
Made with thick lace so I couldn't sit down without fear of ripping.
I revived tons of complements on this dress! Perfect fit slightly below the knee, narrow on the bottom so if you have a booty (I don't) it may be a tight fit. Other than that I absolutely loved it!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but not for short gals.
links_reviews_text: I love this dress! If I bought it (which I am thinking about) I would need to have the torso altered—it is just too long from the shoulders to the waste so it bunches in the back in a weird way. The length is longer but still looks great. There is also ZERO give. I didn't end up wearing this to my event because of the bunching but I would have if it didn't do that.
I felt very elegant. Didn't need to wear a bra. Loved the color and length
It ran a little small but was really flattering. It felt like it was tight in the right places to look form fitting but the top was forgiving. I was comfortable and felt great in it all night.

This is such a beautiful dress, with soft, quality lace. It does run a little small and the pencil skirt is a little restrictive going up stairs and dancing. Also the zipper goes all the way up to the neck, so definitely wear your hair up if you have long hair, and it doesn’t work well with scarf around neck since it got caught in that as well. Otherwise I loved it and got so many compliments! By the way, I’m 5’6, 145lb and wore size 8, which fit perfectly.

I wore this to a work event (I'm an event planner) where I was going to be highly visible all night. The 10 was perfect but I knew I would be up and down all night so I opted to size up for the room. I ended up on stage handing out awards! All the ladies in the room came up to ask me about the dress for the rest of the night! Great color and fit!
Adorable dress on- I'm curvy with a large bust and it was perfectly flattering and I had no issues with fit. Loved it and got a ton of compliments

links_reviews_title: Loved this for a warmer fall wedding day!
links_reviews_text: Felt great in this dress , wore the 6 for a little extra room- received many compliments as always when dressed in Rent the Runway!!!
Danced the night away in this beautiful dress! Felt amazing and got so many compliments. Decided to wear the size up as other reviews noted for a little more hip and leg room.

links_reviews_title: The color on the top was vibrant. I was felt confident and pretty in this one.
links_reviews_text: The material looked and felt high end. There is not much "give in the hip" area so I put this one on over my head rather than stepped in. I found the dress flattering because of the color and style. If you are larger in the hip and rear you may want the size up. I loved the dress and would wear again.

The fit is a little tight in the hip area so I wore a 10 instead of my usual 8. Other than that, this dress is simply beautiful and I received many compliments. The 10 fits like a glove! Remember to size up if your a tad bit wider on the hip area like me.
Wore for a work function. It is simple on beautiful. Tough to put on by yourself, need an extra set of hands.

The fabric on this one is something you have to feel to understand. The color is gorgeous, the cut is flattering, and it's fairly easy to move around in. The only drawback, and the only thing that kept me from giving it all stars, was the fabric on the high collar. Very scratchy, very uncomfortable. Otherwise, absolutely a pleasure to rent. Would totally recommend to any and all!
This dress is stunning in person! Different and edgy without showing too much skin. Countless complements the entire day.
Fit is fitted, very nice hues of blue! Material is nice, not itchy, closure on back of dress constantly catches your hair if long. Other than that, no complaints, was pretty, many compliments

I was skeptical about showing to much around the top, but the overlay netting was perfect under the top of the dress. I felt gorgeous! Received many compliments. I would give it five stars, but the option wasn't available. I ordered this dress at the last minute to blend with my husband's shirt. I literally ordered it Friday evening and it was on my doorstep Saturday morning. I absolutely love RTR!

links_reviews_title: The event was spectacular - a wedding held at the Beach and Tennis Club at Pebble Beach.
links_reviews_text: The dress was perfect for the wedding. The color's were beautiful and felt both fresh and classic. I got a TON of compliments!!

I absolutely loved this dress! Originally, I had rented the pink version of this dress to wear at my bridal shower. I was unsure of what size would fit best, so I got the pink one because it was available in 16W (and I was worried that designer clothing might run small). When the dress arrived the 16W was way too big, so RTR overnighted me this dress in the regular 16. The fit was perfect! I absolutely loved that this dress was not revealing and hit below the knee- so classy without looking old. The color was amazing in person, and I got so many compliments on the dress all day. I typically wear a size 16 in dresses and a 14 or 16 in pants, and the fit of this dress really was spot on. I will say that similar to other reviewers I did find the neck to be a little scratchy, but it was not unbearable by any means. This was my first rental from RTR, and I can not say enough good things about the stellar customer service and quality of the dresses. Rent this dress- it will not disappoint!

Beautiful dress, colors really popped! I received a ton of compliments. The dress is pretty long, I'm 5'10" and it was halfway down my calves which was perfect, may be an issue for someone quite a bit shorter than me though. As other reviews have said, not a lot of room to move if you're going to be dancing or moving a lot and runs small so size up. All in all loved this dress!
Material has no give, but fits like a glove! I'd recommend going a size up if you've got those hips like I do!
Could not have loved this dress more. Beautifully made and fit like a glove. As others have said required shorter strides and pulled the lace up slightly before sitting down.

I wore this dress to my graduation. Loved the colors and felt it was very flattering. Two things that bothered me was the zipper was incredibly difficult to get up and the neckline is made of lace so it was itchy after awhile.
This dress was lovely! Like other women have said, the bottom is a bit tight. I worn a strapless bra. I felt like a million bucks in it!

I ordered this dress for my sorority's spring formal and it was a huge hit! I took the recommendation and ordered a few sizes up in order to accommodate for the fact that the dress runs small. The dress looks best if you wear it with your hair up to show off the high neckline. I found the dress easy to sit and dance in and I received endless compliments on the look as a whole! This was my third time renting from RTR and I still haven't been disappointed once!
I loved the color and look of this dress, but does run small and limits your movements.

links_reviews_title: absolutely LOVED this dress. It made a lot of heads turned and I received a lot of compliments
links_reviews_text: This dress is stretchy and definitely fits all in the right places. Received so many compliments and my date did as well. The strap was a tad bit too long but it did not cause any issues for me. This dress definitely made me feel like I stole the spotlight.
This dress is AMAZING!! I was showered with compliments all night. It was a perfect dress for the occasion. I would rent this dress again in a heartbeat!

This dress is gorgeous, and compliments curves well! It fit well, but the straps are very long, which made me nervous that I would fall out of the top. Luckily some tape and pins saved the day. I usually wear a petite, so it might not be a problem for others.

This dress is one to stop the show! It is very tight and form fitting, so I suggest a size up to wear shape wear. The dress shows every curve- if you know what I mean. If too tight the shape wear lines could show. I think with a forgiving fabric I would be a size four but rented a 6&8. Size six was a bit loose but perfect for the shape wear. I used misses kisses low plunge backless push up "bra" to get my boobs situated. The straps are a bit long for my petite body so consider a way to pin if needed. I felt comfortable the whole night in this dress. Did not worry about being exposed or not being able to move.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a military ball and it was great!
links_reviews_text: Im 5'4 and it was perf with heels I have a short torso so the straps were a bit long but it really didn't bother me throughout the night

Overall I think the dress LOOKED great - loved the color and the style, the quality of construction was very good. The challenge with this dress is that (like many women) I'm a different size in the bust (8-10) than I am in the hips (14) but unlike my wedding dress (which was the same size I wore for this - 14) I'm not able to either a) 'get away' with wearing the bigger size on top or b) alter the dress. I tried wearing a stick on bra since one of my favorite features of the dress, the plunging back, did not allow for a regular bra. Even then I felt conscious the whole evening, making sure to stand and sit up very straight for fear of exposing myself on top. The alternate size I ordered was the 12R and while this was better on top, the fabric does not stretch or give at all and I wasn't able to move easily from the waist down. If you are close to or equally sized on top and bottom, GET THIS DRESS! It's stunning and benefits from woman with proper curves filling it out. If you are like me and less 'even', know that it might be trickier. I would recommend to others but would not rent again myself.

links_reviews_title: I loved the ease of returning the dress! It was great!
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing. My husband thought I looked gorgeous! It doesn't hide your insecurities though! Wouldn't recommend for anyone who has a tummy area they want to hide. I had to find the PERFECT spanks for it. Because of the low back, they still showed a tiny bit. I'm middle of the line as far as bust goes (32 D) and I was scared of a nip slip. I wore a sticky bra just to prevent it!

The color of this dress is gorgeous. It is elegant but sexy. However, the material has almost no give, it does not stretch. I was afraid I was going to burst a seam when I sat down, luckily I did not! I would recommend wearing this with spanx. Also, there is no real support built in for your breasts which is disappointing given the lowcut back of this dress, which does not accommodate most bras. If you're tall like me, you should definitely opt for the tall size. The regular is too short. It was fun for one night, but I would not rent again.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my Oscar-party murder-mystery 30th birthday party and felt very fancy and sexy!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit true to its size 4, which for me meant the top fit except the straps were too long (I usually wear size S/ 4 in shirts) and the bottom was VERY tight (I usually wear a size 6/28). If I had worn the size 6, the top would have fallen off. I’ll echo what someone else said in their review: this dress works *best* for people whose top and bottom halves are exactly proportional to each other, since it’s a woven silk and doesn’t stretch, but I felt sexy even though the fit wasn’t perfect. I found the “extra” fabric at the stomach a little annoying, until I had apps and cocktails. ;) But if you have a very flat tummy, it may hang strangely. On length: I’m 5’4” and don’t wear heels, so the dress was a few inches too long, but I never tripped over it. In the full-length photo, I was standing on my tiptoes, so if you’re taller than 5’7” this dress might be short on you. I would probably rent it again!
This dress fit perfectly except for being way too large and baggy in the abdomen area. I wanted to love it, but it looked so strange.
Fits kinda weird around the tummy area due to the cut but it ended up working out well! I still got a lot of compliments I would only recommend if you have an average body type.

links_reviews_title: Really flattering, but WAY too revealing for my taste!
links_reviews_text: This dress is pretty sexy, no doubt about it. It definitely hugs all your curves in the right places and it's true to size. Love the crimson color and the lace detail is beautiful but holy cleavage. I am a 36DD and everyone at the event would have definitely known it. This was a work related event as well, so even if I felt pretty uninhibited it would not have been appropriate at all. I also don't like how the sewn in cup detail is so tiny so if you're anything above a B-cup, the cup will look like it sits in the middle of your boob. Weird. Other than that, an A/B cup girl can wear this with no problem at all.

The dress is beautiful. I received a lot of compliments. I wore it to a wedding. I was a bit hesitant ordering it thinking it might be too bright of a red. The dress is more like a burgundy red color. I am 5'5, 34D, 29, 41. I ordered 2 sizes based on some reviews saying to size up. I ordered a size 6 and 8. Size 6- The straps were a little loose with some side boob. It fit super tight around my hips. To sit I had to raise the dress up. Size 8- It was really baggy around my stomach, waist, even around my hips. It did not compliment or show my figure. The dress is not made out of stretchy material. Without heels it was the perfect length. In the photo I wasn't wearing heels. With 5 inch heels it was like wearing a high water dress. But still beautiful.

Beautiful dress! Unfortunately the top runs very large. I ended up tying the straps in the back with a zip tie. The rest of the dress was gorgeous and I received many compliments on the color. It was more cleavage then I like, so I covered it with a shawl.

links_reviews_title: Elegant and sexy at the same time!
links_reviews_text: This dress is simply amazing. I felt sensual because of the tight fitting hips and the low neckline, but elegant because of the cut and the lace detailing. The fabric is SO soft and flowy and perfect for dancing or spinning around. There isn't much stretch, so make sure to get a larger size for your backup (I ended up wearing my larger backup). It is tight in the hips and butt and sitting was somewhat of a challenge, but if you have a less curvy figure then you won't have a problem. The lace makes it look feminine and romantic, and the thick straps kept everything in place without any tugging or adjusting.

Rented for part of a Halloween costume. I sized up thinking that I would need to for my bust, but the straps are way too long and there was awkward gaping in the armpits. I do love the the fabric though as it is very soft. It clings to show everything though, so if self conscious about midsection or bum you may want to skip.

Dress was great. I got the 4R & 6R as back up. I tried the 4R and it fit like a glove I didn't even try on the 6R. I have wide-ish hips and the dress felt so comfy. Top of the dress was small but it was ok for me since I'm small chested (36A) I'm pretty short (5'2") and the length was perfect with my high heels. It hovered right over the top of my heels which were about 4inches high. Overall great dress..tons of compliments. I wore it to a Roaring 20s Gala

links_reviews_title: Knock out dress, but tight in hips
links_reviews_text: Loved the deep red color and lac detail. The back fit perfectly but bc the hips and thighs run tight, there was a lot of extra fabric in the front. Looked better in person than it did in photos. You may want to size up!

This dress is elegant and sexy. I felt like a total bombshell. The only downside for me was the fit up top because I have a very short torso. The straps were too long, so I was adjusting a lot. But if you have a normal length torso it's definitely a 10!!!
Was a little baggy in center and was a little short. Would have gotten the long size if it was avail.

This dress made me feel very sexy and skinny. However, the fit of the dress was a little weird. The 2R fit best except for the bust. I am pretty small in the busy so not a problem I'm used to having. The 4R fit around the bust but was looser than I wanted around the waist and hips. Still loved the dress despite the fit issues!
This dress stole the show. I was nervous to wear it because it was more low cut than I hoped. I took a chance and I'm glad I did. I got multiple compliments and felt beautiful all night.
I never wanted to take this dress off. The fit was perfect and the mermaid cut is super flattering. I was able to dance in this as well!

links_reviews_title: So flattering! Femme fatale kind of dress
links_reviews_text: I received conpliments all night. Ideal for small breasts (would be hard to handle much larger boobs in this as mine kept popping out). Overall, it is super sexy with an old Hollywood flare. True to size.

Overall this dress was great and perfect for a black tie gala. I am a true size 4, and I ended up wearing the 4. The 6 fit more comfortably in the hips, but the bust area was way too big and the straps were falling off. The 4 fit more snugly around the hips, and though there was still some room in the busy, was an overall better fit. I am just over 5'7", and it was a bit shorter than I would have liked. I had on 3.25" heels, and the dress could have definitely been a bit longer. Received many compliments and felt great!
So many compliments - was the best dressed - this piece is so sexy and sensual and edgy because of the lace and the dress material- i absoltely love this
Loved this dress. Wore it for my hollywood glam holiday party and it was perfect. Size up if you have a booty :) I have an athletic body and it hugged in all the right places.

links_reviews_title: Sexy red dress perfect for christmas ball
links_reviews_text: This dress was very form fitting. I wore the 6r and i usually wear a 2/4 but since it was tight in the hips area because I have a booty I had to size up. I am small chested so the top was a little large but was fixed by using a sticky push up bra and pinning the straps in the back about an inch and the pins did not show. Love this dress so much and recieved many compliments and stood out.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful red wine color. Beautiful lace trim.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect for me and the fabric is very soft. Its a little tight around the hips which makes sitting down a little difficult at times. The bottom sways so beautifully while you are walking. Definitely makes me want to own this dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Gorgeous shade of red. Love the touch of black lace in the front and back.
links_reviews_text: I'm a 34D and the straps could have been tighter. Otherwise, nice slim fit through the hips and subtle flare out. Just the right length for 5'3" me in 4 inch heels.

The color was stunning in person and the lace details are very pretty. However, the dress fit super snug around the hips, and the chest area was too loose for me. I even bought silicone inserts to try and fill it in but it looked even more awkward. Also, I couldn't wear a bra with the dress. The back was way too low cut and the chest area was very exposed for me. I was worried the dress would look awkward, but I think it was mostly in my head because I was getting compliments all night, so I'm giving this piece a 4/5.

Had a million compliments! I️ covered it up with a lace cover but took it off end of night and it was amazingly sexy. The gloves had a classy touch everyone admired. I'm 5'7" 120lbs and the 0R fit just right. The material was not as thin as I️ though it would be. It was pretty thick and didn't need any ironing. I️ went bare, no bra with seamless panty and was perfect. By the end of night I️ felt it loosened up but it really tightened my curves and was very flattering. Love it!!!

Fabulous dress with lace! This dress was wow! I loved the color and the fit in person even though it was a little tighter in the hips. There is no stretch to the fabric so deff recommend sizing up for backup especially if you have fuller hips! I wore this with about 3 inch heels but it came up a little too short for my taste, a long would have been better. The fabric is pretty thin so any line shows through it. But I loved the curves it gave me!

links_reviews_title: Bond. James Bond! This dress was perfect for a 007-themed gala.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a gala. The plunging neckline gives just enough sexiness to this stunning dress. I'm 5'4'' and wore a size 8R with 3.5 inch heels- the length was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Worn to a masquerade benefit gala.
links_reviews_text: I am relatively small at 5'5", 120 lbs, 32B1/2. This dress was super sexy & easy to wear! Unfortuntaely, the butt area of the size 0 was WAY tight, but fit perfect up top. In the 2, I had some extra room up top (the straps kept feeling loose all night), but the butt area fit a bit better. I would go for something stretchier next time, as the fabric made it difficult to sit down. The length was perfect with 2.5" heels. My only other issue with the dress is that one of the cups was sewn funny, or like someone had stretched it out. Thankfully these issues didn't affect my night!

links_reviews_title: The compliments I got while wearing this dress were amazing!
links_reviews_text: The fit of the dress was great. The only issue I had was the dress straps. The dress fit so well I had to wear it although strap were a little big. I used a pin to make them shorter. I would definitely recommend this dress. Stunning!!!

links_reviews_title: Love the deep red color and flowy bottom!
links_reviews_text: This was a last minute choice when the dress I ordered could not be delivered. The color was great, a nice deep blue-red. I liked the lace trim touch, but did need to iron them to keep them from falling down (I also used skin glue for one floppy piece). In fact, this whole dress definitely needed to be ironed, even after I hung it up for 24 hours before the event. I went braless because the back was too low, and the front was just low enough that a Nubra would have showed. It was also quite tight and leaves little to the imagination (even my seamless thong showed through, so I went commando). It is lined, but the soft flowy fabric is slinky and everything shows through. The 0 was quite snug on me, particularly around the hips/butt (I have a bubble butt). There isn't really much stretch, maybe none. I opted for the 0 because the 2 was too long, the straps kept slipping off, and it was still tighter than I would like on my butt. All in all, a lovely dress, just not very forgiving. I am 5'3" and wore 4" heels, which made the length on the 0 perfect.

This dress was so pretty! I could've worn a size up. It did not fit over my booty cause I have a larger one. I could have forced it but would not have been able to drop it low later in the evening. Definitely will try a size up!
It was too big for me

links_reviews_title: I felt totally confident in this gown!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to the Jeff awards for theater in Chicago, one of my favorite events every year. When I stepped into this dress, it felt comfortably snug in all the right places. I love the material (neoprene?) and own a cocktail dress made of similar fabric so I was hoping for that feeling. This is my new RTR fave and I got lots of gown envy from friends and strangers!

links_reviews_title: Fun top but does fit weirdly
links_reviews_text: I've ordered items from this designer before. They all have the same issue: being super low cut while fitting everywhere else. I usually remedy this by wearing a cami underneath or pinning the fabric, but it does make the top look a little weird. The fabric is really nice and I love the pattern, I just wish it fit better.

I'm 5'5" 125lbs slim athletic build. Fun to wear once, but the bust & waist design wasn't too flattering from my point of view... some shirts are slimming, but I just felt a bit frumpy in this cut. The silk material was amazing & I did get complimented on my nice shirt so that was a win!

This piece gave a nice pop of color to my standard meeting fare. I wore it twice, once with a black cami and once with pink. There is a hook and eye closure meant to allow you to wear it without a camisole, but if you're well-endowed it's too tight and gaps. Camisoles worked great! Would rent again.

The fabric is beautiful and it looks really pretty when you're standing straight. However, like the other reviews said, it gapes at the chest. There was not enough room to safety pin it closed, so it just awkwardly hangs open, especially when you're sitting. I felt a little self conscious all day even with a cami underneath, just because i knew it looked funny.
Couldn't wear this. Hook eye closure in front and a gap if you're not v narrow. Long zipper up the back. Nice fabric.

Do you keep deleting my reviews? I'm OK with that but please stop prompting me to re-review if you don't like what I write. Here it is again. Beautiful fabric. And the way it was cut it exposed me down to the navel. I wear a bra and there was no wearing a bra with this top. I wish it had worked out because the color and fabric was so pretty but I couldn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: The top is very low-cut and has an opening below the chest
links_reviews_text: Disappointing rental, way touch skin showing to wear out. The fabric is actually open underneath your bra. Not a good look for dinner date.

The fabric is beautiful - the colors, the feel, the weight. The cut seemed good to start with, but the chest has a hook in a strange place that gaps beneath it. I wore with a tank beneath and just let it gap open. If the chest had laid flat this would have been one of the best rentals ever - as it was I pulled at it all day.
The blouse ran big on me. I had to wear a tank top under it as it is low cut.
tight around rib cage

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, high quality. Not great for work
links_reviews_text: It's a beautiful piece but slightly too low cut for work. Great material and color.

I was worried about this fitting due to the reviews but it fit me perfectly. I could see how a curvier figure could have issues with the blouse because the bust area easily pulls and is narrow between abdomen and waist

While this fabric is stunningly beautiful, the cut is ridiculous. The V-neck literally went down to my navel. Wearing a black camisole underneath would've looked silly because you would've been looking at mostly black tank top with a dash of gorgeous blouse… Bizzarre!
This is a lovely top. The gathered fabric in center make it very forgiving. Silk- so lays beautifully and it’s oerfect for work or evening.

links_reviews_title: Really high quality fabric and gorgeous color
links_reviews_text: The asymmetrical skirt made this a winner!

Loved dress. Had to order larger size for shoulders and bust but wearing belt made it fit perfectly. I'm 5'8" and wore 2.5" heels and dress hit floor on long side- had to hold up from time to time. Wore to derby and rec'd lots of compliments!
Get this 2 sizes up. There is no give in the fabric. It is a beautiful amazing dress but no elasticity. I love love loved wearing this and got so many compliments.
Loved the cut but the buttons and gaping at the bust was not worth it

Gorgeous bold green dress that is versatile for many an occasion. I had a jewelry work event so I buttoned up to showcase the Swarovski crystal necklace. The drama continued with the asymmetrical hemline. Had to wear taller shoes to insure I didn't drag the dress on the floor or step on it. I'm 5'5" and wearing 3" heels so please take note on height. European sizing so I wore an 8 even though I'm a US 4 in dresses that are only tight through the waist. My hips are larger as are my thighs and this draped with a flattering red carpet worthy flair. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Nice dress, too big if your 5'0"
links_reviews_text: Nice dress in photos, but didn't fit flattering at all and the shoulder area was just too big. The chest/torso was definitely made for someone taller. Was really looking forward to wearing this since everyone said it ran small. It honestly runs perfect to what a "0" or a UK 4 would be

links_reviews_title: The color of this dress and the hemline were so fun and unique. Perfect for the Christmas holiday.
links_reviews_text: I am small up top and this fit snug. If you have a large bust or waist, you may want to size up. It is also long. I'm 5'6" and the dress did drag a bit in wedge boots.
super flowy
Dress was light and easy to wear. It did fit tight around the bust (I'm a B cup), but otherwise was perfect. I got an unbelievable amount of compliments!

links_reviews_title: This was for a birthday celebration, I got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: It was a little long. I think the sleeves fit a little strangely, and there was a little bit of a scent? Though, overall, I really loved this. The fabric felt nice, it was super comfortable, and the color is so vibrant and flattering!
A little tight on the bust, but overall beautiful dress. Lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Very green, great for women of height!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'11'' and I wore this with 3 inch heels. It was fun to wear a dress that was so especially striking for a tall woman. I wore this to the office and to church. The top is very conservative, but the bottom hemline has drama. The fabric has a little sheen to it that you can't be sure of in photos. It definitely needs to be ironed.

links_reviews_title: This dress is EVERYTHING! It's absolutely a show stopper! You won't regret renting this.
links_reviews_text: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this dress. The cut of the dress, the way it hangs like it was cut on the bias, the color, the weight of the material...everything is just fabulous!! The sides are long so if you're short they will be dragging the floor. The dress runs extremely small so I wore a 10R and I'm usually a size 4. You will not be disappointed. I'm considering buying it. I had to tape the top closed.

links_reviews_title: LOVE! But, if you're not 5'10 or taller, don't.
links_reviews_text: I love everything about this dress. The long hemline and circle skirt, gathered on the hip, are fantastic! It's like a Mad Men reboot! If you are not tall, however, you will struggle (and ruin) this dress. With flip flops, the longest hems were touching the floor, thus heels of outside the house!

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments.. had to rent it a second time!
links_reviews_text: This dress was AMAZING!!!! The fit and movement is unparalleled. This is a must try. Beware if you're on the shorter side, this dress may not be for you.
Loved the color, loved the concept. I'm a true size 4, so tight through the rib cage and bust. No way could I wear this 8R dress.

links_reviews_title: I went to a work dinner for my husband's business and I stood out like the emerald city in this!
links_reviews_text: This dress is classy, and surprising, and looks so expensive and gives off an air of high style and sophistication, while the shirt-top breathes in a cool-girl vibe. Such beauuuuuutiful fabric. I may have to buy one.
I should have maybe ordered a size up. I was just barely able to zip it up. It looked great, but I felt like I was busting out the seams.
I couldn't even get it on, the top is so tight! Very weird fit and it was no stretch!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, but not as great as I'd hoped
links_reviews_text: Beautiful in theory, but wrinkled easily and the material didn't breathe.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color. Ridiculously small if you have any boobs.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color. Ridiculously small if you have any boobs. I'm a 36c (not super huge), and even though I could get it zipped (with some effort) the buttons all pulled because of breasts. I wear anywhere from 6 to 12 depending on designer and have straight up and and down figure (narrow hips) with medium breast size for reference. Seems like this would be best on someone with tiny waist and smaller breasts (though fit is open at hips so would probably work good for hourglass)
Small chest size up
The 14 fit but was too long for some one 5'4. Pretty color but for someone taller and less busty.
I'm a 34a and couldn't get the zipper closed in the chest area! So upset I didn't size up!
Great dress! It's very comfortable and stands out in a crowded area. It has a side zipper and no pockets. I'm 5' 3" so I had to use fashion tape at the bottom.
I’m 5’10 128 I wear a 32dd the buttons at the top wouldn’t button
Too small, runs very small.
Large on shoulders. Tight on waist. Normally wears 4 or 2. I rented 6 for this. Im 128lbs, 5'2...

Perfect for the holiday season. However, this dress fits extremely small around the rib cage area. I normally wear a size 4, for this dress I sized up to 8 already and still couldn’t zip it all the way up.

This dress is equally as dramatic as it is subtle. The color is vivid and gorgeous, the fabric is medium weight and hangs beautifully and has a slight sheen to it. The asymmetric hem lends to the drama... and on a short person, even in heels, the tips touched the ground. The top is the subtle part. Very vintage in feel... I turned up the cuffs on the sleeves, left the top buttons undone and popped the collar. I’m a 34D and it didn’t pull or threaten to come apart. The 8 fit like a glove, really flattering. There’s zero stretch or give in the fabric btw. I traveled with this dress and definitely had to iron it as it wrinkles easily. I’d absolutely wear this again ... so many compliments!!! Made me feel fancy.

I'm bummed I wasn't able to wear this! I am 5'3, 120 lbs (solid size 4) and ordered the US6/UK10 and I wasn't able to get it on as it was too tight in the rib cage. Definitely order two sizes up. Gorgeous color and fabric though

links_reviews_title: Great color, sides get on the floor?
links_reviews_text: I loved the colour and I could have gone with a size smaller, the sides of the dress keep wiping the floor even with my very high heels, that's the only reason I didn't give 5 stars. Got tons of compliments

I think the reason others wore a belt with it is because the middle can probably be either very loose or very tight. Did not wear it but if i had I would have had to wear very high heels, and would have had to button because the chest was loose and would have needed to wear a belt too so the waist looked better. but it's very nice, these are not bad things, it's hard to have a tailored dress like this fit everyone perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Elegant take on a shirt dress
links_reviews_text: the fabric and cut were luxe

links_reviews_title: I didn't get a chance to wear it but really liked it... Actually didn't wear-couldn't zip up alone
links_reviews_text: Cool, artsy, unique... Tight on the side and couldn't zip up the zipper myself because the spot where it hits the waistline the seam kept catching.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! It was very striking.
links_reviews_text: I typically at 4 or a 6 and the 8 fit perfectly around the waist, but was too tight in the bust.
a little tight in bust long

I really wanted this dress to fit. I am loving all of the emerald this season and want to wear all. of. it. It’s fitted around the rib cage, so definitely size up. Material is stiff, but it has a gorgeous sheen to it, so not super comfortable, but beautiful.

This dress is a show stopper. It is small in the bust though. I wore a 6R and could have gone up to an 8R, which would have been out of character for me. I wore it but it pulled across the chest. An 8R would have been too big in the waist though. Smaller bust would work best but it was still amazing! Many compliments. It's long on the sides. If you're short I would not recommend. I'm just a bit over 5'8" and wore some of my tallest platform heels and it still touched the ground.

links_reviews_title: Sexiest I've ever felt in a dress
links_reviews_text: The photo doesn't do the look justice. This dress stuns. In a room full of nicely clad individuals, people still stopped mid-sentence upon seeing this dress. I felt dressed to kill. Some notes: it's an unforgiving 2, very tight, little stretch, and long. With a 30" inseam and 3" heels, the dress just barely hovered above the ground. The short part of the dress was a desirable length - short enough to be sexy but not too short to be worrisome when sitting down or walking.

links_reviews_title: Unique design but good for tall people
links_reviews_text: A really unique design and I got compliments on it but it was too long even with my 4 inch heels (I'm 5'2) so I think it would just be better to be rented by people who can carry the length. The material is good, a nice thickness. The size 2R was a little large on me, I usually wear 0R, so I wore a strapless bra inside to add some thickness. I think if it fit well and was tighter I wouldn't have to pull up the dress throughout the evening. Overall a nice dress, just for taller people!

links_reviews_title: Felt like Angelina Jolie's right leg Oscar look back in 2017!
links_reviews_text: It was perfect!

I want this dress to own forever! The dress is beautifully made, great material and it fit amazingly. I received a ton of compliments and I was comfortable all evening--even on the dance floor. I'd definitely rent again.

this dress definitely runs small. i am normally a size 6 in dresses and had to order a replacement in size 10. it was still a little tight and chose not to wear a bra, but i was able to dance in it and sit comfortably at dinner.
It did run small. It’s best to wear sticky boobs and then double side fabric tape. This helped the dress stay up all night.

I am 5'1" 110lb and the 0R was perfect! The length came right to the floor with 4 inch heels. The top stayed up (I'm a 34B) with no bra and the dress was very easy to walk in due to the slit. The 2R fit pretty much the same and was the same length but I wore the 0 bc it made me feel a little more "cinched." Highly recommend. Many, many compliments.

links_reviews_title: I wanted to try a dress that was out of the box! I received a lot of complements doing the evening!
links_reviews_text: I should of purchased the next size up it wasn't available . So I had to pour myself in this dress! It's on the small size. I'm a true 12R

links_reviews_title: Very flattering happy for the hidden part of the skirt it runs a little small not much stretch.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'7 145 usually a 4 and the 6 just made it.
Form fitting, easy to accessorize.

links_reviews_title: First Mardi Gras Ball of the season
links_reviews_text: Such a fun and unique dress! Compliments throughout the night, and i had a blast wearing it . The dress does run small on the top , so size up. (Just a warning the length of the long part of the dress was a bit too long on my size 10R ( I am 5 ft 5 inches tall,and wore 4 inch heels... the dress still dragged the ground a bit .) Great quality material and overall comfortable to wear (though since it is a strapless dress there were a few "tug up" moments . Lol). Would definitely rent again! Thanks RTR

My boyfriend and I were invited to a black tie wedding. He asked me to wear a short skirt, the bride asked me to wear floor length. So I met them in the middle, at first as a joke, but I so lucked out! This dress was beautiful, classic, elegant, and fit like a glove! I got compliments all night and felt amazing! Highly recommend!!

links_reviews_title: I loved how classy this dress was and easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: Fit was spot on and I truly did not have any issues. Highly recommend for a formal affair. We went to a formal NYE party with a Roaring 20's theme. This was perfect!

I usually wear a 0 but that was super tight and even the 2 was tight but it still fit to my body great. The dress gave me a really pretty hourglass shape and I've never received so many compliments at an event before!!
Fit great, many compliments!

links_reviews_title: This dress was a show stopper! My date loved it and so did I!
links_reviews_text: It was true to size I have large breast! 5’0 feet 111 pounds wore a size 2. A little long even with 5 inch heels!
Fits like a glove. Hugs in all the right spots. Tended to slide down throughout the night though. Don't recommend for large chested women. Fun and sexy gown though!

links_reviews_title: Amazing! great for all occasions & the perfect "black tie optional" dress
links_reviews_text: One of my favorites from RTR ever! Great for cocktail or gala, sexy but classic and modern looking. I rented the 2L and it got stuck in a snowstorm so I went to the store and squeezed myself into the 0- not my most comfortable decision but wow somehow it worked and made me look nice in photography. Even in the wrong size this dress is beautifully cut and flattering to the body, the high slit is amazing but not too much!
Not much wiggle room. Material does not stretch. But I loved the dress. True fit. Very sexy. And lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Stunning! Appropriate for any formal event, but just as relevant for a cocktail party!
links_reviews_text: The fit is a bit odd, it seemed rather loose in the lower tummy, tight in the rib cage, then loose in the chest again. But sizing up (actually went up two sizes based on reviews, but probably depends on your body type) made the rib cage thing a non issue and the tummy and chest were still form fitting enough (though my preference would have been tighter).
