Otherwise an amazing dress. Incredibly slimming, stays up easily, i felt snug and covered all night while still flashing skin! Wore to a formal wedding and felt right on point. Would have felt just as right at a slightly less formal event too. So multifunctional!

links_reviews_title: Received lots of compliments. Dress is simple, sexy, and classy.
links_reviews_text: Loved how the dress fit and looked on me. The petite size wasn't available so the regular was a bit too long for me.
This dress was so flattering for my figure. I had so many compliments. It is very form fitting the only this I would say is I ordered a 2L and it was still a little short with 3.5 inch heels.
This dress fit like a glove! I have never felt so beautiful in a dress. The amount of compliments I received was unreal. 10000% probably going to buy it!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a wedding, church ceremony and country club reception- tons of compliments all day
links_reviews_text: This fit dress perfect for me. Many people wrote reviews saying the dress ran very small. I am typically a size 0 and this dress fit me like a glove. The zipper was a little hard to get it to "give" but my fiancé was able to zip it up no problem for me. The material was very comfortable and surprisingly as a strapless dress I didn't have to keep pulling it up.

Beautiful dress!!! Loved it!!!! Runs pretty small. Usually wear a 2...went for the 4P and it fit well. I'm 5'4" and 119 lbs. Perfect dress for a wedding!!! After posting pictures so many people asked where I got the dress...think RTR just might have some new customers!!
this dress fits like a glove! everyone loved it! got a lot of compliments. wore it to a black tie wedding.

Dress was beautiful, gave me nice curves (I don't normally have lol) but it was very small on top for chest/upper back. The rest fit perfect, even size 10, my normal size, just not last 4 inches to zipper. Bigger chests "c" and up, highly recommend size up. Got so many compliments though!!
Ordered a 0 and a 2. I'm typically a 0 but ended up wearing the 2. It is a tight fit up top. I received a ton of compliments on it and it was very comfortable to wear all night.

I chose this dress for it's simplicity and that LEG SLIT. It totally delivered. Fit very well and true to size. I have a smaller chest (32B) and it fit appropriately. I got compliments on the slip and was reminded how slimming black is. Would recommend if you want a simple dress that still leaves an impression.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so sexy and elegant! I loved it!
links_reviews_text: It was a very tight fitting 6. I'm a pretty true 6 and feel like I may have liked the 8 better but it still worked!!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments about the unique leg slit! Photographed well.
links_reviews_text: I am usually a size 0, but am so glad I ordered a size 2 for my backup because it fit perfectly (even a little snug)! The built in bra like structure was perfect because I didn't have to wear a bra. Everyone commented on how much they loved this unique dress and was perfect for my sorority formal. The packaging it came in was even amazing!

After reading reviews, I knew I had to size up in this dress. I am a true size 8 typically (sometimes a 6/10 but you never know!) and last minute they didn't have a size 10L. I really wanted to wear the 8 so I squeezed in it and it worked perfectly! I think a 10 would have fit perfect, but I still felt perfectly comfortable in the 8! Definitely love this dress, felt really pretty in it!

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my sorority's Philanthropy event!
links_reviews_text: The bodice was tight, but still manageable. The whole silhouette of the dress was very slimming and flattering and the fabric is an amazing, thick quality. The only thing about this dress was the length was too long– even when I was wearing almost 5 inch heels, I had to pin the hem of the dress!

links_reviews_title: Such a great dress! So many compliments
links_reviews_text: I have never worn anything other than a 0 my whole life but I am so glad I ordered the 2 as my backup size because I couldn't even get the 0 over my thighs - DEFINITELY size up. Other than that, the dress is perfect. It is tight but super flattering and not uncomfortably tight to the point where you can't eat or move. It stayed up perfectly but if you have a smaller chest you would be able to wear a strapless bra easily. I got so many compliments with this dress! I wore it to a sorority formal but it would be a great dress for any cocktail event or even black tie affair- it is still classy and sleek while looking hot!

links_reviews_title: super fast shipping and great quality. will definitely rent from RTR again!
links_reviews_text: The 2R fit perfectly but was way too short. I am 5'6" and wore pretty tall heels so I had to go with the 4L which was a little roomier than I would hage liked but still was fine. wanted to get the 2L but was sold out when I ordered.

links_reviews_title: Unique and classy... compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a black tie ball. It was my favorite dresss I have rented! It's classy, unique, and so beautiful! I ordered a size up due to the other reviews but i ended up wearing my usual size. It was tight though! I highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Great dress. Super sexy. Doesn't wrinkle. Hard to bend over tho. ;) Bigger chests need size up.
links_reviews_text: I am in LOVE with this dress. I was looking for a dress for the Grammy's and wanted something classy but different. This was it. I tried on a size 10 in the store (see pic with hair up) but barely squeezed into it and my chest (34 c/d) was popping out. I opted for size 12 BUT it was falling down. I wore it with a bra, to add padding and it still fell down. It's GREAT for a curvy girl.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, received lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Only issue is that back seemed a bit longer than front so was constantly pulling it up. Doesnt have bomes im fromt so gathered a little under chest

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments! Sexy, but classy
links_reviews_text: Order a size or two up! This was my back up dress, but I liked it better and RTR was able to overnight me a bigger size! Great service/dress
True to size. Fit was exactly how i wanted. Material is thick enough that it helps shape your body.

links_reviews_title: Feeling pretty and celebrating a great cause!
links_reviews_text: I LOVE this dress! I thought it too plain when I ordered it but it is very striking in person! Very flattering and forgiving as well!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Easy to get into and received compliments all night.
links_reviews_text: The dress was easy to get into and very comfortable.

This was a simple, elegant, dress that I chose for a last-minute event. They didn't have a large so it was big on me, but it still photographed well and ended up being more comfortable through the night.
This dress was sent in place of a dress I reserved but was unable to be shipped. So glad- because it was beautiful- simple elegance. Was also very comfortable, easy to move in and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Sophisticated and beautiful dress! Fits very well, runs a bit big.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress, but it was a bit too conservative for the event I was going to. Would rent for something else. Runs a little big in the chest.

links_reviews_title: This dress was better than I thought it was going to be
links_reviews_text: Fit is snug and the material has a little give. Great lines and feel!
I’m 5’2” with a 34 bust and 120lbs. The small fit like a glove. It was the perfect length with heels. It was elegant and sexy. Would totally recommend and might even rent again!

This was my backup dress and I absolutely loved it! I wore this for a work event and fit in perfectly. I'm almost always a size 0/2 in dresses, a 32DDD/F and 5'3. I was able to go without a bra (woohoo!), but could have easily worn one. I wore 3.5 inch heels with it and it hit the floor at a perfect length. Can't recommend this dress enough!

links_reviews_title: Perfect full length dress for curvy short girls
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a wedding! Loved the fit and length. Didn't feel too dressed up or too dressed down. A little big in the bust area but just used fabric tape to keep it from falling. Pretty unforgiving material but wore shapewear to smooth things out. Per reviewers comments, ordered a size up because the dress runs small
Thick fabric is very flattering! Runs a little small, I am usually an 8 and this was pretty snug. Pretty and classic, nice length for any height. The slit was a little surprising!
This dress fit perfectly. I sometimes find that medium dresses fit me well in the middle and loose at the shoulders but this was spot on. I paired this with a blazer as it was a bit chilly

A huge shout out to the RTR stylists for this. The backup size for the dress I wanted became unavailable last second and they sent me this in it's place. It was 100% in the feel of the style I wanted and made me feel chic and elegant. It does run a bit small though, so if you're a chesty/broad medium or teeter on an 8/10 go with the large because there's not a lot of stretch in the fabric.

This dress worked out well for the formal Christmas party, worn with 4 in. heels. The medium was very snug; so for a smooth polished look, I wore the LR instead, with a strapless bra, which stayed concealed nicely. The cut of the dress is more for a straight frame through the hip area. I would've loved wearing the medium that fits well in the bust area, but it would have needed to be a tad bigger through the hip area for proper fitting for 40 inch hips. The pic from the side, gives you an idea of the elegant fullness of material, from the waist down, so there is room for movement....at least it was for me, being that I was wearing the larger size.
Holiday work party and got tons of compliments on dress - was sleep and simple - but sexy
This was the perfect dress for the wedding I attended. It's super comfortable and the length was perfect. Also a beautiful dress you can't go wrong with.
Really lovely material and good quality, but did not fit around my large bust.

I wore this dress for a gala and absolutely loved it. I typically wear a 6 in dresses, am a 34DD, and the MR fit perfectly. The dress was just touching the floor and wasn't too long with heels. Considering purchasing! This is a staple black gown.

I rented the MR and it fit great, the only issue for me was the length. For me, at 5'0ft, it was far too long even with tall heels. Although it was long, I was still able to manage. Nice thick material, did not need a bra either which I always love. Snug in all the right places.

Can't figure out how to upload a photo but this dress was wonderful. It was actually a backup sent because my original dress didn't work out. It runs small, so order up a size. The length was perfect for me (5'4") wearing 2 inch heels. I probably could have also gone without a bra. I liked it so much I tried to find it online to buy it.

links_reviews_title: felt like i had things together, and i looked like it too
links_reviews_text: snug and fitted. loved the shape it gave me.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress and wish I would have ordered the XL.
links_reviews_text: With my full bust, it was very hard to zip past my boobs. Once zipped (with assistance from my roommate) My boobs were flattened and squished. The rest of the dress fit great and was a think sturdy fabric so it was very flattering.

links_reviews_title: It was a meh. Not up to the level for the black tie gala I was attending, per my expectations. Prom
links_reviews_text: I'm a 36DD, chest did not fit well. Slit was "bunched" around my thing, though fit was appropriate. More in the tailoring than the fit to my body

links_reviews_title: I wasn't able to wear either size sent.
links_reviews_text: I went for a fitting in October. Picked the dress. It was perfect. I received the dress and the next size. Neither fit when I received them. They were beautiful in the plastic. But not on me. I had another dress in my closet I'd worn to another event, good thing. But I returned both of the dresses sent to me back, unworn. I was very disappointed.
Size was too small; right around waste area. Loved overall style/design, but I didn’t have time to order a size up for my event. I would’ve worn it if it fit.
fits like a glove and was practically the perfect length on me, being 5'1 plus heels.
Perfect for a black tie wedding. Gorgeous gown. Sleek. Classy. In love!

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for the 243rd Marine Corps Ball.
links_reviews_text: This dress runs extremely tight through the hips and bust. As a 36D once I got it on, it wouldn’t zip. The fabric isn’t giving and it doesn’t feel very luxurious. Overall, I will steer away from this brand in the future.

The dress fit me perfectly. It's thicker fabric that doesn't show every little bulge. The slit is sexy but not so high that I felt inappropriate for a wedding. I am 5'9", B cup, 125 lbs and wore a size Small. I also ordered the XS and definitely would not have fit into that. This dress does not run large.

I got so many compliments on this jacket! It was super cute, very cozy, and at a Medium, it was big enough that I could wear a chunky sweater under it. With the sweater, I was nice and warm as the weather dropped into the low 40's.
I wore this as a statement piece for a Halloween Party. I dressed up as Taylor Swift and the jacket was the key piece of the outfit. I received so many compliments on it!
Loved this jacket for my birthday dinner and other holiday events!! So many compliments

The color would have to be my favorite. It was so pretty! It's not a flattering jacket by any means, but it is really cute and fun! It's great for just about any occasion and you can dress it up or dress it down! It fit me to about the top of my hip bone and is pretty true to size. I am 5'6, 34 bust, 27" waist and I wore a medium. Grab this if you have your eye on it!

links_reviews_title: This coat is incredible- fun, stylish and a show stopper!
links_reviews_text: I loved this jacket. I am an athletic woman with fairly broad shoulders and this coat fit me so nicely. I wore it out to dinner on a business trip and was stopped several times by women to say how much they loved it. It was warm, comfortable and really fun to wear. I would buy a coat like this for sure!
Wore this for my bachelorette party in the cold weather It's not great for freezing temps, prob would have been better for 30-40s! But beauty is pain ha!
Comfy and cozy - great color and feel - one downside is there is only one top button so if you're looking for warmth the cold air might fly up

links_reviews_title: O. M. G. On Wednesday's we wear pink.
links_reviews_text: Wore this to Mean Girls the musical. I have never received so many compliments in my entire life. Sort and a bit wide of a fit, but it added to the glam. It is warm and adorable. So fetch! (Haha)

I rented for a breast cancer event in CO. It was perfect. I also wore it a couple days later to dinner. I basically have no torso so you can see the length definitely appears longer on me than most, but I loved it. Works for play and real life!

This jacket was everything I wanted it to be. Bright, cool, unique but not outrageous. I wore it every day of my niece's Bat Mitzvah weekend and was complimented everywhere -airports, dinner, the hotel, etc. I ordered a Medium b/c that's the largest size listed, but was sent a size Large. That was fine with me as I would have ordered the large anyway, but I'm not impressed with the lack of consistency. There is nothing figure flattering about this jacket, but it is entirely worth it for how fashionable and fun it is.
This coat was pretty fabulous. I normally wouldn't wear anything like it, but it was a great addition to my white dress for my bachelorette party. Everybody loved it!
Great fit and detail to coat!

I ordered this fuzzy fun jacket to wear for Valentine's Day. It was so bright and furry that I had a hard time pairing it with something to wear to work. It does get a lot of attention and hugs from people.

This jacket is so incredibly fun! I had to get the XS, and would have rathered a larger size, bit i loved it when i tried it on. It was more of a princess cut in the sleeve. Love the color. Love the feel. Very faux but also very lux.
I wore this jacket for wedding rehearsal dinner. The color was very bright but looks darker in the photo. The fur was a little more "stuffed animal" than i expected but was soft and didnt look cheap.

links_reviews_title: It looked great and felt great but as advertised, it’s bright and bold! Wear it to be daring.
links_reviews_text: Looks fun in photos and it was very warm. The fit was loose but right for the style, and it is PINK! It would have been too much if I had to wear it all night but for a fun pop while we were outside, it fit the bill.

links_reviews_title: Its like having a pink aura
links_reviews_text: Loved, but not for the faint of heart.
Rented it with the romper for a bday at Disco Chicago, total hit. It's soft af and the color is killer. You won't regret this rental.
I loved this so much. It's so soft and so comfortable and it begs for compliments from strangers. I ended up wearing it to the Women's March because pink, duh.

Rented this for a high tea date with my girlfriends. I loved this fur and wish I could have kept it forever! I typically wear a medium, but the small ended up being a better fit since it is a little boxy. Very warm and cozy, beautiful bright pink color true to the photos, and great for photos!
Ummm I'm obsessed. I also wore this with jeans and got so many compliments! Wish I could buy it!

links_reviews_title: Fun pop of color for art opening
links_reviews_text: Wore this bright jacket to an art opening. It kept me warm and helped transition my all black work wear to something fun enough for a party.
The color was amazing and added a pop of color to my all black ensemble. Jacket is a little boxy but I took my try size XS. It worked great for a NYE black tie wedding.
This jacket was a bit much. I decided to commit to wearing it once. It's a little over the top.

links_reviews_title: This jacket was the perfect addition to my disco costume for a themed work party! Loved it!
links_reviews_text: The fit on this jacket is tricky.... I am tall and thus have long arms. The sleeves on the small were definitely too short but the body fit was right. The Medium had sleeves that were a much better length, but the body was huge. So, I guess it depends on the look you are going for. I opted to wear the small and just deal with the short sleeves. Since I was wearing it with a disco costume, I felt like the short sleeves were actually kind of appropriate! :)

links_reviews_title: Beautiful neon pink coat. Super soft and comfy.
links_reviews_text: fluffy. colorful. warm. LOVED IT>

links_reviews_title: If you want to stand out, this is the jacket for you!
links_reviews_text: Liked the fit, but if it's cold, there is only one clasp at the top of the jacket. It's really made to be worn open I think. I didn't end up wearing it bc my husband thought it looked like a "dead muppet," but I thought it was darling. Needed a bit of TLC to fluff it up, but it was fun to wear to a casual function over a cute top and jeans.
Love this jacket. It's so soft and fuzzy -- a pretty good weight too. Fun for a night out.

This jacket is super thick and warm and a really terrific color. My only complaint is that it is maybe a little bit TOO thick and bulky and large in general. I'm 5'6"/140 lbs/33 bust/30 waist and a smaller version of this would have been more flattering and better proportioned for me.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to work and a birthday party. It is one of my favorite rentals.
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. I wore it in single-digit temperatures. It was plenty warm.

The jacket does run small, I usually wear a medium in jackets as I have broad shoulders and I wore the large. It does fit very boxy as well - so not for you if you are looking for any kind of fitted look or shape :) Otherwise fun to wear - wore it to a baby shower for a new baby girl.

links_reviews_title: Not for me! Made me feel like a Sesame Street character. But I could see it working for others.
links_reviews_text: Made me feel too boxy and large.
beautiful fit. True to size
Snug in the shoulders. Would size up if I ordered again
The hot pink color is VERY vibrant. The material is not necessarily high-end looking so I wouldn't wear it to a gala, etc. but it is very fun to wear to a party.

links_reviews_title: Bright & fun, didn't end up wearing though
links_reviews_text: I was excited to wear this for breast cancer awareness month - super fun pink color. I ended up sending back without wearing because I noticed the pink had stained the hanger, so I was afraid it would stain my clothes if I wore it. SUPER soft fabric!!
Stunning color, wore to studio 54 event. Runs big, size down. Xs was perfect
I loved the jacket but there was something on it in spots causing it to be matted.
Didn't take a picture of it but it kept me as warm as it could on a cold NY night in December

Although I ordered a medium, I was sent a large. As a result, the jacket was a little big on me, so I just have to assume a medium would have fit. The color of this jacket is very bright, but I love that kind of thing which is what drew me to it in the first place. People will definitely look at you because it is not often that you see someone walking around in a hot pink fur. Pros - has pockets, keeps you warm. Cons - takes a little skill to clasp the jacket closed.
Wore this to a charity event and it was perfect! The length makes it feel formal, while the slit gives it a sexy twist. Fits true to size.

I rented this for a NYE wedding. I had my second baby 4 months ago and things didn't go back the way they once were but this dress hid everything perfectly and was very comfortable because of the stretchy material. I am breastfeeding so I need something that was tight to hold me in but stretchy since my breast size goes from a D to a DDD/F before I need to pump. The slit was effortlessly sexy! Would definitely recommend.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved this dress! Fit like a dream!

links_reviews_text: I have always loved the fit and style of Halston dresses and this was no exception- I wore my usual 8 and the dress fit like a glove. I was able to wear a normal bra with it, which is a huge plus. The slit is quite high (especially when sitting) but I was able to dance the night away at a wedding without issue and felt like a million bucks. My husband even had other guys compliment him on his wife with the high-slit dress! Will definitely be renting again!

Loved it so much I bought it. Fit perfectly. So flattering. Well-made very structured dress. Highly recommend it to anybody all sizes. Can't go wrong with this dress . You will love it and look like a knock out. Enjoy!
Great dress! I rented for a fashion charity dinner. I wore it to work with sneakers and leather jacket and it was perfect for daytime as well. Tons of compliments. This dress did not disappoint.

I loved this dress....but NOT for the event I chose it for. I was invited to a work fundraiser, where I'd be sitting at a table with current and retired partners of our firm. The dress was too sexy in that context...that slit was more revealing than I bargained for! I ended up not wearing it (boo hoo!) and going with something I already owned. However, I totally want to rent this address again...it fit like a glove and I felt like a million bucks in it! I'll save it for a night out on the town with my husband, haha!
Dress runs large, but if you size correctly, you'll be fine. Classic and covered up top with a high slit. Three people asked me for the designer name and told me to buy it.

This dress was perfect for a charity gala. I'm 5'1" and have an athletic, muscular build so I sized up to be sure the back would zip. It was a little loose in the waist but not noticeable. I got compliments and was comfy all night. Paired it with lace-up nude pumps, a dressy white blazer, and citrine stone jewelry for some color.
Fit wonderfully and I'll rent it when I can show off that much leg sometime!

This dress is extremely flattering and comfortable; it was worn for a formal fundraiser. I received so many compliments on it through the night. Just be aware of the side slit when sitting, as the material spreads apart when sitting and exposes your entire leg.

links_reviews_title: I felt so sexy in this dress!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a high end work event i had to work. I never once felt inappropriate and got tons of compliments. The material is forgiving as I'm not a small woman and I never once had to adjust the dress (even with the high slit). Totally want to buy!

I really did love wearing this dress because it was super comfortable and flattering. I ordered because the reviews were so great, even for y'all girls like me. I wore to bf's Christmas party and we sat a lot of the time. The slit is so short on my 36" legs and 6' stature that I had to place my clutch over my crotch every time I sat or got up as to not flash everyone. I kept my napkin over my exposed thigh all night for safety. Great dress, just wish the 6L would've been available. Fits true to size.

Amazing quality and fit. I felt pretty, sexy and confident while wearing it. Material is a bit stretchy, fit me well, but had some room to fill out if needed. I really loved this dress! Wore it to a an orientation I led at work and felt awesome :)

This dress surprises well! Looks very simple on the hanger but after you get it on it's definitely a pleaser! The fit was excellent and the high slit added the right amount of sexy needed for the parents night out! Thinking about buying to keep! Only con is the zipper is kind of challenging. Needed help getting it up. Other than that, I loved it!

I wore this dress to my friend's wedding and loved it! It was super comfortable - I was very pleased to fit a size 6 (sometimes I'm and 8 in dresses) and the slit made it sexy while still keeping it classy. The fit was great and had a slimming effect. I would rent this again!

links_reviews_title: The perfect elegant yet sexy dress
links_reviews_text: This dress is a showstopper. I received compliments on it all night at a friend's wedding. I was so sad to send it back! The slit is very high, which is dangerous when sitting down, so you'll have to be careful, but the dress is definitely worth it. It's classic and slimming. True to size.

I had an awards event to go to and wasn't keen on dressing up due to recent weight gain. This dress made me feel great. I was so lucky to have picked two winners for this two event weekend. I ended up winning an award and had to go up on stage to accept so everyone saw my dress and I received so many compliments after.
I'm typically a 8-10 but got this in a 6R. It fit like a glove and oh my LEGG!! See pics for proof is this stunner. You won't be disappointed.

This dress was everything I needed and more!!! It Fit perfect and was it was moveable was able Danced all night in it. Ordered the 12 (which fit but tight) and 14 but wanted to be able to dance without worrying so I wore the 14. Received lots of compliments.
The design is unique. I got many compliments wearing this dress!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a bachelorette party (group of women in our thirties) - was the perfect style
links_reviews_text: The dress was a bit tight for me. I would have preferred a larger size, but they were out. The dress bunched a bit in the waist to accommodate my hips, but because of the thick material, no one seemed to notice! I'm tall, so I was nervous the slit would be too high for me, but just looked sexy. I would rent the dress again (in a larger size!)
I wore this to see Hamilton and it was perfect! I wore a regular bra and the straps were covered. The slit makes it sexy, but not too revealing. Perfect! I felt elegant and beautiful.
Loved this dress! Classy and sexy. Super comfortable and true to size! Would definitely rent again! #nightout

links_reviews_title: I rented this to wear as a guest to a wedding.
links_reviews_text: I felt incredible in this dress. It's elegant and sexy, the slit is to die for! I wore this to a friends wedding and as little black dresses go, this one takes the cake. It's well tailored and the fabric is sturdy. It hugged me all in the righ places and showed off my curves well! I just felt amazing in this dress... it was hard to send it back!
Dress was so comfortable and beautiful.

I rented this dress for a black tie optional wedding and it was more than I expected! I felt stunning, beautiful, sexy and classy, all at once. It made me look and feel tall and slender and I would absolutely rent this dress again. I am 5'7", 170, and it hugged my curves in all the right places.

links_reviews_title: Rented this dress for a bachelorette party. The slit made the dress so flirty and fun!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great and the dress was very comfortable. The slit and the cut outs on the back made the dress so fun! It is a thicker material which helped during the outdoor portions of the event. I usually have an issue with dresses being too short but this one worked out perfectly. It would probably be on the long side for anyone under 5’6” still cute but more formal I think.

links_reviews_title: Classic Black dress for a formal event
links_reviews_text: This dress made me feel beautiful. I ordered this one as my backup dress but ended up loving it more than my first choice. I am fairly hippy and the cut across the front was perfect for my body type and made it look slimming. It definitely has a high slit so you need to be careful when you sit down but its feasible. I also normally wear a 4 in clothes but in this wore the 2 so size down for you second size. As a mom of 2 -- I felt pretty darn sexy for the first time in a long time.
This dress is perfect.. hugs all the right places and is so comfortable!! Would recommend 100%!

links_reviews_title: The first dress I've ever worn that looked better off the hanger!
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing! The size 10 fit perfectly. I was nervous that the waist seam would hit at a strange spot but it was perfect. The fabric is thick so it goes a long way to hide a muffin top/spare tire. I did wear spanx underneath, but definitely don't wear the longer shorts kind because the slit comes up pretty high. Also you can wear a regular bra with this dress. I received a ton of compliments on this dress from total strangers, which felt fantastic. I loved this dress and would absolutely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: I recieved so many compliments for wearing this dress! I felt sexy all night long!
links_reviews_text: True to size, the slit is a bit too much but I felt sexy. I didn't need to wear a spanx under the dress because the dress is already shaped in a way it's no lt necessary to wear a spanx. I didn't need to tuck in my belly (I have big belly) since the dress kept me in shape. Would be interested in renting this dress again.

I wore this dress to a formal event. I am normally bewteen an 8 and 6 in terms of dress size (always depends on the dress!) but the 6 fit comfortably and I even had some extra room! While the slit does ride up a bit when sitting, it was not enough to make me self conscious and it was easy enough to monitor. I got a lot of compliments and felt incredible!

links_reviews_title: Love/hate relationship with the slit, but the dress did the job!
links_reviews_text: - I wore this dress to a 1920s-themed holiday party for work and loved it! The slit adds some sass to an otherwise modest/classy dress, which I loved. The slit is also the dress's Achilles' heel, so I knocked a star off my rating. More on that below. - I ordered an 8 and 10 and wore the 8 comfortably. The top and waist weren't super flattering on me (I have a smaller bust.) A 6 probably would have been more flattering on top, but uncomfortable. - Beware that if you choose to wear nylons with this dress, choose ones that don't have the darker "shorts" section at the top. They will probably peek through the slit. - As other renters noted, the slit gets dangerous when sitting down! The venue I was at had velvet booths, which proved to be a bit of a nightmare with this dress. They pulled and twisted the dress until I was wearing practically nothing. I was glad there were black cloth napkins within reach that I could place over my lap while I ate and scooted in and out of the booth.

Like other reviewers noted, the dress runs small. I am usually right in between a 4 and a 6, and while the 4 fit fine, it probably would have looked better in a 2 (which I never would have imagined!). The slit is a fun and sexy detail to an otherwise modest dress. It's not too high that it was overly revealing (I wore it to a family wedding on NYE), but definitely got higher when sitting or crazy dancing. I got a lot of compliments, and the dress was very comfortable (bonus- you can wear a regular bra!). Overall, I would recommend it- just be sure your backup size is smaller!

Halston Heritage is always a great rental! Nice, quality fabric and seams. Sizing and other reviews were spot on, and it did seem there was a bit of give in fabric. Great silhouette and angles across midsection. Simple black dress with dramatic slit makes it a perfect statement piece but may be a *bit* too risky when sitting (slit opens up high on the thigh). I was standing most of the night so there was no stress about that at all but might be an issue if you're going to a formal sit down. Would rent again!
I can’t say enough about this dress! It fit like a glove. It was so incredibly sexy and sophisticated. I wore it to my company Christmas party. I received so many complements. I wish I owned it!

links_reviews_title: Loved the slit and back design!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. The slit is sexy so wear some nice heels! The cons were the zipper it was hard to pull up, and also the shoulders were a bit loose but over all it was great fit.

links_reviews_title: Conservative with just the right amount of sexiness. Love the style.
links_reviews_text: Wore to fiancé's work party (cocktail attire affair). Fit perfect in the shoulders and bust. Was very comfortable. Cut in the hips hit to high on me, probably because of my height and shorter torso. I disliked the fitting in my hips but my fiancé said it was not noticeable. Slit was just fine when standing but rose incredibly high when sitting. I encourage you to sit in the dress before deciding to wear it out. Would rent again.
This dress was the talk of the evening, it was so simple yet elegant with a touch of sexy! I would rent it again in a heartbeat.

Love this shirt- it does run really LONG. Like so long I didn't know how to tuck it in and hide the seams. Also shows every bump or lump- you must be feeling yourself when you wear it! But it was comfortable, sexy and easy
Very polished casual look. The material is very stretchy and flattering.
I ended up wearing it but just didn't fit me the best. I didn't end up taking off my jacket. I felt like I had my arm out the wrong hole
Not flattering. Never wore. Don't rent if you have anything but a flat chest

links_reviews_title: Beautiful top and color - runs small but maybe i say that because I have DDs.
links_reviews_text: Loved this too because it was unique. I layered it with a coat and necklace and definitely felt confident. Lots of compliments.
This shirt is great - the fit is very flattering and adjustable. The color is great - makes you look tan. Will be renting again soon

links_reviews_title: crop top for those who are scared of crop tops
links_reviews_text: This was so fun I wore it with high waisted shorts and even pulled it off on a summer friday type day at work. It's really nice material and thick so it doesn't slosh around or surprise expose any part of you that you don't already know about. love it!

This top was super cute and super comfortable. A little awkward to put on (the zipper is only partway, so you have to pull over your head), but it's very well constructed, and a nice material. I would say it fits true to size, but is a little looser of a fit intentionally. One cool feature - despite being a crop, when I sat down, it covered some of the stomach rolls :-p I'm ultimately not sure how versatile it is, but looking forward to renting again.
Heavy, good quality fabric. Be prepared to show your midriff. Can dress it up or down!

I may eventually buy this top... I haven't returned it yet because I've been wearing it with different things. Skirts, high-waist pants, jeans. It goes with everything. I have a large chest so I got an XL and it fits just right, so if you have a similar body-type I suggest getting an XL. The material is slightly thick but not too thick for summer unless it gets above 90 and it's humid, I'd say.
This top fit very well and has a nice structure so it remains flattering even though it has a loose layer. I received a lot of compliments.
Loved this top! I wore it twice! Once with black jeans and again with a high waisted pencil skirt. Nice material and very flattering. Great color, too!

links_reviews_title: Cute top, runs small, hard to zipper on your own
links_reviews_text: This top was cute but runs small and was hard to zipper on your own.

The color is beautiful. The shirt is a little boxy but as someone who normally stays as far away from boxy it wasn't bad at all. It is a cropped top for sure - but if there is a way to make something a classy crop top than this did that.
I don't typically wear cropped tops, but paired it with a high-wasited pencil skirt and thought it looked really cute. Runs a bit big.
This top is super cute and flattering! I'm usually between an XS and S, or 2 and 4, and the XS fit perfectly. I thought it might be too small, but it fit like a glove! Love it!

links_reviews_title: So amazing!!! Such lovely fabric and colors and fit!!
links_reviews_text: This dress my favorite!! So light, well made, elegant but fun. Probably better for a nice restaurant that at work because it's a little short. Wearable, absolutely, because the quality is so good, but next time I will try the size 12 for more room in shoulders and chest. (Normally I take size 6 in American sizing)
Fabric was wonderful. Packed well. Lots of compliments. Will rent again.
The pattern on this dress is gorgeous and the fabric is great as it doesn't wrinkle. The dress is very flattering, I enjoyed wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Love the vibrant unique colors. Work appropriate.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful slightly stretchy fabric. Subtle high-low without a huge front-back difference. Sleeves are a bit small. Got tons of compliments on this dress and the fit. People love the print and fabric.

This fit true to size, albeit a tad long for my 5'1" height. I typically wear a 0, and with the European sizing I wore a 6. It felt very high quality and the colors were vibrant! Speaking of the colors, there were so many to match with which made this dress very easy to integrate with my existing clothes. I wore tights and boots as it was cold that day, but I feel like it would work easily in warmer weather as well.
True to size, fitted, snug in the sleeves, but the color is luminous and the cut is flattering. I kept humming "I feel pretty" under my breath all day.

This dang Peter P dress had me so excited! I have to say it didn't look like much on the hanger- I wasn't impressed with print or color but BUT the cut and drape are EVERYTHING. It's so beautiful and believeitornot versatile. Pros: silk is light, cut/drape are perfection, great length, some give Cons: the light color on the boobs made mine look bigger- busty ladies be warned I styled this 2 ways: Work- nude peep toe pumps and a leather jacket on top Austin night out- as shown with cowboy boots!

links_reviews_title: Interesting but not too flattering on me
links_reviews_text: The print and fabric are beautiful on this dress but I didn't feel it wa terribly flattering on Me. High quality and very stylish, however.

Super fun dress and the pattern is just perfect! Love this dress it is a bold statement yet the colors are not overpowering. Very flattering on the body as it hugs in all the right places. Ran a little small for me in the bust and midsection so I'd recommend sizing up for curvier women.

The stretchy silk and pattern is gorgeous, but my mother saw this dress in my closet and said it was frumpy and hideous (mind you, I'm 40 - I promise I don't still live with or typically listen to my mother!) I decided to wear my other option to an event instead and just wore this to dinner, but everyone besides my mother loved it. It's the only time in 10 years of marriage that my husband asked to take a picture of me, because he loved this dress SO much. He insisted I buy it, that it was so flattering on my mom-body, but at the current price point, I might just wear it another couple of times then return it. I personally love it, and the print hides lumps, but if it was ten years younger with boobs and a waist, I might opt for a more flattering silhouette.

links_reviews_title: High-end dress. Runs one size small. Didn't love the dress because it made my chest look very large.
links_reviews_text: I am a big fan of this label, but I didn't love this dress. The white/pink flowers at the chest, coupled with the high waist, made my chest look very large. Otherwise, it is a high-quality dress made out of textured silk and with a beautiful print. Skirt is longer on the sides and back than in the front, where it is quite short. I usually wear size 10 on top and size 8 on bottom (5'8", 153 lbs, 36C). I rented this dress in US size 10 (UK 14), which fit well everywhere except that the shoulders and upper arms were a bit snug. Also, there wasn't much extra room at the waist or hips, even though that is where I usually wear size 8, so I would say that this dress runs about a size small.
This is a truly beautiful and unique dress! The fit is flattering and the fabric is soft and silky. Where it when you want to make a statement.
Not too short! Great for small waist, wide hips. Colorful but not too crazy!

links_reviews_title: Pretty print on a flowy dress
links_reviews_text: This dress is so striking. It flows great and lays where it's supposed to around the waist/under bust, accentuating curves without being clingy. Chesty women and/or small-chested women may find the bust area problematic. Overall, I loved this dress very much and will likely rent it again.

Did not wear to wedding because it made my bust look bigger. The color of the fabric and design were gorgeous. I ended up just wearing it for date night with my husband. The fabric is very light weight but surprisedly warm and comfortable in 40 degree weather.

links_reviews_title: Not a great choice for hot, humid weather.
links_reviews_text: Very pretty. I tried on during a heat wave, and could not imagine going outside in it. Better for cooler weather.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress but makes me look a little pregnant!
links_reviews_text: This dress is absolutely gorgeous – – cut and fabric is stunning. However, if you have the slightest bit of a belly like I do unfortunately, because it is an empire waist it will make you look slightly pregnant. If you have a flat belly… More power to you, enjoy this beautiful dress.
Super eye catching dress.

The dress was really lightweight which was a plus, but I felt it made my bust look a lot bigger than it is... not something I need to nightlight anymore than they take care of on their own. Felt that is ran a little small. Prettier on hanger or model.
Got many compliments
This silk dress is durable and really doesn't wrinkle. Many compliments. In one setting, I added a knee-length blue skirt to make it longer. Worked out perfectly.
Stunning pattern, beautiful material, flattering fit. I will definitely rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: I love this dress! I would keep it if I could afford it! I love the cut and the color!
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly and was so comfortable! I got a lot of compliments on it and the print & color are striking!!! Remember it's European sizes, so don't order your American size!!

This dress was flattering and amazing. It got lots of attention. The man I'm dating said he did a double take when he saw me across the room. The sizing was a conversion, I believe European, so you can trust the RTR recommendation. It was perfect

I wore this to two holiday parties & it was a showstopper. I was wearing an aircast because of two broken bones & no one even noticed it because the dress is so eye catching. Fits like a glove, yet still incredibly comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, unusual dress that doesn't hit a larger hourglass frame
links_reviews_text: I could not wear this dress because although it "fit", it was too short in the front to wear to work (showed lower thighs) and bumped out just above the butt, although it wasn't tight. It was unflattering and not work appropriate. In a slightly bigger size it might work, but I doubt it. If you're thin and petite, this may be stunning on you. It'll look best on smaller chested women. Not at all for me. Immediate return.
What a darling dress, really fun and pretty and different

Rented this for a dinner in the Fall. This dress is so unique - amazing colors and pattern. This is one of those designer dresses that you can tell it is designer - the pattern is so special. Fits true to size and not too long on petite. Got tons of compliments. One note that the colors were much more muted in the dress than in the website picture - it was more of a dark teal base, not bright blue like the picture. Personally, I liked it much better in real life.
TTS and fabric is so soft.

links_reviews_title: I love the fit of this dress. It was very comfortable. It is very high quality as well.
links_reviews_text: Fits great, easy to coordinate with jewelry, got a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Got tons of compliments for this dress!
links_reviews_text: I actually wore it to two separate events in the same day. Dressed it down with a jean jacket and boots for a brunch and then added a floral belt and heals for the evening cocktail party. It's so different from what I would ever normally pick and glad I did!!
Fits like a dream. Perfect for wedding. Lots of compliments.

This dress was exactly what I needed for an October wedding. The color, cut, and fit met all of my expectations. Paired perfectly with nude heels and a silver/grey wrap. I got so many compliments on it too! The only small issue I noticed was that sometimes my bra would peak through the front. Not a huge deal since the lining was nude and the bra was too, but I would be mindful of that.

It was my first time doing this and have to say I love that this dress work out and it was so comfortable that I was able to move around. A little hard to zip up my husband had to help me but it work out..

I ended up wearing the large over the medium because I'm big on top. The dress was beautiful and I received so many compliments. I did not wear a bra but ended up regretting that towards the end of the night. The tan underneath does go down low if you have bigger boobs but the lace covers it so it's not revealing
Wore it for family pictures, color came out great, was flattering and comfortable to wear.
True to size, indeed! Thank goodness because they didn't have my backupsize. I love that the inner layer squeezed and provides support so the lace overlay drapes beautifully.

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments on the dress!
links_reviews_text: It was a little tight in the middle, and bunched a little bit around the zipper. But the dress for the most part fit well, slip didn't ride up, and everyone really liked it.
This was the perfect dress for an outdoor garden wedding! SO many people commented on how perfect it was! Fun and Flattering! Fit true to size!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, perfect for outdoor wedding in August
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit, received many compliments!
I absolutely love this dress and will surely rent a smaller size once I lose my post partum weight. The material is fairly thick and the liner inside is perfect

Perfect for a late spring wedding. I got lots of compliments. Dress is very well-made and fits true to size. There is definitely enough room up top for a bustier girl. Very pretty color and lace. The midi length makes it modest, but the colorful lace makes it fun. Great rental.

The dress fit great and was not as uncomfortable as other reviews led me to believe about the arm area. I expected to be able to notice the contrast between the lace and lining more but it was still beautiful. I received tons of compliments on the color! I wore it to a beach wedding and felt comfortable, not too hot at all.

I loved this dress! I wore it to my husbands grad school graduation and it was perfect for the ceremony and dinner afterwards. I rented the small and extra small, expecting to wear the small. The extra small could've worked but the slip and waist would've been uncomfortable. The dress was true to size. I am hourglass/pear shaped, 32d, 5'4", 130lb. A few notes... the nude slip is short compared to the hem and had to be pulled down after sitting or walking. The slip is also really form fitting and could put unwanted attention on the tummy/bottom, so something to consider if you liked this bc it was an a-line. A few reviews mentioned tight or itchy lace around the sleeves. I didn't have that experience. I noticed the fabric but it was not something that made me consider wearing a different dress. I wore the dress without a bra and was very comfortable. Overall, this dress rental was a success. I received several compliments and would rent it again.
This fit and flare dress was perfection. The color and lace was stylish yet sophisticated and it was very comfortable. So many compliments!
A little tight on neck and arms holes due to material, but still loved it.

links_reviews_title: Lovely Dress for Spring or Daytime Wedding
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for Easter at a Napa Valley resort and it was comfortable and a beautiful shade of pink with a slightly lavender hue. Only difficulty was that due to the gathering of the gorgeous laser cut fabric, I needed help with zipper along the back. It is narrowest and slightly rigid at the waist, therefore opting for the small, rather than XS. Many compliments!

This was my backup dress which I had to wear because my first choice didn't fit and had some flaws in it. Overall this fit well, I normally wear a 16 and the XXL was good. The nude underlayer beneath the lace was quite stretchy. I wore this for an outdoor wedding in 80-degree weather and the dress was not too hot. The bride said I looked classy so that is always good. I wore a strapless bra but you might be able to get away with a regular bra with clear or nude straps.

This dress fit right in all the right spots! Love the lace overlay on the chest so if you are fuller in the chest, you don't feel like you're hanging out. Wore spanx with this, but the dress did slim the stomach as well. Got many compliments! Length went down to between knee/calf (I am about 5'4").
Nice and long so easy to pick up kids

links_reviews_title: Perfect for spring/summer wedding or event
links_reviews_text: Knew from the reviews that it would run a little small. Would normally take an xl so got the xxl. Fit great! Would have been perfection if my chest were a little bigger. Super super comfortable and got a ton of compliments
Really pretty dress with gorgeous details. I usually wear a size 12 and a large fit with some extra room.
The slip and lace overlay was sophisticated but fun. The slip is a thick material-- very comfortable for a wedding where you'll want to be moving around.
The bottom layer of this dress fits snug and short. It didn't work for me for Easter. And the zipper is too light for the fabric in my opinion. Difficult to get up and down.
The medium was too small and the large was way too big.
The lace is really heavy and the fit was overall really unflattering.
The lace was unforgiving in the top near the arms and in the chest. I couldn't zip up the dress past my bust. I am large on top but I typically wear size 8's with no problem. Cut smaller/narrow.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but too tight on me and short
links_reviews_text: Just tried on this dress and didn't wear it. Was tight on the chest area for me and could close it that well. The inner lining was too short for me so I returned this dress.
This fit exactly how one would expect it to, which is kind of a relief in the designer clothes world. Was comfortable and easy to dance in, felt pretty, and got loads of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Pretty lace! Not super formal though
links_reviews_text: The dress wouldn't zip up, but the lace is very pretty. It would look nice for a birthday brunch or something like that, but I wouldn't wear it to a wedding it doesn't seem very formal.

Dress color was more vivid than the pictures and was really pretty. Unfortunately the under lining was tight and very short. Felt like my butt was barely covered and kept riding up. The lining was surprising heavier than I thought it was going to be. Very pretty but just a little too tight and short for me.

At 5'9" I felt like this was a little long for my age. I rented this for a wedding and in my late 20's I felt very matronly. I will say it was a great fit for my shape, size and the lace was in great shape but it just didn't work out for me.
I didn't wear this although the dress was beautiful the materials to Heavy

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and fabric.. fit pretty well! Nice length for a formal affair
links_reviews_text: Really liked this dress, I wore it for a graduation and got lots of compliments. Only drawback was that the zipper was hard to maneuver.

links_reviews_title: great color, would be fun to dance in
links_reviews_text: did not wear as it was my back up dress and I went with the first one. Great dress, great price. Felt a little tight overall.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, lace and fit. Could be a great wedding outfit too!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for my birthday party and got so many compliments. It's such a flattering A line fit and the lace is gorg.
Fits well, high quality materials, and lovely color.
The material is very heavy. It made me feel frumpy

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but lace reads as heavy
links_reviews_text: I rented this and two other dresses for a wedding and did not end up wearing this one. The fit was nice but it's really hard to zip up yourself. I thought it would be a bit more feminine and dainty, and while the pink makes it read as feminine, the fabric is thick and the dress felt overwhelming and heavy.
A little tight and scratchy under the arms

The fit was a bit odd on me. It was the right size but the elastic under halter didn't hit at my natural waist but also looked odd if I pulled it up to wear as empire waist. To wear at natural waist with belt the neck line was less comfortable. I loved that it had pockets and it is a vibrant yellow. It was fine for a work dress.

links_reviews_title: Best fitted and formal dress I have worn yet!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a desert wedding and it was perfect. The color looks gorgeous against my dark skin. It was flowy which was necessary due to the heat. Absolutely no problems with this dress. Easy to put on and take off and dance in and super comfortable
Rented this for work and received a ton of compliments. It's very comfortable and a versatile dress. Am liking the way this brand fits.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a late summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful colors, bold but not too bright. Fits absolutely perfect! So many compliments! Flowy, very flattering, especially in the belly area. Wore with a strapless bra. Wore sandals for a comfortable night and it looked great! Will definitely rent this one again
Loved this dress! I would size down to small next time, but still adored this dress and would rent again. Just hung very loose in back with the medium!

Loved the color of the dress and the flowers, definitely pops! Fit is not tight. True to size. I wish it was either shorter or longer, slightly awkward length on 5'9''. Easy and not too fussy of a dress

This dress is more yellow green in person than yellow - I'd call it chartreuse. I didn't love the color but it was cute enough overall and fun and bright. Not the most flattering dress as it made me look a bit hippy and wider than usual, but still cute enough to wear. And very comfy! Good for a big dinner bc plenty of room underneath. The neck detail is pretty. Length good for petite - it was full length on me at 5'1"

The fabric on this dress is gorgeous. So many people commenting on how pretty it was. The shape of the dress was ok. The waist seemed a little high, and so to pull it down to my actually waist took away the top poof. I just felt kinda big in it. The material is also a little heavy with the lining, so it wasn't as cool as I had hoped. Even so, it's a lovely summer rental you can dress up or down.
Definitely more of a green than yellow. Very bright and happy. Wish I had gotten a large instead of medium but the medium still worked. Was just a bit snug!
wore for a bridal shower and got so many compliments!
Wonderful lightweight dress for summer. Pockets and a forgiving waist. Probably not great for traveling, as it wrinkles easily.

I think this dress would have been cuter and more comfortable on my 36 year old body or younger. Waistband hit me in the wrong place to make it look good on my 46 year old body. Loved the colors though.
After this, I'm never wearing another form fitting dress to a wedding again! But seriously, this was so comfortable and also elegant.
Very vibrant colors, adorable cut. Love this dress!!!! I wore a small and usually wear around a 6. It had plenty of wiggle room and was very comfortable!

Colors are perfect for Spring & Summer. Flowy dress. A little on the baggy side if you wear it with flats, but looks better w/heels. Because of the lining, it has some weight to it. I wouldn't wear it on a sweltering day, because of that. However, your average summer day is fine for this.
Unique chartreuse yellow that works w the pinks. Easy fit. Wore at work and into dinner. Versatile- can dress up or dress down. Would rent again.
loved the color

I loved the colors of this dress. It was very comfortable and had pockets. The length was a little awkward on me being shorter, but it worked fine with heals. Would have been even cuter with a bright pink shoe!
Loved this dress-wore it twice and it was a delight. Floaty, fun, comfy... The color was more of a chartreuse than anything, though, and it's a bit aggressive. Be forewarned!
It fit fine, but wasn't very nice

links_reviews_title: Fits true to size, just not great on me
links_reviews_text: Vibrant colors and pretty print, just wasn't great on my short wide frame. Would work great for slimmer and/or taller women.
Love the colors and fit. Perfect for summer and even for fall with boots and a denim jacket.

Wore on vacation and was perfectly light, but fabric felt substantial and well made to wear to dinners at the resort... the waist band is comfy and co tributes to a flattering shape, esp if you alter the neck tie to your preference.

I absolutely love this dress. It was beautiful and vibrant. The colors of the dress is very eye catching. Received compliments all day wearing this. I loved that it was pockets as well. I would definitely rent this again in the future
Very comfy with the elastic waistband. Could be worn empire or at natural waist. Very summery

links_reviews_title: This dress was really comfortable and flattering! The colors are great, especially for summer!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit as advertised, very comfortable and the straps were adjustable using the tie in the front (nice touch!). Beautiful colors!

I absolutely LOVED this dress for my birthday! It was definitely short but I wore tights so it didn't cause any issues. I am 5'5" 134 pounds and I wore the medium. I didn't event try the small. It definitely runs SMALL so order the larger size for your backup. You'll love it!! I hated that I had to return it!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous and comfortable for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a wedding. Everyone said how gorgeous it was. The gold detain on the dress is stunning and photographs well. I got many compliments. The dress runs a little small but it has great stretch. I love how comfortable it was. Plus I was able to wear a regular bra. I thought the dress was a little short, so I wore black tights underneath. It was chilly that day, so it all worked out. I felt beautiful! I highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: I wore the dress to New York Fashion Week and felt so beautiful!
links_reviews_text: I was so happy with my first Rent the Runway experience. I wore the dress to New York Fashion Week and felt so beautiful! I got tons of compliments, and a NYFW videographer even filmed the outfit. It was such a Cinderella moment for me - thanks, RTR! My one stipulation is when I saw all the reviews about how short and tight this dress is, I thought people were exaggerating. They weren't! I'm 5"6 and 125 pounds with a slender, athletic build and felt like I was squeezing into a small, haha. In person the dress was much sexier than I imagined. It's more of a clubbing outfit than a work-appropriate outfit. But overall, I was obsessed with this dress and would even order it again. NYFW, 2021?

This dress is amazing. It is so stretchy, therefore, so comfy. I'm 5'0 so it hit me at a good length. It was a tiny bit itchy under the arms but nothing that would make me shy away from renting again.
Truly easy to wear, stretchy fit and a killer dress! You definitely feel beautiful in this.
Great fit, surprisingly stretchy. Sequins were a bit scratchy under the arms but I expected that. Wore the medium to get a bit more length.

This dress fit like a glove! Very short! While I felt incredibly gorgeous & sexy I spent the entire night on the dance floor and had to keep pulling it down. If you like to dance I would pick a dress that's a little longer. If you just want to look hot, rent this dress!

Perfect for a 1920s themed New Years Party. Fit well, but rides up easily. A little scratchy (which I was expecting with sequins) but not enough to notice after a glass of wine or two! Got a ton of compliments.
This dress is a tight fit, I did have to occasionally pull it down. However, it is Perfect for petite girls!

Dresses like this can easily look tacky but this dress presented as a classy number. Runs small...I'm so glad I grabbed the large (even though I hate wearing size "large" out of principle. The sequins make the dress a bit heavy however I felt this was a good thing by preventing it to ride up. I would def wear this again.
Great dress, S was tight especially in my arms but I have athletic arms. Was a bit uncomfortable in axila after a while, but overall fun dress.
I wore this to our annual black and gold gala and loved the dress. It was cute and surprisingly comfortable. I got so many compliments!!!

Fun party dress for gala with casino night theme. Dress was comfortable and fit really nicely - I got lots of compliments all night. It is SHORT though - I'm 5'4" so I can usually get away with short dresses, but this was even short on me!

Loved this dress, I got so many compliments on it. I wore it to a formal fundraiser event that was gatsby themed. There were a lot of women wearing basically the same dress, but mine was one of a kind! A little scratchy under arms by the end of the night and a tad shorter than I would prefer but still very nice!

This dress fit like a glove. There was definitely nothing else fitting into it, but I was comfortable the entire evening and didn't feel like the dress was overly revealing. Lots of compliments - would rent same or similar again.

links_reviews_title: This made my 40th celebration a magical one! Got so many compliments
links_reviews_text: Was perfect fit, just like the review mentioned some discomfort under the arm because of the sequins but it was manageable

links_reviews_title: This dress fit like a glove- the small fit but chose medium. I received so many compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: It was snug, but had some give. It was comfortable and not too short. Because of the print and sequins it was very forgiving and didnt show bloat. Perfect for a corporate event in Las Vegas!
I rented this dress for my 30th birthday after having a baby 3 weeks prior... it made me feel beautiful. It is a little short but the dress stays in place.

I agree that it's definitely worth sizing up! This dress is so fun and I got lots of compliments. As I danced the night away, I had to keep pulling it down, but I expected that based on the reviews I read beforehand. Overall, it was very comfortable and just beautiful in person!

links_reviews_title: Worked Great For Work Awards Banquet
links_reviews_text: I was worried this would be too short for a work banquet, but it was perfect with tights. The sequins were a little itchy in the arms, but I think that's the case with all sequin dresses. The dress fits close, but has thick enough fabric to cover any rolls. It was a little tight across the chest, but that's a pretty common issue with dresses for me; it wasn't unbearable. I would definitely rent again.
I love love love this dress! It's the right amount of sparkle. It was perfect for our night out. My husband loved it and wanted me to buy it. So many compliments all night long.
This dress was very comfortable and forgiving. Perfect for a night out and not to short.

It's not itchy even though I thought it would with all the sequencing. It does. It ride up even with thick thighs and a booty. Totally thought it would but I kept asking my hubby to check and I was good walking all over Vegas. Really shows all the curves and has a little bit of give to the fabric. I ended up buying it.
I rented this to chaperone a Gatsby themed Prom. It does run quite small and does not stretch. I'm normally a S and had to request a replacement in a M. However, the medium fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: The dress was a little on the snug side. But it did not ride up at all. I am 5'8" and it was a little short, but I liked the look.
Loved the details on this dress! It's short and sexy!

This was the perfect dress for a monopoly-themed auction. It's short and tight, and I received a LOT of comments about how hot I looked. I wore a one-piece shapewear slip underneath to smooth out any underwear lines. I normally wear a 10/12 and the large fit just right. I didn't try the medium that also came.

links_reviews_title: Choosing, getting, and shipping back was very easy and efficient!
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous! Definitely runs small lengthwise so I would size up if you are worried about it being too short. You will receive many compliments on it throughout the night!

This dress is nothing short of AMAZING!!! I wore it to celebrate my 35th birthday. It fit great in all the RIGHT places. I usually wear a medium/large, but so glad I opted for the 2nd size and got the XL. If you want to feel sexy then this is the dress for you.

links_reviews_title: This dress is nothing short of amazing! I didn’t want to send it back. It was perfect for Mardi Gras
links_reviews_text: I do believe the dress first true to size but it hugs your body. It’s stretchy and not stiff so it feels good when you move around. I think even in a larger size it would fits tight to your body- that’s the way it’s meant to. But it’s FABULOUS!!!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for our first wedding anniversary. It's always fun to try new RTR dresses!
links_reviews_text: Pros: so fun and sparkly! I got 4 compliments while we had dinner. It's a good choice for winter weather events because it's not sleeveless. Cons: it's tight! The medium did not fit, so I'm glad my backup size was large. This dress is also pretty short and be warned: it rides up your thighs easily. Last con: the sparkles made the armpits a bit itchy. That said, it's still fun and you will be noticed.

The medium fit fantastic! Like the other reviews mentioned it was SHORT! I am 5'0" for reference and I was hesitant. Got a ton of compliments. The dress I had looked a little in the pits but after you got it on you couldn't tell. Great for a cocktail event.

The dress is very fitted and I was worried XS could be too small. This one was my second choice but I ended up choosing it over another option so I didn't have the S size to see if it worked better. It's fitted enough that it doesn't ride up despite the short length and if you have a smaller chest you don't need a bra. Also very impressed with the ease of delivery and return!

links_reviews_title: Love it but I didn't wear it
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress but there was gapping under the bust on my waist so it wasn't as curvy as I would've liked and it was super short. No bending over at all in this dress lol. I might've worn it if my bf wasn't hating on it so much (he doesn't like sequins it seems). Otherwise I think it's a super sexy dress for date night at somewhere nice.

This dress runs really small! I am normally a 0-2 and wore a M in this dress. It is pretty short so great for petite girls! It fit the theme of the party well and the sequins were so fun. Would recommend for a themed party or Vegas!

Fit was great! Very comfortable to dance in. Did not ride up at all. Lined so the sequins aren't noticeable. I received a ton of compliments and danced in it for hours. Perfect amount of sparkle. Get this dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress looked amazing on me! I got tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Dress was amazing. Rented it to wear to a Beyonce & Jay Z concert. I looked phenomenal. Dress was in great condition. Wasn't small and fit great. Dress did not rise up when I walked. Felt like a million bucks all night. Would definitely recommend. Would rent again if people hadn't already seen it.

I am never disappointed by a Dress the Population dress. The dress has a good amount of stretch and fit true to size. Beware if you are tall because this dress is SHORT. I honestly would have given it 5 stars if it was just a tad longer.

links_reviews_title: Ringing in the new year in sequins
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. It was short but didn't ride up so I could show off my legs. I rented this in October in anticipation for New Year's Eve. It was comfortable even if it was sequined. I needed help zipping it up bit was able to take it off. Fun dress!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a NYE party and it was hit. The fraternity colors were black and gold.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 8 and ordered the medium and large and ended up wearing the large because it just fit better and I was more comfortable. The material is stretchy and with spanks it is a great silhouette. One of a kind style and I received so many complements.

links_reviews_title: Feminine and fun for a party
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a bridal shower and received a lot of compliments. It's a very feminine dress, fitted at the waist with a higher neckline. The under arm area is a little exposed with this cut, if that's something you're self-conscious about.

links_reviews_title: The fit was absolutely perfect. And this dress was SO COMFORTABLE. Got several compliments as well
links_reviews_text: Nice high/low detail made this trendy but not too. You'll need a racerback bra or a strapless bra, but its a very comfortable dress to wear. The detailing around the waist was also really nice. The fabric is thin so this is definitely a summer dress.
I had my reservations with a longer dress as I'm not very tall and did not plan to wear heels. The dress fit well in all aspects. Plus it was nice and cool during a muggy August wedding!

I wore this dress to a baptism and it worked out great! I loved the light-weight material and the higher neckline. Overall very comfortable and while it was a little big in the back but the flowy material made it work beautifully. I wore a strapless bra and it worked fine, even with my busty chest. Love the color and beading. Received a lot of compliments. This one gets an A+

Great fit and light material which was great since it was a bit warm, summer, daytime wedding. The back was a little larger but not at all annoying or even overly noticeable. I would rent again for sure!

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments!! It was very flattering!
links_reviews_text: True to size

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress. It was comfortable and breathable and it was perfect for a May wedding
links_reviews_text: It felt a little loose in the front near the waist area, but it fit great in the back. Was not too long in the back with 3 inch heel. Nothing was dragging and it was great for dancing in at the wedding.

I wore this dress to an outdoor event on the beach and it was perfect. I have a very large bust and typically size up to accommodate it. The flow of the bottom half of the dress is very flattering and hides and the belly and thighs nicely. This dress is light weight and perfect for a hot summer evening.
This dress is beautiful! I loved the fit and the length. The color was the perfect shade of yellow. It paired well with my denim jacket and sandals. I received many compliments, would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great spring dress for a day at the racetrack
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'7, 165 lbs, 36D hourglass shape. Rented this dress for a day at the racetrack. It fit well and was a very pretty dress for spring. Comfortable and would wear again. I normally wear a 10 but wore the 8 because it was slightly better fitted at the waist

links_reviews_title: Everyone who saw me in this loved it. The color and fit were amazing. I felt so glamorous.
links_reviews_text: This fit like a glove. It is great. I'm fairly short and it was not too long. It was a little tight in the bust, but did still fit and I'm a large C small D. The color, fit, and fabric are remarkable.

I wore this dress with sticky bras, wore it on multiple occasions during my trip: post race, going to a timeshare presentation, playing on the beach. It flows with the wind and is so easy to wear. After playing on the beach, my sticky bras got wet and fell and that's when I found out I didn't even need to wear bras with this dress!

links_reviews_title: Cute but not quite fancy and not quite casual
links_reviews_text: It's a cute dress but it's not clearly formal or clearly casual so hard to feel comfortable/fashionable day or night
Perfect for summer wedding, traveled well in my luggage. Fit great

links_reviews_title: So light and easy to wear. I've rented this twice!
links_reviews_text: It was so comfortable, but dressy enough for my taste!
So beautiful but didn't wear because the back was baggie and fit strangely. A shame because it's such a beautiful dress
It was so comfortable!

links_reviews_title: I felt so flowery and elegant!
links_reviews_text: It fit great, my butt is big and my top is small so this dress fit perfect as the bottom opened up so I could wear the smaller size. Felt wonderful!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a beach wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about this dress. Fit was great and I got so many compliments!
Absolutely gorgeous dress that fit try to size and a good length for me (5ft 4). Flowly and feminine. Perfect to wear on our summer vacation!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a spring wedding
links_reviews_text: Comfortable fit, bright pretty color. Wore this to a friend's Connecticut boat house wedding and it was perfect.
Rented the 0 and 2. It is a little big on the chest area, so the smaller size worked better for me. I got tons of compliments. I have it 4 stars because the fit was a little off for me.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for an August wedding
links_reviews_text: This was my first wedding after having a baby so I was a bit nervous about what to wear. The top fit my larger bust without issue and the waist and skirt fit perfectly! I was able to wear a racer back bra to be more comfortable. Great dress!

links_reviews_title: Terrific dress for an outdoor summer wedding.
links_reviews_text: This was my first Rent The Runway rental, and I was thrilled with the experience overall. I ordered the 0 and 2, but didn't even need to try on the 2 as the 0 was perfect. The dress was super comfortable but still elegant and flattering - I was very happy with it. It was a terrific style for an outdoor summer wedding.

links_reviews_title: Very nice but a little mature
links_reviews_text: Rented as a backup for a wedding reception. The fit was great and it had a nice flowiness to it, but the way it looked on me (perhaps it was the length) felt a little too mature. Additionally, the dress was quite thin even with the lining and the weather called for thunderstorms at the outdoor wedding I was attending and I feared that it would end up see-through if I got soaked.

Very light and comfortable. Loved the high lo look. Received a ton of compliments. It was a bit big on top I could have taken the straps up half an inch and it would have been perfect. Wore a light bra underneath and it wasn't visible by the arm holes.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but for taller people/longer torsos
links_reviews_text: It's a beautiful dress. I love the color and fabric, but I felt like it was designed for a much taller person. The defined waist was too low on my body and the length was odd, below midcalf---not what it shows on the model picture. I probably wouldn't wear it again. It made me feel straight up and down on all sides. I ordered the 4 and 6 and I wore the 4.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for an August wedding.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'7" 118lbs small chested with an athletic body build. This dress fit perfectly, was very comfortable and perfect for a hot and humid day. I received many compliments on the dress and really enjoyed wearing it!

This dress was exactly as pictured and fit great. It really highlighted my arms and shoulders. The only negative was that upon close inspection of the dress you could see visible signs of wears, especially around the beaded belt detail. Regardless, I got a TON of compliments and felt extremely put together in this dress. I'm 5'5", 34DD, and 146lbs and the size 8 fit perfect.
The dress was perfect for my 15 yr old nieces party. It was a perfect fit for a semi formal occasion. True to size.

This is my first RTR experience and it was truly a pleasant one. The dress is one I normally wouldn't have picked for myself, but luckily my friend suggested I try it. I was floored by all the compliments. I can run between a 12 and 14 dress depending on the style, but this 12 fit perfectly. I was very happy with my whole experience and I hope this helps someone to make a decision on renting this dress or any other for that matter.

links_reviews_title: So comfortable and flattering! Great to dance in!
