links_reviews_text: I ordered the 4 as my backup size but ended up trying it on first and it fit perfectly so I never even opened the 6. It was perfectly flowy throughout the skirt, and comfortably sized in the bust without being too baggy or big. I loved how the waist was a little more fitted so the dress didn't just hang. By the end of the night I felt the neckline was bothering me a bit, but I honestly don't think that was the dress but was more about me not loving things around my neck. I paired with a chunky gold and pearl bracelet and pearl earrings which picked up on the belt, and nude open toe pumps.

Great fit and cut. I wore it for a friend's wedding where I was the personal attendant. Great on its own or paired with a light jacket (I chose denim). Gradual high-low hem which was perfect for my own preferences.
great dress by far the most comfortable one i wore

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, comfortable dress! Perfect choice for a business dinner on the beach. Love this dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit was as expected. Great fabric. Comfortable. The beaded waist detail was a nice surprise. The color is a pretty bright yellow. One of my favorite RTR pieces!
This dress fit well, was very comfortable and the pattern was beautiful. I would definitely rent this again.
Great dress for a daytime Daffodil Festival onNantucket. Got so many complements. Was comfortable and easy to wear
This dress was such a hit! My mom and I both wore it!

So beautiful, comfortable, flowy. Well-designed dress. Can be dressed up or down. Didn't want to return! Wore a strapless bra with it, with very little adjusting. If you're between sizes, order up. Little tight in the waist after a four course meal :)
I love this dress! Perfect fit and perfect for occasion. I wore to a horse race in Kentucky and received lots of compliments. I felt very pretty in such a light and flowing dress.

This dress is gorgeous! I wore it to an outdoor wedding in August, and it was perfect. I rented a ton of dresses for the event, and this was was hands down the winner. The fabric is on the heavier side, which is nice because it flattens the tummy. That said, there is not much give. If you're pear-shaped, I'd size up one because it's tight in the midsection. For those who find it gaps in the chest area, if you cross the straps in the back instead of the front, it will be much tighter.
Gorgeous dress, elevated resort wear! Fit like a glove, probably best for ladies with B cups and below unless you size up. Would rent again!

This dress is amazing! Had to size up for the girls.. per usual but the 6 zipped, just couldn't breathe! Only downfall of this dress was that after sitting in it for many hours and dancing, the straps on my collar bones started digging in and I woke up with marks! But beauty is pain.. right?

I thought a 2 would be too small but this dress fit like a glove! (I have a small rib cage but am a 32c and have a butt). This dress accentuated my figure and was a lovely satiny material. Perfect for weddings!

When I first tried the dress on, it was very fitted at the waist. The dress doesn't have stretch but towards the end of the night it felt comfortable even after drinking and eating all night. The bottom was very loose, but it didn't take away from the dress. I would rent it again. It definitely makes you look thinner. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Not sure what I’m supposed to write here.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fabric, but no give. Not a good fit for pear shape. Usually I wear a 6/8, had to wear the 10 to barely fit my hips in, and then the bust was very loose and kept sliding around all night while the skirt portion kept riding up and bunching at the waist. Still got a lot of compliments on it but wish I had a more well fitting, comfortable dress.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, is not as white as it looks in photos so worked for wedding guest dress
links_reviews_text: Little loose on the chest for me, but perfect for my curves in hips
I rented this dress for the Kentucky Derby and absolutely loved it. It's a bit tight in the top for those with a bigger bust. If you're in between sizes, go up.
LOVED the fit, style (especially at the bottom), material, neckline... everything about this!

links_reviews_title: Fit on bottom, top was HUGE
links_reviews_text: Very strange fit. The top was enormous but the bottom fit fine. I couldn't have gone down to a 2 because that would have been too small. Don't recommend for smaller breasts

links_reviews_title: Fantastic, flattering dress for hourglass shape!
links_reviews_text: This is one of my favorite RTR's of all time. This dress is very flattering on and the other reviews are accurate about the high-quality fabric, midi-length good for petites, etc. I would say that the size 2 fit me well because I have a very narrow ribcage w/ a larger bust, but it was a squeeze in the hips. Overall it looked great, but a little room in the hips would have made even better, but there was no way I could have worn a larger size in the waist or bust. I taped the top of the dress with fashion tape to secure opposed to pinning straps, which kept the loose top/ straps secure all night. Wish I owned this dress! Want to find more cuts as flattering as this style for my body type. p.s. I nearly ordered a 4 and 6 after reading reviews, but unfortunately, we suffer from inaccurate sizing syndrome.
loved the weight of the fabric. held me in and i felt great all night.

This dress is much prettier in person than you realiE. Fabric is very thick. Very pretty. I would have given this dress a 6 star but I have 34D and the top was verrrry tight. Waist and the rest fit well. So I say rent this dress. But know if you are busty they will be swished and deep breaths are tough.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress. Fit like a glove!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress! I was a little concerned it wouldn't fit right in my bust area but it kept the girls in place all night (I went without a bra). The material is sturdy and hugged my body in all the right places. I loved the versatility of the straps but felt that crossing them in the front was much more flattering for me. I would highly recommend renting this one!

This dress was glamorous!! Fit like a dream. Little tight in the chest, but gave me a little extra umph! The material/dress is much dressier than it appears in pictures. Perfect for a semi-formal affair.

Loved this dress. Very elegant and unique dress for a black tie. The fabric is very luxurious in person. The fit is super tight, runs small but very flattering. There is no give, no stretch. Many people pulled me aside to compliment me on the dress.

There is very little give or stretch in this dress. I read the reviews saying that it runs small, and I decided on an 8, even though I am oftentimes a 6 or an 8. I ordered a size up for my back-up like Rent the Runway recommended. I should have gone with the 6. The 8 was massive! BUT, true to size perhaps for people who are a size 8. My only thought was that the women that wrote it ran small have been victims of vanity sizing at other stores...this does not run small! True to size or a smidge big... It was so big I tried to use safety pins to pin the top in, but the material is so thick (not hot) that I couldn't. You could have fit two hands down the back it was so big. The neck straps and the key hole on top didn't look good because it was so big. Overall, I just had a baggy dress all night long! You can see in one of the photos just how baggy the dress was on top. I would recommend going with your normal size, and if you have a small top like I do, going with a different dress. You really need large C or D cups to fill it out.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Elligant and fits snug. Perfect dress to go to a wedding!
links_reviews_text: True to size, and a perfect length Height: 5’4” Bust: 32 C Body type: hour glass Weight: 105

So flattering! I have pretty wide hips and a pear shape, so the fact that it fit like a glove without squeezing in a weird way was great (I think the Thick material and silky material allowed for that), my boyfriend couldn't stop staring and I received tons of compliments! Will definitely rent again

I rented this dress for a wedding reception and it was very appropriate. However the fit is a little hard. I'm usually a size 8, but sized up to 10 based on the reviews. Thank goddess for that because I needed the size 10. Honestly I could've gone one size bigger but the top did not fit. I had to tie the straps to fit my body frame. Still such classy womanly dress. Love!

links_reviews_title: Fun, elegant, flattering, form-fitting, great quality thick material.
links_reviews_text: The dress was thick and held in everything well. I usually wear a 6 or 8 in a dress, but had to order a 10 at the last minute. I ended up fitting my hips into the 10, but then the bust was too big (I'm a 36B). It was an easy fix to just safety pin each side on the top about a half inch and it worked out perfectly! It looked like I took it in! The dress was the perfect length for my 2 inch heels and 5'5" height. I didn't need to adjust the straps but they were a bit longer than I would have liked but they worked as long as I stood up straight and didn't hunch over. I wouldn't have needed a bra except that I needed to fill in the dress better, but it would have held them in well enough. It was form-fitting just enough to be very flattering. I would order your size and a size up. I did wear a mini corset underneath to flatten my myself out, but I probably could have gone without it. :) All in all it was an amazing dress. It was perfect for my husband's youngest sister's wedding. It was fancy enough but not too fancy. The material was a slight satin so it made it very elegant. It wasn't a white background really. It looked to me like a very, very light pink background with purple and pink flowers. It was very beautiful and I felt confident wearing it. I would highly recommend this dress.

This dress was a huge hit at a Hawaiian destination wedding! It was hot as heck and even though the fabric seems thick, I didn't feel like I was melting. I wore it with a bustier and it felt a little hard to sit at times. Fabric doesn't stretch. It traveled well in a suitcase and needed only light steaming from a tiny handheld steamer. Not too white for a wedding!

This dress was my favorite rental to date! The material is a gorgeous satin that you can't tell in the picture, and the fabric is so thick and flattering! I absolutely adored this dress, and it was so comfortable dancing the night away at the wedding! My one complaint was that after a while, the straps felt looser on top so I was having to pull it up quite a bit toward the end of the night.
Couldn't zip the dress up. This dress also looked more casual on the app and was a lot more formal in person. Thick material.

So cute! It has a great fit and flare - I'm super short and was worried I'd be drowning in it but it worked well for my size. Sucked me in quite a bit - if you're teetering between sizes, would suggest the large one. Didn't need to wear a bra either!

links_reviews_title: Designed to dance - but not to breathe
links_reviews_text: Such a fun, playful dress that begs to be danced in. It is a gorgeous material and a flattering hourglass cut. The drawback is that the ribcage is super tight and for someone with a long torso, the tightest part of the dress was at the ribs, and the 2 just wouldn't zip up. I ended up wearing the 4, which was still tight in the lower ribs but loose in the hips and upper chest. It is designed for someone with a more dramatic waist to hip ratio. So while it gave my more straight frame some nice curves, the cut was a little off. Still, it was a beautiful dress and absolutely a ball to dance in.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a hot summer night outdoor wedding.
links_reviews_text: Size 10 fit well- but I would have worn an 8 usually. So it was smaller than a normal 10. The bust was a bit large for me so I had to pad! But overall I had so many compliments and it was very comfortable.

It was a little loose on top so definitely had to wear a padded strapless bra with it, the material was shinier than expected making it appear more formal in person. Also had to wear heals so that the dress did not shorten the appearance of my legs which is different since I'm pretty tall-but! I wore it to my event and it was a fun/sexy shape and print, the bottom skirt is very fun and has movement. Would not rent again but received several compliments and the dress was unique and fun to wear.

Very structured , but no give. The material does not stretch. It is also a satin like material that is heavy for summer. However the dress is beautiful and photographs well. I'm typically a 2/4 and could've went to a 6. It's SUPER tight in the chest but bigger in the stomach area... the 4 was def tight for me. Rent a size up for back up.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Summer Dress for a Formal Wedding
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fit and very flattering. This dress was definitely a showstopper.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a formal spring wedding
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a formal wedding at a vineyard. It was perfect for the occasion! Lots of compliments. It runs small and has no stretch. I ordered 1 size up and maybe could have gone up 2. But 1 size up + Spanx fit like a glove!

links_reviews_title: Great quality dress with a fun silhouette and thick fabric.
links_reviews_text: I sized up but think I would rent my true size next time around. Runs smaller in the chest and looser in the hips.
I usually wear a 6 but have hips, so sometimes need to size up. The 6 fit but was super tight, the 8 was perfect! I felt beautiful and got compliments all night!

Fit snugly in ribs and waist. Loose enough in hips to dance and bend down to pick up my daughter. I'm 32B and wore my most padded bra and still had a little gapping at the bust near the armpits. Heavy fabric hid flaws but wasn't too hot. Great dress, I would buy it if it fit better in the bust

This dress was everything I hoped it would be and more!!! I didn't want to take it off! I rented this for my graduation in May. I was afraid it might be too hot based on previous reviewers, but even under a graduation gown it was still cool enough! -- The fabric is AMAZING and it's fully lined! It's a rich thick glimmering material and the color is kind of a really really pale blue but in a gorgeous hue. SThe flowy bottom fabric was so perfect! Would be SO fun to dance in! -- Fit is a little off, but not enough to notice on my. I'm 5'8", 130 lbs, 32C, hips measure 38.5". It runs small (maybe 1 size small?) on the bottom especially around the hips, but perfect up top. I ordered a 2 & 4, and this is the 2 that I wore. I could've worn the 4 on the hips but it was too large thru the bust. Overall I still loved it! It was sooo comfy except when sitting, because as I mentioned the fabric has no give. It was hard to breath when sitting if sitting up straight, but I was standing for a lot of the time. --I wore no bra, and the fabric is thick enough you don't have to worry about special underwear! I don't even think you would need Spanx. I loved that I didn't need a ton of jewelry with it because it is already such a stand-out piece itself!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a polo match on a trip to Australia and it is the perfect occasion dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress is stunning and I absolutely wanted to keep it. It's really unique yet classic and sophisticated. I wish I would have gotten a size 4. I kind of drift in between a 4 and a 6, so maybe size down if you're undecided.
Beautiful dress. Received many compliments. Definitely upsize one size from your regular size.

This dress was fun to wear. Fits nicely and added some curve to my otherwise pretty straight body. I read other reviews that the top is a little big and the straps dig a bit into your shoulders, and while I agree somewhat, it really wasnt too big of a deal at all.
I loved this dress! Its so pretty and feminine. I received so many compliments. I am a size 6 and ordered the 4 and 6. I wore the 4 because it fit better in the chest, but the hip was tight.
This dress is absolutely stunning. Flattering and comfortable. I danced and ate all night and it was a shame to have to take it off! Would absolutely rent again.

I rented this for a beach vacation to wear to dinner. I typically wear a 4 but the 2 was all that was available. It fit but was a little tight in my hips. A 4 would've been perfect and allowed it to hang a bit more loosely. It's a beautiful, well made dress and the beading is unique.

I ended up wearing the 2 because it fit a little better. I didn't need a bra with it since the fabric was thick and it was just the right amount of tight and loose. The arm holes were a little bigger than I would like. I tried to pin up the straps a little but couldn't do it without pins showing. Ended up wearing it and just adjusting it throughout the night. It was so comfortable and was great to dance in!
Great dress. So comfortable and not too short. I may have to buy this one! If I do, I'll shorten the straps slightly to adjust the fit, otherwise perfect !

This dress is amazing! Its so classy yet sexy and different. I was thinking of buying it but it is so unique that I wouldn't wear it enough. I wore a 6 and have an athletic butt so it fit more like a sheath than a shift dress. If you have a bigger booty I would size up if you want more of a shift dress look. Everyone loved the dress and the beading is beautiful. I would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a summer boat party
links_reviews_text: So fun ! So many compliments
Very comfortable. Chic and well made.
Looove this!! I am tempted to buy it. It is beautiful, classy and flattering. Fits true to size.
The dress is so amazing. I loved how it flowed not restrictive in the least. It is true to size You Can wear a strapless bra for added support.
This dress fit me perfectly and was completely comfortable without a bra. It looks exactly as shown in photos.

This is a great dress to hide a tummy and still feel sexy. The detail work on the flower design is gorgeous. We went to a sushi restaurant and people kept stopping at our table to compliment my dress. Our waitress even wanted to know the designer and where I bought it. It is so comfortable!

Made my shoulders look super fantastic. The dress fit perfectly. Incredibly versatile. Minimalist but not boring. Rented for a gala, dressing it up with more formal accesories, then tossed a denim jacket over it the next day to wear it to a more casual event and it looked perfect both times.
Loved this dress ran big. I usually do 2 or 4 in dresses and the 2 still had room. Loved it! Will rent again!

It was definitely comfortable! I received compliments all night long. I am very petite (5'1 - 98 lbs.) and was concerned about the dress being a bit too big. I picked a size 0' and it fit perfect. Nothing bad to say about this dress :)
Good fit, not too long despite my petite size. Beadwork classes up the single LBD look. Paired with black strappy sandals.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a late September wedding.
links_reviews_text: I ordered this dress for a wedding late September. In Michigan you never know what the weather will be this time of year. It ended up being cool so I threw on a wool wrap. I've been sizing up as I'm currently 6 months pregnant and this worked perfectly. It's lined which is great. My only comment is it was a little snug in the bust, but I'm a little bustier than I used to be. #maternity

This may be my all-time fave so far from RTR--ALL night, I received so many comments on this dress and people were asking where to get it, they loved the beading on the front, and it was so flattering and comfortable! MAJOR HIT, LADIES! It's also really well made and PERFECT for a more athletic body type. I have a bigger ribcage/upper body than most girls and this was absolutely fantastic in terms of comfort and fit. I did not have to wear a bra with this (personal choice), but you could easily wear a strapless one if you need that extra support. RENT. THIS. DRESS. Home run!

This dress was perfect for a nighttime wedding! The beading made it fancy enough that I honestly didn't feel I needed accessories, but it was also fun enough to not feel too formal. This was a backup dress and I thought it fit a little snug in the hips in the size I wore but I probably would typically wear a size up (which was unavailable) so I'd say it fits true to size.

I purposely sized down because I didn't want it to hang too loosely on me. I'm pear shaped so I knew the dress wouldn't quite hang on me like in the photos either way, and I liked that it was a little more fitted with the size down. Went without a bra and because of the beading I was all good! Fun and cute option for a date night or GNO.

links_reviews_title: Little black dress upgraded - classic but with enough to be different
links_reviews_text: I wore this to my 20 year class reunion & got so many compliments. The material did not pick up lent and had a nice liner. It was fitted at the top but flowed in the middle to hide my self conscious tummy area. It was a great dress! You will need a strapless bra.

My normal size in a dress is 4, but being pregnant I chose the 6 as a back up. I wound up wearing the 4 as it fit perfectly. It was a little shapeless but perfect for 20 wks pregnant and still room to eat and move. Loved the beading detail!

I am between sizes, and, while both a 12 and 14 fit, I opted for the 14 because I wanted to feel ok crawling in and out of cabs, etc. I have a larger chest, so I was a little concerned about the bra situation. It does cut low down the arm-holes and it a strap-racerback. I was able to wear a bandeau solid black tube-top bra w/o it showing. The beading detail is lovely and a really nice "showpiece" for this dress. The color on the beading is more grey (blue-toned) white, so the right shoe might be a strappy silver or black with silver detail. I wore nude/black wedges and no one called me out, but I wished it matched up a little better. You can get away with wearing minimal jewelry for this one as well because of the beading and neckline---so you will save a little $ and effort there. When I looked at pics of this it seemed a little more like a shift dress, but wearing it, it was just a slightly looser sheath. Zips on the side and it didn't stick on me---it's always nice not to have to get an assist. The lining is pretty substantial, making it a little hotter (I was in Vegas in summer---so it was HOT) but, I didn't have to worry about underwear showing! I liked this one a lot! I wish it came in other colors/details, I would definitely consider buying!
This dress fit true to size. It was very flattering and I received many compliments. The beading really sets it apart from the usual LBD. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Unique, great fit with room to spare to eatz
links_reviews_text: I wear between a 6 and an 8. The 8 fit but was a little loose. 6 was a good fit but just got broad shoulders.

links_reviews_title: So comfortable on a HOT summer night!
links_reviews_text: The beading was really beautiful! It fit super well and was very flattering. I didn't need to wear a bra which was a bonus because I don't own a strapless. I got a ton of compliments, and I felt great in it. I am usually a size 10 so the fit was spot on, good for a full bust.

Wore this dress to my sister's rehearsal dinner and it was great -- it was loose enough that I didn't have to worry about eating too much of the delicious rehearsal dinner food but was still chic. My one (small) complaint was that it was a thicker material than I had imagined it to be so it wasn't as flowy as I thought it would look once on. Not a huge deal at all but the thickness of the material caused it to be a bit more constricting than a thinner fabric would have been. I wore the size 6 although honestly I wish I had ordered a size 8 as a backup instead of a size 4 because I think I would have been slightly more comfortable in an 8. Nevertheless, it was a great dress and I'd wear it again!

links_reviews_title: I want to keep this forever!
links_reviews_text: Fitted around the hips (and I barely have those) but blouses a little around the middle. Fabric thick enough for no bra, even at a c-cup. On the shorter side. This is comfortable and sexy and pretty and...perfect dress.

I usually wear a size 6, but I got a size 4 because of reviews saying it runs big. I think I should have gotten a six. The 4 was doable, but too tight across my hips. The beading the dress is beautiful! Will rent again.
This dress was great for a cocktail rehearsal dinner! It was a good length, and comfortable. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: amazing dress, with room to eat and drink!
links_reviews_text: Flattering little black dress. Loved the quality and the beadwork. Was able to eat and drink freely, as this wasn't too snug in the belly area. Wore a strapless bra with black strappy heels. Hit me mid thigh - very sexy! Also loved the neck line. Highly recommend this dress! Fits true to size.

The beadwork is gorgeous and the dress is so flattering. I'm usually between a 2 and 4 and the 4 was just a little too loose, so if you're between sizes you can probably size down. I will absolutely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: A fun and easy-to-wear dress, which I wore to a wedding in L.A.
links_reviews_text: The dress has an under-slip, and its fit was more snug at the hips, but that is typical for me since I have a small chest. Overall, it was a fun dress to wear. I liked that it showed off my arms!

It was pretty true to size- but really depending on how you want to wear it you could possibly drop down a size. I dropped down to a size 2 and I normally wear a 4. I have a slightly thicker mid section and this dress hid it so well. It was looser in the middle which made having that extra piece of cake a no brainer! I got compliments all night. Would definitely rent this again!!!

links_reviews_title: Easy,comfortable dress. Perfect for charity gala!
links_reviews_text: I loved the halter neckline. No necklace needed! Plus, the shift style was easy to move in. I wore with tights and black suede wedge boots to a winter charity event. Both sizes fit but the 8 gapped to much on top. The pictures don't really do it justice. Beading detail on this dress is beautiful. Will rent again!
Great fit! Comfy and appropriate for occasion.

I got compliments all night on this easy to wear shift dress. The fit does wonders to highlight shoulders and back without being too tight on the belly which is always a plus! It was so comfortable and everyone stopped to admire the beautiful beaded flower. Truly a unique and fun dress.
Fit is true to size. I am a 34D and size 4 normally, but I wore the 6 because I wanted a little bit of a looser fit on my butt. The beadwork is impeccable!

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable, easy to wear dress
links_reviews_text: The fit was really great, I'm about two sizes larger than normal because of some medical stuff going on, but I still felt pretty in this dress. I'll wear it's again, but this time I'll cinch up the straps, they were a little long and I looked a bit Michael Phelpsy in the shoulders.
I loved this easy-to-wear dress. It was comfy, great for dancing, and amazing quality. The beading made it really stand out from all the other beautiful dresses at the wedding!
Love the high neck and racer back. Can wear a regular strapless bra too which is perfect. Will definitely be renting again!
I can't even explain how much I loved this dress! Wish I could keep. Fit perfectly, the halter straps were nice and the length was perfect for a summer formal dinner. Will rent again!

This color and cut of this dress was very flattering. I only gave it four stars bc it was very tight and unforgiving even in the skirt. We had to get in and out of buses between the ceremony and reception of wedding and the dress was so tight I barely made it up the steps! I would definitely size up and maybe go up two sizes. I am usually a two and wore a four and probably would have been more comfortable wearing a six.

I've been a 6 in pretty much everything I've rented from RTR, so I'd say this runs a little small since I wore the 8. Super comfortable, flattering, great material. Didn't need a bra, just petals. The color was a so nice, more of a sherbet, like a soft orange. The party was an orange theme, and I was so excited to see so many cute options from RTR!

links_reviews_title: I enjoyed wearing this lovely dress to a wedding.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable fit. Not too tight. The front does wrinkle a bit (from sitting down), but it's not so bad.

links_reviews_title: Super flattering Dress! Used for a Summer Wedding
links_reviews_text: Took a chance Bc I read the reviews and saw it ran small. Made it work and got so many compliments!

Classy elegant dress in a great color. Ran a little small (wore one size up) and did have a little wear on the side seam of the dress that was not ideal but not very noticeable. Overall liked the dress a lot - received many compliments.

Wore this dress to a summer wedding in NYC, and it was very comfortable. Got complements all day & night! The dress does run a little small, and the neck straps can get a bit annoying after a few hours.

links_reviews_title: Head turning dress, felt like a whole snack :)
links_reviews_text: Small through hips, great for an hourglass figure. 5'3", 165 lbs, 36D bust (can't update profile). renting again for another wedding.

links_reviews_title: Nice peach dress, runs very small
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful but because it ended up fitting so tightly on me, I couldn't even take a normal stride; it was too restricting around the thighs and tight around my hips, I could only take baby steps. I didn't end up wearing it to my professional school ceremony with it being such a tight fit so I should've listened to the reviews and sized up. If you're 26" waist, 37" hips - go up from a size 4! This fabric was nice and thick though, wish I'd gotten a bigger size.
Very flattering fit. Thick material so I sweat a little but otherwise perfect!

links_reviews_title: Celebrating with family and friends in this dress made this event even more fun!
links_reviews_text: The fit and color were perfect. I received several compliments.
Great dress for a summer wedding. Defiantly needed to size up one or two then your usual and the zipper was a bit tricky but all and all a great dress!

links_reviews_title: The dress was well made and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size. It has a bit of give but was a snug fit.

I got this for an outdoor summer wedding. I ordered the size 8 with the size 10 as a backup, and the 10 was too big overall while the 8 was tight through my hips and still quite large around the bust. I wear a 34DD so it was a bit odd to me that the bust was still gaping at the sides. It's a very pretty color, but there isn't much give to the fabric. I ended up not wearing it and went with the other dress I rented.
Pros-beautiful color, amazing fabric, great fit (once you size up), fun to wear and lots of compliments. Cons-size up for sure. I typically wear a 10 or 12 and needed the 14.

Overall the dress was snug: the pencil skirt combined with the around the neck halter top made it pretty tight around my neck when bending over - getting my shoes on was a little tricky. Had no problems dancing the night away though!! I wish I would've thought to wear my spanx, otherwise, really great dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, a bit uncomfortable at times.
links_reviews_text: Got many compliments on this dress. The color is what makes this dress. The neck of this dress made it uncomfortable to sit for long period of time. Size up!
The color is beautiful in person and it fit great. It does run small and the material doesn't give.

The dress definitely runs small just like everyone said. I normally wear a 6 or maybe an 8, but the 10 fit me perfectly. It's a slightly stretchy material and very comfortable! Perfect for a spring/summer wedding. The only drawback was that because of the fit my dancing was a little hindered. Couldn't break it down quite as well as I normally can!

The material was really nice and comfortable. The color was the perfect shade of pink and I received lots of compliments. The dress does hug you fairly tight in the stomach and hip area but the fabric is thick enough to help keep everything smooth. Great dress!
I usually wear an 6/8 dress, ended up wearing the 10. Beautiful color, received lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Perfect match for my Kentucky Derby outfit
links_reviews_text: OK, so I'm a little pudgy in the tummy right now, so I definitely wore shapewear underneath. I went braless, which this dress is thick enough to handle. I felt a bit like a sausage, but the 10 was too wide at the hips, and was structured enough that it wouldn't lie flat on my hips, and really the hip area was the only part that seemed bigger than the 8. Got lots of compliments, but was definitely sucking it in all day.
The 0 was definitely too snug but I crammed into it. Just was careful about sitting and bending. Great color. Great shape. Got compliments all over the place.
This dress was absolutely gorgeous. It fit great and I didn't have any problems with the bust being too small. I received many compliments on the color and style. #thankyouRTR

Such a fun spring color! Bright and eye catching coral! Great thicker material that is very flattering. Form fitting but not restricting. Wore a normal strapless bra and worked perfectly. Great find!!
The fit was perfect. I felt slim and sexy.

The dress fit like a glove!! It hugged every curve and was very flattering on my body. I feel dress sizes and pants sizes are usually off anyways, but i wore it in the same size as my jeans and it worked. This was for a quinceañera and I had to wear coral, it was such a hard color to find. Luckily I looked here. I couldn’t wait to tell all my friends I rented it for $30.
Cute but choked me when I sat down
Was easy to wear and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Easy dress to pack for a destination wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fit as expected and reviewed by others. The material has a bit of give, was comfortable all night.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my company holiday party.
links_reviews_text: The dress is a little tight but the material is stretchy so it made it easy to walk and move around. I really liked the lenght especially for a work Holiday event. I received the dress a day early and received a lot of compliments at the party so overall I am very happy with my choice.
Definitely size up. I'm usually a six, and definitely needed the 10 in this dress. The 8 was ok, but too tight to wear all day. Wore this to a polo match.

I wore this dress to a warm and rainy summer wedding. I chose this dress because it was for a colleagues' wedding and I knew that there would be co-workers present and thus wanted to cover up a bit more than I normally would. For that purpose the dress worked, it covered up my chest entirely, didn't have flashy cut outs and hit just at the top of my knee. I chose not to wear a bra and the dress didn't do much to flatter my small chest. It was comfortable to dance in all night, I'd recommend for a more modest wedding.
Loved the neckline. Stretchiness showed off the booty and allowed for dancing.

I wore this for my company employee awards banquet. I got so many compliments. I think it's really comfy but it does run small. I wear a 10 so i got a 12 and a 14. The 14 was way too big but the 12 fit great with spanx and a strapless bra. My only tip is be aware that if you have medium to large chest there will be some side boob.
Size 2 fit perfectly on me. I'm 5'6 1/2 and weigh 123 lbs. I received many compliments on the dress and was perfect for a beach wedding!

This dress was awesome! I can usually go between a 4 and a 6 in dresses since I usually don't buy ones so fitted but for this one since the other reviews said it was snug, i went up to the 8 and was so glad i did. The 8 fit great and looked great, but the slit in the back did rip twice on me. I think if i had ordered a 10 it may have fit since it runs snug but otherwise i've never worn a 10 so i wouldn't have thought to order that much up. Both times it ripped was when i was either opening my leg out to get in a car or out of a chair. So if you have a big booty, the dress is awesome but definitely use caution when moving your legs while sitting. Color was great, not too bright of a coral but also not dull. For reference for booty size i wear a 27/28 in jeans. I also thought this dress was great for petite, any longer and i would have looked silly but it ended up being a really flattering length although it was not a petite dress and the model it hits near her knees.

I loved the color and design.. Nice fabric but not much stretch at all, so elected not to wear the dress for dancing at the wedding reception. Got lots of compliments. True to size. The only thing I didn't like about the dress, was the hem at the midsection. It created a bulge and didn't allow the dress to lay flat and smooth against the body.
This dress hugged well so with a pair of Spanx underneath, I felt good in it. I didn't LOVE it personally because I don't really like the neckline.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my casual wedding reception!
links_reviews_text: I loved the color and the look very much and got lots of compliments. However, it fit like a glove and was not easy to use the restroom without help. Also, the cross in front of the neck (which was lovely in theory), but it did twist quite a bit exposing my bra of the same style. I wouldn't say not to rent this dress, it is beautiful, but lets just say it was high maintenance.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, stunning color! You will get compliments!
links_reviews_text: This color of this dress is truly stunning. The fit is a bit smaller, I wore a size up. Fabric is thicker, which I liked. I truly have no complaints about this dress. Very happy with it!

links_reviews_title: Unique and so fun to wear for holiday party
links_reviews_text: the fit is comfortable, kept me cool on the dance floor and warm for fall weather. totally different from my norm which made for a fun experience. no bra needed. so many compliments.
Love this dress /!
Was a great dress, rubber trim to hold up cutouts kept flipping out but they were black so it wasn't a huge deal

Got tons of compliments on the dress. It is thick and heavy. Great materials. I was outside all day but it wasn't hot from all the cut-outs. I'm petite 5'3. I wouldn't recommended it to anyone shorter than that. The dress is long.

I wore this dress to see Hamilton! I felt gorgeous and received compliments all day! The medium would have fit my bottom half better but the arms/shoulders were snug. However, I have more athletic broad shoulders. The slip underneath is short but if you don't mind showing your thighs it's perfect!

I'm 5'10", 140lbs, with 34C athletic build. Dress was pretty, but the cut from the waist out to the hips is different and kinda drawers attention to your hips/makes them loop bigger. I was not use to that look, but it was different and well made.

links_reviews_title: Waist was a little big, but it's such an amazing dress to wear that I give it 5 stars!
links_reviews_text: In love with this dress despite the waist area hanging lower than I wanted it to from being to big. This exposed my sides more than I wanted because I was at an evening wedding surrounded by very traditional family. But they didn't consider my bare skin offensive at all (ha) and I got tons of compliments - not bad for a mom of two young ones :-). It's so easy to wear, so comfortable, yet very chic and elegant and edgy and different all rolled into one. I wore the XS and it fit longer than the model since I'm only 5'3" (117#, 32B, 33-26-36), but I still loved the length and everything about it. I hope I have another occasion to wear it to and highly recommend it.

I wore this dress to a Harry Potter costume party on New Years Eve. I played Bellatrix Lestrange. It was perfect for the occasion and character. However, the way the dress is made and constructed is so delicate I was paranoid about snagging it on something and ended up changing out of it halfway through the evening.
I loved it! I wore a tank top under for more coverage for my event but I felt so beautiful. I have big arm so it was definitely tight on my arms with now stretch.

This dress is by far my favorite RTR dress; and the second time I rented it. It's tea length, super comfortable all night long and easy to take on and off. The zipper is wide not one of those teeny tiny ones that's impossible to open and close. Compliments all night! I'm 5'11 and use a wheelchair, it's very comfortable and easy to lift up when I had to use the restroom which is always a challenge with dresses. The cut outs are high fashion and not trashy. Perfect amount of tease to leave em hanging ;) . I'm small up top so I'd definitely size down since this dress runs slightly on the large size. If you're over 5'11 the under slip might not cover your booty so just a fair warning.
This was a perfect look for a winter night out in NYC. Comfortable and a statement dress!

links_reviews_title: I want to keep this dress! Perfection!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly! So comfortable! Makes your waist looks small. So many compliments!
I rented for a date but felt it was a little too revealing for my taste. I would 100% rent again for a more party-environment. Beautiful and great fit
Fits great and it is very flattering. Compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: Probably the most comfortable and complimentary dress I've worn
links_reviews_text: Fit is perfect. Relaxed without being droopy. The fabric is heavier than you think, but that only adds to the comfort. Slightly stretchy so it doesn't cut into you, but thick enough that you feel like you don't need a bra. Classy because of the sleeves and bottom length, but the cutouts and lace add the edge you want. I would avoid wearing in summer, but all other seasons check out.
This dress fits TTS. I am 5'6, 130lbs, 36D, athletic build and this dress fit perfect in a S. I was even able to wear it without a bra. I would highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Many complements "very sexy" dress. This dress was also comfortable to move around in.
links_reviews_text: I did not feel restricted in this dress at all. I could move freely in the medium. Loved the over all fit. I will be renting this one again
The dress is gorgeous and it fit so well.

My dress sizes fluctuates between small and medium. I needed help zipping up the SR and the armpits and chest was just too tight (i have square shoulders)although the waist was comfortable. Switched to the MR which was much more comfortable on my chest and arms but made the waist fit larger. This is just gorgeous detailing. On my frame (5'3) the hem of the dress reached my ankles with a 3 inch boot. The sleeves were a bit longer on me in the MR but I was going for a dressy boho look so it was fine. I would definitely rent and even purchase this dress because it can be dressed up or be more casual.

links_reviews_title: Fun and Diffeent Take on the LBD
links_reviews_text: This dress is so much fun and definitely a twist on your classic black dress. People noticed it and I received lots of compliments. The SR fit perfectly with enough room in the arms and upper body to be comfortable. It is hard to lift your arms over your head.if your between sizes I would size up as it doesn't stretch. Im 5'4 and it cam to just about my ankles. I did feel a little uncomfortable sitting because if you slouch at all you might get some spillover on the side. The sticky part of the dress that holds the bottom in place was a little worn but still worked. I really enjoyed this dress and would rent it again.

This dress was sexy withtout being cheap whatsoever. The material was actually very heavy. Dont recommend if the weather is very warm. Fit pretty well but had plenty of wiggle room so it wasnt too tight. The dress was actually tea length on me which i thought was very flattering because the underskirt hit a few inches above the knee. Perfect for a Saturday night date!

links_reviews_title: Love This Dress! I want to buy it!
links_reviews_text: This dress runs true to size. Im 5'4, 34C bust, 27 waist and 40hips. It was a perfect fit! The length was perfect (stopped right at my calf) and it wasnt too tight or too lose in any areas. The one con I will forwarn you of is the skirt slip! ITS EXTREMELY SHORT! Especially for ladies who have curvier lower bodies. I was extremely self conscious when I sat down, stood up, and walked. Be mindful of this when you rent this dress. Other than that I have zero complaints. Got TONS of compliments from family and strangers alike.
I wasn't sure on whether to order a small or x-small because of some reviews of it running a little big, So I Went with the x-small and glad I did! It fit perfect!

links_reviews_title: An original high quality dress perfect for any special occassion
links_reviews_text: This is one of the most beautiful dresses I have ever worn! It was comfortable and I got compliments all night. I am even considering buying it. It is sexy but modest and original without being over the top. This is perfect for any special event.

I wore this to my husband's Holiday Party and recieced lots of compliments. I was very aware of the cut outs all night and worried about my back fat so I wasn't comfortable in the dress. The quality of the dress is great and if you feel good with your body I think it woild be a fabulous dress. For me, it wasn't the best dress I have rented but that is on me and not the dress.
Loved this dress, it fit absolutely perfect. Got a ton of compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: I wish I owned this dress!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for wedding rehearsal and dinner in November. It was freezing out so u wore thick black tights and black booties. The cutout and lace didn't make me cold once. This dress is thick material to where I definitely didn't need the tights. I received endless complements and I will totally be renting this dress again for whatever reason i can come up with. It's just so different and everyone can wear it. I was worried about the cut outs but they hit in the perfect spot and the edges have that rubber to hold it up against your skin so you feel secure and held together.

Wore this to a "boho chic" themed gala and I think it fit the vibe well. I admit at first I wasn't sure I liked this dress - the material was heavier than I expected and the skirt a bit bulkier than I expected. I worried it didn't have enough movement and perhaps I might look weighed down. But by the end of the evening the dress had grown on me, and I ended up feeling hip and fun and was glad I had chosen the dress.
This dress is amazing! I got non-stop compliments about it all night! Fit like a glove and light enough to wear in the summer.
This was perfect for wine tasting and SUPER comfortable! I received many compliments and would wear this dress again anytime. Very unique and flattering.
I loved this dress, I wore this for my senior prom and I felt so beautiful. One problem with this dress is the arms, it wasn't stretchy at all.
Tons of compliments. Wore it to an awards ceremony followed by a rock concert. Felt so sexy yet really comfortable. Might need to rent to again in a few months.

I loved wearing this dress out for a Girl's Night. I think this is a great option for tall girls- the skirt and sleeve length were perfect on my long frame. I am 5'11" and 152#. BUT, be forewarned- I stepped over something and my heel got caught in the lace and I crashed to the floor. Make sure you gather the skirt when stepping over things or doing stairs!

I wore this twice, first to a fancy dinner and show for my husbands birthday and again for a friends afternoon wedding. I received so many compliments and everyone was dying to know where I got the dress. I'll for sure rent this again, easy to wear and super fun!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. I was going to purchase from rtr but I found it online for half price.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect. Loved it. Got tons of compliments

links_reviews_title: the detail and quality in person was beyond my expectations.
links_reviews_text: This dress was absolutely beautiful. I received so many compliments, it is truly unique. I wish I could have kept it, will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Unique and beautiful piece that will hopefully be in stock so I can rent it again
links_reviews_text: It fit tight in the shoulders/across the top of my chest. The only time this really bothered me is when I was trying to reach my arms back to zip up the dress, it was very difficult. Also, I imagine if I had to lift my arms a lot - for dancing, say - I might feel too constricted. Also the waist/hip area could have been a little tighter, but it was fine.

links_reviews_title: Such a comfortable, easy dress. Got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit was near perfect! And loved that it's not super snug... I ate a steak dinner, and didn't have to worry about sucking in the rest of the night, ha!
This dress fit perfectly. It was extremely comfortable. I received complements all night. I would so rent this again.

links_reviews_title: I am OBSESSED with this dress!! Endless compliments. Will definitely rent again!!!
links_reviews_text: The cut out hit in the right places. It does run large. Would have wish I got a small but absolutely loved it!!

I rented this for date night and my husband loved it! So much so that I rented it again recently. The peek a boo shoulder is very eye catching. Sexy without being really exposed. Subtle. I really considered buying this one!! It's snug but not tight. Flattering and versatile. I'm a size 12 and RTR recommended XL and it fit great.

One of my favorite rentals, a simple comfortable fit - very forgiving on any belly rolls. Good length, I was able to move and dance no worries. I did have to pull and pin the shoulder zig-zag so that it stayed pulled tight. I kept it simple with big colorful earrings and got lots of compliments!

This is a fabulous dress! Lots of stretch! For me, it was snug in the chest and looser in the mid-section. I am a solid 8, but I opted for the Large size. I considered purchasing it, but ultimately decided to send back. I will definitely rent again!

Pretty, comfortable LBD. Not my favorite rental but I felt pretty for my birthday dinner! Only real complaint was that this dress is a little tough for pear shapes. The hips were tighter than the waist (which was loose) which isn't my favorite way to wear a dress! It was easy to hide since the material is black. Would recommend for the right body type!

links_reviews_title: Super comfy and perfect little black dress
links_reviews_text: I should have bought this one -- super comfy and perfect little black dress with a little flare. One of the strings was too long on the shoulder so I had to tuck it in. But overall very cute and wore it a few times before returning. Or ally a size 6 and this fit true to size.

links_reviews_title: NYE Night Out - Comfy and Chic
links_reviews_text: Loved this! Stretchy material and strap-style shoulders allowed for me to wear my favorite undergarments and stay comfortable dancing all night for New Year's Eve! This dress hugged my curves in all the right places. Will definitely rent again.

Cute dress though nothing too special. Perfect for a night out when you want to go a little dressier than jeans but want to stay comfortable Probably would be cuter with big earrings or a statement necklace or something.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Shoulder details were really flattering. Would definitely recommend this dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. I typically wear a 10/12 and rented the large. It fit perfectly. Wear a strapless bra, skip the necklace so all eyes are on the sexy shoulder.
Wore the medium and it was still loose and comfortable. Dress also has almost a built-in shelf bra that helped keep a strapless bra up. Got so many compliments and would wear again!

Wore this to a wine tasting and it was perfect! Heavier, stretchy material made it extremely comfortable and the style was so unique. I received so many compliments and my date couldn't keep his eyes off me!

I rented this dress to wear to a concert, weekend away with my sister. The dress was stretchy and comfortable. It fit great. It made me feel sexy, but was still appropriate for someone my age and size (age 45 and size 10).

links_reviews_title: Really pretty, simple dress that was comfortable and easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: I enjoyed this dress - wore it with black patterned tights and black heels. It was stretchy and a little shorter than what I had expected, but I liked that about it. I think the fit would be better for those with more shape - my A/B cup doesn't provide much in terms of curves (I would have liked it to be a little more snug, even when wearing the small, as my "straight and narrowness" was quite evident). The shoulder detail is super cute!
It fit perfectly, I felt beautiful all night, and got a bazillion compliments. What a great dress!
Very comfortable fabric with cute sleeve detail. Thick enough fabric that I didn't have to wear a bra. Kept me warm in 20 degree weather, I would definitely rent it again!
Great LBD for any occasion!!

links_reviews_title: I felt amazing in this dress and my husband loved it!!
links_reviews_text: This dress is easy and fun to wear. It is forgiving in the waist area which was nice and the cut out shoulder is unique and sexy. I wanted to buy this dress and would definitely rent it again.

I rented the M and L in this dress. They came new with tags and were amazing. The fabric was stretchy and comfortable. The medium fit better but I chose to size up so i didn't have to suffer in spanx due to panty lines being visible. The L was just a tad bit larger but fit in a way I could wear comfortable undergarments without worry about them being visible. I'm normally a M and could have 100% worn this in a M as well. I loved this dress and will likely rent again. One item to note--- the cute strappy detail is a bit loose. I had to manipulate them to keep them tight. Also, the dress has no zippers. I chose to step into it rather than pull over head and risk deodorant marks!

I LOVE THIS DRESS! Its stretchy which makes it super comfortable, warm for these upcoming winter months. The detail on the shoulder makes it have the perfect umph for the little black dress. I would recommend wearing spanx to smooth things out.
I love this dress! I've rented it a couple of times. Its sexy and flattering without being too revealing. I wore it with fishnets and over-the-knee boots and looked amazing for a fun date night.

links_reviews_title: My son got engaged and I wore this dress to the engagement party!
links_reviews_text: Could wear with sandals or tights and boots, depending on the weather. Very versatile and comfortable!

links_reviews_title: I received many compliments on the dress, the material, and how well it fit me.
links_reviews_text: Definitely would recommend this dress to anyone who needs something for a formal event, with cooler weather. Flattering and the material is great!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable but not my favorite RTR piece
links_reviews_text: Material is very stretchy and very casual. The shoulder detail does dress it up a little, but I also found the "straps" to be kind of awkward. XL fit me well (10/12) and it's on the shorter end.

I rented this dress and another backup fairly last-minute for a weekend in Atlantic City. The shoulder detail definitely made it more unique than your standard LBD! I am starting to realize that shift dresses just don't work as well on my shape as I'd like them to. It was comfortable, but a little short, and since my bottom is a bit bigger it just fit my waist awkwardly. I ended up passing on it since it just didn't compliment my curves as I'd have liked, but I would still give it a shot if you're looking for a simple, easy option to add a little something new to a classic black dress look!

I rented this for my 40th birthday party -- it was so comfortable for a day on a wine tour and looked stellar in pictures. It was cold so I wore it with black tights and booties to dress it down a tad.

links_reviews_title: While it fit really well I chose not to wear this dress, it ended up looking frumpy on me.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well but looked really square on me, with the right figure I think it would be gorgeous.
Wore for an office holiday party. Fit great and super comfortable!

links_reviews_title: fun party dress that you can dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Great fit, good quality material.
This dress fits like a glove, however it was really cold outside so I did not end up wearing this one.

Wore this to a dinner with my boyfriends relatives and wore it again to a dinner with a mentor of mine. Worked well but my dress came with a weird (but very tiny) stain on the dress. I tried like hell to get it off/out but it seemed like someone got adhesive on the dress and I had to scrape and scrap... couldn't get t all off. It was only noticeable if a person was looking very closely
Loved this dress! I received compliments all night long. I dressed it up with burgundy velvet heels and rhinestone jewelry for a black tie event. It was fabulous!

links_reviews_title: Classic black dress with a fun twist
links_reviews_text: I actually wore this dress twice with knee high boots, loved it!
The dress is really pretty, maybe not for a formal event but great for a party

links_reviews_title: Thin material - kind of a "club dress"
links_reviews_text: Was a bit too young for me. Material was thin. Reminded me of an inexpensive club dress. Laces were loose and a bit wonky when it arrived. Had to work with them to get them to lay right for the try on. Sent back without wearing.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but didn't fit right to be flattering!
links_reviews_text: This is a nice dress, and I didn't totally hate how it looked on me. But I chose not to wear it in the end. It fits like a shift from the bust down, so not tight over the hips or stomach, which hides a lot. But the arms, shoulders, and bust were VERY snug on me in both the medium and large sizes, which made it look sort of unbalanced and ill-fitting. A slighter, slimmer person than me, with a small bust, could probably wear this and look great, because it would fit like a shift dress. On me with curves and thicker arms/shoulders, it looked odd. I will say that it is very forgiving in the stomach and hips, which was nice.

links_reviews_title: Forgiving cut, but a little matronly.
links_reviews_text: Basic LBD but the straps fit a little weird and it wasn't a showstopper or anything. Just kind of meh.
Cute for everyday or a date.
Loved the fit of this dress and felt super special and classy at my bridal shower!
Fit is great. The subtle ruffles are very pretty.

links_reviews_title: Subtle pink dress with ruffles that make it unique. Classy and cute !
links_reviews_text: This dress fit true to size and was a good length for any occasion. The ruffles give it personality
I rented this for Awards night at my company. Loved the fit and detail on this dress. It was so beautiful and comfortable to wear. I got tons of compliments. The color was beautiful also.
Liked this dress a lot, but constantly needs a lint roller so good for 1 or 2 wears only

links_reviews_title: Love love love! Rented for church, but might purchase. Classic and lovely!
links_reviews_text: True to size, flattering, and comfortable!
Pretty dress and flattering cut- well made
Fit really well but the length was an inch or two short for work but too conservative looking for a party.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a special day in my career!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. Beautiful color and exquisite design. I wore this to my pinning ceremony after receiving my doctorate at Vanderbilt University.
Nice dress, great fit. Paired with a cardigan for work. Might be a little short for taller girls to wear to work. I'm 5'6" and it was fine (just shorter than I expected).

This dress is relatively simple, but the ruffles make it fun and different. The fit was a bit longer than I was expecting as a taller person, which wasn't a bad thing since I wore this to work. Fit was a bit large- lots of space around the waist that wasn't as flattering, although it was a bit tighter around the arm holes.

links_reviews_title: Dress up or down; very high quality.
links_reviews_text: The armholes fit snugly, almost too small. The dress was closely fitted across my C-cup chest. Even though I probably would have been more comfortable in one size up, I still loved this dress.

links_reviews_title: Great work dress- so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Wore to a conference in Vegas on a 100 degree day, and was very comfortable. As others have mentioned it is a bit big and I had room in the waist but I think the 4/40 would be too small for me in the chest/shoulders area since that was more fitted. It's a beautiful color, well made, and wears well- it didn't wrinkle like I expected during the day. The silk ruffles are beautiful and move delicately as you walk, I felt very elegant and put together. Perfect length. Would love to buy, but will think about it and rent again instead. Rent this!!!
Such a beautiful dress. I received so many compliments.
Wore this to work. Super cute! I love ruffles and although a lot of them, dress did not look bulky. Good quality. Lightweight material. Overall comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Bridal Shower Dress - Awesome color and fit!
links_reviews_text: Love the blush color and the lining/material was sturdy and thick but still light and airy for a sunny, 75 degree day. My belly sticks out right now but this was still flattering from all angles which is very important to me! I also love when I wear something without sleeves that my "armpit fat" (lol don't know what else to call or) isn't sticking out. I was surprised how well this dress fit overall. Highly recommend!
Loved the subtle pink of this dress. Great structure- well made and luxuriously lines. Can wear regular bra. I'm between a 2 and a 4. The 40 had a bit of room.
Great tts fit. Feminine dress. Put a black turtleneck under to be comfy in cold weather. Def more beige than pink.

This dress was really cute, and I love that the ruffles were on the smaller side! I really like the color of it and the fabric is pretty comfortable. This dress does definitely run large though, so I'd recommend sizing down.
Love it with a cropped ivory blazer for work or statement jewelry for cocktails/dinner or gorgeous pumps and elegant jewelry for a wedding.
It fit perfect and color was perfect. A little short for work but wearing a sweater over it.
Armholes were so tight it felt like T-Rex arms.. did not wear
Great fit. Love the flare.
Very nice color, great design at bottom, flare. Runs small, I usually wear US 2-4, but this 40 still kinda tight on chest. I'm 5'5", 115 lbs, 34C.
fits true to size.
Pretty dress, more of a beige color than pink. Ok dress but I didn't wear.

Cute dress. The length was a little off on me, but I am very short. As it turns out, pale pink is not my color. The dress is nearly an exact match for my skin tone and totally washed me out. Unfortunately returned without wearing.
I rented this for my daughter who is 5'4" and 105 lbs. The dress fit beautifully but she thought it was "too long" it is knee length. She didn't wear it, but she should have lol.

links_reviews_title: this dress was beautiful in color and fabric is great. the top is for very bigger chest. I am a B.
links_reviews_text: big on the top
maybe runs a little big. adorable

I absolutely love this timeless, classic dress. I was going to buy it, sans for the fact that the color is a little bit off, indicating it's been dry cleaned one too many times. But, it's a beautiful dress, flattering, and versatile.
The dress is beautiful. It was a little fitted in the chest. Perfect length for a petite frame.

I ordered this for daily workwear (RTR unlimited) and was pleasantly surprised to see that the color was muted and neutral enough to be professional. More beige than pink. I wore it with a white cardigan and nude pumps and it looked very appropriate for the office. With fancier shoes and jewelry, it could easily convert to an event outfit. I am petite and pear-shaped and it was still flattering. The length was on the shorter side for me but still conservative.
This dress runs a little smaller than most Red Valentino styles- sized up 1 size. Beautiful details and good material that doesn't wrinkle!
this dress is really cute and high quality
Fit well, the pink is pretty! But there is some little flaw

I rented this for my cousin's wedding in Cape May, NJ! I was giving a reading and wanted to look amazing. I loved the color, and the sleeves - the lace detail - everything! Received a bunch of comments!

links_reviews_title: My son's Valentine's Day mommy & son dance
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my son's Valentine's Day dance and it was such a great dress for the event! I didn't want anything too short or long and a high neck (it's an elementary school). When I first tried it on, it was a little tight to get over my hips (I have big hips and thighs) but it was a perfect fit! True to size. My son saw me in it and said I looked beautiful. I felt like a queen in it. LOVED THIS DRESS!!
Tons of compliments at work all day. I always go one size up for all Draper James and they fit great.

I wore this to a charity luncheon and shopping event and loved it. The dress is a great length and was comfortable for sitting for long periods of time. I ordered the 4 and the 6 based on other reviews and found the larger size was better across the busy line. Also, the color is absolutely lovely!!

Got this dress as a back-up for a formal Christmas Eve dinner, and I'm so glad I did! The color was gorgeous, detailing was classy, and fit was perfect. It even had some stretch so I still felt comfortable wearing during and after a very large dinner. I got a ton of compliments and it's the kind of dress I would love to own.

links_reviews_title: A friend told me I looked like a movie star!
links_reviews_text: The dress was beautiful, so well made and fit perfectly! Comfortable and the perfect length. I wish I had purchased it!

I ordered a size 10 and size 12 as replacements for a dress I thought was too tight. The size 12 was very large, the 10 fit perfectly. However the size 10 had a rip in the lace down the front of the right leg. They are beautiful dresses, and have a very comfortable fit. As a large-chested woman, I really appreciate a dress I can wear a regular bra with! However, these do feel kind of matronly.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Color for Family Christmas Photos!
links_reviews_text: This was a well made dress that was the perfect color for Christmas photos. When I first saw the dress, I was a little worried that the shoulders would look too padded/structured but once it was on, it was flattering. It would be a perfect dress for a holiday party. Classy enough for a work event.
Another Draper James win. True to size, this dress was as pictured and did not disappoint. The color was rich, the fit was comfortable. Loved it.
I actually wore this to the rehearsal dinner. Fit was perfect and dress was super comfortable.
I wore this to an end of summer wedding. I loved how I looked and felt in the one!! A medium amount of give in the material, and generous in the bust.

links_reviews_title: The comfortability of this dress made the night!
links_reviews_text: The fit of this dress is true to size. I ordered a 12 and a backup size of 14. I tried the 14 on first and while it was nice, it felt a bit loose. I wanted a bit more conformity so I put the 12 on and it was perfect! The length of the dress went just below my knees (I’m 5’2”) and it was not tight at the bottom which made it perfect for dancing and walking around all night comfortably. I loved this dress so much I wish I could keep it! I will definitely be renting it again in the future. Thanks, RTR!

links_reviews_title: Wore it to my daughter's bridal shower (who was also in a RTR dress) it was perfect for the occasion
links_reviews_text: It was true to size. Just need to be a bit careful as the lace can get caught on things. Very comfortable!

This dress is a fabulous dress for work or dinner. I wore it to the end of the year dinner and ballet. It was perfect length, and fit. It's not stretchy, if you are big busted you may wish to size up. Gorgeous color with black detail.

This is a looser fitting dress with beautiful red lace detail. I easily could have worn this to the office but it fit in perfectly at a Holiday party. You can wear your normal bra with this and it fell right to my knees. The lace was not itchy and I did not find the dress to hug tightly anywhere and the slightly nipped in waist have a gorgeous silhouette.
I got so many compliments on the dress, it was perfect to attend a graduation reception! Would rent again!

Comfortable and suitable for classy/conservative events but the red still makes it fun. I'm 5'4" and it hit a few inches below my knee. Due to some shoulder sheerness I needed to wear a strapless bar.

I wear a 10, but usually in dresses I have to go up a size. I am very grateful I could order two sizes of the same dress because the 12 fit nicely. I wanted a dress with sleeves since it's been a little cooler and something that hit the knees. I'm 5'10" so it's not always easy to find a dress with extra length.

links_reviews_title: This is a beautiful dress with a weird fit
links_reviews_text: Very nice material. My regular size was snug on the midsection and based on the reviews my back up was a size smaller rather than larger. It bunched a lot when I sat but looked okay standing. If I had the larger size as back up it would have been perfect.

I am on the left. This dress was a perfect fit. It looked great and I received a lot of compliments. I took one star off because it was a little difficult to lift my arms above my head (dancing, clapping even). Overall I loved it and would rent again.

Loved this dress! It fit well without hugging my curves too much and was a great length. Hubby thought I looked sexy and I felt very classy. Wore it on a dress up date and to the theater. Found myself wishing I had the perfect bracelet to wear with it, though!
Fit nicely, love the color & style! Fits true to size

Loved this dress. It wasn't snug on the arms. I was about 7 weeks pregnant with twins so I did have to go up a size. I wore this to a fundraising event and got a ton of complements. You can accessorize with either gold or silver!

links_reviews_title: Classy and perfect for the occasion
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for the occasion. The dress fit perfectly and I got tons of compliments that night. It runs true to size, I normally wear a 12 in a fitted dress like this and it fit like a glove. This was my first experience with RTR and I will definitely rent with them again.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress you can wear all day!
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress. I wore it all day Christmas Eve to work and then to my family's house. It never was uncomfortable or wrinkled! Size 2 is my normal size and it fit great! Not too tight, not too loose.
2 is usually my smaller size, but I ended up wearing the 0. Bummer that there aren't pockets like my other favorites.

Loved this dress! Very comfortable even though it’s not stretchy. It’s true to size, maybe a tiny bit large, I wore the 4 but could’ve worn the 2, it was just a little too tight for the event I attended. Gorgeous color, pretty lace. It’s classic, elegant and feminine. I would buy this dress.

I'm a pretty solid 4. Sometimes a 6. Never a 2. This 4 is large everywhere: shoulders, bust, waist, hips. It's just big. HOWEVER, it is beautiful. It's surprisingly comfortable for a lace dress. It's longish, but I'm shortish. I think it's perfect for the holidays or Valentine's day. I'll try the smaller size.

I rented this dress for a formal family portrait session. It was perfect. I wanted a deep red color and this did not disappoint. I liked the knee length (not above the knee, truly at the knee). I found it very flattering and got many compliments and was very tempted to buy it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a holiday office party!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a holiday office party at a fancy restaurant, and would definitely get it again. The fit was spot on, and it was the right balance of fun while still being work appropriate. The color was festive without screaming Merry Christmas, and the price was great. I'd definitely rent this or another Draper James dress in the future.
It fit perfectly and was just so pretty. The material is great and the style is timeless!

links_reviews_title: This is a gorgeous, well constructed dress. I wore it to a company holiday party.
links_reviews_text: The 4 fit perfectly. I'm usually a 6, but I always look up the brand's dress chart online and the 4 should fit me based on that size guide. There's no stretch to it. It wasn't too tight even sitting down, very comfortable. My measurements bust: 34", waist: 27", hips: 38".

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, easy to wear, and perfect fit!
links_reviews_text: Fit my figure perfectly, and was very comfortable. I'm relatively tall, and it hit just below the knee. Elegant, but required high heels.

Forgot to take a picture I was having so much fun! Its a beautiful dress on, I was so comfortable in it and it was perfect for my company Christmas party! Elegant on and I normally wear a size 4 and this one fit me perfectly with a little wiggle room!

links_reviews_title: Broadway opening and after party. It was perfect.
links_reviews_text: I hate shopping for events like this and this was really a great way to go. I picked up the dress and tried it on at the store, which was great because there was an issue with the zipper and we worked through it. I had the red jacket that happened to match perfectly. So the leather and lace was a hit. Like with any dress like this, it was really important to be wearing a good undergarment foundation.

links_reviews_title: So classy for a formal work event.
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit of this dress. I also really liked the weight, it looks way heavier than it is. Highly recommended from my Mom body to yours.
Very elegant and lovely. The lace was very nicely stitched.

This is my first time renting a dress. What a great idea! The dress came in plenty of time so I could exchange it if necessary. The quality was great! I researched the reviews before selecting this dress so I knew it would be a little longer than I would have liked, but the fit was great and very flattering! I got several compliments. I will definitely use this service again!!
Has some stretch, which helps across the chest-

links_reviews_title: My first RTR experience could not have been easier.
links_reviews_text: Surprised that the 6 fit me so well - I am 5'9", about 148 pounds, slim through top and torso and usually wear an 8 or 10. Nice that there's a bit of stretch. I wore a nude-colored bra and you barely noticed the straps; black, red or pink might be a good option, too.

I went Back and forth between the small and the medium but ended up going with this small as it was for a birthday. If I would've worn this To a different occasion, I likely would have gone with the medium. Itchy in the shoulder area but 1000% worth it. I am almost 5'9" so the dress may fall a little longer on you depending on the height.

True to size. I wore an XS. Iam 5’4 and 110lbs with a 32D chest. The sequins did pull at my hair when trying to get the dress off. The dress was perfect for the party and had several compliments. There is a nice lining inside very soft so you don’t feel any sharp edges from the sequins. I would love to wear this dress to another party!

Beautiful rose gold sequin dress from BCBG. Very flattering to all skin tones. Paired it with nude strappy 5" heels and a coordinating snakeskin print jacket from Scotch and Soda. Warm and stylish for a fancy dinner out with my boyfriend. Compliments from the hostess as she led us to our candlelit table. A wonderful choice for any fancy occasion.
This dress was stunning! And amazingly comfortable!

This dress was actually the dress I ordered as a back up for an office Christmas Party I attended. When I put it on, my mom said it should have been the topic pick! The dress fit like a glove and I felt beautiful in it. It's suppose to be 3/4 sleeve but if you're on the shorter side, like me, it is a full length sleeve. It's also a short dress so that combined with the figure flattering fit will get you compliments all night. If you're not one for attention, DO NOT rent this dress. Definitely wear your Spanx when wearing this dress. I would absolutely recommend it!

links_reviews_title: This was a great dress that popped!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my 35th birthday party. It was beautiful and festive! I definitely stood out from the crowd. The dress was tight and sexy...but not too tight where you cant move or dance. Just don't forget your Spanx! I would definitely wear it again!

This dress was so comfortable and a total hit. Perfect amount of stretch, I got so many compliments, felt amazing, but was totally at ease the entire day. I was the personal attendant and had to be able to run around, this dress made that so simple. I'm 5,8, 135 lbs and I rented a medium. I think a small maybe would have been on, but the medium was perfection. Rent this dress for SURE!!

I wore this to a concert and dinner date at the casino. Both sizes fit I went with the medium. I loved the dress though my hair stick to the sequins a bit and the arm sometimes bunched up a little. Perhaps because I sized up a little to the medium.
I've rented this dress a couple of times. It's beautiful and I love the rose gold color.

I received so many compliments when I wore this dress!! It's super sexy and figure flattering. Only issues were it's super tight to get on with very little flex with all the sequins. Also, the sequins kept getting stuck in my hair, so I'd suggest an updo if you have hair that will hang.

What a dress! I normally wear an XS or a 0 so this dress fits snug! Received compliments throughout the night, and definitely kept me warm on those chilly nights. This dress was worn around October-November in the West coast, but jackets were not needed. Loved it!
Tight and short but very sparkly. There was a bit of stretch but the sequins were scratchy and would catch on other people clothes. Recommend wearing spanx to keep things looking smooth.

I rented this for a symphony experience that was gold themed. It fit snug but the material was thick enough to hold any imperfections in and made me look great. I received a ton of compliments and I will definitely rent again if I need a glitzy, glam dress! It was definitely a dress that turned heads!
