links_reviews_title: I wore this for my bachelorette and absolutely loved it!
links_reviews_text: The design was perfect for the mermaid look I was going for. I wore a medium and it fit perfectly - no spanx needed! It's pretty short, but I felt comfortable with my glitter nude fishnets underneath:) Would definitely recommend for a fun night out!
This dress fit great! Got so many compliments on it!

This dress was golden!! Sequence did not get stuck anywhere and I felt great in it. I'm a size 0-2 on top and can be 6-8 at the hips (yay hourglass), so I always struggle with bodycon dresses. However, because it stretched, the bottom did not feel tight or too high. It was perfect!
I rented this for a birthday weekend in Vegas. I loved it and got so many compliments and good pictures. It's a little short but very comfy and stretchy. 10/10 would rent again!

I'm 5'3 & 150lbs.. I rented the M & L, I went with the size M. The L was just a little too loose on me. I absolutely loved this dress.. super comfortable and got lots of compliments throughout the night!!

I wore this dress 2 weekends in a row in Miami and Vegas. It works really well for large chest and it was perfect length for 5'6. A lot of these dresses feel too long for a party look but this one was perfect.

Such a fun party dress. So comfortable, I was surprised. Glittery and attention grabbing. Only small complaints, you gotta wear your hair up, my hair was snagging on my dress all night and other complaint was it was a tad short for my 5'8 frame. Luckily it was winter time and I paired with tights.
Oh my goodness! This dress is FANTASTIC! I ordered my usual size (XS) and it was nice and snug. Only drawback was that it has no zipper so I had to get help to put it on and take it off ;) LOL

links_reviews_title: Perfect combination of sexy and classy
links_reviews_text: Fits snug, but true to size. Looked absolutely gorgeous in person-pic doesn't do it justice. Had ton of compliments, felt like a million bucks. Great dress!

This dress was perfect for me, and it was a show-stopper for sure. The sleeves made it warm, but my event was in February, so it was comfortable, even indoors. The length and sleeves were perfect. It's true that it is all sequins, but arranged in a pattern that you can see from the picture, but it's less metallic than you might think. Overall I would totally rent again!

links_reviews_title: It makes your body look amazing!
links_reviews_text: I wore it for a Holiday Party and if was perfect for the occasion.
Perfect fit... made me feel like a million dollars! The absolute perfect Christmas party dress. Received so many compliments on it!

Loved this... ran a little hot and I don't usually run hot... but it was after dancing... it was thick to hide bumps... but I also wore spanx. Got so many comments on the sparkliness. I usually wear 10/12 medium but the large was perfect.

This dress is amazing! Just like the other reviews, I received so many compliments! I rented the dress for my husband's bday party and he LOVED it! The fit was great. The medium was a little tight under my arm and slightly too short. I'm 6'0" and weigh 174lbs. The large was perfect. I was comfortable and never had to just the dress throughout the night! 5 stars!!

Wore this for my bachelorette party and loved it! Fit like a glove and I felt amazing in it. The sleeves were a tad short and made it a little hot w/all the dancing, but once we stepped outside into the cold air I was thankful for them. Only con is my curls kept getting caught in the sequins so by the end of the night my hair was super frizzy.

links_reviews_title: This a show stopper!!!!fit like a glove. Sexy but classy.
links_reviews_text: This is beautiful dress!!! I rented it for New Year's Eve. I picked it up from the store. The staff was very professional. The fact that the dress doesn't have a Zipper it was hard to take it off. So I called one of the stylist, two of them came. They were so happy in helping to take the dress off. I received so many compliments, it fit perfectly and hug in the right place. I wore a size small. The x-small was tight in my chest. I am 112 pounds but 32DDD. I do highly recommend it and I would rent it again!!!!!

links_reviews_title: This dress is everything. I was complimented on it all night long at a winter glam themed event.
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly! Hugs your curves l nicely, which is necessary in a dress covered in sequins so you don't look bulky. I'm 5'10" so it was a teeny bit shorter than I normally do for, but not so short it was inappropriate. I felt fabulous, sparkly, glamorous, and amazing all night strutting my stuff in this dress.
This dress was fantastic! So comfortable and got a million compliments all night long. I was nervous with the sequins it might be itchy but I didn't feel a single one. I highly recommend this dress!

I’m 6 months pregnant and I wore this dress for new years eve. I’m 5’2 and weighing 150 pounds. The fabric stretches nicely. The favric is also very festive and it looks great both in person and in pictures. It’s not itchy at all because it has good lining. The sequins can get tangled with other parts of the dress as you put it on and take it off; but that’s just the nature of sequins in general. Overall is angreat dress for a party.
I'm 5'2 133 pounds. It fitted just right. Thick material. I have some belly fat on my mid section opted to wear spanx.

links_reviews_title: I felt awesome in what I was wearing!
links_reviews_text: I loved everything about this dress! It was super comfortable, which I was not expecting with it being a form fitting sequin dress. I was very nervous about this because it was my first time to use rent the runway but I was very pleased with how the dress turned out. I felt like it was flattering and the color looked great in photos and really made the dress a stand out. The reviews helped a lot in my selection.

links_reviews_title: Loved it - it covers your lumps and bumps and holds everything together.
links_reviews_text: I usually order a M and it was true to size. Only thing though, the weather was unusually cold that week so I wore a camisole underneath and you can tell by the photo that it showed. Other than that, I loved its warm long sleeves and that wasn't too short to wear at my office party. I felt very sexy in it.

links_reviews_title: Would definitely rent this dress again!
links_reviews_text: Love this dress! Fits true to size.
Loved the look! Runs small and very form fitting. I barely fit XS. Cute and comfy!!

The dress fit perfectly. The color and shine was beautiful. I didn't have any issue with it riding up and I have a big butt and a lot of height. I didn't try to small on cause the medium was already pretty tight. If you're contemplating this dress, please give it a shot you'll have the best night. The sequins do get caught on each other but I still danced the night away. Sad to send it back.

links_reviews_title: I wore it for a night out in Vegas. People kept stopping me to say they loved my dress.
links_reviews_text: Very comfy. Loved how it made my boobs look!
I wore this on a girls night out. I got tons of complements on the dress. Material stretches and is breathable. I would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Unique Dress that got a lot of compliments
links_reviews_text: This dress is has a really unique structural top with a see-through middle band that is a little hard to see in the photos. I am a size 8 normally and rented a size 44 which was a little tight. I wish I would have gone up a size to be slightly more comfortable in the hips/butt area. I have a very long torso and the length ended up being perfect and hit me just above the knee. Overall I will highly recommend this dress and I may rent it again!

links_reviews_title: The most amazing dress I've ever worn.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me like a glove (with spanx). I received a million compliments. It was so comfortable and the sleeves and belt detail make it the perfect little black dress. I will rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Great fit but long for petites
links_reviews_text: Still wore it because overall fit was nice- ended up tucking the midsection into the dress to shorten it- also midsection shows skin , which is less appropriate for work.

links_reviews_title: Style unique, fits like a glove. Very slimming.
links_reviews_text: Tight around the knees so it's a bit binding but overall great dress for what was needed

The dress fit me perfectly. I went with the 44 as the 42 was really tight. I am normally a 4 or 6 but the 42 was way snug. I'm 5'10 and 135 lbs and had no trouble zipping, walking or moving in this dress. I received a ton of complements on it. I would definitely rent this beauty again. It's sophisticated with a bit of flair with the embroidered waist and flutter sleeve. Really a beautiful, classy dress.
Beautifully made. A classic with modern touches.
This dress looks amazing on you. Great fit, good material.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering! Classy! Came off great in pictures
links_reviews_text: I was really impressed with the fit and how classy this looked. I was a speaker for a women's conference and it was perfect. The only problem (not with the dress) was that my weight was up 4 lbs so my tummy was a bit more prominent in this dress. So if you have a poochy stomach, be aware that this dress doesn't have any wiggle room in that area.
Dress was perfect. I felt elegant and sexy at the same time. It hug my curves and fit in the right areas. My only issue is that it's a little tight from the bottom forcing me to give small steps.
Work this for the Versace event in Milan. So chic!

links_reviews_title: This dress is amazing as long as you can zip it up.
links_reviews_text: Good fit. Slimming effect

This dress fits true to size. It's rather close-fitting in the lower section, so size up if you are not comfortable with it. It accentuates the hour-glass figure. The top is amazing, the fabric is great, and the belt adds a touch of skin if you want to, but can simply be covered with a black under-shirt or a belt. The color is true black. The skirt doesn't have too much stretch and there is no slit in the back so size up if you want be able to take longer stride. I had to unzip it and then zipped it back up at every restroom stop. Overall, this dress looks great and I will definitely rent it again.
Rich fabric, cutout at stomach is subtle and elegant. Wore to a play and political event and was perfect for everything. One of my favs!

This dress was a backup for another dress I ordered that wasn't available. The fit was good but the middle piece is actually a cut out - so if you're wearing it for work you need a cami or a high waisted undergarment underneath. I didn't realize that when I ordered it.

Rented this for work. Great dress - really accentuates an hour glass figure. I put a wide waist belt with it because of the holes and I wanted to wear it to work. The skirt doesn't have too much stretch in it. Will def wear again

This dress fit great! One thing to point out, the "belt" area is actually woven thread and I needed to wear a black cami underneath to make this "work appropriate."I loved the feel and I felt powerful wearing this dress. It went great with the Tory Burch tortoise shell cuff.

It's a little more interesting than your average sheath. The sleeves are open and didn't cover my arms. The cutouts in the middle add a little flair. The top has folds folds, but on me it didn't sit that way. Overall, despite these things, it is a very nice and interesting dress.
Very elegant dress, a little too revealing to my liking in the waist area, but a belt can easily fix it!

This fit a little big but I sized up so my normal would have actually been fine. The middle of the dress is see through (in the pics with the model, it looks like a tan colored belt but that's the dress and her skin showing through). It would have been inappropriate for me to wear to this specific occasion like that so I just wore a black long-fitted tank underneath.
I love how the dress hugged my curves and had cut outs on the arms. What I didn't expect were cut outs on the waist. Beware because it wasn't work appropriate for me.

This dress is comfy and sooo flattering. It's super sexy, yet full coverage. Really interesting detail in the top with folds and cut open shoulders. No spanx required or special undergarments. Great for hourglass!
I'm keeping this one! It is so flattering, unique and versatile
Worn with cowboy boots to a "Western Chic" gala--received many compliments. The waistline embroidery is pretty. Very small fit--I ordered the 40 and then went up to the 42 to ensure it looked classy.
This fell under "recommended size", but i couldnt zip it up the back and couldnt wear. loved the dress and will try it again.
Beautiful dress! I usually wear 48 -50 but need 52 in this one. Waist is sheer with skin tone showing through. photo looks like it could be a belt. Love it and will rent again
This dress is gorgeous. It is a bit uncomfortable in the neck area, towards the end of the day it pulls back, but I was willing to forgo the pain, it is so sophisticated
Overall, I loved this dress, but the lining at the neck pops out and does not lay flat or straight.
I loved this dress but couldn’t wear it and should have sized up. Definitely keeping in mind for a future rental!

LOVED this dress. I rented several to try (through Unlimited) for a fancy dinner date, and this was the clear winner. Conservative length and neckline are nicely balanced by flirty waistband and playful sleeves.

links_reviews_title: I wish I took a picture! This dress is amazing!
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing - rent it! It's so fierce and slimming. I ended up wearing the black tank underneath like others did bc of the meshing but honestly I could have gone without it. It's not obvious that it's your skin - it could be a nude fabric underneath. I almost bought it even though it's crazy expensive bc I loved it so much. One note - the skirt got a little wrinkled after sitting in it at a breakfast. But still a great dress!

Loved the material and cut of this dress. It was so well designed and extremely flattering. Hard giving this one back! I wore a black slip dress under so it didn't show my midriff as I wore it for work!

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress runs small. The sleeves are beautiful but the waist is sheer and was not appropriate for my event.
Beautiful top, too narrow bottom for my hourglass frame.
It runs small and I am a size 4 and it wouldn't zip up not because it didn't fit. The zipper was too tight

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous but a bit snug so didn’t wear. A larger size would have made it great.
links_reviews_text: Snug in hips.
Beautiful dress, I wore it with a black shaper underneath as it was for work and I didn't want to show skin. Very fitted in the tummy area with classic style .
Was a lovely dress but just too small all over, could get into it but then breathing would of been a problem
Too tight in the hips and bust area.
I loved the cut of this dress but couldn't wear it because the bottom was just too small.
Ran small. Pretty dress. Never wore
Great quality dress. Was difficult to dance my bra would pop out of the top or cutout. Very pretty color.
Fit great, comfortable a lot of compliments! Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Everyone couldn't believe I rented this beautiful dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! The only thing is that it was a little baggy on the lower back. But I absolutely loved the dress and had lots of compliments and was super comfy!
I got so many compliments on this dress. It fit so well and although it was a bit longer than I anticipated it looked perfect once I slipped on heels.

The fit was a little awkward and baggy in the middle. My strapless bra kept popping out the center cutout as well. Other than that, it was a great material, color was gorgeous, great length, and got several compliments.
I wore this to an October wedding and I am scared for knee length because I'm 5"2 and often they could be too long. This was perfect length for me. So comfortable very flattering. Was a huge hit!
Dress was so flattering. Was a thicker material. A beautiful maroon color. The straps are adjustable. The slit is an appropriate height. Lovedddd this dress.
This dress was absolutely stunning!!! Soooo slimming, gorgeous color, so many compliments! It's a great mix of sexy and sophisticated
Absolutely loved this dress! It was very comfortable and beautiful! Fit very nicely!
I usually wore a M but found this to be a little snug in my hip/butt area and was glad to have the back up size which fit better

links_reviews_title: Sturdy stretchy material but the hem on the slip needs mending.
links_reviews_text: Great dress that hid less than perfect torso beautifully. Sturdy stretchy material hugged the right places with just enough give to eat and dance. Didn't need a bra (36B) which is always a plus. My only issue was the hem on the slip was loose so had to use double sided tape to hold it in place.
Went to a #wedding and it was the perf color and fit. Very appropriate for a wedding

I wore this dress to a wedding and received so many compliments! I typically wear a 4/6 and the small was perfect. I loved that this dress was very fitted but also stretchy enough to be extremely comfortable. The cut of the top was very flattering for my smaller chest. I loved the cut out at the bust and the slit on the skirt. I wish I owned this dress!

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to a summer wedding; received lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove. I'm 5'3" so the dress hit below the knee, keeping it classy for the event and I never felt like it was too long. I was worried it might be tight to sit in for long periods of time but I never felt uncomfortable. I got a lot of compliments, more than I expected because the dress just hugged every curve. I have a small bust and thicker bottom half and this dress fit perfectly. 10/10 would rent this dress again!

Beautiful deep purple color in person. Great quality fabric. The cutout is perfect - doesn't reveal your sticky bra or underboob cleavage. I also liked that the slit added a bit of sex appeal without being over the top. I got a ton of compliments on this dress too!

Definitely loved this dress and got tons of compliments all night long. Fit great, with plenty of room to move around and dance all night. The only issue I had was that it kept riding up causing me to keep having to fix it. Other than that I loved it!

links_reviews_title: Nice but fit a little weird
links_reviews_text: I ordered a small and it was still a bit big in the back, I couldn't adjust the straps either. I have a large bust and it fit well with no need for underwear. Overall I liked it!
The fit was great! It looked great and felt great. It did ride up a little throughout the night, but it was long enough to not be an issue

links_reviews_title: The dress was comfy and I love the cutout and color!
links_reviews_text: I got a medium and found it a little roomy in certain places (such as my bust). It was comfortable and could be dressed up or a tad down.
Received so many compliments on this dress. The material was great quality and the color was beautiful. I would highly recommend.

Surprisingly comfortable for a snug fitting dress. Solid thicker material and not very stretchy, which was a plus in the tummy area because it wasn’t “hugging” my curves, therefore more forgiving as I ate throughout the night! Bust area and straps felt secure - I was not worried about slippage. Beware the side slit is a bit high. I’m only 5’4 and when sitting down, I felt like I was showing a little too much thigh.

links_reviews_title: Gives impression that you are 20lbs lighter!!!
links_reviews_text: At first I was worried the small wasn't going to fit but it looked amazing. The fabric held everything in place, I did not wear a bra for my DD's. I felt sexy and classy throughout the night. My sister told me that the dress looked like I am 20lbs lighter.
Classy dress that fit nicely. I'm 5'6 32DDD 128 pounds and this dress for like a glove. Received many compliments. It was comfortable too!

links_reviews_title: I felt so confident in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Amazing dress for a wedding. Received so many compliments. The dress was incredibly flattering although a little snug in the stomach area. Highly recommend some form of spanx.

I am 5'3" and ordered a small and a medium. I am typically a medium but some dresses vary in size. The medium was comfortable and I had enough room to dance the night away. It was a little big in the chest area by feel but when you looked at the dress you couldn't tell. This dress was so beautiful and I did not want to return it! You won't regret this dress it's amazing!
I loved everything about this dress! I got SO many compliments all night long. I'm usually between a 6-8 and I wore a medium. Super comfortable and I didn't seven need to wear a bra with it.
Very form fitting, great heavy material, decent stretch. Medium was perfect, would be great for larger busts.
I loved this dress, it fit so well! The cut out and slit made it feel sexy but the length kept it classy and appropriate. I felt so comfortable all night long!

links_reviews_title: Fun, classy, form fitting but not too tight
links_reviews_text: Great fit overall! It’s long enough to be classy but also shows enough skin to make it fun. Even though I’m top heavy, the top fit well and provided enough coverage. Loved it!

Read a lot of reviews that the material was stretchy so to get a size smaller. I usually am a medium but ordered a small and it fit perfectly!!! I loved the dress! Felt like it accentuated my curves. Would highly recommend this dress for any formal occasion.

I ordered a small and a medium just incase. Medium felt baggy and small fit perfect. I was worried about the chest area overflowing because it recommends for smaller cup sizes but it was fine. Had stretch so I wasn't uncomfortable. Would definitely wear again.

Perfect for late 20's - classy yet the slit & tight fit keep it young and trendy. I felt great in this and it was comfortable all night. I was able to wear a strapless bra but you'll need one that's thin in the front to keep it from peeking out the slit. I'm a straight smedium & never know which one to get (especially to avoid anything hugging too much on the muffin top) but the small fit perfectly and the thick fabric actually smoothed me out instead of drawing negative attention. Do it!

Thankfully I have larger breast (implants) because I think that's why I loved this, it showed a nice amount of cleavage but not a scandalous amount! I'm right between small and medium, I didn't even try on the medium because the small fit so perfectly. I have small hips and butt but not a very small waist. I wore the sticky bra that gives you cleavage I call it the chicken cutlet bra. I wore spanx that had a short and it worked so well!

I'm 5'1 athletic build with larger than average boobs for my size and this dress fit perfectly and made me feel great all night. The cut out and slit give it an added touch of sexiness without being too much. Stretch material makes it comfy to dance in all night, and length was great for a spring wedding. Only complaint is the adjustable straps made the dress seem a bit cheap and the thick fabric made is so I COULDNT adjust them so they were uneven all night. The cutout means no bra, but good quality thick fabric so it was totally fine.

links_reviews_title: Comfy, true to size and sexy!
links_reviews_text: Great quality material that hugged me perfectly in all the right spots! Color was gorgeous and it was comfortable to dance in.. received so many compliments and was a show stopper. I also requested that the dress be delivered a day in advance, and within minutes I had a response from RTR and they were able to accommodate my request.. outstanding customer service!
Loved the design and got a lot of compliments! It was more purple than maroon & the fabric is pretty thick. It was a little different than what I expected from the pictures but still loved the dress!

I was a little nervous renting from this website for my junior prom night, but I was pleasantly surprised with the service. As a first time customer, this was actually my free second dress option which I was grateful for because my first option was too large. While the fit was perfect, it did have a tendency to ride up a bit which ultimately wasn't a big deal considering its length. The dress was very comfortable for a long night of dancing and fortunately had adjustable straps.

links_reviews_title: I got many compliments in this beautiful dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress is very stretchy and forgiving. The fabric is thick and was nice for a chilly evening in April. The cups gave me enough support while not being a real bra, and I was happy the straps were adjustable. This fit me very nicely, despite being a tiny bit pouchy above my butt in the back. I felt very confident and sexy in this dress.
I ended up not wearing this one for my event but it was beautiful and will likely rent for something else. It was a little big even for the XS but not by much!

links_reviews_title: It's baggy and wrinkly and one of the straps was on backwards
links_reviews_text: Unless you have huge perky boobs (that won't fall out the keyhole) this is not the dress for you.

Great fit. Waistline sat higher than anticipated but wasn't terrible. Skirt was flowy and provided a nice twirl affect while dancing. Dress can easily be styled/pair to be more or less fancy as you want. Another great pick!

The dress fit very well. I could wear a normal bra. It was playful and fun but didn't feel inappropriate for a work party. It was nice for the winter as well and paired well with dark tights. I got a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Super fun and easy to dance in. I wore this to a work party.
links_reviews_text: #perfectlbt
Beautiful dress. Comfortable to wear. Sizing ran small so I was glad to have sized up my backup size. Only con is I wish the detail in the fabric showed up better in pictures.

links_reviews_title: I loved twirling in this dress!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great! It was so comfortable and flattering!! So fun to dance in!

I rented this dress for a wedding. It fit perfectly. I loved the flare at the bottom. The dress was classy and fit the venue well. I was comfortable--didn't find myself pulling at the dress at all. Danced all night and got lots of compliments. I'd rent it again!
True to size. Fun dress
Bust area was a little snug. I am a 34D and wore the size 4. Otherwise, it was super cute!
Very fitted in the bust. Love this fit and flare cut! Perfect classic dress with just the right bit of edge

I wore this like a year ago and I'm just reviewing it now lol. I got a size 2 and 4, I think I wore the 2. I had no issues with it, I was able to dance like crazy in it and raise the roof. I believe it was a little tight in the back but what dress isn't. Great first time RTR rental and I came back to rent almost exactly a year later this time with 2 weddings within weeks of each other. Happy Wedding Season!

Loved, loved, loved this dress! I got so many compliments on it and it fit great. It was nice and snug through the chest and flared out just above the belly button. It was perfect for me because I run slim through my chest and carry more of my weight in my mid and butt area. I really don't get dressed up often and felt so pretty in this. Just be aware of wind or you'll end up with a few Marilyn Monroe moments. :)

links_reviews_title: LBD with some sass! Went to a gno event, got many compliments, I felt totally girly in this lbd!
links_reviews_text: fit true to size, would have loved some pockets! The polka dots made this simple lbd, a fun piece and one of my favorite rentals this go round!

links_reviews_title: Flattering but chaffed at the arms
links_reviews_text: The cut of this dress was very flattering the waist, puffs out a lot at the hips. The dress was comfortable except for it rubs a little in the armpits so at the end of the night I was Red there. I am very small busted and it was fitted on me. I would say larger chested women should size up.
Absolutely loved this dress! Fit true to size and was extremely comfortable!

Wore for a formal work function in April. I was nervous it would be too "holiday" for spring, but it worked great as a staple LBD; lots of compliments and the fabric holds together well (not much stretch to it, so aim for your true size). The 10 was just a hair more snug than I intended, but the 12 I think would have been too loose. Being shorter at 5'3" I was concerned about the skirt length. It. Was. Perfect!! Right above the knee (perfect length for an evening work function) and just enough volume without being "poofy". I DO wish it had pockets though... I paired with black open toe heels like the model pic, Art Deco-esque drop earnings, and a bright red matte lip. Would rent again in a heart beat.
This dress fit perfect! I was able to wear a regular bra which is always helpful. It was a perfect length and hid my belly. I'd absolutely rent this one again.
Another great pick with RTR! Dress is true to size, can be worn with or without a bra. Super comfortable! Super cute! Super fun dress! Wish it would have had pockets!

Wore this dress to a nice dinner in New Orleans during Mardi Gras. Also wandered around the French Quarter. Very comfortable and flattering. The arm holes felt a little tight, but nothing that bothered me too much. It's a very good dress if you want your waist to look small!

links_reviews_title: I felt beautiful in this dress!
links_reviews_text: The fit was absolutely perfect for my body type. I wore a poofy petticoat to give it a 50's look. The dress fit me in all the perfect spots and hid my problem areas (tummy). Dress was also very stretchy and easy to move around in.

links_reviews_title: A fun twist on a LBD
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress. It was so fun, but appropriate for a benefit dinner. The slightly shiny polka dots elevated this from a normal little black dress. I am top heavy and the top on the 8 was a bit tight, so probably could have gone with a 10 for more comfort there, but other than that fit great. (I usually wear anything from a 6 to a 10, mostly based on room through the top). Skirt does flare quite a bit, but I thought the proportions were flattering.

links_reviews_title: I absolutely love this dress. I felt so fabulous & chic!
links_reviews_text: I'm so glad that there was a backup size. I ordered a 12 and ended up needing the 14 because this dress is quite snug across the chest. For ladies with an ample bosom like myself, it is a good idea to size up in this one. The narrow band at the natural waist & flare of the skirt make this dress very flattering and excellently camouflage any belly. It was also very comfortable, the fabric is quite thick, so it probably would not work for the summer, but was perfect for this cold snap! I will definitely rent this one again!
Was tight in the chest, but not too tight that it was uncomfortable! The polka dots were a cool detail. I would rent again!

Loved this dress. The skirt was very flouncy (?) and flared out more than it looks in pictures. The pattern had a subtle sparkle. Length hit me right at the knees and I'm only 5'2 so I imagine it is a cute mini on someone taller. The only drawback was the cap sleeves had no stretch so they dug in a little playing games at an arcade

links_reviews_title: Fun version of a classic black dress
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to my company's holiday party. It was a fun take on a classic LBD with the dots and the slightly poofy skirt. It was a little tight up top, so I wore the size up from my normal. Overall, I wish I owned this dress because I want to wear it again!
Super fun, flirty and flattering dress. I normally wear a 0 or 2 and wore a 2 in this. It was maybe a tad big but not noticeable to anyone else.
Was a little tight in the chest but the next size up would have been too big in the waist. Looked great though and got tons of compliments all night!
Loved everything about the dress !!! My husband loved it on me too !

links_reviews_title: Perfect style for a 60s themed holiday work party.
links_reviews_text: Good length, even for a short person. Fun to twirl in.

This backup dress was the winner for me! I chose another dress as my primary because I wasn't sure how I would like the full skirt but it was so cute! It fit well but size up if you have extra weight like me in your mid section. I would have been more comfortable sitting in a 6.

links_reviews_title: I loved dancing in this dress. It was breathable and complimentary!
links_reviews_text: The 2 fit my top half perfectly but wasn't very fitting to my waist. After I added the belt this dress was unstoppable! I felt beautiful and received many compliments!
Same as other reviews, very tight in chest area. I didn't have to wear bra but I'm only a b cup. I would suggest going up a size for larger chests. Fun for dancing with the full skirt.

links_reviews_title: Got many compliments, would rent again!
links_reviews_text: Loved the full skirt and no need for special undergarments. Fabric isn’t stretchy but fit was comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Celebrated the top women in my industry!
links_reviews_text: Bust was a bit tight on me. But I LOVED the full skirt. Great fun dress for a formal event.

links_reviews_title: Super fun to dance in with the skirt. Awesome dress!
links_reviews_text: This was a bit tight up top for me, but let me not wear a bra (34DD). Got a ton of compliments and fun to dance in with the skirt.

Ordered this dress for my daughter's homecoming dance. She got compliments from everyone - her date, the parents, teachers, and other young ladies. Hepburnish with a modern twist. High quality dress with just the right amount of flirty fun. Thank you, RTR!

This dress is perfect for any cocktail party... the perfect little black dress! It is conservative, but still extremely flattering. The dress goes in at the perfect point on the waist and the flare of the bottom makes your legs look great! It was comfortable all night long and looked great with a pair of black heels.
The fit is TTS. And has a great full skirt for a fun spin! The fabric is great quality and the fit was flattering in the arms and waist.

links_reviews_title: This was a 60th Birthday party for my dad! the dress was a hit!
links_reviews_text: Dress runs big. I got a 4 and a 2 the 2 fit good the 4 was big on me. Nice A Line Flair if you like that cut.
This dress was really cute and easy to wear. I'm a 34DD and it was a little tight in the bust, but I think a bigger size would have been too big.

links_reviews_title: This dress was for a black tie optional, summer wedding at a winery & it was perfectly elegant.
links_reviews_text: I received A TON of compliments in this dress. It is fitted in the chest and upper waist with an appropriate flair on the hip. The material was very structured, however, so the dress kept it’s shape throughout the night. I paired with a simple bracelet and stud earrings, as well as a simple black ankle strap heel. If you are a slender hipped gal like myself, but want to keep some elegant modesty, this dress is perfect. It gives room to flaunt your legs, but the high neck and full skirt will make every classic movie lover “ooh” and “ahh.” I’m very happy I went with this choice. Comfortable, chic and fit amazing. Best of all: no bra drama necessary!

This dress did not work for the conservative charity ball that I was attending. I think overall it's a nice dress but didn't fit me right. There are no buttons or zippers it's all stretchy. And so I found it pretty tight/fitted in the stomach and hips but seemed stretched out in the shoulders and bust so wasn't as flattering in those areas. I wonder if it wasn't stretched out if I would've liked it for a less conservative function.
This dress is a great color and true to size. While low cut, it could still be worn with a standard bra.

links_reviews_title: LOVE this dress. Sexy, head-turning, comfortable!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me like a glove --I'm curvy. I wore this to my company holiday party and was unofficially voted best-dressed. I loved wearing it SO much!
Fit perfectly. The length was perfect for me being tall. So many compliments and it was very comfortable.
It didn't make the cut but it was really pretty. I ordered the M (I wear between a 6&8). The medium was fitted but not stretched. If I had a larger bust, sizing up would be better.

links_reviews_title: Was my back up dress but fit was nice
links_reviews_text: Was a perfectly nice, versatile dress for evening occasions. I rented this and another for a wedding, and ended up wearing the other because it had a little more personality. It's a well fitting snug dress with give, but just not that memorable. Bottom half near my legs was a little loose.

I love this dress, it fit perfectly. I did wear spanx to make everything smooth and a regular bra but secured with dressing tape on my bra so I wouldn't have to worry about my bra peeking out. I received many compliments and appreciate the second size from rtr for total piece of mind! This was my first rental from rtr and look forward to the next time I can look to them dress me up!
Definitely snug fitting, even the large was tight. I'm 5'11" 165 lbs. I got a lot of complements! Neckline is super low though

links_reviews_title: I did not end up wearing this dress.
links_reviews_text: This was my backup, backup dress. It's a super cute dress but not flattering on me as my stomach is not flat. This dress is very form fitting and not for everyone. I ended up not wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fit! I love the way I looked in it !
links_reviews_text: Even though the dress looked beautiful , the fabric was fading and some of the lace was becoming undone in certain areas.

Perfect for fall wedding. I selected the Small and Medium. Both were snug, but I decided to go with the small because the medium's shoulders were loose. Wore a regular bra (with a little push up) and some shorts spanx which made a subtle but smooth finish. Easy to move in, appropriate around family, but also made me feel beautiful and sexy.

links_reviews_title: Lady in red! Perfect dress for fall wedding.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress! Form fitting and potential to lose a boob while dancing but dress quality and style was perfect for fall wedding! Elegant yet sexy. Slit on back of dress was nice touch.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it Out of the house
links_reviews_text: Cut very low
Wasn’t able to wear. Too tight, and too low for my chest. It stretches, which was nice, but the fit was uncomfortably tight. (I’m 5,7 160#, hips).

Rented this for a red-themed Christmas party, nice stretch in fabric and flattering fit. The color is perfect, bright and festive (not orangy) I wore the ruffle sleeves under my arms, I'm not a 'cold shoulder' person and it worked perfect. Definitely needed help zipping and unzipping to use the ladies.... bring a friend!!

This is was my outfit from RTR and I was very pleased with how well the romper fit. I do have on spanx under to smooth everything out (lol) but I glad I chose the XLG over XXLG since it fit just right.
Loved this outfit for a work Xmas party felt sexy but sophisticated , plenty of stretch and comfort for my pregnant belly, highly recommend
I wanted to find something formal, yet comfortable for my cousin's wedding. It was a hit. Not only did I receive compliments, but I also was able to drop it low all night long.

This is a great option if you have an event where you don't want to be overdressed but are unsure of how casual it is. Wore it to a rehearsal dinner/welcome party with cocktail casual attire and this fit the bill. Also lucky to find a jumpsuit that fits a petite frame. Would rent again.
Gave me a little bit of a wedgie (5'4" with long torso) but loved the coverage over arms and overall fit!
Loved wearing this! Super comfy and flattering! Would rent again!
I loved everything about this jumpsuit. The fabric is nice quality but not too heavy for a Mexico wedding. I was comfortable in this all night, and received so many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a fashion event and even the designer complimented me
links_reviews_text: Wanted to keep it fit like a glove. Bright orangy red. Soooo flattering and comfortable yet stylish

links_reviews_title: Power jumpsuit in a kick ass color.
links_reviews_text: I loved this jumpsuit so much. It fit so well that was I kind of shocked. The arm drappings are kinda odd but once you figure it out it can be really cute. I loved having the pockets of course. I highly recommend wearing this for a ego boost.
The S was too large so I ended up wearing the XS and fit like a glove. Thick material makes you feel very comfortable wearing something so form fitting. Great color and shape.

links_reviews_title: Love the color! Great for a formal affair.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a Sorority gala. I wanted something formal but not too formal in my own Sorority colors and this was a great find. Super comfortable too!
Super comfortable, statement piece!

The fit was perfect on a petite body. My only issue was that it does accentuate the lower belly pooch if you have one. The shade of red is very vibrant and perfect for summer. I needed help zipping it up, but aside from that it's very comfortable once it's on.
Loved this jumpsuit! So many compliments.

I originally ordered the small, which was the right tightness, but the torso area was wayyy too short and it gave me a wedgie, so I had to get the medium which meant it wasn't as tight around the mid section but it was a much better length in the torso. If you are taller than 5'5", you probably need the medium for this reason. That being said, the medium worked fine, and I got tons of compliments. This is definitely a piece that sticks out in the crowd. The material is thick, and the fine quality makes it an option for formal events.

I'm 20 weeks pregnant and I wanted something still sexy for my 30th birthday. This jumpsuit was IT. The color, the comfort level, the room for my belly. Not pregnant, I would have worn a medium. Material is heavier than you would anticipate, but super stylish nonetheless.

This is my most favorite piece I've ever rented from RTR. It is so well made-- the fabric is thick, falls nicely on the body, and the entire jumpsuit is lined. It's incredibly flattering; I have a long torso and short legs but the waist hem sat at just the right place on me and the length was fine (the slits on the outside of the pant legs are a fun touch!). The color is a beautiful tomato-red, a touch on the orange side. You do have to wear a strapless bra. My only two critiques: (1) it was a bit of a challenge to go to the bathroom because of the hook and zipper so it's better to have someone with you (but that's what you get yourself into wearing any jumpsuit) and (2) the straps that cross in front of the neck lay a bit funky, one of them folded over on itself as I wore it (I tried to steam it out with no luck). But overall this is a fantastic and unique look for any formal occasion!

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit was perfect for a wedding
links_reviews_text: Jumpsuit was perfect! I received so many compliments! I always tend to order a size up in jumpsuits since I have longer legs.
I am curvy and this was a flattering fit. I received compliments all night! High quality material as well
It was so fun and comfortable. I wore it to a gala and was definitely stood out.
This was a perfect rental. Fabric is thicker but not too thick. Has pockets. Not short waisted like many jumpsuits. Love this both for dressy and more casual events.
I absolutely loved the fit of this jumpsuit. Perfect for someone with curves. Inside is lined which makes it super comfortable. Can't wait to rest this again.

I loved this - interesting style, fit great, had pockets, and THAT COLOR!!! I wore it to the rehearsal dinner for my wedding and it was a show stopper. Material is quite thick - I also took it on my honeymoon to Miami an almost didn't wear it because it was too hot. Took up a lot of space in my suitcase.

The formal dress I had ordered for a black tie beach wedding sadly didn't make it to me on time. Luckily, I had this beauty on backup from my monthly Update options. I've never worn a jumpsuit before, but this one has made me a believer! It was comfortable (form fitting but not too tight), looked formal enough for the occasion, had pockets, and had fun, flowy side slits in the pant legs. It was perfect to dance in! I'm also not usually a red person (see: sunburn), but I actually loved the color. I got so many compliments-- even from the bride! The only downside was needing some help unzipping/ re-zipping for the restroom. I LOVED this jumpsuit and would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: For like a glove! Flattering and a winner!
links_reviews_text: I took a shot on this jumpsuit having four reviews and one picture! I am usually a 6 on rent the runway with athletic shape! I ordered the small and medium! The small was perfect with great stretch material thick material and extremely flattering! I wore a strapless bra and I highly suggest this underestimated piece! I wish I could buy it!
Wore this for my bachelorette party! It was a little big but felt comfortable. I enjoyed wearing it out and would rent again.
Super comfortable! Super cute! And definitely a cute summer jumpsuit. You need to have this in your wardrobe ASAP!!!
Fit super well. Really comfortable even though it is dressy. Slits in the legs that show off a little more skin, too.

This is the sisterhood of traveling pants jumpsuit. It looks good on everyone. I liked it so much I've rented it twice (for different groups of people- it's striking and not easily forgettable.) I got so many compliments from friends and strangers both times I wore it. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Would have loved this if it fit!
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit runs very small - definitely size up! I would have loved it if it fit!
Fir was great. Something to consider is that it is a jumpsuit with a zipper on the back so that makes for a somewhat challenging trip to the bathroom. Overall stylish, eye-catching, and super comfy.

links_reviews_title: Festive for a Christmas party in Florida.
links_reviews_text: Ever so slightly sort waisted, but the fabric is thick and stretchy and the fit is pretty forgiving.
I got so so many compliments at our work Christmas party. I have curvier hips and thick thighs and it fit me like a glove! The pockets are great and the slits on the side are a fun detail!

I rented this jumpsuit for a second time since I didn't wear it the first time. I wore it for my birthday dinner and it was so comfortable! Pockets are always a plus, and the neckline makes it pretty unique. Fit is perfect, I wore a small which is my usual size.

I am usually a size small. From reading the reviews, decided to go with an XS. I am taller--- 5'6, so the jumpsuit seemed to ride up in places it shouldn't have. Didn't end up wearing because it was too small but will definitely order again in a larger size. The bright red is a show stopping color!!!
This is classic and classy. Great fit. Doesn't wrinkle. Current. I wore it for both vacation and a party once I returned.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color on my skin and made me feel very confident.
links_reviews_text: Love the amount of room in pockets. Fabric and lining glides across your body effortlessly and hides issues you may not appreciate. Love wearing this jumper!

links_reviews_title: The 2nd option that became the 1st option.
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments and I felt so beautiful and most importantly so comfortable. This jumpsuit was the perfect showstopper and came in clutch when my first option didn’t work out.
This is is so sassy, comfortable and FUN! I wore this for a wedding. I am a standard size 6 and I rented MR.
Such a cute and unique dress. Wore for a wedding and got tons of complements. It's classy and not obnoxious with the cutout in the middle. Would rent again!
Got lots on compliments on the dress. The fabric was itchy and the lining didn't sit well. Worked for one night out.

good fit, but the fabric of the skirt edge is a bit itchy on my legs when I put my coat on. wear a jacket on top for work, and went to the party without the jacket. so it's good for from desk to party.

This dress was a back up. I read the reviews and knew the 6 may not fit but the 8 wasn't available. Sadly, I was right. I couldn't get the zipper up around my chest/rib cage. I felt amazing in the dress and comfortable which is always a plus for me. The color is a rich red with subtle sparkle with some sequins sewed in. I think a regular nude bra would work fine but there is a pad sewn in, so it may not be necessary. I WILL be renting the 8 for my next engagement.

I rented this for a work holiday party and it was a hit! Perfect festive dress!! I'm usually a 2 in most brands and the 2 fit perfectly. The only downside: the exposed buttons on the butt that hide the zipper. I almost thought I would til the lace because it's so delicate.

Wore this dress to a cocktails holiday party, and it was perfect! I opted for one size up just to be sure it would fit, so it was a little loose, but I prefer that! Got lots of compliments and it's a total win.

This was my backup dress which I did not end up wearing. I am usually a 10/12 depending on how short the dress is. I am 5'10" and the 14 was very short in the back but pretty loose otherwise. I would have been able to wear it but probably would have been self conscious all night. I didn't love the nude section in the middle and the fit just didn't work for me.
AMAZING holiday dress!! Couldn't wait to wear this after I received it. My boyfriend begged me to buy this one. Marchese always represents some of the most beautiful pieces available on RTR.

links_reviews_title: So perfect. So comfortable. So loved.

links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for the holiday & it's perfect for the occasion. Probably should wear a better strapless bra because my boobs look saggy. Otherwise, the fabric is comfortable & the length is perfect for me (5'3"). It fits perfectly on me even for my thick waist. Would love to own one of her dresses one day.
This dress fit my hourglass figure perfectly. I got many compliments and would definitely rent this dress again!

Fit me perfectly! I could see where if you were a bit bustier the top would be more snug fitting. But otherwise, super easy to wear, very comfortable. Color was just stunning. Definitely would recommend!
Gorgeous dress. Lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Fit my curves perfectly - but a little challenging to get in by yourself
links_reviews_text: I rented this for an award show/dinner and it was perfect. Small red sequins throughout was the right amount of glam. I was worried the middle section would look weird, but I ended up liking it. Only tough part was getting this on myself - there are 3 snaps on the lower back. Other than that, loved it and got tons of compliments!
Got compliments all night on my dress. Very pretty color red, flattering cut & haavy weight lace.

links_reviews_title: Cute but very true to size!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress as part of my Unlimited and after reading reviews, decided to size up as I as not getting two sizes. I wish I had gone with an 8 (or even a 6). This dress was very true to size, if not a little large I thought. Because it was a big on me, I still wore it but wasn't the most comfortable. It kept shifting around during the night. That being said, the details of this dress are amazing and it is very beautiful.

Absolutely loved this dressed. I've rented a lot and this might be my favorite one yet. Comfortable, easy to move in with just enough sexy appeal. It was warm for the wedding but I was comfortable all afternoon. I cannot recommend this dress more highly!
I received never-ending compliments on this dress! It's so flattering and hot! Extremely high quality as well. Loved it!!
Wore this for a work gala and felt really pretty in it! I wasn't crazy about the see through part in the middle but other than I was really pleased with it.

This dress was beautiful yet very comfortable. I am normally a size 12 but did rent a 14 because that was the size available at the time. It turned out that the 14 fit perfectly. I highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Loved this Marchesa dress! The fabric was durable, details are gorgeous, and it fit just right!
links_reviews_text: This was my first RTR experience and I couldn't be happier. It arrived on time and in great condition. I did choose a size up as my back-up size, but this was definitely true to size. The fabric ended up being thicker than I'd imagined, which was good because I never was scared of any accidental tears. I'm 5'2'' and the dress ended a bit above my knees. The color and details were striking. It definitely lived up to my expectations! I wore it to a wedding and it was easy to dance and move around in. No complaints! Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: The dress fit like a glove and I received a lot of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly!

I absolutely LOVED everything about this dress. I am larger chested so I sized up and it fit great. I was able to wear a regular nude bra without it being noticeable. I am 5'4" so the length was perfect for me so it might be short on someone with legs. The details on this dress are just gorgeous. I felt amazing in it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect in every way & so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I rented a dress by the same designer from RTR for another event last year so I was pretty confident about the size, but I ordered an 8 just in case. I'm a 4/6 and the 6 fit perfectly and was true to size. Comfortable all around, even when sitting. I thought it might be itchy, but not at all! Felt like a princess and got so many compliments! Perfect for so many occasions. Would recommend to anyone!

Wore with nude strapless bra. Did not have any issues with the mid portion folding or bunching like I had read in some reviews. Was perfect color for a winter wedding. Got plenty of compliments. Details on the dress were very beautiful. Would rent again

The embroidery and lace on this dress is beautiful and gives it a formal look despite the simple silhouette. The mesh panel in the midriff gives it a nice bit of edgy style. Per some of the other reviews, it can fold over a bit weird, but I think it's one of those small things only you notice and not anyone else. It's practical - easy to move in, not too hot not too cold, not too much skin but still interesting, a nice pop of color. All in all a great pick. I also liked that it seems like it is not a super popular option - after trying on two other dresses with hundreds of reviews (this one only had like 5) - this dress was in much better condition and felt much more unique.

This dress was a backup dress selected by RTR when the size to my original selection was not available. IT's a beautiful color and feels extremely comfortable. Not itchy or heavy. I didn't wear it because I had another dress to select from, if not I certainly would have. It is not curve hugging, the nude part in the middle is not forgiving if your wear full body spanks, but overall a beautiful dress.

Both dresses were brand new with tags still on them. Beautiful dress but definitely runs large. I'm typically an 8 and even the 6 was a little big on me in the waist area. Because the dress was a little big, the mesh panel would fold so I had to continuously adjust the dress to smoothen it out.

This dress was perfection! The detailing and lace were so delicate and beautiful. I really wish I could keep this for forever. I wore this for an Army Ball(Ranger Ball) and I got a lot of compliments. I would definitely rent this dress again.

This dress was very fitted throughout the midsection and I would suggest going one size up from your original size. I am a size 2 and the size 4 fit me like a glove. You should consider doing a strapless or a nude bra. However, this dress is so pretty and I think it's perfect for a fall event. I will be renting this for my Christmas party!
Perfect for date night!

I loved this dress when I tried it on! I didn't end up wearing it because I found a dress that was better suited for the event, but I found this to be very flattering. The "see-through" part is actually a tan mesh fabric, so you're not really exposed in the middle. I'd definitely rent this for a different event in the future.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but odd mesh at the waist
links_reviews_text: The dress was very pretty and fit well except for the waist. The nude mesh didn't fit tightly so it looked odd. My skin was darker than the nude mesh which also looked odd.

Overall I think it was a cute dress, but it wasn't appropriate for the event we were going to. I didn't realize there were sequins on it when I ordered. The sheer in the middle was interesting, but it didn't feel like it added anything to the dress. The color was a very bright red which also felt a little too intense for the dinner we were attending. Overall the fit was fine.

Dress was cute, but the mesh see-thru panel in the midsection was an unwelcome surprise. Made the dress look younger on me than I wanted, and though it was cute, I just didn't like the seethru panels. Boo.
I didn't wear this dress. It was a bit short and with the mesh around the center it felt a little bit too much like an ice-skating costume.

Pretty fabric and style concept. seems to run large. Fit well but didn't flatter. Proportions were off. Nice fabric. Quality construction. Too cutesy for my taste. Mesh does not work on tan skin tones, beware! Probably better off with the black version.
Ran a bit small so I couldn't wear it as I had hoped, but it was an absolutely gorgeous dress! Detailing was amazing.
Itchy and not very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a Christmas cocktail party. I felt fabulous in this dress!
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a 4, wider in the hips, but was comfortable in a 2 because of the A line skirt.

This dress ran small in the hips - I'm usually a 12 but the 14 fit me just right outside of a little extra room at the top of the dress. If you have hips size up! The cut of the dress is very flattering for an hour glass/apple shape. The layers hide imperfections in the midsection. The fabric is light and flowy - very comfortable.

Beautifully designed and patterned dress...for someone else. The horizontal pleats at the hips are constricting and over-exaggerated the area, which is the opposite effect I desire. The top was altogether saggy and irredeemable for my pear shape. I would need to have it taken up in the shoulders about 2" to fit properly.

links_reviews_title: This dress is amazing! Wanted to keep it.
links_reviews_text: What a lovely dress that can work for so many different occasions! It's beautiful. The print, the flow, the fit are all perfect. The dress runs a bit small, so don't expect to squeeze in to this one. Order your true size. The only odd thing we're the small arm holes. They seemed off in the sizing and a little bit snug.

I love this dress. The fabric is to die for. Looks great with and without a blazer. I wore this all day from an early flight, to meetings, then cocktails, and finally to a late night dinner. It was perfect.
I wore this out for a nice dinner with my boyfriend. The material is so soft and flowy and comfortable. Easy to wear a bra with and super flattering.

links_reviews_title: Perfect light and classy summer dress
links_reviews_text: Conservative enough for church yet fun and flirty for the party. Really a great dress
This is a nice dress in winter with a black jacket, but probably a better choice for spring or summer. It's pretty and feminine.
Fit like a dream and was so so flattering. Would rent repeatedly but the price tag is a little steep to purchase!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress with interesting detail; perfect for work
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect, very comfortable fabric for summer

links_reviews_title: I did not wear the dress.
links_reviews_text: My usual size is 12 but I rented size 14. The dress is non proportional. It has a long torso and it's large around the chest and tight on the waist.
It was very comfortable and flattering. The fabric and print are very pretty. I would rent this again for a summer party

Great for hourglass figure. High quality and fully lined- zipper is a bit sticky at the waist area due to banding. Colors are lovely. A bit too dressy for ordinary day-time wear, probably better for church, dinner date, etc.

links_reviews_title: Cute, flowy, and great for summer
links_reviews_text: Really like the asymmetrical hem and multiple layers. Flattering style. However, it has an oddly small waist and hips. I'm usually a size 12 and am glad I sized up, even so, it was still snug for my lower body. Wore with a light sweater for the office, received a ton of compliments. Would recommend with caution for a pear shape, others should be fine. Quality construction and material.

This dress has quite a few interesting details, but I didn't end up wearing it because the high neck with middle ruching across the chest somewhat cheapened the look in my opinion. It didn't help that the length hit slightly below where it should since I'm petite, and thus ended up looking even frumpier.
This is a flattering light, flowy dress with an uneven hem. No stretch but well made and fitted in the bodice and waist. I wore this to a church event.
I love this. Fit is very flowy and the print is gorgeous.

links_reviews_title: felt terrific - got it with the tags on! how great!
links_reviews_text: the dress fit perfectly and was very pretty - wore it to a cocktail party and would rent it again for sure!

I loved this dress - the basic silhouette is incredibly work-appropriate but the details bring it up one (or two) notches! I wore it with a blazer for part of the day and without once I was back in my office. Really a great Spring dress!

links_reviews_title: Cute, except for ruching on bust
links_reviews_text: I really liked the way this dress moved, with the stiffened fabric around the hips providing a nice bell-shape. But the ruched bust seems odd if you aren't particularly busty on top. The ruching went down to the waist, which looked weird.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a day in the garden
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear. Great quality. Lovely dress all around if you want something a bit on the conservative side.
High quality workmanship and fabric
Fit and fabric very nice. Great for work or special occasion.

links_reviews_title: Style didn't work work for me!
links_reviews_text: Not the best fit for me.
Super cute but very small. Definitely could have worn a large!

I loved the material of this dress. It fit well but wasn't too tight. Easy to move around in for a wedding. The busy design kind of hides any flaws... I loved this dress & I'd buy it if I could. Length was great as well :)
The Slate & Willow dress is way too short and way too tight! I'm only 5'3 and it was barely covering my butt! Go up 2 sizes if you can! Pretty florals!

I wore this to an outdoor wedding. It was extremely comfortable and actually runs small which I love because I'm petite! 5'2" 100lb I could have worn the XS but went with the small for extra room. Really pretty colors, nice thick material but not too hot.
Love it
It is a little short. But super cute.

Everyone says this dress runs small, and it's definitely very form fitting but I'm not sure I would say it runs small. Maybe a little but not enough to size up. Looked great and I got tons of compliments. I do think it could be too small for someone with a large chest.
Cheap fabric and extremely short for work. I'm 5 feet and felt a little exposed in the office. Runs smaller than other slate and willow dresses

I rented this dress for a rehearsal dinner. I got many compliments on the color and pattern, however, it was a bit tighter all around than I expected. It was a bit tight around the neck area which made it a bit uncomfortable to wear for several hours. If you are to rent, I'd recommend sizing up. It was still so pretty!
Cute daytime dress for an island vacation but so short I had to layer a skirt under it and wear a small instead of extra small. Photographed well and had nice colors.

Loved this dress so much I bought it! Very flattering style with nice stretch in the fabric and easy to zip. The colors are so bright and pretty, lots of compliments! Be warned .....if your not comfortable with short, this isn't for you! Felt kinda "Ally McBeal" short for work-I loved it!!

I wore this dress to a wedding in Central Park. I had to run a bunch of errands before and needed a dress that I could do all this in. This is an fun, easy, throw on dress that will make you feel put together and pretty once you get to your final destination, after running around the city. The scuba material is light and breathable, but I would recommend a pair of spanx underneath, just because scuba material can sometimes hug in places you don't wait it to. I went up 2 sizes and wore a Medium, I am normally an XS in dresses.
Tall girls beware.... there is no bending over in this dress. Definitely go a size up. Otherwise the dress is cute and summery.
This dress is so cute but it is inappropriately short for my height.
i'm only 5'6 but this dress barely covered my bottom! I got so many compliments but wouldn't order again. material also feels kind of cheap.

The fabric is so pretty - the fuchsia and turquoise palette give it an almost abstract art vibe. This fit perfectly for me. It is quite short so I wore with black tights but can see wearing it with sandals in the summer. I wore with black patent heels and chunky ankle boots and both killed :) Definitely true to size - the XS fit to a T.
The dress is tight but it has stretch to it and ruffles at the bottom. Very vibrant print!

links_reviews_title: Runs very small, but beautiful pattern!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a daytime luncheon and it was nice, got lots of compliments on it. Fabric is light and has a full zipper, so you'll need someone to help zip it up. I normally wear a small, but I couldn't even get it over my hips. My backup was a medium, and that still felt tight. I sat the entire time so it was fine, but if there'd been dancing no way would I have been able to. Also, it's very short, and I'm only 5'2. If you're taller than that, you're probably gonna be uncomfortable. If you're petite, not curvy, and small to medium in your chest this is gonna be a good fit for you. And make sure to get a bigger size as your backup.

I lovely the fit of this dress! I was true to size. I'm 5'4" and it was a little short. It was also a little snug on the hips if you tend to be more pear shaped. However, it was a great fit for a bridesmaid luncheon. Lots and lots of compliments!
Like it

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress!!!! Tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I went up a size to accommodate my chest size. Medium fit, but it was tight in the chest.
Didn't wear. Sooooooo tiny. Couldn't even zip it. I do have broad shoulders for a petite frame. It fit in the waist but not across chest/shoulders.

Such a cute little number. My only complaint is that it is really short. I'm only 5'4" and if I bent down or over a table I was putting on a show. Which posed a little issue since I wore this to a party my friend was throwing and I was just there to help (lots of bending and cleaning). Still a great dress though!
Loved this dress and it was a good fit on waist and bust. However, I am 5"10 and this was wayyyyy too short.

links_reviews_title: Colorful and bright dress for summer weddings. I wore to two separate events.
links_reviews_text: Dress runs small and the zipper is tough but you can pull it over even with zipper up.
I am a size 2 and even the medium was too tight on me. A bit short. Beautiful bright pattern.

links_reviews_title: I could not wear the dress
links_reviews_text: Extremely small

links_reviews_title: Reviews are accurate - this is TINY!
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately, I didn't get the chance to wear this because it was just... tiny. I'm pretty short - 5'4 - and even on me this was very short. Barely covered by butt! The top is also very slim. I could barely zip it up! Definitely size up!

This dress is very fun and flirty. Unfortunately, I felt it was too short for my personal taste but I was disappointed that I felt that way and kept trying to convince myself otherwise since it really is a very cute dress.
Great color and style but the fabric was a little cheezy and cheap. Very short in the front, bodice is very tight. Size up if you dont want it too tight or short

links_reviews_title: I'm a size 6 and the medium wouldn't even zip!
links_reviews_text: TOO SMALL

I ordered a S with an M as a backup, neither dress was marked size-wise, but the larger of the two barely zipped. Thank goodness for RTR's replacement process! I had two alternate options the next day.
I put on the dress and it was way too short to wear out of the house. Material felt kinda cheap too.

I rented this dress for a family wedding - although the pattern and overall fit would be very cute, the dress was extremely short. I am not terribly tall - 5'6" - and wasn't able to wear either of my size choices due to the length of the dress. However, I was very pleased with RTR customer service getting me a replacement dress in time for my event.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, great quality fabric, stretchy, and fun!
links_reviews_text: It is nice and TIGHT. Normally I get a S & an XS knowing that I am going with the XS.. not this time. Was much shorter than I expected (and I'm 5'1). I have a large bust, so maybe that was what brought it up (34 DDD), but overall I got a lot of compliments so I was happy

I love the color and detail of this dress, but it is not for everyone. I am not super tall, but I am not tiny and this dress was really short!! I wanted it to work, but alas I opted to wear my 2nd option. This one I might have flashed people had I bent over and I know I would not have been comfortable wearing it. So it is pretty, but if you are taller I would not wear it. Also, the zipper was a bit tricky and I had a hard time getting it zipped. An XL would have been a better fit especially on my bust. I would not recommend.
Wore this for a friends derby party. Great dress, but I’m 5’2 & felt it was on the short side.
Dress is very beautiful but runs so small I couldn't even zip it up. Couldn't wear :(

links_reviews_title: way too small, Could have been so cute if it fit. I never wear a large but would need it in this.
links_reviews_text: tight and short
The material was thinner than expected, but not cheap. Runs small - very tight in the shoulders. Since it's a fitted, stretchy material, I'd size up.

The color of this jumpsuit was amazing, a wine tone with a touch of pink. The legs were fabulous and I adored the cut for an anniversary dinner with my husband. The fit can be a bit awkward in the hips but I ultimately ended up wearing the 4 instead of the 6 since the top on the 6 was massive. A different cut and style that I wouldn't normally wear but made it fun.

links_reviews_title: Unique and beautifully made - ultimately did not end up wearing
links_reviews_text: RTR sent this as a back up when they didn't have my size in another style I ordered. Showing this pic from the side as it was definitely snug so it made for a sexier look. The pants have a sheer panel which is sleek and adds some dimension without being too over the top. I decided this was too tight for my work party, but its a great piece and would look good on taller ladies!

links_reviews_title: Great jumpsuit - especially for the holidays
links_reviews_text: Flattering jumpsuit. I sized up and it was a good idea - no stretch. The side of the pants are see through. I'm 5'5'' and it hit floor with heels.

Super comfy, true to size and no bra needed (since you can't wear a normal bra with the cut anyways). I only wish I had ordered the tall as it felt a little short with heels on. Also the pants are sheer on the side which I did not realize! At first I wasn't sure what to think and then I embraced it as part of the fun/flow of the look. Would order again, color is gorgeous.
I LOVE this. Fits perfectly. No bra needed. Awesome piece. Would definitely rent again. Considering keeping it all month.

I wasn't sure how I felt about wearing a jumpsuit but this had a great fit- especially the top. I wasn't a fan of the 'flowy' legs as they had a slit right around my problem area but it probably wasn't noticeable to anyone but me! I loved the color and the top had a great cut that I received quite a few compliments on!

links_reviews_title: I felt so powerful in this!
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is gorgeous. It is flowy but the material is thick, the color is stunning, and it's comfortable. It honestly made me feel like I could take on the world. The only downside (which wasn't a big deal) is that it's difficult to walk distances in, and when the wind is blowing, the fabric wraps around your legs. I received a ton of compliments wearing this. A power suit for powerful women.

links_reviews_title: Stood at for my audition for The Voice!
links_reviews_text: I simply loved everything about this and received so many compliments and head turns. I felt like I ruled the world.

It was a great deep red color. The neckline is perfect for busty girls but you have to wear a strapless bra because of the cut and low back. The length on the 6 was just right for my height with heels.

This was ALMOST perfect. The color was a beautiful deep red, perfect for a fall wedding, and I LOVED the sheer slits in the legs. Definitely a unique piece. I'm 5'10, so typically speaking, ordering long is the best route for me. I'm between a 4 and a 6 and went with the 4L. The length was great (worn with 2" heels), but it was baggy in the armpit area, torso, and on my bum. I tried to pin it a little bit but couldn't make it work. It wasn't enough to be a huge noticeable difference, but it was just enough to bother me for the duration of the evening. I'd size down one, if not two sizes, depending on the fit you're looking for!

I am OBSESSED with this jumpsuit. It's true to size and SO flattering. A sticky bra was necessary -- I wore molded cups as the front sides are narrow and the back is low. There are sheer panels inset in the leg. I received endless compliments and felt incredible. My sisters both wanted it -and I'm seriously considering buying it. LOVE!

links_reviews_title: Disappointment - didn't end up wearing out of the house
links_reviews_text: I'm disappointed in the jumper and wish there was a review that warned it might not be a great fit. I'm 5'10" flatfoot and the long was not available. Sometimes the regular length works, but definitely not in this case. Even if the long was available, i don't think it would have made a difference. This jumper does not do you any favors and i did not end up wearing it for my event. It's too wide and unflattering.

Wore this to an engagement party and felt great. I could have warn a 2 but it was tighter in the bust area. Even with the 4 I didn't wear a bra and just wore pasties. Also, I have a pretty flat stomach but still wore high Spanx to really give myself the hour glass shape you need for this jumper. The legs are wider than I expected but it made the jumper unique and even more comfortable. I got lots of compliments!
Great fit. Comfortable hip and thighs. Ankle length, with nice flutter on the leg due to the open panels.
I sized down per the previous comments and it fit perfectly! It was a fun alternative to a sparkly dress on New Year's Eve. I'm 5'11 and the long size just hit the floor.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a horse race park and it was perfection!!
links_reviews_text: The top had plenty of room bc I didn't fill it out at all. The sheer side leg panels were an awersome surprise!! Clean and very well made!!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to an indoor/outdoor wedding and it was perfect.
links_reviews_text: I loved this vibrant jumpsuit! I ordered a 6R and a 4R as the backup. I actually ended up wearing the 4R because the 6R was too big up top. It fit great and I loved the open back. I paired it with a gold belt and fun earrings. Got a lot of compliments! I wish I could keep it!
This jumpsuit was super comfy and fun to wear. It was a little on the loose side, especially in the waist but the torso was long enough for me which is sometimes a challenge.

Picked this piece since it was something I wouldn't normally wear/buy so why not rent it. Got a ton of compliments actually wore it twice before returning I got a lot of compliments both times. True to fit but pretty comfy.
Tight but right
Fit a little awkward but still loved it

links_reviews_title: Beautiful jumpsuit! I felt classy and sassy.
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit fit great. I'm 5'4" so I usually plan on wearing at least 4-5" heels with long dresses/jumpsuits. And I needed them for this as well. A strapless bra was fine and didn't show. I paired it with an excellent necklace that I also rented from RTR.

I love this jumpsuit! I'm pretty short so I was worried about how long it would be, but with some killer heels it wasn't a problem at all. The material feels heavy but it's really breathable. I wore this for an awards gala and I got a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Felt great. Easy to move in
links_reviews_text: Beautiful and comfortable. A bit heavier than expected. Loads of compliments! Wore it for a pageant I was directing. Needed pants to get stuff done but still felt as beautiful as the contestants in gowns.

I recently wore this to a black tie wedding and I was very pleased with how chic and elegant it was. I would recommend wearing a strapless bra and the high waisted brief Spanx underneath to smooth things out.

links_reviews_title: I had picked up some weight so this was very flattering yet forgiving.
links_reviews_text: The sheer cutouts was a plus. It was short enough to wear flats, but long enough to wear heels! The color was more of a garnet color

links_reviews_title: In a sea of black, I stood out!
links_reviews_text: If you are busty, this might be a challenge. It's a bit long in the torso, but the drape of the bottom half hides it for those of us who are shorter in the torso. OH! This one is single lady friendly. You don't need help getting in and out of it!

The outfit is a show stopper. You will get compliments all night long! It was a bit long for me, and the chest was a little big (nothing a push up bra can't fix). I found it to be a bit flowy, but it had a great shape. Overall, BEAUTIFUL jumpsuit!

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit fit perfectly and I got a ton of compliments. Perfect for the latin dance event.
links_reviews_text: Great for dancing. Color is a beautiful deep red. Back is beautiful. Legs are fabulous with the side slits revealing the sheer under layer as one walks or dances. Very sexy.

links_reviews_title: Fun and great to wear for Christmas work party!
