links_reviews_text: I'm 5'2'' and the petite was a little long on me so I folded the top part and placed a belt over it. It was not noticeable. Outfit was prefect for my work Christmas party. - Age 40

links_reviews_title: Not as flattering as I had hoped
links_reviews_text: Definitely runs large so order down. Wasn't as flattering as I had hoped..

the jumpsuit runs true to size & looks amazing! got tons of compliments at the holiday party. I agree that the torso is a tad too long but everything else fit perfectly! would definitely recommend this for any event!!

I rented this for my work holiday party. I got compliments from everyone and it was easy and comfortable. I'm short and the length was perfect. The fabric pulled a bit in the front but the 2 definitely fit much better than the 4.
Wasn't that comfortable to wear, probably because of my body type.. but looked great standing up in pictures.

I originally had a dress planned for my 40th birthday night out but my husband told me it was going to be a bit more casual. I got on the phone with RTR, agent helped me look thru jumpsuits because I really haven't worn one before but always wanted to. I'm not going to lie, I put this on and was a little worried, the legs bell out a lot and you really can't wait much of a bra so I had the silicon cups. After I got my heels on and accessorized, I felt beautiful. It's a really unique jumper. Toward the end of the night, I would look down and it was like I was wearing a sexy long dress. Lots of compliments! Gorgeous color. Would rent again.

I love this jumpsuit. The cut of the neck is sooooo great for my broad shoulders. I love this jumpsuit. The color is beautiful. Only oart I don't like is the seam where the pants and top meet. It's a bit low and cuts a little weird but I am being not picky. I have a very short torso, if my torso was slightly longer it would fit perfectly
I used it for a wedding and I received so many compliments! I was really happy!

links_reviews_title: Sassy piece! Got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit well, you can wear a strapless bra with it. great color and material.
This is a super striking and bold choice for a jumpsuit. It is very long though and you definitely cannot wear flats with it. I wore it for a photoshoot in Portugal and it stood out without a doubt!

links_reviews_title: Such a lovely color!! Rent it!
links_reviews_text: I was looking for something to wear for graduation and I came across this jumpsuit. Before renting, I'll usually read through most, if not all, of the reviews then sleep on it, then choose to rent. With graduation around the corner, I rented it. BEST DECISION EVER!!! The color is WAAAAY prettier in person! The sheer panel on the sides went up to mid thigh and it wasn't too sheer! It was more sheer near the ankles. The jumpsuit definitely runs large. I wore the 2R and it still had room, but it was still worked! Being 5'4" and short torso'd, I didn't like how shapeless it made me look. I went to forever21 and purchased the gold belt in the picture! It really pulled it all together and cut me right! Wore with 4" heels and it skimmed the floor! I got compliments from fellow graduates, professors and complete strangers! It's flow is lovely and it easy to take off to pee! Will DEFINITELY rent this again!!
I was worried when reading the reviews that the sizing of this dress would be way off, but it was perfect. Loved the dress and it was comfortable all night. The slit added a little something extra.

The fit of this dress is fantastic. I took so many photos in it because I felt absolutely fabulous in it and I think I looked it too. I highly highly recommend this dress for a more formal wedding reception in the summer. It flows beautifully, the color is great and the fit on the bodice is slimming.
Its a perfect fit! Many complements.

Loved this dress for our engagement photos! I went with the 2R which was a little short even without heels (I'm 5'6"). I wish I had gone with the 2L so it reached the floor. Regardless, this dress was beautiful and figure-flattering! Highly recommend!

I originally ordered this dress as a back-up Prom dress. I ended up liking the other one better, but it turns out my sister's college graduation was the next day, so I ended up wearing it to that. I read reviews saying that the sizing was small, so I ordered up a size. It fit good, but was a little snug in some places. The band around the waist was tight, so it bunched up in the back. It was the perfect length, with or without heels. I loved the slit on the side, and thought it added a lot to the dress. It for me around the chest, but I think it would be pretty tight if you are larger than a C cup. Overall, beautiful dress.

I wore this for a Black Tie optional outdoor wedding! I received compliments all night on the color and how flattering it was! My only complaint is, it was a lower cut in the front that I typically wear (be careful when sitting down)! Other than that, it was perfect! And it was also light material, which always helps at an outdoor wedding in Louisiana! Highly recommend!
I am normally a 16, which did fit but because I'm pretty busty I went for the 18 so I wouldn't be adjusting all day. I got so many compliments and it was never uncomfortable. Highly recommend!

I wore this pretty pink floral dress to one of my wedding showers. I did find myself fighting to keep my girls in it. It is cut rather low/fits awkwardly around the chest. I got lots of compliments on it though, but I couldn't wait to take it off because I was fighting with the fit all day.
I could barely zip it but have been buying 10s ever since which do fit. Beautiful dress that's well made

links_reviews_title: REALLY sad but the dress was way smaller than I thought. I normally wear a 16/18
links_reviews_text: I got this dress for an engagement photo shoot and so glad i did it way in advance. WAY too small. And it cut weird.

links_reviews_title: I wear a size 16 fit and flare at Eloquii and this did not fit me in a size 20R
links_reviews_text: Feels too small compared to other 20r that I have worn

links_reviews_title: Runs ridiculously small. Can't even zip it at all
links_reviews_text: Bottom half of the dress is a 16. Everything the zipper touches is a 12 at best. Maybe a 10. It's ridiculous. Don't bother.
Runs small. Couldn't wear it. But it wasn't particularly flattering with the high neck regardless

links_reviews_title: The color of the dress and the fabric are even prettier than the picture.
links_reviews_text: This dress was so beautiful, the silk was so soft, this is what I wanted to wear. Unfortunately, it runs about 3 sizes too small.

links_reviews_title: I truly loved how flowy this gown was, and how it was cut to flatter your curves.
links_reviews_text: This dress is sized SUPER small. I had to wear 4-5 sizes larger than what I normally wear, which is a US 14-16. So, that was really hard when ordering sizes. Additionally, by the time I found the size that fit my body, the sleeves were basically falling off my shoulders, so I had to use bobby pins to keep them up during the wedding I attended. But I loved the flowiness of the dress - which is the exact reason I rented it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but not meant for curves
links_reviews_text: This dress is not something I would normally pick to wear but I wanted to go for something different. The pink color was so beautiful and the floral design on it was the perfect touch. I ended up not wearing it because it was too tight around my hips and I knew the next size up would be large in the bust. If you are less hippy/not such a big butt, then this dress would be perfect.
Very form fitting in the midsection.
This is a bridal size fit. Size way up. It's beautiful but it wouldn't fit :(
Compliments galore on Valentines Day! High end looking, great material and super flattering dress! RENT IT

links_reviews_title: Would have been beautiful for a date!
links_reviews_text: But not for a work function. I am 5'3, 120 lbs and wearing a 4. The 2 would have been way too fight. This fit like a glove but just too form fittinga and too short for work. But I loved it. Will wear it on a date or cocktail party.

This dress was so comfortable and beautiful for Christmas Eve! It definitely runs on the shorter and tighter side, the size 4 was a little tighter than I would have liked when I usually wear a 2 comfortably. Would definitely rent again, note that the sleeves bell out at the end, I just rolled mine up once to eat without dragging my arm in my food. Dress was definitely form fitting and hit about halfway down my thighs.

Best shade of red!!! Very form fitting, I probably would have been more comfortable in a size 4 but the size 2 definitely sucked everything in. The sleeves are also a fun detail! I loved the split seams.

links_reviews_title: Sweet grandma of the bride said I looked stunning!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a fall wedding and got so many compliments! The color and sleeves are amazing. I ordered a size up and was so glad I did. It fit like a glove and rode up a little throughout the night, so I wasn't the most comfortable but it's a stunning dress!

Usual size 4/6, size 8 was perfect for me. Love the color -- it really stands out. I received a lot of compliments. This dress was comfortable and almost want to buy it -- it's affordable w the RTR discount. I'm not buying because i have another red dress too similar to this

links_reviews_title: You'll feel sexy not skanky in this dress! It's very classy without being too revealing
links_reviews_text: Great fit, maybe a little short for my taste!

links_reviews_title: Such an easy and amazing first time Rent!
links_reviews_text: It fits a tad tight and was a smidge shorter than I usually get, but I got so many compliments and felt beautiful. Perfect holiday red.
The red is a great pop color and really stood out! It was perfect length for a Christmas work party and photographed well! Highly recommend this dress!!
I didn't wear this dress because it was super tight around my thighs and looked really weird and boxy. Not flattering for my curvy body type

I'm usually a 0 or a 2-- I rented the 2 since it ran small. Low and behold, the 2 was so tight, i could hardly breathe and it looked ridiculous. The dress itself is a very nice quality and good looking dress- so I will probably rent again in a size 4 or 6 and see how that fits.

links_reviews_title: I thought this would look cute at work, loved the color and bell sleeves.
links_reviews_text: I'm typically a size 10-12, sometimes 14 due to a large chest. I got this in a 12 and the top portion was definitely too small, the bottom was tight but it fit. Would definitely need to wear with tights in a work environment. Will re-order in a 14 when available.

I normally love the look of this type of dress but this was one was way too short and tight. I normally wear a 6 or 8, but even the 10 was too small. This would probably look great on someone with a smaller chest and not as much around the middle :)

I absolutely love this dress but I opted for a different one it was a tough call!! The fabric is thick enough and it's short and sexy enough with the contrast of the long sleeves. I definitely would consider renting this for another event
could not wear it
Fit like a glove but with the high neck and long sleeves was still reserved. Felt like a million bucks!

links_reviews_title: Little red dress. Tight little red dress.
links_reviews_text: Ok when people say this runs small, they aren't playing. I'm usually a 4 - sometimes a 2, and the 4 was form fitting and short - like, barely covered my butt. I wore it to a bday party and debated wearing it to work, but even dark tights wouldn't have made this work appropriate. It. Is. Short.

links_reviews_title: This dress is cut weird. Terrible overall.
links_reviews_text: This dress is cut weird. The shoulders were too wide and it was loose at the top of my back, toght on my chest and the overly long sleeves covered half my hand. The lower half was a bit snug but since I have wide shoulders it should have been loose of the top was that off. It was also incredibly short. Terrible overall.

links_reviews_title: Runs small. Tight in hips and arms
links_reviews_text: Great color. Just should have sizes up
Pretty good fit, wear it for a night out with my girls. Definitely fitted in the midsection, may need to size up.
Short and sassy, material was thick however dress didn't allow for any shapewear
Runs very small. If you’re curvy and busty, too small.
a little short but very cute
Normally a 6 and wore a 6 but it was a little bit tight. If you are in between sizes I would go up a size because Likely tends to run small. Comfortable, simple dress!

Wore this for our holiday vacation. It was the perfect fit for me personally, but I don't have many curves so if you're blessed in that area I would definitely recommend sizing up a little. Overall, I thought the dress was beautiful and very flattering. I'll likely order this one again!
Loved this dress for a holiday party and sized up knowing that it would run small based on the reviews but I could've gone up three sizes and even then Would likely have a body con fit.

Great dress but definitely size up in this dress unless you want a snug fit. I'm a usual 8-10 and wore the 14. It was lose enough to have shift dress look but without being huge and boxy. Loved the sleeves. I'm 5'10" and it was a mini dress for me.

links_reviews_title: Bummed it was way too small
links_reviews_text: Way too small. Great color and seemed to be great quality. Im sure it would have looked great if I could have gotten it over my hips!

I am a 4-6 and sized up to a 6, and it was still skin-tight, especially around the hips. The dress is beautifully made but I couldn't wear it to a holiday party because it was a bit too scandalous. I'm trying the size 8, but be warned that you should size up 1-2 sizes!
Loved this dress.

links_reviews_title: So comfortable and nice thick fabric so minimal shape wear needed

links_reviews_text: I had reserved another dress, but when I went to pick it up at the Georgetown boutique I really didn't like how it fit on me. Being a bigger size, I knew my in-store options were going to be limited. I tried on probably another 8 dresses before I found this one. It was a bit big. Had they had a 14, I would have taken it, but it worked well enough. I really love the color blocking. It was comfortable, too. I did feel a bit overdressed for a 1:00 wedding ceremony, but, oh well. The invitation stated the dress code was semi-formal, so this fit the bill.

I wore this to my husband's work holiday party. It was a hit! I loved it for this occasion because it was modest and sexy!! With my measurements, the top was very tight and the bottom was roomier than I'd like. It was super comfortable. The fabric is thicker and the design is almost quilted-it is really nice. High quality interior silicone rim keeps the top in place with zero slippage. The boning offers excellent support and gives the dress a very expensive look.

I wore this to an award ceremony for work, and I got many compliments! It's classy and it will get a lot of attention! Only thing... I don't think it would be a great dress for a "fun" night out. The skirt was pretty restrictive.
Wore this dress to my anniversary dinner, it is beautiful! The red and black combo is very sophisticated and the fit is really forgiving because the fabric is very thick!

The dress is definitely pretty but just not made to fit my body type (big girl with small boobs and no butt). There's a big difference in size bw the 14 & 16. The 14 fit but it was tight for me around my stomach (trouble) area & made me look pregnant. The top part of the dress, in both the 14 & 16 was too big for me...I couldn't fill it out, even if I wanted to! I ultimately went with the 16 bc I didn't want to wear Spanx and since it was a work awards dinner, threw on a blazer & solved my 'too loose/big on top' issue.

Worn for an awards gala. Not sure I'd recommend if you need to dance. Elegant and classy for work. Comfortable and forgiving if you have to eat dinner. No bra needed but size down if you are a C cup or smaller.
Have a pretty curvy body, this was tight in the butt area but loose on top. Wearable, but didn't quite match up.

Absolutely gorgeous dress! Wore this for a christmas party with friends and received wonderful compliments. Wore it again for Christmas with the family and everyone loved it. I felt BEAUTIFUL and classy. No bra necessary and it was wonderfully comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful cocktail dress for office Christmas party
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. The slightly darker red is beautiful color. Probably could have squeezed into a 4 but it wasn't available. So, I got the size 6. Plenty of room to eat and dance. Lots of compliments. It was long on me about 4 inches below the knee but I didn't mind since it was a work event.

This dress was perfect! I felt trendy and pretty and got tons of compliments. The dress felt a bit larger in the bust but did have a grip inside to help it stay up. I loved the material and the color. Definitely recommend.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but very thick so didn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: I could only stay in it for about 5 mins before taking off as I felt very warm in it. I rented it for a party and can't imagine dancing in it ;) I think it would be a great dress for a more formal event.
Loved pairing this dress with a red lip and gold accessories. A bit longer than expected though!

I rented this dress for a relatives 50th Birthday Party. It was a perfect fit. Very feminine fit even though it comes below the knee. There was boning in the corset so there was no need for a bra. There was also elastic lined around the top so you don't have to worry about it sliding down. The construction of the fabric was so detailed. People are still raving over this dress!

A very easy, comfortable dress to wear. The material is heavier than I expected so it is perfect for cooler evenings. It was a bit longer than I like - I would have preferred that it hit just below the knee.

links_reviews_title: Runs small & no stretch at all!

links_reviews_text: Great material. Flattering dress. Very comfortable.
I did not wear this, it was too small
I wore this dress to a wedding with a dress code of 'wicked fancy'. It was the perfect balance of badass red and glamorous cut and feel. The fabric was comfortable too

links_reviews_title: Looks great with a blazer over it for work.
links_reviews_text: Fits snug and flattering. Thick material to Hide imperfections.

I have a textbook hourglass figure, very curvy. I'm also busty on top, bump out in the rear, and have a little bit of a pouch when I neglect to keep a lean diet. That said, I typically avoid straight and narrow dresses, and opt for fit and flair, but read the reviews and took a stab at this one. Picking the size was very tricky, though, because I'm a true, busty, 10 on top and curvy 12 on bottom in separates. As this is a one piece, I went with the 12 and was thrilled at how well it fit me overall. A padded strapless bra helped fill in the top just the right amount. The fit and fabric were incredibly flattering and I received so many compliments. Only cons were that I personally needed to unzip the dress down to go potty and the dress twisted a bit so I found myself readjusting to center...but maybe that's just me. Cons aside, so many more pros! I loved this rental and how it made me feel so glamorous. Was definitely the standout piece in a sea of blue and black dresses.

At only 5ft, I had to temporarily hem it up about 2.5-3 inches. With the hem, it still left about 1-1.5 inches of the split in the back. It fit my top very well & I didn't have to keep pulling it up throughout the night. I felt very sexy. The red is very vibrant. Loved it. Would rent it again for another event. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was because I could have preferred a "petite" size, due to the length.

links_reviews_title: Runs small at the top, size 10 and 12 were almost the same.
links_reviews_text: Runs small at the top, had to wear a size bigger and was baggy at the hip area.
The quality of the garment was stellar, the feel and fit was just not for me or my needs. Tight in places it shouldn't have been and loose in places that it should have been tight.
I am a small 6/8, so I sized up and there was still no room in the chest for me. Very disappointed.
The material was good quality, as was the craftsmanship. But the top was too small for me and I couldn't zip it up all the way. Otherwise, it looked great.

links_reviews_title: Runs at least a size small. Very thick and a little long.
links_reviews_text: Runs at least a size small. Very thick and long. I didn't end up wearing it, but it is pretty.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress, classic style, perfect for a wedding or cocktail party.
links_reviews_text: The back zipper is an issue. The dress clearly fit but despite my husband's best efforts, he could not do up the zipper. Too bad because it is a lovely dress.

In designer dresses, I usually wear a 6 but an 8 in this worked well. I thought it looked prettier in person than in the picture. I also wore a cute little shrug with it as I wore it for Mother's Day brunch.

links_reviews_title: I received TONS of compliments on this dress.
links_reviews_text: It was very slim fitting in the hips and thighs. I'm a bit curvier in the hips and thighs, and it barely fit, but I made it work. If you have a few curves or a round bottom, this could be tight.
I loved this DRESS!!. I'm so glad I went with the 10 and not my usual size 8. Perfect for Xmas party. Classic cut. sexy but not too revealing. Loved it

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a holiday work party.
links_reviews_text: This isn't a great dress if you're smaller on top/pear shaped. It doesn't have much stretch and it didn't fit me well. But it's a pretty dress.

links_reviews_title: Unique, Eye-Catching, perfect for the holidays!
links_reviews_text: This dress did not disappoint (except for the fit - for me)! The detail is rich, the fabric is thick and more of a felted finish. The top black portion has some slight red underlay to it. The interior banding would keep this up all night. My only problem was that it ran small, not true to size - unless you are a size 6 and straight through the hips, then it would work. I would need to size up for my curves. Sad to not be able to wear this one!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, but didn't work on me.
links_reviews_text: I am smaller busted, but this dress had about 3 extra inches up top, while the bottom was uncomfortably tight. The fabric is beautiful, though. I would've liked to have worn it.

The perfect dress if you want to look classic, but a little trendy at the same time. The material was thick, (so perfect for the fall and winter) soft, and comfortable. I am normally a 4, but that size was unavailable so I went with the 6, which, while not as form fitting, still looked great and was flattering without being oversized.

Love the fabric and concept but totally did not work for me. I could hardly get it over my head and it was super tight in the bust. Actually flattened my boobs and I'm a B. The waist Fitbit maybe a size up would have allowed the dress to fit more "flowy". The length was awkward as well on my 5'4 frame...hit just above the knees which isn't generally flattering on shorter bodies. Had to send back without wearing.
Light and breezy. Casual vacation dress.

links_reviews_title: Cute but not as beautiful as the photo
links_reviews_text: I liked this dress a lot, it's super cute and fun to wear, but I was expecting it to be much prettier. On the professional photos looks better and it has some little decorations on the skirt that are cute but not as elegant and delicate as I thought this would be. I wore it once but I don't think I'll wear it again. I got a size smaller based on the recommendation from RTR and it was a bit short. Still cute tho
Lots of compliments ! Cute dress
Loose fit, but can be adjusted to drop waist or more snug. Lots of fun for dancing at a concert, light and breathable.
Very small, I sized down because the reviews were that it was too big but I found it super tight
I always wear an XS and Small and the XS was too big in the waist and not flattering there's not a good drawstring so the whole night I had to scrunch it and hold it up

links_reviews_title: Fit and pattern were so pretty!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect to wear to work (covered by a suit jacket) and transition to a fancy birthday luncheon! the pattern is very pretty/funky in person. I would definitely rent this again.

Wore this to work. I loved the pattern and details, but there's a lot of fabric. The top is also see through so I had to wear a tank underneath giving me even more bulk. Luckily, I was at work, so I threw on a blazer and all was hidden. Not bad, not great. Will probably not rent again.
Very sheer, despite having a liner.
I usually wear a small or XS but this dress looked like a sack of potatoes on me. Even with the tie waist I couldn't get it to hang correctly. I'm 5'5" and 113 and it just didn't look very cute!!
dress is slimming
The top of the dress is disproportionately narrow. I could not wear.
Not bad, but not a "wow" look or fit.
too big, not good for petite height girls
way too big

links_reviews_title: It was way to big for me.. I looked frumpy
links_reviews_text: I think xs is not xs. I am 5'2 and 110 pounds and these xs are not fitting at all.
This dress runs large and long. Way too much extra fabric. Even with the drawstrings I could not make it work. Paisley patterns and colors pretty though. Maybe best for taller women!

links_reviews_title: Great dress! I probably could have worn a small, but it looked great and wore it several times.
links_reviews_text: The drawstring waist lets you make is short or long, the fabric is beautiful.
A pretty print, but the fit is not flattering at all. Also had a lot of ruffles so if that's not your thing don't order this dress

links_reviews_title: Flattering. I wore with tights, boots and a blazer on vacation shopping in NYC.
links_reviews_text: Fits great at the waste.

links_reviews_title: I wish I had ordered smaller. Cute details.
links_reviews_text: Cute details.

links_reviews_title: Never wore it. Cute and flattering above the waist only.
links_reviews_text: The way the dress fell on my waist was not flattering at all. I may be the wrong height for this dress but it did not look right. Cute pattern and would have been fun with strappy black shoes or a tall boot.

links_reviews_title: Great dress but the neckline is too plunging
links_reviews_text: Cute dress but the v of the neckline goes below a bra. And there is too much space to go brakes without showing everything.
Horrible fit and bad material

Dress is slightly longer than it appears on model. I have a short torso, and found this dress unflattering on me. I think it would be better suited for someone with a longer torso. It does have nice beading at the bottom of the dress that is not evident online.

Flowy fit. I liked the tie sides so you can adjust the waist. Wore to work with a blazer, tights and booties. It is low cut so had to wear a bandeau underneath. Nice dress with some great detail work. Could also wear with knee high boots for a night out.
Odd fit for me . . . lots of material on the upper half of the dress--but fit from the waist down. Overall, it just didn't hang on my frame in a flattering way.

links_reviews_title: Super cute print - big on top
links_reviews_text: Wanted to like it but should have ordered a small.
This dress is very functional and good for a vacation. I didn't feel overly stunning in it, but it was easy for my trip. I wouldn't rent again, but still a good dress.
runs large
I loved everything about this dress--the cut, the material and the pattern (even though I am not a fan of paisley, it just works). I actually should have bought this one.
I liked the fabric but it's not a dress for anyone with boobs. I tried it on and it was too tight around the chest but it felt nice everywhere else.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful jewel details and a fun print
links_reviews_text: The dress was great, but be warned it is SHEER. I wore a spanx body suit under it because you would see right through to my undies. I didn't wear to work because when you cinch at the natural waist i rides up quite a bit (I'm only 5'4 height and typically wear a 4-6) . I did change and wear in a dimly lit restaurant with a leather moto jacket (Blank NYC) and Suede thigh highs. I got a lot of compliments and actually wore the next day to another dinner lol
Cute dress. It can be adjusted with drawstrings on the sides. Wore with tights, booties and a leather jacket.
The waist can be adjusted for a more fitted look. The ruffles are flattering and the relaxed fit makes it easy to wear all night.

I loved this dress! The color is so pretty in person, and I got several complements. I ordered the 2 & the 4. While I could have maybe sized down to the 0 for the top of the dress, the lower half was decently fitted, so I'm glad I stuck with the 2.

After several attempts to get the size correct I went with a size 4. It definitely runs smaller in the hip area but larger in the bust if you have a small chest. Overall it was a great dress and I received many compliments. It was worn to my companies awards ceremony.
Fit was snug but overall was a fun dress.

The slit was a little short. Very sexy but I was a little uncomfortable at times because the slit was so high up. The top on the 6 was perfect but the hips were too narrow for mine. I ended up switching into the 8 for the reception so I could dance a little better but then I had to pin the top with a safety pin so the top of the dress wouldn't fall.
Beautiful dress. Got tons of compliments on it! Firm fitting with the high slit which gave it a sexier look. The top ran a little on the bigger side. Overall great rental!

links_reviews_title: I received many compliments on my dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit true to size, ruffles laid correctly, good mobility, perfect length, and just enough leg poked through.

When I first saw the dress out the bag I was underwhelmed and thought I got something too plain but I loved this dress! It took me forever to find one for this event and I was going back and forth but this is a classic shape you can’t go wrong with. Get this! But for details read more. For sizing what everyone said was right. Don’t go your usual size, size down. While my normal size of a size 8 didn’t exactly fall off of me it was certainly looser in the bust and hips. So the backup size 6 worked better for me. Also if you’re short like me I’m 5’3 the slit can come up kinda high, at least for my taste but it’s not truly a problem unless you’re popping your leg out the whole time. And for the hot day I wore it, it was definitely good pick to stay cool. Last drawback was that you can kinda see the elastic through the fabric at the top of the dress (I’m guessing too many washes) but it doesn’t show up in photos, it’s just one thing I would add if I was being really picky. This dress has way more pros in cons great dress for the occasion and a compliment magnet! With this not being my first rental, RTR always works me.
Going with a strapless dress can be a toss up but this dress stayed in place all day/night without needing to constantly pull it up. Also loved the color and detail!

This was a beautiful dress for an anniversary date! I am between a 4 and 6 with full hips - I wore the 6 which was a little more comfortable. The dress stayed up throughout the night with a basic strapless bra underneath. The slit is fairly high, but I never felt too exposed. If you wear Spanx underneath just be prepared to hike them up on the side of the slit so it doesn't show. The color is gorgeous and I felt so confident!
Loved the dress, loved the color, had to keep adjusting the top and pull it up a bit but that was really the only con.

Difficult to say if it fits true to size because I was 9 months pregnant when I wore this, although it was VERY stretchy. I had rented a dress that was the same brand at 7 months so I based the fit off of that. Pre-pregnancy I was a size two, and I ordered this dress in a size 10. The color is amazing and the slit is the perfect length. I was getting complements all night on the dress. Would definitely rent again!!

links_reviews_title: So Comfy and such a fun color!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a wedding in the Hudson valley. It was perfect for the late summer and fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: I fell in love with this dress!!!
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments and loved it perfect for a wedding. The only problem for me was that it was to big for my chest. But overall I still loved it

links_reviews_title: Perfect color for my skin tone. SoCal wedding in August// perfect combo of chic and casual
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing the 0 but it was still a bit too big around my waist and chest (5'4", 120) but it was a very gorgeous dress and I got plenty of compliments on it!

links_reviews_title: Super pretty and lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I’m between sizes, and ended up sizing up for this dress for a more comfortable fit all together. The top was little big on me, so I had to keep pulling it up. Other than that it was a great dress! I’m 5’8 and 140lbs for reference.

links_reviews_title: Wore this as a bridesmaids dress and loved it!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove and I didn't have any problems with the dress riding up or falling down - wore with a strapless bra and a high rise Spanx thong and had no issues. Would definitely rent again!

I cannot express how much I loved this dress. I received so many compliments! It was very comfortable. I wore it to a banquet so I wasn't moving around (dancing) too much so can't how'd it be for that but I imagine it would've a good dress to dance in as well. I didn't really have to pull up or adjust the top at all. I'm normally a size 4 but wore the 2. The dress is very stretchy so you'll probably need to size down. The 4 just had way too much extra fabric in the waist area. I'm 5'6'' 146lbs, athletic build.

This dress is gorgeous! The color is stunning and I think would look great on any skin tone. I'm fair skinned (more so than you can tell in my edited photo) and was worried about the light blue but it looked great. I am 5'4 and 120 lbs and ordered the 2 and 0 because I read on some reviews that the dress runs large. I normally wear size 2 and it fit great. The 0 fit on top but was too tight in the stomach and hips and made the slit sit weird. The only thing that drove me a little nuts about this dress was that the chest is so big. I am pretty small chested (34b) but even after reading reviews thought I'd be ok with one of my many strapless, very padded bras, especially ordering such a small size. I had no issue with keeping the dress up, but the elastic on the top puckers and I couldn't get it to lay flat. I think that would happen unless the dress was so taught you'd be popping out. Not the biggest deal, I think it only bugged me so much because everything else about the dress was perfect! Still have to give it 5 stars! Great light fabric and easy to dance in thanks to the slit. The only warning I will give is that like other reviews said, between the cut and the light fabric the dress isn't forgiving whatsoever. I wanted to try spanks because I was nervous about my booty dimples and always pig out at weddings but the slit it too high. My butt looked fine and as long as you're not self conscious of your midsection and can relax it's great. Very classy but also sexy and would work well for any wedding, including formal or black tie. Wish I had more curves to fill it out but still loved it! Felt confident seeing lots of people I hadn't in years!

links_reviews_title: I loved it! The color is more of a periwinkle, I felt very pretty and got a lot of compliments!!
links_reviews_text: I’m 5’4 and 32 large B cup. I thought the top was too big for me, the waist area was comfortable and the length of the dress was perfect. The slit was beautifully made and I didn’t have any issues with it. I wish I had gotten a smaller size but it wasn’t much of a struggle pulling it up. I received so many compliments on my dress and I felt confident in the way I looked. I would really recommend this dress. I wore it for a semi-formal wedding!

Loved this dress. It was prefect for a formal wedding in Jackson this summer. Felt so confident and comfortable all night. Received compliments all night. I was nervous when ordering before I wear a 34DD bra. Didn't have to wear a bra and it kept the girls up all night just when dancing had to check myself but not bad! Would rent this dress again!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect backyard wedding on a gorgeous summer afternoon.
links_reviews_text: I’ve read some ladies go a size down but frankly the size 4 fit me way better than size 2. Size 2 was way too small, couldn’t get it up my hips. Size 4 was roomy but not loose. I’m 5’2”, weighing 134lbs, 32D cup. Dress is super comfy! Light weight. I received so many compliments!

I've worn this dress to another wedding and it did not disappoint almost a whole year later! Fits great and the ruffles distract from problem areas - watch out when sitting though, the slit goes up pretty far!

links_reviews_title: Thank God For RTR sending more than one size!!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! The color was absolutely stunning! I tried on the size 4 which is what I usually wear- but I'm a size 34B and for whatever reason this dress is snug everywhere else except the bust area. The size 2 was snug as well, but I was able to work with the just area a bit more. I did have to wear a strapless bra with a lot of cushion for it to still fit the bust area. Although this dress looks great- I gave it 4 stars because the fit was a bit awkward. I'm 5"4 120 pounds and I had to adjust the dress by pulling it up all night. Other than that- love the dress! Definitely recommend it for a woman with a larger bust and a petite body!
I got so many compliments on the dress. My favorite color. Definitely a showstopper. Also, wasn't confining and somewhat comfortable.
The color was very unique. The dress runs a little small but still very flattering.
Loved the dress. Beautiful color. Slit is high though.

I was hugely thankful for RTR's policy of sending you a replacement last minute because a shipping issue meant I left town before my package arrived. RTR sent me this dress and another (the one I had originally ordered wasn't available) to the hotel I was staying at. I picked this one because I loved this style, but I have to say the quality of the actual garment was lower than usual. I think the one I wore had been worn A LOT. The hook and eye were barely hanging on, and one part ended up falling off at some point. There was a little white stain under one arm that looked like it might have been paint and didn't come out with a shout wipe, but it wasn't really noticeable. The fabric also didn't hold its shape like other Jay Godfrey dresses I've worn, and the rubbery strip at the top kept exposing itself. All things considered, though, I still loved the way the dress looked, I just think maybe the one I wore needs to be retired.

links_reviews_title: Such a cute dress!! LOVED IT SO MUCH
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 0 but I wore a 2 because they didn't have my size available. The 2 fit SLIGHTLY too big but it still looked good; had to pull it up once in a while but other than that it was perfect. Definitely true to size

Great fit and comfortable. Didn't have to pull up constantly like some strapless dresses. I got the 2 just in case, but it is pretty true to size, maybe slightly larger. Ultimately the 0 worked perfectly. I was able to wear a strapless bra with no problem. Loved the color too. Easy to play of with blue or purple.
Dress fit a little bigger than I expected. I would suggest wearing Spanx to smooth out the material over the stomach area!

links_reviews_title: Wore it to Law School "Prom", Loved It!
links_reviews_text: I am usually about a 6 (sometimes a 4). This dress fit comfortably, but definitely was snug so if you are ordering a back up size make it a size up. It is very tight and can emphasize the tummy a little bit. Had no problems with it falling down or anything. Also, the slit is decently high so be aware of that. But overall I loved it.

This dress fit great. Slightly loose in the top which was flattering and didn’t cut in at the chest like other strapless dresses do and roomy enough to wear a strapless bra. I got so many compliments. The thigh slit is just the right height.

I usually wear a 2 but have literally no boobs and am pretty small up top so the 0 fit better! I still needed a strapless bra to keep it up but it stayed up the whole night. Lots of compliments! Classy and sophisticated.

The dress is great. I felt elegant in it all night, however, the sizing is odd. I'm a true 8 in dresses - the body of the size 10 fit like an 8, while the chest area fit like a 10-12. So, loose on top; tight on bottom. But overall pretty dress!
I usually wear an 8-10 in dresses but i had a feeling about this dress when i was reading the reviews so i went up in size and the dress fit perfectly! It was great for the wedding i attended.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a black tie affair
links_reviews_text: I really enjoyed wearing this dress to a black tie wedding that I was invited to! The color is a true periwinkle color, I wore gold accessories and nude heels! As far as the fit goes, this dress fits larger in the bust, and is very form fitting. I wore the size 0, but the 2 was comfortable and did not fit as tightly as the 0. I feel that the dress was fun but modest enough to wear to a wedding, I received so many compliments. I highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: I felt like I was the center of attention and I was loving it!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress! It fit perfectly and I had tons of compliments. Not too short, perfect for a wedding guest.

Loved this dress.. I was nervous at first since I rented this dress for winter wedding but it worked out perfectly. I received tons of compliments. The only issue I had was the top was a little large .... and kept falling down. I have 34C bust so it might just be the dress it made. Other then that it worked out wonderfully!

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress. Elegant, unique, but also classic.
links_reviews_text: I love this dress. I'm pear shaped so I had to wear a push up bra to keep the top up but it was worth it. The slit hits at just the right height and accentuates your curves beautifully. Would highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Got a lot of compliments on this beautiful dress
links_reviews_text: Great fit . Loved this dress

I got this dress as a backup and I instantly fell in love as soon as I put it on. It was much more flattering than the dress I was planning on wearing. I am right in-between a size 6 and size 8, but reviews said this ran large so I ordered the 6R and it fit perfectly. Only downside is that it is extremely long so plan on wearing 3-4 inch heels. I received compliments on the dress all night.
I received so many compliments!! I'm 5'5 with hourglass shape and this style was perfect! I wore it for a beach wedding which made the airy feel of fabric and color of this dress just perfect.

links_reviews_title: Sent to me as an alternative when the dress I actually ordered wasn’t available.
links_reviews_text: Much more flattering and beautiful in real life.

links_reviews_title: Outdoors/garden wedding on a very hot spring day.
links_reviews_text: A bit tight on the hips and stomach which creates folds on the hips. Elegant cut. Beautiful color. Simple but highlights the right places.

links_reviews_title: The past reviews were right on and it fit like a glove. The cut and color were stunning!!
links_reviews_text: The fit and size were right on and the dress fit like a glove. The material was so nice and it danced beautifully. I will continue to use RTRW as my past two experiences have been great!!!

The dress was pretty was photos since the bottom moved so pretty. Was a thicker material but you still saw any lines if you wore anything underneath. I'm a 32ddd and didn't feel too chesty in this at all. Overall great dress! I did get the long and I'm 5'9 and was able to wear a one inch heel.

This is the most gorgeous dress I have ever put on my body. It hugs every curve magnificently. The color is amazing, a cool understated blush. Length and cut are perfect. Truly a show stopper. Loved it so much I purchased it.

This dress had a fabric that was thick enough to cover up imperfections, but still tight to your skin to look like you had a flawless figure. The flowy skirt was great when we were walking and talking. A little bit difficult to find a bra that would work with this since the back has an open/cut pattern. I found one that was the exact color of the dress and it wasn't noticeable when it peaked out. Pretty long, I am 5'5" and with my 5" heels it was the perfect length. Great dress! Loved it.
Fits true to size, great material has some give but structured nicely

I wore this dress as a bridesmaid in a friend's wedding. It was comfortable and flattering. I was a little lose in the chest and torso area but not enough that I couldn't wear it. The thigh and butt area fit well (and I don't have big hips or booty).

links_reviews_title: Bridesmaid dress for a tropical beach wedding
links_reviews_text: Stunning dress that was worn for my sisters wedding on a Caribbean beach. The dress fit very nicely although heels were needed (I'm 5'4) for the bottom to not hit the ground. Other than that it fit wonderfully and was very flattering i would recommend this for a formal affair the quality of the material is very thick and high end. also i think having a larger chest helps to fill this out not sure how it would work for a smaller chested girl. Loved it!

I wore this for our countryside elopement! Even though some girls felt they needed to size up, the 6 was perfect for my smaller frame. The fabric does have some stretch to it. It also dragged behind me slightly which I loved, but it took some skill to walk around in. I ultimately loved the cut of the dress and was sad to take it off! I did not get hot in it either as we were taking photos outside!
I felt wondeful, got a ton of compliments but when i look back at the pictures it reveals all of the unwanted rolls and curves. :(
Not a terrible dress but I chose another option for my bridesmaid dress. The stomach was baggy.

links_reviews_title: Accentuated my curves! Loved the quality material and lovely color.
links_reviews_text: Dress was a little big in bust (I am 32B) but it wasn't an issue! It definitely dragged the ground, and I will say it is a bit unforgiving in the tummy area. BUT OVERALL I LOVED IT!!!!! It hugged my curves and made my butt look awesome! I felt like a goddess!! Material was sooo quality-nice and thick but not hot. And cutouts In back were super cute! Definitely will rent from here again!

links_reviews_title: So much fun to dance in!
links_reviews_text: A littke loose! So much fun!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my event.... Elegant, comfortable & just enough sexiness
links_reviews_text: This was my first RTR rental. I was perfectly pleased with the entire process as well as the dress. I rented both the 2R and 0R. The 2R was way too baggy on my stomach and silhouette. I usually am a 2, but this 0R fit me perfectly. The fabric is soft, high-quality and thick (without being heavy). There is no stretch to the dress (not that it needed it ). I loved how the gown hugged my curves without being overly sexy. It did show some cleavage (which I wanted lol) Even so, ALL the older women and men at the event continuously complimented my dress and figure in it....so it must have just been classy enough.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to my office holiday party at a fancy hotel! Gorgeous and fun to dance in.
links_reviews_text: Wonderful weight to the material, but definitely shows lines of undergarments and the open panels in the back meant I had to go braless. It was long on me, even with platform heels, but thankfully not by too much. Altogether, a lovely dress and perfect for the occasion. Paired it with silver shoes, handbag, and necklace.

links_reviews_title: This dress was ordered as a maid of honor gown. I absolutely loved it. Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I was dieting at the time and wore the 2r but I could have been a 0. I had a 4r as backup. Loved it but wished it was one size smaller as I lost my curves. Would love to wear it again. Very comfy and great in pics. Weight at the time was about 130lbs, 5'7. (Not curvy then)

links_reviews_title: Felt like a woman - Compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect! I wore it to a scholarship fundraising gala where formal attire was required. Very comfortable slightly stretchy fabric hugged my curves. The neckline is a deep v, I had to where a backless strapless plunge sticky bra and it worked perfectly. I'm a C cup and found the straps to be just a tad too long, forcing me to pull the dress down and expose more cleavage. The length was perfect with 4" heels, I'm 5'2", and the high low hem in the front made it easy to walk and dance. Hubby was all over me, and I caught some other men looking too ;-) Would definitely buy!

links_reviews_title: GORGEOUS!!! Did not want to take it off!
links_reviews_text: So incredibly flattering. Lots of stretch. Size 4 would have been too big, so I went with the 2 as most people said this dress ran big. I received so many compliments in this dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, fun, easy dress - a little unforgiving!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, very comfortable and easy to dance in - just wish I had a pair of spanx to help smooth things out! Sometimes worried about underwear lines, but still felt wonderful in it.

links_reviews_title: Worn for family photos, so beautiful that I didn't want to send it back!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, I loved the fabric!!! Worn for family photos and it photographed beautifully. Fit like a dream, I am 42-32-43 and the 12 fit perfectly. Difficult to wear a bra because of the straps in the back, but with a backless/strapless bra it works perfectly.
This dress fit true to size and is very comfortable.
I am trying dresses early and loved this dress, but it's way too long even in 4" platforms. Will return and hope they have it in petite.

I loved this dress! It flattered my figure sand made me feel beautiful. I was able to pick any pink dress that I wanted to wear for the wedding I was in and the color complimented the other dresses perfectly. The only things I would point out are that the dress is very long so plan to wear heels. Also, it's tight so wear spanx if you are self conscious of your stomach area. The back is also open so I wore one of those backless stick on bras and it worked great. Other than that I was in love with this dress!

Loved this dress so much, especially the unique back. At 5'5" I'm a bit short for floor length dresses from RtR (my last maxi dress was under my feet all day even with huge wedges on) but the asymmetrical bottom of this dress made it perfect for my height. My shoes peeked out, not too much of my leg showed, and I didn't step on the dress all night even after I changed into flats. The color was the perfect blush pink to match the other bridesmaids whose dresses were a combination of other RtR dresses and purchased from bridal shops. I wanted to keep this dress on all night!

links_reviews_title: It was comfortable and I got a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: It was definitely long (wore with 3-inch heels) and bigger around my torso (as per other reviews), it's not forgiving, but I'm more slender and more athletically built so it was perfect for me. (AKA couldn't wear undies, but spanks would work.) For me it fit great and I felt awesome in it! Danced all night!

My boyfriend was invited to a summer wedding and I wore this as his plus one. Great dress! Stretchy material. I could have worn a shapewear to keep my tommy in a little better. The skirt is fantastic! Love wearing these skirts to dance!

This dress was a showstopper! I wore it as a bridesmaids dress in my best friend's wedding and I have never felt sexier in my life. The dress runs true to size for bridal (i.e... one size up from normal dress wear) but is very stretchy! With that said, it's unforgiving.... shapewear is a must if you don't want to see every single thing. If I had to choose a downside, it would be the bra situation. I had a cross back which worked, but not perfectly... the back cuts down too low for a true strapless so you just have to compromise. I am a 32DDD and had plenty of room up top. So with that said, probably not ideal for anyone below a C cup. Last thing, I got regular length and it worked perfectly with 4 inch heels with me standing 5'5".

Such a great dress! I'm 5'4'' and curvy- this dress is a high quality, slightly stretchy material, so it has a little bit of give, but not much. I have a smaller waste with wider hips and a decent sized cup size and this dress hugged me in all the right places and was comfortable when standing and sitting. It is kinda heavy though, so definitely recommend for an indoor event. I wore 2.5-3 inch wedges and didn't have much (if any) of the dress dragging. Got tons of compliments, thanks RTR!

I felt like a million bucks in this dress and everyone commented on how beautiful it was. It really is a stunner. Elegant and a little sexy, Hollywood glamour style. I am between sizes 4 and 6 usually and even though I have DDD cup there was still a little room in the bust area in the size 4, so I would say the fit runs a little big. I managed to make a low backed bra work instead of the stick on type, which was great. The length was perfect with 4"heels (I'm 5'6") the ends did not drag on the ground and it hit perfectly even when I kicked my shoes off to dance. It's going to be very difficult to part with this dress, I'd love to keep it.

This dress was perfect for a bridesmaid dress. I have a bigger chest and did not need to wear a bra. Only flaws were that it is super long, even with 3 inch heels. Also spanx are a MUST, you can see everything. Lastly, if you're self conscious about your midsection at all, I would not suggest this dress. However in the end I felt great!

This dress was everything! From the fit to the feel to the fabric to how it photographed, I couldn't have been happier. Rented this as a bridesmaid dress - risky I know - but the color was spot on. My girlfriend who got married was blown away as well by how perfect the dress truly was. I went with the 4Long because I am taller - 5'9"- and wore 3" heels. Super comfy great for dancing in. No complaints and so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: This dress was so fun to wear! Big hit. Everyone loved it. Thanks RTR :)
links_reviews_text: Finding a bra is tricky because of the back. I wore the stick-to-your-boobs solution which wasn't great. Also, Spanx was a must!

This was a backup dress I picked up from the George Town location in D.C.. It was a little lone for my 5ft frame but I made it work with some 5in heels. I had to wear spanx to smooth things out a bit and in hind site I would have wore pasties instead of messing with a strapless all night. HOWEVER, this dress ended up being stunning and I did received a ton of complements.
Wore this dress for our formal look during our engagement photo shoot. The dress was stunning and fit perfectly! Would rent it again for a black tie event!

Loved this dress so much more in person than I did online. Wore it to a ball I was invited to by a friend and everybody in my group got their dresses from RTR. I rented a size 2R & 4R for backup. I ended up wearing the 2R and it fit perfectly! The top was a little lose but fit better once I put on my sticky bra. Very fitted around the butt (mine is large haha) and a little lose around my slimmer waist but overall very flattering. Would definitely recommend a higher heel.. mine were about 4 inches and the dress did touch the ground a little (I am 5'5").

I needed a last minute blush pink bridesmaid's dress after the dress I originally purchased did not work out. This was sooo comfortable, and the fabric was both stretchy and heavy enough to smooth things over. I didn't feel too exposed on top, which I sometimes have to worry about. The length was also great (I'm 5'7" and wore 3.75" heels) and the high-low cut was nice, since I didn't have to worry about tripping on any fabric in the front of the dress. Bonus - it covered up my terrible sports bra tanlines perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Was a beautiful color & was so flattering! Loved it
links_reviews_text: For busty women Im 5'2 & it was a little long w my heels Form fitting

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and flattering, lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly for me. I wore it to a March wedding in Raleigh, NC, about 50 degrees. I'd say this is an all-weather dress, though may be a tad heavy for a hot summer day. I was able to wear a regular t-shirt bra which added to the comfort of the dress. I opted to wear tights which were fine under the sequins. The little cap sleeve was perfect, and not too tight so I was able to lift my arms easily. Colorwise: The only "concern" is that it is tough to see the blue to black ombre in photos, and it is a bit more on the navy side than the bright royal blue you see in the photo, but still vibrant and sparkly!

links_reviews_title: The dress was comfortable, fit well, and looked great! It was so easy.
links_reviews_text: Since I'm 5'1", the dress ran to just past my knees, but with high heels, it still looked great. I'm a bit thick waisted, but this was very roomy. I'd probably wear a 4 at my target weight. This cut was very forgiving.

Normally wear size 6 or 8 petite in dresses. Petite wasn’t an option for this dress and after I read the reviews that it ran large I opted for a 6 and 4. The 6 was too big in the top (could see my bra and also bunched in the back). The 4 for perfect! I didn’t even need to wear Spanx because the dress flared at the right spots. Was happy to wear a regular bra too. Loved the pockets! Only down side was the sequins kinda dug into my leg when I sat for longer than 20 minutes, but not terrible. Received so many compliments! I’m 5’2” and 155 pounds with 32d bra.
The dress fit like a glove. There was a Littleton cleavage than I am normally comfortable with, but I received lots of compliments. I was very happy with this dress.
Great for curves. I could wear my favorite, supportive bra easily. Perfect length for me.

I went a size down as most people said it ran large. I would've been slightly more comfortable in the 6, but the 4 worked ok. I loved the color and got tons of compliments. Was also very comfortable -- nothing hanging out or riding up!
A little long for a petite, but lovely, nonethless...
Lots of space for my 7m bump. Didn't get itchy at all. Kept forgetting about the awesome pockets!!

links_reviews_title: This dress is very comfortable! The sparkles get a lot of attention.
links_reviews_text: The chest is a little bit big. If you have cleavage, great! If you don't, it will look a little loose.

links_reviews_title: It does run a tad big and is a little itchy around the arms like all reviews
links_reviews_text: I read so many reviews about this dress and went back and forth on what size to get. Ultimately ended up going with my normal size and ya it was a little big but I'd rather it be slightly big and fit than be too small and not fit when I needed it for an event. If I had prepped better I would have ordered two sizes, normal and one size down which I would recommend. And yes it does rub the arms a bit but it's nothing you can't handle. Worth it for how cute the dress is.
Loved the color and ombré look. I thought the glitter may be itchy, but it didn't bother me. I felt very pretty and festive!
Great fit, the sequins are perfect and subtle enough..... not too bold. I LOVED everything about it. It made my evening!!

This dress fits very well and it's really cute. I didn't end up wearing it to my event because I wore a different rental but I did love this one and it was a close second! Very forgiving dress with just the right amount of skin showing

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, comfortable dress with endless compliments!
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to my company holiday party (cocktail attire). The fit was amazing! I received compliments all night from people about how "unique" the dress was since most sequin dresses are sheath and one color. I wanted to keep it! I am busty (36DDD) but I don't mind showing cleavage. That was the main reason I wore the 10. Love love love this dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: Beautiful but a bit itchy. Lots of compliments
I wore this dress to a wedding on July 4. It was the perfect color blue. I got so many compliments on this dress. It was very comfortable too!

links_reviews_title: The sparkle really make this dress!
links_reviews_text: I received compliments all night! This dress is super comfy and fits true tot size/a little big. I fit in the 14 but worn the 16 for comfort. I have a large bust area and this dress showed the girls off perfectly!

links_reviews_title: Very flattering, sequins can be irritating
links_reviews_text: Glad I rented this! I felt very glamorous, appropriate for a NYC evening wedding, and I'm still receiving compliments. It was super flattering! I'm glad I had multiple sizes, as I usually would be an 8 with a 10 for backup, but the 6 fit perfectly. The sequins could be a bit irritating under the arms when dancing, FYI. Also, if cleavage isn't your thing, be aware that it's very low cut. It was really flattering on me but I know some more modest folks might not like it! Definitely size down.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much, I bought one for myself!
links_reviews_text: Fantastic dress! I am normally a 12, but the 10 was a perfect fit. Just the right amount of bling for a family wedding. The sequins do scratch a bit under the arms, but not so much to be unbearable when I was out on the dance floor. Paired it with sparkly black heels and jewelry for a look that got tons of compliments!
I received tons of compliments in this dress. I felt confident and comfortable. I love this dress specifically because it hid my post baby bump. I was a hit at the wedding! <3

links_reviews_title: Everyone at the bridal shower gave me compliments on this dress. It's so sparkly and flattering!
links_reviews_text: Normally I'm a size 14, but RTR only had a size 16 in stock, so I took a chance on it. The fit was perfect. I was worried the dress would show too much cleavage (bra size 42G) but to my surprise it didn't. Loved the pockets on the dress! My only complaint was that the sequins were a little scratchy around my arms but nothing too bad.

runs large like everyone else said. usually an 18 but the 16 fit perfectly. I loved that I could wear a regular bra with it. I ended up not wearing it only because I felt self conscious about the length. it's not a short dress, well below the high school fingertip rule, but I rarely wear dresses or show my legs at all, so it was just a lot for me for a daytime event. would 100% rent again to take it out on the town!

links_reviews_title: While officiating a wedding, this dress was the cherry on top.
links_reviews_text: I was asked to officiate a wedding so I knew for pictures I wanted something that would make me look great and stand out but of course, not outshine the bride. This dress did just that. The dark color mixed with all the sparkles was the perfect combination. I received so many compliments not only on my wedding script but the dress as well. The best part of this dress was the comfort and pockets! The sparkles on the neck caught in my hair a little bit and itched under my arms when hit at certain angle but no where bear enough to ruin an amazing wedding and not make me want to rent again.

links_reviews_title: POCKETS!!! It was so nice not having to worry about a purse/bag/clutch!
links_reviews_text: Fit - true to size Sequins did irritate underarms & was scratchy for my daughter when she became tired at the end of the night & wanted to snuggle.

This dress runs a bit a big. When I tried it on the sequins felt a bit scratchy under my arms but I didn't notice after I put it on for the event. I also was able to wear a normal bra with it which was a awesome perk!!
I loved this dress! Not too low cut, not too short, but still flattering. It was comfortable and fit well. It's nice for dancing because it's easy to move around in

links_reviews_title: I wore the dress to a wedding at an aquarium! It was perfect for this event!
links_reviews_text: The dress it like a glove! I have never had so many compliments on a dress! I ordered the 22 which was too big so thankfully I had the 20 as my back up dress! The only down side was the sequence under the arm made me kinda sore from dancing all night. I can’t wait for my next big event!
This dress was so perfect for the Vegas wedding I attended. The dress does run big, So size down if possible. It was the perfect length, cleavage and arm coverage for the Vegas heat! Great rent.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit great! Discovered it has pockets! Many many compliments. Previous reviews said scratching under arms, but it wasn't that bad. Tolerable for sure.

links_reviews_title: LOVED this dress, so fancy, so comfortable, so gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: I love Badgley Mischka and this dress did not disappoint. I LOVED it. I rented it for a formal work gala and I adored how sparkly it was. I seriously got compliments on it all night long! It was super comfortable and super flattering, simply amazing. Highly highly recommend! And for any expecting mamas out there, I wore this dress when I was 23 weeks pregnant and it worked perfectly! I normally wear an 8-10, and ordered a 12. I think I still would have fit into a 10 but the 12 was very comfortable without being too loose.

Loved this dress! I followed the reviews and sized down for my backup size, and I'm glad I did. The size 8 is the size I ended up going with. It was very flattering...and it has pockets! Great party dress.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a book launch cocktail party in NYC and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: This dress was AHMAZING. It was form fitting in all the right spots and loose in all the right spots. I am already trying to figure out when and where I can wear it again! :) I am a true Size 14 in most dresses, and the top was a bit loose. I could have worn the backup size 12, but it was a tad too snug around my chest, and my sister convinced me to opt for the more comfortable one. Glad I did! It was SO comfortable. Going with the looser option, I didn't have the issue that other people had with sequins rubbing underneath my arms. The length was great. If your biggest problem is your tummy and you have a curvy athletic build, this is the perfect dress IMO. My first time using RTR and I'm hooked!

My friend and I rented this dress for a charity dance competition and it was {almost} perfect...gorgeous, comfortable, and it has pockets! The only reason I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars is because the sequins scratched our arms all night.

This dress gave me a ton of confidence attending an event solo where I knew nobody. I got lots of compliments throughout the night from men and women. Also loved that I didn't have to carry a pursue, pockets FTW!

This dress fit pretty true to size. I felt really wonderful in it, my only complaint was that the sequins were a bit scratchy under the arms and by the end of the night I definitely wanted to take it off.
The dress was fabulous! Compliments from strangers all night. Didn't take much to accessorize. Cleavage fit well. Thick material. This was the second time I rented it!!

Loved this dress. The zipper was hard to work like every RTR dress I've tried, and the sequins were a little scratchy under my arms but after a few hours I didn't notice anymore. Love that you can wear a regular bra and love love love the pockets!

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress!! Went formal with a country flair!
links_reviews_text: Runs big. All the reviews said to order a size smaller I ordered my typical 4 with a 2 backup and the 2 fit amazing! I received sooo many compliments on my dress! It was stunning, if I say so myself! This was my first experience and I will definitely rent again!! I've told everyone I know about it too!!
Such a fun dress! It's lightweight, not itchy at all and it moves. Extra bonus- pickets! So many compliments on this dress. Do it!

links_reviews_title: I wanted something sparkly for a wedding in downtown Chicago and this fit the bill perfectly!
links_reviews_text: After reading the reviews I was afraid the dress would be too low cut to wear a bra so I was pleasantly surprised that no special undergarments were necessary. Got compliments on it all night! Definitely would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Dress ran true to size, very comfortable and flattering

links_reviews_text: This was a perfect length for me ( 5' 4") with about a 2 inch heel.

links_reviews_title: I got to pose on the red carpet feeling great about the way I looked
links_reviews_text: The dress was so comfortable and the bust was stitched in such a way that I could go without a bra. It made my life so easy. It was sexy yet classic. Loved it

I was told I looked like I should be at the Golden Globes. 🥰 This dress fit true to size, definitely best if you have a bigger chest, because it allows for the cups to be filled properly with a subtle amount of under-boob. I definitely felt sexy and walked around feeling confident and ready for anything.

This dress was simply beautiful. Very flattering and comfortable to move in. I am about 5'8" and it was just hitting the floor without heels on, so I did have to wear a mini heel. Other than that, it was gorgeous, comfortable, and kept me out on the dance floor all night!

This dress was beautiful! It fit very well, was extremely flattering, and was easy to wear. I felt comfortable and confident walking around all night in it. I ordered the long, and it was still surprisingly short for a long, I could only wear a small heel. But overall, it was a beautiful and comfortable gown, I would recommend!
This dress is so very flattering! Fit me so well and was perfect for my black tie event. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Love the dress, but not made for those with small chests
links_reviews_text: The reviews before me are all correct, amazing dress (thick fabric) for a cold weather affair but the fit was off for my shape. I am pear shaped so the 6 fit my hips to perfection but was very large on my chest. I had to end up cutting a stick on bra so I could have extra padding without the strap showing through the cut out. Not ideal but it worked. I am 5'5 and wore 1 inch kitten heels and the 6L was almost too short.

links_reviews_title: All the pieces I rented from RTR were beautiful together.
links_reviews_text: I am a size 6/8 or medium in everyday clothing and will normally size up to 10 or large when it comes to gowns (depending on maker). This gown was very elegant and flattering. The front cutout along with the open back gave just enough sexy to still be classy. I would order this again.
This dress was worn for a black tie wedding in Chicago during August. It was very flattering. I usually wear a 2 and i wore a 2 here. It fit well!
Comfortable, easy to dance in. A little large in the chest. Would recommend

I absolutely loved this dress. Definitely recommend getting the Long if you're 5'7 or taller. It fit well, was thick enough that a bra wasn't necessary, and was fancy for a wedding with just enough fun features (neckline, open back) to feel edgy. Got so many compliments!
Dress around bust area was bizarre and not super flattering on me (I'm small chested). Overall made me feel good but wasn't my favorite dress I've ever worn.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful classic with a twist black dress
links_reviews_text: Show stopper #glamorous dress for a NYE wedding. Did not wear a bra but could wear a sticky cup bra if needed.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a black tie wedding.
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly and was comfortable. I'm 5'4. I rented the regular and it was a little long with tall heels.

links_reviews_title: Loved the way I felt in this dress! So comfortable and figure flattering!
links_reviews_text: The only tricky thing about this dress is that I couldn't wear a bra. I tried the adhesive bra cups but they showed either in the keyhole or on the sides. The cups are padded so there is no concern there but I did have to adjust the girls a bit.
Fit true to size and looked great!!

links_reviews_title: This dress is sexy! I felt good in it and got a lot of compliments
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly other than it was a bit too long.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel classy and sexy.
links_reviews_text: It was comfortable to move, walk and eat. Perfect for the red carpet

This dress was my first choice and I was so disappointed! First of all the material felt like a tablecloth. It looked more like a prom dress than a black tie gown. The way the bust is constructed there are these weird darts ABOVE the nipple line...which my breasts sit pretty high so on someone who has lower breasts this would be an even bigger issue. It also ran large, I'm usually a 2/4 and def would have needed the 4.

links_reviews_title: This was not the original dress I wanted, but I was able to get this as a replacement rather quickly
links_reviews_text: This is a very nice dress, but I feel like it would be so much better if it were a bit more fitting. I'm a 4-6 and I felt like I could have gotten away with a 2! The peek-a-book cut-out was very sexy, but I think it would be better on a woman who is more endowed! I did receive a lot of compliments, which I think makes the dress a winner. I just wanted more va-voom! However, Rent the Runway's phenomenal customer service and willingness to get me another dress so soon was truly appreciated!

links_reviews_title: Very simple and classic... great dress!
links_reviews_text: This was one of the most comfortable dresses I've worn! It fit great and so flattering. I usually have to wear a bra with a dress but this one was wonderful and held me in perfectly! Added a fun earring to help it pop and got lots of compliments.

I didn't feel like this dress did anything to flatter my shape. RTR sent this to me as a backup dress. I would have felt comfortable wearing it without a bra. Considering it was a long, I was surprised that I would have had to wear flats. I just didn't feel like the dress looked that good on me.

links_reviews_title: Runs big in the chest and stomach
links_reviews_text: Didn't get to wear it because it was a bit too big. I'm usually a 4.

This dress was a backup option I ordered and returned. It was simply way too short, even though I ordered the long. The fabric was thick, but not quite as elegant as I imagined it would be. Would have been a great dress if I was just two inches shorter!

I'm 5'4" and typically wear a 6, so I thought it ran a bit big. I was also surprised that I was able to wear the 4L without it dragging, but with 3-4inch heels it was perfect. It was a comfortable fit, but I was a little self-conscious about showing "under cleavage"... I wish I would have bought some fashion tape.

I wore this to a black tie optional gala. This dress is made of quality thick material, is easy to dance in, is extremely comfortable, and looks nice. It's sexy but still conservative. My main priority for dresses are that they are flattering in the stomach area - without shapewear, I didn't feel self-conscious about my stomach. I give it an 8/10 on the flattering scale. The top fit well - I didn't need a bra and think the top would also fit well if you have a bigger chest (C-DD). The dress was very short - it wasn't even long enough with flats. For reference, I'm 5' 10, about 145 lbs , B cup. If the length isn't an issue for you then definitely rent this dress!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a romantic NYE dinner date with my boyfriend and now we're engaged!
links_reviews_text: This dress showed off my hourglass shape. It was perfectly form fitting on top, showcasing my narrow waist, while flowing easily over my hips. I also love that it has an open back. Classy but still romantic and sexy. Absolutely loved it!

I wore this to a black tie wedding, with accessories also from RTR. I really liked the fit and cut of this dress. I labeled it as true to size, but I would say it's a little on the forgiving side- I'm a bit heavier than usual and I'm wearing between a 6 and 8 in other dresses, and the 6R fit me very well. This skimmed over what other dresses made look not-so-great, and I did choose to wear a pair of Spanx shorts underneath, though it looked fine without. I didn't wear any sort of bra apparatus as I've tried sticky bras, tape, etc before and always tore them off mid-event in frustration. This dress, despite the 'boob window' as my boyfriend deemed it, didn't show off much unless you were looking in from below, to the side. People with larger chests may have different results. (I'm a 32DDD which sounds big but really isn't.) I was able to easily move about and dance, which I really liked. I am 5'3" and wore 3.5" heels and the dress just swept the floor. IMO it was a bit shorter than other 'regular' length dresses I've gotten from RTR but that worked in my favor. Girls 5'5"+ may want lower heels or to try the Long.

This dress was the back up style that I ordered. It fit great, but was a tiny bit large in the bust. Ultimately, I did not choose this dress for my event because I liked the other one better. However, it was a beautiful dress!

links_reviews_title: What a head turner this dress is!!!
links_reviews_text: A stunning glamorous beauty this dress is! I wish I had a pic of the open back. I'm 5'7 135lbs and I ordered this dress in my usual size 4. I wore it to a formal night while my husband and I celebrated our first year wedding anniversary aboard Royal Caribbean's Harmony of the Seas. Formal night was a blast and this dress was just gorgeous!!!! My hubby loved this dress on me so much and couldn't stop looking at me all night. I just may have to buy this dress. Hands down would recommend and if I don't buy it I'm def renting this again!!! #oneofmyfavrentals #formalnight

It wasn't a true 6L/tall. It was barely long enough when I wore heels. The top was gappy so I had to stuff it w/bra pads haha. The 8L was long enough but was too big. I got a TON of compliments on it as it shows off a toned upper body really nicely. ;) I would wear it again if it was a TRUE tall size.
