This was the first dress I ever rented and I loved it. This dress fits like a glove with some good tight support underneath. I received a lot of compliments on this dress. I was able to dance a lot in this dress and not feel restricted.

Beautiful dress! Just have to be careful if you're large chested. Also, I got the Long and it still wasn't very long on me (5'10"; 170 lbs) Im a 34DD and what seemed to be a 'peek-boo' opening turned me into looking like a stripper. Lottttts of underboob showing. What I ended up doing was buying some slightly see through fabric from Joann and putting over that opening using double-sided tape. With that done, I absolutely loved this dress and didn't want to take I️t off.

This dress fit perfectly! I usually wear a size 6 and ordered both a 6 and a 4 and ended up wearing the 4 as I felt that it fit more snug in the bust to help support since I opted to not wear a bra. I wore 4 inch heels and I am 5'4 and the dress length was perfect. The material was so nice and did not even need steaming when I took it out of the arrival pouch. I will definitely rent this dress again!
This dress made me feel so beautiful. So comfortable & fit like a glove. Days later, & I'm still getting compliments!
I found it to be supportive in the front and comfortably looser. Normally a 12 would be tight on me and this dress fit great!

Incredibly comfortable fit, with plenty of room for dancing, eating, and drinking. I'm a 34D and was able to go braless with petals thanks to the thicker fabric. At 5'9" 160 lbs with an athletic build, and this fit very true to size!

I never in a million years thought I'd be able to wear a backless dress because I'm bigger up top, but to my amazement I was able to get away with wearing this dress without a bra AND feel comfortable in it! I did put a little fashion tape by the cutout because I was paranoid about the girls slipping out of place but I don't think it was really necessary. Love love love this dress!

This dress was my first RTR rental and I am now HOOKED. The quality and fit of this dress is incredible. I'm only 5'3", so I was worried about this being too long for me, even in heels (as dresses typically are), but it fell perfectly and was a hit all night. The backless feature is stunning and the detail of the criss-cross neckline and front keyhole is so flattering. As a 34B, I felt that the chest was a little roomy, but definitely not anything noticeable to anyone else. I didn't find it possible to wear a strapless bra or "sticky-boobs" with this, because of the way the arms are angled in, but also didn't find it very necessary. 10/10 would recommend this dress for any formal occasion!!
Amazing dress, simple but the cut makes it stand out! Will rent again
Sexy, comfortable, amazing! Its simple but that high hem gives lots of leg and the the halter is a nice touch. Love this enough to probably buy!
Loved this dress! Conservative on top with fun high cut leg on the bottom. Fits like a glove, true to size. Well made and in great condition.
Gorgeous in a subtle way

You have to rent this for yourself! I felt amazing in it, was able to move but still felt all slimmed out and curvy. I received tons of compliments and would absolutely rent again or even buy. I rented the 6 and 8; both fit, but I went with the 8 to have more wiggle room in Vegas. LOVED THIS DRESS!

links_reviews_title: Dress fit Perfect so comfortable . Danced the night away ....Received compliments all night long.
links_reviews_text: #sexy #fitlikeaglove #hugseverycurve
Wore this to the club for a bachelorette party in Hawaii in mid April, felt very comfortable the whole night. Didn't need to fidget with it at all.
Great fit - got plenty of compliments and was super comfortable! Was able to dance the night away.

I would buy this dress in a heartbeat if I could! So flattering and the slit gives it just enough spice. I was receiving compliments all night! The 6 fit, but the structured hip didn't seem to quite line up for me. The 8 fit perfectly, form fitting but not too tight. I will definitely be renting this again Also, props to customer service - I originally ordered a different dress but it got lost in the mail. RTR was able to overnight me a replacement that arrived before 11am. Very impressed!
Can't say the material was my favorite but it looked amazing and was super flattering. Love this LBD!
It fit like a glove! I got a ton of compliments !

One of the best items I've received from RTR!!! I'm 8 and sometimes a 10. I have a big tush so I tend to fluctuate in size. I got the 10 based on the reviews and I'm happy I did. The 8 would have been too small for the bottom. Anyhow, the dress is stunning; I received compliments all night! definitely a Winner.

links_reviews_title: Amazing! Classy w/ a touch of sexy
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress!!! I got SO many complements. I am 5'7, 170, 38D, athletic build (I do Olympic lifting so I'm not a small gal), thick thighs, ample tush, broad shoulders, slight tummy pudge in lower abdomen and some lose skin from birth & weight loss. I normally wear size 10 in Jcrew, anthropology & 8 in Loft. This dress fit true to size. The material had some stretch to it and the fabric was thick so it hid the issues I have with my lower stomach. I did not need any spanxs! This dress holds everything all in and smoothly! The slit came to my mid thigh and was just enough to give this classy dress a bit of sexiness to it. I love it so much I def will wear again! I just may buy it.
I'm so happy I took the leap of faith. I was nervous because of how short I am, but it was an amazing pick and I received so many compliments

WOW this was the first time I had ever rented from RTR but this was the best experience ever. I will definitely be renting this dress again...so many compliments all night! The fabric was thick but a bit stretchy and the shape was so flattering. I was even able to wear a regular bra with it, which is a huge plus! Tempted to purchase this from another website because I would wear this over and over again...you can definitely dress it up or down depending on the event; the right amount of sexy but classy at the same time

links_reviews_title: I received a ridiculous amount of compliments of this dress. I may actually buy it. Crazy sexy!
links_reviews_text: It was sexy and classy all at the same time. Hugged my figure. Best dress I've ever rented. I may try and buy it. The compliments were endless! It's a snug fit and the slit is high, but it was perfect for me.

Dress was very comfortable. It had stretch to it. I was able to wear a regular bra with it but with the straps crossing my chest. The length was fine even with my short 5' stature. It hit my curves perfectly. Would love to own this one.

Excuse the crazy picture.. lol. This dress was amazing! Loved it so much I almost purchased it! Such a nice form fitting dress with a nice combination of classy but still sexy! Would definitely rent again

A friend of mine wore this dress to my wedding and I loved it so I decided to rent for the next wedding we went to. She's much taller than me so I was nervous about the longer piece but the shorter side really balances it out. It was also extremely comfortable. If I could buy I would!
Hot dress! I loved it but the slit goes up high so things like getting out of the car can be a little difficult.

links_reviews_title: The cut was amazing!!! And the leg! Loved it. Fit like a glove. Size 0/2 55-year-old
links_reviews_text: Perfect!

links_reviews_title: Felt like a Bond girl. So sexy and easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: Size 2 was perfect for my small bust and athletic body -- I felt like it hugged some curves but left plenty of room for dancing and moving. The slit is soooo sexy-classy. Would rent this dress again 3000 times over.
This dress got lots of compliments at the studio 54 NYE party. I was on the fence but the fit was good, minus a little bunching in back. The sizing is accurate as well.
I loved this dress it was elegant and comfy and the exposed leg had a hint of sexy without being too much

links_reviews_title: The dress just makes you feel like a bombshell
links_reviews_text: The bust was a little big on me But overall the dress was true to size. It's the perfect blend of black tie and formal wear.
Great dress! Only negative for me was that the back gaped a bit. Didn't end up wearing due to a change of plans but would have been great!

I LOVED this dress!! I rented both the 6 and 8 and they both fit great. The 6 fit better on top as the shoulders were a little loose with the 8. If you have a bigger chest, I would suggest sizing up for your backup for that reason. I am typically a 6 so I would say it's true to size. I have long legs, large hips and a bigger "behind" so the slit was definitely high but not so much that I was exposing anything and I still had no trouble sitting. I can't wait for a reason to get this dress in red!
Loved wearing this dress!! The slit was so fun. Flattering on my curves.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress and the material!
links_reviews_text: Dress was perfect! Loved everything about it. Fit was a tad too big around waist and hips area but not noticeably. I would def wear it again!

I loved this dress so much, i'm considering renting it again to purchase. The fabric is lined and thick but not too thick that it can't be worn in warm weather. It was form fitting on my curvy size 12 body. I loved the short to long, but is definitely short on the cut side when sitting down but not uncomfortably so. I wore another night with a black leather jacket, could be dressed up or down.

links_reviews_title: No awkward adjusting, fits perfect and comfortable
links_reviews_text: I'm usually between a 6 and 8. The 8 fit perfect not too small or too loose. Love the length and the one leg slit. Received many compliments and told them I wish I could've kept it! Highly recommend if you're looking for a comfortable little black dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fit with a sexy leg
links_reviews_text: This dress was gorgeous. High neck with sexy leg to show. Looks great on athletic body. I wanted to keep the dress. Received many compliments. I'm still in my postpartum body, it hid my stomach well and showed off the rest.

links_reviews_title: The rental process was so easy and the stylists were super helpful!
links_reviews_text: This dress runs large so I sized down from a size 2. I'm so glad I did! The 0 fit perfectly. I tend to have a short but athletic build with a little more curve in my hips. It fit both top and bottom and didn't make me look short (like many longer dresses do). The cut out was fun and flirty but the dress was still conservative enough for a cocktail formal wedding!

links_reviews_title: This dress was amazing. It made me feel beautiful. I would buy it if I could in a heart beat!!
links_reviews_text: Fit was a lil big in the stomach area, but it still looked great!
I got so many compliments on this dress! Fit great and ran true to size. #CharityGala

This dress fits true to size (if between sizes I would go for the smaller) the longer hem and high neck fit is sophisticated, yet the high slit is just enough sexy! Little to no jewelry is needed & the liner is nice and heavy that no bra is necessary. I received many many compliments in this dress!! #sexysophisticated #littleblackdress #lbd

links_reviews_title: The back up size to find the perfect fit!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly and was so flattering! It was true to its size, super comfortable fabric, and just the right amount of sexy!! It wasn't skin tight, it was a nice stretchy quality material that hugged the right places. This dress was just right for celebrating my birthday and made me feel beautiful. Will definitely look for this designer in the future.

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved the cut of the dress and it fit perfectly!
links_reviews_text: Get this dress! Amazing fit. Very slimming!
I absolutely loved this dress. It was so comfortable and flattering. I would wear it over and over again.
Love this dress! It was so comfortable and great quality. I got a lot of compliments. I sized down for this designer but luckily I already knew that when ordering the dress.
Beautiful dress, I am always a 2 but was a 4 in this dress (especially for a work event). However, the 4 seemed too big. I will rent again in a 2 for a non-work event.
Runs small through the arms and is short. Great for a rental. Wouldn't rent again, but glad I did the once :)

True to other reviews, the lace arms are very tight and I had to size up to the 6. Thankfully the arms fit because the dress was so cute and comfortable, although I wish it fitted better in the body, (as I'm sure the 4 would of fit, had i of been able to get my arms into the sleeves). I'm 5'4", and it was short for the event that I was attending, so I wore with black nylons.
Fit perfectly, no need for a bra and no issue with coverage, actually comfortable!
The fit is a little snug thru the arms but other than that, perfect fit!
Enjoyed the style and size.

This dress was adorable and flattering but the arms kept me trapped like a vice. After debating back and forth I ended up deciding against wearing it out because I wouldn't have been able to do what I had to do at work, which was so frustrating because it's so cute.
As others mentioned the sleeves have no stretch so while it is really chic... there is no range of motion.

links_reviews_title: Not your cookie cutter cocktail dress
links_reviews_text: This dress is so pretty, very feminine with the ruffles and lace but still understated. It runs fairly small (the lace in the sleeves has no stretch) which was actually fine and ended up being more comfortable than I thought. If you're looking for a nice cocktail dress that's fun and unique I highly recommend!
I loved the dress, the lace was uncredible.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments! Not made for athletic body types.
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a rehearsal dinner- the dress was beautiful, looks great in photos, and i received a ton of photographs. The dress however is NOT made for athletic body types. There is no stretch at all in the arms. I could not get the size 4 past my biceps. I was able to wear the 6, however it was very large in the body. I was still extremely constricted in the arms and shoulders. Bottom line, beautiful dress but only functional if you have a slender upper body.

At first I had passed over this dress online, but I happened to fall in love with it when I tried it on at the store! It's more form-fitting than it looks online (in a good way). They only had the 4 in store so don't know if the smaller size would have worked too, but generally Nicholas runs a little small so I'd recommend sizing up.

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit throughout the body. I actually could have sized down to a size 4.
links_reviews_text: The lace neck and sleeves made sizing down impossible. I’m lucky I have relatively small arms or I’d be in trouble. The body of the dress is super flattering and I loved the bottom ruffle.

links_reviews_title: If you need to YMCA, don't get this dress LOL
links_reviews_text: This dress is SO cute......I read other reviews and sized up to a 4, I can see why you need to size up....you cannot lift your hands above your head LOL So, make sure your hair is done, and have someone ready to zip you.....and don't go to an event where you need to YMCA or do the wave, because you won't be able to. I struggled to even take a selfie in it LOL. Sizing up definitely makes the waist bulkier, I just wish this was a better fit because it's adorable. :)
This dress is gorgeous with lots of pretty details but the lace sleeves are very, very tight. I'm a true 0 or XS and this dress barely zipped.

links_reviews_title: This dress was amazing, Great with a nude heal and a great pair of statement earrings!
links_reviews_text: RTR STYLIST REVIEW I loved this dress! I wore a size 8. I would recommend sizing up for a back up size due to the long sleeves and high neck, it's always good to have a little more room in those areas. However, there was a lot of room in the bust/midsection area. It was very comfortable throughout . I am 5'3" and this dress hit me mid thigh, it was a very comfortable length. This dress is perfect for a Fall/Winter Event. It has a classy feel to it, but is also edgy and cute!

links_reviews_title: So cute but super tight arms!
links_reviews_text: Couldn’t even put my arm on my hip for a pic!

links_reviews_title: I am short, so the length of this dress was perfect, it hit mid thigh. Style and size were perfect.
links_reviews_text: Arms are tight!
So cute on line but in person was not good. Way too short and also not shaped well. big in waist but super tiny in shoulders and arms.
runs very tight!
The sleeves were TIGHT!! Omg! But the dress was so cute that I got past it.
the fit was snug and I didn't think it was the right cut for my shape
I’m always a 6, sometimes a 4. Couldn’t even fit my arms in the 6 or zip it up. Oh well : /
Adorable, but I didn't wear it, it was too small in the hips.

This dress is very pretty, nice quality. Unfortunately, the ruffle on the arms made me feel like a linebacker. I just don't think it would be very flattering on anyone. Maybe if you're pear shaped and want to balance out your bottom half, but if you have broad shoulders at all, probably not the best
great

links_reviews_title: Too small, but would have been good...
links_reviews_text: Item was too small. No stretch in material... would fit like a glove if it did

links_reviews_title: This is a very cute dress and finally one that is "mini" versus down to my knees!
links_reviews_text: The fit of the body on this dress is fantastic. Alas, the arms and chest area what was the designer thinking, the lace part is so tightly styled that it's so uncomfortable. If you have very narrow shoulders and very thin arms this dress will work, but if you have broader (normal) shoulder width despite the rest of the dress fitting, this will not be a great choice.
This dress is amazing. I felt like a million dollars wearing it. I ordered up to a size 6, but probably could've gotten away with a 4. You will not regret this rental.
Fabric on sleeves does not stretch
Couldn't get it zipped

links_reviews_title: Such a cute dress but runs small!!!
links_reviews_text: I am a true sz 2 and it was WAY too tight in the bust and bottom. Order a size (or two) up!

I usually wear a size 4 across the board, but thankfully sized up to a 6 after seeing the reviews! The sleeves are pretty snug and I have thin arms. Super cute, flirty ruffled skirt part without being too boring/conservative. It's a little short, but I thought that made it more fun/flirty. The ruffles down the sleeves are a fun touch too. The fabric is slightly stretchy and the lace parts are not itchy at all. I wore this with gold heels and loved it.

links_reviews_title: This was perfect for our annual Christmas party, which can be business casual to dressy!
links_reviews_text: Cons were as others noted, it runs small. I usually wear an 8. Pros were that it is a beautiful dress. I got a million compliments all night. It was a tiny big big in the chest (I am a B cup), but not ridiculously so.

I really wanted to wear this, but I could barely move my arms around, because the sleeves were so tight. The lace material and detailing is beautiful, but there is no stretch to it. I loved the ruffle at the bottom, so I was sad I didn't get to wear this dress. Even tried sizing up based on other reviews, but still a no-go.
Many compliments
I really loved the details, the sleeves are amazing.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress but it was too large under the bust, while in the bust it was perfect at size 10 wi
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress but it was too large under the bust, while in the bust it was perfect at size 10 with a 40" bust, 34" waist
Didn't wear. Too baggy in the abdomen
Great fit - wore for high holidays at temple

I wore this for a bridal shower and absolutely loved it! I had given birth 2 weeks prior and this dress made me feel like a million bucks- not an easy feat! It holds the midsection in well. I rented size XS and S. I ended up wearing the S because the XS was too tight in the bust.
Layered lace with floral print is pretty and unique. Great dress for work and military promotion ceremony. Form fitting silhouette is flattering and comfortable without being too tight. Fits TTS.
The dress is very comfortable and forgiving. I did have to pin up the top a bit on the sides as I am smaller on top then the bottom but so many compliments!
Great fit. Comfortable to wear for a long work day.

Vavavoom! This dress is so sexy, in a conservative kind of way. This dress runs small, so size up. I’m a 14 and got the XXL and it was perfect. Lots of stretch to this gorgeous lace dress. It’s much better suited to an event versus work due to the low cut neckline and dressy fabric. You could throw a blazer over it and still make it work, though. Spanx came in handy as the dress hugs all curves. The dress is long. Plan on high heels and being at least 5’6” for this to work on your frame.

Really liked the material of this dress. It's thick and structured so it helps smooth a bit and has stretch it all the right areas. Length is great for the office but the neckline was a little more revealing on me than how it looks on the model. I ended up wearing a chunky multilayered necklace to cover up a little of the cleavage. Really comfortable and runs large. I'm a true medium and the small fit perfectly.

I was hesitant to try out this service but it was awesome! My 2 dresses I ordered arrived early and I had time to decide which I was going to wear. I loved the Floral dress. It fit me perfectly and loved the length. It was a great choice and an even better decision!
The photos do this dress zero justice! It's ultra soft, comfortable, not tight yet fitted and a dream! Don't size up if you're between sizes, pick the smaller size, a must rent .

links_reviews_title: Form fitting for sure but beautiful lace, pattern & colors!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a bit tight for me in my waist so I tried to cover that up with a blazer. I did love the stretch lace, neckline, and pattern. Even with the waist being tight I felt sexy and professional in this outfit. Will rent again after working on my tummy!

links_reviews_title: Better for an event than work
links_reviews_text: This dress was gorgeous and a little stretchy which I liked. I rented it for work, but it was too low cut so I had to add a scarf/shawl to cover up and make it more appropriate. This would be perfect for a wedding or other event though. Spanx are needed if you have anything but a flat stomach.
Don't forget the spanx! It was a form fitting dress with nice lace detail. It shows a little cleavage but was still classy.

links_reviews_title: This dress just wasn't for me...
links_reviews_text: Although the material is sort and stretchy and fits nicely, the pattern and length of the dress made me look larger than I actually am. Not the look I was going for. Maybe with super high heels it would look different but I wasn't going for that look.
Comfortable and flattering!
Great length for tall gals, and the material is high quality and heavy- not just a printed design, but also includes a lace overlay finish.
I should have ordered the large. Also, the cleavage was a bit much for my comfort.

I loved the lace and the pattern of this dress. I rented the large but it was way too big. It was also surprisingly long and hit me a little below the knee (I'm 5'9). I think a medium would have worked.
Stretchy fabric, bra-friendly, cool pattern, room to dance. A favorite brand!
Rented for nephews wedding but wore my first choice. This is a great dress and I would rent again to wear to dinner, cocktail party, or other function
Nice thick and stretchy fabric. Definitely a fitted dress, but the shape is flattering.

This dress was pretty, the fabric had a lot of give, and I could've gone down to an XL. Unfortunately, it did not suit me length wise and was unflattering around my top. I don't know if the XL is any shorter but this dress seems like it's meant for someone with some height.
Runs small. Almost too right for work, but wore a blazer over it. The pattern is nothing special.

links_reviews_title: Too formal and glam for work but would have been great for a cocktail party
links_reviews_text: Size down if in doubt for overall shape but also know the fabric is unforgiving.
I couldn't zip the dress up all the way.

links_reviews_title: The fit was okay but not work appropriate.
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size
This dress was lovey but ran very small.
It fits perfectly, it's comfortable and I looked fantastic in it.
Outer layer of fabric was a stretchy lace. The cut fit me well and was good for work.
Very comfortable. Great for a long day.

Probably more suited for a wedding or summer party, but I added a belt and made it more casual for work. Perfect fit. Lined and comfy. The lace fabric and colors are beautiful. It is a bit on the bodycon side.

links_reviews_title: Very long; almost ankle length on me (5'6")
links_reviews_text: Okay fit. Textured material doesn't photograph well. Very long; almost ankle length on me (5'6")
Has some give to the fabric. Cut is very flattering for hips.
Great fit for curvy girls.
The belly area was a little poochy but overall nice dress. I paired it with a black jacket to pull it together.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Will definitely rent again.
links_reviews_text: The fit was amazing. Hugs in all the right places. I went with the medium but could 've definitely wore the small. It stretched a bit after wearing for a bit. Material is not heavy but not flimsy either. Beware of the top if you're big chested!! Overall amazing dress!

links_reviews_title: Very fitted, even after sizing up!
links_reviews_text: This dress arrived new with tags and was stunning! Showed a little more up top than I would say is appropriate for work but still gorgeous. The material is thick and seems very well made. The length hits around mid calf. Sadly, it's exceptionally fitted...around the tummy. Even after sizing up to be on the safe side (I'm generally a 14/16,XL) no such luck. Didn't even wear it. If you have a tummy and over a size 12, don't bother.

links_reviews_title: Stunning color and great fit - RUNS LONG
links_reviews_text: LOVED the color and comfort of this dress! I received lots of compliments on the fit. For bra needs, I wore the stick-on rabbit ear style bra cups, which worked great and didn't show through. For undergarments, I wore a seamless no-show thong. This dress leaves little to the imagination when it comes to what is underneath, but the material soft and stretchy. I LOVED the cross back and the halter neck. The 4R was way too long for me, even with 4-inch heels (I'm 5'-5"). Would recommend! True size.

I rented this gorgeous dress for a wedding in Poland. The fit was incredible. I could have worn the 4L for fit, as it wasn't much different from the 6L - but the 6 had more length. I am tall - 5'11ish - and wore this dress with 3" heels and it was the perfect length. The dress has a shelf bra built-in and I wore a Nu-bra too. This was my favorite RTR dress ever - so flattering & comfortable - while being absolutely stunning.
Gorgeous color, and comfortable! Stretchy fabric. I am busty, and wore a sticky strapless bra with this dress, due to the open back. I received compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: Wore for a black tie wedding in D.C.
links_reviews_text: This dress was great! Awesome stand out color without being too crazy. Fit was very flattering and comfortable. The extra fabric and ruching around the mid section definitely made me feel better than a "flat fabric" design. I wore with a pair of spanx to really suck it all in :) Tons of compliments! Only con was that you can't wear a bra. As a smaller chested girl, I would have loved a little extra "oomph". But overall, I give this dress a 10/10

This dress was stunning! I loved wearing it to a recent wedding, and it definitely turned heads. This dress fits in all the right places and was easy to dance in. My only negative was the length, but that can be fixed with hem tape or high heels! #glamorous #showstopper

Dress fit like a glove! It was perfect for a hot humid summer night. I would have liked a bit more built in support but it fit really well and I felt sexy. I paired it with platform booties with a 3"+ heel and it was still a bit long. Great dress that accentuated my booty!

I wore this for our engagement photos while we were on vacation, and I am so happy with the results. The dress is a simple design but really pops with the bright color. I found it to be true to size. I didn’t wear shapewear because I could see it through the dress and I was worried that was all I’d see in the photos, but if you have ones that include shorts, I would probably recommend them.
I can't tell you how many compliments I received the entire night! Dress fit like a glove and makes your booty look amazing!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Fit, Fantastic from the Back
links_reviews_text: This was my back up dress. Yes this is thinner, which is why it fit my curves perfectly and clung in all the correct places. I am not in exactly "proud of myself" shape and my skin is not perfectly smooth but needed no foundation garments. It hung smoothly and was fabulous for my pronounced booty. Boyfriend was crazy by the end of the event. Many compliments

I wore this dress for a winter gala in Cancun. I did have to wear spandex as it was fitted, but the dress hugged my curves perfectly. I got so many complements all night and felt beautiful! The color is also perfect for olive skin tones. :)

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress. Not a game changer.
links_reviews_text: This was a pretty dress. Hugs your curves well and ruching in all the right places. The material is very thin and clingy (consider what undergarments you will need carefully). The 2R had a stain so I was forced to wear the 4R. It hung a little low on the sides and I had to worry about hanging straps and side boob showing. I am 5"3' and 117#, the 2R was perfect fit and good length with 3" heels.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely in love with the color and great for being in Florida in May!
links_reviews_text: Fitted true to size!

links_reviews_title: The material was soft and stretchy
links_reviews_text: 24 weeks pregnant, the 4R fit, but I could have gone up a size. Non-pregnant size is 2-4. Good thing it was stretchy and the ruching really helped with the fit.
Comfortable yet elegant
The fit was fantastic. I felt beautiful, I received so many compliments, the color of the dress was gorgeous.
Loved this dress! The fit was perfect and I got lots of compliments. Completely comfortable and easy to dance in.

Great dress. I was worried too much armpit/side boob would show and make it hard for a sticky bra, but it was fine. Bold bright color, I was 24 weeks when I wore this and it was super stretch and comfy. Fabric was thicker and nice. I am 5'6 and it came mid high heel I wish it I got 2L instead so it was a bit longer.
This glamorous dress is brighter in person than my pic. It was beautiful and hugs your curves in all the right ways. Low back was a nice touch. I felt really good all night in this.

This was actually my backup dress, but the minute I put it on I felt amazing! It was comfortable and flattering! I felt stunning in this dress and got so many compliments! I wore this to our Hospital Gala! My guy liked the dress so much, he told me to buy it!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit. Beautiful color! Gorgeous dress.
links_reviews_text: This was my first RTR gown and it did not disappoint. I wore this to a black tie gala. Numerous compliments on color and the open back. Great fit, hugs the curves. Sexy and elegant.
This dress fit like a glove. It was extremely comfortable and flattering, and the stretch was helpful for fitting my curves.

This dress fit like a glove! The "ruching" is in all the right places, especially in the back! The color is gorgeous and I was so surprised by how much I loved this one. Ultimately I chose a different dress because of weather.. however this dress will remain on my "hearts" list for a summer occasion. It's sexy and classy all at the same time!
The only issue I had was that the shelf bra was not sufficient for me. I wore a nubra and felt relatively comfortable. I was also happy to be able to wear spanx with this dress
I wore this to a black tie tropical wedding and it was perfect. Very comfortable, flattering, and the colour is rich.

links_reviews_title: This dress was as fun as they party! I loved the vibrant color!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove and was very flowing. Would wear again!

links_reviews_title: so many compliments and form fitting. Loved the stretchy material but definitely wear pasties
links_reviews_text: definitely wear pasties!

I'm 5'9" weighing 130 & usually have problems finding dresses that are long enough while staying form fitting. This dress was perfect for that. The material is stretchy and easy to dance in all night, and the length allowed me to still wear heals. I would definitely rent this again. I didn't wear a bra but since fabric is thin, I recommend wearing breast petals in case it gets chilly.
Got a trillion compliments. Fit so well. Material is thin but in a good way. Felt pretty all night.
Loved the fit! It was a little long even with heels on.
This is a great dress that hugs every curve. There's no cup coverage in the chest so you're likely to nip out. Also it was a tad long for me at 5'4" with 4" heals.
Beautiful dress. Very comfortable. Wore it to a breast cancer fundraiser and received tons of compliments. I tried on the 2L and it was too long. The 4R was perfect. I'm 5'7 and 135lbs.
I loved this dress! It fit perfect. I highly recommend RTR and will definitely use them again.

Loved this dress. The color was not as bright pink as I expected. The material is very thin and unforgiving so be sure to wear smoothing undergarments. I was able to wear a size smaller, which also made me feel amazing. Get pasties or a low back bra.

links_reviews_title: I wish I could wear this dress every day!
links_reviews_text: This was the most comfortable thing I have ever put on my body. It's sexy and does amazing things for the booty! Don't be too scared of the open back because there is a nice little shelf bra, all you need are some pasties!

links_reviews_title: Great color, if I only had a better booty....
links_reviews_text: This dress color is vibrant and I loved it on me but my rear end is flat and sad and the ruching in the back brought attention to that. Boo hoo. If I have a perky booty I'd say definitely this dress is for you! I didn't end up wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Dress fit like a glove. The color was vibrant and beautiful. I got many compliments.
links_reviews_text: A tad too long for me. The 4P would have probably fit but wasn’t available. Fit amazing everywhere else.
A little loose at the top if you are short-wasted but overall a great fit. Perfect for hot weather events as the fabric is light and stretches. Strangers were complimenting the dress!

This dress is absolutely amazing!! The color is beautiful and the fit will hug your curves! I wore the 10L and I'm 5'6" and wore 3 inches heels and it was still long, but I like my dresses long. You can't wear a bra with this dress but there is a built in shelf-bra. I have discovered Perky Pear breast lift tape which gives a lift and support and wore that with this dress. Overall, LOVED this dress! I may have to re-rent it in the future!!!!
This dress is perfection! More pics on my instagram _olgas So many compliments. It's comfortable, stretchy, and the color is gorgeous. Highly recommend!!!
Fits like a glove but fabric is unforgiving. Wore shapewear underneath.

This dress fit me beautifully- I have a large chest- 38 GG- and I was comfortable & able to wear a strapless bra. I am 5'8" and wore 3.5 inch heels- the 16L was just the right length. The zipper was difficult but I feel that is the case with nearly every dress I have rented from here. The sequins were slightly bothersome under my arms but not terrible. I got so many compliments and I really felt quite beautiful.

This dress is absolutely stunning in person; but doesn't necessarily photograph well. It was a random one sent to me as my original choice was not available, and from pictures, I was sure I wouldn't like it. But when I put it on, it was like a different dress. If you need a dress mainly for pics, it's prob not best choice. But if you want a showstopper of a gown, it's a great choice. It's comfortably weighted, esp in winter. I'm 5'7/137 and length of 4R was perfect floor-grazing in 2.5in heel

links_reviews_title: Sleek with then perfect amount of flair
links_reviews_text: This dress was stunning!! It was slimming and so classy and stood out just enough.

This is such a gorgeous dress, even better in person. I wore it to a gala and received lots of compliments. However, the dress does feel a bit heavy due to the material the overlay is made of. For the same reason, it does not hug your curves; the material doesn't cinch. Overall, a modest yet fashion forward dress.

links_reviews_title: It was a wonderful night at the Ball! Great cause and great time. Lots of compliments on the dress
links_reviews_text: Material doesn't give much and zipper is a little tight to move but overall comfortable dress and isn't too heavy
This dress was selected for me as a replacement by the RTR staff. It fit great and was very complimentary to my curvy figure. Need a low cut bra/spanx due to the lace in the front!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous gown perfect for many occasions.
links_reviews_text: Very glamorous gown that hugged my body well. It moved surprisingly easily and was comfortable throughout the night. I'm on the taller side so it was nice that the dress still hit the floor with my heels on.

Beautiful dress! Fit perfectly aside from the length which I was able to shorten with hem tape. No problem with the sequins either, the dress was very comfortable. Heavy enough for a December party. Thanks RTW!

This dress was a replacement for a style that became unavailable at the last minute. Of 3 other styles of dresses I chose this one. I could wear a strapless bra. I wore 1 inch wedges which was awesome for my feet! I liked this dress, it draped well and didn't cling.

links_reviews_title: Great evening fundraising for our Community Cancer Center.
links_reviews_text: Fitted waist, and came rested on the floor wearing flats. The gown is quite heavy. It is a sequin embellished lace overlay. There are gaps in the design that tend to get caught on things. Very forgiving and I had lots of compliments.
The dress was perfect for the black tie wedding, and ran true to size. Would highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Fits like a glove - classy and elegant
links_reviews_text: The zipper was amazing, the dress fit like a glove - I could totally breathe. I'm normally a 10 so the 12 was on point for designed sizes.

links_reviews_title: This dress was exactly what I wanted for this event, formal but not plain, plus easy to move in.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 12 in dresses but wound up wearing the backup size 14 to give myself some breathing room — I knew we’d have to walk between venues at this two-part event. The length was perfect with 2-inch heels (I’m 5-foot-5, shortwaisted but with long legs.) The only problem was the famously balky zipper — I had to coach my husband through zipping it up, handling all the layers of fabric. The dress is heavier than most, but it doesn’t wrinkle, and I really hate wrinkles. Got lots of compliments. A win!

links_reviews_title: So great to have a perfect dress to wear once and send back. So easy!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly. The length was great with my heels. Loved it

links_reviews_title: It was a very flattering dress. Tough to get zipper up around ribs since I have large breasts.
links_reviews_text: I received many compliments and felt very confident in the dress. Great for a formal affair. I get get a back up size higher than you need just in case if you have larger breasts. I am 5'4" and the length was perfect.

I liked this dress, but didn't love it. The lace and sequins were very pretty, I loved the way it sparkled. I wore a 10L and it was almost too long. I'm 5'9" and wore medium height heels. The dress hit the floor, but I was able to walk without tripping. The dress was a little scratchy under the arms and at my feet. Trying to walk quickly in it resulted in the sequins rubbing the tops of my feet. I have a pear shaped body, smaller on top, bigger on bottom. Sometimes I can wear an 8 in gowns - especially ones that have a fuller skirt, but the 8L was too snug around my hips and butt, so I went with the 10L. I wished it was tighter in the waist, but overall I thought it looked nice.
The dress fit well and look fantastic for a gala event. The only trouble was the zipper was a little tricky. I got a ton of compliments and would definitely rent again.

Fit was perfect, true to size. Be sure to get a plunging strapless bra, I also did backless but not certain that was necessary - certain lights you can definitely see a bra if you aren't wearing those specifications

Basically what everyone else says - tough zipper, heavy dress. But otherwise it was great. I wore a black strapless bra and it was fine. The part of the bra that was visible just looked like it was part of the lining.

links_reviews_title: Wore dress to formal gala. Was perfect for the occasion.
links_reviews_text: Dress was great ! Received many compliments on it. Only negative is the zipper was extremely difficult to zip.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, but the zipper is impossible
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, but ended up wearing my backup. The zipper was worse than I expected even after reading all the reviews. As luck would have it someone else at the gala wore this dress. It is beautiful, but it was too long and the zipper was difficult.
The dress fit beautifully, very comfortable... the zipper was tough so you will need a hand.

This dress fit well. I am a true 16 and 5'9" so I had on a 2in heel. The length was good but I prefer a gown to touch the floor. Since I was sitting most of the night it was fine. The fit overall was good. While it is form fitting theres still some room in the stomach area since its cut like an empire waist. You will have a few scratches under your arms at the end of the evening since its all sequins, but its worth it as the fabric is so well crafted.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing it, but was a solid back up choice!
links_reviews_text: This was overnighted to me because my other dresses just didn't work out. I honestly didn't like it at all from the pictures, but basically needed an option with my event two days away. I was soooo pleasantly surprised with how gorgeous this dress was. The fabric was a tad itchy, but not too much that it would have stopped me from wearing it. The fabric doesn't have a lot of give, but i felt it fit really well to my body. Very beautiful dress. Top of the list for next year's event :)

links_reviews_title: The dress was beautiful and elegant.
links_reviews_text: I am between a 4 and 6 in pants, depending on type and brand. I could have worn the 6, but felt more comfortable in the 4. It was sturdy and comfortable and beautiful.

This dress is really beautiful. I ordered it along with another gown for a gala. It fit really well-true to size. There isn't really any stretch in the waist-ribs area. I am just under 5'2" and it was long without heals and with 3 inch heals it still would have needed a temporary hem. So, I didn't wear it because the bottom is heavy lace and would not have been conducive to a temporary hem. I would highly recommend for those a little taller.

This dress was a winner! Absolutely beautiful on. It’s comfy and I didn’t feel like I had to mess with it all night long. It’s a bit heavy but it didn’t bother me. It was a bit long but my size smaller back up was perfect length, just too tight. So overall this was a winner for me. Tons of compliments all night long. Just enough cleavage to keep it classy too!!
Perfect for a formal affair. Ran a little large in my opinion. If you are wanting to wear heels, I would recommend ordering the "long" as my dress was almost too short to wear even with flats.

4 stars because the dress was not as long as I had hoped. I am roughly 6ft. tall, wore a 12L and flats. More importantly, the dress was comfortable and helped hide my 3 month post baby body. I did receive several compliments. The model image and my photo do not convey how shiny the dress actually is. One of my colleagues said it looked like leather from a distance. I have to applaud RTR for making this a smooth and simple process.

This dress is gorgeous. The pictures don't do it justice. I'm 5'3 and was wearing 3 inch heels and didn't have any issues. My only complaint is the zipper was super tough! Thought I'd need a pair of pliers. I had two sizes of this dress and the zipper was the same on the other one as well. Received a ton of compliments. Was very comfortable to wear for a long evening. I'd recommend sizing up as I normally wear a 10/12 in dresses.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Perfect for a formal affair!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress and received so many compliments on it! I attended a formal awards banquet. This was comfortable all night. It looked and felt very elegant without being too flashy.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, elegant long dress perfect for a formal affair!
links_reviews_text: This dress is heavy-duty and feels amazing on, but is not too heavy and is very easy to move around/dance in all night long. The lace under my arms did feel a bit scratchy throughout the night, but nothing too uncomfortable that would make the dress less worth renting. I was very happy with this dress and received compliments all night long! I rented the 14R and 16L and ended up wearing the 14R with 2 inch heels and the length/fit was perfect (the 16L was too loose and way too long for my 5'4" height!)

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but didn’t love it
links_reviews_text: I really loved the look of this dress but when I put it on something seemed off. It just didn’t suit my body proportion. It was also big which didn’t help. In the photo I was wearing 3 inch heals and it was still really long. The 2P would have been better. The material makes it hard to use double sided tape too since it’s heavy and beaded. If I was taller I would probably have loved this dress. That being said, it seemed to be good quality and my husband loved it. Just wish it fit better.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely stunning! Perfect for a Holiday Ball. It this one ever goes on clearance, I am buying it!
links_reviews_text: I ordered the 10R and 12R. I am normally a size 10 and it fit perfect! It was absolutely stunning and I got so many compliments. I am a small busy so be aware- the front has a low cut with the beading lace over it. I just wore a black strapless bra for coverage just in case. Was a little long since I am only 5’2”- did get caught a few times on my heels but overall a beautiful dress that did not disappoint! Perfect for any age especially someone wanting something with a little coverage- back and shoulders in lieu of a strapless dress.

I adore the dress. If I had a disposable income I'd buy it. It fits perfectly and looks elegant on a pear shaped body. My hips were minimized and my butt looked great. I didn't wear a bra with it (32B) and felt comfortable and secure. The inner lining is soft so you don't need to wear tights/shape wear. It's so classy and not ostentatious at all--so while I was the only one in a floor length gown, I was not over dressed at all. I'm 5'7'' and the Long size was perfect with my 2.5 inch heels but would have dragged with flats. Rent this!!! It's incredible.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this gorgeous dress!
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 10/12 in clothing and the 12 was a good fit for me. It was a bit snug in the middle, but I don't have much of a waist. I carry my weight in the middle. Spanx sure did help this issue. :) This dress is very well made and with high-quality fabric. It's heavy but in a nice way. The 12 regular was a touch too short for my taste as it hit midway down my 3.5-inch heels, so I chose the 12 long. The 12 long was a touch too long but was never a nuisance (I didn't need to hold it up while walking, nor did it trip me up in front). The dropped neckline was the perfect touch of sexy, yet still modest with the lace overlay. I was able to wear a black strapless bra, and even though I could see it, everyone else thought it was a part of my dress. The picture doesn't do this dress justice. It's was definitely a win for me!

I am 5' 10" 165 pounds bra size 36b. I ordered the 12long and 14 regular. The 12 long fit best in the body but was too long. The 14reg was a bit big in the body but length was perfect. I wore the 14R. Dress was beautiful and comfortable. I received several compliments on it. I do not attend many black tie events but would definitely rent again should the occasion arise.
I am right between a 10 and 12 (5'5, 160lb, 36B) and went with the 12. It photographed beautifully and I felt lovely, so much so that I just rented it again for my work Christmas party!

This dress ran a bit large. I normally wear a 4 and I ended up wearing the 2 instead. The ONLY reason this dress gets 4 stars, and not 5, is because the zipper on both dresses was incredibly difficult to zip. Could not have done it without another person for sure. The beading is gorgeous and the pictures do NOT do it justice. The long length was great (I'm 5'10" and wore 4" heels and it hit the floor perfectly). There were some plastic threads that were loose on the beading but nothing too noticeable. Overall, a good dress!

links_reviews_title: I received multiple compliments on the dress!
links_reviews_text: The fit was as expected except for the length, which was insanely long! I wore 4 inch heels and still had to "hem" the bottom up with safety pins by ~4 inches (I'm 5'5", 120-125 lb). This wouldn't deter me from renting it, but if you're back and forth between this dress and another, it's something to consider. One thing I didn't realize from the photos online was that the "metallic" is actually partially from black sequins. I do love sequins, so it didn't bother me, but I was surprised when I opened the box. Overall I was very happy with the dress! It felt comfortable and I love the look.
Really like the details on the dress.

links_reviews_title: Nice for chilly weather wine tasting
links_reviews_text: Bust was too loose for me and I had to wear a top underneath. Otherwise, I loved the sleeves and wrap tie!

links_reviews_title: I so wanted to buy this!
links_reviews_text: Cute easy dress wore it a couple times on vacation.

The collar area is a deep plunge so wear a cami under it. I wore one with a criss cross especially for v -necks. Worked out great. I also wore booty shorts under the skirt cuz it was a bit short. The fabric is thin and light weight. Perfect for the SoCal heat wave. I wore it to a dinner party one evening and everyone liked the dress. Then I wore it again to a gallery show the next day. The print has a boho feel to it. Along with the puff sleeves. If you like that style, then you'll like this dress.

links_reviews_title: Fun and flirty for rooftop party and dinner
links_reviews_text: The beauty of a wrap dress is it will fit many different body types and this one is no exception. I did have to pin the top closed because that amount of cleavage would not have been appropriate. For a more conservative look you could wear a bandeau. I liked that despite my 5'1" height impediment the dress still fell above my knees. The sleeves made me smile all night.
This was perfect for a party on an urban farm. It was so soft and comfortable yet incredibly stylish without feeling overdressed. One of my new RTR faves.

This dress is fairly cute, but nothing too special. Picked this out in-store when I needed something to wear asap for a brunch, and it did the job. Even wore it to work (pinned up the chest, with tights) the next day. Loved the sleeves.

Love this dress! This runs true to size and is great for any cup size. There is comfortable room in the midsection and you can adjust how tight the waist! This may be worn with a standard bra. Pair this with nude heels and simple earrings!
Super comfy and cute for Easter. It is a faux wrap dress so it was a little loose and I had to safety pin the chest area

So cute! Loved the length and pattern....it was very open in the front and showed a lot of clevage...too much for me in the daytime. Maybe would work with a nice bralet underneath. I wore it as a kimono type cover up.
Can dress it up or play it down. Had to pin the chest part because my boobs were too out there.

A tight fit around the waist, huge in the bust. I wore a tank top underneath but it was a weird fit and I found myself trying to adjust it the entire time I wore it. You'd have to have at least a DD cup to fill out the top of the XL. Fabric wasn't great, felt cheap. Print and style are adorable for the right fit. I wore with tall brown leather boots.

links_reviews_title: Unfortunately I did not wear this dress as it was too small.
links_reviews_text: too small to wear

links_reviews_title: Dress runs a bit small and not recommended for ladies with larger butts.
links_reviews_text: The dress quality was beautiful however I was unable to wear the dress as it was very short in the back.
The dress is very thin, fits short (and I am only 5'4) and a little snug for the size ( I ordered a medium), especially if you are big-busted.
Dress fit well, it was a little large in the chest area but I made it work with fashion tape. Loved this dress, wanted to keep it!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous but too short for work
links_reviews_text: Very flattering fit, loved it! Just way too short for work. I'm 5'7 1/2" and it was mid thigh on me. Low cut but nothing a safety pin can't fix. Will have to rent again but for another event.
The dress is cute and fun but the chest was too big on me. I probably could've made it work with a bandeau underneath and some blousing technique I didn't think it was worth it

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a work event and received a lot of compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: This dress is very flattering and I felt like a million bucks in it! Great dress to transition from work to evening. I did use a safety pin for the chest area and to keep it closed at the bottom because it blew open a bit in the wind. Otherwise I loved it and will definitely rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Cute boho print without the unflattering boho fit.
links_reviews_text: It is a little large in the bust area and unlike like other wrap dresses it can only be adjusted so much in the waist area. Other than that the fit is great!

It fit pretty well, but the opening of the "wrap dress" requires a tank or something other than just your bra, depending on the event. It's a little short depending on how long your legs are. But it was a very cute dress.
Great fit!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, but WAY TOO BIG on a petite frame with 32B.
links_reviews_text: I so wanted this to be a nice day dress for my upcoming trip to New Orleans, but it is far too big for me. It's not super lightweight, either, so layering something underneath to fix the gaping cleavage situation would be too hot and cumbersome. Lovely concept and beautiful sleeves and print, but just doesn't work for me, sadly.
Lower cut than I thought, had to secure with fashion tape. Closure felt insecure at first but worked out fine during the day. Loved the sleeves and piping!!
Loved it so much, I want to buy it. Light, comfortable, cute and flattering

links_reviews_title: Too short for this curvy girl
links_reviews_text: This dress is really cute, I loved the sleeves and the print and the fabric is really silky and high quality. Like other reviewers have said, it is really low cut, but I could have fixed that with a safety pin. The reason I sent this back without wearing it was that it was so incredibly short. It might work better on someone with a more athletic figure who is ready to show a lot of leg but the low-cut top and super short skirt combo was just not enough dress for me.

It's definitely low cut, super low cut... you can use fashion tape or something... but I opted for a one piece bodysuit that was classy looking and so that peaked through, and also kept everything in place with no panty lines to worry about. Such a gorgeous dress, partner was over the moon. It is a bit dressy, so not for casual events... and since it is low cut, I wouldn't feel comfortable wearing it to conservative events. So much fun...
a little low-cut
Def runs small for the busty gals n I'm glad i had a little slip dress to wear underneath to tame the cleavage. It is a really fun and pretty dress!

links_reviews_title: Rent it, but rent it for date night! NSFW/etc. Amazing dress, but A LOT of cleavage and so short!
links_reviews_text: If you have breasts whatsoever, they will be visible in this dress. Ditto if you have any height--it's short! I rented this for a work thing, which was definitely a no go. Kind of hard to explain, but the dress is a faux-wrap--it does open up completely, but on one side, instead of a tie, there's a button loop and then a button on the opposite side. I've had this for skirts before, but not a dress. Definitely makes this snug. Excited to rent this again in summer!

links_reviews_title: Dress is adorable and you feel pretty in it.
links_reviews_text: Fit was excellent except for some gaping at the neckline.

links_reviews_title: Doesn't work if you have boobs.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit everywhere but the chest area. I was hanging out.

links_reviews_title: Darling, but size up if you are not small chested
links_reviews_text: This is a darling little dress, but the way it wraps is almost obscene with a DD chest. I am sending it back to get a medium. I tried it with a cami and it there was too much of it showing to look nice.

Really cute skirt and nice heavy material. I usually wear a size 4 in my regular clothes, but size up for RTR things with no stretch...This skirt had a ton of material, size down or get your regular size! True wrap with no buttons or hooks. I'm 5'1 and it was very long, wore it over a swim suit to host a pool party, but it looked a bit odd pulled up that high with a crop top tank.

This skirt got a lot of attention. It's the perfect wrap skirt for summer! From the fit, print, colors and has pockets. Bc of high waist, it allows you to wear some fun crop tops w/o showing your tummy. The fabric is on the heavier side but comfy. I would try pairing an orange or coral top with this or even green.
Not a fan of high waisted but this was a hit! Non-stop compliments. I like the pockets!
Wore this on Memorial Day weekend to brunch with friends! Very comfortable, thick almost denim like material so it doesn't blow around in the wind.
The material is thick. It also has pockets (always a plus.) no complaints really.

The skirt felt a little large around the waist. It is a wrap skirt so I could have pulled it tighter but then it would have pulled in the part of the skirt it is not supposed to. Depending on what you are looking for, it might be a little long. I also got the top to wear with it and the waist went up too high for me. I thought it would have a little skin showing between the top and skirt, but the skirt went up too high on me. Love that it has pockets and I could put my phone in there. The fabric quality is great and didn't wrinkle in my suitcase. Overall I recommend this.

links_reviews_title: It is a super flattering and fun girly skirt. Love the ruffle detail and it fits perfectly
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable. Not too short. Fits well and is flattering

links_reviews_title: big and fits weird, so size up
links_reviews_text: It runs big and fits weird. I'm going to have to fold it under because it gaps on the right where the tie is.
Pro : well made, wonderful colors Con: Too much fabric

Rented this for a trip to New Orleans and am probably going to purchase it!! It's a thicker material but not too hot at all, the shape is very flattering and the colors and fun but not overwhelming. One of the best pieces I've rented to date.
Pretty, but the heavy fabric seemed more formal than the style.

I had been eyeing this skirt and was excited to finally rent it, but wasn't that happy with it. The material is almost like denim so it's heavy (I thought it would be lighter/flowier) and its so much material that I didn't like how it looked or felt on me. I considered wearing it anyway - still overall looked cute on the surface - but ultimately decided to return so I could get something else.

Just too much fabric. It's a true wrap dress and by the time you get it on and all figured out it's just big.. I should have sized down. Gorgeous quality material and vibrant print but did not wear. Made me look huge

links_reviews_title: Runs very big! Normally size 4 and went with size 0
links_reviews_text: Great for vacation at a resort! Used with a black crop top. Can go from casual to dressy as material feels almost like a jean with print
Great fit, got SO MANY compliments, amazing dress!
Fully loved cotton traditional wrap dress. This was cute and comfortable for a hot summer day.
One of my favorite rentals ever! Fit like a glove and got so many compliments. The wrap dress can get a little tricky when windy, but nothing a safety pin can't solve
This dress was absolute perfection -- I almost bought it, will definitely rent again. Cool and comfy in the summer heat!
I wore this dress 5 times in 2 weeks I loved it so much! It's made of nice fabric and it's flattering. I would definitely rent again.
Dress fit well but had to safety pin the neckline so I wouldn't fall out of it. A bit lumpy and frumpy looking but cool and comfortable.
Flattering to hide any bumps.
Easy to wear and adjust to your size. Perfect summer day dress. Very classic with the strip that has a slightly faded look. Relaxing yet chic.
Dress was just ok. Felt a bit frumpy wearing it - it accentuated my hips. May be better for someone with smaller hips/less curves

This wrap dress was cute and comfortable. However, I have found other Draper James styles to be less-than-forgiving to those of us who are a C-cup or above, so I ordered a size up. Turns out, in this style I didn't need to size up. The 4 would have fit me much better overall, but the 6 wasn't so bad that I couldn't wear it. I ended up putting a white tank under it for work and wearing it with pink flats.

Didn't really like this dress. Made me look kind of frumpy. Was really big in the belly area and I know a lot of the reviews say it covers the boobs but I'm a C- D and I definitely couldn't wear this to work without a cami underneath. Returning without wearing unfortunately. The belt was kind of folded too and I think in some pictures it looks wider than it actually looks in person.

links_reviews_title: Could use a clasp on skirt, cute dress!
links_reviews_text: Was perfect for my casual office, and long enough for my tall frame. I walk to work and found that the skirt was prone to blowing open in the wind (yikes). This can be easily fixed by some fashion tape but is good to know.

I loved the fit of this dress. Wrap dresses can be hit and miss with me but this was great coverage in the chest, lightweight enough for Texas heat and super flattering. True to size with plenty of room for adjusting at the waist.
I loved this dress, even cuter in person but I was unable to wear it due to the low cut.
Tried it on, but the waist didn't hit quite right. Hoped to wear it for a daytime party, but ended up returning it unworn.
I really wanted this dress to be awesome. It is so cute. However, it looks like a maternity dress on me. The front bunches out and my stomach does not. It was so weird. 😔

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Fits comfortably with classic details so you look put together!
links_reviews_text: V neck isn’t too revealing, belt cinches the waist just right, and the length is conservative.

This dress is really lovely and usually wrap dresses are super flattering. Something about the waistline didn't work for me and made me look much broader. I'm short waisted-- maybe it will work better for someone with a longer torso.

When I read faux wrap dress I automatically assume it's a fake wrap dress that looks like a wrap but it isn't. This is a wrap dress and I personally hate wrap dresses. It also needs more fabric. Disappointed with this one!!!!
Got a ton of compliments. The materials feels great and the belt makes it adjustable as a true wrap dress.
Cute dress, great for every day. A true wrap dress but that fit well and not too low-cut. Only complaint is that it arrived a very wrinkly.
Not a great fit
Cute daytime dress and great fit. Not too deep in the neckline and wrap was flattering.

links_reviews_title: It came early and fit great. I chose two options and really loved both but this one fit better.
The color was fantastic and the cut was flattering but for a lifter the shoulders were tight
links_reviews_text: The dress was fantastic and I loved the back of the dress because I have an upper back tattoo. My only problem with this dress was that the shoulders were so tight it made sitting down hard. I mean I could sit down as long as I was sitting straight up which was fine for the first 2 hours then got a little restrictive. This could be just a "me problem" because I'm a CrossFit power lifter and have a broad shoulders. The dress is also incredibly short! I could only wear kitten heels with the long!
This dress is gorgeous. It fit perfectly and I would recommend for anyone with a slim build. The dress is very straight. It was comfortable for the evening.

Rented this for a gala and was very pleased. The fit was just right and comfortable. It was a bit long only because my shoes were flats. The material is great and there is stretch to the fabric. I had no difficulty moving and dancing in it even without a slit. It is shaped to turn this pear a bit more into an hourglass. One issue that may have been part of the design is that the lining in the front was about two inches longer than the lace. The back was even. Great dress!p

links_reviews_title: Felt like a movie star going to the Oscars
links_reviews_text: Fit a little small in the chest but I loved the built in bodice because it helped flatten my stomach
This dress was actually a backup after my first shipment did not fit. It arrived just in the nick of time, and fit like a GLOVE! It shimmers in an understated way and really just has timeless appeal
Loved this dress!!! It was so elegant and the color was vibrant! I felt so fancy in it, would definitely rent this one again!
This was my first time using RTR and I was absolutely amazed! The dress was so beautiful and fit perfectly!
Beautiful dress. Fits true to size - wore to a black tie event.

Wore this dress to a black tie event and it was perfect. So many compliments. The lace top is sexy without being over exposed; tight fitting through the waist and then flowing skirt. The top has lots of structure - maybe wear it without a bra, but for me it looked better with a strapless bra. I am 5'10. I ordered a long. Was able to wear heels and it was still long. The back hem is longer than the front - I did step on it a couple of times. Highly recommend this dress for an elegant evening.

This dress is gorgeous but not exactly the most comfortable to wear. There is a built in corset which kept digging into me. I wore my own bra underneath which may have caused that. The dress is extremely form fitting, mermaid style, and tight above the knees. I normally wear a size 4, but went with the 6 in this dress. It is a stunning color & a standout from the normal black dresses at a gala!

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect blend of class and sexy.
links_reviews_text: The fit was similar between the 4R and 6P. But I'm short, so the length on the 6P was perfect. The built in bra was a great feature. My only complaint was that there was no slit in the skirt so it did restrict your movement somewhat. We weren't somewhere that we were dancing, so it wasn't a problem. Very comfortable to wear all night. Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous option for a black tie wedding!
links_reviews_text: I rented this gown for a friend's black tie wedding and absolutely loved it! There is a built-in bra that makes the top of the dress super flattering and helps support the sexy low "v" back. The silhouette of the bottom half of the dress was gorgeous and made for some great photos. The color is great for any season and has a bit of sparkle throughout the lace. The fabric was actually very breathable despite how well-made the dress is, which was perfect for this 100F+ wedding! I'm on the shorter side so the regular length (versus the long option) was perfect for me. Highly recommend this rental!

The fit was almost perfect except for the shoulders and length. Over all it was a gorgeous dress! I received a lot of comments even from my husband who said I looked beautiful. I was afraid to dance in the dress because of the length... got caught in my shoe accents. Will maybe try a smaller size in a different color next time.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, comfortable dress and I didn't need a bra!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 6 and it did fit but the 8 looked great and had extra room to dance in. The material is a little less luxurious looking at first glance but, once on, the shimmer shows through the lace and it really is quite beautiful. I got tons of compliments. If you carry your weight in your hips, size up. But that said, it is very very comfortable and very pretty.

links_reviews_title: As a widowed Mother of the Bride, I walked my daughter down the isle. I felt beautiful and blessed
links_reviews_text: All good

The top was soooo flattering I could not get over it! Didn't even need to wear a bra! Only downside was that there was no petite option available at the time so the dress ended up being a tad too long even when I wore 4" heels.

This started as my backup, but put it on and loved it! The fit was perfect, no pulling or adjusting all night. I was a little concerned about the straps slipping, so I used a little fashion tape just to be sure they stayed in place. I felt elegant and received many compliments. I would rent this dress again.

Gorgeous dress! I wore it for a gala and received compliments all night. My original two dresses in this style had issues with the satin hanging below the lace in front, indicating that perhaps the dresses had been cleaned one too many times. Fortunately RtR overnighted me another, then I could I truly appreciate how beautiful this dress is. Perfect color, bit of glitz, glamorous without being over the top. It runs small, particularly up top. I usually wear a 4L, the 6L was ok, 8L most comfortable. If you have assets you will definitely need to size up.

links_reviews_title: I received many compliments. The dress just lit up in photos.
links_reviews_text: Another person at my event was actually wearing the same dress from RTR, we took a photo together and laughed about how we both had excellent taste in fashion. I was still happy I chose to wear this dress.

links_reviews_title: I had so many compliments on this dress! It was just enough sexy but with lots of class.
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfortable and elegant. I honestly have no complaints! The fit was great, I am busty (36C) and did not require a bra since there was plenty of support built in. The waist fit well and was slimming. The small train was just perfect as it wasn't overkill but added a more formal touch. I ordered a 10R for backup but it was a smidge too tight. I highly recommend this dress!

The dress was beautiful! It definitely shows all your curves and is flattering. The only small issue I had was getting it zipped but once I got it zipped all was okay. You have to be sure to fasten the built in bra to be able to get it zipped. Initially I couldn't zip it but once the strap inside the dress was fastened I was able to zip it (some back cleavage had to be smoothed a little lol!!) I got compliments on the dress and I felt beautiful!! Will rent again from RTR.
Beautiful detail! Comfortable and got tons of compliments

links_reviews_title: A beautiful and very comfortable gown!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect. I read in the reviews it ran a bit small and short so I opted for the 8 long. I normally wear a 6 and while I'm only 5'3 I knew I wanted to wear heals so I went with the 8 L. I think the 6 L would have been perfect. The fabric is high quality so it still was form fitting. You really don't need much with dress, the neckline needs no necklace, it's just the perfect amount of sparkle, even the bra on the inside is perfect. I'm smaller chested and the dress was a smidge big so I opted to wear one anyway just to try to fill out the top some more which ended up being a perfect solution. I received so many compliments. I felt so glamorous in this gown. I would absolutely rent it again!!! It's worth noting that my "problem areas" are my lower belly and my thighs. I often can't wear dresses because when they are tight or even form fitting they usually pull in the thighs but then the fabric is baggy on top. Not in this dress at all. This dress was slimming in all the right places. A great dress for curvy ladies to feel absolutely sexy. THANK YOU RENT THE RUNWAY!

links_reviews_title: This dress is beautiful! It is a gorgeous deep blue color that sparkles in the light!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress in a size 8L and ordered the 10R as my backup size. I actually ended up going with my backup size for two reasons! The first was because, despite being 5'8" and wearing heels, I felt that the Long was TOO long. I felt like I was going to step on the train all night long, and actually did a few times in the Regular length. The second reason was because my 36B/C bust and wider ribcage ended up being too squished in the 8. While I liked the waistline in the 8 better, the AMAZING built in bustier in the 10 fit me much better and was much more flattering. This dress is figure flattering and modest at the same time. Overall, I highly recommend it for a "black tie" event when you want to wear a subtle pop of color!

Another great rent from RTR! I have a pear shaped body and the 14R still fit great! I got the 14WR as a back up in case but didn't need it. It fit perfectly well and the zipper was easy to zip up as it is in the back and not the side. Many compliments throughout the night and it was just an overall stunning gown! I absolutely recommend it!

This dress was originally selected to be a back up for my back up and I fell in love with it. I had to go up a size from what I normally wear only because my regular size wasn't available. It was a little loose but that only made it better for dancing the night away. I truly wished I didn't have to return it!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress, runs small and doesn't come in Long, but overall great look.
links_reviews_text: I ordered this dress for a Formal Ball, it looked wonderful, I felt beautiful in it - but it did run really small. I usually order a size 4L with a 6L as a back up...I received a regular 4 and regular 6, and had to go with the 6, which was still a little snug. I am a trade and true 4, I was shocked I had to size up. I received many compliments. the structure was great. The color was beautiful, just be sure to size up.
Had a bit of a panic that I couldn't zip it, but husband to the rescue and it fit like a glove. Received so many compliments on it, and I lived the detailing.

This dress was perfect for a work event. I had an event where I was in this dress and on my feet for 8+ hours. The dress was comfortable and I got compliments on it all night. Modest enough for work while also being super modern and trendy. This is great for someone with a bigger bust and I would absolutely rent it for a work event again.

I received this dress as a back up when my first choice suddenly became unavailable in my size 3 days before my event. This dress is absolutely beautiful the pictures don't even really do it justice. It hugged my curves in all the right places. The only downside for me was that it was pretty long on me even with some pretty tall heels. I ended up not wearing it because my original pick fit in the back up size and that one was more flashy for NYE, but I would definitely rent this dress again for another event.

Nice fit, but a little tight in the torso, even with the little amount of bust I have. If you have any, I suggest ordering up a size. Perfect length for a small heel. Ended up wearing my back up instead.
It fit my body like a glove. It was challenging to clasp the top portion, as I have curves. But once it was on, it was comfortable and beautiful. Highly recommend!

I loved this dress. I got it as my back up but loved it more then my first choice. It is just such a beautiful dress. Literally everyone complimented me on it. It's true to size for a formal dress. I'm normally a 6-8, but I usually wear a size 10 in formal dresses. This was consistent with that. Be aware that it is a fitted dress and hugs your body tight through the mid-section and hips. That's the style. It is also very long. I'm 5'2" and I wore 6" platform heels. It was still a bit too long but nothing I couldn't get away with.

links_reviews_title: Not great for a large chest
links_reviews_text: I truly adored this dress. Very pretty shape and color. Just enough sparkle. I had to wear the 4 for my DD's but then shoulders were too big. Otherwise fit beautifully and felt fabulous!

I loved the sparkly look. It wasn't too much and was just fancy enough. I loved that it had a "bra" clip in the back to hold the girls in place. I would say that if you are busty this may be a bit of a challenge as the top is snug with not a lot of wiggle room. Overall was a great dress and would rent again.

links_reviews_title: The dress is BEAUTIFUL!! I felt like a Queen! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: A size down would've fit perfectly but was unavailable. The fit was a bit loose but not too noticeable. Length was perfect for my 5'6" and the look was ravishing!
The dress fit great and did not need a bra, I am only 5 ft so the regular length was just slightly to long but I wore 3 inch heels so it worked out. I loved the back!

This dress was fitted but not too tight! I received multiple compliments, and I felt stunning! I had a baby 6 months before I wore the dress, but it did a really great job holding all the important parts in without spanx.

links_reviews_title: The galla I attended was old Hollywood Glam theme. I felt like I was born for that era in this dress
links_reviews_text: It fit like a glove. I normally wear a 2 but the 4 was perfect. I was unable to zip the 2 up. I love this designer, Theia. I am tall and also have a long torso with a big bootie.
