I feel like Theia makes dresses for my body type. I own a few of this designer's dresses and love all of them.
Looks like it will only fit a broom when you take it out of the bag but it is a tshirt type of material. Its a bit see thru but very comfortable for a summer night
This is a knit dress and it hugs every part of your body. I didn't have enough courage to wear it in public.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Color - Not Easy To Wear
links_reviews_text: Don't let it scare you when you take it out of the RTR garment bag (see photo above). It looks super tiny but has plenty of stretch. However the material is thin & leaves nothing to the imagination. This WILL require special undergarments to avoid VPL (visible panty line). Still love the overall design & color, especially for summer.

links_reviews_title: The fit was too small for my taste. And the length made my knee caps look big.
links_reviews_text: The fit was too small for my taste. And the length made my knee caps look big.
Not flattering at all
Fits true to size. A form-fit. Great for the right event. Definitely not a work event.
When I got the dress I wasn't even going to try it on because it looked so small. Some way, some how, it contorted on my body in a perfect way and looks amazing. Good for hourglass shapes!
Planned a trip to Vegas and this dress would be perfect but ended up canceling trip. I would rent it again though. Fit was tight and clingy but not unflattering.

I feel so lucky I got to wear this dress while new. Sooooo flattering for my hourglass figure. Styled it with fun white heels. The dress is a thin fabric and perfect for late spring, summer or early fall. The color is gorgeous and makes your tan skin pop. I wore it for an elegant work event in the tropics and it felt great outside and indoors in the AC. You can style it so many ways. Wish I could buy it!
Definitely runs small-it fit but was tight. Great color--perfect for spring and summer but the material is for fall or winter. Fully lined. Cut high around armpits.
I'm into green and I never would've thought I could pull off this shade but it worked! Wore it to a client's office and got a couple compliments. It was comfortable and fit true to size.

links_reviews_title: Hugs in all the right places!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a work event and the dress is so flattering! I wore spanx but the way the dress is made, I could have gone without it. The lines on the dress is frilled and I couldn't see that on the stock photo. Overall, totally satisfied!

links_reviews_title: Love everything about this dress but SIZE UP AND UP
links_reviews_text: Love the color, material and design!! Definitely size up. Normally I wear 4/6 but I wore a 8 and it's still a tiny tiny bit small. Other than the sizing, it's a great dress!!
The dress runs small so size up. It was tight in the bust and the arm holes. The fabric is very forgiving but heavy. It was a good dress.

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress for work or play!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color and nice form fitting cut. Long enough for work but not too long and the color was so fun that I wore to a cocktail party as well. Only cons is that the mint green color shows everything so if you have pets make to have a lint roller handy. Also it runs very small. I ordered up to a 4 after reading the reviews but honestly a 6 would've probably been more comfortable for work. Overall really loved his dress!

I got SO many compliments on this dress. I usually have an issue with sheath dresses fitting since I'm a 4 on top and an 8 on bottom but this dress fit like a glove with the 10. Would definitely wear again.
Great fit, fantastic color.

This dress looked so plain to me.. I originally got it as a backup dress but it ended up being my favorite of them all!!! Perfect fit, classy but sexy, great for dancing!! Would 100% rent this again!!!
I'm between a 2 and 4 and the 4 was tight. I think the 6 might be too big, though. Careful with the zipper as it intersects with the fringe diagonal design. A little short .

This dress was perfect for the occasion! I usually wear an 8, but decided to go with the 10 because it was a little snug in the hips. Otherwise I loved this dress. This material is nice and thick, hugs your curves in all the right places. Would definitely consider renting it again.

Pretty mint color & conservative neckline for a wedding. The frey ends were an initial turn off but looked just fine. My major negative was the tight bust fit (34B) when everything else fit well. The material is not very stretchy so if on the fence maybe size up. Due to the thickness of the dress material & liner it also bunched a good bit when sitting. For me it was an okay looking dress maybe for a standing event but probably wouldn't rent again mostly bc of the tight bust.
Perfect fit, comfortable and awesome color. Great for dancing and can match any shoes/jewelry.

links_reviews_title: Hugs your body. Beautiful and classy, perfect dress for a banquet. I will rent it again
links_reviews_text: Perfect for If you have small boobs and big booty. Love the curves
I got many compliments on this dress! The mint color is one of my favorites. The dress fit me like a glove. I wore this to work and again for an engagement party. Would rent again

links_reviews_title: Can I wear this dress everyday??
links_reviews_text: This dress was so hard to send back. The color, the cut, the fit... it was all stellar. I wish I could give it six stars.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and accentuates my curves
links_reviews_text: Love this dress! It runs small but the fit is incredible for women with curves.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for graduation and I absolutely LOVED it.
links_reviews_text: Super flattering and comfortable, beautiful color, and fit runs relatively true to size. Only complaint was that the front wrinkled relatively easily after sitting down for dinner.
This is a beautiful dress that fit like a glove and I got so many compliments on it! The color was perfect for rehearsal dinner.

links_reviews_title: Order one size up for sexy, two sizes up for office wear
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous color and cut. Runs small -- ordered one size up for work and it was inappropriately right. Made for great upscale clubwear at a bachelorette, though!
Small in bust
This was a replacement dress, safe to say I didn't wear either of the dresses. Worst RTR experience ever, I don't think I'll ever be ordering from here again. It runs way small.

I rented this for work thinking it would be a work sheath but it fits more like it's meant for da club. As advised, I rented a size up and it was still too small. Perhaps you could try renting 2 sizes up?
Dress was really tight on top and overall small. I weigh 112 and the 6 was too tight for me. Also the color was not great for me but the fabric was a really nice heavy weight.

links_reviews_title: Cute enough, but the zipper problem is awful
links_reviews_text: As usual, I tried my stuff on when it arrived to see if it would make the rotation or not. It was a cute dress but unzipping... OMG. The little fringe parts got stuck and I couldn't get it off. Given it zips in the back, its not like I could see the tiny fringe parts to remove or have the ability to deal with this. I had to wait until my husband got home to unzip the dress. It was so frustrating. It was cute enough but not cute enough to deal with that so I sent it back.
but this dress runs a size small. will return the 0 and try for a 2

links_reviews_title: Great dress, comfortable, tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: The dress fit great! True to size, perfect for petite people.
I'm normally a 0 so I rented a 0 and it was soooo tight. I'm 5'2 100 lbs and it was tight on me. I returned it and rented the 2 which fit much better. Pretty color for spring and cute details.

links_reviews_title: Runs small! Especially on the arms!
links_reviews_text: I bought this for my pinning ceremony. I already had my boyfriend matching me and ordered 2 sizes up from what I normally wear. It was very painful around my arm pit area. It wasn't very flattering even if I suffered through the pain. I couldn't even zip up the 6 and the 8 barely made it. I did not wear it! I'm gonna say skip this dress unless u don't have big boobs and have tiny arms.

Love this dress. It accentuates the curves perfectly. Only complaint is it's a bit tight in the bust, but I am currently nursing so I'm pretty big in that region. I might size up to an 8 next time I rent for that reason. Color and quality is beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress, good shape, need help to unzip
links_reviews_text: Dress runs small so ordered up a size and it fit perfectly. Nice length for work, hit just above the knee and a heavy material that retained a nice shape. I liked the fringe, but it got stuck on the zipper and I never would've gotten out of it without help. Overall liked the dress though.

links_reviews_title: Really pretty dress. Runs small so order one size larger.
links_reviews_text: The dress is prettier on the inperson than it is on the hanger. But size up because it runs small
Definitely fitted, but I like a more feminine cut for a work dress

links_reviews_title: Received many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Great cut, very form fitting. Heavier fabric. Beautiful dress. Color is a little more saturated in person than what is shown in the picture.

Fits like a glove - wow! As others have warned, runs small! I usually wear a 2 or a 4 and the 4 is almost too small! Still happy I chose it over a 6 but definitely size up! Wish I could buy this dress... I will definitely be renting the white version of it that RTR offers in the future!
It's a lovely dress. If you usually wear a 6, get a 10. Size up times two.
Perfect for an hourglass figure

Thick, durable fabric. Really slims you because it sucks you in LOL. The zipper was a little thin for the type of fabric so it kept getting caught going up, so may need someone else to zip you up rather than attempting solo. Great subtle mint color.

links_reviews_title: It was too tight and too short for work
links_reviews_text: The color was very pretty

I'm 5'2'' and it seemed too long on me. It was not too tight but gave the appearance of being too large. Would be good for a taller/bigger person. The color was also kind of "blah" in my personal opinion. I did not wind up wearing this dress. I was disappointed because usually I LOVE cinq a sept.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable fabric and fit is just right. I felt classy and beautiful.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect for me, neither too large or too small. Good for evenings.

Loved this romper!! When my first choice dress became unavailable, this romper was overnighted to me. It was perfect! It fit really well, nothing was too tight. I did wear spanx but that was more to make things smoother than to lose inches. I felt comfortable all night long and received many compliments. The bride (a very good friend) had also rented this romper for a few occasions herself, so it made wearing it even more special.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! Loved the way it fit and how it looked!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a casual wedding reception, received tons of compliments from friends, family and staff at the hall! Will def buy this romper, felt beautiful in it!

links_reviews_title: Super flattering and perfect for a bachelorette!
links_reviews_text: Loved wearing this romper to my best friends bachelorette party in Chicago. Only draw back is the bathroom situation -- but that's with every romper. Would rent this again!
I loved wearing this. It fit perfectly and I felt covered yet sexy. The one issue I did have was the zipper had some wear so it took some wiggling to get it to zip all the way up.

This was a really fun romper to wear for a bachelorette party in Nola! Overall, the fit was true to size. I am tall and have long legs so was was aware of what bending over may do to the length. Overall, though, this was a fabulous piece. It didn't lend itself to a bra, for a smaller cup size at least. You will need a bathroom buddy to help unclasp and unzip. Really enjoyed this number and felt sassy and confident!
The romper fit really well. The zipper was a little hard to get up but it eventually got there. The length was appropriate but still sexy. Great way to stand out at a cocktail party.
Very cute and girly. Fit perfectly
I love this! It was my very first romper. I went 1 size up and that one fit pretty well. Loved the pockets. I got a lot of compliments.
Fit well and worked with tights

This is a very beautiful outfit!! I ordered a size bigger based on other reviews and this was still very tight. I had ordered it for a date night but, it was too tight. I would not have even been able to sit in it. I would say def size up for this one!! Maybe 2?

links_reviews_title: Romper was a great fit! I had a blast and got ton of compliments in this unforgettable romper!
links_reviews_text: See picture for look! This fits true to size. I wore the 8 only for the extra length, but the 6 would have worked too. Loved the lace detail on the sleeves and the color was really unique for New Years when everyone wears sparkles or black.

Wore this little outfit to a Christmas party. Received tons of compliments, and felt confident in it. I decided to wear the size 2 over the size 0. Both fit well but the size 0 was slightly tighter and shorter, which would’ve worked. But I decided to wear the size 2 because it was a little roomier to dance in, and the clasp was broken on the size 0, so I went with the Size 2.

I have a larger rib cage/shoulders and all the RtR rentals I've used in the past have been a 4 or 6 and fit great. While the lace and cut of this romper is adorable, the material is not at all stretchy so I couldn't get the back zipped up and the shoulders were tight. Super disappointed because it would have looked fantastic for the cocktail party I'm going to. If you have a wide rib cage or athletic shoulders, go a size up.
It was a great fit. Wore it out in Vegas and it felt very comfortable and looked flattering! Would rent again... might even buy it !

links_reviews_title: Wore this out in Vegas and couldn't have been more happy with it! So wish I could have bought it!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous blue color and lace detail
Stylish, comfortable, has pockets, and you are able to wear a regular bra. What more could you ask for?
Great outfit to go out in. Super comfortable and great price for fall

This is my first time trying a romper and I am OBSESSED with it! It's pretty and girly and comfortable. It is incredibly flattering, aside from the pockets sticking out just a bit more than I'd like. I ended up adding a belt to break up all the lace, but it also looked nice without any accessories.

links_reviews_title: Perfect outfit for girls night out at Justin Timberlake!
links_reviews_text: Very flattering and feminine!

I loved this romper! It was so fun to dance in but also more formal with the lace sleeves. The sleeves were a little tight, but still comfortable. I'm 5'10" and found the length short but not too short.
It was super comfirtable. It wasn't a hassle to use the ladies room either.

links_reviews_title: So glad I took the risk!
links_reviews_text: I was a little leery of ordering this romper because they can be hit-or-miss on my petite frame. I decided to order another dress just in case. I ended up falling in love with the romper!! The lace was absolutely beautiful and the shape made my body look great. I got tons of compliments! The lace is darker than as shown in the picture (more navy), so the slip underneath blended in nicely. I took away a star because the romper arrived with two rips in the lace in the back. Lukily my grandma was able to sew it up nicely, and RTR customer service has been great. All in all, I did not want to return this romper! Great for petites!!

This romper was perfect for a date night out in Vegas. It wasn't too dressy or too casual. The fit was great, true to size and just the right length (I'm only 5'2"). It did come significantly worn, and had a hole the size of a golf ball in the lace on the sleeve.

I love this romper!! Loved the fact that it had pockets and was super cute. Hated that this will be the 2nd RTR rental that a I coldn't wear to my occasion because it smelt terrible, super disapointed!! It did fit tighter than expected. I'm a size 6, 135, 36D and could barely zip up the size 8. I want to recommend this but totally upset on the condition of the rental.

links_reviews_title: It was perfect, i was nervous, this was my first RTR so sizing had me a little on the fence
links_reviews_text: The romper was tre to size and cery comfortable. I was nervous, becaus this was my first ever RTR, but id absolutely rent again. #newyears #romper
Rented this for a birthday dinner in Boston. It was well-fitted and super fun to wear. Loved the lace! Would definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: The lace is beautiful & the color is amazing..
links_reviews_text: Super sexy, but classy...perfect to show off nice legs...a wee bit loose in the middle but fit well everywhere else. So many compliments

This piece was absolutely beautiful! Wore it for a date night and my fiancé thought it was super sexy. The bottom did stretch a little as the night went on, but it wasn't noticeable with the lace. Would buy it if I could!

I always liked the idea of a romper but never thought they looked good on me. I took a chance on this one and loved it! I was able to zip it up myself with some awkwardness. I wore a regular black bra with it. The only downfall was when you sit down this rides so high that it's like you're just sitting in your underwear. I kept trying to pull it down as I would cross my legs but definitely felt like my goodies weren't covered. If you'll be standing or dancing - rent it!

links_reviews_title: Perfect outfit for a fun night out!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this piece and was very tempted to buy it. It is extremely flattering and even has pockets! Would absolutely rent again!
This romper was amazing I wore that six opposed to the eight because the eight was a little bit saggy in the crotch LOL The zipper was tough though out the evening but other than that it was great
I was able to dance all night without worrying about my dress coming up. It is a beautiful blue and runs a little bit small but mostly true to size. I got many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for the occasion, will order again!
links_reviews_text: Only thing I didn't like about it were the pockets, they add a little bit of bulk to the hip area which is good or bad depending on body type (for me, didn't want the extra bulk there). However I found this to be a small detail, and will definitely order this one again! I ordered a 0 and a 2, usually I am a 2 but the 0 was still comfortable and not tight at all. I would recommend getting a backup size just in case!

I loved this romper! I thought it was going to ride up and be uncomfortable, but definitely not the case! It cinched at the waist and was very flattering. I loved the length of the shorts and even wished it was slightly shorter since I'm only 5'4. I was in a casino all weekend so the long sleeves were perfect in the air conditioning!

This fit true to size. It was very easy to get in and out of to go the bathroom. It has pockets which are a plus. The legs were not too tight nor too loose - perfect length as well. I got tons of compliments and my daughters friends, who know their fashion well, were WOW'ed when I came out looking soooo glamorous. I set the new mom standard!!! Highly recommend.
It's cute. Kinda runs small. Zipper impossible to pull up all the way up on your own.

links_reviews_title: This rompers was a hit. I love the fit and the style.
links_reviews_text: Pros: this dress is true to size. The lace and fit are perfect. It has no stretch is the only con. You must be careful when putting it on. I received compliments the entire evening.
Fit true to size, would rent again.
I love love love this Romper! I got compliments all night. The color is stunning and it was comfortable. I ended up being able to wear the size 2 and I'm usually between a 2 and 4

Slim in the hips but the top worked well with my broad shoulders. I wore a strapless bra - you can see thru the waist band and center to skin so it was more noticeable than I realized. It’s a cloth dress that seems to be starting to fade with cleaning. I tried both the M and S - went with the small because I wanted it to be more fitted. Either would’ve worked though.
Dress felt expensive and fit great. Got lots of compliments at my niece's baptism.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, sexy dress perfect for winter wedding
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress! I received compliments all night on it. The fabric was really forgiving and nice and thick. It was a little difficult to dance in because of the cut, but it's probably good that I didn't embarrass my bf by getting low in front of all his friends. I didn't wear a bra with it and was not concerned at all.

I'm 5'8, 150lbs and a 38B. I wore the M.It fit well. Zipper was hard in some spots, but it seemed pretty worn out. I think someone with a bigger chest size wore it last bc it was a tad stretched out by the armpits. I have wide shoulders so I didn't zip up completely bc I felt like I was choking in the neck area. Didn't have to wear spanx. Hugged you in the right places. I wore a strapless bra and you can't tell. I received many compliments

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but be careful w sizing
links_reviews_text: Really great dress and got tons of compliments. Just like someone else said, even nicer in person. I would have given 5 stars if the fit was more true to size. I rented this for my 60th Birthday party and felt like a Queen. I was glad I had my birthday sash which kind of drew attention away from the sizing issue. I am a consistent size 10 but based on other reviews I ordered the large. It fit but was snug on the hips/waist and hung very baggy on the underarms. used double sided tape.
Loved this dress! Incredibly flattering and comfortable! The thick Stitching and busy pattern smooths out any extra areas you don't want to emphasize!

I am often in between sizes (10/12) sometimes 8/10. I ordered an L and XL. The L fit but the zipper wasn't great so I decided to go with the XL. It was big in the bust and back but over all a great fit. The colors are amazing. They are a mix of brown, purple and black. Great for a fall/winter wedding. I highly recommend this dress.

Another stellar rental from RTR. I am a size 10 with a 34H bust and the large fit perfectly, no need for Spanx. I could have squeezed into the medium but wanted to be comfortable for the fundraiser we attended, haha! This dress was the right mix of classy and sexy. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Sexy & covered all the right spots!
links_reviews_text: Dress was sexy. Loved the material and color. I rented this for a wedding and it was perfect! I don't really like super tight dresses because I always look bloated in the stomach area but from the thick material and designs it covered it up so well- TRUST ME! I loved this dress and got lots of compliments. The neck collar area was not pressed against my neck it was much looser but it did not bother me much. It was pretty tight around my bottom but I was still able to dance all night long! LOVED!

I'm a 36DDD and the top part of the dress still felt loose. I used a thick strapless bra to help the situation. However, the waist down fit perfectly. The colors are more muted in person but photograph well.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress with lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! The material was soft, super comfortable, and I thought the length was perfect for a late fall wedding (I'm slightly over 5'3). The top portion of the dress did fit a little loose on me but the halter top cut made everything stay in place regardless. Great rental
Received many compliments. Dress is very flattering. There is no give in fabric so some movements are a little challenging (like getting in and out of a low car) but overall dress is comfortable!

I'm always a Medium, but HAD to size up to the Large. Which is fine, women's sizes are always weird... the Medium wouldn't go up past my curves and booty. But the Large fit great. We had to walk around the venue.. I was comfy and looked fashionable. Received compliments at the event and after when we posted pics. Recommend!

links_reviews_title: LOVED IT ! I was sad to send it back i recieved so many compliments
links_reviews_text: a little difficult to use the restroom in unless you take the dress off but i managed to wiggle it up and down.
I rented this thinking it was more of a red than it is. It's actually a reddish rust color and was too fall-like for the event I was attending, so I wore something else. Will rent it again though!
Didn't end up wearing this since the coloring is more orange than red, but the fit was nice.
This dress was absolutely beautiful!!! It was unique and different! I received compliments all night! Only thing - the dress stretched out over the night! But otherwise, wonderful :D

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and perfect for the awards show!
links_reviews_text: Fit well and can be very dressy or more cocktail attire.

I wore this for our anniversary dinner. I really needed a strapless bra to fill out the bust a little better, but with that see through strip down the middle (and across the waist) it would have been tacky. Maybe if I had a black strapless bra I could have made it work. Fit well overall.
The dress was perfect for my occasion. It had a true to size fit, was very flattering and comfortable. I’d highly recommend renting this dress for a formal event! Great experience all around.
Birthday

Another hit from RTR. I loved this dress and felt fabulous in it. It's snug, that's for sure. I barely fit the medium but it thankfully hugged my curves in all the right places to be flattering. The fabric texture is forgiving though not at all stretchy. It photographed well and I received many nice compliments. Note that the bust is quite large, while the hips are small. Overall, was very happy with this choice.
Dress fit like a glove. Got so many compliments. The color was beautiful and it stood out in the crowd. Would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: I attended an evening gala fundraiser and it worked perfectly. Not too casual and not too dressy.
links_reviews_text: It was a tight fit. So if you want breathing room you'll need a medium.

I wore this for an awards meeting for work and it was beautiful. A few people mentioned how extremely large the top was but I didn't agree that it was not wearable. The tea length was beautiful. Size was great too.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for this wedding!!
links_reviews_text: It fit true to size. I wear a size 0 so the XS was perfect. You definitely have to wear strapless bra. I loved that it didn't wrinkle and always kept it's shape.

links_reviews_title: Really nice dress. Classic and elegant!
links_reviews_text: Really nice for my hourglass shape. Nicer in and in pictures than right out of bag.
True to size, it fits perfectly but since I am flat chested, the chest area is a little roomy. I love it.

This was my first rental and I loved it! I was so happy to have the smaller back up size since that's the one that I wore. It hugged my body in just the right places and was comfortable to Dance in all night. I was able to comfortably wear a black strapless bra with it even with the little cutout in the middle. You couldn't even tell. I got so many compliments and felt beautiful in it al night! Highly recommend this one!

Great dress! I have a petite bust and thicker bottom so although the medium fit ok, it was slightly too large up top so I opted for the more fitted small. It felt quite snug around the waistline when i first put it on but once I was moving around it was comfortable. Would recommend for a black tie optional wedding as it’s long enough to be classy and appropriate without the hassle of a floor length gown. Color was more rust/brown than red but was very pretty for a Florida “winter” wedding. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Sleek and elegant dress for wedding
links_reviews_text: I thought this dress was really flattering! The large fit well, although I wish there would have been more room in the hips (absolutely no give there, it will a little tight - I couldn't size up because I was pretty much swimming everywhere else in the XL). I thought this silhouette was extremely flattering, and I thought the colors were perfect for a winter evening wedding in the Midwest! FYI, the cutouts on chest and around waist aren't lined, so I'd suggest either a nude bra or no bra. I would rent it again, but I will admit that I prefer a similar dress that the designer has made (Green Over Black dress).
Loved this dress! I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and modest while still flattering
links_reviews_text: I'm 5"4 and weigh 104 and usually wear a size 0 or xs. This dress was comfortable and flattering but just a little bit loose, but nothing that made it unwearable. I got tons of compliments and felt really comfortable all night.
Classy, beautiful fit! So many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Dress is gorgeous, both the shape and the color
links_reviews_text: It has no stretch and is tight on the hips - walking was limited - I'd size up if pear-shaped
Very comfortable. XS fit but was skin tight so went with the small which was a little loose but not noticeable. Great colors for the fall/winter. Very pleased with this one!

links_reviews_title: Danced the night away in this perfect dress!
links_reviews_text: The small fit but I could not fit a strapless bra - I ended up going with the medium, left just enough room for strapless bra and feeling comfortable dancing the whole night!

links_reviews_title: I got lots of compliments on the dress as it is not standard black tie.
links_reviews_text: The X-Small was a little too small if you are curvy/pear-shaped but the Small fit well. There was a little extra room in the armpit area (I wear a 34C) but overall the dress fit very well with a beautiful neckline and shape.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for a winter wedding.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit great! I was a little unsure how long it would be but the length was perfect. My sister and I both rented and we both got many compliments! The dress was very comfortable as well and was easy to sit in and to dance in!
Pictures do not do this dress any justice. It is a must order. Hugs the curves but not too much. Has nice cut outs and color is amazing

links_reviews_title: Flattering and stylish for a conference keynote!
links_reviews_text: Great dress with interesting shape, texture, and style. The bottom is 👌🏼. The color is really dark and looks basically black in most indoor lighting. The only downside was that I found it a little itchy to sit on for extended periods (with bare legs).
Dre's is very dark green (which I loved) with very Pretty details throughout (not just too and skirt. It had some give to it which made it very comfortable to dance , sit and move around.

links_reviews_title: Form fitting but very flattering - pack the spanx!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a charity auction - there's no slip so you definitely need a strapless bra unless you don't mind a mild nip slip. I wore high waisted spanx given the form fitting style but was otherwise very comfortable. It's a knit so don't wear in a super warm climate. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Surprisingly light and breezy for a knit
links_reviews_text: Felt fabulous in this. The details are almost too much but not quite so... perfect ha. It fits very snug but didn't feel restricting.
Loved this dress so much. The fabric was a good stretch. Seriously awesome fit and length. Wore to a wedding at a winery in spring and it was a hit!
This dress is sooooo comfortable! I loved the ruffle details and "meshy" areas. It is definitely a hunter green, despite the stock photo looking black.

This dress was true to size. I am 6'1" and wore a size large. It came nicely to my knee. You will need a black slip under this dress, especially if you will be in daylight. Very comfortable for dancing as well.

links_reviews_title: I wish I could wear it more
links_reviews_text: I enjoyed wearing this dress and wish I had more going on that month so I could wear it again. The color is dark green (which is a nice change from black). Fits true to size. Not too tight, but hugs curves in all the good places. Loves the see-through top of the dress and the ruffles on the bottom. I would sure rent it again!
Awesome dress! The dark green is a great departure from black and the details are wonderful. Very comfortable and flattering. Wore it while 26 weeks pregnant.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my office holiday party - festive and fun and unique with good fit.
links_reviews_text: The fit was great. I rented a L and an XL. I typically wear a size 14. The large fit, but I decided to wear the XL to have a little more room to move and because it clings to the body. I could have worn the large with no problem. The dress is very comfortable and a great fabric. It is stretchy without being too loose. It still felt weighty (in a good way), and it held things in place. It is a dark hunter green and worked with my black shoes. I received lots of compliments and would rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Love the thick, knit material & color
links_reviews_text: Fit beautifully, fabric has nice stretch, so super comfy & hugged my curves. Length was great, and I'm on the shorter side. Beautiful, classy dress. Wore for a holiday party.

links_reviews_title: Super Easy to rent and return. I received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I'm 6' tall, so I search out longer dresses. I rented this dress for a November wedding reception. I didn't want another black dress. This dress is a beautiful hunter green. I accessorized with gold jewelry and gold shoes. It fit like a glove. Form fitting. Beautiful fabric. Classy dress. Comfortable.

The color of this dress was just beautiful and the details were so pretty. I was speaking on a panel and this dress was long enough that I did not feel like I was exposing myself to the crowd. It was comfy to move around in and I really liked it. Great dress overall!

links_reviews_title: So comfortable, loved the color and details!
links_reviews_text: Usually wear an XS or Small. Glad I went with the Small on this one.

I wore this to the office, and then again to a conference. I got lots of compliments from people who usually don't comment on my attire. It was the perfect midi length that I love, just below the knees. The ruffles make for a very flirty look, especially when walking. So does the peep through lace at the top. I wore a nude colored bra which you could not see under the lace. The material is comfy with stretch, and has some nice weight to it. It does hug all your curves, so some people may consider wearing spanx. But it was a great pattern on the material that does hide some flaws. Love it, and will rent again!
Flattering, very comfortable, got lots of compliments!
Wore to a wedding. Perfect for the occasion! Hits mid calf. Wear a black bra with it... when camera flashes nude bras can be seen.

links_reviews_title: So this is hunter green and not black! Pretty dress and super comfy!
links_reviews_text: Pros: it was comfortable, interesting design, liked the ruffle details on bottom Cons: it was longer than I thought. I'm pretty tall and it fell almost to my calf. Buyer beware: not black :) actually pretty shade of hunter green. Found that out when I walked into sunlight haha
Beautiful detail on the material/knit

links_reviews_title: Love this dress and a lot of complements.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to see the Rockettes on Christmas Eve eve and also to semi-formal Christmas brunch. Literal head-turner. Even the receptionists at the hotel complemented it. Form-fitting without being risqué and the dark green is very festive. I’m considering purchasing it.

Hits just below my knee, which was preferred. Got lots of compliments for this beautiful dark green dress. It's thicker and heavier material so it was perfect for our winter holiday party at work. Fitted yet stretchy. This was my 2nd time renting this dress.

links_reviews_title: True to size. The dress has a dark green tint
links_reviews_text: Perfect Cocktail dress
At 5'11", it's hard to find a dress in the right length. This was perfect, hitting just below my knees. It's form-fitting with fun ruffles. The deep green color is beautiful.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a gala, & it was perfect for the event
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly, no gaps, nice stretch in the material. The color shows up beautifully in photos. Ruffled details and embroidery make it unique. I have an hourglass figure and it can be difficult to find dresses that are form flattering without being provocative, and this fit the bill. My boyfriend loved it. Received many compliments.
Nice knit and outstanding hem detailing. I received so many complements on it.

This dress is GREEN, not black. But, it is a lovely shade of green (even though I thought it was going to be black). It is quite heavy, but comfortable. I suggest wearing a strapless bra with it, because even with a nude-colored bra, the straps were visible. It is a very elegant dress -- it was perfect for my work event and I received many compliments. It was my favorite dress of the four dresses I rented this month.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a high school prom that I was chaperoning, so it was perfect for me to move in.
links_reviews_text: This dress is very comfortable, though some might say it has some weight to it (because of the material). The color is a dark, hunter green, which is a nice change from a typical black party dress, but black shoes/accessories look great with it. Back zipper is very easy to get open and closed, and a regular bra can be worn with this, even though the top portion is see-through. Bra straps just look like they are part of the design.
The fabric is great and hugs your curves. It's thick though, so not too revealing. This dress is dark green, but looks black in most lighting.

links_reviews_title: Fun fundraising event at an art gallery
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and fitted. I didn't feel stuffed into a dress, it moves with you but keeps it all "together." Nice to not have a typical black dress, the color is elegant and comes out stunning in pictures.

The beautiful rich emerald color of the dress is not at all accurately depicted in the photos of the dress. I was pleasantly surprised and it is a gorgeous color on me. The dress was heavy and flattering. It fell a little further down on my leg then the image depicts. I was quite happy with it and would rent again :)

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a charity gala
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Figure friendly without being clingy. A little longer than knee, which is a nice change from all the super short cocktail dresses lately. The material is a bit heavier than i expected, which was also a nice surprise as the evening was a bit chilly. Note that the color is a beautiful deep emerald (not black)
I found the dress weird and see-through. It runs large. Order a size smaller than you would normally order

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but much dressier than appears in photos.
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress but for a cocktail party or wedding. I thought I could wear it to work and be a little over dressed but not have to change before an evening event I had. But it was much too dressy to get away with for work and actually was also too fancy for my event as well. It's really for an affair type occasion.

Loved this dress and the color being a dark green. It was nice to be a little different. It fit me well and it felt like the correct size, but was a little more fitted in the bottom area than my personal preference so it wasn't my first choice for my particular event. I would still rent it again. It would be perfect for a date night or a party paired with a jacket, too. I could see how you could really change up the look with this dress style.
thicker material but held form nicely, form fitting but not too tight, I received a lot of compliments wearing it
It was much too fitted and not forgiving - I have a muscular frame and curves and it didn't work for me. But pretty color and fabric.
Great for a work party. The fit was great, flexible, fit a larger bust.
I rented this as a backup dress for a party and didn't end up wearing it but really liked it and would consider renting again. Classic LBD with cutouts to give it a little extra. Flattering cut.
I LOVED this dress. It was my favorite thus far. It fit perfectly, I only wish it was in my budget to keep it forever.

I loved his dress! I read the comments about it being thin and low cut, so I wore spanx underneath and figured out a way to tie it so that there wasn't much cleavage and it was perfect for a warm Sunday brunch. I paired it with white sneakers and a mint closed Marc Jacobs cross body bag.

I loved this dress. It was light and airy which was perfect for the warm weather, but also made the dress a little shear. I wore nude undergarments which I got confirmation were not visible to others. I also had to safety pin the bust area to keep the wrap from coming open.
I pinned the top to keep it from being too revealing. I also suggest fabric tape for the bottom as the slot can blow open pretty far. Easy fit since it is a true wrap dress. Wrinkles super easily.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but a lot of trouble
links_reviews_text: When I first put this dress on I thought "Not worth the trouble." It is thinnnnn. You need to wear a slip. It also needs to be pinned at the chest. But as I wore it longer in the day, I really enjoyed the slips and how light it was. It was fun to pair with riding boots for the first day of fall.

links_reviews_title: I really want to love this dress but...
links_reviews_text: I received a lot of compliment, lovely color, really light and nice for summer. Ireally want to love but it was just uncomfortable. This is a wrap around style, too comes off lose and really high slit, you have to be really careful not to expose yourself from below and from the chest area, Really stressful, i have to adjust the dress all the time in the boob area and i keep on stepping on it too! Ugh

I absolutely loved this dress! It was light, airy and summery. Dressy without being too dressed up. Plus, a true wrap is always flattering on me. Cons: I had to safety pin the top together and the dress is VERY sheer.

links_reviews_title: Wear a full slip if you wear this dress.
links_reviews_text: This material was very thin and pretty transparent as you can see from the photo. I did not wear.

Loved the color and look but it is VERY transparent and requires a slip. The side slits are higher than I expected and I had to pin the front to not have too much cleavage showing. Because it's a wrap dress and has two slits, it's hard to stay covered when sitting. I received compliments and enjoyed the dress for the occasion. I thought I'd wear the small, but ended up in the XS.

links_reviews_title: Kinda flimsy material but surprisingly works
links_reviews_text: I was at first surprised at how flimsy the material was but it fit well and looked quite good. I thought I looked good but didn't get too many complements.

links_reviews_title: Light, easy to wear. Perfect summer dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly. Wore more than once.

links_reviews_title: This is a great summer dress. It's super light and breezy, and super flattering.
links_reviews_text: I didn't use a slip, but wore nudes under, and it was fine. I think I have just the right skin tone for it. I did use a safety pin for the bust, but that was all. It was perfect for a hot summer day.

I loved the way this dress fit and I felt so skinny! If I owned this dress, I would invest in a full slip because I had to wear a cami to cover up the plunging neckline and would have felt a little more covered on the bottom. The material was quite sheer so you need to choose your undergarments carefully. There are 2 slits on the side that go above the knee and the dress wraps so there is another opening at the front. A little breeze will blow this thing right up and I gave folks a bit of a show. I felt so pretty in this dress but honestly was terrified of walking outside in it again because it blows up so easy. If you have the right undergarments though, I think you'll feel confident and beautiful .

I love this trendy dress by Greylin. Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going a size up for your back-up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and somewhat of a shift at the hips. It works best for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this wrap dress. At 5'5, the length hit floor length on me. This stylish silhouette is very comfortable and has a split that adds an extra accent to your overall look. I would recommend pairing this with a very thin bracelet and simple earrings.

Very lightweight--looks great and I loved the vibrant color--but it was a windy day so a few guests may have gotten a bit of a show! Also, I did have to pin the top to keep things in check! Probably would have worked fine with a camisole.
Loved this dress!! Runs a little large on top so had to wear something underneath. Really comfortable. Wore for a work conference - can easily be dressed up or down.
Thin material which makes is perfect for summer!
This dress is beautiful on. It's a bit low cut, but fits nicely and is a gorgeous color and print.
I just didn't really like this. Material was thin and clung in places. wrap dresses are usually really flattering and this one wasnt. Didn't wear.

The print was very colorful and vibrant and the quality of the fabric was nice. However, the dress was very low cut, sheer and the slits were high so it didn't work for work or out and about in the city. I would re-rent this for a beach vacation for sure!

links_reviews_title: Rented for summer workdays for a casual office
links_reviews_text: Slit is high, don't wear to a formal workplace. V is deep.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and flattering fit but I had to pin the neck to keep it closed and material is thin.
links_reviews_text: I wore it out to dinner twice and had compliments both times!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress but could not wear it because it was see through. Super bummed!
links_reviews_text: This dress is pretty but see-through! It also runs a bit big. Needs to be worn with a slip and you need fashion tape by the chest area.

Totally fell in love with the print and cut of this dress, very slimming but also flowy. Only two issues: it is unlined and a thin fabric so I had to wear nude underwear and also had to use some fashion tape on the top to keep my bra concealed.
This dress is very sheer. The material is flimsy, although a beautiful print. I wore a tank slip underneath and even that only helped so much. Felt like my butt was hanging out all day!
This dress fit really well and was a little sheer and sexy

The picture makes it look like this dress is modest and could be worn in an environment that needs some modesty (like an office workplace), but it's not (or at least not for a busty person)! It's very cute, but falls more into the date-night category for me. My husband thought the cleavage-showing was great (ha!). But not as great for the work event I meant to wear it to!

I loved the colors of this dress, such a great choice for summer. Unfortunately the top was REALLY large (and I'm a C cup). I had to wear a tank top underneath, which was fine, but really detracted from the overall vibe. The way the dress wraps is also not quite right. It was like I couldn't get it tight enough around my waist without the actual dress being tied (as opposed to just the strings). Similarly, the strings were SUPER long and actually got caught on my chair at work and untied the dress at one point. Luckily no one was around when I came apart. Disappointed in how it worked for me - maybe with fashion tape it could be better for others.
Pretty print; fit was awkward; top needs to be pinned or dress worn with tank

The color is beautiful but the fabric is quite sheer. I had to pin the bust to keep it from gaping and the true wrap, combined with skits on both sides proved to make the dress super unwieldy to walk around in. I wore it on a somewhat windy day and had to hold the dress down the entire time outside. It also was problematic to sit in. I order to keep the fabric from gaping in front, I had to tuck it between my legs, exposing a lot more side thigh than I'm comfortable in. I'm 5'10, so the slits on the sides came up a lot higher in me than I'd normally like. I wore it on a Friday at work with a blazer and felt fine while standing still but was super self -conscious walking or sitting. Beautiful but a pain in the a$$ to wear.

links_reviews_title: Completely see thru looks more like a cover up
links_reviews_text: Not a dress is a cover up
Thin material. Fine for a casual weekend event.

From the pictures the dress is great, but when I tried it on it was see through and there was no loop or hole to wrap the dress. So I never wore it, just put it back in the bag and sent it straight back.
Fit in the waist area... somewhat. Large in the bust, didn't even come close to covering my bra. Just large and gaping up top and not flattering at all.

links_reviews_title: If larger chested you need to wear a tank top.
links_reviews_text: good

links_reviews_title: I wore this a few couples times, both during the day and at night.
links_reviews_text: Very versatile dress but runs a little big. I loved how flowy and open it was! Slightly sheer but not a problem if you wear nude or black undies!
This dress is very pretty, however the fabric is very thin and sheer. I wore a tank and leggings under it because I would have been freezing otherwise. The overall fit was a tad on the larger side.
I didnt wear it because it was to sheer and i didn't the proper slip. Loved it and wish i had time to buy a slip to wear this dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful pattern, but hem was threadbare
links_reviews_text: I guess that's the problem with anything towards the end of season, but I didn't expect the hem of this dress to be fraying and threadbare. I didn't notice until I was in a meeting because it was a perfect thrown on and run out the door dress. Love the vibrant color and pattern

What a beautiful dress. I recommend wearing it with nude undies and bra. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 is because it wrinkles VERY easily. I wore it once and had to get it dry cleaned in order to be able to wear it again. Lovely color and pattern.
I loved this dress. It's sexy without being too revealing or feeling too dressed up. The front comes open a bit when you sit down but it's easily handled. I'll definitely rent again.
Fun dress for an outdoor summer wedding. I'm usually a 4 and the 4 fit perfectly!

links_reviews_title: Great color for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: Cannot wear bra due to exposed sides. Long enough to be dressy for a wedding!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and design - the cutouts add just enough unique and sexy details.
links_reviews_text: Fabric is thick but not too hot, I wore for a beach wedding and without any shapewear. The cutouts add a unique flair to the dress. Length is good, its tight and I sized up to be same - ended up wearing the 12 when I normally am fine with a 10.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and unique cut!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 2 or a 4 and luckily they sent me the dresses early because I was very uncomfortable in the 4. I felt much better in the 6 they sent me. I thought the color was great for a summer wedding and the cut was unique and sexy but appropriate. I thought the material was a lot thinner than other dresses I rented - I felt like you could see everything through it which I didn't like.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for outdoor summer wedding! The color and cut-out sides made it standout
links_reviews_text: Did fit a bit snug around the waist and the skirt rode up a bit as I walked. I'm usually somewhere between a size 2 and 4 and had to go up to the size 4 with this dress. But it was a very comfortable dress that fit well everywhere else and I would definitely rent it again! It was also nice to not have to worry about a bra with this dress but you could definitely wear one without worrying about hiding straps!
Beautiful fuchsia color. Cut-outs are very sexy.

Color is great. The dress is fitted so if you're not super confident and comfortable with your shape, this is probably not the dress for you. Normally, I'm a 0 but that size was skin tight and short - felt too "clubby". Not what I was going for (wedding). 2 was perfect (pictured here).
Dress was comfortable, and just sexy enough for a Friday evening wedding.
fits like a glove

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color, but very snug recommend ordering up!
links_reviews_text: PRO - Color was amazing for a summer wedding! CON - Like other reviews it is very form fitting, I ordered up a size and wore spanx but it was very flattering!
Loved the dress! It was a hit. Normally a size 0, should have ordered the 2.

links_reviews_title: i liked the color of the dress and the cut out of the top.
links_reviews_text: The dress had a slip underneath that kept riding up/ was bunching at the belly. It was not flattering and I was playing with it the whole night. The color was pretty, but unfortunately, I would not rent this dress again.

First off, this dress was lovely. I wore it to a wedding and got lots of compliments. Ok. This dress runs small. I ended up wearing the 6, which fit great on my hips but was large in the chest (I'm a 34B). Going braless wasn't an option because the top was a bit large. If you are going to wear a bra, you'll have to use a lot of fashion tape. In the end I had to settle for a little bit of bra showing. I probably wouldn't rent this again.

I wore this for an August wedding. It was very fitting. Cleavage wise, I would not recommend this dress if you're looking for a conservative look if your chest is on the larger size. I am considering buying this dress as it's the second time I've worn it! I loved it both times!
I rented this as a back up dress and ended up wearing it to brunch when my fiancé proposed to me. The fix was comfortable and the color was so vibrant. It was perfect for the occasion

links_reviews_title: Don't rent if you're self conscious.
links_reviews_text: This is a gorgeous dress, and all the other reviewers look amazing in it! However, if you're self conscious, I wouldn't suggest renting this. I'm extremely self conscious of my "back fat", thought I'd give it a try, but ended up not wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Such a Comfortable Fun Wedding Guest Dress
links_reviews_text: This was originally my backup dress for a wedding and I ended up liking it way more than the original. Seriously SO comfortable and fun for a summer event or wedding. The color is a nice bright pop for photos. Definitely a must to favorite. Totally wish I could have kept this one. Five stars all the way!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress! Definitely recommend, but runs small
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Runs on the small side

links_reviews_title: Felt sexy and classy in this.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. I'm pear shaped and I love how the shape of the dress gave my upper body more presence balancing out my lower curves.

As other reviews said, this dress definitely runs small. I ordered my typical size 4 and size 6 as backup and ended up wearing the 6. Fit pretty well overall, easy to dance in and the color was beautiful! Perfect for a spring wedding.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my business school Spring Fling plus as a wedding guest
links_reviews_text: The dress was very fitted but made of good material so did not wrinkle at all while I was sitting. Hit right above the knee.

This dress is stunning. I'm normally an 8 or 10 but sized up for the back up and it was still a little tighter than I would have liked. Nice thing was no bra! Which being large chested I've never been able to say. I didn't have any sideboob slips, everything stayed in place.

Rented this as a backup style but as soon as I put it on I fell in love. The fit is amazing. I'm usually a 0 but this was only available in a 2 and it fit perfect. Hugged all the right places and you can wear a regular bra with it. The color is definitely more pink than orange, so fun for a spring wedding. Sad to return this one!
Skintight, couldn't wear a bra. Very sexy and got a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! Loved this dress—but it's tight!
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to a friend's wedding and got so many compliments. The color is definitely bright pink (as compared with the coral color that appears in the product photo). It's VERY form fitting and I was absolutely in need of my Spanx under this to help smooth things out. I was able to get away without wearing a bra as the snugness of it ensured that everything stayed where it needed to and I didn't have any issues with things showing between the side cutouts. From the reviews, I ordered a 6 but wore the 4 as the 6 gaped a bit in the front arm holes and was baggy in the lower back area. The perfect dress to spice things up!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments, but worried about wardrobe malfunction
links_reviews_text: This dress was very flattering, and I got tons of compliments on it. However, the lining was not attached to the dress so the lining kept riding up while the rest of the dress stayed put. I had to adjust the lining more times than I would've cared to.

This dress is awesome for any time you want to show every inch and curve during a night on the town. It would be perfect for Miami or Vegas, but definitely not appropriate for other cocktail settings in tamer cities.

Color in photo is not right - it's definitely a deep bright pink, not an orangey/red poppy as pictured. That said, it fit well without being too tight, didn't show panty line, and was a simple good looking dress overall.

Great dress for a wedding! Definitely pink, not red. Saw the other reviews and I'm glad I went a size up. The cut out on the sides wasn't in the most flattering spot, but was still overall a great dress!

This dress was perfect. There was enough support that I didn't need a bra. The material was thick enough that I was able to skip the spanks. I would rent this again. I rented the 8 and the 10. Wore the 10 for some room to move.
LOVED this dress. It was true to size and perfect for a summertime wedding.

Great dress. I'm DD chest and my chest allllmost didn't all fit due to the opening on the sides. Risked the potential of some side boob. Definitely can't wear a bra. This fabric isn't too forgiving. Looked great in the dress before I ate dinner. Ate some carbs and my little stomach bulged a little bit. Also be prepared for your headlights to show if it gets cold. I tried Breast petals but they showed through the material of the dress.

links_reviews_title: Great night at a friend's wedding!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! It definitely runs small so order a size up. It's also shorter than shown on the site. I would definitely rent it again!

I loved this dress! I normally wear a size 4 but for this dress I rented an 8 and a 10 because I read the reviews and I definitely needed to wear the 10. Size up! It stayed in place and was very comfortable.
I absolutely loved this dress, it fit like a glove. It was the perfect fit of sophisticated and sexy as well as being on point with this years trends.
Wore it to a wedding but should have worn something a little more modest. Overall I loved the dress and the fit was awesome. The material had a little give/stretch so it was forgiving and hugging.

links_reviews_title: Postpartum and I LOVE LOVE LOVE this dress
links_reviews_text: I am 14 weeks postpartum and was anxious about sizing and looking like a overstuffed burrito. Needless to say, I ordered a 4 and a 6 (pre pregnancy I was a 0). The 4 was really snug, the 6 a little snug but worked! It is tight and somewhat unforgiving in certain areas but I loved the dress and would def order it again. The color is really pink! Loved the cut outs on the sides! Was great to dance in and was really comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for any spring or summer wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fit really well.

links_reviews_title: Cowboy ball and side cut outs
links_reviews_text: Rich pink color Side cut outs showed perfect classy side boob for 36DD Don't wear a bra All panty lines will show Lined but you can see everything Zip back closure So many compliments
Great dress, got a lot of compliments. Could not wear a bra. Felt shoulders were a little wide but overall loved it
This dress fit great and was loose in all the right areas. It was dressy without being too formal and amazingly comfortable!

I am a size L, 12 ... but at the last min they were not able to send me that size. So RTR still sent the M plus several backup options. Thankfully the M fit. It was a bit snug in the neck and shorter than I would have liked while hauling around two babies but it was still quite flattering, and camouflaging my mom belly well.

This was the perfect dress for my 20th high school reunion. The styling was just the right balance of fun night out and comfort. The slightly trapeze shape hid my mommy tummy, the cold shoulder detail and flounce added the right amount of flare without adding to my already large bust, and the length was right, even with my long legs and 4" heels I didn't feel like it was too short. The only reason I didn't give it five stars was it doesn't have pockets. But it does have bra keepers! The fabric is a medium weight crepe and the dress is unlined. I highly recommend this dress and I will definitely rent it again if I have any more events to go to.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! It was comfy, yet elegant.
links_reviews_text: Dress fit well and I received a lot of complements. It was hard to give back!

Loved this dress. It was comfortable but had a great slimming effect. Loved the cold shoulder. It arrived a little wrinkled, I lightly ironed it and it was perfect. Just an easy comfortable pretty dress
This dress was very flattering and comfortable. I got compliments all night!
I really liked this dress. It's light weight and easy to wear. It's roomy in the bust and the hips for a shift. I would recommend!

I got this dress in a large and a medium. I ended up wearing the medium! You'll notice in the picture, I also didn't wear it as a cold shoulder dress. I tried it on like it is in the picture and didn't think anything of it. The day of the wedding I was getting ready and ended up with the cold shoulder look. I felt a bit restricted with that look and somehow managed to get back to the look in my picture! Much more comfortable in my opinion! I felt very pretty in this dress, especially because I didn't have to wear Spanx (although, I hate them, so I don't wear them anyway!)! I'd rent this dress, again!
Pros: hides mommy tummy, loved the shoulder draping details, great fabric and perfect length

This dress was true to size. I'm 145 pounds and 5'1" and usually wear a medium. The medium fit well. I didn't actually wear it because it didn't flatter me. The other dress in my shipment was more flattering.

Loved this dress! I have a "mom pouch" and this dress was flowy enough to go over it without even needing spanx! After reading other reviews, I sized 1 size down. I typically wear a large but the medium fit perfectly.

I love this dress. I'd gained some weight and was self conscious about what dress to wear. I didn't want anything too tight in the tummy. This dress was not tight and fit perfectly. I felt beautiful in it. I'm about 145lbs (5'5") in the photo. The small was a perfect fit.
Fit true to size. I’m a 12/14 and it was loose enough to feel good on. Great for any occasion.

links_reviews_title: This is the perfect, most flattering party dress.
links_reviews_text: This is the second time I've rented this dress, and it is super flattering. The Medium fits really nicely, but is slightly shorter, so I prefer the Large. It lays really nicely, the ruffles add a nice feminine touch, and it is just a really great dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect! Comfy, classy, and flattering.
links_reviews_text: I had read in reviews that this dress ran large which worked perfectly for me. I wear a 16/18 normally, but the xl (14) was perfect! You won't be disappointed in this gorgeous black dress.

links_reviews_title: Blue man group for fiancee's birthday in vegas was amazing!
links_reviews_text: Great alternative to a lbd! Super comfy. If you're going simple and classy - this is great! Loved that it hid my trouble spots (arms and belly) without needing a belt or sweater. If you're looking for a bit more sexy, another dress or light colored stockings with pumps is fantastic. I wore with wedge boots and dark tights to casual this style down.

links_reviews_title: Who knew a LBD could be so comfortable?
links_reviews_text: Very very comfortable - probably best dress I've rented from RTR yet. Will definitely rent again. Currently 180#, 63", and DDD chest.

links_reviews_title: The wedding was black tie optional and this dress was appropriate even though it wasn't 1st choice.
links_reviews_text: This dress fits exactly as the display picture shows. It was super comfortable as it was not fitted. It runs a little big as I don't wear a Medium too often and it fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Loved this! Perfect for a wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect for me. I absolutely loved wearing this dress. I felt comfortable all night. I would have bought it if I could!
This was my backup dress and I’m so glad I got it. I wore a size medium which is what I typically wear in dresses that are not form fitting. I loved this dress, it was comfortable and flattering!!!
This was perfect for a rehearsal dinner! It was so comfortable and flattering. The fabric and style is so forgiving if you're feeling a little self conscious about your arms or stomach as I do!

links_reviews_title: This little black dress was so comfortable.
links_reviews_text: This dress fir perfect and had a nice flow so it was also very flattering.

links_reviews_title: I didn't want to send this dress back!
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing! It does run a bit big, I normally wear a medium but was able to wear the small. It's super flattering and you don't even need to wear spanx ;) It might be a little short for taller girls, I am about 5'6" and I for sure wouldn't bend over in it haha. I would buy this dress if I could!

I got the medium and the large and went with the medium. It fit great, was comfortable, and perfect for the party I went to. I have trouble finding clothes to fit but this dress was flattering. Very classy.

I ordered the S and XS and ended up wearing the S, mostly because I felt the XS was a little too short. The S fell a couple of inches above my knees--apologies that I didn't get a more full-length photo. I think this dress is a fun style, flattering for many body types, and comfortable to both sit and dance in. There's a cute pearl button at the back of the neck, so I got to wear my pearl jewelry! I'm 5'2", 135 lbs, curvy, 36C.

I wore this to a work party. Very cute, simple, and comfortable! It runs a little large so it's not quite as flattering or form-fitting as other dresses but I definitely enjoyed wearing it for the night!
Great dress. It did run large. I'm normally a 10/12, but the medium for me perfect! Comfortable and forgiving.
Fit well. Only complaint was that it was a little too short for my taste.

I rented this dress for a gala for the nonprofit I work for. It was very comfortable and a great LBD. I liked that I could wear fun jewelry with it- it was easy to wear and I would rent it again for a similar event. The large would have been perfect but wasn't available when I ordered. (Sorry for the mirror picture; I worked the event and didn't get to take a picture there!)

RTR could not send the backup size (S) so I wore the M. It was probably a bit big but I felt great in it because it hid my midsection which is what I wanted! I'm renting the dress again already but have ordered the (S) again as the backup size! Good experience!
This dress was roomy and comfortable. Love the black color and the cold shoulder detail. You don't have to suck anything in in this dress. It was so comfortable!
Great LBD. You can dress it up or down as much as you want. Loved that it was looser so it was very comfortable. Probably could've worn the small, but the Medium worked out great too.

links_reviews_title: I want this dress! It is comfortable and fun. I wore this for a work graduation celebration.
links_reviews_text: I have broad shoulders and this dress worked perfectly for me. I probably could have worn a medium; however, there wasn't one available.
Perfect for a wedding! I'm a size 12 in dresses and I wore a large comfortably.

Runs large, very comfy. Sleeves aren't awkward at all. In the pic my bra strap had fallen down :-/ Was able to chase a 2 1/2 yr old around a wedding all night with no problem lol. Only dislike is I felt like it made me look boxy/bigger than I am. Did receive lots of compliments on it though.
This was actually my back-up dress but I am so glad the other did not fit because this one made me feel SO good! I loved the cold shoulder look and the ruffles added to it!

links_reviews_title: Amazing free flowing dress- the perfect LBD
links_reviews_text: Absolutely fantastic rental. I was so comfortable all night. The wedding was outside and I was nervous I would get too hot but the material kept me cool and I received a million compliments! Highly recommend!!!!

I wore this dress to a retirement party. I'm 5'8", 150 lbs, athletic build. This dress was very comfy, with plenty of room for movement. I wore a Medium, and possibly could have worn a Small (however size small typically is too tight across the shoulders (not a concern with this dress) or too short. The material is heavy enough to not blow in the wind, and I didn't need a slip. I wore a black sports bra since a regular bra straps were exposed on the shoulders due to cut of dress. I'd definitely rent this again.

I rented this dress for my birthday dinner and I couldn't have loved it more! It fit me like a glove, and was so comfortable even when sitting and eating. I was so sad to return it and I will definitely rent it again!

I ordered a medium but could have possibly worn a small. There was plenty of room. Very comfortable. Loved the high neckline, so I could show off short, bulky necklace (looked great with it). Could dress up with heels or even more casual with wedges or nice sandals. Would definitely rent again.
Wore to a party and got so many compliments! Material kinda thin but quality is good
Loved how this fit me at 21 weeks pregnant! I felt cute but still comfortable.

With the little bow and flouncy skirt this dress should be super feminine on. It made me feel anything but feminine due to the cut. Yeah I know it's drop waist but something about the way this was constructed made it bulge in places it shouldn't and made me look like an apple. I don't mind looking boyish but I do mind being given bulges I don't have that made me look like I have a big mid section. I did wear this to work as I wanted something different but it didn't make me feel good about myself.
I suppose it's a little boxy but I love the fit. It's comfortable and light. I love the bow and the v in the back. I'm only 5'2 so it could be short in taller gals.

If you have a little tummy like me, this dress takes care of business. It covers just what you need it to while making you feel ultra feminine. It was almost a little too short for work but I just paired with a shorter heel. Love this dress. Can't wait to rent again.
Flattering, would rent again. Very comfortable.
I liked this dress. If it was comfortable, with a flattering fit, classy, but still cute for an evening work event.

This dress is cute and comfortable. My shoulders are broad and my build is athletic. I've had a difficult time selecting rental dresses that fit me well. However, with dress I received lots of compliments at my friend's wedding.

links_reviews_title: Sweet drop-waisted dress for expecting mom
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress at 31 weeks. I'm 5'9" and the dress is short but not too short, even with the bump. I loved the fabric and the tie at the neck.

links_reviews_title: Love the fun bow & baby bump friendly
links_reviews_text: The bow at the collar is super fun! Float & fabulous. The style is friendly for a baby bump too! (28 Weeks) would definitely rent again
Much more flattering than expected.

links_reviews_title: It was a perfect little black dress
links_reviews_text: Fit good and was very comfortable
Loved this dress!! Wore it to work and then everything in between. So easy to wear and loved the little peek a boo in the back. Great length for work. Loved the tie sash at neck.
Great work dress. Got a lot of compliments. Loose fit - super comfortable . Runs short but work appropriate on my 5'3 frame

I wasn't as big of a fan of this dress on me as other people were - I got tons of compliments. I'm curvy so I usually prefer dresses that are more structured. But it was definitely cute! With all the compliments, I may end up renting it again!

I rented this dress to wear as a bridesmaid at my friends bridal shower. It was in March, and though I rented it to wear with spring wedges, the temp dropped day-of and thankfully the dress looked just as pretty with black tights and booties. I feel like this is a dress for all occasions. Can't go wrong with classic black. The bow is adorable and I was happy I didn't need to go strapless under the dress. I am pear-shaped and the dress was (slightly!) loose up top and (slightly!) tight on bottom, so I think this runs true to size.

links_reviews_title: Black shift with a twist. The high neck and bow at the top make it fun and different.
links_reviews_text: Casual little black number with a drop waist and adorable tie-yourself bow. It's forgiving and easy to wear. I paired it with a little faux fur and pearls to create an Audrey Hepburn look for the theme of the shower.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress. Simple, easy black dress.
links_reviews_text: The bow is much cuter in pics online than it is in person, but overall, this dress was super cute. Short enough for a work party but not TOO short. Nice to wear a normal bra with it. Partners well with cute black heels!

links_reviews_title: This dress is a must ! It was very elegant and was a hit !
links_reviews_text: It fits to true size
This dress was everything!! It was perfect fit and I had room to eat. Lol This was a perfect choice for my birthday dress!! Thanks rtr for the dress, ear rings and rings! I love rtr pro!!!

Before I added the belt I thought it was a little long and shapeless but the belt totally made the look. The dress was super comfortable and the bow added some fun to it. I love the dress but definitely size down and short girls beware it is long.

My first choice wasn't available so stylist helped me out of my comfort zone and into this dress. Beyond comfortable and just trendy enough for a dinner in the city. Would highly recommend as an alternative to bodycon styles!

links_reviews_title: Super cute dress - too short for work
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. I received it without the neck bow; however despite that, it was still super cute worn backwards with the v-neck in the front. It's super short, so not exactly conservative work appropriate unless you are petite. The lighter stitching on the bottom makes the dress. Very light and float -worked well for 90 degree weather, and also worked well paired with a blazer. No spanks required - the cut is very forgiving.

links_reviews_title: Simple and conservative, but still sexy. Perfect for so many occasions! I had to buy it!
links_reviews_text: Easy and comfortable fit. (Play around with the bow a bit to get the perfect look.) So cute and simple, but still sexy. Loved it so much I had to buy it and I can see it being perfect for many occasions.
Dress up or down. Flowy skirt. Lots of compliments
Dress fit small and was a little short for my height.
Too tight in the chest, and too short.
I'm 5'10'' and it was probably too short for work. But so cute!
The dress is nice and comfortable all over; not too tight and did a good job of hiding the extra holiday weight I was carrying. I am currently wearing a size 12 and the L fit great.
People said it ran large, plus it isn't fitted so I thought it get a medium. But it is supposed to be loose and the medium was way too small
Very comfortable. Loved the neck and tie, as well as the way the dress lays in the back. Really classic and pretty. I wore to a rehearsal dinner and it was great LBD with unique style.

links_reviews_title: i accidentally wore it backwards - and it looked super cute! LOL
links_reviews_text: lining is tight in the chest

links_reviews_title: Great day to night dress for a 90 degree plus day in NYC
links_reviews_text: Neck tie is adorable, super girly! I wore this work on a summer day, because I am more on the shorter side it hit me right above the knee.

links_reviews_title: This fit much longer and more bag like then it appears in the photo.
links_reviews_text: The top tie at the neck was originally what drew me to this dress, but when it arrived the small felt big and baggy as opposed to cute. I'm pretty short (5'0") so the dress fell just above the knee instead of mid thigh on me. For a taller person, this would most likely be a fun, casual dress just not for me.
Cute details

links_reviews_title: Sadly didn't get to wear...evening cancelled.
links_reviews_text: The date night I rented this dress for was cancelled but I will rent this again! It was beautiful,stylish and comfortable. Fit great!
Cute dress, Fits true to size, Just end up not being the look I wanted. Would be great for brunch, ladies night out, or casual date night.
Small fit great. I'm 124lbs, 34DD. Great length for work and lunch with the girls. White trim doesnt show up in pictures

Item was overall large. Also--bra straps were an issue b/c cant wear a racerback b/c the back is open, and reg bra showed every second of the day. Even still, i would buy this dress in a minute! ...i just want the smaller size!

I rented this for my fiance's bday party. It was fun but the necktie was awkward. I couldn't figure out how to position it so it kept slipping around. It started out lookibg like the RTR model pic but didn't stay that way. Maybe double-sided taoe would help? Fit really well on my petite frame though.
Thick warm quality material, just enough balance to be sexy but not too revealing!
