Wore to a work awards banquet. I was a little nervous about the slit, but the rest of the dress almost hit my knees so despite my insecurities I felt fine about the length in the end. Super happy with this dress and received lots of compliments!

This dress is stretchy! I was anticipating a fabric with no give but was pleasantly surprised. There is no zipper, so you need to pull this over your head but once it is on, it is oh so sexy! Very comfortable and unique. Would rent again!

I wore this to a reception and got many compliments. I liked this dress; however, if you're curvy, it WILL rise when you walk. The dress was super sexy and the fabric felt amazing, but the split was kind of high. I'm tall and have hits so it is definitely form fitting, but still classy for an after 5 event.

This dress was incredibly comfortable. I used a size M and it fit beautifully. Sometimes it would slide up but it wasn't very often. I got tons of compliments. It's thick in material, so keep that in mind!
Nice fit, not too tight. The split made the dress extra special.

The dress had stretch which was nice. It was thick material so definitely for winter. I wore it with black tights and black boots. Would have looked a bit more dressed up with heels. I could have maybe gotten away with a medium.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, comfy and warm perfect for a winter event!
links_reviews_text: This is my first time ordering from RTR an i'm sorry i'm just now ordering from them. I'm 5'11 and this was for my annual tax-season work party at a country club so I wanted something sexy but mostly covered. This was the perfect dress for that, the length was perfect (a little above the knee) and the material was thick enough to keep me warm on such a cold winter night. I wore black tights an booties an it looked great, I had many compliments that night. Great first time using Rent the Runway!

I liked the dress overall. Loved the slit of the dress, nice detail. The back opening was another touch that made the dress stand out. It hugs the curves very nicely. My only concern was that I had to pull dress down a couple of times so that the top part doesn't bunch up. Nice stretchy fabric.

links_reviews_title: A dress that brings comfort, class and warmth to a perfect mix!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my friend's baby shower. The location of the shower was on a yacht and the requested attire was Business Casual. The forecast that day was cold with a potential to snow so I wanted something warm to wear. I had my first child 3.5 months ago and lost all of my baby weight plus excess and wanted to find something comfortable but classy to accommodate my new body especially since my boobs grew but I lost my curves. The dress has a cut out in the back and hugs the body bringing attention to areas that may be considered problem areas for most women so making sure you wear proper undergarments is a must. I wore spanx to suck in my belly and a proper bra to lift my boobs and to keep straps from showing in the cutout back. The dress has a slit and isn't too short but make sure your undergarments are seamless. I felt warm, classy and comfortable and I highly recommend this dress!

Very easy to move and breathe in this dress. I found that it runs true to size with a little extra room around the armpits. The slit is higher than expected so was grateful I had tights to wear. Overall pretty easy wear, flattering, and understated.

I selected this dress for a night out with friends. I didn't know where we would end up and I wanted something attractive, but not loud. This dress was a solid choice. The fabric and cut of the dress is flattering and I think that for being a form fitting dress, it managed to disguise my tummy area. It had great stretch too, making it extremely comfortable. I think it did end up riding up a bit as I danced throughout the night, but honestly I was not too concerned about it. The sltit is not crazy high in the front and the back of the dress fell above the back of my knees, so it is not scandalous if it does ride up. It is winter and snowy currently so I wore this with black tights (not pictured) and over the knee flat boots.
Forgiving. Cute slit but i wore tights as it was cold.

This dress from my ribcage up was so cute. I loved the back detail, and the fabric was thick , stretchy, and warm. Oddly, it was SO large in the hips. My husband even noticed and kinda pulled on the loose fabric on the sides. I wound up wearing it because we were out of town for a formal event and I didn't have any other choice. It was fine but just strange because I'd say my butt is proportional to the rest of my body and I always wear an XS. It was fine either way, but I would have sent it back if I had tried it on before taking it with us out of town. If you have a booty that is often too snug in things that fit your top half, this dress is for you!
Fit like a glove. The slit made this pretty dress have some sexy. It hugged all the right places. Would recommend to anyone.

This dress was great! It was very comfortable, but fit snugly. The material is thicker, so it was perfect for my holiday party that was outdoors. I'm usually a medium, and the small fit me very well. The dress does ride up a bit but that would be my only complaint.

Loved the dress except the sleeves were a little long and the collar was a bit too loose. I managed as the side slit and open part on the back gave it enough of a feminine feel to over look the looser neck and longer sleeves. I'm glad I rented it.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and warm for a cold night
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a dinner date and it was perfect for a cold fall night. The sleeves and high neckline keep you warm but the slit in the skirt and the opening in the back make it sexy. I could've worn the Small but since I was going to dinner wanted something with a bit more room in the middle. Overall would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, but rode up all night
links_reviews_text: Fit fine, but rode up. A little big. Could have used an xxs. Prefer other brands, but I️t was fine.

I liked this dress but didn't love it. The material is great- thick and warm and the sleeves are very long. But the fit was not flattering on my body type. There's a seam right above the tummy which really emphasizes any insecurity you may have in that area. Definitely wear with tights. Slit is very high!

links_reviews_title: Sexy style! But didn't fit quite right :(
links_reviews_text: Loved this rental! The material is very thick and shapes you well. I was in between the S and the M but ended up going with the M because it was more comfortable at the waist. But then the top was way too big -- I wore the biggest push up bra I had but there was still a lot of extra material around the neck and arms. Wore it with my hair down to cover the neckline.
Wore this for NYE - it was perfect! It kept me warm in Dallas while it was chilly and still was sexy with a slit up the leg. Got tons of compliments!!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on the dress while being pregnant felt great!
links_reviews_text: It was perfect stretchy material yet form fitting, great quality dress.

Dress was perfect for a winter party. The fabric was thick & the long sleeves kept me warm. The slit was sexy and the overall form fit, received tons of compliments! Super comfortable too! Would totally rent again.

This dress is fitted and sexy for a date night or night out. At 5'7-5'8, you can see the slit is pretty high on me, so I wore with black tights and booties. The sleeves and length otherwise keep it more appropriate. I could never wear with a blazer for work, but may be less sexy for a shorter lady.

links_reviews_title: Great dress... rides up a bit.
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a snowy winter evening event. Material was thick & giving. Dress was super cute, but it did ride up a bit. Found myself pulling it down throughout the night but not annoying enough not to recommend. It was perfectly conservative & sexy at the same time.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress. One of my favorite rentals from RTR.
links_reviews_text: The fabric is super flexible which always for easy movement - perfect for dancing the night away. It was a little snug on my lower torso so I just wore spanx which helped keep everything in :-) I'm typically a size 10 and found that the Medium fit much better than the Large. The slit did ride up a little bit.
Everything about this dress was perfect for a cool spring night out. It easily went from day to evening event. It was tad snug, but in a form fitting way.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a date night out
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It was a bit out of my comfort zone, but I'm so glad I picked it! The slit was so flattering and the fit was perfect. The key hole in the back was also a sexy touch. I got compliments all night long.
Perfect Fit did keep on riding up but I didn't mind it!! Big booty problems
It was cool dress, with sexy slit & cut out on a back, it could be easy for work or play , fabric was medium weight-( spring/ fall). I would re rent it for business meeting

This dress made me feel amazing for my Valentine's Day day! I'm very curvy and this dress hugged me in all the right places. The fabric is thick, so it's a great dress to wear in the middle of winter. And always a plus, I could wear a regular bra with it! I loved this dress!

I wore this dress to a gala and it was perfect. The long sleeves and high neck make it classy, while the slit and fun pattern make it fun! I would say it is overall true to size, but the chest area was a little large on me.

links_reviews_title: Really flattering dress! Loved the cutout in the back!
links_reviews_text: Nice thick stretchy fabric-no shapewear needed! Super cute and sexy for a night out. Loved it even though it fit a little large on top.

Loved, loved this dress! I used my pro membership complimentary birthday rental for this dress and earrings. My birthday is in January so it's always cold, and our town is fairly casual, but it's always nice to dress up once in a while! It was super comfortable and warm. The a-cut slit added the appropriate amount of sexiness. I paired it with strappy black booties and a black clutch.

links_reviews_title: Super modern, fun dress! Perfect for winter event.
links_reviews_text: Fit was great! Very comfortable and thick material. Small was perfect and even with my longer torso the slit was still sexy but appropriate. Definitely recommend!
Fit great! Slit made it a little sexier and has a cute opening in the back!

links_reviews_title: Really cute dress... runs large and kind of baggy top
links_reviews_text: The dress was really cute and looks awesome on this model but maybe I am just too small for it... story of my life. It runs a little large and I had worn the XS and you can still tell it was big. The shoulders and neck area seemed really baggy, and was shifting around all night, and I also had to roll up the sleeves. The dress is very stretchy which is great but just too large for my short self.

Lined and super comfy, great cold weather dress. Can wear with a regular bra. I felt it fit a little big in the chest, but not enough for anyone else to notice. I like that this dress doesn't have zippers you just slide it on, so do your hair after you put it on.

This dress what classy due to its sleeves, full coverage and length of skirt, yet sassy with the slit and cut out in the back. The tweed like texture was so unique, and also offered warmth in the winter. I wore with a regular bra (because the cut out is higher), black tights, and knee high black boots. I didn't wear jewelry since the dress was so busy! I felt that the fit was tight on the upset half. Normal if wear an XS, but my shoulders didn't fit in the XS (I do have broad shoulders though)!

Fit TTS but will show all your curves and details. I did not have any issues with the cutout areas as far as showing too much or not fitting well. But in all the right places. It was very comfortable considering the length and close fit. Would wear again!

This dress really stands out! I wore this for my husband's birthday - he absolutely loved it and I got a lot of compliments that night. It shows a little too much skin and is a little too tight for my taste. I think this dress serves better as a new years eve party dress, or a bachelorette party dress or even a wilder birthday (my husband's birthday was at a random bar). It's the perfect dress to go clubbing. I would recommend renting this dress, and I could possibly think of re-renting but for the right occasion.

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove and was true to size.
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my husband‘s holiday work party. It was very fun to wear and I got lots of compliments. The cutouts and open back are definitely revealing so confidence is a must to pull it off. I did find myself tugging down the upper part of the back throughout the night because of being self-conscious about back fat, but overall I loved wearing this dress and would definitely rent again!
Fits true to size with a little stretch. Wore this dress last week on my honeymoon in Barbados! Sexy and fun!

This is a belated review, but I rented this dress for my birthday celebration with friends which included a dinner, hotel pregame, and then a rooftop bar. I'm busty and am not blessed with gravity-defying tatas, so I was nervous how this was going to fit with my strapless bra. Typically outfits like this always end up having the underwire showing, but luckily that wasn't the case! There isn't much give and definitely fit like a glove, but I loved it and felt extremely powerful and attractive.

links_reviews_title: Sparky easy fun - lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: #glamorous #party #miamidatenight

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! Love this dress!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect! The sequins were not itchy at all. I would rent this dress again! The delivery process was an absolute nightmare, but the dress arrived barely in time for my second event and helped make up for the experience.
I love this dress. It was the second time I have rented it! The sequins were soft and comfortable, so no chafing. Super sexy and flattering!
I felt like it shadowed a little in the tummy area and the arms were itchy. It didn't stop me from dancing the night away to Lady Gaga but probably wouldn't rent again.
Dress was very comfortable and for me like a glove. The length was perfect and the silver is more of s gray/silver than a really bright silver. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: NYP. Perfect dress for the occasion !!!!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable dress for NYE Party!! Danced all night in it.

links_reviews_title: Wore this fun dress to my daughters Cheer Banquet.
links_reviews_text: Sparkles were fun, fit was perfect and loved the side and back opening!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my work holiday party!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove! Held everything in and didn’t want to take it off, definitely recommend this dress!
Great fit overall. Loved the matte look of the sequins. Length is tasteful and I was able to dance all night!

links_reviews_title: Fits true to size with plenty of stretch.
links_reviews_text: I've got a rather large donk. I'm 5'3" 148 lbs and the size 8 fit me just fine. Recommend either a strapless bra or one of those bra hooks to turn a regular bra into a racer back (Target has them). I felt super sassy in this and it was perfect for Beyonce & Jay-Z OTR II mom's night out! Would definitely rent again.

I got so many compliments on this dress! I always wear a 2 from RTR and this fit true to size. It's tight for sure, but not too tight. I easily navigated lots of dancing and moving around with no major issues. The only thing I didn't love was that it was a little clingy around the tummy area, but overall not a big deal. The cutouts are super fun, too.
Perfect fit for a 0, not itchy either! I am 5,2 and about 120lbs and I always wear a 0 from RTR.
Sexy and comfy, thick enough keep everything in. The sequins scratched my inner arms though, making it fine for sitting or standing but difficult for walking.

I love this edgy dress by Halston Heritage! The perfect party dress! This dress true to size so you should size up for your back up. The dress is fitted but comfortable. It works best for any cup size and should be worn with a strapless bra! Pair with heels and accessories to complete this look!

I rented this as an option to wear for bachelorette party but ended up not wearing it because i liked the other one better. This dress is much nicer than it looks on the model. The side cutouts are more pronounced and very flattering. I wish I had another event to wear this for!

links_reviews_title: It was a very cute and sexy dress for a Friday night out at a club for a birthday barty.
links_reviews_text: I got the 2 and the 4 and ended up wearing the 4. It fit fine (was a little snug), but looked great overall. The cutouts were a sexy feature.
I wore this dress for NYE! It was so perfect! Fit true to size and was the perfect length!
Fit was wonderful, as was construction. Ended up wearing with tights and a blazer over because it was so cold, but impossible to NOT look amazing in this dress!

If I ever wanted to find the perfect NYE dress, this is it! It's different and shows just enough skin to keep it fun! The fit is true to size and would work best for A to C cups. There is a zipper for the torso and the bottom separately, making it easy to get in and out of this dress! I would recommend a racerback bra or a strapless bra. Pair with some accessories and some comfortable shoes to ring in the new year or make a statement at your next night out!
Size up! Cute if I had the right size.

Rented this dress for a festive-themed night out in December and it was perfect for the occasion. I love that the sequins aren't super shiny, so I didn't feel like a walking disco ball. The cutout adds a cool, sexy touch without being too much. Docked one star off because the fit was a little off for me (large in the chest, slightly long in the torso, length was almost to my knees), but I'm really petite, so I expected it to be overall a little big. I wouldn't rent it again, but it worked for what I needed!
Fit perfect - nice thick material that hugged all of the right places.

links_reviews_title: Really fun but not the most flattering
links_reviews_text: This definitely requires spanx and might not be the best for curvy girls. It fit great, but the look was all bust and it showed everything I wanted to hide on my stomach. It also probably looks better on darker skin than my super fair skin.

links_reviews_title: Not great if you're self conscious about middle
links_reviews_text: As soon as I put this on it was an instant no. If you have a stomach at all, which I do, it accentuates it. Didn't wear it. If you're not sure about sizing I'd say size up; my usual 6 was a struggle to zip.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty. Wore it for a "Roaring 20's" cocktail party.
links_reviews_text: Fit well - somewhat revealing on the sides.

links_reviews_title: so flattering, and fun. I would have bought this dress if I could afford it.
links_reviews_text: bodycon type dress, fits great, I am 5'4'' and 115lbs, size 2 was perfect!

links_reviews_title: This dress got a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I love the cut of this dress and it can be dressed up to be super glamorous and be worn on a fancy/formal occasion, or it can be toned down for low key parties. Pros: A very comfortable dress to spend time in. It was easy to move in, so if your occasion or party is a little more active then this dress is appropriate. Cons: If you are large chested I don't know if this dress would fit. I am very small chested and the fit was very close. If you are tall, or have long legs it might be too short.
True to size, agree with other reviews

I rented this for a NYE party. The fabric is nice and the cutout look is cute, but the dress is very weirdly sized. I am 5'11" ~135 and the top fit perfectly whereas the bottom was super loose. They have separate zippers and everything. Unable to wear even the smaller size; I am normally a 6 or 8 but would have needed a 4 at least.
This dress was perfect! We had four events in one day so I needed something for day and night. With a jacket on it worked great for day events and at night it was fun and sexy with the back cut out!!

links_reviews_title: Cutouts didn't work on my small frame
links_reviews_text: This was an interesting one indeed. I read a bunch of reviews and thought it looked great on people that seemed to have similar body types as mine! Unfortunately, it didn't work AT ALL. The cutouts were too low and super unflattering as a result. Maybe my torso is too short for it? I honestly have no idea, but it was just all wrong. Super disappointing.

If you are looking to slay the night away and look like a million bucks? This is the dress for you. It fits true to size, and was super comfortable all night long. I can't tell you how many compliments I received. Sadly, I was having TOO much fun to take photos, but I can guarantee I felt like I could conquer the runway if I wanted to.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it because it didn't fit right
links_reviews_text: Not flattering for petite bodies, if you have a large bust and small bottom this is not ideal

links_reviews_title: It was tight in the top area.
links_reviews_text: It was too tight for my liking.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress for a festive party!
links_reviews_text: I like the dress, it was just a little bit too big for me. I range anywhere in dresses from a 2 to a 6, and I had the 6, but I think a 4 would have been perfect.

It's a cool dress. The neckline does need some steaming and some fashion tape to hold it up, but it looks good up top. I've got some hips so it was right around them, and I could barely get my hands in the pockets. Sizing up makes it too big in the chest.

This dress ended up being a nylon sporty material which was a big surprise. I needed to belt it to make the dress flattering. Once belted it totally changed the looked. There is high slit on the side, which made the dress feel younger. It is super comfortable and highly recommend it.
Nice material and side slit is great. Pocket placement was strange. Mid section was strangely puffy. Material at neckline doesn't keep its shape & droops down.

links_reviews_title: So light and comfortable and flattering!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! It's the right amount of sexy and comfort. The mid section is roomy but the way the dress is designed also keeps it very flattering. The material is so light. My only issue was that the notch cutout on the top kept folding down so you need fashion tape or something to keep it up like in the model photo. But because the dress is so light, it moves with you. Will definitely rent this again for another event!

This is such a sexy dress!!!!! The style, fit and color - are so hot - and although it's a fitted dress, it was very comfortable. It's true to size and the only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 stars is because it's a weird length. Not to the floor but not mid-calf and it just seemed like it should've been floor-length or just below the knee. It's definitely a winner - LOVE the color!!!!

This was one of my favorite RTR rentals. I got tons of compliments, it was super comfortable, and perfect for my ageing body where the less flesh on display the better! It pulls over the head, doesn't wrinkle and came to just above my ankles.

Rented this for a company awards dinner and received several compliments. My tummy is my challenging area and the rouching in the middle helped me try to hide it. The dress felt great, the material was very comfortable and not too hot. Would definitely wear this one again.

links_reviews_title: So comfortable - looks effortless but chic and flattering
links_reviews_text: Loved this one, which surprised me. I tried it in on a whim and it just felt so comfy and I knew I wouldn't be messing with a bra line, straps or annoying bodice zippers, bust issues, etc. it was super easy to wear and I felt fancy enough for a black tie gala but not overdone. Added gold jewelry and a tight low pony and got many compliments :) I'm 5'8", around 128, a 34C. The small would have been fine but seemed like it might stretch a bit with wear (which it did), so went with XS - glad I did!

Super stretchy and comfy. Not especially flattering for my body type (might be better for even bigger builds), though. Also, RTR recommended the large and I'm not sure why. The arms were way too long, and since the dress is stretchy, a S or M would probably be fine.
Amazing will rent again

I did not expect this dress to fit or look good but it was so comfortable and stretchy. The fabric sucked everything in but wasn't constricting. Annoyed that I didn't get any good pictures that do the dress justice, but if is really worth a try! Serious thank you to the associates in the flagship store for the recco!

This dress is so comfortable! The fabric had a bit of give so you don't really have to worry as much about the perfect size. I am 5'7 and it was a little short with heels but still worked very well. Beautiful color that got me lots of compliments. I would rent this again!
I wore this dress twice - for an opera and a 70th Bday party. Each time I wore it, I received several compliments and headturns. It is a beautiful dress! I would rent it again.
beautiful fit, length was great (I was concerned since I am relatively short), but low heels worked very well. loved the color as well!

The dress was perfect, I received many compliments. The color is vibrant and the dress is very comfortable and easy to wear, great for dancing. The length was perfect, I am 5'4" and just wore small heels.

The picture doesn't do this dress justice. It wasn't a first or second choice it was actually my 3rd choice but it was definitely the best. I didn't end up wearing my first choice. I asked for a size 8 but the tag says XLR. The fit wasn't great but this dress fit perfectly. It was stretch which was good. It also had long sleeves and I have really long arms but I still had some that I could bunch up at my wrists. It you have larger arms, this isn't the dress for you. The sleeve are slim but in addition to long arms, they are also skinny. One thing to note though, it does conform to the shapes your body makes. Meaning if I sat for a long time, there was 2 indents where my knees were in the dress but I just pulled it back out and it went straight again. I'm 5'4" and the dress just hit the floor until I put on my 2 inch heels and then it was right at the top of my pumps. For someone taller it will obviously be shorter. I would buy this dress if I could.

It would be lovely on some, but the color washed me right out. Plus, I couldn't make the criss-cross over the chest work in a flattering way. However, the dress is extremely comfortable. Still, it went right back in the bag.
Too fancy for work, I'm 37 and I felt very Downton Abbey - just a little too matronly for me.
Beautiful dress but the arm holes are very tight, which makes it uncomfortable!
Wore this for a bridal shower and loved the way it fit!!

This dress was perfect for the July wedding we went to! I usually wear a size 12 but was able to wear the 10 quite comfortably. My ONLY criticism is that the part that was under my right arm was a bit baggy. But nothing I had to keep fooling with or that made it uncomfortable to wear. Absolutely LOVED this dress.
This fit true to size for me but it was a little snug under the arm.

links_reviews_title: It was okay, wasn't flattering. I wore it anyway.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'9" and weighed 180 at the time. It just wasn't my cut. Someone less busty would have done better.
I'm not too sure who they thought could fit in this arm hole but it is incredibly small. Almost painful.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress so much I wore it twice on our vacation in Paris and in London! Very flattering!
links_reviews_text: This dress was very flattering and comfortable. Runs true to size.
Wore this for my birthday celebration in Mexico! Was super hot that day but this dress was very easy to wear and looked fabulous even through the heat!

Wore this out to dinner with co workers when on our annual convention. Fit well. The underarms were tight which I have never experienced before. Length was good and overall comfort was great. It was a little too fluttery for my personal style but I received lots of compliments on it.
Love the room in this dress to accommodate my growing belly (19 weeks when I wore this). It's not too short either. Beware the armhole on the left side -- for larger biceps, you may need to size up.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and off the shoulder!!!
links_reviews_text: I loved the color and style of the dress! Very comfortable! The only thing was that it was a little tight on the right armpit - when I tried the 12, it was huge but still tight there too. Once I had the 10 on all night, I didn't notice. I received so many compliments! Wish this dress was always in my closet :)
I wore this to a bridal shower and it was easily dressed up or down. Super comfortable and flattering.
Liked this one better on than I thought I would. The dress was light and airy. Wore a couple times before sending back since I was with different crowds :).

links_reviews_title: An easy vacation dress but nothing too special.
links_reviews_text: Very true to size. Easy to wear, didn't wrinkle in my luggage. Not the best color for me but overall a worthwhile vacation rental.
loved this dress for a summer week night outing
So cute! Very flattering and great for a bridal shower!

I thought this was a great dress for my cousin's bachelorette weekend in Charleston. It is comfortable, fun, the fabric is nice a and light on a hot day, and doesn't take up much room in your luggage.

Overall I liked the dress. Nice print and good length. What I didn't like was that the area under the right armpit (if you look at the model picture) was pretty tight. The dress fit very nicely except for that area. I still wore it and got complements. I would recommend to size up for busty ladies to avoid armpit trouble.
This dress is very comfy, Its not flattering on big boobie people. It made me look even bigger in the chest because is blossoms out to the waist.
Lightweight, cinched waist gives the dress a nice shape while still being flowy.
Fit perfect. Comfortable elastic around waist. Received several compliments.

links_reviews_title: Pretty floral dress that was form flattering and great for the graduation I was attending
links_reviews_text: Dress itself is very pretty - the floral print is nice and it is a high low hem. I wore it for my sisters graduation weekend to a nice dinner My only complaint was the armpit that everyone else in the reviews talked about. The armpit on the sleeveless side was very tight. I was Still able to wear it but there were a few times I found myself pulling at it

I love this summery dress by Shoshanna! Running true to size with stretch in the waistband, I recommend ordering your true size. This style is roomy throughout the midsection and loose and flowy at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You not able to wear a standard bra because of the one-shoulder detail so you should wear a strapless bra or a convertible bra where you can remove the one strap. At 5'3 the length hit mid-thigh to knee length on me. I love the colors and print and how flirty this dress is! Pair with wedges or espadrilles to complete your summery sundress look!

Lovely pop of color! The yellow is a bit darker / more marigold in person, but still a beautiful dress. Agree with the other reviewers that the arm hole is a bit tight and uncomfortable, but I was still able to wear it
Fit well, true to size. I liked the one shoulder look and was fine with a strapless bra.
Beautiful colors and everything from the waist down was great. The chest/arm area was very small and tight.
I couldn't get this on past my hips. (And I'd like to say it's because my butts too big-that my squats have been paying off 😉- but sadly it just runs REALLY small.)
Wore for a semi-fancy dinner out. Had to use a little fashion tape to keep the top in the right place but loved it regardless- SO flattering.

links_reviews_title: Great fit & super cute. Lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Cute for casual day wear or dress it up with heels
Love it

links_reviews_title: Great dress but tiny arm hole
links_reviews_text: Dress fit great everywhere except the small arm hole

I sized up based on reviews of the arm hole. It was a little tight, but not uncomfortable. As a whole, loved the look and feel of the dress! After wearing it all day, the elastic was very itchy by the end of the evening, but only a small inconvenience.

I sized up because of the issues other reviewers noted about the armhole, and they were right. This is quite tight from the shoulder to opposite underarm. Otherwise it's a lovely dress; comfortable due to the elastic waist, and a lightweight fabric perfect for late spring.
Very nice, tiny bit small

links_reviews_title: Flowy dress, perfect for seaside vacation.
links_reviews_text: Cute dress, cool material, suits a hot, tropic climate.

links_reviews_title: Arm/shoulder area is tight and uncomfortable.
links_reviews_text: Did not wear due the arm and shoulder area being too tight. I could put it on and it fit everywhere else, but felt like I would be uncomfortable with the pinching of the arm area.
The top of this dress is very stiff and the top around the shoulders is way too tight compared to the waist

links_reviews_title: Tried it on and didn't wear it
links_reviews_text: The arm hole is strangely high and tight on this and the fabric isn't that great. It made me look wider than i am.

Such a pretty print and material, but I followed the advice of other posters & this time it didn't work for me. I'm usually a 2, but went for the 4 and it was swimming on me. May end up trying to rent in a smaller size one day.

This is a beautiful dress that is perfect for transitioning to spring. I wore it on a date night with booties and a denim jacket. The fit was weird, though. In the waist, I feel like I could have definitely worn a size 4. However, the arm holes seemed really short and cut into my armpit. I think if I could have somehow retied the strap it would have been a little loser, but the bow is sewn in to place. Because I had the jacket on I didn't really mind and eventually forgot about it, but it was a little uncomfortable. It is a good length and nicely lined.

I'm 5'5", 130 lbs, hourglass shape and wore a medium. I could've worn the small if I had spanx but just felt more confident in the M! This dress fit perfectly. One thing I look for in dresses is that in pinches at the waist so I have more of an hourglass look and this dress did just that! Super comfy too and stayed in place after dancing all night! It has a silver shimmer to it but it looked classy. So beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Rented for nye. Loved it but didn't end up wearing
links_reviews_text: The fit of this dress is so nice and flattering. The material is thick and stretchy. Loved that there was some shimmer. Ended up wearing a diff dress but will rent this again

links_reviews_title: This dress is elegant and classy!
links_reviews_text: This dress was flattering and fun to wear! The shimmer in the dress isn't very noticeable. The off-the-shoulder fit is snug, but not super restrictive. I wore this to a New Year's Eve event, and was able to dance without restrictive movement, but also felt secure. This dress had a looser fit, but hugged in all the right places! I wish I owned this dress and I would definitely rent it again!
It was comfortable -- a bit short for me -- otherwise fit great in a size L.
Lent to my friend when her dress didn't fit when we were getting ready for a wedding. M fit perfectly for a size 8, has a little stretch but thick material

links_reviews_title: Love the slight shine in the dress and nice thick material
links_reviews_text: It’s a little tight but works even for tall girls! I am 5’9. Off shoulder is actually comfy on this one because it’s snug and doesn’t move.

links_reviews_title: First time ordering and I was so nervous! My dress was perfect!!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit pretty true to size and was so comfortable! I received tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: The wedding was fun & I could actually dance in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! It was my backup but chose it over my original. The fit is great. Super comfy & the material is stretchy. My only critique is the top rolled up but would definitely not stop me from renting it. Great dress for a lot of occassions! Sorry for my pic, didn't take any at the wedding.

I loved this dress so much that I ordered it from Halston. I usually have a difficult time finding dresses that fit due to my larger busy and smaller bottom, but the thick, stretchy material made it hug my body perfectly! You adjust the shoulder flap to fit your size/needs, slipped a little while dancing, but I felt fabulous all night!

links_reviews_title: More elegant than expected. Very pleased
links_reviews_text: This was a back up style I ordered for a charity gala. Initially I was worried it would not come off as formal enough but I was pleasantly surprised and was very happy with the length and style of the dress. I have an athletic frame and the small fit well. Didn't give me curves exactly, but certainly fit well and was very comfortable. I ended up not wearing a bra which was ok but would recommend a strapless bra in the future.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to homecoming and I felt so confident in it
links_reviews_text: It fit me well and hugged my body in all the right ways but if I wanted to dance I couldn't raise my arms above my waist. So if you're going to an event where you have to dance probably isn't the best option but if you're going to a wedding it's great.

Loved every minute in this dress. It is a fitted dress, but definitely has some stretch. Length was great for a fun cocktail party. There is a little shimmer in the dress, but I honestly didn't even notice it once it was on. I'm usually a 6 or 8 in normal dresses and the medium was a perfect fit.

This dress is simple but I really loved it! It's super comfortable and I found it to be very flattering. It was long enough that it is pretty conservative, but the off-the-shoulder style and the sparkly fabric gives it a fun flair. The Medium fit perfectly, so I'd say it runs true to size.

This dress made me feel so good! It fit like a glove! I wore the XS, I'm 5'4', 113 lbs, 34A. The material has some stretch to it. The shimmer is very light- barely noticeable. I am small chested, so you may want to size up if you have a larger chest or broad shoulders. After wearing it for a little while, I did start to get a little uncomfortable because the off the shoulder part was a little tight around my arms/shoulders. And as with most off the shoulder dresses, you can't lift your arms, so I don't suggest this if you'll be dancing. I wore it to a rehearsal dinner though so it was perfect. This dress made me feel like a million bucks!

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel so sexy and confident!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit unbelievably well! I️ was worried about comfort with the sleeves being off the shoulder, but they stayed put. The material is thick and slightly stretchy which made for a comfortable, sleek, and sexy look. I️ would 100% rent this dress again!
Thick material is so flattering! Perrecr off shoulder look. Didficult to raise arms
The off shoulder part felt like there was a big flat board across my chest. Maybe not good for smaller chested girls.

The dress is fabulous. I wear a size 6/8 but had read Halston runs small so I ordered the Large -- I actually think I would've been fine in the Medium. I solved the slight bagginess issue by belting it. The material is knit but it hangs in a very flattering way. The shoulder material only moved up a couple times during the night. Overall, I was super comfortable and felt great.

links_reviews_title: Rented this dress for my grandmother in law's birthday party
links_reviews_text: Really pretty but you cannot lift your arms above a certain point in this dress. It was really only an issue when I was cold and wanted to put on my coat and realized I couldn't over these sleeves. Something to consider if you're considering this dress for a winter function. Otherwise, it was mostly comfortable and flattering.

Didnt originally order this dress. RTR had a mixup and sent me this instead of what I originally ordered. Though I was bitter about the situation, this dress worked. It was a good length as I am 5'10". Not too tight, but compliments the body.
I'm 5'8 probably around 165-170 lbs and the medium fit fine, it wasn't too tight, but I felt more comfortable in the large. It was very flattering and classic, my husband even told me to buy it!

links_reviews_title: Showed all my lumps and bumps!
links_reviews_text: This dress is a sexy yet conservative LBD. For me, it did not flatter my pear-shaped figure. However, the material, length and overall look of the dress was lovely. Just not for me! I ultimately wore a different dress from my unlimited shipment to my sorority formal.
Heavier than expected for a Florida Bridal Shower.
Thick, comfortable dress, with sexy shoulder detail.

links_reviews_title: Fun easy comfortable Dress with a fancy look
links_reviews_text: Because of the stretchy knit fabric it was so much more comfortable and flexible than you would think, but still looked classy. And the fabric, though stretchy was thick enough to be flattering to curves.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a work holiday party and loved it.
links_reviews_text: I went with the medium instead of the small because it was a work event. The fabric was stretchy but thick so it held everything in well but didn't look cheap or tacky. I was nervous about the shimmer but it wasn't too much! I would have rented this for a second holiday party if it were available!

links_reviews_title: Wonderful for a work cocktail party. Got many compliments :)
links_reviews_text: Sexy but conservative enough for professional events
I ended up not wearing this one, but I did love it. I wanted to wear somewhere, but I just didn't have an event for it. I would actually rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Elegant dress, perfect as a guest of a wedding.
links_reviews_text: Material does not really show the gold accents. Looks black in person. Material is thick and very flattering. Side zipper makes it easy to get on. Off the shoulder stays well since the fabric is thick.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable but materials a bit heavy
links_reviews_text: I didn't ent up wearing this dress simply because it was a bit too heavy for the summer. I loved the look of it and definitely will rent again for a wedding in the fall. The dress was a bit short (above the knee) and is a great cocktail dress!

links_reviews_title: An off the shoulder dress you can still dance in!
links_reviews_text: Perfect and flattering LBD - being tall, this was an excellent length! Quality fabric and cut.

links_reviews_title: Black dress with a unique shoulder touch.
links_reviews_text: Fit great since I'm normally a 12/14. XL was the size to go with. The shoulder sleeves I had to keep on fixing which was a bit annoying for dancing, but it was manageable.
I did not wear this piece. It runs a bit large so it wasn't fitted. Maybe if i had sized down. The shoulders didnt stay in place. It was just okay for me.

links_reviews_title: I ordered this to wear for NYE!
links_reviews_text: Ordered this for NYE! It was the perfect amount of sparkle! Turns out we went to California for NYE, so it was not as cold as I expected. I wore something different. Size, fit, texture, everything was exactly as expected. Beautiful dress, will likely rent again!

This dress would fit a larger chest. The zipper will fit right at the bottom of the ribcage and not the waist. I had to size up in order to zip and it to feel comfortable. Didn't need a bra either. Wasn't as itchy as other reviewers said it was (personal experience).
Very tight around the ribs but overall a beautiful dress.
This dress was so perfectly cute for a Sweet 16! The tulle on the skirt was ripped on arrival but a little pin and tuck fixed everything.

links_reviews_title: The dress was a show stopper, compliments, like the drinks flowed all night.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly in the waist, but a bit too big along the shoulder and the upper back. Material was a bit scratchy along the seams. I considered buying this dress if it wasn't for the itchy seams.

links_reviews_title: Being able to wear a designer dress that I never would have purchased on my own!! First time renter
links_reviews_text: I normally wear an 8. The 8 fit perfectly, but I couldn't get it zipped up all the way and buttoned. Wore the 10 instead and it looked fine and zipped all the way up!! It was a really fun dress to wear and I got many compliments!

Rented this for an Alice in Wonderland themed gala and felt fab. Very comfortable, fun shape and details. Lots of compliments. Paired with nude sandals and Alexis Bittar earrings from RTR. Luckily I had tried the dress on in the store in a 2, with enough time to order the 4. I am a consistent 0-2 in dresses, especially with an open back where there's room for error on the chest. But I could not zip the 2 to the waist. Order up! My husband wanted me to buy this one. I will rent again!

links_reviews_title: PREFECT fit and tons of compliments!!
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size and was a perfect fit! Length was great too and I am petite!! Will definitely be renting future dresses!!

links_reviews_title: Adorable and perfect for "a night in Paris" theme!
links_reviews_text: This dress is definitely all sorts of "extra" but it is so fun! Perfect for a special occasion. Runs about one size smaller so definitely size up. Kept jewelry and shoes simple since the dress is the star!

This dress is beautiful! The red lace really stands out, and the way the skirt draped is unique and gorgeous. I got compliments all night about how unique and flattering the dress was. I am a little heavier after having a baby and this dress made me feel beautiful and stylish. For the most part it was very comfortable, too. I wore it without a bra and had no issues. One minor note was that the neckline was beautiful but a little itchy and constricting. It didn't stop me from dancing or anything but if you think you'll be bothered by that, you might want to look elsewhere. It wasn't enough to detract from my rating! As always, the rent and return part was easy—I just didn't want to give this one up!

I LOVED this dress. It was just so unique - lots of compliments at the charity event and on photos I posted afterward. Fit: large in the chest (larger-chested girls this is for you! The rest of us might need a little extra, like a sticky bra); zips to your natural waistline; plenty of room in the hips (and a good disguise if you're looking for one there since there's so much tulle!) One of my favorites!

Cindy Lauper was our entertainment and this dress fit right into all that fun! Flattering, flirtatious, spunky, unique and en Vogue. Loved it! Formal night with guys in tuxedos and we looked like we just left the Oscars!! Would buy in a second! Dress size 6 fit me perfectly, 4 was too small for my 128lb frame.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress! Show-stopper! Love love love love love!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a Gala event and got compliments on it all night! It was sexy, without being too short on my 5'10" frame. With a faux-hawk updo, it gave off a cool rocker vibe and I loved it! This was actually a backup dress style that the excellent RTW customer service rep overnighted to me when my original dress arrived slightly damaged. With my athletic build, the waistline was snug at the seam, and loose on the shoulders, but it did not affect the overall comfort or look. I would order 1 size up and a backup 2 sizes up.
#party
This flirty fit and flare will get you a lot of attention. The pop of color is eye catching, with very high end silhouette. The length is classy for a shorter skirt
Stunning dress. I felt like a rockstar. Definitely recommend sizing up though. It runs a bit small.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for my event.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 6 and the 6 fit. It was a little snug around my bust. The top of the dress was a little scratchy around the neckline, but nothing unbearable. No need to wear a bra with this dress as it's very structured inside. I paired it with rose gold jewelry and black strappy heels. This dress was even prettier in person. I received many compliments.
It definitely runs a size small (I'm usually a 6), but it was so comfortable and fun to wear and dance in. Very unique and a show-stopper!

This dress has such a great 80's vibe it was prefect for an 80's prom theme. It ran very small in the waist as other reviewers have stated. I usually wear a 4 or 6, rented a 6 and an 8, and ended up wearing the 8 as it was much more comfortable. The top was a little big, but I really wanted to breathe. In the end you couldn't tell and I got so many compliments! It really is a gorgeous dress.
Wore for NYE. Loved the dress. Looked amazing. Wasnt very comfortable to be honest- but looked great and got tons of xomplients.
This dress was absolutely gorgeous! Perfect for a holiday party. The back is also beautiful! Received compliments all night. Nha Khahn is a new favorite for me after wearing this dress.
Wore this for a wedding and got complimented so many times! Great experience with RTR as always!

links_reviews_title: This dress was the highlight of my gala! I got tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, perfect for dancing. Beautifully made - all lined, many layers of fluffy tulle, red lace flower pop on the bodice, and a really elegant structural piece over the top of the skirt. I think it's the best one I have rented so far! I would buy this dress.

When the dress arrived, it was even prettier in person. It was lightweight but well-made, just enough frill for a 40-something like me to pull off at a festive event. The event was a success and so was the dress. I got compliments all night long. I did not wear a bra with it and it was fine! I am a 38 C and it was a little loose on top but the 12 was too snug in the waist and there was no give.

links_reviews_title: It was unlike any dress at the party.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. It was totally unique and fit true to size. The fabric at the top was a tiny bit itchy at the neck, but tolerable for one night.

links_reviews_title: Unusual dress, but the neckline felt weird
links_reviews_text: This dress was so unusual and cool looking, I wanted to love it, but the neckline was too high. I felt like I was being strangled. It cut right across the bottom of my neck. Maybe my torso is too short?

Wore this dress to an 80's concert. It was perfect because it was reminiscent of the 80's fashion with an high-fashion twist. I probably could have gone a size bigger because it was impossible to hook the top of the zipper. But the zipper was strong enough to stay closed.

links_reviews_title: Definitely my kind of dress. Classic silhouette, modern detail, romantic applique & layers.
links_reviews_text: The torso was a tiny bit long so the sleeves were a touch loose. Fit perfectly otherwise. I love how airy the dress is. I was surviving comfortably while everyone else was sweating. Went great with a styled pair of earrings and the kate spade bag. Truthfully ended up buying the dress afterwards.

links_reviews_title: I LOVED this dress!! I wore on stage at a women entrepreneur's event called PleasureCEO.
links_reviews_text: This dress was very outside of my usual style, but something about it caught my eye. And I'm so glad I took the risk because I got a gazillion compliments on it. It was totally striking! I personally needed to rough up the cuteness with some edgy accessories, but then it worked like a charm. And I loved that I didn't need to wear a bra, even as a 36DD.

Fit was amazing, I felt like a dark ballerina - the material is so lightweight and tutu-like, I went for hours of salsa dancing without stopping (or sweating that much!). Perfect for an evening party, my friends at one point were having fun with it as I was twirling...I have hourglass shape and the fit was great, no bra necessary. I am a regular at RTR and this was my favorite dress ever! If I wasn't plastered in pictures everywhere I would've bought it :)
Small on my waist which normally does not happen often. Had to wear the back up size (6)
Beautiful details and I got many compliments. I'm a 12 (US) so for this brand I have to size up 14

This dress was amazing!!!!! It was sent as a back up for a dress that would not fit. I was able to comfortably wear it without a bra and Spanx without worry. I can't even count the number of complaints that I received. It is fun, flirty, and sexy. The best part about my experience was that RTR was totally willing to overnight this (and another dress) to me, in a totally different city, for NO charge when my original dress would not fit, and my original back up was damaged upon arrival. This dress was simply meant to be. I would rent this again in a heartbeat. Fit me true to size.

links_reviews_title: The layers of the dress laid perfectly
links_reviews_text: I loved the red detail because I could wear red tights to help it pop out. I couldn't find my black heels, but I think it looked good with black flats (though, I would have preferred the heels). It was easy to walk and sit in. I couldn't wear a bra with it because the back was a little low, but the top fit just right that it didn't matter too much.
This dress is so pretty and I received so many compliments! The waist part is pretty tight and it was hard to put it on myself, but once I put it on it looks so great!
Loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress!! Very dramatic! Loved it!!
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful but definitely cannot be worn with a bra due to the low back. I am a size 10-12 and wore the 14, and it was a tiny bit too big but the 12 didn't zip. It was loose on my shoulders which was a tad bit annoying. I would definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a New Year's Eve party.
links_reviews_text: I got this dress in a size 10. I have a pear shape body with wide hips and small bust. I felt that the dress ran a bit small. The bottom skirt part of the dress is full, layered and really pretty. Great for my hips! The top, however, didn't fit me well at all. I have a B-C bust size, and I probably needed a C-D bust size to fill it out on top. The top part of the dress is a stiff mesh, and it just didn't lay that well on me. To be clear, though, this dress was not recommended for my body shape but I saw it and decided to get it anyway. Probably wasn't a good idea to do that! Even though it didn't fit me that great, I did have fun wearing it.

Loved this dress! I received so many compliments on it and from people I had never met! It's so unique. Many said they will absolutely now try RTR for their next event because of this dress. The top fit just a tad big - I have a short torso - but everything else was true to size.

I wore this dress to a Christmas work party and it was the hit, received a lot of compliments. The details and the unique design was something I look for in a dress. This dress was my second choice and I'm glad I got it.
The dress runs small so size up 1 size. Great quality and fit. It's a great party dress!

I got so many compliments on this dress. I'm short (5'0) and curvy and I'm usually between a 10 and a 12. I opted for the 12 because I wasn't feeling great and wanted to have a bit of room. If I'd been feeling a bit sexier the 10 would've been tighter/more form fitting. I loved the ladylike puffed sleeve. Usually these look too dramatic on me but not this time. Definitely plan to rent again. I wore to a black tie wedding but this would be perfect holiday/NYE Dress up or down very versatile

This looks like a little girl's dress. I'm not sure why my dress was 3" shorter than it looks in the pic, and I'm in 5'6". The dress seems to fit well otherwise but it is inappropriately short, at least in the backside for those of us with curves :) Just wear leggings or tights with it if you're not petite.
I'm typically a size 10 - I sized up to accommodate my chest and I was wearing for a work event and didn't want it too tight everywhere. This designer is great for large chests

I wore this for a Winter Bat Mitzvah. It was fine. There is no give to the fabric. The 10 fit, but I felt more comfortable in the next size up, as there was a little more room. The dress is a lovely color.
Want to buy it.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my Work Holiday party and received a ton of compliments.
links_reviews_text: A good/snug 12. A little short for my long legs (barely fingertip, don't bend over). The overlace was nice and gave depth/body.
I wish I could own this. It's perfect for a work fancy event. It's appropriate but still dressy. It's cocktail perfection. So flattering on!
comfortable, flattering fit

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: It was very comfortable to wear all evening. I was afraid the lace arms would be too tight but they are very roomy and not irritating at all. The V neck on the dress was nice, classy but a little sexy. I wore dimmers so my chest sat a little lower but if would have worn a bra I would have been showing more cleavage than I was comfortable with. Overall I loved this dress and would rent it again!

This dress was perfect for a fall wedding. I probably wouldn't have picked this dress if I hadn't tried it on at the flagship store, but it wound up being super flattering on me, and I got a ton of compliments. It was a little short so I wound up wearing it with tights, but other than that the dress fit me well and was really comfortable. I will also say that this dress has some cool 80's vibes with the shoulders (which I love), but if that's not your style this might not be for you.
I thought the ruffles on the bottom were a little cheesy but overall this dress was a hit
Fit incredibly well, got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: This is much shorter than the image with model. It's nowhere near knee length and I'm only 5'8"
links_reviews_text: Short length, nothing like the picture, returned without wearing though quality looked great and the size 2 was true to size

links_reviews_title: Backup dress selection was a huge hit!
links_reviews_text: This dress looks great in the picture, but the length is shorter than it appears in the picture. On me, the length was about 1 1/2 inches above the top of my knee. So delighted that my back-up dress selection worked! Great option offered by Rent the Runway!

Loved everything about this dress! The scalloped lacing at the bottom brought memories of my 90's Prom. The v-neck was super flattering and of course it has pockets! I was able to wear my regular bra as well. I normally wear an 18 so I got that and a 20. I wore the 18 and even though I'm a 40F the straps were still a little loose on me. Will Torah rent again!

I really loved this dress. I had so many people tell me I was the best dressed there by far. My only complaint is it fits kind of weird. I'm barely an A on top so The bodice was TTS but the cups were too large so it felt disproportionate. The straps also fell often but that may have been caused by a lack of chest. The dress also felt a little worn in the underskirt from being rented often but I still really loved it. The navy was a great change of pace from traditional black.

I wore this as my "back up" dress. The dress fit well and the fabric is very nice. It does have pockets. I know this is important for some people. The dress itself was just OK. It did not WOW. I did not receive any compliments, like I normally do. If you need something conservative, this is a great option.

links_reviews_title: Rented this dress for a formal event and I received lots of compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit great and it flowed so nicely. I absolutely loved the High-low part of the dress.

links_reviews_title: I seriously want to buy this dress!
links_reviews_text: Pockets! This fit like a glove, Im usually a 14 and got the 16 as a back up which was way too big. This was the first time I've ever worn a dress with no bra, I felt completely secure, no problems all night! Super flattering and received many compliments. Would definitely rent this again in a heartbeat!

Wore this for black tie optional winter wedding. Tons of compliments. The hi- low wasn't as dramatic as pictured but I think that's a height thing (I'm 5'5 and wore pretty low heels). The material is very thick which was forgiving no spanx needed. I wore my own bra with safety pin help. Runs a bit big I probably could have sized down.

I had original ordered a different dress in a 14 and backup in 16 and neither would zip all the way up. I have a large bust and is always the deciding factor on dress size. I called RTR and they overnighted me this dress that worked great! It has plenty of room up top! I may have gone to a 12 on this one honestly!

I wore the 6R dress to a formal wedding this past weekend and several people came up to me asking if they could take a photo of it! For reference I am 5,5", and 145-150lbs with an athletic build. The cinching at the waist is super flattering and I loved the high low detail. It is also a beautiful color and super comfortable, you could wear pasties or a bra with it if needed

links_reviews_title: I never wanted to take it off!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove. I am not a tall girl, but I was so in love with it on the RTR website that I decided I'd make the long size work. I bet the regular would have been perfect, but with the right heels the long worked out for this 5'2" lady! I truly cannot say enough great things about this dress. I felt like a princess. Will DEFINITELY be renting this one again!

Loved the dress, and of course the pockets! No bag needed for the night. The detailing on the bottom was amazing. If I was better in heels a higher pair would have really showed that detail off. The color is rich and the material is great. Would rent it again for sure.

links_reviews_title: This dress is as fabulous as it looks
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a wedding and it was extremely comfortable. The dress fits perfectly and is true to size. Women with larger breast, no need to worry about the fitting in the chest area!

This dress fit like a DREAM. I wish I had a reason to wear this every single day. It hugged all the right places and I am always a little worried about dresses not zipping over my lats, as I have a bit more muscle than the average size 6-8 gal. I cannot say enough wonderful things about this dress, no bra was needed and I got so many compliments all evening. This was worn for my annual company party and I can't recommend this dress enough if you have a formal affair coming up!

I absolutely LOVED this dress! Had so many compliments throughout the night. I was able to wear it comfortably without a bra and had a ton of support. The material is thick, but I had no issue wearing for a July wedding. It's super flattering, and has pockets! I would absolutely recommend and rent again!

Absolutely stunning dress that I wore for a formal wedding. Very comfortable, not too heavy, and best of all it has large pockets! No need for a purse! Great for dancing and the lace at the bottom is a lovely accent. I got so many compliments on this dress. It does fit very large though, which I guess it better than too tight. I usually wear a 14 in most things and a 16 in most dresses. So I ordered a 16 and up to an 18 just in case. But it fit so big that spanx was not needed, and I prob could have worn a 14 and hell even a 12 with spanx so keep that in mind. But I will definitely order this again if the occasion comes up. #wedding #ItHasPockets #formal

links_reviews_title: It's a mullet, business in the front, party in the back
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress, really glad I ordered a 6 since I have a wide rib cage and no waist so there was no way the 4 was happening. Bonus - substantial fabric meant no need for a bra even with my 32 DD's.

I got so many compliments on this dress. Great for ladies with larger busts. No bra needed but still fit with nice shape. Poofy skirt is great for accentuating curves! Also - wore 3in heels and back of skirt just lightly touched floor.
I rented this dress for a wedding. I can't tell you how many complements I received. The dress is very comfortable and the pocket is a plus. I would recommend this dress.
Daughter wore it to a dance. Perfect fit, shoulder kept sliding a bit, though. Watch out, the open webbing on the back can catch easily on the heel of your shoe.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! True to size!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress, would rent again in heartbeat! Wore strapless, backless bra for support as I am small chested just to give a little extra support in the front. Heels or wedges definitely needed so dress so not drag. Another favorite from RTR!

links_reviews_title: Absolutely Beautiful & Elegant dress! I felt like the "Bell of the Ball" So many compliments too!
links_reviews_text: This dress was stunning! It is so beautiful and classy. I wore this dress to a formal gala and it was a head turner. Fits true to size...
Gorgeous color and design. Slightly large in the top.

Fit was excellent. I didn't wear a bra bc the back is too low-- but there was no need since the fabric is thick. Probably not as easy to do for ladies with larger chests, but for me it was perfect. Bodice fit great and was very comfortable. I got so many compliments!

I originally ordered a 22W as I am usually between a 20 and a 22. It was huge. Especially in the bust. (I am a D cup) I had to order a replacement in a size 20 and it fit better but was still a little big in the bust, but I made it work.
Suprisingky fit a little big love the pockets!
It runs small it was a bit tight. but it look amazing

links_reviews_title: I got lots of compliments, and one woman told me my dress was her favorite of the night!
links_reviews_text: The bust fit well with a backless ("sticky") bra. I loved the pockets because they fit my phone, and since I was volunteering for part of the night it was helpful! The back of the dress was a bit long (I am 5' 3"), so I had to wear higher heels so it wouldn't drag.
I was not as in love with this dress for the evening affair I was going to, so I returned it. I think it would be better for an event during the spring summer. Will try it again then.

Loved everything about this hi-Lo style dress. Very flattering. Worn all day to a wedding. Could dance in it. Received so many compliments. If I wasn’t losing weight I would totally have bought this dress without hesitation.

links_reviews_title: Pockets!!!!! And beautiful dress... very comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I am short (5'4) but was glad my backup size was actually a 2L because I thought with heels it looked better to be longer. I got lots of compliments and it has pockets!

This is a beautiful dress. It fit very well. I wore it with a strapless bra as the dress straps sat on the edge of my shoulders. It had pockets on each side which held my lipstick and iPhone. It was comfortable all night long. The lace edge is absolutely beautiful and I had several women tell me how beautiful the dress was.

links_reviews_title: I got many complements at the Wedding and the dress was very comfortable,
links_reviews_text: I am 5.2" tall , size 18/20. I weight 230 lbs , apple body type , Bra size 44DD 20 W regular was perfect.

I loved this dress. It is truly beautiful. The only down side was the sizing. It runs a bit small. I ordered the 2 and 4. The size 2 was snug and the 4 was huge??? I wore the 2 but felt a little uncomfortable around the rib area.

I should have gotten a 10 but the 12 worked for the night. I wore 4 inch heels and that just barely had the back off the ground, I'm 5'4. I got tons of compliments and ladies- POCKETS. I want to buy this dress. Definitely recommend.

My dress arrived one day early. I wore this dress to a Debutante Cotillion Ball and it was perfect complimented with silver bling shoes and jewelry. I received many compliments and the navy was unique and different from all the black or red dresses. It ran a bit big in the shoulders but I draped the straps to look more off the shoulders.

Loved everything about this dress! Plus, POCKETS! People were complimenting the dress all night, and afterwards! The material is very soft and flattering. I did not wear a bra with it due to the low back. The netting did come slightly wrinkled, so be sure to take it out of the bag and let it hang for a day (or hang in the bathroom while you shower)

I received notice on Wednesday that I had to attend a formal ball on Friday. RTR really pulled through and got me this dress Friday afternoon. This dress is really beautiful and perfect for a formal affair. Unfortunately, the top was MASSIVE and I had to use a lot of strategic fashion taping to make the top somewhat work. I would suggest sizing down if you have medium or small bust. Length was good, though did drag a bit in the back. I think three inch heels would've done the trick.
It was perfect

Wore this to a gala in Feb 2018. The material was thick. Although the dress was slightly long in the back, I only had to pick up the dress when I was dancing so as to not trip. Dress felt amazing and perfect for the occasion.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! And the pockets make it even more amazing!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size

This was my first experience with RTR and I am officially a client for life!! Not only was the quality of the dress amazing, it fit perfectly, but the service was impecable!! I received a faulty dress and it was such an easy process to report it and they made sure to send me another dress same style same size to the hotel in less than 2 days just in time for my event!! Amazing!

links_reviews_title: Hall of Fame Induction in style!
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. I used my back up size, should have been my original. Stretchy material was accommodating to curves. Event was a conservative cocktail dress, this was perfect. Only surprise was base material was more sheer than expected, a nude half slip did the trick. Arrived a day early, and drop off at UPS after was so easy. Would rent it again in a heart beat!
I liked this dress a lot. I had to wear bike shorts underneath as you can see straight through the lower half

links_reviews_title: Love this dress lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Love this dress. Got compliments from people all night, strangers came up to tell me how much they loved it too - it was perfect for a winter wedding. Was a bit sheer, but wore black spanx. Also say a little oddly on my arms - wasn't sure if should be fully off the shoulder or not... but figured it out. Loved this dress and would definitely rent again!!!

links_reviews_title: Felt so light, delicate and feminine.
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress for an opera event. Bought black spanx to wear under after reading reviews. It was a lovely, light and comfortable dress. Ended up wearing the SM instead of XS. I think the XS would have been a snuggier fit but I went with my Dad so opted for a teensy more relaxed fit. Loved the dress and the length. I am 5’6, 115 lbs, 34A, 2 inch heels.
Extremely see through. Definitely prepare with putting another layer on under.

links_reviews_title: Went to a Halloween masquerade ball. Dress was elegant and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Nice dress! fits true to size. It would work for different body types size the fabric has some stretch but not tight. length just right.

links_reviews_title: So very comfortable and I got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: My daughter rented this for me and I was very skeptical. I am 5’7” and typically wear an 8-10. The large fit perfectly and was a wonderful length. I wore black spanx and you could not tell the midriff was sheer. It slips over your head and has a little elasticity to it so it fits very well. I wore it up on my shoulders so a bra with straps was fine. It was a lovely dress, I would definitely recommend and would absolutely rent it again!

I've recently gained some weight, so I went up in the size. I'm only 5'5 so it was a bit long but I held the bottom almost like a queen, ha! Many compliments, perfect weight, stretch, simply beautiful.

I love this designer. Guaranteed fun / flattering / comfortable and always unique. This is easily a formal dress but when that event was cancelled I decided it worked with a jean jacket, brown booties and turquoise. Tada! Made of two layers and as mentioned by others, BOTH layers are sheer. Don't let that stop you. Its amazing and you can make it work.

links_reviews_title: I've never had more compliments or felt more comfortable in a dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was completely comfortable, and the compliments were off the charts! I did wear a spanx body suit underneath it, because the midriff is sheer. But that just made for a slim line and I was honestly treated to compliments all night. I was SO sad to send this dress back. I LOVED it.

links_reviews_title: Loved the sleeves and the off the shoulder style.
links_reviews_text: Okay, so it was sheer in the mid-section area but I wore black spanx and it was perfect. I'm 5'4" and wore 4" heels and it barely touched the ground. Great silhouette and shape for my five month post-baby body.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments! But had its downsides
links_reviews_text: I rented the LR and XLR for a wedding event and I chose to wear the LR. The XLR also fit but was a little too long in the front. There were some previous reviews about the sheerness of the dress that were valid. The top portion is not see through at all, but below the waist is questionable, depending on lighting. I ended up wearing leggings under the dress for cooler weather and you can see in the pic where my middrift is visible in the photo. I think this dress would also have been fine with some sort of spanx or slit underneath. EVERYONE wanted to know where I got the dress, tons of compliments. However, the dress is pretty poor quality. I wouldn't pay $75 to rent. Its maybe a $20 rental value? If you can get a discount price and prepare for underneath, its a good rental! I'm happy with the process and will definitely Rent the Runway again!

links_reviews_title: This dress was very comfortable and easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: I am normally a size 10 or 12 in dresses because of my bust. I got the dress in a x-large which was perfect...it fit well through my bust, arms and waist and then flowed nicely from the waist down.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress.
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit. Comfortable. Timeless. Only complaint is that the slip in the bottom half is completely transparent - you must wear a slip!
THE BOTTOM IS TOTALLY SEE THRU! I would have to wear another black slip under this in order for it to work...

I normally wear a 4/6, so I got the MR and SR. I ended up wearing the SR. A little tight in the shoulders, but a good fit in the busy. The dress is two thin pieces of mesh. It's very thin, and the wind blew right through it. Thank goodness I had a long coat and thick scarf. My legs were freezing, and the dress is a little long. Would be great for a summer event. Not good for winter.

This dress was one of the most comfortable formal dresses I have every worn. There are no zippers - you just pull it over your head. It is very stretchy and I got LOTS of compliments on it. I agree that it doesn't have the glitz of a formal dress but is very elegant. I almost just bought it to keep. Length was good with a midsize heel.

This dress was stunning! I got many, many compliments on it! I am 5'8' and 160 lbs - the large fit perfectly. I do recommend wearing a black slip underneath, as the dress is a little see through. I was so comfortable in the dress.

links_reviews_title: This was a back up dress but I could have happily worn it.
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing this dress --it was my back up but I could have been very happy wearing it. I am 5'3" and about 135 pounds. I could have worn this dress in flats and it would have been just off the floor. It is 2 layers and both are see through black but you can wear undergarmets to make that work. The dress was very comfortable and flattering. If you want to get your hair and makeup done before getting dressed, note that this is a pull over the head dress. I feel like this dress could be worn to a black tie event or a much less formal event.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a million in this dress. It was stretchy and comfortable and great looking.
links_reviews_text: I ordered Medium, but may have been able to wear Small.

Was a very comfortable dress! The picture makes it look like it would be tea length, but it fell to the floor, with heels on. No zippers or buttons, just put on by stepping into it. Wore another slip with it, as the one in the dress was quite see through. Also wore a strapless black bra. Very stretchy dress, making it easy to size. I'm between a 12 and 14 and the XLR was perfect.

The material is light and very breathable. I didn't have a problem with it being see through. The length was great. However the dress made me look matronly - no shape to it. I may have needed a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: I was on crutches, made it easy to get around and hid my boot.
links_reviews_text: The dress was very comfortable and a perfect length for me at 5'6".

links_reviews_title: Dress turned out to be see-through, RTR's great customer service resolved things to my satisfaction.
links_reviews_text: Unless you are looking for an outfit that shows off your underwear, YOU NEED TO WEAR AN OPAQUE SLIP UNDER THIS DRESS. I think a black bodycon dress would also look very good, or a bandeau and a pencil skirt? The dress itself is a few layers of very filmy material that is pretty but offers absolutely no coverage.

links_reviews_title: Would definitely get this dress again!
links_reviews_text: We went to a NYE black tie optional wedding and I was feeling body conscious, so I ordered this dress in hopes of feeling covered up but still looking dressy. This dress totally fit the bill and was so comfortable I could have slept in it too -- I would highly recommend!

Great fit, nice style but two layers and both are very sheer. My daughter pointed out that she could see my skin through the whole torso. Also didn't love that the lining layer ended above knee so polka dots stood out on the bottom.

This dress was hip and comfortable. You need a slip or to get comfortable with the ability to see skin -- which is actually kind of fun if it's the right event. This dress is more "cool" than expensive. I received tons of compliments! It's very true to size -- with lots of give.
