links_reviews_title: Huge number of complements on this one :)
links_reviews_text: Nice and comfy fit.

links_reviews_title: A New Forever Favorite That I'll Look For Reasons to Rent Again!!!
links_reviews_text: This dress is the BOMB-DIGGITY! Fabric is light but very high-quality, and contains a good amount of stretch, which makes it skim your curves ever so gracefully! I'm 5'6", and I wore the XS, which fit my body perfectly and fell to the bottom of my ankle bone. The vibe of this dress to me is very 1950s Parisian, and it's so beautifully made that it DOESN'T look charicatured, unlike many dresses that throw off a vintage vibe. I wore a knee-length black slip under it, because the skirt & underskirt are rather sheer; there's also a sheer band on the torso, but that didn't bother me because the fabric is beautiful. You could dress this dress up or down in a snap. Rent it, you can't lose!!!

links_reviews_title: SO comfy and SO many compliments
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress. Heels occasionally were caught in fabric, but wasnt a big deal. Was SO comfortable.

Loved the fit. It was a full length on a short girl like me. It was lightweight and nice for a semi-formal event. I recommend wearing BLACK spanx under it because even with the extra layer, this dress is too sheer.
Great dress- got lots of compliments! Note- lining is sheer so if you have lighter skin tone, make sure you have a full slip to wear underneath or you will be exposed!!'

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this dress. It was too long and was not flattering.
links_reviews_text: The material of the bodice portion of the dress was lined and looked black on black. The skirt portion was sheer and look nude on black. It was not flattering to my figure and I chose not to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Do not waste your money on this dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress was very disappointing in material and design. The entire gown was see-through; the material was had static-cling and was so rail-thin that it hardly qualified for being a "cold weather" gown; it didn't set properly on or off the shoulders. Even with wearing a slip, skin was still showing. Would not recommend.
Great for curvy women. Perfect length.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and great for a chilly winter party.
links_reviews_text: Nice fit and can be worn with out a bra. Perfect length and overall coverage. Not sure if it sat on my shoulders correctly but, didn't have to fuss with it which was nice.

This dress is fabulous. The material is soft and light weight with a healthy amount of stretch. It does come with a built in liner to provide more coverage. Almost like a short and sheer inside mini slip. Not sure why one reviewer said it was completely see thru. I felt gorgeous and comfortable on this dress, its perfect!

I rented this fun dress for a holiday reception at work. It is a very cute dress, but it is super thin. Even with the lining, you can see right through it and I knew I would be self conscious about it all night.
Very comfortable, the dress stretches and gives. Sheer fabric made it sexy but still classy.

links_reviews_title: Great if your wearing a body suit.
links_reviews_text: The dress is thin, polka dots arefabulous but its completely see through so you would have to wear s black slip or black body suit.

I took this with me on vacation and wore it for a nice dinner out In St. Andrews. Pros - great details - lace, sheer, flowy sleeves, peek a boo slit in the front. Cons - all the above. It's a lot! It's cute but it's also short. I am 5'10 and it definitely was not comfortable to raise my arms and not be self conscious. It was a good sitting shirt :)
The fit on this top was so flattering! Love the way it could be worn with slacks or jeans. I am a 38C, it was form fitting. Not much give.
Comfortable on the sleeves, interesting detailing, fits good on 36B-29"waist

I rented this to wear for a casual NYE party. It was the perfect compliment to the Rag and Bone Jeans seen here (also rented on RTR) and fit great! I'm busty so I sized up to a Large (normally wear a Medium). The cutouts and lace detail are really stunning. I received lots of compliments and would definitely rent again!
Such a cute top! Got a lot of compliments. A little short on the torso area so I wore a black cami underneath. It still looked great.
Beautiful top! Fits true to size, I can even raise my arms in it. Perfect with jeans and heels for dinner date!
This top is sexy with the mesh in the middle but not tooooo sexy/inappropriate. I wore it to a party with friends and loved it. Received a ton of compliments. Would rent again for a night out!

links_reviews_title: This shirt is really frilly, but it was perfect for an after work holiday party.
links_reviews_text: The fit is a little small. I ordered an S as my first choice size and an M as a back up. I tried on the M first and didn't even bother with the S because the M fit really well. It's also pretty short, so if you have a longer torso, I'd recommend wearing it with something high-wasted. Also, you can see your bra through the front lacy panel.

links_reviews_title: Very beautiful lace detail, hard to lift arms.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful thick fabric & gorgeous lace, but can't lift arms! Didn't wear b/c was gonna wear either w/ white shorts or jeans on airplane & worried couldn't put luggage in overhead compartment.
I rocked this all black look today and received sooooo many compliments!! I had women coming up to me asking where I got it. Ill definitely rent this again.

Although I typically avoid ruffles, this top is one of my new favorite items at RTR! The ruffles are subtle enough that they just look fun and flirty, and they balance out the edginess. I wore a nude camisole underneath because the front panel is see through. It fit really well throughout, but was definitely a little more snug around the waist than it was everywhere else. I'll definitely be renting this top for my next night out!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and wanted to keep it!!
Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Was such a great price to purchase and was so flattering on that I had to purchase it. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Great staple piece. Pairs well with anything.
links_reviews_text: Can be dressed up or down. Great pair with jeans or pencil skirt.

Was perfect for work. Needed a cami underneath but loved the length of the top because it fit just right without having to tuck in! Received a ton of compliments. Sleeves aren't tight either. Was comfortable all day
loved this top... cute with jeans or white slacks!
It hits slightly above waist. I wanted to wear with jeans but didn't want to have my stomach showing.

This top is very feminine and pretty. Fits true to size. I would suggest going up a size if you are in between sizes. There is a zipper in the back. The top is very fitted. I wore it on a girl's trip to Nashville. Loved it!
The lace, open shoulder and sleeve were all nice. That said, it was not as flattering on me as I had hoped.

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments and so fun to wear.
links_reviews_text: While I marked true to size it's a bit tight but that is really just the fabric because it has no give to it. I can sometimes wear an XS but no way could I have worn an XS in this. I really like the design, it was elegant and chic.
I could not wear to event as it was too small across the chest and I did not really care for style in person.
Great quality! Beautiful top, but fits very tight and short. I couldn't zip the back.

links_reviews_title: This top is pretty and comfortable. It flatters any body type. Lots of complements.
links_reviews_text: There is no give to the top. If you're in between sizes, size up. Easy to wear with a bra, dress up or down. Great for cold weather. Even though it's a cold shoulder top, it was nice and warm everywhere else. The mesh line down the front made it sexy. You could add a cami if your event is daytime.
This is an adorable top for a night out - if you're comfortable showing a lot of cleavage. It's also a bit on the short side so either high waisted pants or showing your tummy is a must.
Really pretty. Something different
Sexy and classy, I loved this top. The quality was excellent, but order one size up, couldn't lift my arms, definitely runs small!
Such a cute and elegant top! Got so many compliments
LOVED this. Wore it to multiple occasions and nights out. Very flattering and beautiful. I would buy it if I could!
Love this blouse, I didn't wear it because it was so small. I needed a small or possibly a medium in this brand, usually a xs works

links_reviews_title: More flattering than the model photo
links_reviews_text: This top is sexy and fun, and not too ruffley. I feel like the sample photo isn't showing this top at its best. I think it can be worn year round.
This was fun to wear once but wouldn't get it again. XS was a bit too small as well.
I didn't attempt to wear this because it was so trashy and worn out. I almost quit rtr Because of bad quality lately

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a Bruno Mars concert and it looked great!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful top...a little short on the torso but very feminine and well made. Usually wear a medium in tops but needed a large in this one. Looked awesome with Jeans
I'm not big on ruffles but I love this top. I wore it with jeans and high heels. It runs small so consider sizing up.
I didn't end up waering this. It was a heavier fabric that I thought it wiuld be a s had A LOT going on. I'd rent it again if I had the right occasion.
Loved all the details of this top. It was pretty snug in chest area, so would recommend sizing up if you aren't smaller cup size.
Short torso fit, no give ans cleveage cut shows bra and skin
Sturdy fabric, loved all the detail, fit great

links_reviews_title: Super cute but size up if y a large chest!
links_reviews_text: I rented this before in a small & I couldn’t zip it over my chest, but it was so cute I rented it again in a medium and it was perfect! Such a pretty top. It is see through in the center so I wore a bralette, but I don’t mind cleave, you could always do a tank.
I rented this for brunch in Santa Monica & it was perfect! So flattering, fun, & surprisingly comfy!

This jumpsuit was SO flattering. I loved it so much I wanted to keep it. The fabric is high quality and sucks you in where you need it. Didn't need to wear a bra with it. Couldn't have picked a better outfit for what I needed.

I wore this to a rehearsal dinner, and loved it! I got so many compliments. It was a little snug, and I probably would recommend sizing up if you don't want it to be super tight. But it was a really flattering fit.
Super comfortable. Got tons of compliments

links_reviews_title: Sexy, fun and flattering navy jumpsuit!
links_reviews_text: Pros: True to size, beautifully styled and very flattering jumpsuit. Cons: For ladies 5'9" or above (and/or long legs proportion-wise), the jumpsuit may be slightly short. The inseam is around 33". If it was 1" longer it would have fit me perfectly. I ended up not wearing it - which was a bummer because it's so flattering on.
So perfect! Only issue for me is length of pant but I'm 5'8" so things usually run short!
I received many compliments on this piece. It was incredibly beautiful. The fit runs somewhat small as the straps were a little tight which would be my only complaint.

I wore this outfit to my hotel's grand opening event. I cannot even count how many compliments I received. It is a thick material, and so flattering. The ruffles camouflage any insecurities about the tummy area and arms. I cannot day enough great things about this outfit. I would give it 6 stars if I could!

I loved this jumpsuit! The material was high quality and it was very slimming. The color is beautiful and I loved the cut. The length is very long, I had to use tape to "hem" it to fit but otherwise this jumpsuit fit perfectly! I would absolutely rent again!!!

This runs perfect to size. I'm 5'5" and wore and size 6. The length and cut were perfect with a cute pair of 2.5" heels. I received so many compliments and hope to rent it again some day for another occasion! Highly recommend and SUPER comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Ideal for a slim or pear shape, not so much for curvy or hourglass, elegant, versatile
links_reviews_text: This is a good option for when the weather is colder (thick fabric) and the dress code isn't completely clear (versatile outfit). I'm normally between a size 0 and 2. I tried on 3 sizes: size 0, too tight overall. Size 2, perfect on my waist and butt, way too small on top. Size 4, a little more loose on the waist and butt, still too small on top. Size 6, perfect on top, too loose, sort of baggy on the bottom. However, since the party I wore it to was more conservative, baggier was better. My suggestion is to choose your regular size for slim and pear shaped bodies but size up (even 2 sizes up) for hourglass, busty, or curvy bodies. It is also pretty long so ideal for taller women or with high heels. I'm 5'4" and needed 5" heels to make it work.
Great fit! Felt perfectly glamorous at the Phantom of the opera! Got a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Felt very confident in this outfit despite being several sizes bigger from my last pregnancy!
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit was a perfect fit. It was not too tight to sit or dance comfortably. Material is beautiful as well.
This jumpsuit was so chic and covered every part of my body I wanted to hide just perfectly. It was the right amount of stretch and surprisingly the right length for my height (5'8).

links_reviews_title: Lovely jumpsuit! Such a fun take on “black tie”: wore to a holiday ball for business school.
links_reviews_text: Very comfy to dance in, the draped shoulders did limit movement a bit, but the overall fit and forgiveness of the shape (and existence of pant legs) made up for it!

links_reviews_title: I felt like a million all night
links_reviews_text: Looked Perfect!! If it were mine would have tailored a lil/straps were a tad long but truly amazing, classy, and comfortable!!!!

This jumpsuit was worn to an awards gala. At first I considered that something was wrong with the outfit , due to the large amount of people staring at me. I was wrong, I received so many compliments. It's incredibly flattering. The tush looked exquisite. Very happy!!
It was very snug! But also comfortable. I wish I would have ordered the 8R to give a little more breathing room
Loved this but the legs were way way too long for me. Im short - too bad I can't get this hemmed!

I literally changed between the wedding service and reception because I knew I did not want to have to sit, eat, and dance in my church clothes. This was gorgeous, fitted, and forgiving. I wore high heeled boots and the pant leg grazed the floor, but not in an annoying way at all.
I am long waisted so it was a tad tight between the straps pulling the pants area up. It was fine though, just a tad snug. I would probably not order a size up though. Very awesome and heavy fabric.
Runs small on top.
Lots of compliments, navy instead of black which was a nice change. Loved it!
hard to go to the bathroom
Beautiful, flattering It was very hard to return I will definitely rent again

links_reviews_title: This jumper is everything!! Highly suggest for any night out!
links_reviews_text: Excellent fit!
Super stylish and yet incredibly comfortable.
didn't wear it.
I am 6' y'all and I loved this jumpsuit but it was too short in length.
I got so many complements. It's fun, flirty and fits really well. Overall very flattering. Can be worn for a formal black tie to cocktails.

links_reviews_title: You feel like a million bucks in it!
links_reviews_text: It fit great!!! Didn't wear a bra but the fabric is thick enough you feel comfortable without one on! The style is very flattering! My husband loved and wanted to buy it!!

links_reviews_title: The fabric, the fit, the design everything is awesome! I loved it! It's very flattering!
links_reviews_text: It's very flattering, it accentuated the right places!

links_reviews_title: All the compliments I got and how good it made me feel!!
links_reviews_text: Fitted but flowy in all the right places. Makes you look like Beyoncé!
Loved this jumpsuit. So comfortable to wear.
im really little, so I very was exited it ran small! it's made beautifully but i looked like i was playing dress up
too short

Loved this jumpsuit!! I ended up not wearing it for the wedding I rented it for because the sleeves, while cute, don't really allow for your arms to lift any higher than shoulder height and that wouldn't make for much fun on the dance floor. I was sent another dress that I adored and went with that option, but if I had another event, I'd wear this jumpsuit in a heartbeat. It fit perfectly, was super flattering and was really fun with the sleeves and peplum. It looks great with flats or heels--at 5'5 it was the perfect length. Totally recommend!

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a wedding rehearsal dinner.
links_reviews_text: I LOVE the top of the jumpsuit. It's stunning and very fitting. The fabric is thick and flows beautifully. BUT! The jumpsuit is sooo short! I'm 5'9" and it looked like I was wearing a pair of highwaters. I understand the style is suppose to be short, but it just looked silly when I put shoes on. I ended up not wearing it to the rehearsal dinner :(
It it super cute dress. It just runs a little big! If you have small breast, size down if not, regular size! But other than that I got tons of complements!!

Im 7 months along and rented a medium (I usually wear a small). It fit great in terms of length and belly. I was very comfortable. The only downside is the straps. It took me like 15 minutes to figure them out and they were still too long. But it wasn't too obvious. Also I wore no bra but used double sided tape to keep it closed.

links_reviews_title: It was great for the day to evening summer wedding I attended. I was happy with the quality and fit.
links_reviews_text: The only con is the straps were a little hard to adjust.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a daytime wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was very comfortable and perfect for the wedding I attended. My only issue was the chest part did not fully fit but after tightening the straps, it was less noticeable. Also the fabric is different than what I imagined. But overall I liked the dress!
I got it for a photoshoot, but would've definitely worn it to an outdoor/beach wedding or another outdoor formal party. It fit just right, minus the chest area. Overall a great dress

links_reviews_title: Show-stopping dress, just buy some bralettes!
links_reviews_text: I felt so glamorous in this dress at my first opera!

Wore this for a wedding in Reno, NV in October and multiple people told me how gorgeous this dress was! The v-cut in the front goes a little low and the straps don't adjust must, but I'm a 34D and did fine wearing a backless-sticky bra with this that I bought off of Amazon. I would for sure upload photos but this website keeps saying all of my files are too large :( But this dress is worth ordering for sure! Sizing: I'm 5'6", 140lbs and a 34D and a small fit me like a glove
Loved this dress. It fit very well. My only issue was the layer under the dress. It would bunch up a lot. Otherwise highly recommend for weddings.

links_reviews_title: I could not get the boobs to work! LOL!
links_reviews_text: I have no idea what happened but I tried this on at the NYC store. Since I live in Portland, Oregon and I didn't want to haul it home, I had them ship it so it was waiting for me when I got there. At the store it fit great. On my vacation....the chest area was so weird. I was never able to wear it. Too bad because the fabric is so pretty.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but not sure for what occasion
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress as a backup for a wedding I was attending but it didn't seem to look like a wedding dress for a semi-formal affair at a hotel. I might rent for a beach wedding, or for some kind of more beachy or casual vibe. The bust was pretty loose, but when I wore it with pasties, the chest was fine.
I did not wear this dress. It was too low cut in the front and the straps did not adjust enough to accommodate.

links_reviews_title: Ordered as a backup style, ended up not wearing. The dress is flattering but didn't love the color.
links_reviews_text: Flattering fit that shows off shoulders and legs.
Loved the bottom ruffle details an I got tons of compliments !!!!
loved the color, the fit, and open slits

Hubby loved the way this looked but it was too much cleavage for a wedding. I think you'd need perkier boobs or a magic bra to make this work. I said it runs large because I had about 4 inches of material left on the back in order to get the front to lay flat against my chest... but maybe it's supposed to just flow down the front, in which case you'd really need a magic bra.
So elegant, feminine and flattering. I sized down.

I really liked the flowy look of the front. The back was weird though. We couldn't figure out how to get the bottom of the straps/top of zipper to lay flat. I finally had to give up, because the back looked too weird. I wonder if I got a medium, if the dress would hang lower on the hips, eliminating the back strap issue. However, I have such a small bust a medium would look horrible up top in the front. Oh well, just not meant for me.

links_reviews_title: Made me feel like a goddess when I tried it on!
links_reviews_text: Although the fabric was thin (the only reason why I did not give it 5 stars), I loved how unique and feminine this dress looked on me. The color was nice against my olive color skin. The dress I received still had the tag on and it was a size large. I did not wear it because it was not right for the party I was going to attend. I would love to rent or buy this dress in the future!
it really didn't fit well on the top. I ended not using it. It was too loose compared to the rest of the body. It seems like it was a wrong cut or something.
Top was sloppy. Did not fit well at all.

Loved the way this dress looked on the model but pretty much everything about it was ugly on me. Straps are adjustable but it didn't help me out. Color is also darker than pictured. Had to sent back :(
The bust was very large and awkward
Love the color and the cut, but I honestly should have worn a 12 not a 10. Usually between a 6/8, so this runs super small. But the color and cut are absolutely gorgeous!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous and easy to dance in!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a bit hard to zip up on my own, but it fits snug all over, without being overly tight. The slit goes much higher when seated, but not inappropriate. I tried wearing a racer back bra underneath but the edges of the cups were visible. Braless is still fine since the dress is snug to keep things in place. I got lots of compliments on the dress, and it was comfortable to wear all night.

Very sturdy fabric. Definitely size up. I usually wear a 4 and ended up wearing the 8. Could have fit into the 6 but it was snug. Great dress for Christmas Eve mass! Stylish yet modest. Slit isn't terribly high. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a work holiday party!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely love the color of this dress (emerald)! The fit is great but was a little constricting in the waist and there is no stretch. Will show everything (eg bra lines). The length is perfect (I'm 5ft 4 and I wore 3.5in heels)
Obsessed with this dress. Highly recommend this for any event especially a holiday party. I'm normally a size two or 4 but holy cow its still tight with size 6

This dress got so many compliments!! Everyone loved the style. The downside is this dress definitely runs small, I'm typically an 8-10 and the 10 was pretty tight. But it's really comfortable! Love the color too!
Loved it so much I bought it! Show stopper!!

I'm going to echo a lot of the other reviews and reinforce that this dress definitely runs small so going up a size is the way to go! With that, I felt like the material was thick and flattering, and the color is amazing! I feel like it would look good on anyone.

links_reviews_title: I was so comfortable while looking elegant
links_reviews_text: Thick material to where I didn’t have to wear a bra! I am large chested (32DD) and felt very supported. I was able to dance and feel good! It hit me below the knee and I am 5’5.

I loves this dress. It does fit very snug so definitely size up. I’m a little hippy so I sized up 2 sizes. I wore spanx shorts underneath and that worked great. If you don’t have the right undergarments the lines may show. I received a ton on compliments on this dress. The color is awesome. I would def rent again in another color. The look is classic yet sexy and flirty perfect for any occasion.

Received so many compliments all night, I felt amazing in it, and although it's a tight fit that shows everything, it didn't feel uncomfortable at all. It's sexy but sophisticated and demure. Will definitely rent again!!
This dress was very comfortable, AMAZING color, and a great length. I rented a size up and it fit perfectly. Many many compliments

This is the second time I've rented this dress, and absolutely love it. Lots of compliments on the emerald green color, and it's super comfortable. I'm usually a size 6, but went with the 8 in this dress [I'm 5'6" 135lbs]. The fabric is thick, yet pretty stretchy, so either size could have worked for me. But I opted for a little more wiggle room and comfort. You can wear a normal bra with this, though racerback would probably be best. And I just shimmied it up to use the bathroom (unzipping would have been a bit too tricky).

links_reviews_title: Something special for a party where Anna Wintour's daughter and Vogue fashionistas are in attendance
links_reviews_text: Thankfully I listened to advice about the fit of this dress. I usually wear an 8, but the 12 fit perfectly. It was snug, but not too bad.

I absolutely loved this dress - the color was stunning and it fit in all the right places! Warning that it does run small, I usually wear either and 8 or a 10 and wore a 12 in this, and it was still very form fitting. I would buy this dress if I had more places to wear it to!

This really accentuated my belly to the point where I couldn't wear it. I'm a 26 in jeans to give you an idea of waist, and the 8 was super tight all the way through. Perfect if you are not large chested and if you have no stomach at all. Pretty color, I love the slit, length is long for 5'2" but would have worn if the hips were not so tight which is why I think it makes your belly pouch look larger than other dresses do.

links_reviews_title: I felt pretty, festive, but also covered appropriately for a work event
links_reviews_text: I got lots of compliments on the dress and felt it was fun yet appropriate for a work cocktail event. The color pops but is not garish. It runs small I had to size up to my back up 10, but I feel like most of these RTR dresses are like that. zipper was tight around my rib cage but felt like I was locked in sold with no slippage of any kind. I chose not wear any spanx but probably should have. Glad I got this dress.
I didn't want to return this dress
Gorgeous emerald dress with a flirty ruffle bottom to have a fun time. Tight from top through hips and a sit to walk with ease.
Tight fit thick material

links_reviews_title: Pretty color for St Paddy's Day
links_reviews_text: Pretty color. Very snug on top but had extra room in hips area.

Runs very small as others have said. Usually an 8 is the best size for me, in this I wore a 10 (and only Spanx) but could easily have done a 12 and probably would have been more comfortable. Super cute with a pair of nude studded heels - got lots of compliments.

Definitely super tight! Go up a size, got lots of compliments on the color. The bra situation was a bit tough. Had to wear a racerback bra and then used toupè tape to keep the sides in. Not great for dancing but had a fun night and felt great in it!
Having rented this brand before I sized up but it was still very small. I'd recommend as a beautiful dress but size up two sizes.

I received so many compliments on this dress. The color stood out brilliantly at a winter wedding. The material is nice and thick and the dress hugs curves nicely. I went up two sizes, so definitely size up for your back-up dress. Also, the slit in the front is quite high on taller girls. Not a deal/breaker at all, but just be aware if you're gong to a more conservative event.

links_reviews_title: Sexy but still work party appropriate!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my office holiday party. It is a very form-fitted dress. The fabric is thick and sucks you in but there is little room for error nonetheless. I wore spanx with it. I characterize it as running small because I am typically a 4P in most Rent the Runway dresses of similar style to this one, but I could've potentially benefited from a size 6P in this dress. It might be because although I am petite, I have an athletic figure. It is sexy but still covers you up so I believe it to be appropriate for a work-related function. I was happy with this dress and would rent it again but would size up!
I felt that it ran slightly small (opted for the size 6 but typically wear size 4). It was a beautiful color and form fitting while still appearing classy.
Received lots of compliments. Very comfortable and easy to wear all evening. Thick fabric made it warm and seasonally appropriate for an outdoor fall cocktail hour and formal dinner.
Size up, very fitted and looks GREAT!

I wore this dress for a company holiday party, and it was so fun to not be in red! It was fantastic quality, a gorgeous color, and I got compliments on it all night. It definitely runs small as I normally order size 10 dresses from RTR. I am wearing a 12 here and wishing I had the 14 ;)

This dress was just perfect. It definitely runs small but the slit gave you a little room to move without revealing too much. The material felt amazing and I loved that I could enjoy myself without having to worry about sucking it in all night! I was getting compliments all night long and hated that I had to take it off at the end of the night!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress for my Birthday Celebration
links_reviews_text: This dress was fun and flirty. It fit a little tight but it looked great nonetheless. I got a lot of looks all night. I'm a tall girl and the length was perfect.
I got so many compliments on the fit and color of this dress. Worn to a daytime wedding, it was just dressy enough but absolutely would be perfect for an occasion at night as well.
A little tight in the ribs (36A) but otherwise a fantastic dress! Comfortable for lots of dancing and celebrating.

Wore this dress to a charity gala. The emerald color was so beautiful, I had people coming up to me all night to compliment the dress! It is a snug fit, but very flattering. Definitely go up a size. 4 stars because the dress arrived with a hole in the side - I patched it myself and wore it anyway!

I rented this dress for a fall wedding in VA. I LOVE this dress. The color stood out, it fit me perfectly, and it was sexy without being too showy. I received many compliments on the dress itself, but also on how it brought out my blue eyes, and looked great with my blonde hair. I would rent it over & over in all colors. I'm rather busty, and it held everything in without giving me the dreaded armpit skin/fat bulge.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit like a glove!
links_reviews_text: The dress was perfect for a fall wedding. I felt confident in it. It was the right amount of sexy without being prudent or over the top. I almost didn't rent it, because I saw that others had problem with the slit being too high up the leg; however, I am 5'7 and didn't have a problem at all.
Talk about a bodycon dress! Loved it and got lots of compliments, def size up. I would have preferred a six but it wasn't available. The four fit but uncomfortably tight when sitting.

links_reviews_title: Great color, fit very snugly but it is pretty thick material. I wore it with a racerback bra.
links_reviews_text: Great color, fit very snugly but it is pretty thick material. I wore it with a racerback bra. Slit is pretty high up so I would not have been comfortable wearing it to work!

I loved this dress--I'm not a "cape" person but this was a nice compromise with the sleeve detail. It fit perfectly and I loved the color. The only problem is that the best part is the back and I neglected to get a picture of it! It's a nice V but not too revealing and it is still possible to wear a normal bra. No special undergarments needed which is always a plus!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress & the entire RTR process. It arrived in perfect timing.
links_reviews_text: The dress gathered a tad in the waist. Also, after seeing it in pictures I felt like Mrs. Waterford from a Handmaids Tale.

I ordered the 6 and 8 and wore the 8 as the 6 was too tight around my hips. I was about 10weeks pregnant so I wasn't showing yet but still conscious of any bumps. Received many compliments. Would rent again!
Dress fit perfectly. I am 5'3 and 121 lbs. I chose size 4 and 6. 4 fit best and was extremely flattering.

links_reviews_title: Friend referred to this as my Superwoman cape dress
links_reviews_text: This dress was comfortable and pretty, and conservative enough for the event while still having the fun surprise of the sleeves/back ruffle. I wore the 12; while the 10 could have worked, it was snug across the hips. I paired it with nude slingbacks and gold jewelry.

links_reviews_title: Postpartum Dress for Cocktail Attire Wedding
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments on the color, but found the fit a bit small

Loved this dress! It wasn't too tight to dance in, but it also looked classy enough for the wedding we attended! I normally wear an 8 (I could have fit in the 6, but went with the 8 for the length). Had a bit of stretch, but not so much that I'd call it stretchy

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a black tie optional charity event.
links_reviews_text: The dress was super comfortable and I liked that I could wear a regular bra. The back is what makes this dress special. Lovely color and i paired it with nude heels.
Wore to my college graduation. Perfect for petites. Length was what I wanted. Comfortable. Back is beautiful. Was able to wear a regular bra.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and stylish for a wedding
links_reviews_text: Dress fit great! It was just enough to not be too flashy, but still stand out. Got lots of compliments! Will be renting again!
I didn't end up wearing it, simply because I liked another dress better for a wedding, but I loved it! It fit great, was flattering, great color and material. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: No one else wore the color peacock..received so may compliments...would rent it again!
links_reviews_text: True to size. Suggest pasty boobs!

links_reviews_title: A gentlemen commented on my elegance
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect. Appropriate for a Catholic wedding that I read in. I somehow was even able to nurse my baby in this. Wore a regular bra. Easy to dance in. The shift fit is forgiving for a buffet.

links_reviews_title: The back of this dress is amazing!
links_reviews_text: The color is very unique- a dark teal. The length was perfect - I am 5'3''. And the back-WOW! I wish I had a picture of the back. It is beautiful.

links_reviews_title: All the compliments were nice. And I didn’t need to adjust anything! Comfortable and great quality
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect...for me. I have a shorter torso and chest and am fairly short at 5’2”.

Rented for a cousins wedding in late September. It didn't photograph as well as it looked in real life. I'm post baby and nursing so I was looking for a boxier fit. I'm smaller on the bottom than top (in real life outside of nursing) and the ten was snug on the top but wearable. Dress was super forgiving with the fun back. Not stretchy at all - so size up if you need extra room on top. It ran true to size in my opinion! Would rent again!
Loved it!!! I have wide hips so it was a little tight in that area but it was fine.

Really relied on the reviews for this, so I'm paying it forward. Sorry for the crappy pictures, I never actually took any at the wedding... I'm riiiiight in between a 4 and a 6. The 4 fit well up top, but was really tight in my hips and butt. The 6 had a little more room everywhere without feeling too big. I wore my hair up, A NORMAL BRA, and a long necklace. I liked the conservative front (I don't like showing off my chest), and open-ish back. Received a lot of compliments :)
Dress fit true to size and is very comfortable. Love the back and cape type sleeves. Got many compliments and paired it with a fun statement necklace.

The color is much better in natural/bright lighting. Slight thicker fabric and fully lined. Able to wear regular bra. Needed alittle steaming when it arrived. Comfortable to wear all night but would recommend sizing up, pretty straight fit through hips.

links_reviews_title: Versatile dress for a fall wedding
links_reviews_text: My brother had a small outdoor wedding in November- in Chicago- so I needed a dress that could be warm outside and look good with tights (if needed- bc brrr). This dress was great! It was a different style than I normally rent, but fit well and looked classy (even while shivering). Paired it with a simple black and gold longer necklace. Had a great time and wouldn't change anything about the day- great memories, thanks RTR!
This dress was very easy to wear. It was quite comfortable and the cape adds a little fun flare. I wore a fun pair of flowered shoes with it. The color is also gorgeous, very bold Jewel toned.

This was my backup dress that RTR overnighted to me and I iffy about it until I put it on for the first time. The best part about this dress was that my shape wasn't lost but my giant chest (currently sitting at a 32K) is concealed. I received the most compliments on the back of this dress! Fit me perfectly, I was comfortable, and not tugging or adjusting at anything all night.
Perfect to wear as a guest to rehearsal dinner. The back is awesome and the color is very rich. If you have hips/thighs/booty size up!!

This dress was perfect for my work event!! It was classy yet simple, the color was amazing and i was complimented on the dress all night - this was my first RTR experience and it was a perfect one!! The dress fit true to size and it was very flattering.
I wore this to a wedding when I was 12 weeks pregnant. It fit great and was very flattering for my small baby bump. I got so many compliments on it!

I loved this dress so much the first time, I rented it again! The cape arms make it very unique. I am straight and narrow and typically wear a 0 or 00. The dress is made to fit loose, so if you size like me it'll be perfect. It's a great dress to wear all night on the dance floor!

links_reviews_title: Unique dress in a beautiful color
links_reviews_text: I rented this for an evening wedding reception and really liked the finished look. It was not too dressy, but very unique with the draping in the back. The color was really pretty and I paired with silver accessories including sparkly peep-toed shoes. Despite the extra material in the back, this one is very form fitting so beware.

links_reviews_title: Elegant dress with a beautiful back!
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and material! Runs slightly large
Got many compliments on this dress! The back of the dress is what makes it so pretty. It was a little snug for me in the mid section but not uncomfortable. I would definitely wear it again!

links_reviews_title: Worn for a gala. Received several compliment and was VERY comfortable the entire evening.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit true to size. I am 5'5, 125lbs, 34 A and wore a size 2 perfectly. Several reviewers said they could wear a regular bra with it, however I could NOT without visible bra straps/being worried they'd be visible. I wore a strapless bra just fine. The event was mostly sitting and therefore the comfortable nature of the dress was important so I wasn't tugging at things the whole time. I highly recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: I was able to walk into the NY flagship and walk out with the perfect dress for my event!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a formal work event. It's a little long on a petite person like myself but it still worked.

The 0 fit perfectly. I'm 5'3, 115, 32B. You can wear with a regular bra, which is awesome. This dress does not get justice in photos. The back of it is draped, but still sexy. Tons of complements while wearing it. I would have bought this dress of the rack, no problem.

Loved the color and dress design. Wore a size two which was good in the waist and bust but could have gone with a four in the butt. Had to keep pulling it down. Did not make for flattering candid dancing pictures!

I ordered this dress kind of at the last minute and was nervous it might not work. I ended up loving it! The material was wonderful -felt high quality, the cape was unique and fun, & I loved the color. I did Not want to return it! I thought it was very true to size; I usually wear a 2 in dresses and the 2 fit very well. One thing I would say is it's definitely a shift dress, so for me it was a bit loose all over, especially the waist. If you have full hips/bottom, it could hug your butt a bit. I would recommend getting your usual size + one size up.

links_reviews_title: I've actually rented this dress for two separate occasions. I was flooded with compliments at both.
links_reviews_text: I love the subtile cape detail and color. It's a very flattering fit for my body type.
The picture didn't do the dress justice. Fit perfectly and the back was beautiful.
I wore this dress to a wedding and received so many compliments on the details of the dress! I'm a 34H so it is pretty hard to find a dress that isn't suffocating or hangs like a moo moo dress.

Loved this cape dress! My favorite part had to be the deep teal color. It was definitely loose fitting. This dress hit me right above the knee. I would accessorize it with a bold necklace. Can be worn with any undergarments.

Beautiful and classic. Great for a more dressy spring wedding. Wore with statement earring and flats. Wore a size up from usual because of length. I am 5'11 so it was a little bit short on me for a wedding.
Great color and fit. The dress has a bit of stretch so it made for a comfortable evening. I recommend for those with a large bust. I got so many compliments on the dress overall.
Great work option. But watch out for that split, it can definitely ride up. I'm 5'2" and when I sat down I had to cover up. Great color but will probably not rent again due to the split.

links_reviews_title: Didn't want to send it back!
links_reviews_text: This was classic beauty and sexy all in one. Be prepared to put your napkin or handbag on your lap when sitting because the slit opens in the front pretty high when you sit down. It was a really hot day for this outdoor wedding and I felt comfortable in this lightweight fabric.

links_reviews_title: Flattering draping but too sexy for conservative office
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress in store - my friend and I thought it was super flattering (which it is) but when I put it on to actually wear to work, I felt like it was a little to sexy for the conservative office I work in. The split in front was a little high and the v-neck was a little too low for the office. If I had a wedding or a cocktail event I was going to, I would have def worn in. A size up probably wouldn't have fit so tightly either....

The color is beautiful. The cut of the dress on top is flattering. The slit on the bottom is right in the middle.. not on the side as it appears in the pic. I'm 5'4" and the dress looked lovely when I was standing up, standing still. Any walking or sitting causes the slit to open and it gets pretty racy, very quickly.

links_reviews_title: Outdoor, daytime wedding in Texas ... in June! It was hot. But beautiful...and the dress was a hit!
links_reviews_text: The color is gorgeous and the cut is very flattering! I had to be cognizant of the cleavage factor (would gap when I sat down and had to keep adjusting so my bra wasn't fully on display) and the leg slit would occasionally expose my spanx. Those were the only two "watch-outs" I experienced. But the dress was fabulous and I received tons of compliments! Might even end up buying for future use! Height: 5'8" Bust: 36/38 D Body Type: Curvy / Athletic Weight: 165

I got so many compliments on this color of dress! It was perfect for a May wedding. Fits true to size and was very comfortable in it! The only thing I'd say is the slit in the middle makes it hard to sit down...I had to put my purse on my lap bc the slit goes up the middle :) other than that I loved it!

This dress is gorgeous! I love the color. The material is very nice. It looks great and fit pretty well. The main problem is the way the slit in the skirt is cut, when I sat down it opened up a wide chasm, showing much of my thighs. I wore this out to a fancy brunch and kept my napkin to cover my lap the whole time. It is also a little low cut up top. I think if I had bigger boobs, that problem would be solved.

This dress was definitely sexy, maybe a little too much for the wedding I attended. I didn't have a problem with the cleavage, it actually was a good skin to fabric ratio but my hips were a bit more than the dress could handle. That front split was all the way up and the fabric that wraps under it ALSO goes all the way up therefore, if I wasn't careful, I might unintentionally flash my front at someone. It was also a little difficult to pair with a layer but I might not have had the right item in my closet. Looked great with a pashmina/scarf thing that I had.
Loved loved. Ran a tad small in the breast area but it was super duper sexy.

links_reviews_title: Nice fit but can be too revealing
links_reviews_text: I liked the look but I had to pin the top and the bottom to keep it from opening too wide and revealing too much.

I got this dress in store... I am usually a 10 or 12, and I went with the 12 because of the slit like everyone talked about. I am self conscious about my hips and midsection but this dress is super flattering!

links_reviews_title: I loved wearing this dress, I felt beautiful and confident.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well, I had to size up to the 10. The slit in the front made picking out shape wear more challenging. When you move or sit it can shift exposing more of your leg. I’m 5’6” so I didn’t feel like it went too high.
Could not even zip this - ran way too small. Everything else I've rented thus far has fit perfectly, so this was weird.

I really wanted to like this dress! So much so that I also ordered a size up in case the size I usually wear didn't fit. They were BOTH too small. The cut in front was very high and I was worried I'd expose myself if I took a long step, so I ended up wearing a different dress.
Sadly, I rented this for work but could not wear it. It is too low cut and the slit is too high for sitting down in the dress. It is a beautiful color and fabric, though.
Gorgeous!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, but a little too sexy for a work event
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress but the slit and neckline were a little much for work

I got LOTS of compliments on this dress. Some may have not been for the right reasons though..v low cut, v high slit. But definitely felt very sexy! I ended up seeing my ex-boyfriend out that night and it was enough to grab his attention for the entire night.

I rented this dress for work and could not wear it. If you have bigger hips/thighs this dress will not work. I felt like I would give everyone a "show" with each step. It is super cute and the bodice fits really well though!
It was just ok. Everything fit well and it looked good-ish. Just not the stunner I have come to expect from RTR
This was so flattering and comfortable !! Got a lot of comments about it!
I liked it just okay, my husband didn't like it. Said it was too simple. I did not wear but it did fit just a tad small.
This was too low cut and the slit too high for work. Super cute for any other dressy event!

links_reviews_title: Great dress - great color - love the cut - the slit rides a little high - need to be careful sitting
links_reviews_text: The slit is very sexy but you need to be careful when you sit down. It runs slightly large - but no big deal

links_reviews_title: Ordered a size up to compensate for the slit.
links_reviews_text: This dress came NWT and is an absolutely beautiful color! I wore it to attend a wedding at a country club and paired it with a statement necklace and some strappy stilettos. While I usually wear an 8, I sized up to a 10 and was glad I did! It was a bit difficult to sit down in because of the cut even with the size-up, but I found myself standing most of the time. Additionally, I might be weary renting this if you have a fuller bust.
Top had a stitch that was torn out when received. Would have held wrap together but still ok if stick had not shown. Skirt terrible. Split higher and wider than pictured Lovely color
Front slit is already quite high standing still but when walking it rides up even higher. Don't see it being an issue for those with a straighter frame.
New tags. Fit as expected. Actually a pretty nice dress but I went with another. For Mother's Day.

Color is true and pure turquoise- gorgeous. Fit is high waist so silhouette is very flattering. Chest not overly emphasized and skirt split adds to length of legs. Sitting shows a lot of above knee but hey, that's what a napkin is for!

links_reviews_title: Front slit is so high you can literally see my crotch when I walk,
links_reviews_text: I gave this two stars instead of one or zero. Only because it is made very well and it is a very good brand and it does fit well. But what is up with the front slit?? When I walk you can see my crotch. It's ridiculous. I guess someone could wear it if they don't care if people are seeing their crotch??? I'm 5 foot seven, 125 pounds. Nothing weird with my body. I don't understand how anybody else could wear this without their crotch showing
Was a little big but worked ok. I should of sized down. Paired with a black blazer and black heels.

Meant to get a six which was too tight on the waist but fit right everywhere else. Accidentally went home with an 8 which was too big except in the waist. Ended up wearing a cami underneath the dress because it would have been too indecent otherwise. This is a pretty dress if you get the right size.
Had already sized up. Material is pretty thin too
Huge hit at a Salsa Night party!

I love this preppy, feminine dress by Viva Aviva! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size, for your primary size. (add if true to size) and going up for your back up. This style is roomy throughout the midsection and, loose at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this dress. At 5’3, the length hit knee length on me. The black color with the multi-colored piping on the ruffles keeps the outfit fun. Pair with heels and cute earrings to complete your outfit!

links_reviews_title: This dress was comfortable and true to size. The tiered skirt made dancing super fun!
links_reviews_text: #NYE
Fun dress. Comfortable fit. Better for taller / long torso girls though. It was a little long on me.

links_reviews_title: Fun to wear but runs slightly big
links_reviews_text: This is a such fun dress to wear! I felt like dancing all day long, endless compliments too

links_reviews_title: I wore this to receive a community service award and it was just perfect. Tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size, it was a little big on the bottom but not a problem because I could fill it out. Perfect for curvy ladies.

So much fun! Every time someone complimented the dress I couldn't resist doing a little half-spin. I'm sometimes a size 2, sometimes a 4. In this dress the 2 was nearly perfect - just slightly big in the hips but still looked good to me. You can't help but smile while wearing this dress :-)
Runs very large but it's comfy & adorable!!!

I'm usually a size 2-6 but I wore a zero in this happy dress. I'm small on top, curvy on bottom so the style and stretchy material made it possible. The ruffles his hippy saddlebags while the solid black body shows off curves. I felt super cute and received tons of compliments including many "your look makes me happy" while running around NYC for work.
Perfect dress if ur feeling spicy and fun! Glad I ordered a size down and it was perfect
This dress is flattering in all the right places but runs large. It was a fun dress to wear to a party.
Date night. Fun and cute and comfortable.
Perfect fit and comfortable. Everyone was asking about the dress!

links_reviews_title: The day was overflowing with compliments for this dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress is absolutely stunning. The fit was perfect and my hot pink shoes and accessories made it even more beautiful. I felt like the most beautiful Flamingo Dancer in the world. I will definitely rent this dress again.
very slimming
thick sturdy material, well made

links_reviews_title: Really unusual dress - great for winter party!
links_reviews_text: This was a lot of fun to wear. The cons... The bustle felt huge on me, and the cut-outs on the arm felt like an unnecessary extra detail given the amount of action on the skirt. It does run a full size large - I usually get a 4, this was a 2 and for one minute I considered swapping it for the size 0. The fabric doesn't have much stretch, and the sleeves are cut fairly generously, so it looked better when I pushed up the sleeves. You're pretty covered so it's a good winter party dress, less so for other times of year. But I rented in December, wore it with black opaque tights, and I felt great in it. Excellent example of why RTR is so wonderful - I would never buy this in a million years, but it was a blast to wear it once!

Loved this dress that I rented so much that I saved it to wear again a few days after the dinner I'd originally rented it for. Super flattering and very good quality material. Would definitely rent again, and maybe even buy.
Very fun dress to wear
Beautiful dress! Great fit......

links_reviews_title: Too tight and just not what I thought
links_reviews_text: Too small size up

links_reviews_title: If you have a Flamenco fantasy
links_reviews_text: Very heavy material. Was too costume-like for me.
Very flattering fit, true to size. Top was sleek and form fitting and even forgiving, skirt billowed out and was festive. Perfect for a family party

I ordered my usual size 0 but, in every way, this dress was too big. It did not hug my waist like pictured on the model. It was down to my knees and the fabric was very heavy. I couldn't wear the dress.
I rented this for a birthday party and I loved it. Looked super cute and fit great. I did have to change after a few hours because the material wasn't very breathable and it was too hot for dancing.
So comfortable and such an eye catcher.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a Vegas party!
links_reviews_text: Amazing dress for a Vegas night out. True to size. I got sooo many compliments!
This was one of my favorite rentals! It's short but super flattering!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a wrap party and Zoe Kravitz loved my dress!
links_reviews_text: True to size. I'm 5'3 135 pounds and the size 4 fit perfectly. It was not too short just above the knee. I got so many compliments.
Perfect perfect perfect

They didn't have the 2, but the 0 fit perfectly. a little on the short side - i had to pull it down when i was dancing, but super comfy, plus no bra! (always a win!) Got lots of compliments! fun, different party dress!

links_reviews_title: Love the low back and bold colors
links_reviews_text: This dress was great for a formal but funky wedding. The silhouette, length, low back, and colors were fun to rock, but the modest neckline kept it feeling classy. The sleeves jut out a little awkwardly from the arm pits (part of the fit seeming large) but not enough to be a dealbreaker. I wish the skirt were flat and fitted to complete the sleek, modern feel, but it had a bit of a bubble cut which was disappointing. Highly recommend pairing with a purple lip!

links_reviews_title: I felt beautiful for my law school graduation!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for my day- it made me stand out and matched my mood! The dress was a much stretchier fabric than expected, which made it SUPER comfortable. It seriously felt like I was in pajamas. Despite that, it was still substantial enough that I didn't need a bra, and I was able to wear nude boy shorts. In case you were hoping for a little more structure to help your midsection or something, though, you will probably be disappointed. The only downside of the comfy stretchy fabric is that it wrinkled very easily (i think you can see in the pictures). The 00 and 0 both fit, but I went with the 00. The 0 was mainly only too big in the sleeves/shoulders- and I do not have small shoulders by any means.
Fit like a glove! Quite short, but that was expected. Loved the open back and cap sleeves. Only part I didn’t love is the hem bubbled a little.

I am saying this dress runs large only because my backup size 4 was a little loose in the front/shoulders due to the back of the dress being so open. Other than that this dress is VERY lightweight. Not the canvas material I was expecting it to be, it's more like a light cotton(?). Very comfy and would be great for a hotter time of year. Great to wear any color of shoes you want! I wore hot pink heels since it was for Valentine's Day!
Love this dress, but did run big and had to use tape to keep it held up. Hit right above the knee and was comfortable for outdoor wedding.

Cute dress! Love the bright colors and splash design. Very stretchy and comfortable fit for the material. I Wish the material was thicker and felt for sturdy, seemed a little thin but that can also be good for hot, outdoor weddings! The white part of the dress seemed more worn/faded in person. Can't wear a bra because the back is entirely open. Doesn't matter for me because I am small chested. Overall, great rental for outdoor summer wedding.
Wanted to rent this for so long. Was beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Vibrant print and open back made this dress so much fun!
links_reviews_text: I really enjoyed wearing this dress and got a lot of compliments throughout the night. I found that while the 2 fit, it was less tight and I was more comfortable in the 4.

links_reviews_title: It was super comfy. The colors and design were bold and bright, which is why I loved it.
links_reviews_text: The fabric is on the thin and stretchy side. If it fits tightly, it will show every curve.
I got so many compliments on this dress. October is a hit or miss for weather and it was pretty cold but the dress looked great!
I got so many compliments on the dress, and it was super comfortable to wear! I would rent again!

I am 5'3 and this dress was short! I decided to go with the 2 because the length of the size zero would have been inappropriate for a wedding. The zero fit me better in the shoulders and with wearing the size two the sleeves would sometimes fall off my shoulders. It's a pretty tight fitting dress. I'd definitely size up! Not sure I would rent again due to length. I couldn't dance much and I had to constantly pull it down when getting up and sitting down. Lots of compliments despite the annoyances!

The 0 fit but the zipper was stretched out and popped off my body in an unflattering way so I went with the 2 which was more comfortable anyway. Used 2 pieces of fashion tape at the shoulders and it stayed in place all night. Got tons of compliments! Wish I owned this dress, one of my favorite rentals so far.

I don't want to send this dress back because it is just so cute!! I rented this to wear for my anniversary weekend and it wore it out to dinner. I received so many compliments all night. The colors are so vibrant and fun and the back is the best part. I chose not to wear a bra and didn't have any issues with the top sliding off. It is a bit short so be careful. For reference I am 5'3 and 115 lbs.

The dress fits pretty well, the only part that doesn't fit that good is the belly area. (The belly part is a little bit puff) Wore this to an employee luncheon (casual formal) and everyone loved my dress!
Perfect for a summer wedding. It's short tho. You have been warned

links_reviews_title: It was good all together just a few minor things .
links_reviews_text: Overall it fit well . I’m little up top but with a butt. The 0 was a bit tight in the hip area and the 2 was huge in the arm area so I did the 0 , my friends it looked good tho. The only real compliant was you can tell there was a part of the dress that was restitched prob from so much usage and when standing it was uneven on my legs the dress with a large crease where you can tell it was restitched . It was a minor thing but it just bothered me the way it fell. Overall it good

Loved the dress and got so many compliments. Wore it for my going away party. It's light and easy to wear. The shoulders surprisingly stay on really well. Wore stick on cups since the back is exposed and a bra would show. Definitely recommend.

Dress is very cute. But super short!!! I wouldn't have worn it to another function but since i was out with my husband it was fine. I wore the larger size bc it was so short. Still cute though and comfortable despite the length

links_reviews_title: Had a blast dancing the night away with my best friends!
links_reviews_text: At first I was skeptical of this dress. I wasn't sure about the sleeves and the dress seemed to hug me in the wrong places. I decided to stick with it and wear it for my friend's wedding- I'm so glad I did! Once I had my hair/makeup done, I felt fabulous in this dress and I received a ton of compliments. The only negatives: this dress is short and does ride up so I was constantly pulling it down. It also made wearing spanx difficult. Overall, I would absolutely recommend!
So cute! I got lots of compliments on this one.

links_reviews_title: Loved the structure the dress had!
links_reviews_text: Probably could've used a size smaller, but it wasn't available on the date I needed it. The 2 was fine, I just had sit up extra straight to be sure the sleeves didn't slip. Looks best with a sticky bra. I'm short so the length wasn't an issue, but I could see where it might be a bit short for women with longer legs. Loved how different it was. Lots of compliments!
It is a little short even for only being 5'4 and you can't wear a regular bra! However I loved this dress. I was able to dance without any issue.

links_reviews_title: This dress is fabulous! I wish I could keep it.
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this dress. I am 5'4, and it was on the short side (but I liked that). The open back really makes the dress. It's fun, flirty, and sexy. For ladies with smaller busts, this dress works great because the top isn't so tight. It's very flattering. I would definitely rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: I received many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was true to size and so beautiful! It was also very comfortable. Highly recommend.
Sexy and sassy, I loved wearing this dress for my 30th Birthday!
Spent the evening pulling down the rear but it was SO cute! So many compliments

This dress is adorable! I wore it to commencement at MSU and it was the perfect dress for a daytime event. Super comfy, gorgeous print, no need for a bra, the back is to DIE FOR. However, just like others had reviewed, it is a bit on the short side. Wearing it with flats made it feel a bit more appropriate. One of my fav rentals!

Loved this dress. The fit was great with the size 2. I was happy with the shorter length, as most dresses are not short enough for me since I'm only 5'3". I did have to use a little fashion tape on my shoulders as the top was slightly too big. Nothing that was not fixed with the tape. This dress is not loose, but not insanely tight. I had plenty of movement in it and was able to dance all night long in it. I enjoyed the bright colors and felt pretty sexy in it. The back is absolutely gorgeous! I obviously did not wear a bra but tried out the silicone nipple sticky things and that worked perfectly to help smooth out my boobs as well as adding a tiny umph to them. Perfect for the occasion and got lots of compliments! Oh, and I opted for the blue shoes (jcrew) once I got myself ready and put the dress back on. They looked great with the colors in the dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful colors but not the best fit
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress on the hanger... not so much on me. It was right in the hips but gapped in the waist. To be fair I do have a big difference between my waist and hips so if you're more of a straight built, this might work better for you. It also rides up a lot, when walking, when moving arms... when breathing. It was ok and I did go out in it but I wouldn't rent again
I rented this for my engagement photos. Very stretchy material. Also very short! I loved it though. Flattering cut and beautiful colors. Great for date night!
Open back and a mini, so great for a party or night out!

This dress was perfect for a communion! The length was great for me and the colors were pretty! The shoulders/sleeves were a bit stretched out but overall it was a good fit. I was comfortable in both the 0 and 2.. but went with the 2 for a slightly looser fit since I was at a communion :)
It was stunning on. The colors are gorgeous and it's very comfortable to wear... it is "shorter" but it's super cute so just depends on what length you like . I received TONS of compliments!!!
Good fit, light weight perfect for dinner.

Super cute fun dress. The yellow color is bright and vibrant really went well with my skin tone. It's a bit hugging around the hip area but I usually have that problem because I have wider hips for my waist. Overall love the dress can be dressed up or down and still feel fabulous.
Love the bright yellow dress! It's a great easy dress for any occasion.

links_reviews_title: Perfect day dress for a Las Vegas conference!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit true to size and the length was perfect for a shorty like myself. The material was comfortable and the color was an eye-catching yellow. I would rent this one again!

Really liked this one. Only got to wear it for a couple of pictures because we were flying out soon after, but I'd definitely rent it again. The yellow is more of a mustard yellow but in a good color way. The cut, fit and the ruffles all make it a sophisticated look but with a good sexy, fit. Don't need much jewelry or any accessories with this one. I wore the S because it gave me breathing room. Thanks #RTR!

This dress was beautiful and professional and fun! I wouldn't normally wear such a bright color but it was so fantastic for the spring design event I went to after work. Fit well and didn't wrinkle too much even after a full day. Fun sleeve made the dress stand out. More of a mustard color than true yellow.
runs a little small but got tons of compliments!

This dress was comfortable but a tad short. I had to be careful when sitting down. It definitely shows your stomach area though. I'm a 38D and the bust area was a little snug. The color is more mustard yellow than the picture. Overall, it was a great dress!
Perfect for a spring bridal shower!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color for a sunny day.
links_reviews_text: Fit just right in all the right places.
I wore this dress to a bridal shower. It was cute overall but the chest area ran big. Size 0 was tight but size 2 was loose in the bust.
incredibly flattering and great for vacation

Great dress! I have a larger chest so it was a little snug up there but I thought it fit pretty true to size. I wore this twice - once for a academic dinner & once for Thanksgiving! I felt like it was versatile for both events. Also it was a tad snug on the midsection so maybe not the BEST choice for Thanksgiving but overall I was happy!

links_reviews_title: Perfect cheerful dress that you can wear with boots or heels!
links_reviews_text: I used this dress for family photos. Beautiful color to match the autumn leaves. Not too snug or too loose. Flattering but not flaunt. The fitted dress still flows with movement. Overall very nice dress so I bought it to keep!
I loved how different the dress was however I wished the yellow was a little more vibrant!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, super flattering, fit for all seasons!!
links_reviews_text: Second time I have rented this dress on my Unlimited, needless to say I LOVE it!! Fit is perfect, true to size and very flattering. Fabric is thinner than it may appear and has a bit of stretch. It can be accessorized so many ways with lots of color!! Highly recommend! Go for it!! Great for work or date night!!
I wore this dress for a wedding. It was flattering and not too tight. I received several compliments for this dress. It was comfortable and easy to dance in.
Great dress! It's a little big in the back area but I'm short and petite.

links_reviews_title: My date couldn’t keep his eyes off of me!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous, classy but yet sexy dress. Wore it to our 14 year wedding anniversary date and it was a bit. I received so many compliments throughout the evening. My husband was in awe lol. The color of the drsss is such a beautiful yellow-mustard which makes it perfect for this time of the year. I was undecided between this dress and another dress and I’m so glad I went with this one. I rented both xs and S and decided to wear the XS, I liked the way it fit better. I have to add that this was also my first experience renting from RTR, they made the process so smooth and painless. Thank you.
Got so many compliments on this dress and it was sooo comfortable!
Fall wedding win!
The fit was great, and I loved the color and ruffle. The ruffle did have a mark that appeared to be from ironing, but I still wore it.

I've worn this dress countless times . compliments rain every time. I dress it up, dress it down, even wrapped my head put on some animal print sling backs and wore it to a Wakanda Party. Gave them a little taste of African American Wakanda. I've worn it with short hair long hair, ponytails and head wraps. My dates always receive compliments when I'm out with them wearing this dress. So much so that i bought it. I own it
I loved the material and fit of this outfit, very comfortable, lightweight and great for work.

Rented for anniversary dinner with my hubby. I definitely think this is better for those that are bigger up top. Also, it is flattering for hourglass figures or curvy figures. The color is slightly darker in person. It's a fun fit and flare dress and comfortable!
I added a belt, big help.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for a commercial photoshoot.
links_reviews_text: Fit: perfect. true to size. Pros: Color was nice. Fit was awesome. Flowy. I loved the ruffles. Cons: none that I can think of.

This is one of my favorite Rent the Runway dresses and one of the only ones that I've ever rented twice! I love the fit, I love the flowy sleeves, and I love the color. It's comfortable and it's pretty and it always gets me so many compliments!
Loved he ruffles and frills on this dress. A little snug across the hips, so the fit was a little wrinkled (as you can see), but fun dress to wear!
Rented both M and L, and went with the M. Fit was snug and perfect. No cons on this dress. Extra ruffles gave it a little "something" extra, and the color is great for brown & dark skin.
Enjoyed

The color was a little bit more green and the material wasn't as versatile as I was hoping… It also didn't seem to fit me the way I wanted it to. Seemed baggy and not flattering. Probably could have benefited from a cute belt and dressier shoes. Nice quality but not what I was looking for for a regular day.

Amazingly easy to wear, super summery, incredibly flattering dress that would make you feel so feminine! Fantastic fit and remained breezy even in Temecula wine country's 115F temps! Would highly recommend

links_reviews_title: Everything about this dress is perfect.
links_reviews_text: Pros: color style and zipper Cons: I have to return it back to rtr

I wore this dress to my sisters graduation and loved it. It is more of a mustard color than yellow but still really pretty and I got so many compliments. The way the bottom flows is so slimming so I felt great! The only issue I had was with the top. I'm a 34B and the top was a little big on me, but if you wear a push-up bra, that'll do the trick. Also the fabric doesn't stretch so make sure to find a size that'll fit in the waist and size up for backup size.

I loved this dress!!! I got so many compliments. The ruffles were flirty and fun. I definitely felt like I had a JLo moment in it haha. The color was more of a vibrant mustard color in person. The waist/hip area was very very tight. The fabric had very little, if any, stretch. Not ideal for a pear shaped person. I wish they would've had a bigger size, but I made it work.

Pros-I loves the ruffle detail on the top and the bottom and the color is cute. Cons- it's short. It came about mid thigh on me and I'm 5ft 1. The material is very light and the wind would easily blow it up. Also the material clings to any imperfect bump and my pooch. You can see the seams on my control top power panty. You can also see the outline of my bra. This would probably be good on a 5ft person with a smoother silhouette than me. :)

links_reviews_title: OK dress. Didn't flatter my body
links_reviews_text: Dress was alright. I'm not really into yellow.
I wore this for an interview and it was perfect! Really great fit and color

links_reviews_title: Always fabulous in a fit & flare
links_reviews_text: Wore it to a spring time party, and felt stunning. Received tons of compliments. The cut is very flattering and the fabric is comfy and soft. I didn't find it too short at all, like a couple of the reviews have said. I will say that the color is much more Marigold like the dress title says, and less lemony yellow like the photos seem to show. Still a great shade of yellow. Would rent again.
Fabulous dress! So many compliments! I’m 5’0 and with 4” heels, the dress dragged by the end of the night. But otherwise perfect!
The dress fit like a glove. The length was perfect! I received a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: The dress fit perfectly, the color was amazing, and I received compliments all night.
links_reviews_text: The material on this dress was stretchy, thick, and comfortable. The bodice has boning all the way around. Despite walking, dancing, and walking from 6:30pm - 2am, I never worried about the dress slipping down. I didn't need a bra, but wore a strapless bra nonetheless. I wore the OP with 4 inch heels and the dress covered my shoes but not my toes. I was sad to return the dress and would definitely rent it again!

I felt like a vintage Hollywood Star. Absolutely stunning dress. I'm 5'4" and the length was perfect with some medium heels. The boning helps keep it up and the ruching is super flattering. I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress! I felt like a million bucks.....even standing next to my friend who is a model.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable, the top stayed put. There is enough give in the fabric to comfortably sit, but not so much that it is like a second skin. I highly recommend this dress.
I loved this dress. The color and fit were perfect for my company holiday party.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress for USMC Birthday Ball
links_reviews_text: This is my second time renting this dress for the USMC birthday ball as it is a perfect match for the uniform's scarlet red. It is form-fitting, but the ruching and heavier fabric are very flattering. I'm 5'4" and 126 lbs and I wore the 4P since I wore low heels (2.75") and to allow for dancing. This is a dress that my husband loves to see me wear!

This dress has the potential to be beautiful, the material was really nice and the length was great. The dress fit right in the ribs and midsection but was really baggy in the chest and fit really loose in the hips and legs.

links_reviews_title: Fire engine red is so much fun!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a lot of fun to wear. The boning helped keep this strapless dress in place. I could've worn the 2 but was a bit tight and short so decided to size up. Also the two sizes were considerably different colors whereas the 2 was a deeper burgundy red and the 4 as pictured was a bright red. Lots of compliments, enjoyed the gown

I rented both the 6 and the 8p, I'm 5'4" and was just between the right fit on the regular and petite fit. I wore very tall heels with a platform and the regular was still a bit long for me. I have a big bust and the dress is tight at the top to keep it from falling down, but it didn't feel tight anywhere else. I got so many compliments on the dress, I loved it.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Fit like a glove
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on the dress! There is boning on the top so I didn't need to wear bra and it stayed in place all night. I thought the petite would have been shorter, it was still too long but I just taped it up for the night.

links_reviews_title: Rent this dress!!! I had so many compliments on this dress! It was perfect!
links_reviews_text: I'm busty so I had a hard time getting this zipped in a 14, but the 16 was way too big. I did get it zipped but it took a while! I am 5'8" and the regular was the perfect length for a 2 inch heel.
Fit to a tee; did not have to pull up at the top. I would definitely wear again. Beautiful, beautiful dress.

I had a mishap with the original dress I rented (arrived damaged), so RTR sent me this one directly to the location of the wedding. I was driving when customer service picked the replacement so I had no clue what dress I would get. That said, this dress was a AMAZING. It was very form-fitting, but not to the point where it felt uncomfortable. I could dance all night. I got MANY compliments. I felt like $1 million all evening. Kudos to RTR for helping me out in a jam and making me look amazing!

I am 5'10 and 163 lbs. I wore this for a gala. Highly recommend the long! I have long legs and I wore 2.5 inch heels. I could have worn flats and would have been fine. Wore a slimming undergarment and helped tremendously! Normally wear 10 and ended up wearing the 12 long. Would buy the dress if I could. Love it!
I absolutely loved the fit and the color. The fabric is really soft with a bit of stretch, so the dress adjusted perfectly to my curves. I got many compliments. Everybody liked it!

Great style, great dress! I received so many compliments. It was nice to be a pop of color in a sea of black. I am 5’1”, 130 lbs, 32DDD, with a curvy hourglass figure.
