I ordered the 6P and 8P and found the 6P to be a better fit, albeit a bit snug. I would say the 6 fit like a 4. The 8P was too loose and well too long even with heels. In the 6P I didn’t need a bra as the boning and bodice fit well. In this particular dress, the boning was starting to poke through the liner and would’ve been torturous if I hadn’t worn shapewear under. This was my first RtR experience and I was very pleased with the selection, pricing and process. I’ll def do it again for formal affairs as finding petite formals is hard and expensive.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit perfectly with the outdoor wedding.
links_reviews_text: The dress is a little long and I would definitely do an 8P if I rented again. The clinch waist is great because it covers any extra pounds that occur after dinner (which is a huge bonus). It's classy and supportive. I have wide hips, but narrow top. The bottom of the dress had tons of stretch and the top stayed up all night. I'm 5'4, 140 pounds (most of my weight in my hips and legs). Hope this dress makes you feel beautiful, too!

Gorgeous! This dress is so comfortable. Fitted but enough elasticity to move and dance! My hips are wider than my chest, so the top was loose. You can tell in the picture if you look closely. But I wore a strapless bra, and the dress stayed in place all night. I would highly recommend.

I loved this dress. It was a classic red strapless dress. I'm 5 ft 1 and had to wear 5 inch heels for it not to drag on the floor. When I switched to more flat shoes later, I just had to hold it up a little when walking around.

Dress was stunning on me. I didn't end up wearing it as I have a smaller chest and the dress was slipping down a little and I also thought red was a little bright for a formal wedding. I would see about renting for another event where it would be appropriate to stand out

links_reviews_title: Dress fit very well, was perfect for a black tie wedding. Only issue was the backup size was n/a.
links_reviews_text: Dress fit very well, was perfect for a black tie wedding. Only issue was the backup size was n/a. However RTR was very accommodating in helping to find an alternative dress, and getting it shipped to me in time.
This dress was absolutely perfect, hugged every part of my body, and very comfortable to wear. LOTS of compliments!
This dress is amazing. I am short and for me to wish for a longer dress was a surprise. Get the long version for the perfect look.

links_reviews_title: Never been so obsessed with a dress before.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit amazing. I am still obsessed with it. The color, fabric and fit were perfection.

links_reviews_title: My husband's face when I walked out in the dress made the whole experience worth it!
links_reviews_text: The fit was amazing. I wasn't sure my bust was going to fit but with some slow zipper work it did and stayed put all night.

I loved this but I'm glad I got a backup size! I usually get a 4/6 and the 8P was snug at first but fit well and was comfortable all evening. I think you may not need to size up if you are narrower up top. I did not do a strapless bra and it ended up fine given the structure. Would def rent this or something similar again!

links_reviews_title: The dress is beautiful. Very elegant and perfect for a fancy, black tie event.
links_reviews_text: It was a tad big on the chest and a few inches too long in the back. Even with heels, it was 1-2 inches too long in the back. The front is shorter and was fine. I was going to use fabric tape, but I couldn't get it to look right, so I ended up just wearing it long. If there was a size smaller than 0P, I would have ordered it. I have a small rib cage and waist.

links_reviews_title: This dress was a show stopper! So many compliments...would definitely rent again!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove! I loved the color and the length was perfect. I am about 5'2'' and with my heels it just touched the ground.

It fit perfectly! Although, I can see how bustier woman would have an issue with this dress as it is a little tight on the top. However, it fit me well and didn't slip and I am a 34C. Also I got a 6L as I am 5'8 and wore 4 inch heels and the dress fell right at the ground with no dragging. I would recommend this dress to anyone, the bright red really makes you stand out! :)
the dress is amazing. I did not wear shapewear and I regret it. The midsection has some ruffles that can make it look like a belly

Didn't end up wearing this gown. I rented the 4P and 4R and I'm usually a 4 or 2. Thought I was erring on the side of caution but false! FYI the 4P is really not much different fit wise like other petite sizes; only the length was diff, which I appreciate. I'm 5'3, wore 4" heels, and the dress still dragged in the 4R. However, I am a 34D and the dress would NOT zip because it's a side zipper. Once I finagled it closed, I had to hold my arm up to show a somewhat flattering view, with the dress pulled higher than intended, and I'm still spilling out. Also, like other reviewers have said, the boning was odd in that it went below the girls and no further. I'd be interested to try it in a 6, but I'm not too optimistic. Beautiful color though!
I loved this dress!
This dress was simple yet stunning! It highlighted me in all the right places.

links_reviews_title: so incredibly beautiful! received so many compliments. this is the right dress!
links_reviews_text: 6P might have been a little tight, but it still fit pretty nicely. Normally a 4.

links_reviews_title: Definitely felt like a "Beauty in a Bottle"
links_reviews_text: Dress fit true to size and no bra needed. Received compliments all evening.

links_reviews_title: First time renting and will be doing it again.
links_reviews_text: Runs small, it is thick, so it’s warm.

links_reviews_title: It was a beautiful night in Chicago for my Barrister's Ball, my boyfriend's jaw dropped! Hollywood!
links_reviews_text: I was a little nervous that the 12R wouldn't be long enough for my height (5'10") but was surprised that it was the perfect length, at least for me. My toes did peek out but I had on some awesome shoes to complement the dress so that didn't matter to me. There is a built in corset it felt like and didn't have to wear a bra. But any ladies with bigger busts may want to go up a size. I am a 36B and it just fit. Overall, beautiful gown. Felt like a 1930s Hollywood actress with the classic red. Received compliments all night and my boyfriend's jaw hit the floor!

The fit of this dress is perfect and the color is gorgeous! The only negative is the zipper can get stuck and is a bit hard to get up! But all in all, I loved this dress! Many compliments on this one! #heartball

links_reviews_title: Beautiful rich red color the ruching and gathering on the side of dress is very pretty & flattering
links_reviews_text: Great dress, lightweight material easy and fun to dance in. Boning in the top rib area was noticable but flexible. Boning stopped at the bottom of the rib cage instead of at the hip which didn't look as smooth since I don't have much in the hip department.

links_reviews_title: P E R F E C T F I T
links_reviews_text: This dress was hot hot hot. I felt so sexy and confident. The dress did not ride, it fit like a glove.

links_reviews_title: Thick material, but shows ALL curves....both good and bad!
links_reviews_text: I didn't love this dress despite the high quality material. The material is super thick, yet not concealing. The material bunched up weird in the back too and didn't seem to fit right on top. Overall, I would say this dress looks amazing on other women, but it's not for me.

links_reviews_title: First Herve dress ever worn. Very form fitting.
links_reviews_text: Very form fitting and flattering dress. I rented 3 Herve dresses and ultimately didn't go with this one but it's gorgeous.

links_reviews_title: Great fit and form. Perfect length for a short girl!
links_reviews_text: Always love Herve bc of the quality of fabric. And it was the perfect length for someone who's short.

links_reviews_title: My boyfriend loved it so much he bought it for me
links_reviews_text: Sexy but still classy. Extremely well made. Heavy material sucks everything in.
Loved this dress because it is not only very form fitting but also on the longer end of Herve dress lengths. Didn't have to keep pulling the dress down like I have with other styles.
Very comfortable, fits well. Was kind of thick material so I got hot quickly but gorg dress

I loved this dress! The material was thick and I could wear a normal bra. But it was pretty unforgiving in the midsection even with spanx. Im 5'3 and 120lbs I tried it on in the store and loved it but after drinking and eating all night you could tell I had a food/drink baby!

links_reviews_title: You can't go wrong with Herve. Class all the way.
links_reviews_text: If you are familiar with Herve, this is a great piece, all of the fit, with none of the legs/boobs, for a more formal/conservative affair. Don't get me wrong, you will still turn heads with it's signature curve clinging material. I was happy that this dress didn't seem 'worn out' as sometimes girls squeeze into Herve, when they should really size up. I am 5'4" 130lbs, a 34D/DD, and although i could squeeze into an XS, Small is the way to go for girls my size. You don't have to worry, it's plenty tight, the arms hit perfectly, not too baggy or floppy or awkward. All of the marks of a designer dress. I adore Herve, and wish they made a lot more conservative pieces like this. I am too old to have boobs hanging out everywhere, or a mini skirt on in front of my teens. This allows you to look great, and still look CLASSY.
great fit, lots of compliments
This dress was classy yet sexy. Tight fitting but very flattering and very comfortable. I got compliments all night. I have never gone wrong with this designer!

The material is heavy weight, tight fitting, and gave me a great hour glass figure. It is perfect for a bubble butt! It is really comfortable. Underwear and bra lines are visible despite the material and dark. color. I wore a maidenform slip. The high cut neckline, color, and high quality of the dress made it conservative enough for a wedding despite the curve hugging tightness and short length. The medium was too roomy in the back. The small was a perfect fit. I got this dress as a replacement after my first (and cheaper) choice wasn't able to ship. I'm not sure I would rent it at full price. It didn't stand out enough for me. It was missing a "fun" element. But I'm sure the right jewelry and accessories could change that. I just didn't pick the right ones!
Loved this dress, it's simple yet still beautiful. It's tight fitted but not uncomfortable. Herve Leger is timeless. I would absolutely wear this dress again.
This dress is beautiful and elegant. Got compliments all night.
Awesome. Unexpected rental because my original rental was not available. It turned out that it was actually more appropriate for affair. RTR stylists are the Best!

links_reviews_title: I felt so sexy in this dress!
links_reviews_text: It is super tight and people should know that you should wear this dress if you wanna FEEL SO SEXY about yourself ;)
HL is a form fitting, elegant, sleek look. I felt sophisticated and well dressed without being showy. I very much enjoyed wearing this dress and will likely rent another HL!
How much do I want to keep this?!! Hugs so good. Super comfortable. Feels really sexy. I think HL is my favorite designer for a body hugging dress. Ooh la la.

This dress was not what I requested but I was over the moon delighted that I got it! I intended to wear another dress to a work gala for which the declared dress code was "business", however this one was one of my just-in-case picks in case mine wasn't available. I'm so glad it got picked for me because it fit like a glove and I felt like a million bucks. I received many compliments on this dress and it felt conservative and work-appropriate yet sexy. The linework is stunning (apologies my picture doesn't do it justice). Get this dress, you'll be thrilled!

This is my second Herve rental and I'm obsessed. This dress is really sexy without being over the top. It was perfect for a date night. I needed a lot of helping zipping into the dress, but that's how you know it's the right size.
I loved the fit. Very flattering. Wore it to the casino for my friends 30th birthday. (36d, hourglass)
Color is very deep- perfect for fall wear in warmer climates - couldn't walk a block without a compliment - curves are hugged in the best way- it fit me by the knees - I can't let this dress go-
Great fit and great quality. I loved this dress!!
Loved everything about it.
Like most of Herve Leger's dresses, the dress is beautiful and the fabric is excellent quality. I wish I could buy the dress but the price tag! I would definitely rent again!
This dress is very very fitted (as are all Herve leger dresses) but flattering! Great for a fun night out in Vegas!

links_reviews_title: Very cute and love the color
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! I wore it for a weekend in NYC. It fit very well and the dress was brand new and didn't feel warn at all like some of the other ones I have rented. I thought this might be a little conservative because of the neckline for the weekend but the style and fit was so sexy I was happy it was a higher neckline! Loved it and will rent it again.

This dress fit true to size and came with be tags! I didn't end up wearing it as it was an add in when my original dress was ruined. It just didn't stand out to me but it was a comfortable dress to wear and I enjoyed trying it out. I wish it was a little lower cut in either the front or back to balance the conservative navy color.
Dress was perfect for date night, comfortable and fit great!
This is a great dress. Sexy but not skanky. I'm 5'4", 110 lbs, 34A, and the XS fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Fits perfect and hugs every curve
links_reviews_text: Perfect. I'm renting again
I loved the waist fit but the top was a little small because I’m a 34dd.
I love the material of this dress, it's supportive and tight and exactly what you want.
Fits like a traditional HL dress. This one has same classic lines you would expect. Long enough that you aren't constantly pulling it down. Great neck - sophisticated
Fits small in the bust - was unable to wear
So so tight, but great material and style

links_reviews_title: Full Disclosure: I just wanted to try on a Herve!
links_reviews_text: Dress is lovely. Clearly worn so no longer a true navy blue--a bit purplish. Nonetheless, holds you in beautifully and accentuates your shape. Love it.
It fit perfect and I felt like a rockstar in it

This was an absolutely gorgeous dress, but runs very small. If I had the small, it would have fit perfectly but I am slightly under 5 foot, about 103 pounds (mostly in the booty), and had trouble with the fit of the XS. Had to return, but will rent in the future as a small.

links_reviews_title: No need to suck in your tummy
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing! I felt glamorous and didn't feel I had to hold my tummy in. The dress did that all for me. You can't go wrong with this dress. I wore it for an art show and a fashion show after party. So fun. I also let my friend borrow it and she is a size 8-10 and she looked amazing in it. I'm a size 4
So many compliments and so many people asking where I bought it. My husband loved this dress and it was perfect for the wedding.
I wore this for a Mardi Gras ball, and it was so perfect! The top is obviously really low, but a practice run of taping made all the difference! Couldn't have been happier with this dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress was beautiful! The color was gorgeous, and it felt great!
links_reviews_text: I wound up wearing the smaller size of the two I ordered. Both of the tops were a little on the large side, so I would have liked to take the straps up a little. Otherwise, it fit like a glove. It is very thick material, and the sequins aren't scratchy at all. The color was beautiful, and people complimented it all night! This was my first RTR experience, and I'll definitely do it again!

links_reviews_title: Worn for a casino themed work party
links_reviews_text: Got a ton of compliments all night, the dress is absolutely gorgeous. Didn’t need to wear a bra and felt fine the whole night. I wish it was a bit longer but still looked gorgeous on.

links_reviews_title: You'll feel glamorous in this gown!!!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a black tie Gala for my husband's work event, & I definitely stood out! It's a gorgeous shade of green, the side cut-outs add a touch of sexy, & it sparkles from head to toe - I received a ton of compliments all night. However I wish I ordered the size 0 for a perfect fit. It runs a bit big & the straps are long making it super low cut. But besides that I would 100% recommend this stunning dress!!!

links_reviews_title: Best New Years outfit a girl could ask for
links_reviews_text: Comfy, maneuverable , and extremely sparkly . What more could a girl ask for ? Endless compliments ensued for this flattering piece and it was the most fun to accessorize with

links_reviews_title: Received many compliments from men and woman.
links_reviews_text: Felt glamorous and beautiful. Zipper are shifted to the side a little and had to constantly move it back to the center. Overall is a very beautiful dress get it!!

links_reviews_title: I didn’t think I was going to like this dress as much
links_reviews_text: I wish the the other size I requested arrived but nether-less it was perfect the only issue I have is sequence keep rubbing off my under arm and left some scratches

This dress was amazing. I wore it for a NYE black tie wedding and got so many compliments on it. I wish I had a picture that did it justice. I typically wear around a size 6-8 depending on the designer but there was a slight mishap and I had to make the 4 work. It ended up fitting perfectly, although I had to work to reign in my boobs. I have a large chest and was a little worried about exposing too much through the side cut outs but it was fine. So comfortable and just a fun dress to wear.

links_reviews_title: Dress fit my body perfectly and I felt beautiful
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! So many compliments. Would definitely order again!

Ended up ordering this as a last minute backup when the dresses I ordered initially didn't fit right/weren't flattering. I had to size up because they were down to just a few dresses left, and while I think I would have preferred the fit of my true-size slightly more, this was still very flattering. I could see how the cutouts might not work for everyone, but with the position of my waist, they worked really well.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress for Emerald City themed black tie event!
links_reviews_text: True to size, very comfortable, dances all night in it. Length was perfect with heels. Straps were a little long, if I owned it I'd alter those. This lead to more boob exposure than desired but still wearable. Got compliments all night on it. My husband really liked it too.

I wore this as a bridesmaid for a friends winter wedding. I got the 8 and the 10. The 8 fit me a little snugger, which I preferred, but the zipper broke so had to wear the 10. I am a 34-36DD and the bust was slightly roomy. You cannot wear a traditional strapless bra with this because of the side cut outs. It's a gorgeous gown. It was light weight and slightly stretchy. I felt super sexy and glamorous.

I rented this dress for a winter photo shoot. It's a beautiful color, very comfortable and photographed amazing. I am 5'7 and wore 2.5 inch heels and the dress was short to me even though I ordered a 8L. I didn't like that my feet showed at all. I wanted it to be longer. Also the bust was low which I wouldn't have minded but it may have been way too big for me for my bust area, my bra kept showing. I would probably go down a size if I ever rented this again. But the material is quality.

This dress fit like a dream in all the right places I was able to wear a strapless bra with a thin back strap and it didn't show through the cutouts! I got SO many compliments on this gown including mermaid princess goddess! I am very thin with no curves built like a stick figure and it made me look like I had boobies and a butt I love this dress!
Top runs slightly large but it didn't give me any issues! I loved how sexy I felt in this dress. The sequins weren't itchy which is a huge plus for me. I'd rent this dress again in a heart beat.

I rented this dress for a gala/party. This dress was so pretty and not heavy at all! It was actually really stretchy at the legs so it would've been perfect for dancing. I could see that it could be a little scratchy under the arm pits but otherwise was super comfortable. I'm just barely 5'6" and it was a great length with 3in heels. I did not end up wearing this dress because I liked another I got better, but it was gorgeous and I'll definitely rent it again if I need to!
Loved the dress! The top was a little big, but the sequence was just what I wanted.

The dress is a show stopper. Received compliments all night. Initially I was a little nervous on how flashy it could be, but it was so beautiful I forgot alll about it. I typically wear a size 6. However I should've gotten a 4 long. The 6 was too big, especially in the chest. It kept falling down and the weight of the length of it made the chest part fall even more I think. Overall 5 stars, a breeze to rent from the company, and amazing dress! Was sad to ship it away.

I rented this dress for an upscale wine festival. This dress was glistening all evening. Very comfortable and stretchy material. The sequins were soft enough that they didn't scratch my skin. Loved this dress so much and received so many compliments. If your looking for comfort and glam this is the dress for you!

links_reviews_title: Impeccable service & the dress was a stunner!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size-- if you have a full chest this gown will do all the work for you. However some ladies may prefer a sticky bra for some shape. Due to the cutouts you can't wear shapewear with this dress-- I tried it with a natural waist undergarment but it still creates a poppin fresh effect on the cutouts. Decided to skip it for Friday's black tie event and will instead wear it with a thong on Saturday night. Very formal, very glam!
Great fit. Color beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Would 100% rent from them again the ladies that worked there were extremely helpful and super nice!!
links_reviews_text: I thought I would need a size 8 but was very pleasantly surprised when i tied the 6 and it fit like a glove, the dress made me feel so amazing, though I'd recommend an updo because your hair will get stuck on sequins.

links_reviews_title: This dress was a show stopper.
links_reviews_text: It fit so perfectly. Giving the perfect fit & style for my body type. I got so many compliments on it. I’m roughly 175 pounds, 5 feet 7 inches & the 8 long was fabulous!

Loved loved loved this dress! Received a ton of compliments and I was extremely comfortable in it all night! It hugs in all the right places. This dress runs big so definitely size down at least one whole size. I'm a typically a 6-8 in formal wear but I wore the 4 and it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: The color and cutouts on the side!
links_reviews_text: This dress was fabulous! The color, sequins, and cutouts on the side make it a very sexy dress. I would definitely recommend the long if you are 5'7" or taller.
fit well, straps were a little loose so boobs hung out a little

links_reviews_title: Dress is very comfortable while pregnant
links_reviews_text: Im 5 feet tall. 23 weeks pregnant. Dress hugged my curves perfectly and accentuated my belly in a very classy way. Got lots of compliments on the dress and would 100% rent again
Top runs a little big !

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments!! Was comfortable and glamorous!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, I had a shaper on but didn't need one. Had to be careful with the length in the back catching on my heels but other than that , I loved the dress!

links_reviews_title: Old Hollywood style glam with a twist!
links_reviews_text: I could have worn the 8, but there wasn't one when i needed this. Such a beautifully cut gown! Don't miss this exceptional look!

I rented this for a Mardi gras ball. Turns out it was an Under the Sea theme which was perfect because I felt like a mermaid! Be careful it's a little roomy up top. Also I wear a 2 in everything and ended up wearing the 0. Barely touched the ground with about 4 inch heels (5'5"). I loved this dress!
I really enjoyed wearing this gown. It rubbed a little under the arm area; otherwise, it was the perfect Mardi Gras dress.

Rented this for a black tie charity gala 5'4'', 158lbs, 30GG-28 waist-37 hips easily could have worn the 6 but went for the 8 Pros- I wear a 30GG and I wasn't suffocating or looking inappropriate (the top has space but you'll need fashion tape if you have a small back) Length was perfect I have a 27inch inseam and I wore 5 inch heels with a platform Fitted through the body but space to dance and eat and sit Cons? Looks like a different shade of emerald/olive depending on the lighting. Straps aren't adjustable so tape or pins will be your bestie Not super warm you'll need a shawl or fur thing of sorts if you live somewhere wintery There's no Stretch which is why I went for the 8 rather than the 6.
This dress will be noticed! Didn't want my boobs to be quite so center stage so went with another gown.

I used this for a Mardi Gras Ball. I'm 5'5 150lbs and pregnant. It was so comfortable! The long was great as I did wear a 3in heel and it barely hit the floor. It was a gorgeous dress and had a lot of give. I would wear it again! Very easy to get on and off too!

links_reviews_title: Mermaid-esque, Moves elegantly- Just sexy enough
links_reviews_text: It fit well- I could have gone with the 2L because I like higher heels, but the slightly longer in the back style of the mermaid bottom made up for any length lacking. I did tape the girls in just to guarantee that there were no wardrobe malfunctions. This dress moves in a lovely way and reflects light. My evening was as sparkly as the dress, and I had folks stopping me to compliment.
Loved this dress, tons of compliments. Little long on me (I'm 5'9) but I could have worn higher heels. Very fun dress, felt great in it.
Dress fits true to size, but runs short... I'm 5'5 and ended up having to order it in a 6L. Beautiful emerald green color and comfy to dance in! Wore to a gala !

I am 5'6, 125 pounds. The 0R fit me perfectly. The size 0R and 2R fit the same but I wore the size 0. Next time I would order a long because I wanted the dress to be longer. Side area where the cutouts are was a little loose but not extremely baggy. Overall great dress, lots of compliments.

I absolutely loved this dress, but should note that I favor classic, chic pieces, and like to be more covered up. Really great for tall woman who want the tea length. It's a lot of heavy fabric, but you're able to move in it. It does have a swishy noise to it as you move, which I found charming. Def size down on this. It's very forgiving, and I ended up thinking I could have gone even smaller. I went with simple jewelry, nude strappy shoes, and a low bun...felt simple and classic

I normally wear a six but this one fit perfectly in a 4. The dress is thick which is great because you don’t see a bra strap and also stretchy so it’s pretty forgiving. I got compliments which is always nice.

Made with a beautiful heavy material, perfect cut, miles of fabric on the skirt, tea length. Conservative enough to wear to a work function, but oh so elegant and classic. I felt beautiful wearing this dress. It was very luxurious.

The fabric is really thick (read: forgiving) so it didn't really matter that the dress was a bit too big. I wore it to work with ballet flats and a cardigan, and then swapped the shoes and it was perfect for an evening event. It's a little low cut for daytime without some additional coverage.

links_reviews_title: Sometimes I just need to overdress for work. A special dress like this one just made me feel great.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fit although a little low cut for my work. Oh well, put on a sweater when needed. Rest of the day, I twirled the skirt and loved it. Heavy beautiful, but swishy sounding fabric.

Couldn't have asked for a better dress. This material is a thick stretch, so it's a very easy fit. It's good for all body types. The skirt was on the long side: I'm 5'8" and it was mid-shin on me. The shape of the dress is elegant and classic. I loved it and highly recommend.
The material is incredible and was perfect for a cold kansas wedding. I received many compliments

This dress was an alternative choice when my original dress was unavailable. It's really beautiful with lovely movement for dancing. The fabric is unusual - it almost has a spandex/scuba suit feel to it, but it's lovely and does not wrinkle at all. It runs large, I'm typically a 10, but wore the 42 (which is suposed to be a 6!?). The waist of the dress fit very high on me (I'm pretty long waisted), but still looked fine. It is very low cut - I wore it to a benefit for a nursing home run by nuns so wasn't comfortable with the amount of cleavage. I added a light weight spandex-type tank underneath and it looked like part of the dress. I would definately rent this again for the right occasion.

Material is super thick, which was great for a November wedding where the temperature was 30* and the ceremony portion was outdoors! It is a classic, elegant dress. However, if you're short like I am (5'1"), the dress runs long. It hit a little above my ankles. I liked the dress a lot, and it fit everywhere perfectly, but I probably wouldn't rent it again just because of the length.

This was my back up dress after my original choice wasn't available. I'm normally between a 12 and 14, but when the stylist recommended this dress, she suggested I get the 44 (US 8) and 46 (US 10). I was nervous it was going to be too small, but the dress has so much stretch I ended up wearing the 44, and maybe could have worn a size smaller! My favorite part of this dress is the skirt. When someone twirled me for the first time on the dance floor there was an "oooo" from everyone around me! With the fullness of the skirt and the weight of the material it made a pretty impressive effect. A few cons to the dress: 1. the waist line was either too high or two low. Where it hit me was not bad but not quite flattering enough. Maybe if I had a smaller size it would have been better. 2. The arm holes seemed fine at first, but I ended up futzing with them in the front. And when I took the dress off at the end of the night it was a little red running from my shoulder to my arm pit. 3. Why, oh, why does this dress not have pockets?! With the fullness of the skirt they would blend in perfectly! Overall, I would recommend this dress as it was mostly comfortable, looked nice, and had a great twirl. Definitely order down at least a size if not two or three.

The fabric on this dress is GREAT! Super thick and HEAVY fabric but was super comfortable and plenty of room to move around. I would have been better wearing the size 38 as this was a little too long and not as fitted as I would have liked. The fabric is super stretchy, I recommend sizing down for a backup because of how big this how much stretch and room I had wearing this. Plus you are able to wear a standard bra with this!

Substantial weight to the material. Runs large in the waist and (hips obviously). The cut of the neck line and arm holes are proper ratio and appropriate without being oversized. I would rent this again for another occasion. Does look dark navy in some lighting.

links_reviews_title: Wonderful fabric, a bit long though
links_reviews_text: Loved how this dress fit! I could have probably gone a size smaller, it has a pretty low neckline but I think a size smaller would have handled that issue. The fabric is thick and heavy which I like, excellent quality. It is very long though, more than I expected, just above my ankles.

links_reviews_title: Comfy but dont recommend for pregnancy
links_reviews_text: Really wanted to wear this dress to a friends upcoming wedding. The dress is comfortable and flattering up top but at 30 weeks pregnant it pushes out the dress and it becomes tent like. Maybe it would work earlier in pregnancy
Nice material and cut -- but go two sizes down
I'm 5'5 and the dress was almost tea length. Its a beautiful navy color and has a lot of volume. Very easy to dress it up.
This dress is huge! Size down. Material is a heavy sort of scuba material -- would not recommend for summer.
This runs large (really large). Also the bottom is not hemmed and the fabric is quite heavy.

The dress fits beautifully and wears well all day (no wrinkles). It is a bit dressy for most workplaces, although not mine, and I paired it with a jean jacket to make it more casual. The skirt is full and the fabric a little on the stiff side, but I felt like a million bucks.
It's true what other reviewers said about the fabric being forgiving but there's just so much of it. Felt like I was wearing a giant black tent.

Runs large. Beautiful, comfortable and well made but I'm typically a 6 and the 42 was pretty large on top. Was officiating a friends wedding and couldn't wear because I didn't want any boob showing...I didn't have fashion tape with me. I would have liked it to be a little more fitted around the rib cage area as well but again, just runs a little large I think. Waiting for the 40 to be available and I will be renting it right away!!!!

links_reviews_title: Did not wear because it's two sizes too big.
links_reviews_text: Did not wear because it's two sizes too big.

links_reviews_title: This dress is a stunning spinner!
links_reviews_text: On my 5'6" frame this dress was longer than tea length and the size I received was about 2 sizes too large. Cute dress that I would try again for a different event in a smaller size.
This was a Georg pus dress. I wore it to my family's Christmas Eve and felt a little overdressed but it was such a beautiful dress I didn't care

links_reviews_title: My daughter wore this to a work/dinner event.
links_reviews_text: Fit well, the material was very heavy.

links_reviews_title: Shockingly large in size and the front plunge is no joke.
links_reviews_text: I ordered an 8 and it was several inches for a fitted look as I had hoped. Seemed more like a jumper.
heavy thick material, comfortable, love the flow of the bottom

links_reviews_title: Too much for the office, better for an event
links_reviews_text: The v was a little too deep for the office but I paired with a cardigan to solve that issue. The material is great weight for the winter. It's missing pockets, felt like they should've been sewn in.

links_reviews_title: Great black dress just way tooo big
links_reviews_text: Great quality - But too large I couldn't wear it
Really well made and beautiful, heavy fabric. Has some stretch but still maintains its architectural integrity. It was too low cut for me to wear to the event .
not cute, matronly, fits comfortably

links_reviews_title: This dress is heavy with amazing drape. I would have liked for it to be a bit longer waisted
links_reviews_text: Great dress. The quality is stunning, and I loved the drape and heft of the fabric. However, I would have loved it even more with a longer waist that was a bit more nipped in. Also, because it's a synthetic fiber, it mopped up the smell of the restaurant where we ate, and I had to give it a heavy dose of scent spray to wear it again.

I loved how this dress fit. It definitely runs large; I recommend sizing down one or even two sizes. It is quite low cut, but I wasn't worried about falling out of it. High quality, heavy fabric, beautiful drape. Very Italian. Recommend!

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite rentals ever
links_reviews_text: I have rented this dress three times. I love it! Goes with every shoe in your closet- heels, flats and sneaks ( my personal choice!). The top is nicely fitted with a respectable amount of cleavage but nothing scandalous at all. The skirt is full with gorgeous movement. Gonna hold on to this one a little longer.
runs slightly large...beautiful, easy to wear but long --more midi length then shown here on 5'4

Great fit on top, providing a lot of coverage for large chested ladies. But the cut at the hips is not the most flattering. So if you'd like to flaunt your hips or backside in any ways, you may look to another dress.
This dress would be good for a party or nicer affair, but was too long/bulky for the office. And it ran very big.

links_reviews_title: This was the perfect dress for a cocktail-attire party.
links_reviews_text: This was a great little black dress. It fell to mid calf and looked great with flats or heels. I received multiple compliments on it and have already recommended the same dress to a friend for a different event.
Very flattering and easy

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous and potentially problematic for hourglass and/or short women.
links_reviews_text: This picture doesn't do these pants justice. They are GORGEOUS and flowy! I am an hourglass so the waist fitted slightly loose but I don't think it's enough to size down. SHORT WOMEN WATCH OUT! I am 5'5" with long legs. I wore 3 inch booties and these pants slightly brushed the ground. So, tall women rejoice! Next time I rent I might take a risk and size down for a more fitted cinched waist.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to wear these but Too much fabric for me.
links_reviews_text: My HS reunion is coming and the dress code is Saturday Chic. I have wanted to rent these for a year and sadly I am not the body type. They are high waisted and very long. The fabric is crepe like and flowy- So pretty and very comfortable (no stretch tho). I rented the 12, Euro sized, and it fit my waist. Just too much fabric.
Loved the fabric. The high waist made me look taller. Received many compliments, I will rent this again!

Love these pants. The fit was great. I’m a shorty but they were perfect with my normal work pumps, 3”. Looks amazing when paired with a slim fitting bodysuit. I prefer a turtleneck for extra chic-ness. I felt fabulous all day in these!
Rent the pants! Perfect length with heels. So flattering. Love them
I love everything about these pants: the fabric is quality, the length is great for taller ladies, and the style is unique yet very easy to wear.

Coolest pants ever! I've now added these into my regular rotation for workwear. I originally rented them for a trip, and loved that they were an easy way to look polished and unique (plus the fabric is very packing-friendly - minimal wrinkles). The high waist would make these perfect for pairing with a crop top, but I have gone with either a tank top or turtleneck. Super slimming, but still flowy - pretty much no stretch at all, so just bear that in mind! I am quite tall and the fabric brushed the ground - so shorter folks may feel the need for a heel.

Hard to describe these, because they are so beautifully unusual. A little more blue than blue black as they appear in the reviews. Note: some reviewers said they run small, but I sized up to a 6 & they were a bit too big. Should have stuck with the 4. You will not regret wearing these for any occasion.
Fit was great and material was good - not too thin. Would recommend for a date night or special occasion, back zipper gets tedious during a long work day. Overall I recommend these.

links_reviews_title: Runs small and fabric picks up dirt easily
links_reviews_text: Part of the reason I do unlimited is to try stuff I would never ever buy. These pants are definitely different. They were comfortable and. pretty but I had no idea what to wear with it. You can't really tuck anything in bc it shows under the fabric. A crop top isn't an option at work. I realize the sweater I paired with it is probably out off style, but was the only thing in my closet. I think these pants were just too cool for me. Also they picked up dirt like crazy, so don't wear for a outdoor event or picnic.
More pants should be made with the skirt overlay detail. So flattering, fun, and still profrssional.

I have to say that although these look like you're about to attend a capoeira class, they really are UNIQUELY AMAZING! I'd purchase these for sure. Super comfy, and true to size. I'm a US4; 5'4 and the length was perfect with my cinderella 3" heels. Take a chance and rent these, that’s what RTR is for!

I paired it with rented top. I wish that I had paired it with something sexier. I ended up looking a little frumpy but it was too cold outside to show skin. The pants didn't photograph well but they did flow well when walking across a room. I loved the coverage for my giant booty. There was an uncomfortable wedgie going on underneath but I'm used to that.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, but best for tall lanky ladies
links_reviews_text: I love Osman, amazing on trend style and unbeatable quality. Pockets, gorgeous navy color... A bit tough to pair with something, and honestly better for someone with longer legs than myself. I put heels on and they looked better, but still a little full pant shape for my already curvy figure.

links_reviews_title: Flowy, funky, slim waisted, long length
links_reviews_text: This was fun to try as something different. Definitely a statement piece, and perhaps a bit edgier than I would normally wear to work. Very high waisted and slim in the waist. Glad that I got the size 8, even though I usually wear a size 4. Had to wear 3 inch high heels to make it work.
Interesting pants however I love the uniqueness! Super comfortable and a light fabric. They did run long length wise. Can see a super chic person rocking these out to a night out on the town!
Such great pants. Adds a little flair to regular work pants. I would have preferred they fit a bit tighter around the waist but overall they were great
You definitely need to size up. I usually wear a 6/8 and had to get a 10.

I normally wear an 8 and the 12R fit perfectly. These are so classy but versatile. I was able to tuck bulkier shirts in and it didn't look bad because the flap hangs down and covers any bunching. I would totally rent these again.
Love these pants. RTR suggested a 6R for me. I normally wear a 0, and it was way too big. I want to try again with a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: The fit and cut was just beautiful
links_reviews_text: A little long for me 5'4, but heels made it work

Comfortable knit- pockets! Unfortunately, I'm short-waisted and this would look much better on a long waisted woman. I'm 5' 5" and needed a 3 inch heel not to drag the hemline. I tore apart my closet to find something to wear with these super fun pants. Whatever top you match to these pants needs to be form-fitting to offset the volume of these pants.

After reading some review that stated the waistband was slim and unforgiving, I rented a size up from my usual 6, the equivalent of 8 = 10R. The pants were just a bit too big, though, I should have kept with my usual size with my body type. I am more of an athletic pear, so my waist is fairly slim. I really liked these pants, they are casual to business appropriate. The fabric is flat (no sheen) and the skirt portion has a lot of material, so they were very cute but just not that dressy -- best suited for casual evening outing or work.

Should have sized down as they would have been more flattering if more fitted. Got many comments that I looked so put together and professional, stylish, etc. Had a lot of looks from women ( in a good way).

links_reviews_title: did not wear, way too small
links_reviews_text: as above

links_reviews_title: Cool pants; too big and too long
links_reviews_text: I really like these pants, but they were too big and little too long. The design is really edgy and actually sophisticated; however, they were just too big, with too much fabric and I couldn't find the right top. Great on somebody taller with something slimmer on top. I couldn't get a blazer to work or any jacket, for that matter.

These pants are gorgeous and so different. For winter, it was difficult to match with my wardrobe, and seems to be best fit with a tight crop as shown in the photo. Will rent again in spring/summer with summer top!

links_reviews_title: These pants are fun. They work best with a tight top.
links_reviews_text: I had to wear these pants very high, since the waist does not have a lot of give. That worked well since they are long (I needed to wear at least a two inch heel so the bottoms wouldn't drag on the ground). These are fun and funky. I received lots of compliments.
The pants were too large in the waist so I'm going to to size down and try again. The style is interesting and has a high-waist which I love.
They are high fashion but comfortable, look good with a tight top or button down shirt!! LOVE

links_reviews_title: I got this for a weekend trip in NYC.
links_reviews_text: These pants were AMAZING! Subtle, beautiful, interesting, and comfortable! I am 5'4" and with a small 2" heel the length was perfect. Went all the way to the ground versus the crop shown on the model. I am thinking of buying them!
I think the 6r was the smallest size - if so it was too big around my waist and way too long to wear Beauty flowy material though
I was not able to wear these pants due to their length, even with my highest heels. I do like the style and wish I could have worn them.
Loved this dress. It was comfortable and made me feel great!

links_reviews_title: Great fit, ran a little big so I wore the smaller size. Good quality, lots of compliments!

links_reviews_text: This dress was a perfect length even on a tall frame with the slit coming up just high enough. The lacing in the back were great for adjusting to different bust sizes. Contemplating purchasing this dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress was my best friend and I got so many compliments. I didn't want to give back to be honest
links_reviews_text: I am 5' 8" and 130 lbs Fit: I ordered a 4 but I should have got a 2 Pros: stunning dress, beautiful color. I love the lace up back of the dress, perfect length, and very class dress. Cons: was too big on me. Nothing else though

I loved this dress!!! The color was so fun and I got tons of compliments. The 2 was a little snug so I went with the 4 and felt it was more flattering on my body. I wore it with sticky boobs since the back is open. My only complaint is that this dress wasn't very forgiving around the stomach area. I wore shape wear underneath, but it was difficult to find a pair that worked with the dress. You could see the lines a little bit but I decided it was better than going without anything to hold me in! Overall very happy with my renting experience!

links_reviews_title: Everybody loved this dress!! People were commenting on the red all night.
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. It ran maybe a little big but nothing to crazy. I loved the back and the slit in the front. It was comfortable enough to dance in and did not get wrinkled at all because the material is thick. It was my first time using rent the runway and it was a super easy and fun experience!
Very comfy, danced all night, super stretchy and the tie makes the tightness up too adjustable.

Wore this to a summer wedding, absolutely loved the color! Dress fit pretty true to size. I am usually a 4 or a 6 and the 6 was perfect (with room to eat wedding cake ;)). Very comfortable, easy to dance and feel pretty while wearing!
I typically wear size 6 but this one seemed slightly big around the hips, perhaps size 4 would have been ideal. Can’t complain though because I felt very comfortable and sexy :)

links_reviews_title: Sexy but still classy as hell
links_reviews_text: I'm obsessed with this dress. I never wear red, because I'm a red head. I pushed myself out of my comfort zone and I'm so glad I did. One million compliments. Fit like a glove (I'm usually a 4/6 and the 4 fit be perfectly). Definitely go for it!!!!!
I absolutely loved this dress! The adjustable back made it so easy to wear. I wore this to an outdoor ceremony and the fabric wasn't too thick. It was the perfect weight. Would absolutely rent again
This dress was so comfortable and so flattering! felt so confident all night in this. Was a little longer on me that the model, but still great, didn't change the look.
I liked the back of this dress, but I did not like the front. The fabric didn't seem to hang quite right and didn't flatter me.
Perfect fit everywhere EXCEPT the back of the dress was a bit too large. Would have been happier sizing down to the 4. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: I would wear this dress everyday if I could!
links_reviews_text: This dress is AMAZING. The color makes you stand out in a crowd, it fits like a glove, and it is so comfortable and sexy. I got so many compliments on this dress and would definitely recommend you rent this for an upcoming event. I ordered both a 6 and a 4 and the 4 fit perfect. I love this dress!!!

I rented this dress to wear to a spring wedding. I typically range between a 4 and a 6 depending on how things fit at my chest. Unfortunately, I wasn't able to wear this dress as the material is unforgiving and clearly shows all trouble areas (my tummy for me). I didn't think it was very flattering, so I opted for something already in my closet.
Party

links_reviews_title: So cute... but a little too big
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved the fit of this dress around my bust area! It was snug enough where I didn't have to wear a bra with it, but it didn't suffocate me! However, the area around my back and waist absolutely swallowed me. It bunched up when I would walk and I didn't feel comfortable enough to wear it out. On me the dress ended right in the center of my knee! If they had this in a 00 it would've fit perfectly.
Back straps make the tightness around the chest adjustable but made the area around my back gap up. Needed to go a size down.

I am typically a size 4 but trusted the other reviews and ordered a size 2 and backup size 0. I'm glad I did! Both sizes fit, but the size 0 tugged across my thighs just enough that I chose to wear the 2 instead. I was thrilled that the length was perfect despite being short, and the straps tie so the top was adjustable. The quality of the dress shows in the fit - I received compliments all night long!

links_reviews_title: Weird fit for me, too high slit
links_reviews_text: The fit of this dress was strange in general. The top fit me well, but the bottom was very tight and the mid section baggy. On top of that, the slit of the dress is pretty high and it scoots to the center of the body with movement. I ended up not wearing either of the sizes I got in this dress.

I ordered this dress in size 4 & 6 but both were too big. Thankfully I had time to order a backup in size 2. The size two was perfect but this dress definitely runs large. Size down! Otherwise, my boyfriend loved this dress for or Valentine's Day date and it was very comfortable.

I am smaller up top but a little curvy and normally have issues with dresses pulling at the hips but this was a perfect proportion from the top and bottom, the slit is a sexy touch to a sophisticated dress. I did have to be mindful when sitting down as the slit came up a little high but used my napkin or clutch. I got compliments all night and the back is fun too! Very comfortable to dance in, Highly recommend this for a wedding, the pop of color really makes it stands out! I LOVED this dress
Fit perfectly! Loved the tie in the back and the slit length was perfect

I got this dress as a backup for my Christmas party and didn't wear it out. It wasn't flattering on my curvy size 8 body, even with spanx. I felt self conscious about my mid area and because the dress didn't lay flat the hem started bunching and pulling in areas. I think this dress is suited for some one a little less curvy!

I rented this dress for a work outing that consisted of dinner, an art show and then a club with colleagues. I was able to wear it all night and enjoyed how it walked the line of sexy (fitted, red, open lace up back, high slit) and classy (long length, straight neckline) at the same time.
Wore this to a wedding in Palm Springs and got tons of compliments
I got lots of compliments on this dress. It fit well but was a little lose in the back.

I absolutely loved this dress! The color is a really nice bright red and the fit is great, especially because it's easy to loosen or tighten the dress with the ties in the back. I'm 5'4" and it was a bit long, but still a good length. I got so many compliments, and it was very comfortable too! 10/10 would recommend :)
Love the lace up back that makes the fit customizable. Received so many compliments about the color. The fabric was stretchy which was great for dancing
I didn't end up wearing this dress, but it was gorgeous and very comfortable!
Fit great ! Loved the color

I originally ordered a different dress in which both sizes came in way too small but RTR overnighted this dress to me and it was great. I ordered the 10 and the 12 and I wanted to wear the 10 because the length was a little shorter, but the underlayer wouldn't sit right and it bunched up the bottom of the dress so I ended up going with the 12. I liked this dress but wish it was a little bit shorter but overall very comfortable and easy to move it.
There was a small spot on it but I got it out with a tide pen and was very happy with the dress. The fit was perfect (5'3" 125 lbs and a 34B) and I got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Wish it was mine so I could make alterations at the waist!
links_reviews_text: Dress for really nice, much bigger than I thought, I'm usually a 4 but I was able to wear a 0. I'm 5'4, 120lbs. I have a very small waist and large hope so it didn't quite fit my waist but I managed. Super gorgeous color! The model picture doesn't do it justice!
Great dress. Very festive. Not a ton of support but going without a bra was ok. You might want pasties or adhesive bra on hand. Fun dress. Will rent again.
Fits true to the size, I do have wide thighs and it complimented my body
Fit true to size, perfect for a late summer wedding. The adjustable back is perfect for someone who is smaller through the bust. Very comfortable!

I really loved this dress! The color was beautiful and I definitely stood out at the wedding... I would 100% rent this dress again because it was comfortable and flattering. The only con was the straps would fall down when I was dancing but it wasn't a big deal, just a little annoying.

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress because A. I got compliments all night and B. Didn’t have to wear a bra!
links_reviews_text: I could have worn the 10 or the 12, but the 12 was more forgiving and easily adjustable with the straps in the back. Great material, the color is and orangey red in person
Beautiful fit and color. Only downside is that it tends to wrinkle if you're sitting for extended periods of time

links_reviews_title: F A B U L O U S
links_reviews_text: By far my absolutely favorite item I've ever rented. The thin scuba material is so flattering and forgiving and the cut of the dress is great for pear shaped gals. I want to wear this everyday. I will say the weird built in bra was annoying and didn't fit over my bust, but it wasn't too distracting to look at, just a little irritating. But even with that - this is the greatest dress. The bell sleeves and the v-cut backwere a fun a addition - almost purchased it, and cannot wait to rent it again.
I love this dress!! The fit was a little different than I normally expect from this designer, but I loved it! Compliments all night!
Comfortable stretchy material and loose fitting. I loved the sleeves!

The most comfortable dress, a classic silhouette with the surprise sleeve detail. Material is thick, so stretchy, and did I mention comfortable?? On the day of I started to worry about the color of my bra/underwear and whether or not they'd be visible - had zero problems even with a black bra! Would rent this again in a heartbeat! For reference I am 5'2", 36C, 135lbs

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and comfortable dress. Perfect for KY Oaks! Received lots of compliments:)
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress for the Oaks, runs true to size, very comfortable. My only issue was the lining for the bust area kept creeping up and showing through. I felt like I had to constantly adjust it. Overall lovely dress.

I liked the fit of this dress. It is fitted without being tight - which is great since I am post partum. The sleeves were fun and fine for dinner, though I did have to be aware of them around food and drink.
I loved this dress and I loved wearing it. I got so many complements and the material is awesome

The dress fit great! I could have gone with the smaller size but this one was fine. Only negative was it had this weird liner that was supposed to cover your bra but it just kept rolling up. You can see this in the picture.

links_reviews_title: A Cool North GA Mountain Wedding
links_reviews_text: This was a great dress for this wedding. I knew the temperature would be on the chilly side and this dress did a great job. It was very comfortable. It was a bit shorter than I was hoping and I did fight with the lining at the bust quite a bit. I found it easier to pull the lining up above the bust rather than trying to keep it flat which produced a faint line across the bust. I did receive quite a few compliments. Though this dress was great I probably would not rent it again. I typically wear between a size 6 and 8 and ordered both the 42 and 44. The 44 was a much better fit for me. I did have to wear some foundations under it to help with unsightly panty lines.
I received so many compliments! Great color and fit!

I wore this dress to a family member's wedding. I appreciated that the fabric was stretchy but that cut was not form fitting across the belly, which was nice being six months post partum. The sleeves are fashion forward and the cut of this dress with the high boat neck felt very Jackie O.
I wore this to work with opaque hose and black heels. Fit great. Loose and flattering, but wrinkled easily.
It's slips on, no zippers or buttons. Great dress! Wore to a baby shower! Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: It was a beautiful marriage blessing
links_reviews_text: Great dress! Got it for my Marriage Blessing! Nice soft material. Very comfortable! Probably not good for summer as the material is thick.

links_reviews_title: Not sure of the right fit
links_reviews_text: So as you can see from the pictures I don't think I was the right body type for this dress. The material was very slick if that's descriptive and not cozy like I prefer my dresses. The bell sleeves looked fine in the picture but may be more of a Halloween costume than a night out

The fabric was sturdy enough to hide all my flaws while still feeling comfortable to wear. I loved that it could be worn multiple ways, because it allowed me to really play with my look and find what I needed to wear to look my best.
It was a perfect dress! It fit just right and I felt comfortable in it all night. I got lots of compliments on it as well. Would definitely recommend!!
Comfy stretchy material. Really cute dress

The scuba material of the dress is relatively flattering. It's really warm tho so keep that in mind if you're a dancing wedding guest. The sleeves are a nice detail since the dress is very plain. You can wear a regular bra but keep in mind it's a boatneck so you have to keep watch of the straps.

links_reviews_title: Received tons of compliments but fit was a little off
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my brother's wedding. I received tons of compliments but the fit for both the 38 and 40 were off. The 38 did not hit me at the bust correctly. The seams for the bust line were above my armpits which created a very faint crease at this area. The 40 fit me at the bust but was too baggy on me. I went with the 38 for the wedding. The material is awesome and could be worn in a cool or warm climate wedding. The dress was also a little more pale and short than I expected. Overall, I was happy with my dress but I don't know if I would rent it again based on how great I felt in other dresses I rented from RTR.

I wore this to an outdoor bridal shower in August. Dress was pretty and I got a lot of compliments. One annoying thing was the lining in the chest was too small (I'm a 32D) and kept riding up, creating a bit of a line across the bust.

I rented both sizes 38 and 40. Both sizes fit (the size is forgiving), but the 38 looked better. It's important to wear bras that don't have lace that are smooth with this dress, since the lace will show through. Otherwise, the cut hugs the body at all the right places. I got so many compliments all day long. Since it was a coworker's wedding, I heard even more compliments after returning to work (it was memorable). The bride herself complimented me several times on her wedding day and after we returned to work!

I loved this dress! It would probably have been a little too heavy for a 90-degree day, but it was perfect for a rainy August day. It's a lightweight, thinner scuba material and was very wrinkle resistant and comfortable. Has a little stretch, but not super forgiving. It was perfect for church because of the modest boat neck, but I also thought it looked great worn backwards for more of a v-neck cut. Great peach color, and appropriate length.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress if you're a curvy lady
links_reviews_text: This is one of my all time favorite dresses and I'll definitely rent again. The top fits snuggly but in all the right ways and the bottom is A-line shaped so very friendly for a gal with a tummy like me! The fabric does kind of remind me of swimsuit fabric but I was perfectly comfortable. Don't hesitate and just rent it!
I wore this dress for over 12 hours during a conference. It was so comfortable and I received a ton of compliments. I may have to purchase this one!

links_reviews_title: Told I looked like I just came from the Royal Wedding
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly. I was concerned about wrinkles when I first opened the package but they quickly fell out. While the dress wrinkled when I sat or bent over, the wrinkles quickly went away. The dress fell to a few inches above my knee so taller women may want to note this - I am 5'2". While it is quite simple in style, I received so many compliments about this dress being beautiful and the gorgeous color. It was almost embarrassing! :-) I paired the dress with nude heels, a pink clutch, and a pearl statement necklace.
I'm obsessed with how light and stretchy the fabric is!! Should have ordered a size smaller but still worked as it hung well

links_reviews_title: LOVE this dress, but it was WAY too short
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress hoping to wear it to my bridal shower. I LOVE the sleeves for this dress, and I will for sure be renting this for another event! When my fiance saw it when i tried it on, he asked if i could buy it--he liked it that much! Unfortunately, it was too short to wear for the shower when I would be sitting opening gifts in front of a group. It fit perfectly, and would be great for a party or a night out with the girls. This dress is staying my "my hearts" for sure!
I was the step-mother of the groom. It got many compliments on the this gorgeous dress. The color, fit, and fabric are wonderful. I had purchased a slip to wear under it but it did not need it.
Very forgiving in the midfriff area for a curvy girl, like me.

links_reviews_title: PRETTY IN PINK!!! I was stunning in this dress and recieved many compliments.
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size, the one con I have is that the dress wrinkles very easy. So after sitting or under a coat, be prepared for wrinkled sleeves and dress.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress and necklace - arrived on time and easy as always!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress for a dance. True to size and beautiful color!

The material is stretchy and comfortable but it's tight- almost like spandex. I wore spanex underneath to soothe everything else. This wasn't my first choice but I'm glad RTR recommended it. Everyone kept complimenting the dress and my favorite feature were the sleeves and the neckline, very elegant and sophisticated. I'm curvy and a size 16 and the dress fit like a glove, although I don't have a large bust. Would recommend to rent!
This dress is gorgeous. The shape. The color. The material. It just works! The bell sleeves are super fun anf the body of the dress is extremely flattering. Will for sure rent again (and again!)

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a winter wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for my friend's winter wedding (outside in FL). The sleeves are seriously fabulous! I got lots of compliments and felt comfortable all night. It looks best when you add a statement necklace.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a Holiday Party that was cocktail attire and it was perfect
links_reviews_text: The material is amazing. It's stretchy, yet it's also flattering and is form fitting. The length was perfect and the dress fit true to size. All around I loved the dress. I usually wear a size 6 and the 40 fit perfectly. My only complaint would be the lining in chest area. sometimes it would bunch up and you would be able to see a line in the material.

The fabric on this dress is thick and very high quality. The fit is very flattering even on my post-baby body! The sleeves are a fun touch and I️ received numerous compliments. I️ do want to note that I️ had to wear a strapless bra because of the cut of the neck and I️ wasn't expecting that but it worked out fine. I️ highly recommend this dress!
Loved the fit and color! Super flattering and feminine--fabric feels like a dream on.

I loved the fit. I loved that it hugged everywhere without being too tight anywhere - it was perfect. I loved the material it was a thin stretchy material. The sleeves were long on me (but that's nothing new for me). I wore this for a costume and it was perfect and comfortable to wear all night! I sized down but didn't find a huge difference in the sizing and easily could have gone with the larger size.
